You can't listen songs for a long time because after 1 hour you will remove the earphones because it's very uncomfortable.. I will give 5 Star to it's built quality.. Only buy it if you are a casual user.. Or you can go for Mi basic, JBL C100si , Skullcandy, Ant audio and even the realme buds 2. These brands are much more comfortable and provides good sound.. Don't waste your money in this earphones...trust me you will literally fell pain in your ears.

name: sunny prasanth
title: 👌👌👌JUST AWESOME 👌👌👌
content: 👌👌👌JUST AWESOME 👌👌👌. Do not believe in others comment...... It has good BASS.... But not irritating Bass... One should go for this item if your budget is below 1500.rs.......I BOUGHT IT FOR 600Rs. 👌SOUND QUALITY - - - - - - 5/5 (FOR THIS PRICE RANGE) - - - Some compare this sound with 5000-to-7000 Sony, jbl, beats,...... Etc....... Within this price range it will be on the top...... 👌DURABILITY - - - - - 5/5....TANGLE FREE WIRE..... Even 7000 Sony earphones... Have not such type of quality...... 😊😊😊JUST GO FOR IT😊😊😊

name: Jyotishman barman
title: Lasting
content: Actually the product is too good (super bass, good sound quality,noise cancellation, everything a good headphones has)but,get damaged after 2-3 months of use, so if are expecting à year use then,I think it'll hardly last,cuz I've bought 3 pieces,and didn't lasted more than 3 month,after 3 months the sound quality fades and ultimately to no sound,so from my experience buy it only if u have no budget (pleanty of money to waste) it'll give the best in its working days so I'm giving it 5 stars, but if ure, searching for a long lasting headphones then it's not ur thing,my friend

name: Girish k
title: Better but could be Best
content: After doing a lot of research keeping in checks of my past experiences I didn't want to go for high end earphones and while doing so I got to view this one. Boy I tell you don't fall for th reviews as I did, cos sound and durability are good , however the material might be something where this falls flatter.. Basically the buds don't fit into my ears and especially when you go for a walk and you need to enjoy music. You'll hate this as the heavy weight in buds will will be always be coming out and doesn't fit in properly. Then again there is a holder in middle which is basically useless and heavy as it can be which pulls the earbuds down. The design of this earphones are flawed.. Finally it didn't serve my purpose so DISAPPOINTED

name: Sid
title: Works fine over 2.5 years of use, still counting....
content: Writing this after 2.5 years of use, still works fine.. Over the years, you might find 5-10% drop in bass as compared to the new, due to coil aging, but hardly noticeable, obviously you can always compensate the same with a proper Equalizer, if you really need it hard core.. But this product is history, hope you can find these.. As I have heard that boat being under warranty, give a replacement, have never claimed a warranty was lucky enough, and used them with care.

name: Vikram Kumar
title: Poor Mic. Bad for calling. Good bass.
content: This earphone is excellent for listening to music or watching movies. The bass quality is good.. But for calling purpose it is worst. The mic is not good. If the mic moves to other direction then the receiver doesn't hears any voice. To talk to someone i have to hold the mic near to my mouth.. I am fade up of this and hence planning to purchase a new one.. So go for this earphone only if u want to listen songs or watch movie.

name: Santana
title: Love it ❤
content: I just recived it 3 days ago nd So far I'm loving it.. Sound quality is also very good. Noise cancellation is also quite good.. No question on quality.. Only con I've found so far is that being metallic it feels kind of irritating in ear when used for long time. It often falls down from my ear and when I press it tightly the sound goes off(wondering whether it is my fault or the product has some problem)

name: Gajanan S
title: Not Comfortable At All
content: In my opinion this earphones are good. Because their quality is very good Bass is best in this price range but if you want comfortable fit and you use earphones for a long duration then don't go for this. Because this are not comfortable they frequently fell down from ears. I had tried all the earbuds and wing tips given in the box but they are not fitting comfortably in ears. So Final Answer for this product is their quality in case of sound, Bass is very good but if you want comfortable fit then you should not go for this.

name: Amazon Customer  Remee Khharje
title: #I Want the refund#.Earphones  earcaps are not**fitting at all .And both ears are paining badly.
content: #I want REFUND # No manual is there# The most important part of any earphones is**fitting** of earcap in Ears 👂 which wasn't working at all from all possible ways. No noise cancellation. Bass quality is not upto the mark. Kindly refund as soon as possible.

name: Harish
title: Great for its price
content: Bought this product a year back through Flipkart. The headset had been working perfectly since last 1 year till today when the left side stopped working. That's when I ordered this one.. To be frank I am pretty pleased that it worked for about 1 year as I almost drop the phone every weak or two with the headphones attached to it. Because of this, the wires became loose near the 3.5 mm connector.. Overall Impression. 1. Sturdy Built.. 2. Strong Wires.. 3. You get 6 pair of buds (unlike any other I've bought).. 4. Great Bass and sound quality at this price.

name: Harikrishnan PV
title: Worst Service and low quality
content: I'm giving 1 star for the after sales service and the product quality. I bought the product and within 1 month the left earphone stopped working and as instructed in the warranty I raised the request and uploaded the invoice downloaded from the Amazon site. Later I received a mail stating that the invoice is not valid or clear. They are not going to replace your product if it's faulty in the warranty. I have bought 1 Bluetooth headset, 1 Bluetooth Speaker, 1 Bluetooth Earpod and 1 wired earphone from Boat and the only thing still working is the Bluetooth speaker maybe because I paid a hefty amount on that..

name: Cj_Subham
title: Best earphones in this price range.
content: Awesome earphone!!!. It's worth every penny that you spent on it.. Previously ordered from Flipkart and got scammed by fake product but this time Amazon delivered it before the delivery date.. If you are a music lover it's not for you man.. The bass is not upto the mark but if you are a gamer boy then you will definitely enjoy it.... The build quality is amazing...In this price range no other brand will give tangled free wires and metal finish.. Due to metal it's bit heavy but after applying ear hooks you will definitely use it while running and gym.. Overall it come with a 1 year warranty but this will go more than 2 years...

name: Anishwar Singh
title: 30 Days and it expired !!!
content: Exactly 30 days of use and the right one stopped working!!!. What can we say about the quality ???. Connected to seller by their site, they picked it up for exchange and it's been 16 days now, no update. Looks like I lost my money, not getting anything back.

name: Arijit
title: Superb product @499
content: Quite a sturdy and quality product at the pricepoint. Very good sound on call also, noise cancellation is effectively experienced during calls. My only negative point for this product is that it is desigend as such that the in ear pieces tend to slip out, at least for me.

name: Parth
title: Nice in this price range with one year warranty
content: Here I am using this Earphones since 10 days..so i am sharing some pros and cons of this product so you can make your decision of purchasing it... PROS:-. -bass quality is good... -sound quality is good compared other in this price range. -long cable and gold plated pin. CONS:-. -earbuds can not fit in every one's ear..you need to change it from extra buds which comes with it. -sound quality is not too good compared to JBL and Sennheiser... AFTER END OF ALL I WOULD SUGGEST YOU IF YOUR RECOMMENDATION IS ONLY SOUND GO TO JBL AND SENNHEISER OR ELSE THIS ARE COOL.... Overall rating to this Earphones by me..... 8.5/10

name: VARUN TIWARI
title: Not the best
content: Extremely poor Sound quality of this earphone. There is no super extra bass, bass is not punchy, trebles are not well balanced. In terms of clarity this earphones are not too good. People's and brand created a hype for this earphone. In real world not extra bass on this, if uhh listening bass heavy songs in high volume, bass are comes overwhelming and muddy. There are couples of option on this budget like,, Blaupunkt EM10 and ant audio w56. Do not go with positive reviews on Amazon and flipkart. Total waste of money.

name: laxmi
title: Great .. go for it
content: Great sound quality .. i have to keep my laptop volume on around 20 when I use this so u can imagine how great the voice is .. the voice does not crack at all .. you can also hear the background beat in a song clearly .. just a great purchase .. go for it

name: NandhU
title: Mic not working
content: I've used this product for 2-3 weeks, for 2 weeks it works properly, good bass, nice sound quality, but now I'm not using this product, because it's mic has gone guys, for last few days mic not working. I've been using this earphones for my gaming purpose, and when i'm playing pubg i can't speak anything to my friends ( i can hear everything ) but I can't talk to them, then i checked amazon for return, this product is not returnable, i bought this product for 549, and my money gone wasted. I think footpath earphones just 100 rupees can work more than this item.

name: Ashish Chitra
title: Please Never Buy Boat Products :(
content: I purchased this headphone on 7 Feb 2020. After using for one and half month, one side of earphone stopped working. Due to lockdown I couldn't contact to customer care as well as via mail. After lockdown was over, my product was taken by them for replacement. It took one month for replacement and when I received replaced product it has the same problem. Like it was never replaced. I believe purchase a normal earphone of 100Rs instead of purchasing boat. If you really want a branded earphone then look for sony or philips. They are far better than from this scam and fraud brand. Never buy boat products.

name: SUYAM KALE
title: BANG for the Buck !
content: Please ignore all the negative reviews about this product because what it's offering at such a competitive price is just awesome.. Sound Quality : You can hear all highs and lows in Bohemian Rhapsody that's all I need to say. (The volume is on the higher side so you have to keep the volume a bit lower than other earphones).. Material : It's buds are made of metal and the flat cable keeps it tangle free. It seems durable because you can't see any loose ends or no part is exposed.. Microphone : It offers great noise cancellation and the receiver could hear me clearly.. Overall : Overall value for money. Do go for it if you're on a little tighter budget or you can use it as a secondary earphone if you're an audiophile.

name: Amit
title: I think I got a defected product
content: It worked fine for 3 weeks but .. just after a moderate use ... one of the earphone goes blank in between. Its definitely not acceptable. I have a feeling I have received a defected one ... when it works ... it produces a good output but reliability is a big problem.

name: Yash Dayma
title: I am in love with it from last 2 years.
content: Loving it totally,. These is my 2nd time , I have ordered it.. My first lasted for 2 years.. Delivery was done within 12 hours of ordering.. Even though my friends have said me to try other earphones, i love only boat.. It is hard to beat the quality of these earphones in these segment with its bass and features.. Totally loving it and it will worth your every penny.. Thank you Boat.

name: Rashmi
title: Adjust ur size of earbuds to not fall from ur ears.
content: Material is good quality plus flat wire of it it tangle free if u regularlly bundled it will be. Tangle na..but its a tangle free wire sound quality is good bass is also nice and. Its sound good durability its also good but its haveing press button that cut call not make call it play button in music and video but ....because of pressing this button its look like button its fully plane looking u can see pic i gaved it..it will be malfunction really very very. Rare and some time. Not..evry time...just inform. Not so serious its occur its have 6 pair of ear buds 3of red color in middle of earbuds and 3 are black u can see pic and other supporter clip for ur ears also ther. Biggest con is. Its. Falling from ear. If wear and run. Its also depends on earbuds size . 1star for tough headphoneand n sound also.total 3star 6 pair of ear bud i lost 2 of 2 single pair.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Hate it!!
content: I seriously hate these headphones... Painful..so damn painful in the ear... Comes out of the ear..no matter whichever earbud you use..sometimes I feel it's a problem with my ear..but then..all the other headphones do fit properly... Cannot be used for too long as I already said .ears would start paining... I don't understand how can this thing have 4 n above rating... Sound quality isn't what's expected and mentioned... Bass - 6/10. Treble - 7/10. If the volume is high and someone calls..it'll burst your ears..and when u talk on the mic..the other person can hear lots of back noise and distortions... And the worst part..Amazon didn't even had a return policy for this..just replacement..what wud I do by replacing and getting the same product that hurts my ears

name: Haneesha
title: Good Product
content: Decent product at this price range. I really don't see noice cancellation during calls. Bass is okay. If u increase the volume, then it is not soo good. If you are looking only to listen music or watch movies. It's a good to go product. If you are looking for any office work kind of stuff, then it is not soo good product. It is very hard and very much durable even though you use it rough and tough. So the question is, Is it okay to buy? You decide.

name: Ravindranath TV
title: Awesome Head phones.
content: Excellent head phones, really didn't expect this kind of quality, guys it is really awesome head phones. After putting this in your ears you will completely involve a movie or music, you will feel like you're in DTS theater, such kind of quality it has. I'm very very happy with this head phones. Thanks allot Boats for creating such kind product with less price..

name: Aniket Yevankar
title: The best quality at this price range
content: This is indeed the best possible headphone at this price range.. Pros:. 1. Sound quality and Frequency response are good.. 2. Low price.. Cons:. The size of the earbuds is very large as compared to other headphones. Due to this, it is not comfortable to use it while working out. It easily falls out. Hence I started to use the wings provided, but wings caused my ears to hurt.

name: glowrina g.
title: Wire is flat better tangle free. Also mic is above the average level..
content: The earphone is very nice in its Design,sound quality but just that it's not comfortable to wear. It keeps falling off ,to support it comes with a supporter or whatever it is called , wearing that brings pain to ur ears. Other than that the earphone is very good. But not comfortable enough to wear it and forget about it.

name: Biswajit
title: BLOWN AWAY!!!
content: I was a Sennheiser user since more than 4 years but upon a friend's strong recommendation i went for Boat this time.. The product was delivered and after unpackaging, i was pretty impressed with the build abd design.. But then i put them in my ears and as soon as i played the song, i was BLOWN AWAY!! The BASS is just WOW!. This is specifically for people with a craving for Bass. If you are not a Bass lover dont go for this.

name: Amazon Customer
title: No volume adjustment or call management button
content: Doesn't have a button for volume adjustments or for calling/ending a call or skipping tracks. Extremely disappointed with that - isn't that supposed to be part of even a basic earphone?. Am stuck with this as I can't return the product and can only replace it :(. If only

name: Supreeth Bhaskar
title: I'm giving it 4 and here's why
content: Given the price point, it meets the expectations. I'd have given it 5 if it had better noise cancellation with microphone. Calling over microphone at high volumes is disappointing as noise cancellation is poor and that leads to high distortion.. regarding the sound, it lacks quality at high frequencies namely, guitar music or any other string instrument music. Again keeping the price in mind, I shouldn't really be compalining about this. Overall it's a 4.

name: ankit thakur
title: YOU WILL NEVER REGRET BEST IN EAR EARPHONES  under ₹ 500 and ₹ 1000
content: NOW THIS IS WHAT BEST QUALITY LOOKS LIKE. I RECIEVED IT TODAY (28/10/2020) DELIVERY WAS ON TIME. THANK YOU. #AMAZON. #BOAT. BEST SOUND QUALITY. YOU COULD GET UNDER. ₹1000. VERY GOOD BASS. GREAT SOUND QUALITY.. GREAT FAN OF BOAT PRODUCTS. AND VERY DURABLE TOO. I AM USING SAME MODEL SINCE 2 YEARS. NOW I PURCHASED SAME FOR MY BROTHER.. THANK YOU AMAZON AND BOAT FOR PROVIDE SUCH GREAT PRODUCTS. IN VERY REASONABLE PRICE.. YOU WILL NEVER REGRET BUYING IT.

name: RAMMOHAN
title: BOOM BOOM BASS! 🔊
content: Excellent product with bass boosted technololgy by boAt.I brought it 3months back, till now no issuses.. Highlights:. 1. Good Bass(Get more bass by adjusting the Equilizer of corresponding music player). 2. Metalic Surface Finish(Good Durability). 3. Elegant look(I brought Red Color). 4.Good Noise Cancellation mic. 5.Easy to fit into your ears,no stress feeling even if you want to listen music for long time.

name: Priyanka
title: Waste Product and Bad Seller
content: The product was packed very bad and when it came it was a defective one. I do not want to comment on the Brand as the product can be defective at times but the seller had opened this product and packed as if he wanted to stuff and send it even though he knew that it was a non working earphone. I returned and bought wecool earphones. Dont go for it.. I am disappointed with the seller.

name: Amazon customer
title: One side stops working
content: Writing after six months of use. One side will always stop working. Though u can replace the earphones by raising a request on official boat website. But that also can be done only till one year. Not durable.not made for rough use.

name: omkar gurav
title: Best Sound Quality Headphones.
content: Very nice product, build quality and wire quality is exteremly very good, sound is also good at this price range. ... Tangle free cabel is best for rough use. ... L shape jack pin will adjust for all devices makes it more secure.. Features & details:-. Innovative housing design enables for easy adjustment and optimal wearing comfort with powerful 10mm drivers for sonic clarity, bass-driven stereo sound and good attenuation of ambient noise.. The noise-cancelling microphone enables trouble free receiving of calls or undeterred sessions of musical extravaganza.. Made to fit you and your lifestyle, providing a smooth grip for an extra secure and comfortable fit for your ears.. Passive noise cancellation feature enables users to enjoy listening to your music in a chaotic and noisy environment, it also enables users to receive calls on-the-go.. Crafted with care, the polished metal ensures its longevity, the tangle-free cable is lightweight and features user-friendly controls for easy functioning.. Frequency : 20Hz - 20KHz, MIC. Sensitivity: -42±3db. For any product related queries contact_us on: [ 022 49461882 ] and Warranty : 1 Year

name: Debdut roy
title: Best in this price and can compete the higher ends...
content: 1st of all,,,i am just a one day listener of it,,so giving the review of it by listening thoroughly.. I am a sennheiser cx 275, sony xb 55ap user and also use some xiomi earphone,,. As a basshead i like bass in music but also fond of treable,,for that purpose sony xb55 is utterly dumb,,,bass was really good but treable was very bad,,using equaliser also cant do any good things,,sometime bass was so good that music and voice cant come so nicely so for pure music listener sony is not that good, i am saying aftee uaing it for 6mnth.. But when i listen the Boat 225 the bass was rellay good like the sony xb55ap,,,i cant believe how a cheap earphone can comepte the mich higher one,,,but believe me guys,,,there r so many review of sony for thr bass but still i think for 599, u should go for boqt exactly the bass is same for thr cheap price ans sound also very good,,,but thr treable was not good like sonyxb 55,,,,if u use equaliser,,give some tweak,,and it sound amazing...no need of buying sony for that extra price,,,,pls buy it and then believe that what i am saying........keep listening.

name: Subhamay S.
title: Best headphone in this price segment.
content: One of the best headphones in this price segment. I did a lot of research and finally settled for this one 😌. Tangle free cable. Really durable and robust yet beautifully designed with perfection. Sound quality is awesome 😊. Go for it if you have budget of around 500-700.

name: Anonymous
title: Sony like Quality for a budget!
content: Honestly saying, I'm a Bose QC35 II user. Since I didn't wanted to pay so much on a wired earphone for my budgeted Xiaomi phone, I bought these earphone and to be honest, I didn't expect this to be this much awesome! The bass though, it is so lit🔥. Noice cancelling is also quite good but you should be cautious while on the road as this cancels the noise in such a way that even the sound of a horn can be felt so dull. If I have to nitpick between boAt and Sony in a budget, I would go with the boAt. But since I'm a Bose user, I am not satisfied with the noise cancellation as that of the Bose but for the rest, this is damn good. A try would be worth it.

name: Saitejareddy
title: Good for sound but bad for ears
content: Technically it is good but they are not sitting in ears as comfortably as jbl one . This one not have turned earheads shape , so it is uncomfortable to sit in ears . As they are not sitting properly in ears , i got ears problem , i seen for refund but replacement is available but not refund .

name: Payal
title: Just OK.
content: Noise cancellation - not that effective , I had to install a music booster app just to hear music.. Mic - doesn't work.. Sound quality - Just OK.. Feels too heavy on the ears and the extra buds given doesn't fit the earphones properly.. I had to use another ones, and everytime I'm using them I have to make sure they are not coming out of my ears.. I could have bought a better earphones, read mixed reviews.. I wouldn't recommend.

name: Akhilesh Agarthade
title: Lifeline of this product is 18 Months.
content: I am using this same earphone for second time. Previously it was black colour now I ordered Lemon colour and it looks fresh. The reason I ordered this boAt earphone again is First it is our own Indian brand and second it is worth value for money. Sound quality is Great. Mic quality is Okay.. I can point out its liftime as I have used it already, I ordered priviuos one in OCT 2018 ans used till now. since 2 months it started giving mic problem ans since two weeks Right side earphone stopeed working completely. Also it was behaving noisy during Call. So from OCT 2018 TO APRIL 2020 it WORKED ABSOLUTELY FINE FOR THESE 18 MONTHS. What esle you want in this price range.

name: V K Dwivedi
title: one and only product in this price range
content: it is first time i gave 5 star rating to any product because this is best in this price range.. sound quality is awesome bass is great if you are a bass lover'. microphone quality is great and cancels noise too.. only cons is that its so heavy bcz its metalic build quality so gave rate it 4 star.

name: Jagdish Chauhan
title: Boat earphone issue --not good performance
content: Initially it worked well but later on I realized it was connecting properly with mobile and also computer.And after some month (didn't use frequently and regularly) it needed to be touched near the connector or wire needed to be adjusted to hear it properly.Later it became dead totally. I am disappointed with this purchase.I earlier bought BOAT wireless (nirwana--black )headphone which is really good wireless/with wire. Only problem of that was it cannot be worn for long hours as it gave pain on ear due to non comfortable fit otherwise it was super.

name: Chinmay Singh
title: Cheap but delivers
content: This product needs no more review since it is one of the most selling earphones due to its price range and design and bass quality. Mine has broken down now but no complains, they worked for almost a year and I generally not keep them in best of the conditions so could have stretched a few more months but at this price range you can't expect a good longevity.

name: rAz
title: Comparison with Ptron Boom 3 and for PUBG Mobile
content: If you want to play PUBG Mobile, Go for Ptron Boom3 but L shape 3.5mm Basshead jack is great for 4 fingers claw. (I use 3 fingers claw). Ptron Boom3 vs Boat Basshead 225. Boat Basshead's bass is lauder but not clear than Ptron Boom3. (Boom3 is killer). Sound Quality is great at 75-80 Percent in Basshead.. Boom 3 is dual driver make it larger in size but due to made of plastic is it light weight rather than Boat Basshead; that are finishing by Metal. Easy to fall from ear (Ear hook; Am I joke to you?) (^_^). Overall my personal Experience. Ptron Boom 3 is winner in all expect... Boat is winner only in Build Quality.... Price Boom3 649 with Case. Price 225 Basshead 599 without case ..

name: ram
title: Only for bass heads
content: The headphone is good but the bass is on the heavier side so you can enjoy only bass heavy music. Not for acoustics or classical.. Not good for gaming. The bass is heavy so every gun shot and bomb blast or driving sound will be overtop and movement sounds will be feeble. Hurts my ears while playing games.. Heavy metal tips though durable will fall off the ear often cause of weight.. Overall good but not for amateur audiophiles and above.

name: Rahul
title: Really good earphones.
content: There are no issues as of now and I love the way they have designed the product. The wires doesn't get Tangled very easily. I will not go much in to the sound quality as I am not a earphone or headphone person.. All I can say is that, the product is a good to go one for anyone who is planning to purchase a earphone for regular use.

name: Zoro_ig
title: If your budget is 600rs go for it
content: They are really good at the price of 600 rs and it has a feel of quality and are robust enough for a normal user but me being a rough user I had problems with the earphones sometimes and I also had issue with one side not working and stuff like that but not to worry because the boat support on there website helps a lot you can easily replace your item for a new one if it's in the warranty period. It take 10 to 15 days but it delivers what we need remember if you are replacing the earphones then don't forget to remove the earbuds and then give it to the guy who comes to pick it up . It would be a blue dart or a Fedx guy it depends upon where you live and you don't even require a bill or a box to return it you can just hand out the earphones to the recovery guy if you find this review helpful don't forget to press helpful 😉

name: Amazon Customer
title: Sound quality is good.
content: Purchased for regular office work. Sound quality and microphone quality is really good.. During working hours very helpful as along as we are in sitting position. If you want to enjoy music while lying on bed, not a good one. Ear buds won't stay in ears during sleeping posture.. The attachments to ear buds are also not so easy to maintain. Frequently getting fallout. Need to re insert again and again.

name: aish
title: Worst !
content: These earphones donot work at all i would suggest not to buy them dint even use it for 3 proper days and cudnt even hear anythng frm these earphones... waste of money the cs of earphone company dint take any action yet!! Even after registering the complaint :/. 0

name: Amazon Customer
title: Wire gets dethatched from the driver unit inside the pods. Going for it again.....
content: The metal contacts inside the pod get detaches from the driver unit. These are my second set of earphones of the same model and the issue was same for both my headsets. These are better headsets when compared to boat 242, more crispier bass and voice quality it offers. The only problem with this model is wire gets dethatched from the driver unit inside the pods...... Hell with the boat 242 model I would throw them in dustbin when compared with boat 225 the audio quality they offer at this price range is unmatchable. so I am going for my third one....... At present I am using Sony MDR XB 75AP and Skull candy smoking buds2, when compared to these earphones for rough usage I pick Boat 225 bass earphones at this price range..... I cannot frequently buy 4k and 2k earphone for every 2 years so I pick Boat 225 for rough usage, bass and audio quality.

name: Amla
title: Love it 😍🎧
content: Good sound quality and decent noise cancellation. Doesn't tangle much.. Purchased it again after I lost my old one. Best earphone in this price range. If it is on offer, thn Don't waste time, just buy it! I have been purchasing these for people around me, none of them said any complaints (still canvasing people to buy boat earphones 😂 ). *** you can claim for a replacement if the product gets damaged within the warranty peroid. My friend got a new unit as replacement. All you have to do is to register complaint in their website. ***

name: GlobalHawk
title: Best in price range
content: 1) Looks- Not trendy in design, not eye. catching. 2)Finishing- connector , mike areas were not. finished properly. 3)Sound quality - Average. 4)Build quality - This is the only thing i liked. It has tangle free cable,. gold plated connectors. 5) Weight- This is the main issey. Heaviest. earphone i ever used, Fitting in. ear is difficult, noise canceling is. not its thing. They have given variety of earbuds but still does not fit correctly. But the thing is at this price range(499) , i can say i can't get better earphone than this, if you are rough user then these are really for you comfort might be an issue

name: shivani gupta
title: Literally received used product  !!
content: I ordered this earphones during season sale and I received used products, Literally, earbuds were filled with dirt of ears and filters were missing from both the earbuds,wires were dirty. Even child in KG can tell that this product is used.I mean it was really disappointing service from such a big and reputed company. Don't let me loose belief from your company by providing such disgusting products. If you are not able to handle such big sales and don't organise it then. But don't play with feelings of people. That might be a someone's gift ,just keep this in mind.. Thank you so much for such bad service !!

name: Sankha Suvra
title: Quality product with reasonable cost.
content: No need to share any picture as it's perfectly similar advertised to amazon.. Sound quality is 4/5.. Noice cancellation 3/5. Bass quality is 3/5. Build quality 4/5. Over all satisfied and looking forward to use this in future too.. Cheers 🍻

name: Nishant
title: Handle it carefully
content: They are all-rounder. I am using these earphones for like 2-3 years. I had bought it for 4-5. times (it usually stops working after 3-4 months of usage, depends on you). But I like them, nobody can beat this earphones. :) Well, I am going to buy it again because the one I bought 3 months ago stopped working.

name: Ekta Parnami
title: Earplugs hurt
content: These look amazing and the sound quality is also good. But the ear plugins are so uncomfortable. The seller just gives 7days replacement with the same product. I can't even return it 😭. The earplugs hurt badly! So just one star because I have to keep these uncomfortable earphones.

name: Karan
title: Amazing, Durable and value for money !!
content: Okie , so lets begin. I bought these earphones way back 9 months past. I bought a forest green. variant which looks really amazing with the cover.. I have been using these on a daily basis & have not faced any issues to be honest with this.. The built quality is really awesome with this - Wires are of high quality and don't get tangled. Several times i have like slept while using these at night and found them in a perfect condition even the cases when wire got stretched in night.. In regards to the music quality, it has really got a super base with the beats, the music sound is quite loud.. So in Tota, as per my opinion, i think it's completely worth it buying such earphones at even some higher side as it ensures the quality with the durability factor.

name: rishabh
title: Non working, different colour earphones delivered.
content: Faced an issue, opened seal pack with used non working earphones were delivered, i applied for a return. The delivery agent refused to take the return as i received green colour but ordered orange, told to contact customer care, but no problem as i called and described my issue they soon ordered a replacement for me. Thumbs up for customer care amazon. And about the earphones? Well they are the best at this price it's a balance between everything sound quality, built quality, looks everything is just right. Definately recommended.

name: Shilpa
title: Go for it!
content: Amazing bass, it plugs your ear, so you have a complete immersive experience, the material quality is fantastic, been using these for a year now, looks good as new, so impressed that i bought another one, the mic works perfectly ok... Only problem i faced is that the metal is pretty heavy,and if you're gonna use it for running, it may fall off.. Other than that, i really good quality earphone

name: Amazon Customer
title: Keeps getting unplugged by slightest movement
content: Anytime the audiojack moves even slightly or is touched by mistake, the earphone gets unplugged and the phone goes to speaker. I have to unplug the earphones and then put then in at least 4-5 times before it gets connected again. I cannot put my phone in my pocket when I plug these in because then the earphones will somehow get disconnected of lose and stop working. Worst earphones I've ear bought.

name: Vishrut shah
title: The best wired earphones you can buy
content: Boat has taken care of everything from the most important " sound quality🔊 " to the less important ones " comfort , build quality and appearance " .. I like its sleek finish of wire due to which the earphones remain untangible and easy to use.😃. I have 2 more wired earphones (one which came with my samsung mobile and other rs1499 )from other companies( samsung and jbl ) and this one just beats them in all respect say it in price , the sound quality , comfort , untangible .. I also love the colours available of this product.

name: Nitin
title: Bad design for wire.
content: Please don't buy this product. Sound quality is good and worth to money. But there are major drawback. First it detach from the phone jack frequently , it doesn't stick to jack. Even if you hold phone in hand by plugging the earphone it Will detached itself n its too much annoying. Second i have replaced this product 2 times in year as one side of ear phone stop working ( No physical damage from my side. ). Hence go for better option.. Only built up quality i. e. look n feel is good. Tangle free wire. Good advantage. They should improve the design.

name: Shreyash Singh
title: Defective piece received.
content: I didn't liked the product.. I was so excited for it but when I received the left side of earphones doesn't work properly and it has totally ruined my mood and choice. I am an active user of boat products since 2019 but this unit totally destroyed the trust. Go for any other brand like JBL or Redmi or Realme but don't buy boat products. Really I am very disappointed.

name: Mark Fernandes
title: Value for money and the needed bass quality
content: Purchased in Jun'18 ..so nearly 10 months of usage ..those who purchase this particular model pls note ..use the correct size of rubber housing provided for in-ear...secondly also use the rubber commas when brisk walking/exercising or any strainess activity as they will keep the noise cancellation effect intact and will not give you the rubber housing noise often ..these happen because the drivers and it's shell is a bit heavy...else no compromise on sound quality

name: Shameer Shah
title: Only One Star Reduced
content: Overall product is good. I used it for more than 2 years and now I'm writing this review. It's the best at its price range. One thing that reduced a star is the size of the earpiece which is little bigger which makes it unfit for longer times and while riding with a helmet on.

name: Saurav
title: Sounds terrible but good for the price i guess
content: Bought these cause my jbl t110 got ruined. They don't sound as good or fit as good as the jbl. These tend to fall out a lot cause they're a bit heavy. When you insert it in your ears, you can hear the driver crinkle. There are wings included in the box which may work for some people but it didn't for me. For a pair of daily rough use earbuds, these do the job.

name: SANJOY D.
title: IT IS A CHINESE PRODUCT
content: As in the case of Chinese products, this product is also not value for money. Though the company is Indian but the product is chinese. While purchasing, this product, origin country was not mentioned, due to which I was unknown of it. As faced earlier, I could not get to know of product origin of a pop-up toaster I purchased online of company KENT, but ultimately it came out as made in PRC. As usual for chinese products, it was also of below quality and not value for money. AMAZON should write product origin country so that purchasers not get mislead.

name: Aamir k.
title: Good enough for the price.
content: I wanted to buy a temporary cheap earphone to use as my kz's lost. As for the price, sound quality is good enough tho bass is too muddy and sound signature makes you feel heavy and suffocating in the head. I pulled down bass frequencies and pump up treble to give it a little air and make them tolerable to listen too. Never buy bass earphones and go for neutral earphones if your budget is below 500. Cheap earphones would have bad muddy bass no matter what brand.. I'd give it to somebody once I get my Chi fi's.

name: Mrinmoy Karmakar
title: Great product at this price and the brand reputation is maintained
content: Awesome product... Bought it @449... It is a must have for the bass lovers... It is a product for the millennials... The after sales service is too good from Boat... The replaced the product within warranty and the did the door step pick up and drop no matter where you are in India.

name: Sanjeev
title: Average product
content: Average sound quality. It cannot be substitute for JBL or seinheizer.. Build quality may be better, but sound quality is way below expectation,. I use it for playing free fire, the sound is not comaprable to seinheizer or JBL, as I have used both of them in past,

name: Shopoholic
title: Okay. Nothing special
content: Writing this post nearly 6 months usage. Metal build makes it heavier on ears and irritates, it falls of while walking even at little speed than usual. Not good for continuous use, it's okay for short use like about an hour at the most. Sound quality is not good as compared to JBL and Sony in the same category.

name: shivam w.
title: Good for listening music and watching movies but not for calling, gaming !
content: I purchased these ear phones in 16 aug 2017. I must tell you that build quality is too good. I used them very roughly but they never stopped working. Only thing bother me every time is that they are very heavy, if they didn't fit in your year then use ear hooks. another thing is that they have very high bass so they are not good for calling and gaming because even while calling and gaming bass is too much hence sound clarity is so low. They are only good for music and watching movies.. I writing this review on 8 dec 2019. because in my rough use the 3.5 mm pin broke. And just for fun I checked when I purchased them Then I saw that I didn't wrote any review for them. hence I'm writing and sharing my 2 years of experience in review.

name: Mohit Gupta
title: Reality
content: I bought these headphones after reading reviews.I didnt understand one thing,how someone can give 4 and even 5 star to the sound quality of these headphones,those who given that it simply tells that thay have never heard good sound quality.In my view sound quality is worth 3 stars ie average,bass is also average but built quality of these earphones is awesome....seriously but this earphones misses alot of sounds in song.Previously i was using skullcandy inkd earphones their price is around 800rs,honestly they are 100 times better than all these so called boad,senheiser,philips,jbl etc etc.Buy those instead

name: Prakash Patro
title: Trusted brand. Awesome product
content: I have been using this since 1 year and i use these everyday. Solid earphones and no issues so far. According to me these are best budget earphones. I have order another set for my friend but unfortunately it stopped working within 1 month but thanks to boat warranty. He got brand new earphones within 15 days. Very happy with the product. Go for it.

name: Rhonbeni
title: Won't buy it again, need replacement too
content: Honestly I've been using this product since 2019 and I must say, I'm done with it, I ain't buying it anymore, the sound quality is nice, yes, but the sound is not what needs attention here, it's the mic, idk why but it keeps getting bad every single time after sometime, I bought this product like 3 times already but that's it for me now, I'm tired of having to replace this and wait for a month or so for it to come and then end up getting bad after 1 or 2 months of use, come on, it's like 5-600, so at least make an effort to make it last longer, I would really like a replacement for this again because my one year isn't over yet

name: Khan Arman
title: Mic stopped working after 10-15 days
content: Product is good but the mic stopped working in just 10-15 days.. I'll update this review after I take the to the service center.. UPDATE : They took almost 2 weeks to repair/replace the product...I returned the product with box and ear supporter attached ..but when I got the replacement all I got was the earphones without any box and the ear support.. Now the mic works...but I lost the ear support without which it is difficult to fit in my ear.

name: NEHA
title: Review after a year of usage!!
content: I have been using them since a year so you can trust me on this.No doubt the sound quality and overall quality is good, but ...yes..there is a but...they dont stay in your ear!! So, whats the point .i have tried all their attachments (ear buds you get with them)bigger ones..smaller ones..i asked others also to use them thinking my ears are too small but no use , all had the same complaints,they keep on falling.I think the metal makes them heavy.I would suggest dont go for them instead try other boat earphones ( Boat bass heads, approx 375₹) which are cheaper and good and they stay in your ear, i have tried them too.

name: Prashant Jani
title: Best and reliable earphones around ₹500.
content: Sound quality is amazing. Vocals are clear , treble is great and bass out of this world for this budget.. I was a Sennheisers cx180 owner it lasted around 2.5 years with very rough usage.. Now lets see how much time does this lasts. I was searching earphones around ₹500 for 10 days. My nature is like test product , get reviews and then buy and yes i check reviews a alot. If anyone is like me... you know on tight budget want sundar sasta tikau go for it. Its great product. It even sounded better than my Sennheisers CX 180.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Heavy Buds, keep falling
content: Sound quality is good. The flat cable is durable, overall good quality product.. Only problem is heavy metallic earbuds. Due to heavy weight they keep falling from ears, totally unsuitable if you want to hear with them for a long duration. I could not use them and had to replace with another product within a week. I still have these and sometime use for a short call.

name: soumya jyoti dutta
title: Ear bud stays inside ear often after pulling the headphone out..
content: I have used many headphones in my lifes... May be at around 20 odds.,, but never faced the issue i faced with this headphone.. When i pull it in my ear it fits snugly.. But when i pull it out, to my horror the ear bud stays inside my ear.. It happened atleast 6 to 7 times with me.. And you know thankfully everytime i was able to take it out with my hand but suppose if i am not able to.. I have to visit a ent surgeon then and why should i want that.... The noise cancellation and bass quality is good still i give it 1 ⭐ because of this horrific issues (which happened with my sister in law too!!!!!!)

name: Chinmay Tawade
title: Good Sound & Product Quality, Value for Money.
content: Good Bass quality, average noise cancellation. Very Loud at full volume. I have been using it for a month and never used it on full volume.. Its real tangle-free.. The only bad thing about these earphones is they fall from your earbuds frequently and not comfortable if you are using it for a long time.. Another thing is the mute button. If you put it on mute it doesn't show anywhere that it's on mute you have to figure out on your own that it's on mute.. Overall Value for Money for sure.

name: Harshit Pandey
title: Best in the budget, but ....
content: Boat Bassheads 225 is simple one of the best earphones i ever used & here is my honest opinion about it. 1. Built & Design - it is made up of good quality plastic & metal. The wire is of flat type which doesn't tangle easily. They looks premium & durable - 5/5 stars. 2. Mic quality - it comes with the mic, which is just ok to use. Nothing great but quite usable, you can take calls but nothing more than that like recording audio for other purpose - 3/5. 3. Sound quality - sound quality is almost perfect! It's loud & crisp. Mids & highs are on point. I really love listening to audio & podcasts with them. They have really high bass ... Tbh bass is lil too much so go for them if you are very much into bass - 4/5. Overall at 550/- they are really good & a must buy option ! ♥✌

name: Aditya Verma
title: Not long lasting
content: Bought 2 of these but highly disappointed with the earphone as well as Boat Customer Support. One of the earphones stopped working within the first 12 days. I raised an issue with support team and as per the instruction courier them back. Now its has been more than 15 days and no further communication from there side. Both earphones and their customer service of low quality. NOT RECOMMENDED.

name: Akarsh Kumar Sinha
title: 1yr usage review
content: Review after 1year use. It worked exactly for 1year. Didn't expect it to stop this way but I guess expecting more than a year is too much for companies like these. Never faced long-term quality issue with JBL or Skullcandy...anyway, it stopped working on one side and then totally went caput on both the sides. After a little research I found out that this is a consistent problem with BoAt headphones. Apparently some bug or some internal malfunction is deliberately installed so that the headphone dies soon and obsessive people like me have to go headphone hunting once again. I don't know how this business model works for them because personally, this would really put me off and o would never be able to trust the brand again or buy from them

name: avik m.
title: Power packed performance in small packet. Possible the best in class earphone.
content: I have been using this earphone for around a week and I am sharing my review with you in order to have a better understanding of this product.. Pros -. 1. Sound quality is just mind blowing.. 2. Bass is the keypoint. Absolutely great bass.. 3. Treble works superb.. 4.mids and lows are well calibrated.. 5. Cable is tangle free so u won't get annoyed of it.. 6. Its very loud but doesn't get distorted. Well balanced.. Cons-. Dint came across any such thing.. Don't know How Long will it survive. Hoping for the best. Most importantly what I felt that at first you might feel disappointed with the sound quality as its loud but not clear due to over powering bass but here's the catch as soon as u get the earphone first just set the equaliser according your sound preference and then u ll actually see the charm. It will just blow your mind if u use the equaliser properly. So before listening to any song first set an equaliser and trust me you will never expect so good sound quality at this price level. It's just amazing at this price point. Definitely buy this without even thinking anything it won't disappoint you.

name: Bobby Da
title: This is my 3rd purchase & I'm upset since the Mic isn't working otherwise Overall a great earphone!
content: My first two purchases were really good.. I was impressed by its sound quality and durability unlike the other headphones.. Especially the cables are really strong which is a must.. Boat scores all the credits due to its quality.. But this is my third purchase where I received a defective piece and the Mic is not working.. My call receiver is unable to hear me.. I use this earphone on my daily commitment because of its strong cables to keep my hands free but what's the use if the Mic doesn't work?. Please maintain our trust by delivering the right ones as we give our best ratings to support you.. Thank you!

name: Basith
title: *Yess extraa bass*  poli saanam my®£
content: Earphone has good amount of bass & great niose cancellations too.. Pros:). 1.great noise cancellation. 2. Extra bass. 3. We get six ear tip so we have more option to choose our size. Cons. 1. Obviously extra bass it hurts a little bit. 2. It has poor holding in ear. They don't hold in ears for long. 3. The ear tip is bit heavier. 4. We get the full sound quality of other earphone in boat in 75 percentage. Overall good but poor holding

name: KASUMA KensaiÈke
title: Mere speculation with authentic experience
content: Well let me precise about one thing and that is you get for what you pay. In the sense , the following this one is specifically made for bass well if your into more of detailic sound signature forget about it. Well never the less build quality Is decent so if you use it properly and take care of it by which I mean do not tangel it around or put it in the bag carelessly this could last for long well aside that you should know that when it summer the wire face specific types of threat , and the threat is since it is made out of rubber so it tends to melt and this the wire face high potential of getting torn apart which happens with my Basshead 233 . Well I hope this one doesn't meet the same fate well and also the buds become prone to face the same issue of easily getting tornable after quite while. But you get lots of buds with it so I guess your good on that department. Well any way happy purchase dear reader and good luck.

name: Souradip Dutta
title: Decent pair of earphones with sturdy design
content: Nice earphone, i have been using it for quite some time now, it has good durability, the wires are sturdy and the flat design of the wire makes the product much better. The only problem i felt was that the earplugs often slip out, i tried all the buds provided with the product but still with a little pull the plugs fall out of the ear. The sound quality is pretty amazing, the noise cancellation and bass are great but the vocals are a bit on the low side hence it is better for loud metal, pop or rock music, for talking or melodious tunes won't prefer this much.

name: Pranav Sinha
title: One of the best budget earphones i could find.
content: The material of the earphones is of metal so it feels premium, and its a lot durable compared to the plastic ones. Also, its flat cable is of decent quality, it almost never gets tangled, and if it does, its very easy to untangle.. Sound quality is decent, not the best. Go for JBL if you only want good sound quality. Theres not much difference between them, but i prefer this one because of its build quality, its sound quality and noise cancellation is decent, not bad at all.

name: Philip K.
title: Avoid this at all costs!
content: I picked up this pair in July. From day 1, I have been facing issues with this.. From the start, audio was jarring a little when I connected the headphones to my laptop. But, when connected to my phone, it seemed to be working a little better. I assumed that this was maybe an issue with the ports on my laptop and phone.. Over time, the audio quality started deteriorating. I had to have the jack inserted into my laptop and rotated until I could hear from both sides. When connecting it to my phone, there were times when the only thing I could hear was static, until I unplugged it, and plugged it back in again.. Today was the best part of it - all of a sudden, the audio goes completely haywired, and voices became morphed into different tones altogether.. The looks and design of this is quite good, but in terms of durability, it's just not worth the price. I have had headphones last me a year and a half at a minimum, and this set goes kaput within 6 months. It's absolutely not worth the price at all!

name: Chanchal Biswas
title: Suprisingly Wowwwwww
content: Before pirchasing this headphone I've used sony , iball and samsung lavel u . But today (25/08/2019) I got this product. I'm using it from 9 o' clock. Believe me guys this headset is superb. Best headaet in this budget. Suprisingly the sound quality , bass and clearity are just making me a fan of BOAT ( PLUG IN NIRVANA ). Every second of any song or music or any sound I'm being able to feel. Noise cancellation is working perfectly.. Thanks Amazon

name: Jenita
title: Faulty earphone
content: Sound from right side stopped working within a month. Earphone was ordered in September and since October 2020 i am following up with Boat customer service for replacement. Their phone numbers are always busy and i was able to get through just once in these months. The customer service response is that this model is out of stock and they will contact me when the stock arrives. Even after 3 months i am yet to receive a replacement. Boat may have good products but their customer service is not good.

name: Gaurav Srivastava
title: Not for dynamic use
content: The build quality of this product is good and so is the noise cancelation. The bass is the USP of this product. But this earphones are not for dynamic use. You cannot use them while running or doing any physical work. The earpieces are too big for a usual ear even with the smallest earpiece the earphones kept on falling down. So if you want to just listen music while chilling then you can buy these earphones else I won't recommend these if you're thinking of using it while exercising. Overall its a decent buy but not a good one instead go with JBL.

name: Charan K
title: Excellent quality earphones at a very affordable price.
content: I got it delivered a day before it was promised. Keep up the good work! And coming to the product itself, the build quality is very good. Gives one a feeling that it is gonna last long. I have used a couple of earphones before I bought this one. At this price point, I would say, it is by far the best in build quality. And when it comes to the quality of sound it delivers, I feel it is a bit flat as one can not appreciate the differences between the high and mid tones. One can instantly notice this if one had earlier used a headphone from sennheiser. It sits in the ear perfectly and is very comfortable for long time usage. Overall the value that this earphone offers at this price point over shadows the minor sound quality issue it has. I would definitely recommend this earphone to anyone.

name: Praveen Dabas
title: Value for money
content: Sound quality is good at this price. Noise cancellation is not so good. Also the buds does not fit properly I tried different sizes but all of them were coming out and falling at slightest of movement. But bass and sound is good at this price. Overall a valie for money. Build quality is ok at this price point, I got for 499 during sale. Durability I will know once i ise them, lets hope it works well for at least 1 year.

name: Gopinath
title: Superb sound quality and dashing look
content: This is my Day-1 review, I will update this after one year for sure.. Last ear phones that I had used were samsung galaxy (in-box) for almost 3 and 1/2 years. ;). The main drawback for them is that they get easily peeled out near mic and at the jack due to entanglement of wires. In comparison, boAt's wire is sturdy.. Happy purchase, superb extra bass, opted for red and black color.. Got the package intact, no damage. I would recommend go for it.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worst
content: Worst product.I do not know how this product got this much rating.I am doubting amazon rating system now.I do not suggest this product.. Problem:. It s not fitting into ear and it is keep on dropping from ear , I have tried all buds but no luck. Earlier I have used sneheisser c25 I have used it for 3 years I did not face any issue.. I do not recommend Plz think twice before buying..

name: Vignesh M
title: the sound quality is pretty good. The bass capture is great and overall ...
content: First of, performance and sound quality: I have to say, the sound quality is pretty good. The bass capture is great and overall the heating effect, fit and product finish are great for the price offered.. But I would NOT recommend this product for a the following reason. The design: Although sound quality is good, the design of the earphones has flaws. The wires which are flat as opposed to thin and cable like is very rigid and gets tangled with the dress.. The microphone placement is horrible in that it gets caught in the dress needing constant adjustment leaving the overall experience to be poor.. The clip that is used to secure the wires in place is even worse as it has no mechanism to latch onto the wires firmly.. Overall design needs a LOT OF WORK before it can become satisfactory.. But if you are only looking for something cheap with good sound output, then go for it. But if you want to satisfied with your purchase, then there are other options out there.

name: piyush
title: Cannot ask for more at this price
content: Writing this review after 1 year of very rough use. I even sleep wearing these earphones. But it is just intact. Sound is great for this price. Don't expect a 600 wala stuff to supersede a 2000 bucks thing. Mic is good too. Good job Boat!

name: Doreah
title: Waste of my money. Brought it happily reading the comments on amazon. But I'm unsatisfied.
content: I love the earphones very much. But the problem is it doesn't fit in your ears properly. Despite changing earbuds it doesn't fit well. The earbuds are so hard that even when I tried to change earbuds to the small one, it took me one hour to fit inside, very bad quality earbuds. The earphone is too heavy and falls down quickly. I don't know why I have purchased this one which is not fixing well on my ears. Waste of my money. I have purchased happily reading someones comments under Amazon on other brand earphones which he recommended this one. But I will say I'm truly dissapointed and crying why have I purchased this product. Waste of my money.

name: Surya teja
title: I think I got fake product but original Is so good
content: Actually this model is so so good. I used it 1 year back but I lost them somewhere so I ordered again. But this particular product which is delivered to me is not good. It's not working properly. And hooks in the box are also missing. Completely the dealer's mistake

name: Gokul Asok
title: EXTREMELY  AMAZING PRODUCT AT THIS  LOW PRIZE
content: BEST EARPHONES AT THIS PRIZE.. EXCELLENT MAKING QUALITY. TANGLE FREE. I AM USING THIS PRODUCT FOR THE LAST 6 MONTHS.. SUPERB BASS.. THE SOUND QUALITY IS FINE AT THIS PRIZE RANGE.. THIS IS THE FIRST EARPHONES THAT I AM BEING USING FOR MORE THAN 5 MONTHS.. THE EARBUDS ARE LITTLE MUCH HEAVIER..SO THERE IS CHANCE TO FALL DOWN. EVENTHOUGH THE COMPANY OFFERS SOME EARBUD ACCESSORIES HELPS IT TO GET FITTED... I AM GIVING 4/5 RATING ..

name: Afzal
title: ... this one is what I feel the headphones feel like 1. they are OK not good not bad ...
content: OK first of all the reviews are all on based on personal preference so this one is what I feel the headphones feel like. 1.they are OK not good not bad. 2.the bass is OK too in this price range better than other atleast.. 3.they always falls off from yours ear if u are using it like outdoors like walking while listening Yes there is those hook bt for me it's not comfortable. 4.it starting hurting a little after around 2 or 3hrs of use.. 5.if u think u can return this item then no after u bought it its only replaceable not returnable so your are stuck with it so buy it with caution.

name: abhilash
title: Awesome product..... Thanks boat...
content: Supper product from boat, good quality cables, good deep bass and good frequency responce... An crustal clear sound quality.. I was an skullcandy user... The quality of sound is not same because may be both have diifrent technology used,. But the clear sou d and frequency responce is better than skullCandy..better to here classicical instrument music also... We will get an very small bit of sound also in clear quality... Thanks for boat for this great product.... And also going to try wireless and owerear models of boat.... Thankuu

name: Pankaj Munjal
title: Good Product but very less durable
content: I purchased the earphones on May, 2020 and I am writing this review on 11 August, 2020. Everything was fine until last 2 months but suddenly I was getting difficulty in using them. Below are the 2 things happened just today:. 1) While connecting it to Phone, it is automatically starting to Volume up or down on the phone screen.. 2) During talking, it gives so much noise that the other person could hear you barely and they hang up on me saying "we can't hear your voice, its just the noise from your side". Just to verify this, I record my voice and tried to listen to it but I could hear just the disturbance noises and nothing else.

name: Joe Harry
title: 4 month review
content: This is my review after 4 months of regular usage.. Bought this after a lot of research and reviews from the buyers.. First of all, this is good for bass lovers (who need just bass alone).. Noise cancellation is superb.. Mic clarity is good and till now, no one has complained about any voice issues.. It is durable and user friendly. I’m using it on daily basis and I don’t face any issues with wire tangling.. Thanks to their decent replaceable pairs. It suits perfectly for me.. But? Still this is not for me. The quality of the music is not as per my taste personally.. Overall quality of the product and microphone usage is excellent.

name: Rohit
title: It's slips out of ear due to design and weight
content: It's decent ear phone for its price but the only major issue I am facing is it tends to slip out of ear due to. 1: lack of curve (design) of ear piece cause it's straight.. 2: heavy ear piece since it's metallic it tends to slip out .. This why I am irritated ,cause slips out of my ear every 3 minutes and I have to plaace it again or hold it.. Also I want to return it and buy another variety of boat earphone but since there is only option to replace and not return I can't return it. To Amazon pls hlep me if u can in returning this earphone.

name: Bharat Madhok
title: Value for money
content: they are very good earphones and probably the best at this price range. The sound quality is very good and the bass is awesome. It is very durable with metal and looks very good too. Even the shipment was good too it got delivered in one day with out any extra charge and properly packaged. Now lets see how they hold up and will update if necessary.. Update : The product is still working properly and sound quality is good but, wearing them for more than 1 hr+ your ears become very uncomfortable and the earphones are working but the microphone isn't working anymore.

name: Nitin B
title: Mic sesnsitivity issues
content: The overall bass and sound quality is okay after a year. Its always the punchiness and newness you get after switching from an older earphone to this one. The only bad part of this earphone is that the mic doesn't pickup my voice when the mic is at a normal distance from your mouth when both the ear pieces are placed within the ears. The other side always complains that they are not able to hear my voice or my voice is very feeble and low. Then I have to bring the mic close to me lips to converse properly with the caller. Would suggest you skip this one for anything from another brand.

name: Saket Mahajan
title: 1 Year Long Term Use Review! A Must Buy.
content: I bought these awesome headphones exactly a year back for Rs. 549/- & since then I’ve been using them quite roughly. I wear these in the gym too. I can’t call them waterproof but these are sweat proof. These headphones do not fall out from our ears even while running or skipping. The headphones come with a built in microphone & the best part is that it works with iPhones too. The cable is tangle free. The headphone is made from good quality aluminium. The 3.5mm end of the headphone is in a right angle, so that the cable remains intact even after rough use. The headphones come with extra ear buds & a pair of ear hooks. There’s also a button on the headphone to play/pause & change the track. It also has a 1 Year warranty. Overall a great headphone in this price segment with great audio, good bass.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good but not worth for long term
content: Iam writting this review just before one year of buying, exactly 10 days before the. *right ear buds stopped working, i got replacement which is very good thing service is very good. *sound quality is just good because if we use in high volume we can't hear perfect Beats,. *i need to mention this i have taken a lot of care about handling this product every time i put in a pouch and while putting in to pouch or taking out the rubber ear plugs are detached and i lost one ear plugs then i am using other size one, and this are not tangal free this wires do get tangaled but the thing is it's easy to free it up compared to other,

name: Indru Bhavnani
title: GOOD Overall
content: GOOD to FAIR Delivered in time, the bass is loud on whole. Overall good phones but does not sit properly in the ears if you want to listen to the stereo music lying down, one has to straight on your back . Earphones OK in sitting position but still find it painful after some time as the earphones fitting could have been better.

name: Jigar Patel
title: Value for money product. Good but not perfect.
content: The materials used are good, seems quite durable. However, the sound quality could be a bit better, lesser bass maybe, as well as the noise cancelling on the microphone could be improved. Almost perfect for the price. A value for money product for sure.. Love the design and the fact that extra rubber tips were included in the package was a plus!

name: Surajpuru
title: Good product, Cumbersome wires.
content: First there was a price drop post a deal purchase. Then the wires are slightly heavy and flap around while running. The buds supplied seemed as though of another headphone set..orange wire headset with one pair of green lined earbuds..wonder it's a repacked item... Rest all good sound, fit, controls, quality..

name: Dhiman Mukherjee
title: Worst in terms of product quality.
content: In one word, I'm Very disappointed. I ordered this product on 26/05/2019 received 3 days later. I was happy as it looks premium, sound quality is good if not the best. Problem starts after using 2 days sometimes it works perfectly fine sometimes It's not working at all. I was lucky that problem arise within 10 days then I request exchange and got a new one after 3 days. Today is 03/07/2019. The new one was working perfectly fine until today. Now right side of this earphone is dead. This time I'm not lucky as product exchange date expired on 23/06/2019. If anyone from Amazon customer service or boat customer service seeing this please help as it has one year warranty.

name: Deepak Kumar
title: Value for money
content: I bought this earphone by friend suggest. I Mostly I used headphone during traveling for listening music and watching videos.. • I got the product well packed by Amazon.. • In packed box got 3 pairs extra earbuds with different sizes.. • Sounds are amazing. Sounds are high with Extra Bass but we can adjust. Sounds are much clear than others earphones I have ever used. No noises during calling.. • Length of the headphone is 1.2 meters. That is perfect for everyone.. • Wires are sturdy and strong.

name: Thomas Devasia
title: Don't buy pls... Go with good brands.
content: I bought this from Amazon and got it with in 5 days . I was existed to see it's performance because I got much good reviews from this platform but my experience is totally worst with this product .... It's one ear plug is not even working after 2 weeks... Think twice before buying such earphones... Ever most worst shopping experience with this useless product ....boat 225 headphone...!!!

name: Tushar Upadhyaya
title: Not for me. Big no. To this one
content: The only reason why I ordered this piece of s#*t is because of 65k reviews. Ok, you cannot expect amazing sound in this earphones but as far as price is concerned its just ok. If you just want a source to listen sound and use mic a little it's good that's it. Sound is poor, gives you headache, don't know about ANC but it certainly has active noise amplification. Unnecessary hissss sound all the time when I connect to any device. Long story short, if you want to listen and feel good music addup extra bucks and invest in good earphones. But if you are running out of budget and not much of a music head just want to play pubg and have good time you can go for it.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Dont go for it.
content: Within 20 days of use it stopped working,It's not durable at all, one side is not working Better to buy it from store rather then ending up following Boat customer care and amazon sellers. Spend 50 more and know your seller who sits in the store and resolve your issue immediately rather then becoming a football to get it replaced.

name: Kalpesh
title: My favorite headphones so far.
content: Sound quality is amazing, as compared to a few other headphones in a similar price range, BOAT gives you the best quality headphones.. 1. The metal finish of earphones gives an amazing and rich look.. 2. Cable quality is really good.. 3. Holding clip is a little bit disappointing as its always come out from cable.. 4. The mic is also good.. Really good product in this range.

name: VISHAL
title: Giod quality. Worth buying at this price
content: First of all i want to advise all the buyers to check the product thoroughly after recieving the package, In terms of contents of the box and also the physical appearance of the item. As i had recieved a used product with no additiinal earbuds and even the warranty card was also missing.. Thanks to amazon for quick replacement in two days.. The built quality with L shaped jack and tangle free cable is good and the sound quality is also good. Overall worth a buy at this price.

name: Akhila
title: NOT IMPRESSED
content: Slides off the ears everytime. Very difficult to keep inside ears. Also the noise due to interference is too much. Cannot attend calls using this due to this reason. For the few minutes in which the plugs stays inside ears (I have tried all sizes of plugs) the music is good. Overall, I am not impressed due to the inconveniences posed.

name: P S
title: Just loving this.......
content: Bought and used it for almost 2 months now and still it just soothes me and still seems like new one.. Now am thinking why i have wasted so much money on local headphones (rs 200 - 250) which do not work for even 3 months.. This has better sound quality than them, better built and price is also really nice comparing all pros. Just buy it without worrying about anything and enjoy for years......

name: RAVI RAJ SINGH PATEL
title: Good product but bad after sales services
content: No doubt the quality of the product itself is very good at this prace range...be it its build or audio output... definitely a must buy product. Everything is good till u encounter any problem with it and want to get it repaired or replaced using its warranty service...the problem is they will ask you to write to the service provider to avail warranty which they will never answer...I have ordered two earphones, mic of one among them has stopped working after some time...I jave contacted to service center they are not replying at all..so it's better to go for some other brand unless u want to risk your money.

name: Yanthungbemo Ezong
title: Below average sound quality. Good build quality.
content: The SOUND QUALITY isn't awesome. It indeed has that extra bass but it's a little too much for my taste. The boomy bass muddies up the sound and you don't get much of the midrange frequencies, and hence takes away quite a bit of clarity.. But as for MATERIAL quality and DURABILITY, this set of earphones is a decent choice. I only bought this because it has metal parts and the L-shaped jack, and not for the sound quality.. Under the budget range, if you want to sacrifice build quality for good sound, I suggest you buy the JBL C100SI or C200SI instead.

name: Tousif raza
title: Amazon really sucks
content: Recieved faulty product from amazon.. I have ordered this product previously and I know it is the best at this range and when I ordered this product again from amazon, they delivered a faulty piece which was not working. I don't have problem with faulty piece, I thought that they will change the the product in replacement period but the real scene started from here. They kept on shifting the dates to send a guy and at the end they said that the replacement period is over and they didn't replaced it 😠. I have to visit the service centre to replace it and I am happy with the earphones and the company but not happy with amazon 😡

name: Balakrishna
title: My product is not that good. Otherwise good choice
content: Build quality good.. Sound good.. Bass good, check with various songs and music. Could be better. But good at this price.. Issue with my product is that right earpiece has less sound. Very less comparative to left earpiece.. Second issue is the metallic part behind earpiece touches with ear makes you uncomfortable if u r using them for long time.

name: Abhik Mukherjee
title: Nice Built....
content: I've bought two of these, one for my sister and another one for me. It's been more than 12 months and both of them are doing fine. The built quality is very good and sturdy. The sound quality somewhat became flat throughout the usage. And it's not a bass-heavy earphone at all.. Considering the price(499): for sound quality, I'll give it a 3.5/5 star and for the built quality, it'll be a 5/5 star.. Edit1: After 15 months of usage, the one I bought for sister has given up on the left earplug. The one I bought is doing fine with more flatter sound quality but the microphone is not doing well.. Edit2: Afer almost 24 months of usage, the rubbery thing that holds the earplug of the left side has become somewhat brittle. Frankly speaking it has gone through a lot of torture.

name: Robin Singh Yadav
title: Good headphones if you can bear a little weight on your ears.
content: These are very good headphones considering the price point and very much durable too.. I have been using them for over 1.5 years and the wires are pretty fine till date which is the main issue in earphones that it breaks.. These are made up of metal so they are a little on the heavier side and if you run while wearing them you will definitely feel their weight on your ears and it feels uneasy then.. Other than that, the bass quality is very good and the noise cancellation is good if you choose the earbuds according to your ear size, the microphone is pretty good while talking on calls.. The button features are good too like playing/pausing the music, choosing the next/previous track.. I did face an issue with these in about 6 months of using them that one earphone stopped working all of a sudden and I raised a complaint with boAt and they provided me with free pick up from home and they took about a week to replace them and then delivered it back to my place.

name: Digvijay Parmar
title: The best go-to earphones at this budget price @549
content: The wire quality is awesome. The wires are tangle free and the metal of the earphones is really good and solid. The sound quality is good and best choice for bass lovers and vocals are clear and nice.. Sound quality- 8/10. Comfort level - 6.5/10. Wire quality - 9/10. Eartips quality - 9/10. Atlast, everything is nice about this earphones just one thing will irritate you is the earphones will fall from your ears very often. The eartips are too heavy and that's why the earphones tend to fall really very often. At times you will feel irritated but later you may get adapted to it.

name: Aditya Bhagat
title: Review after using it for 2 years
content: -even though bass and sound quality is great bass onto these headphones is dependant on the device you are using on or the equalizer settings. I've used this headphones with several mobiles they all had to set the proper equalizer settings then only you can feel the bass you need. Same goes for laptop and pc. -gaming on these headphones was impossible for me as i needed to boost the voice to max just to hear footsteps or smaller detailed noises cuz bass is non existant without proper settings. -overall & build quality is really good i got this product on 13th April 2017 and its right side stopped working on 16th May 2019 over this period of 2 years i had no issues at all, sound quality was the same bass was the same buttons were good. -during these past 2 years I've used this headphones every day for at least 3 hours a day they did not disappoint me.They actually lasted way longer than i anticipated so thumbs up to boat for making such product.. Pros and Cons. Pros - the headphones are durable.. Sound quality is great.. somehow feels easier to untangle it.. Bass quality is great.. Buttons on it are good.. Cons- the bass doesnt hit you right away you'll need equalizer for it (at least in my case).. The pointy things on the backside are painful if you wanna sleep using (wearing) them.

name: Rahul B.
title: Durability issue is there otherwise quality of sound is really good.
