content: Initially good quality of sound, good quality of base and voice clarity however the durability is at question mark ‼️. After using these for a month or so one of the earphones stop working. Currently I am not using them anymore.

name: Koustav S
title: Sound, bass, surrounding sounds are good- but material quality, weight and earbuds are not good
content: I am reviewing this after more than 6 months, it's sound quality is awesome. I have no allegations on that. But, in terms of other things like build material, build quality it's not that good.. **It's flat cable is an advantage, but it's a sticky one like it is made with glue....it always stick with the clothing and cause problem very often.. **It's ear buds are giving me problems after 3 months. It always get detached from the earpiece while I keep it in backpack. Also you get 3 different size, one is of very big size (of no use if the right size got lost).. **Also the earpiece are quite a bit heavyweight. It get slipped out from the ear, often.. **Also it's designe is a normal one. No special ergonomic feature in the design of the earbuds (in comparison to the Redmi basic earphone which is only 400 RS).. **It's mouthpiece or mic is good, it have some other feature like play/pause of songs, double tap to next song. But it's are quite heavyweight-which makes problem. It pulls the earpiece out from the ear.. So my final opinion is..... It is great in terms of sound quality and bass ,it's mic is also good (I would give lot more than 5). But its not that much good in terms of material quality, earbuds, earpiece. In this price, you could buy the Redmi earphones ( 400/- varient ant 600/- varient).. Sound quality, bass, surrounding sound is great, but quality of material, weight and earbuds sucks.

name: Sanju Hyderabad
title: Good, but had to ask for a replacement due ti product defect
content: Given only 3 stars as I had to ask for replacement with in few days not using it for much time. Joint at Mic came out, I guess problem is with a weak joint. Had to take pain of return and wait for replacement.. Got the replacement but a different color.. Sound quality is good.. Hope this is one in a thousand case issue of the quality of the make.

name: vishzz
title: Better than jbl 100si and cheap
content: Better than jbl 100si, great sound bass, half of sound volume enough to enjoy. Only cons is it's using metal, so it's slips out due to it's weight easily. Comes with 5 pairs of earbuds and a clip. Update. Used 1 month, right piece troubles with low volume and no bass. Registered compliant & got replacement within 15 days. No extra charges. Fabulous job from Boat India

name: Sandy
title: Sound quality not so good, only bass is high.
content: I have bought boatrockers 400 Bluetooth headphone and boat 100 headphone as well. I have expected much from this. But the only 2 differences between boat 100 and boat 225 is wire and bass. Sound quality is not so good as I have experienced in boat rockers 400. Only 0lus point is 1 year warranty.. The mic also works good. I have only issue with the sound. I have expected better quality sound from the boat 100 or Samsung headphone from the same budget. But even Samsung headphone sounds better, thought it has only 6 months warranty.

name: Manasvi
title: Amazing..
content: The sound Quality is awsome and very clear .The material of which it is made is very strong,the microphone records clearly.The bass heads that i have experienced the first time is really great.I am using this earphone since 6 months and its still working as if it is brand new product, between these six months once the earphone was fully wet due to water fell on it but then too is working properly as it was working before.The shape of the wires makes it tangle free....Good product

name: Aashna
title: Great product
content: They are, as good as Sony 800rs headphone.... It's total waste to 300rs extra to sony, For the same quality.. The add on to boat is they are tangle free. The only thing I just want to add to boat makers is make the earpiece in such way that they don't come out of ears...easily.. Rest all is good

name: AJAY KUMAR BHOI
title: For Game and music lovers.
content: I have been using this product last 2 months and the experience is awesome. I need a wired headphone so i bought this and amazingly this product didn't disappoint me.. Here some points.. 1. Good bass. 2. Sound clarity is also good. 3. Noice cancellation works well.. 4. Mic is very responsive. 5. If you love to play PUBG this is for you.. 6. Music experience is far better than upto 1500rs headphones.(With many brands you don't have mic options 🤨). I am very satisfied with this product.. Due to its metal frame some may feel heavyness, within 4-5 days you used to it and doesn't feel any difference.

name: Srinivas Pawan Varikuti
title: Best for Bass  lovers and high quality sound guaranteed
content: From 6 months onwards I'm using Mi earphones. and I found a little bit sound quality problem and changed to boat earphones and today I got these earphones. after comparing these both earphones I found that boat is best earphones than Mi in bass and sound quality. Just go for it.. Best in Bass. Wire quality is awesome. Sound quality is very good. Built quality also good

name: Ashuhs
title: Dont buy please.
content: I ordered on 29 Jun 2019 & it did not work well even for 6 months. 1 side stopped working. It gave me static current (shock) many times in my ear. Also, there is built-in noise in that headphone only, which keeps creating noise. So no question of Outside Noise Cancellation. :( It does not have mike holder - which can hold mike near mouth. You only have to hold it with hands. The moment you press mike by mistake, it mutes the voice while call is goin on. Sooooo annoying headphone I ever bought in life.

name: narayanasrikanthreddy
title: Dont expect too much
content: i had boat nirvana, the sound quality was better ie sharper than bass 225. However the earphones gave up one side stopped working.. The bass 225 build quality is quite impressive.. Sound Quality:. Two things stand out (1) space (2)bass clarity. It has good spacing ie sound feels near or at arms length when compared to mi standard or seinheisser cx275. Bass feels muffled and clarity is wanted for some of my favorite songs

name: Burhanuddin Kalawadwala
title: Good but not great
content: bass quality is just "nice" because bass just sounds like high dB on low-frequency range setting on sound equalizer that's all, in other words, overall sound quality is like you are in an auditorium and plugged cotton balls in ears, mean you still hear sound but damped.. so if I compare Sennheiser cx 180 which I used for about 3 years, its sound quality was very Open (idk I am not sound expert) and bass quality was perfect.

name: Shashank Saxena
title: ALL BASS, average Vocals and Treble
content: This is ALL BASS earphone, the lows and mid pitch sounds are not very clear. Vocals and Treble seem to be over boosted due to BASS. For this price tag ANT provides better quality of sound.. Plus those attachments for earphones tend to be painful for long duration listening.

name: BINOY SANKAR
title: Perfect earphones for the price range.
content: So far so good.. Good earphones for the price range.. I also have a Sony MDR 55 the Bass is not as good as it but it's not okay to compare both of these mainly because of the price range.. The noise cancellation is actually perfect.. I'd say it has great Bass for the price range.

name: Nikhilesh Patil
title: Better to go with Mi Basics
content: I have brought one around a month back. The Sound quality and performance is Good, however the build quality of plastic mic unit is not satisfactory. The parts have already started falling apart. I am doubtful about the life they will serve. Better to go with Mi Basics as overall I have found then superior to these.

name: Rishikesh Tiwari
title: It can't get any Better at this Price Point.
content: I'd been using this earphone for quite a while and I am really loving it. The built quality of this earphine is excellent. The main ear piece is made of a very sturdy material. Although the wires gets tangled quite a bit but the built quality of the same is good. It's a flat wire which won't break in your daily use or commute. The bass in the headphone is adequate and the sount quality is good.

name: Vineeth
title: Not so good
content: These earphones are very good . The built quality is excellent and you can even beat someone with it with the guarantee of not breaking these earphones. The bass as mentioned is excellent but the music seems to be over amplified .. The worst part is that it's extremely uncomfortable to use and that is because of the huge metallic bob on the ear side . You can't stick them on the ears and it keeps falling down frequently.. I would suggest not to buy these.

name: Arshad
title: Not Good earphone
content: In my ear not fit earbuds.. My earphone jack in my mobile damaged with this earphone because the earphone not perfectly fit in my mobile I used Vivo V9. Earphone disconnected again and again and I pushed again and again in my earphone jack. And earbuds also not fit in my ears. My earphone jack damaged and now I cannot use any earphone in my mobile. It's worst earphone I used in my life.

name: Riju philip james
title: Unde my roughest use lasted for 2 years. Satisfied.
content: I bought this ear phones on September 26 2018 and after serving exceptionally for 2 years, today September 24, 2020 one of its ear phone isn't working properly. Given that I use it roughly this is really good. Sound quality is good not the best, obviously for the price range. So according to me its real value for money. Buy it.. Ps: I obviously wanted to buy this again but wanted to try something different so I have ordered one more piston fit.

name: bootup
title: GOOD FOR THE PRICE RANGE
content: Bought this for Rs 499/- . The build quality is very good even the wires whir is long enough around 1.2 meters. The sound quality is good especially the bass it produces.. It depends on the hone make. one can use some sound equalizer apps to adjust the audio output. The volume output is loud, louder than any other headphones in this category. It is made up of polished metal.

name: Siddhartha Saha
title: Very satisfied with this product
content: Have been using this earphones for more than 3 months. Sound quality and bass are good. However, main use for me is on way to work and back by metro, and therefore - the things that I focused on more at the time of buying it is durability and tangle-free. On both these points, the product does very well. No issues with delivery or packaging. So, highly recommended for rugged earphones with good sound and bass quality in this price bracket.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Quality product at the price point
content: The flat wire is really good as it doesn't coil at all. The storage box is really cute. The sound quality is good with clarity of both speech and music. The quality of bass is good. A good quality product overall at that price.

name: Aaquib Zama
title: Amazing sound quality and really long lasting
content: Love this product. Have purchased 5 of these and given this to almost all my family members.. Good sound quality, sturdy build quality, lasts very long. Cables are of good quality and jack is very solid.. Highly recommended. I didn't find anything so good at around 500 Rs.

name: SANJAY KUMAR
title: Do not Buy
content: My review after one month of use.... 1. Sound is ok. 2. Quality is ok. In my suggestion one should not buy these because these earphones are not fit in ear and every now and then came out of the ear.. Boat is good company but my personal opinion "NO" for this earphone

name: Umang
title: Heavy in weight
content: Product wire is very heavy and the buds are also heavy in weight due to this a slight moving around makes the bud to losen out or come out of ears.. Though the build quality is good but while making so due to its weight. It becomes a bit uncomfortable

name: Parmanand Motiramani परमानन्द मोतीरामानी
title: Strong and Durable.
content: -Boat Bassheads 225 has really good bass, sound quality and noise cancellation. Bass is very good (high-quality bass). Some earphones compromise with the sound quality if the bass is good. Boat Bassheads 225 doesn't do that. It has high-quality bass and good sound quality at the same time.. -It is very durable. There are no weak points in the earphone. The wire is strong. Some parts are made of metal and wires are attached very strongly to the componets. I'm not exaggerating when I say this- "Boat Bassheads 225 is very durable". -Some people are complaining about earphones falling off during running or some physical work. My advice is to use the wingtip which is provided with the earphone. Your earphones will be locked in position and won't fall off during running, cycling, etc.. Edit (in 2020) : I've been using this earphone since 2018 and there hasn't been any problem. I repeat, "Earphones are strong and durable and Sound Quality is also good. No earphone of mine has lasted this long. They always break. If you're looking for a strong and durable earphones, Boat Bassheads 225 is the answer.

name: Jeetu Das
title: ABSOLUTELY AMAZING
content: I buyed this product on 21th jan 2018 and still i have this headphone working in absolutely great condition and i am using it regularly on mobile and laptop.. Build quality is amazing sound quality is also nice.. Best headphones to buy

name: Saikat
title: Not at all a good Head-Phone!
content: What i like:. 1. This headphone for its specific kind of design(strap like structure) doesnt get inter-tangled thus no more unwinding of it.. What i doesn't like:. 1. The mic of the headphone can't even pick up words 15 cm distance away from it.. 2. The ear-buds are made of metal and not hard plastic so, for the first time it will obviously feel like a load on the ear, and then again it starts to fall off from the ears for its greater mass.. 3. The sound quality is not good and if you happen to turn up the volume accidentally your ears are for a hell of a high pitched ride. The high bass only feels good in low volume otherwise it is kinda useless. The sound output is not soft but often painful.. 4. The button box on the headphone (housing the mic) is of no use for many a phones.

name: Allan Lakra
title: A very good budget earphone
content: Pros:-. Looks great. Tangle free cable for messy keepers. Very good sound clarity. Decent bass. Cons:. Noise cancellation not so good. Though it is sold as bass headphones, bass is not upto the mark as much as JBL. The ear heads are plastic though expected at least metal at this price. Overall a good buy for regular usage

name: asawari
title: Bass Headphones- Good product for a daily normal use.
content: A good product under reasonable rate and quality! Comes with a case and extra pair of earbuds. Sound quality and Bass quality is also okay. The only problem i had was with the earbuds, hence 3 stars. With great difficulty and tons of try and error, i was able to change the earbuds to my suitable earbuds size. Was to a point where i was returning the product, but somehow it got done and now they are perfect.. Using it since the past 6 months. If your usage is limited ot calls, songs and video- this does the job.

name: Anita
title: Wow nice one
content: I love this headphones. Once I saw the Hedafon of my friend and i love the build quality and sound quality was beyond the words.. I made a mind to purchase it and after a year I have purchased it it's really cool color is also so unique. Single complaint. The buffer that these set of earphones have are very unadjustable the were not of my style still I manag.. Thanku

name: Nikhil Gokul
title: 100% Satisfied with the product
content: The durability I got from this earphone!. Hands down really good bass and good sound quality. What surprised me the most is the durability I got from this earphone. I had bought it around 1st week of June in 2017 and NEVER once did I have any complaint for it. I had accidentally even forgotten it in my trouser pocket and it came out with a good wash. Had given up hope but it still worked perfectly!. I'm writing this review almost after almost 2 years of usage and now it has started having lose connection issues. But more than satisfied with the product. I had bought this for my mom and sis as well.. Verdict: Go for it if you want best earphones at a low budget

name: Arjun
title: Value for money
content: Build material of wires is good. Color of the earphones are as it is shown in the product image. Perfect for all purpose use and the extra ear buds make it a good deal. Thank you amazon for discount offer

name: Subhadeep Paul
title: Awesome product😍
content: Very good product. The build quality and look is best on this price. Sound quality, clearly and bass quality is moderate and noise cancellation is also very good.. But only bad things in it is it hurts on your ears because of the heard plastic on colored earbugs ....but if you use black earbugs then you can avoid this problem.. Overall its a very good deal. Its better then any other headphone on this range( mi basic or jbl) . And the branding and look is superb.

name: Avi
title: Nice buy.
content: Nice earphones. Doesn't tangle easily. Sound quality quite good. Comes with 5 extra tips making thing easy for ear and life. excellent for mobiles like Poco X2 which have jack down the phone. Quality looks good. Happy.. Value for money.

name: Samik P.
title: Unhealthy for your eardrums.
content: The effective bass is too high in comparison to treble. So to hear the treble tone you have to put the volume high and bass becomes harmful for human eardrums. In low volume bass overshadows every other tone.. Build quality also pretty poor. The casing over the microphone came off with a month of use. Overall will not recommend anyone.

name: Satya Prakash Chaudhary
title: Decent Bass and treble
content: I am giving a true review. This earphone has a great sound including Extra bass and treble with noise cancellation. Jbl products are good but can not beat with it. I am sad with its built quality because I purchase this one in February 2019 and till now I claimed warranty 2 times for this one because one side earphone was not working after sometimes , firstly damged on joint of headphone jack and secondly after replacement it was damaged on right side earphone, it was second replacement and the third unit that I have now so I acn not say anymore about its built quality but the sound quality is decent. Well , the statement applies on it that "If something is to get then something is to loss".

name: Amazon Customer
title: Hate and love at the same time.
content: The product is worth the price and I really loved it. But the issue I have faced is the left ear bud suddenly stops working after a period of time, I have owned 2 products of Boat Bassheads and I have faced similar problem in both of them... I use them for gaming on my ps4 only, so can't tell about music and stuff.. But for Gaming if your looking for pocket friendly earbuds you can go for these..

name: Manan aron
title: Worth it!
content: The product quality is pretty good and its worth for buying. I think instead of purchasing duplicate earphones this is something i suggest. It has good sohnd bass and its better than any Mi brand basic earphone. Okay if the reduces by 40 to 50 INR then its best. I think if you are willing to buy something affordable and quality then its better for you.

name: Nilay Gupta
title: Best for long lasting.
content: Best earphone at this price range for heavy use.metalic finish and durable wire is used.jack is gold plated.also provide supports for your ears with the box for running or exercise purpose.low base but sound is clear.you can use some app to boost the bass.

name: Dr Deepak Kumar Sahu
title: About the Product
content: The worst earphone I have ever used ...I won't get attached to ear ....it's lifespan is 2 to 3 months .....and the customer support is also bad ...don't buy it ...rather go for a MI or realme earphone ...it is just waste of money ......

name: Shivam
title: First copy
content: Don't but this guy's it's a first copy product ..even i was shocked to see the quality of the product as well as the sound quality ..it's very bad .. i have used many boat earphones this doesn't seems original !! And the sound quality is horrible...build quality is like any other 100-200 rs earphones..wire is also like the cheap ones .. not up to the mark.. very depressing for Amazon for sending such fake products

name: amit bisht
title: cx180 vs bassheads 225
content: the ultimate boss under budget. as the name says , its king of bass. best bass sound under budget. lacks in soft quality music , cant perform very well in this genre but its ok for me. best for rock music. its bit heavy , and mic is average , not very good , creates problem when on call. top notch build quality , its been months and this damn thing works like new. this product is better than cx180 in terms of bass. go for cx180 if you want light weight handy and soft music kinda thing

name: Shruti pandya
title: Pleasant for everyday use.
content: I've been using this earphones for 2 months now, the sound quality is amazing and mic too, the wire doesn't tangle, the only problem I have is that the buds (earpieces) are too heavy and they keep falling out of my ear. It's quite irritating. Also you cannot wear the earphones and rest your head over the earphones, get's really uncomfortable.. Boat has always given out good products and this is competent product

name: Avinash Kumar
title: Long term review of Boat Bassheads 225
content: Alright so writing this after using it for more than a year, it stopped working 2 months ago the right earpod started malfunctioning and was dead the other day, anyway coming to the review. Build quality: Really good, flat wire doesn't let the earphone get tangled and the mic was placed just in the place next to the mouth just where it should be and the 3.5mm jack, it's gold plated and L-shaped if people prefer that.. Earpod quality: Pretty good, but made of metal and heavy af that's why people complain about the pod getting out from the ear which wasn't an issue for me as I found the earbuds which perfectly fit my ear canals and then it wasn't that big of an issue for me.. Sound quality: Well, as the name suggests, it's bassy like yeah really bassy but upto the point that It starts giving a headache if listening to longer periods of time because of the empowering bass, the lows were really muddy and mids were muddy but not like lows highs were kinda okayish but was good when you watch movies with it and one more thing even after fitting into ears, the noise cancellation was poor and sound leak was so much to the point that people sitting far away from me could tell which song I was listening to so that was kinda bad well, for me anyway.. Verdict: Overall 3.5 stars. Should you buy: Well, it depends on your preference really if you like really high bass then you could go for it but if you need a balanced soundstage then you're better off with something like 1More Pistons or Soundmagic ES18S.

name: Eric John Dungdung
title: Go for jbl earphones at the same price
content: Apart from it's sound quality there's a couple of things that i don't like. The build quality is cheap, the diaphragm in the earphone is very thin and whenever i try to adjust it in my ear it makes squishy sound which is really annoying. It comes out more often and had to readjust it. While readjusting sometimes it goes deeper in the ear which creates low pressure and the sound from diaphragm gets low. Had to readjust couple of times to get clear sound. Even the ear hooks ate not comfortable. It starts to pain after half an hour. Disappointed on the product.

name: Dtirhus
title: I'm bad at titles.
content: I don't know how to go in-depth with a review. for earphones, I've never used an extremely expensive one. But I am extremely finicky, so finding these earphones to be great means something - perhaps best for deep bass. I love the earphone hooks, it's simple yet immensely useful. Probably the best pair you can get under 1k.. EDIT: I'm still using the same earphones after a year, a first for me - not withstanding that I'm usually moving out of my home more with other earphones during non - pandemic life.

name: Adharsh reghu
title: Good
content: Writing the review after using it for 6 months. First there will be fitting problems. But as you use the headphones your ears will adjust and the earphones will perfectly fit into your ears within a month.. Now about the built and sound quality.. The built quality is superb.... I ordered the blue one and it matches with my phone.. The sound quality is good but not the best.. It is for people who like heavy bass music and dj . The noice cancellation is above average.. Its LOUD, VERY VERY LOUD . IF YOU USE IT IN FULL VOLUME YOU WILL BE DEAF IN A DAY. SO BE. CAREFULL ....

name: Ajay Kumar
title: Best with Sound Failed with MIC
content: Hello Everybody,. This earphone is great with the sound quality, i am using it since sep. 2018 still working absolutely fine like a brand new earphone.. But there are some drawback of this i.e. 1) It's MIC is not so much powerful, you just have to put mic with very near to your mouth for proper voice.. 2) It is very heavy due to mettle on it. It will slip from your ear (Most of the time). For solution of this they provide a rubber band which hold this earphone in your ear, but that will cause pain in your ear.. So overall sound quality is superb but it is heavy to use.

name: Deshdeep Hira
title: 5 stars! I would have given 6 stars! Totally, Totally worth!
content: Real review@. after 1 year use. Best under 500 ! Believe me take This at once dont think!. Pros- Very durable design, very very very durable and made of metal, no tangle wire and will not break even you throw it on head! Look fansy ( red one for me)! Has 6 sets of different sized earpieces ( 3 black pair and 3 transparent). sound quality is good, clear and stable, bass is extra, can be compared to skullcandy 800 rs earphone and just a bit ( very minute quality) than sony 1200 rs earphone, best in this range!. It has speaker as well to attend calls !. cons- only one and major! heavy, slips out of ears due to heaviness, not during exercise, the accessory attached for not slipping ( black ear holder) give some pain after half an hour!. conclusion!. even has one disadvantage, Its must be bought under 500 ! Even if you do not need one, buy one and gift to someone!

name: Kshitij Nagdeote
title: Best headphones for the price if you're a bass lover.
content: I owned a pair of these in black color and the bulid quality is impressive. The wire is flat, metal earphones,has mic and button. I ordered one more for by brother in red color and both look cool plus you get many accessories with it. I've posted the pics.. Awesome product under 500-600 if you're a bass lover otherwise buy the auditechnica cthalr 100 if you love audiophile earbuds. The quality and bass is not present but the mids,highs and lows are balanced in those and vocals are clear.. If you're bass lover, buy these. It's worth every penny. :)

name: Pratik Sharma
title: A so so in-ear even at this price
content: I read one of the most useful review here where this in-ear was compared with Sennheiser cx180 and the JBL earphone. I can't comment on JBL (since never used it) but I'm a fan of Sennheiser and using in-ears and on-ears since more than 6 years. I have bought cx180 twice for self use and I can bet that in-ear is way way way way way better than this cheap earphone. If mic is what you want for talking on calls maybe buy a cheap in-ear from a local store or use standard in-ears that come with mobile phones, but NOT THIS.. P.S. I'm using Boat Rockerz 400 on-ear that's better.

name: Anonymous
title: Bass and noise cancellation is awesome .
content: It is an awesome one I have ever seen.. early I used some smartphone branded headphones.. and I also took up apples wired one.. this boat 225 is awesome ... Now I need to mention a strange thing and I also ordered this one in flipkart but they gave me a 2 year old model boat bass heads 225 without noise cancellation and bass ,. And it also don't had any hook or clips... Conclusion is see about the retailer and what the product they are exactly selling..

name: Mukesh N.
title: Sounded so bad I thought I received a defective piece.
content: Hands down the worst sounding earphones I have ever used. The bass is simply absent, it's just ridiculously loud. So loud you can't even push the volume above 50% or you'll hurt your ears. Because of this, some phone calls and all whatsapp calls are unbearable since the volume can't be reduced as low as I'd like for those calls.. Fun fact: I ordered a replacement for this because I couldn't believe a pair of headphones could be this bad. Sadly, they can be. I got the replacement and it sounds exactly the same.

name: Som
title: Almost perfect
content: Sound quality is awesome.. Only downside which I missed before buying that it doesn't have volume control buttons. Even my cheap 200 rs earphone has this feature. Sound quality is much better than the cheaper one though.. Extra earbuds provided with the earphone are hard to fix if needed.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Buds don't fit
content: Chose to order these mainly for the durability of the flat cable. Sound quality's alright but the buds provided are horrible lol there's 4-5 pairs of additional buds out of which 3 pairs don't even get fixed onto the earphones and they're all too slippery because of the over mattified surface of the buds I guess.. These earphones are alright if you purchase different buds with a small size and better grip (would help with better noise cancellation too).. PS: Nothing extraordinary about the bass as the name would suggest.

name: Ameen
title: Awwesome  👌
content: This is a awesome product that i have purchased till today. . The main thing is its sound quality and bass,. Sound quality is the most attracted thing to this earphones.. It have value for money. BOAT BASS HEADS 225, gave a marvelous bass experiance to me,,. This product have maximum buid quality rather than other earphones. And it have only one button to pause, next, and rewind, its ok but need to improve. The major thing is its FLAT TANGLE FREE CABLE,. You can use it roughly and its out put is as usual like normal use. Its never gets tangled when we kept it in our poket. The BOAT BASS HEADS 225 box contains in ear headphones, extra ear buds (3black, 3 blue and1 black extra ear hook) and one warranty card valid upto one year. This product have one year manufacturing warranty. Its pakkage is too attractive. Blue colour is more attractive. 3.5mm gold plated audio jack is used in it. Somply, its a good product, worth for ur money,. Don't ignore this review when you are looking to buy an earphone, BOAT BASSHEADS225 is a perfect choice for you

name: SREENIVASA REDDY MORA
title: Audio clarity "boAt BassHeads 225 in-Ear Super Extra Bass Headphones (Black)" clarity is excellent.
content: Irrespective of small price, Excellent clarity and click to fit ergonomics shape of speaker buds which easily fit in to ears and no need to reset frequently as they are falling from ears which is common phenomena of cheaper version earphones.. Attending calls as well as listening music at par quality audio. Thanks to Amazon for suggesting such an extraordinary ear phones at rock bottom price.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Satisfactory performance, value for money
content: Incredible sound quality. Gives you the stereo feeling which we loved in the 90s. Has satisfactory bass too. Ergonomic but falls out of the ears. Case is a bit small but can accommodate the earphones if folded in a circular manner

name: Swarnaprasad
title: Amazing sound quality
content: The earphones are durable it gives amazing sound quality I’m using it on my iPhone 7 Plus with the connector. It looks stylish the quality is pretty nice I got to one for my husband what is Samsung phone and it works perfectly on that too. Overall a great but yes it’s been four months now I have been using this and it’s going good.

name: Dhruv Patel
title: If not ment for outdoor use, You will be impressed...
content: Overall Good quality.... Both sound and built quality above average.... Best suited for moderate use... And when you're steady and in upright or straight supine posture.... But not for use during jogging or even walking.... Design is not kind of that holds the earpiece in ear easily.... Comes out during walking due to wire weight and terminal attachment of wire with earpiece.... You can't even use, when in bed... Earpiece hurts your ears when compressed against pillow.... But Sound output and quality are quite good.... Noise cancellation is also above average.... Overall you can go with this.... But boat rockers 225 is overall choice in all aspects... Only thing with wireless or Bluetooth headphones is you can only use for 6-10 hours and then you have to charge... Not suitable in many situations.... So wired headphones are overall choice.... If not ment for outdoor use, go with this.... You will be impressed.... P.S. Best wired earphones are one with iPhone!!! Great experience!!!

name: Ameet
title: Great product in this price
content: Clear sound,. multiple different ear buds in size,. enough wire length to watch movie on phone or laptop,. Clip to hold Mike near collar,. Noise cancellation. Overall its worth buying in 449

name: Iyan
title: Not up to the mark...
content: I dont think so its up to my satisfaction, cos iam a music lover, only bass enhanced head set is not enough for 599 range... Rather i am disappointed...cos ib this range we can get a gid headsets.... When connected to redmi 4 , if happen to change the hearphone mode, nothing happens... But my local 80rs head set do faar better than this.. mic is also have some whizzing sound...

name: Shintu Cherian
title: Best Headphone for this price tag
content: The Boat Bassheads 225 looks like a regular pair of in-ear headphones. It has a 1.2m flat cable which the company claims is tangle-free. There is an in-line remote that has a microphone and a single button. The driver chambers of these earphones are made out of metal, which is a surprise considering the low price. They have a knurled pattern on them for better grip, and they do get cold in an air-conditioned room.. Boat generously supplies six pairs of ear tips, a clip, and a pair of ear hooks with these earphones. I think that the ear hooks are a very good addition at this price and will be helpful for people planning to work out while using these earphones. I tried using the ear hooks and found them to be comfortable.. The Y-splitter on the cable also has a metal casing, which seems to be purely for aesthetics. The gold-plated 3.5mm headphone jack has an L-shaped plug so it does not stick out much when you plug it into a device.. Boat has opted for 10mm audio drivers that have a frequency range of 20Hz - 20KHz. These earphones have an impedance of 16 Ohms and do not need a lot of power to drive them.. But when it is comes to sound, it is little more Bass heavy.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Okayish
content: To be honest they sound like Chinese earphones that you buy from a local shop. Very cheap although the build quality is awesome but the sound that come out of those two metal cylinder they are calling earphones is not up to the mark eartips make sound when you touch earphones. There are some pros also like the flat cable is just fabulous the mic quality is totally awesome and wire length is long enough.

name: Jason Bourne
title: Warranty claim sucks at Boat
content: Never ever buy any products from Boat who have sold their soul to an Indian third party company Imagine Marketing Pvt. Ltd. to manage product warranties and repairs. This company rejected my warranty claim for repair on an in-warranty period Boat Bassheads 225 in-ear headphones stating the submitted product invoice is invalid even when it was purchased through the authorized Amazon.in. How can a big brand Boat can employ such a third grade company that without verifying straightforwardly rejects the original invoices as invalid. Never gonna buy another product from Boat ever if they make such a fool of people regarding 1 year warranty claims. 3-4 stars that I have given are for the sound quality, noise cancellation and bass performance of the product. But warranty, definitely sucks!!

name: Vatsal Parikh
title: Stopped working
content: If you're thinking about buying this item thinking it has 1 year warranty and thus is a great product considering good rating then you're wrong, At first I thought it has great bass and sound but gradually it stopped working exactly after 1 year. Now I would rather buy a 1000 rs. earphone than going for such half trash 500 rs. earphone. And the great thing is now in this corona pandemic I have to use my old headphones which sucks and I can't even buy new ones for some more weeks. So basically this earphone left me hanging when I needed it most.

name: Jai Soni
title: ONE YEAR USAGE REVIEW
content: ive been using these for more than 1 year now.. The durability is superb. Many times the cable got pulled accidentally but it works flawlessly.. The vocals, trebles , highs and lows are crystal clear.. The wire is tangle free as they mentioned. Quality feels premium.. And finally the bass. I am a bass hunter and i am happy to say these satisfied my greed for bass. Its punchy and serves the quality for the price.. Also these come with a clip, and many tips of different sizes. Best in this price segment.

name: Haritha
title: Very uncomfortable in ear.
content: Sound and mic quality is okayish...dont buy this product if u want comfort. The wierd bass head design is heavy and extra large causing the ear bud to fall out of ear. Not comfortable to wear..keep slipping out. Extra pair of ear buds are also not of good quality. Support wing plug is also with this pack but hurts ear when u wear.. the quality is rough. Not good. Not satisfied

name: Sarvesh Ghautham
title: I missed my replacement time, the product is defective.
content: Do read this...!!!. I love this product for the best sound clarity, noise cancellation and bass quality. But in the curve there is problem, when I touch there while listening some musics or video the sound is not audible, it's defective. I came to know about this only after 10 days, at the moment I checked for replacement but the last date was over, now it has gone waste. I don't know only the product which I received is like this or every product is like this only...!!!. Do check at the delivery time itself.

name: Sanjay Gulati Musafir
title: Recommended
content: The product is exactly as described. No glitches. Someone mentioned in their review that ear-buds fall off the ear - It was happening with me too. Only changing the silicone top, which are provided in the pack itself, with the right size solved the problem. Value for money. Recommended.

name: ANAND S.
title: It is ok Product not recommended for light music listener.
content: I had purchased this product in January. It stopped working within 8 days. Sound was not coming one or both the sides. I just missed the return by 1 day. I had called up service center and they gladly replaced the product. I am giving them three star because of customer service.. Bass is too much, If you are classical or light music listener then do not go for this. JBL is much better. You get ear pain after listening it for long time. It is not enjoyable with too much bass. If you are going to listen Dance collection then go for it. Also microphone sound quality is ok. I would recommend to purchase JBL donot compromise for 100 Rupees

name: neelam jogalekar
title: Great budget product!
content: This is the second time I am buying this product and it's a great purchase. I bought it for my mother from Amazon after i had a very good experience with it. The only downfall is that, because they are bassheads, listening to your own recorded audios gives more bass than necessary. But overall, very nice budget earphones, durable and good quality.

name: Hardik Barot
title: Value for Money
content: I liked because it gives almost a sound quality like Sonu at a very much cheaper and reasonable price. Zero distortion at highest volume. Cristal clear voice. Material quality looks very good and durable. It comes with different sizes of ear buds. Value for money. Out of ten only 1 less as compare to Sony earphones very thin difference.

name: Kiran
title: Not that great bass as people claim. Heavy.
content: Not so great.. The metal makes it heavy weight.. You definitely cant sleep wearing it. And gives pain after 30 min of use.. Felt not so great bass as people claim. Its balanced with treble.

name: Ankan kumar Patel
title: Excellent product.
content: This is my second purchase of the same item. i find it to be the earphone in this range rather I can say it will beat the higher range of earphone also.You will love the sound quality , noise cancellation and mostly is the bass quality. Don't waste your money on other earphone just purchase this and u ll get all what you want.. Different sizes of ear buds are also given with it that with will help you to fit to your ears.

name: Abhi Dhoundiyal
title: Amazing product
content: I don't think apart from Boat someone provides you the same quality material in this price. Update 1 June 19- It's been over 9 months and one side is not working, i claimed the warranty yesterday and they pickup the earphones. Now let's see the service. To be honest i still recommend these earphones, I also ordered the new pair again and today received the delivery

name: Rakesh R Pai
title: Read carefully before you decide!
content: You would have read so may pros in the product description. Let me come to the CONS which i faced.. 1. NO REFUND. You can only replace the item, hence i am left with no choice.. 2. Cannot be used for working out. Earphone keeps on popping out of your ear and you rather end up being frustrated and leave the gym.. 3. While riding, if you are not wearing helmet (i know helmet is mandatory for safety, but still wanted to test), then all you hear is the buzzing wind and a bit of some sounds. Earphones popping out of ear still happens.. 4. Not 100% tangle free.. 5. Bass is good. But if you need song clarity, then this is not the choice.. This product is only for those who want to listen something without moving from your place. Even if you walk, i dont think this can fit properly in the ear for the least amount of time.. I was using JBL earphone and only after reading the reviews posted here, i thought to buy this. I deeply regret my decision now.. If this review helps atleast some, I will be much more happier then.

name: Babita Bisht
title: Just average
content: The cable quality is undoubtedly very good yes .. it's tangle free so you don't need to solve the puzzle of untangling it.. "BUT". 1. The sound output is not great, If you are a person who listens music or watch videos at noisy places then it's not for you. Even at full volume the sound is not properly hearable.. 2. The ear buds are also not good, yes they provide pairs of ear buds but none of them fits that well. You need to plug them again and again in your ear.

name: Aachal
title: Exceptional Sound Quality
content: Boat bassheads 225 is durable earphone and this is my second buy as old one is now used by me parents. Sound quality is exceptional and noise cancellation works very well. The only challenge that I faced is sometimes it does not fit in you ear properly or falls out of your ear but for that company has also provided different sizes of earbuds for free which you can use as per your need. So all in all it's a must buy product as it's in budget, has sturdy look and comes with earbuds with great packaging.

name: Shail
title: Very Poor Quality
content: The first device stopped working in one ear in a couple of days, got a replacement and the 2nd one stopped working soon after the replacement warranty expired so I am stuck with this junk. Avoid this and go for a better quality product.

name: Hemant
title: Worst product I hve seen in my life

(there was no option to return the product.... you can only replace with same item). still someone wants to buy I'm ready to sell my unused item for 50% price.

name: Avijit Sarkar

name: Gagan Singh
title: Disappointed ...
content: I am seriously surprised why this product received 4 star and that too from 34k buyers...I ordered this product after reading reviews and disappointed. First of all material quality is not gud. It's heavyyyy. Ear buds are not comfortable..... It comes out irrespective of whatever size you use. Worst experience. Again I hv to order Sony earbuds now that I had but lost. 😑

name: Srivats
title: Good improvement in Bass and durability compared to previous model.
content: I bought the older version of Boat BassHeads 225 in Amazon almost 19 months ago. It worked perfectly fine without a single issue till last week. Beacuse, unfortunately one of the earbud (with inline mic) stopped working along with the mic too! One cannot expect to last this earphones for such a long period of 19 months for such a low price compared to other high end earphones. Thanks to it's good but not great durability. I am saying this because the L shaped audio jack and the rubber price that connects the flat cable to the aluminium body of the earbuds weared out. But other than this issue, was pretty much happy with it's performance.. This time I decided to buy the same earphones because it had upgraded the design in the areas where I found the issues in the older one. And I expected the same audio profile from the new one too. But damn!!! I was wrong.. Boat has done a really good job in tweaking the bass in the new version. You can easily identify the difference in the bass when compared to the older model. You won't find it too overwhelming and it has got the perfectly balanced bass at this price budget. The higs are also pretty decent and nice to hear.. But one cone which it retained was that it's mids is not improved like the bass. The vocals are little bit muddy amdt unclear when the song which you are playing has chorus. So, if you are a serious music lover and looking for more vocal clarity , spend some extra bucks to get earphones with more vocals clarity or good mids.. P.S:. The reason why I decided to stick with these earphones is that I mainly use them to watch videos, play games and listen to songs sometimes when bored. I am musician too but I actually LOVE the audio profile in this earphones But if you are a serious audio profile freak, this isn't not the piece for you. But it won't disappoint you at the same time. Happy shopping!

name: Amazon Customer
title: Does not fit properly
content: Fitting is a big Problem. It simply doea not remain in ear properly and keeps coming out. I tried to put smaller size a medium size covering as well but it does not work well at all. It is good to use while seated but while walking it is difficult to keep earphone intact.

name: Akhil
title: Just go for it, highly recommended!!
content: One word for this AWESOME. Using these earphones from last 5 years, best in sound, best in the bass, best in-ear, best in durability.. Tangle-free wire and quality all these makes this perfect for this price range.. *Note: not using the same earphone from last 5 years, I buy it a couple of time because I gave it to my friend, family members because they liked it so much when they tried it.

name: Singam
title: Stopped working
content: I purchased two before and I have purchased two more a couple of months ago and the stopped working after a month and I could not return them.. The one purchased a year ago are working and sound quality is excellent

name: Shivam Shukla
title: Great sound , but the earphone slips out from ear often
content: The sound quality is good and the bass is good as well. But due to the extra bass, there is a sort of cancellation effect on other sounds .. especially the treble .. Also the earphones are heavy.. they often slip out from ear while brisk walking . So I can't use it while I go for walk. That's why I'm giving it 4 stars.. At this price range the best alternative would be to go for the generic Samsung earphones .

name: Amazon Customer
title: Mic stopped working within one month. Not suggested to buy
content: Not suggested. Keep yourself away from it. It won't stay in your ears due to its heavyness, but that's not an issue for me since the Sound quality is really good. But it's mic is worst, initially when I was on call, the person on other end able to hear all the noice happening around me, except what I am speaking.. After few days the mic completely stopped working, upon which I had to remove the earphones every time I got a call. Impressed with the sound quality, I bought it twice, first time I lost it within one month of purchase, second time I had to replace with new one, since one of the earphone was not working properly. Completely disappointed with the performance. Pls don't buy if you are expecting mic to work properly.

name: Mallikarjun
title: 7 month review
content: I like this product experience wise but it is. Not worthy I thought because I am using these. Ear phones boAt Bass 225 from 7 months only. I got problem in left side ear speaker it is not. Working at all and castemer care was not responsing good they telling nearest service center but it was so for from my carent location. I have to spend 200 rp for traveling wt rabbeish. They saying no home picap service I don't know. What to I do halp me Amazon teme please 😳😳

name: Austin
title: Good product. Boat delivers as always
content: My entire family uses boat earphones. My mother, sister, brother and me.. Each has a different model but the same love to it.. This is my third Boat earphone bought as an extra for my laptop and its good for the money.

name: Tanai Mathur
title: Called Bassheads, bass doesn't exist
content: I bought these earphones in the hopes of listening to music with a full sound, the name bassheads seemed like a good option and the other reviews aren't too bad either.. I don't know if I got a faulty piece, but:. First off, my left and right earphones aren't balanced. The right one has has significantly low volume than the left.. Secondly, All the songs sound half baked. The equalisation is terrible. Even after manually tweaking it, it isn't up to the standard.. The sound also cracks a bit at high volumes, but that isn't very prominent.. Another problem is the jack and phone connection. It is a little loose and impossible to put on with the phone cover (my cover's cut out has space to put in thicker earphone jacks, I've been using it for a year).. Without the ear hooks, the earphones refuse to stay in my ear, which is pretty annoying because the hooks start hurting after a while.. Coming to the positives, there aren't many. The mic works fine and the button control is good enough.. I've used other Boat products which were really good, but this one just didn't cut it.

name: Aman Sharma
title: Impressive Product
content: Why This Earphone?. Because it support almost every android and featured phones. The material quality is so good metal body, flat tangle free cable (i.e. you'll never face difficulties in order you take it out from your pocket, never mess up), mic quality is also good, when you plug in your ear surrounding sound reduce by 30% and when playing song 100% you'll Plug into Nirvana.. The Bass is really impressive without even using equaliser.. In short, awesome product.

name: Pooja c.
title: Good product but works for only 6-7months
content: Built quality top notch sound also superb very nice base but there is some problem with the pin as it is angled so when I keep my phone connected to earphones in my jeans pocket and walk the pin moves and after some days it starts to show problem in sound delivery earphones word for only 6-7 months for me I have bought it thrice because no other company provides the quality in this price range

name: Mak
title: If looks could kill
content: This one looks cool but has not been functionally thought thru. The ear plus are heavy and keep popping out. After 6 months of heavy usage the mic stopped working. The length is good. But I'd go for boAt 152 any day.

name: Nikita Bhavsar
title: Good audio! Mic is okayish
content: The audio is good, super good I can say but noise cancellation is not satisfactory. Plus don't even think of using it both for your notebook and mobile. As I mentioned it does not provide 0 noise cancellation the person is not able to hear you right. Plus you really need to hold the mic close in order to be heard.. Overall I can say in wired earphones category it good I mean tanglefree at least - Good job boat with that !. But if mic matters more then give it a second thought.

name: Dominic Prakash
title: Uncomfortable in wearing
content: Uncomfortable in wearing when you are walking or chewing something. Felt like air block in my ears and as per doctors advise I always wear with little air circulation. This is not possible with this model. If you are sitting idle in your house then it may be good.

name: Atharva
title: Pause/play button and microphone problem  replaced 2 times
content: Editing after 1 yr use Basss, noise cancellation and sound quality is superb but the play pause button stopped working in 4 months and after that microphone also stopped working in 5 months then i replaced it again i was disappointed by button again i had to replace I HAVE REPLACED 2 TIMES HOPE NOW IT WILL WORK GOOD BECAUSE ITS WARRANTY IS OVER also ear hooks r not good it starting it works properly then became loose now they r of no use

name: Kapil Semwal
title: Best Service...
content: Good stuff.. Bass could be better, not as expected. Jose cancellation is not so good. Otherwise sound is good.. But, the service is best. I had some issue with the mic and the made it picked up from home and then shipped the replaced earphones.. Best of all.. Service is much better than the product quality

name: abdul basit
title: Good sound, but very uncomfortable and heavy
content: Honestly, these earphones have pretty decent sound quality and many would call it very good especially for this price range and I dont disagree. My main issue is that the earbuds are long and heavy. And while build quality is good, it is extremely uncomfortable in many situations and tends to just fall off even after changing the earbud tip to suit my ear size.. It Is also close to impossible to use just one earbud at a time, so if you want to share with a friend or for any reason want to keep only one on your ear, you'll have to keep it in with your hand, because it tends to fall easily due to the weight. If you want to use it in moving vehicles you may have to keep readjusting to make sure it does not fall off.. And it is certainly not tangle proof and when it tangles, it seems to pull the earbuds down harder so you might have to completely untangle it every time you want to use it.. If u want to use earphones while running then this is definitely not the pair for you

name: rafi pinjari
title: Bass ka baap😎☠️
content: This is very best earphones for bass lovers. Vocals normal have but when we are watching movie with this earphones phones we get best felling like movie theater .... And Amazon gives to me very fast service

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worth for money
content: Was searching for a earphone in midrange. After reading the reviews gone for this , as a bass lover & it is coming with replacement warranty.. Quality is very good,as it is metal. Call quality through mic is good.. Already using apple original earphones, this one sounds close to that, in bass it beats that!!!. Mids/Vocals/treble are good even though this is for bass.. Only con. is due to its metal finish , it's some times not comfort. But it is a little con.. ## Don't consider the reviews which tells it has only bass ,vocals & mids are not clear. Have to adjust the equalizers in the phone/laptop.

name: Abinash Das
title: Good pair of earphones
content: The sound quality is good and the earphone is bass heavy.Earphone are made of plastic but feel durable.The major issue with these earphone is the fitting.It keep falling from ear and if ur use eartips or earwings which the Company provide it will start hurting ur ear after half an hourm

name: Mukund Iyer
title: A good headphones
content: Noise cancellation is farcical. Don't expect A-Grade noise level from this product.. The bass quality on other hand is fine. Just fine. It's not so good and not so bad.. Overall, the headphone is a good deal for the price and sound quality.

name: Santosh Nagalikar
title: Horrible & hard ear buds and worst quality of sound , Dont suggest to buy this product
content: Its been more than 30 days now , I brought this product and Sound output form the product is not good at all and there is absolutely no noise cancellation . The Worst part is the Ear plugs . I assumed that Ear plugs provided will be soft and stick to ear's by looking at the photo provided , but it is one of the quality and it hard too .. It always falls out within few minutes we plug the ear buds in ear . I never suggest anyone to buy this product .

name: Tigmanshu Mehta
title: Faulty earphones
content: I received boat earphone damaged so I ordered replacement. Then again that replacement earphone's one ear bud stopped working in 6 months. I contacted the service center and got replacement after 20 days after calling more than 20 times on toll free number. Even government offices work faster than these guys. When I received new earphone packet, there was only earphone in it no set of earbuds was in it. Then again I had to call service center which responds worse than vegetable market for set of earbuds. I received set of earbuds quickly but one set was missing in them.. For better service stick to Sennheiser cx 180 earphone. As per my opinion foreign brand has better service than Indian brand.

name: vivek
title: Perfect..
content: Some people are not comfortable with the metal earbuds doesn't mean they are not worth it for music.... just choose the right earbuds then they dnt fall off easily.. And They are not that heavy u everyone worried about...still. If you are comfort freak dnt want to take risk...then choose Sennheiser earphone for ultimate comfort experience..

name: Gaurav
title: Audio quality is good.
content: Also comes with tons of ear tips and wings. Audio quality is really good. Build quality is also great! Best in this price range. Seems really sturdy.. It comes off really easily due to the thickness of the wire, but that is no problem if you use the wings.. Wings might be uncomfortable during long usage.

name: mohan
title: Value for money & Worth Buying with best sound quality
content: Delivery timing is awesome i have placed an order in midnight around 11 pm and i got the delivery in the morning around 8:38 am Seller Name is Appario Retail Private Ltd Thane Bhiwandi Maharashtra. Product is good i have tested lots of sound in different conditon with various Hz value to bass boosted custom sound.. this in-ear headphones has survived the sound testing at different levels in my opinion their is no cons about this headphones.. i will rate this as excellent, value for money & worth buying.. This earphones is on 2nd place in Tangle Free headphones category.. The sound quality is good.. Bass quality is awesome which is you can test online for bass test songs available.

name: Hiren
title: Very satisfied, value for money, great quality n awesome sound ☺️☺️
content: One of the best earphones i have ever used... superb built quality, its ruff and tough used everyday for several hours no issues with sound quality being using it from a long time now and it sounds as good as the day 1.. Very satisfied with this product.

name: Arish Siddiqui
title: Worst earphone ever
content: Worst earphone ever. One should never buy it.. In 2 month the quality of sound got worst. & After 4 months mic and play/pause button stopped working.. Boat earphone is nothing but just a piece of junk. No customer service or support from boat.. Totally waste of money.

name: Siddharth Soni
title: Best wired earphones regardless of price.
content: This is my 4th pair. I seem to loose them before they actually stop working or degrade in sound quality.. P.S. I have still used all previous pairs for atleast 4-6 months.. **UPDATE**. These pair did a full cycle in the washing machine (I forgot they were in my jeans pocket and put the jeans for washing) and still work perfectly. Near indestructible mothef*ckers.. **UPDATE-2**. After 5 months of intense abuse, I lost that pair of earphones. Good news, I get to try the new molten orange colour.

name: GK
title: Bad in comfort. Good sound.
content: I was looking forward to it (flat cables, bass). However, the problem was - the comfort in ear. The ear buds kept falling off. Overall, both the cable and the earbud felt a lot heavier than boat 162, which I have.. Overall - was not happy with the product. After trying for a couple of days, decided to return the earbuds. Will most likely get the 162.

name: syedbar
title: This is the best headphones in this price range..
content: Its been nine months that i have been using this headphones and it’s still as new as it was when i ordered them.. the body, the sound, the bass all of them Still works good as when they were new. I enjoyed listening music, gaming or even calling with this headphones.. The sound quality is good.. the bass is great.. The noisecancellation is also good.. And the body is awesome as it comes in tangled less wires with metallic rings over the headphones which feels premium... Don’t think too much just go for it.. These are value for money.

name: Vasa.saisrinivas
title: For one yr usage only....
content: After one year usage . I' m writing dis review..one yr its working fine.... after one year it will damaged... internally..one side ear bud is not working... internal wire is damaged... I bought two headset...same issue I found after one year usage...one head set o got replacement...it will be happened...at 10 days before my expairy date.. thank you boat for giving replacement... But it's good for one year usage...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not worth it!
content: It's not even been 2 months since I bought these and they have already started to malfunction. Mostly its been an issue with microphone not working. Its also quite heavy on the ears and you feel your ears pain sometimes after long usage. They also drop out of the ears with the slightest shake. The silicone rubber buds don't tightly latch onto the head. Frighteningly, they once came off inside my ear. Now I am looking for warranty support from Boat.. I had been using the JBL C100SI which were far batter than these.

name: Rahulbhati
title: Quality and cheaper
content: It's only for sound not for music I know it has good sale just for two reasons 1. It is boat company product 2. It is cheaper than other companies earphones but o would this product to my small brother of 5-8. Years not for me and my friends.. so before buying it make sure what you want.. cheaper and cheaper or quality and little more price product like jbl I think it is best

name: Ravi Singh
title: Never expected thia quality at this price. Must have product.
content: Everyone know that Boat has covered lot of market because of its quality. I have purchased this product and reviewing it after 1 year and it is still like new. I have lost buds even though they provide extra buds but this headset is still running perfectly. Very happy. Thank you Boat and Amazon.

name: Dushyant Gurav
title: Don't Buy Them, If you care for your Money & Time
content: So i would like to start with the price. Its ₹550 That's still manageable for a average college student... They're really bass heavy headsets.. Build quality is good for the eyes not for use.. Just in one month of usage it's giving me those crackling sounds & At times I can't hear from one side.. It's really irritating as I bought this for Pubg, Music and Movies but it doesn't do the work neatly. I would ask you to look for some other headsets in this section.. Also this is my second set of the same 225 Headset and even the last one had a lot of issues i had to go all the way to Andheri & replace them and even after replacing them once it didn't work for a year.. It's my mistake to buy it once again thinking that boat may have solved the problem with this headset.. If I were you i would go for RealMe Buds

name: Saravanan
title: Best earphones for the price
content: This is the best in the segment earphones for sound quality. Haven't used it enough to tell about the durability.. Pros-best material quality feels very premium. Terrific sound quality and bass. Wire is tangle free. Comes with 1 year warranty. Cons- earphones are heavy so it keeps falling out of the ear. The coloured ear buds are hard to install. I would give it 9.5/10

name: Suraj shaw
title: Good for traveling!
content: Go for it!!!!!. This sound quality is good.. Perfect for traveling,. I love because while traveling if we kept headphones on bag, it's messup but in boat due to its flat wires it's easily accessible while traveling.. But trust me servicing of the boat company is very poor! I am using boat from last 3 years & i have many products of boat....by experience it has been cleared that service of the company is poor!

name: Mohan R.
title: Not working after 6months
content: Delivery was fast and the sound quality was good. But failed in 6months, not hearing sound on one side. The product was used appropriately but not sure why it failed. As per production documentation, it carries a 1year warranty, upon searching on the internet, I found that the product is imported and sold in India by imaginemarketing so I sent a mail to them along with the invoice. Let me see how they address the warranty claim.

name: MIE
title: A good pair of headphones with great sound quality.
content: Loved the color. Looks exactly as depicted in the pictures. The sound quality is just amazing. The highs are as good as the bass. Came with a lot of options for ear tips as you can see. Sadly, mine broke due to rough usage. At first the sound wasn't coming from the right ear piece then the ear bud came off. Anyway, it was good while it lasted (6 months)

name: falguni marye
title: Best service from boat 🤩 giving review after 6 month of buying this product..
content: giving review after 6 month of buying this product.. after 6mnth 1side of earphone was not working properly so i put it for replacement on their official boat website n after 6 days they gave me this new cute pocket with new cod without any charges??? Such a great service guys go for boat. N happy and satisfied customer.. from now onwards I'll go with boat only

name: Nikhar Maheshwari
title: Not very happy. Unbalanced sound and uncomfortable
content: Not very happy with the sound quality. I got my order exchanged but even the second one that arrived is not that great. Somehow sound in the right side is a lot now than the left. Bit uncomfortable for the ears too. However I didn't have the return got this product, so cannot help now .

name: SAURABH GREAT
title: The Name of the PRODUCT suits the PRODUCT 100%
content: The best in-ear headphones in 500 price segment, maybe in 1000 segment as well.. I bought 5 of these in past 2 years, 2 for myself(1st one got partially wrecked in an accident and after 6 months of accident it just stopped working) and 3 for my siblings.. Warning, this is in-ear headphone and it's sound & bass might damage to your hearing if used for extensive period of time. You have been warned.. #SaurabhGreat

name: John Jericke
title: Bug Issue (Product Malfunctioning automatically) 👎🏼
content: When I bought the product it was working fantastic after few months 3-4 months later it starts to malfunction noise cancellation is working automatically while I'm in a call it automatically starts to malfunction like it is getting cancelled volume is increasing or it is decreasing, ok Google is getting on, and now totally shit of it for emergency I connect it is not working same malfunction happening. Don't buy it guys waste of money. But sound quality 👌 is fabulous ...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Don't hope for warranty.
content: Don't buy. If you are buying it based on warranty, please don't buy. Product stopped working within 1 week amazon replaced it.. But again stopped within 15 days now warranty is under product manufacturer. But they have not any working contact. I tried on 3 different no.s but none of them is in working condition.. I tried for mail but it's also unavailable.. Warranty is just for increasing the product not for customers help.

name: Krishna
title: Value for money
content: Heavy bass which might be the reason for lower clarity. But for the price this is a great buy. Mic works perfectly. I love products from Boat. They have an assured minimum standard. Value for money

name: Sai kamal
title: Worth every penny!!
content: Read the complete review before coming to a decision. These headphones have superb bass as mentioned on the product. I have purchased these headphones 5-6 months back and these are the best headphones undoubtedly. Well, after a few months one of the earplug came out. This is an issue faced by a few people. So I issued for a repair hoping to get it repaired. Then the delivery boy came, took my headphones, and after 11 days, gave me a new one. This isn't the old headphones but completely new one. The service of BOAT™ is awesome. Don't hesitate to buy!!

name: Gowtham
title: BOAT is G.O.A.T
content: This product can be used to listen music, ofcourse everyone knows that but this product has bass effect which can match the standards of high price segment headphones. If you love bass and you wanna buy one earphone for budget buy this product right now without hesitation. If you wanna buy this product to play PUBG mobile, sorry guys buy another earphone which has a straight jack that'll be good for holding the mobile comfortable.

name: RB
title: Money Wastage!
content: I considered boat to be one of the best companies seeing its reviews and watching its name in top 10 companies. I used to buy normal earphones of Rs 50-100 from the market which used to work for 3-6 months. This time i thought to buy some higher cost earphones thinking that they would he much better . So i decided to choose boat earphones. There earphones keep slipping out of the ears! This is the biggest problem! Material quality is good. Sound is good but even if you are sitting wearing these, these will keep coming out of the ears . And when you are walking , forget that you can wear these in ears. So the main purpose of earphones has not been fullfilled! And one of my friends bought the cheaper model of boat earphones,he is also facing the same problem! Overall hated these!

name: Sohum Sen
title: BoaT Beating all expectations
content: The earphones are really good. I'll just give some pros and cons here:. Pros:. 1. Great sound quality. Equaliser tuning really shows up in the range of music and you can tune them to your liking it genre of music.. 2. Lots of good quality earbuds provided.. 3. Sturdy.. 4. Anti tangle cables.. 5. L shaped connector. This can be a con for some but trust me adjusting the position of the connector when you're using the phone in different positions really enhances the life of the product.. 6. Stylish and good looking.. Cons:. 1. Because they are made of metal these are really heavy and can get slightly painful after prolonged usage.. 2. A weird thing happens when I plug them in sometimes. My volume controls Automatically go down to zero. It keeps happening and I have to unplug and replug it till that stops. This is something strange I have never experienced with any other headphone and it is quite frequent, say every once out of 10 times. Minor irritant but considering I got the pair for 469 only, I can live with this.. 3. Cable is actually a bit too long and gets in the way at times.

name: Puneeth adyanthaya
title: Good quality sound,cables,overall very good earphones
content: I am user of boat earphones from the past 2.5 yrs,no question about the quality of sound and quality of the cables its very good,and 1 thing i would say they have a minor draw back is its keeps on falling from our ears constantly it has a ear guard with it but it cant be put on always,so that 1 thing i would point out is a draw back rest its all very good,the cables are flat cables you dont have a worry of it getting after many years of usage,which generally happens with the round cables

name: PURNA CHANDRA DASH
title: Not long lasting
content: For some time it worked fine. But as time passed one side stopped working. Sound quality is the best but it was not lasting. Please give a replacement for this product. I prefer it but the lasting should be better

name: RAJARSHI B.
title: Poor product service..
content: Right now I am Very much disappointed with the product functionality and service duration..I have used this product just for 5/6 months now( baught in December 2019) and the product started to malfunction... Volume is automatically increasing and decreasing and Google assistant is triggered automatically several times when I am inserting the pin in the 3.5mm jack port..and i for these problems I had to discard my earphone... I was so eager to use this product but now I am very much disappointed..

name: Hrishi S.
title: Justifies the price
content: They have amazing bass but the sound quality is not on par with, say, Sony or sienheisser. However, at the given price point it is good.. The only this I didn't not like is the quality of ear buds. The buds seem to have a seam running across the breadth of the bud which cause irritation when used for a sustained duration.

name: debarun
title: Ear phone comes free with mobiles is far better than this.
content: I would have given 1 rating, 2 I gave just for below pros. And this review is also considering the price (600/-). Pros :. 1. Length of the wire is comprehensive. 2. Multiple ear bud was provided. 3. Mic is ok. Cons:. 1. Noise cancellation is next to none. Even my 4 years older ear phone which came free along with Mogo G is far better.. 2. Treble and Bass completely botched. Simple melody songs only not that clear forget about pink floyd.. 3. I was having creative ear phone of 700/- which I feel far far better than this one.. This review is respective to price as well.

name: Amazing user
title: Daffa-nuksaan
content: Very good product. For bass. Long life. Intangible cable and perfect design. I recommend you over mi earphones or jbl 599₹ earphone. Best buy 499₹ . During sell. Better the it's wireless version 1499 ₹ . In sounds quality.. But one thing I don't like is the sound is coming out you raise the volume to maximum. And it's is disturbing to a next to me person. 4 star ⭐

name: Hrishi
title: vocals are mixing
content: One side stopped working within six months.Got replacement but somehow its earpiece vocals are mixing with inbuilt microphone. So whenever I use them ingame output and my audio input mixes and other players listen everything that I do.e.g picking gun/objests noises,door opening/closing/jumping etc.. Tired of using it.

name: KESHAV PHAND
title: Received Defective product
content: Does not work at all. I just received the defective product. The colour on the edges of earbud and the plugin part is faded away. It seems as used product and no voice can be listened through it. This is very disappointing that such reputed brand has defective product. I requested a replacement hope they will give a product with original quality. I bought it as it is Amazon fulfilled product and now Amazon customer service told me that my money will be refunded if I get defective product again.

name: Chloe
title: The best and durable earphones you can get.
content: Boat earphones will last for many years.The audio quality isfantastic and you will not regret buying this. Compared to other brands of earphones this a beast considering the quality and durability. There are various colours to choose from too so you don't have to be in the typical type.The only downfall is since it's head is metal plated it may become heavy for some people.Despite this , it can be overcome by the additional support type thing provided.They also provided all sizes of earcups ,so it won't be much of a problem.I have been gifting earphones to everyone and also suggest this on my top list.

name: Priya
title: Very bad quality, cannot use with mobile phone
content: The plug doesn't fit into my android phone's port, it simply falls off.. However it fits into a laptop port.. Earplugs dont fix well into the ears either, the plugs fall off at the slightest movement.. Recommend to totally avoid this product.

name: Sandip sarkar
title: Honestly saying Its a Very very Good Product for 499 rs......Love it
content: Very Good Product Under 600 rs in normal days 549rs , in great Indian sale its comes 449-499 rs only.......I am buying it for 449 rs .. The Best build quality , the wire is flat its too good for rough users ....very strong & L shape jack its also good feature ......I love it

name: NAKUL KUMAR
title: Sound quality is great. Extra happiness was seeing bunch of ear buds ...
content: I was very excited on buying these earphones. Sound quality is great.. Extra happiness was seeing bunch of ear buds from small to large.. The only con I faced is losing that I lost 1 earbud from a pair within 1st week of purchase.. Post which I used second one which I lost again. currently using smaller buds, but those gets of the ears even if there is little tension in wire.

name: Soumik Mukherjee
title: Great product with very good sound quality
content: Very good sound with real good bass. Blue color looks cool. But most importantly i liked the build quality which will long last. Also they have given 6 sets of ear buds. 3 sets with blue color and 3 sets black colored. but loved the small clips upon attaching which helping me not to slip down my ears. Very happy with the products

name: Amazon Customer
title: Disappointed
content: First time i bought the product, one of the bud stopped working within 9 months, but i liked the sound quality so i bought it again. I bought the 2nd one on 20 august and one of the earphone stopped working within 3 months of using it. There is no use of warranty, you have to go to their service center, if it exists in your area and deal with this. I've been a fan of Boat since a long time. But now i have started questioning the quality of it's products.

name: Mohammed I.
title: dont buy boat products
content: Boat is not at all a good product. I bought this and after a week left side earphone stopped working as no sound. It says 1 year warranty but after 1 week only it stopped working, Contacted customer care and there's no executive to speak instead automated voice only and it gives service centre address and it also says they are not liable to warranty claims. I needed a warranty claim and dropped and email to boat website and still no response. Short and sweet - dont buy boat products .

name: Jarvis
title: BETTER GO FOR ANY OTHER BRAND OTHERWISE U WILL REGRET
content: Very painful for ear and Mic stopped working after 2 months..
