Can't use for long time and sound quality is also not that much good just average sound quality and I constantly hear some kinda of noise while using it.i hate this product. Besides this It's customer service support is worst .when I claimed warranty they took earphone from me and they still didn't gave me back after 20 days every time I call them to know status of replacement they said product is out of stock but irony is product is available at all online site so they have product to sell but not to provide replacement.They provide guarantee of 1 yr and they will keep the product with themselves for around 1 month so I am effectively enjoying the warranty of 11 month . Boat is such a cheater,cheap and 3rd class company and amezon is providing support to these companies to loot customer like us. Better go for JBL or. Skullcandy or any other.

name: ashish awasthi
title: Expected a better quality mic
content: I expected the mic to work properly as with other earphones but it's pathetic. I have to keep the mic on my lips while calling someone or else the other person will not hear my voice. I did not expect this from boat. Very disappointed. You can just use it for listening to music and not for calling. Over all sound quality is ok, giving 2stars just for listening function.

name: Raghuveer Singh Dhaka
title: comes with 1 Year warranty
content: You will get 6 pairs of earbuds and 1 pair of ear hooks and one clip. Overall this is good, but these earphone are so heavy it doesn't stay in your ear for long. Flat cables which is tangle free which is also a (+)ve for this product.. it has average bass, I am very disappointed with it, since these earphones are marketed as bass-heads.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Very Good Product...
content: The headset is fantastic and boat service also good.. The pouch quality also very good. Very good product for this price,. Cons :-. 1. Treble and Bass is too good.. 2. Worth product for this cost.. 3. The seller send the replacement product immediately, unfortunately i got the defective product.. Pros:-. 1. Nothing to say except the service center in Tamil Nadu.

name: Aman
title: Decent INDIAN product: value for money
content: This is a decent product with value for money at this price point. I tried many earphones, and each one had some flaws but then I got this and it's convincing in almost every aspect. The sound quality is good, bass is high, flat wires and tangle-free. The only thing I don't like about this product is that it doesn't fit well. I suggest you to go with this product, but keep in mind it'll keep getting out of your ears every few minutes, which is irritating though.

name: Suraj
title: Superb!!!!!!!!Just go for it.
content: Just go for it.. I have purchased these Boat earphones the 2nd time from amazon. Firstof all thank you amazon for instanr delivery. I ordered juts yesterday evening and got delivered by today 9 am.. Super bass.. sound clearity... loud... this is just awesome. And also within budget.

name: Javaan
title: MY COMPLAINT
content: Hello Boat management. Sir... Iam used only 2 months this head set🎧. 🔴Head set top hole net paper goes to inside.... I don't know what happened. Its not a toys. atleast 2year we want to use this.. Unfortunately this complaint will effect the sound quality. But I am happy this head set 🟢wire quality good. 🟢 Sound quality good 🟢 reasonable rate. 🔴🔴🔴🔴Please accept my complaint 🔴🔴🔴🔴. 🙏🙏🙏🙏🙏🙏🙏🙏🙏🙏🙏🙏🙏🙏🙏🙏🙏🙏

name: Samrat
title: Overall satisfied
content: The sound effects are good... satisfied. This is not the first time am buying it. I have bought 5 pieces in total - over the past year and a half. The previous ones did not last for than 6 months though. Had issues with the sound distribution and microphones for all instances. Issue is the same is not replaced as the period for exchange is over. Sad but true.

name: siddeshwar
title: About products damage of boat earphone
content: The product is very good and sound is super but the connection in middle of the earphone wires was damage without any force and it was broken in middle suddenly I have sending pictures of the earphone u can see that and I have warranty of one year on the boat earphones so can I get new one or refund please make u r costomers happy and I really loved u r product but because of damage I'm conveying this message to u.... Please respond as soon as possible

name: Saiteja
title: The beast for 499 range best bass
content: No 1 earphone I used so far best 499 price.. Since 2018 to till today using same bass iam lucky my friends also bought but their headset got not worked 1 of side , but i am still using but mic not working after 3 months of use only , Using still now same volume best bass for boat wired

name: Kaustubh Dalvi
title: Don't buy !!
content: I am not one of those who writes a negative review on product that easily, but this product is actually not worth the money. Had purchased this for 2nd time and again, I faced the same issues, one side of the earphone not working at all. I mean, come on! It's not a ₹50 earphone purchased from Station. Anyway, won't buy this product again, and I highly recommend my comment readers not to purchase this product as well.

name: AnimeshChakraborty
title: Best product at a least price
content: Superb product........ I am writing this review after using for 2 months....... Good sound........ Sturdy design....... Made of metal so no breakage...... No tangle...... Wite quality is great......... And the most important is that is is affordable.

name: Chaudhary
title: Excellent Boat🌟
content: built quality 10/10. base 10/10. wire quality 10/10. sound quality 10/10. overall review 9.5/10. easily fur in ear. length jada h as compared to normal earphone

name: poojitha
title: DO NOT BUY
content: Writing a review after buying 4 earphones.. Mic will fail after two to three months of use.. Ear pods will keep on falling as its made up of metal and it is heavy.. Ear buds quality is poor.. Sound quality and bass is good.. BOAT CUSTOMER SUPPORT IS WORST AND DO NOT HOPE FOR ANY REPAIR OR REPLACEMENT.

name: Maddy
title: Good
content: Good for the price. Looks great, doesn’t tangle - which is great. Sound quality is good but it’s kinda hard to fit in my ear and keeps falling off and if I push it in a bit harder then i get that vacuumy feeling in the ear that isn’t comfortable. If it fits your ear then nothing like it!

name: Vikas Singh
title: Not very good, not very bad..
content: I bought it in 499/-. It's a good to go earphones , build quality is so good and it also feels like that way too.. but there's a compromise in sound quality... I bought it because I wanted one immediately that wasn't too costly and somewhere not so bad sound and a goof build quality ( my personal preference ).. to which I proved itself... Sould you buy it or not ?. YES.. yes it's a value for money product.No problem while playing PUBG..

name: Hunt
title: Good in ₹500
content: Sound quality and bass quality are okay in this price, noise cancellation just...... You know only mentioned not really. But in 500₹ what you want..?? And reviewed after 4 months use

name: GAMER DHEERAJ (T07NADO)
title: A very nice product
content: It's a nice product I usually use this to play games and I have no issues with this product although if u take a lot of calls the mic is a little bit on the lower sound when u speak to the another person via the mic the sound is little low I have gotten complaint that the person in front to whom I was speaking had issues hearing me(only sometimes) overall for gaming this is the best earphones that u can get in my opinion for gaming it's just too good I would give it a 10/10

name: Tabrez Lala
title: Baby Ko Bass Pasand Hai
content: Boat : You can place a BET on boat. Its a perfect product for all Bass Lovers. It has deep Bass which makes it perfect equivalent product against its cost. Cherry on icing is BOAT'S customer service & after sale service. When I say after sale services, people I mean it. They arrange the pick up for your product if any kind of defect occurs within then warranty time frame and their customer service is good. I think Amazon should learn from them how to treat the customer. Anyways Boat is absolutely winner in the price range.

name: Anant Singh
title: Buy JBL instead! Comfort sucks!
content: They keep falling out, don't sit in the ear well, and are uncomfortable after longer durations.. Bass is good, but at the expense of overall sound quality.. Even the headphone Jack keeps getting disconnected when you move it a bit (iphone). JBL at the same price range are a much better buy. This is after using both.

name: Sushant
title: Durable and clear headphones.
content: Reviewing it after 8 months of use. Wow what a great sound clarity it has just awesome and the deep feel of bass you get is just awesome. You get extra ear buds with different sizes which is great. The aux is of good quality and the whole headphone is very durable i used it under rain, in fog during winters, and a lot of places with different climates and weather. Its a good and must buy headphone under 600 rupees.

name: Diptangshu Sarkar
title: Issue within three months
content: Bout this about three months ago. And now facing an uncanny issue. Whenever I plug in the headphone the volume goes down automatically. Even if I increase the volume it's decreased again. Now I don't have the option to return the headphone. So please don't buy this crap.

name: Mohan
title: Average earphones
content: Build quality of the earphones is good. However the sound quality is not that great, it more or less mediocre. The most annoying part is the earphones do not stay in the ear after a few minutes, they tend to come out. I feel JBL is a better choice in this price range. I feel I should have purchased sennheiser.

name: Anxx
title: Good bang for the buck
content: Good product for the price. Tangle free wires is a major plus. On the sound quality side, the sound is a bit muddy, and u don't get that adequate clarity. Main negative is an echo like effect u get leading to lack of clarity.. Bass is very good and treble about ok.. To sum up, a good substitute for stick handsfree earphones, good for masala type music but not for discerning music enthusiasts

name: Gaurav
title: Problem with the headphone jack
content: Almost 1 year using this product. There is a problem with the headphone jack. Whenever i plug it into the phone,the media volume automatically goes to zero and i am not able to hear anything. It recurs back to zero if i try to increase the volume. It was good in the initial few months but now it's developing issues. Rather go Realme buds 2...very good product 👍

name: Manish
title: Worst product .. Zero stars
content: Plz dont buy it.. Falls from ear again and again.. And they dont return it.. Only replace it policy.. So u r stuck with this earphone.. One more point, when u are getting a call u cannot pick up the phone from mic of earphone neither u can disconnect becoz there is no button in mic portion... I will give zero star to it..

name: Your fellow Amazon User
title: FRAUD COMPANY ! TWO MONTHS TO REPLACE DEFECTIVE PRODUCTS
content: Dont buy any product from Boat or House of Marley. Their product is usually defective and take months to replace.. They do not respond to mails, and THEIR PICKUP TEAM PICKS UP DEFECTIVE PRODUCT WITHYOUT GIVING ANY ACKNOWLEDGEMENT SLIP.. WASTE OF MONEY, UNETHICAL BUSINESS they are doing!!. Update : earbuds design are faulty, keep dropping off or getting lost. Only adhesive can hold them.

name: Ashish Raj
title: Earphone is not working
content: After using for 6 month there is no sound coming from one of the earpiece.i am facing this problem for three day.and after calling to boat customer support i had got no answer by the boat bot.there is no service center of boat in my hometown. So please replace my earphone as soon as possible.i am facing so much problem while talking to someone. accepting quick response from company and Amazon on it

name: Alok
title: Earbuds not good
content: Firstly, check the earbuds if u r comfortable using it. I wasn't. It hurted physically after an hour for using it not because of sound but because of the earbuds. I have been using skullcandy earphones for 3years and its earbuds still seemed better.. Secondly, one side of earphone voice stopped coming after 2days usage. I have ordered replacement, lets see now.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Boat400 review- good to weak but very poor controls buttins
content: The controls r very uncomfortable to press, reach by hand and use... Very poorly designed controls.. Also those control buttons verh fragile plastic. I thought boat products more durable and rugged to use..

name: Shashwath
title: boAt understood the customer need. Appreciate
content: Appreciate boAt design for the below counts. 1. The mic is close to mouth, which is essential for office meeting. The receiver is able to hear the voice clearly. I was about to buy an expensive headset that has extended mic. However, this model ensured mic next to the mouth and saved money.. 2. Provided so many ear buds to suit the ear. 3. Clip is provided to adjust the mic position, if required. Appreciate boAt for understanding Indian usage context. Indians travel by noisy vehicles like bus, auto and train. One need not to hold the mic in such scenarios. Great relief.. Thanks boAt for understanding Indian context

name: Amazon Customer
title: Amazon is getting pathetic day by day
content: Worst product I ever bought. Just after one week of purchase it stopped working. When I tried to raise a complain, I did not find any contact no. of Amazon customer service. Also they closed my return cycle in just one week. Since past 2-3 orders I observed that Amazon is delivering defected products. Now I don't think I will ever buy expensive gadgets from Amazon such as phone, TV, laptops or others which I did in past.

name: Amazon_customer_IN
title: Fitting is not good, not recommended
content: Not good fit for ears. Poor quality fitting. Don't blind buy based on reviews. Though the sound quality is good for the price, ear buds are not so good. The earphones keep falling down. Poorly designed. Try sony earphones which fit well and produce decent sound for everyday use.

name: Ganesh
title: Bad fit - Does not sit in the ears
content: Sharing this review after 3 months of usage. Horrible fit. The buds do not sit on the ears. First I suspected the shape of my ears, but eventually, when others tried, they reported the same too. Probably because of the metal body of the buds, they do not sit in the ears. I gave up now... throwing them away.

name: Annie
title: Great earphone at good value
content: Great product at good value. Only complaint is that the ear phones don't fit well in my ear but maybe i just need to change the size of the rubber cover that they have provided.

name: Madhumita
title: Satisfactory purchase
content: Quick delivery. Packed well. Cute color. Almost tangle-free. Sound quality is as good as can be expected in this price range. I did have to switch out the earbuds with an old pair (from my Samsung earphones, I think) because all the alternate sizes provided were uncomfortable if worn continually for more than an hour. Overall, I am happy with these headphones.

name: Mr. Mokembo
title: Good sound but not so pleasant to wear.
content: Pros: Boosted feeling in your head, Good sound, Good price.. Cons : it kinda fall off easily and won't fit in perfectly, specially when you you are moving around. The on ear metal piece along the speaker is also very long. In a simpler way, I didn't find it very comfortable wearing it.

name: Raaj Tilak Sarma
title: Poor product in terms of dependability. One earphone will surely stop working within days.
content: Sound quality does not matter.. What matters before that is whether earphones work or not!. Be prepared to have 1 ear not working within few days if you buy Bose bass heads!. Most of the people i know had the same experience specially with bose earphones.

name: Ninad Divekar
title: After replacement
content: Extremely bad experience. The box was opened before.. The additional buds are cheap and do not belong to boat.. The earphones did not work... Ordered replacement.. Seems like received a first copy.. Will update review once I get the replaced ones... Got replacement from seller in 1 day. This one was seal packed and working perfectly well..

name: Shanmati
title: Good and value for money
content: Superb product i am a fan of boat bassheads i have used many brands like skullcandy, jbl and all but boat's bass always attracted me as a bass lover....again proved the best only one suggestion is that the metal head could have been smaller...otherwise good and value for money as i bought it for 499...on great Indian sale...

name: Jayanth
title: Boat Headphones 225 bassheads
content: Products from boat are good. The last time when I bought a headphones it lasted for 13 months, but this thine the product stopped working in just 2 months one side of the headphone is not working I claimed for warranty. They took my product and it's almost 20 days till I didn't get my new replaced item. They sent a mail that new replacement is issued but till now there is no response where the product is and when I am going to receive.

name: Mayank
title: Don't buy blue. It's getting common now.
content: Can't ask for anything else.. It's very sturdy. Been using it for over an year, sound quality is great. First time i bought a pricey earphone and totally satisfied with it.. Lead is rectangular so it doesn't get tangled, even if it did it can rid off easily.. Many a time i pulled it accidentally while it was plugged in laptop. But no complain. Even after one year it work as new.

name: Santhosh
title: Excellent
content: Excellent product, full value for money. Sound quality is decent and the product is sturdy. headphone, cable everything is of super quality. Customer service is also wonderful. I got my earphone replaced after mic stopped working 10 months after purchase.

name: Abhijit
title: Fantastic buy!!
content: Good earphones at this price. clarity is best in the segment. Bass is deep and clear. Mids are one of the best I have heard. Treble is cristal clear. Received with extra pairs of bigger and smaller rubber buds. Packing was much better. Thanks Amazon for timely delivery.

name: Ankita Mohanty
title: Not comfortable to use but good sound quality
content: The SOUND QUALITY is not bad at the price but the earphone's pin comes off the socket even on a slight touch and the earpieces pop out of the ears by itself. You have to keep pushing it in. The connector from which the two sides of the earphone digress is a little heavy which probably weighs it down because of which the earpieces keep falling out of your ears. It's an average product when it comes to comfort and ease of using it. But keeping in mind the price point the sound quality is good. Now what we have to see is the longevity of the product.

name: AC
title: Material Quality gone down compared to same product 2 years ago. Still a good buy.
content: The material quality has gone down compared to the earlier.. I had the same earphones. Lasted almost 2 years. Only now one side has stopped functioning properly because of wire problems near the jack.( Works when you twist it at a particular angle).. Hope this new one lasts longer. But the quality of the ear piece rubbers has definitely gone down compared to earlier.

name: Anupam G.
title: This is the best earphone in this range.
content: Got delivered on time.. The earphone's build quality is too good.. Flat wires to make sure that the Earphone doesn't get tangled.. Sound Quality : Crystal clear sound. Bass : Beyond your imagination.. Noise cancellation : When you turn the volume to full you can't hear literally anything.. Overall : A perfect product by boAt.. INDIAN PRODUCT !

name: Partha Singh
title: Fit is poor will hurt your ear!!!! Don't buy.
content: Sound quality is ok but the eartips are completely useless. It won't seal or stay in your ears. Which makes it's sound quality worse. Used every thing the wing tips too, if u use wing tips it will start hurting in 5 minutes. Without the wingtips too the earphones hurt cause it is too big.

name: Prince
title: One side stopped working.
content: The sound quality is great but one side of this stops wirking within a month's use. And it is not problem with the wire but some internal problem which cannot be fixed by anyone except the professionals. Also the dust mesh is not well placed and sometimes comes out of the ear piece.

name: Rohan Roy
title: This is probably the best thing you can get for 500 bucks.
content: Okay first of all I want to say I've bought several earphones before and none of them have lasted as long as this one. So I'd give 5/5 for durability. It's been over a year and it's still in good condition. I've had sennheiser,skull candy ,sony before but eventually their side would get damaged and stop working except for this one ofcourse. As for sound quality ,if you tweak the player settings you'll get the sound you need.

name: Mohammad Faizan Khan
title: Everyone should own this perfect earphone !
content: The packaging was amazing done and so is the product with 1 year replacement warranty.. Sound quality is just impeccable, noise cancellation could be much better but it's fine looking to the price range of the earphone. But the bass quality is superb and i really liked it.

name: Pankaj
title: Good sound poor construction/model
content: Pros:. Good sound quality, bass, noise cancellation in this price. Cons: poor construction with ear plugs bit heavy which cause them to fall off frequently even by slight touch to cable. Cable is also heavy as compared to other earphones. Poor grip of ears.

name: ramalingam
content: I purchased two numbers of Headphones a year back. one was stopped working within a month of use and another one is still working in good condition. so 50:50.. After 2 years of use, still it is working. Build quality is excellent, tangled free and non breakable wires. Metal finishing is very good, however easily falling from ear. Ofen losing the ear buds while keeping in packet.

name: Anonymous14
title: Writing this review after 8 months.
content: So basically I was looking for durable earphones and ordered this after numerous reviews online. I was very impressed with the quality in the first few months. I use it mainly with my MP3 player.. The metal started wearing out slowly.. Sometimes that earphone would split when it would fall or anything.. Since about 20 days now, I started to have the audio become low compared to its actual volume or it becomes fuzzy. Now the audio sounds totally fuzzy and just to check if it was an issue I tested it with my other devices but it has actually got spoilt. I'm disappointed that it got damaged in less than a year.

name: Kicky
title: MIC not working - struck with warranty claim process
content: Purchased on 8th august. I did not check the MIC on arrival because i used it exclusively for listening to music. Recently tried a call and noticed that the MIC is not working at all. Worst product . Not sure if i was delivered a faulty product or it stopped recently . However a mic going faulty within 13 days is really bad . Will not prefer boat again !!. None of the phone numbers of the service center mentioned in offical boat website is working . Not sure how to claim warranty.

name: Prajjoy Bhattacharjee
title: Very good product. Worth buying.
content: I am writing this review after 5 months of use. Sound is excellent. Noise cancellation feature is available. Bass excellent. On time and fast delivery by amazon. But after 5 months of use the left ear bud is not working. You can listen music through only the right ear bud. Rest all is OK. Wire quality and mic quality excellent. Wires do not tangle. And are easy to untangle.

name: Ashish Arya
title: No answer button
content: I am starting with Cons, as this will help you make an informed decision if you want to buy this headphones.. 1. It does not have an Answer button. Hence you have to pull out your phone to answer any incoming call. Especially when you are riding a bike.. 2. If you use a phone cover, the broad coat just above the 3.5mm jack makes it difficult to connect. Most of the times the other party can't hear you.. Pros. 1. Flat wire is very sturdy. 2. Sound and bass is beyond compare.. 3. 6 sets of in-the-ear plugs in black and white color.

name: SUNIL ROY
title: Bass is good but voice clarity is not good
content: Its good but not best. Its only useful if you sit and listen music or play videos or else earphones just fall from ears due to heaviness. Bass is too much i mean you cant listen original music. I know it says bass ka king still quality is not good. You cant hear voices clearly. Not for gaming

name: KS
title: Detailed review
content: These headphones are really good. The sound quality and comfort level is amazing. It also has active noise cancellation which will help you a lot. If you wear these while driving you wont even hear the traffic around you. But it somebody honks behind you then you will hear it slightly. Overall they are worth it for a price tag of 499

name: Pranav
title: Good quality product Highly Recommented,But
content: This is a very good ear phone. Good built quality, great colour selection,cable is tangle proof flat cable and the L shaped connector is very useful in a laptop. It has high bass and the sound quality is good for normal user. Its very loud, clarity is not bad and its durable.The mic for call receving is ok,the problem with this ear phone is its comfort while using, it has problem staying in the correct place, but can be solved by using the wing tips provided in the pack, noise cancellation is not very good,it works when the volume is above 80%,which can cause pain and discomfort to ear. since its fitness in ear is off balance, i am not recommenting it for long term use, since it can cause slight pain( taking short breaks can solve the problem).It comes with extra ear buds which can be used according to the size of users ear. Its a great value product for its performance and its price. For a ear phone under 700 RS i can easily recomment Boat head set,as abest value product.

name: Karthikeyani
title: Worst product ever!!! waste of money.
content: Within a few months, music stopped playing in one speaker. And registering a complaint on the site never works.. Always the following reply is sent back "we regret to inform you that the invoice submitted by you is not a valid Invoice". I tried uploading invoice in pdf as well as image format. Nothing seems to work. Customer care people do not have much knowledge about it.. And the cap on play/pause button came off easily and couldn't fix it again.. Overall, worst product ever used... Go for any other product even if it's a bit costly.

name: Rocks,
title: After 6 months Good but you buy another bouts255 is best in 899 rs
content: Build quality is awesome sound is good not bed review after 2 months use and its good but if you spen 599 so please don't buy you another bout product bouts255 is more good about this i also have 255 and 255 sound is ultimateI had asked for Nimbu Yellow color and after running it for a few days, I ran it for 6 months and after that, when I changed it, it came in green color replacement, this color is also good for me. But I liked the yellow color itself. But it is also good note back.

name: deepak
title: Severe Ear Problem caused by this headphones
content: Severe Ear pain caused by using this headphones. My wife complaint me about her ear pain caused by this headphones but i ignored, but for 2days i have severe ear pain and not able to sleep also so i consult (550rs consultation) doctor & done ear endoscopy (1200 Rs). After doing endoscopy they showed images of inner ear swelling & infection caused by headphones. Tablet+ eardrop cost. 221rs. So approximately i spend 2000rs + 1day leave.

name: Mansoor Khan
title: See the video before buying!!
content: Writing my review after an year, my earphones Just stopped working after a year and a month, to be honest I have used it in very tough and violent condition, while working out, running, climbing buildings, I have dropped it more than a 200 times, yeah it would have come for a more longer period of time if I haven't used in that manner, and base was extremely good and the sound crisp is not that good, after few month's the net covering inside the earphones comes out I don't why that's a drop off for the product, rest it's really good for budget earphones.

name: Nidhi mahawar
title: not value of money and not durable product
content: boat earphones after using 1 yr under warranty period.. 1. Earphones stop working. 2. The golden plated jack was faded in 2-3months. 3. Earphones buds not fit well automatically fall down. 4. You can easily lose ear budes in 4-6 months. 5. customer care not responded you. It mean technically have no warranty with this product. Yes, tangle-free cable and good bass but not value of money and not durable product

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good earphones overall!
content: First of all - the build quality is superb!. About the sound quality, would say good or average sounding earphones! Bass is there but it is just average,it's not that great! Mids and highs are ok,ok! Overall ok for averag music listeners or earphone users! Pubg does well too! And about the comfortness,change your buds according to your ear and it will be perfect! Go for it! 👍

name: Ashutosh Kurmy
title: Popping out of the earphones from ears.
content: I have been using this product since a month now. The sound quality of the product is amazing and the bass is too good as well but its sad to say that even after these really amazing features, the product has failed to satisfy my expectations as the earphones keep popping out of the ears every now and then sweeping away all its really good traits. Please check on this problem. It really needs to be improved.

name: AQ
title: Simply wow....
content: Simply wow....I have imported sony headphones and these simply make those shy.. Amazing sound. I made adjustment using my phones sound settings and it just turned out better than my expectations.. Keep up the good work Team Boat..hats off to you guys..

name: Cholan
title: Trust and money worthy 💯
content: Sound and bass quality are 👌 extremely good.Noice cancellation and bass gives you the felling of watching a movie in the theatre.But there are also some demerits like the earphone does not fit in our ear properly and we have to constantly put it back in our ears.But these issues can be sort out by changing the ear buds according to our ear size.It was only a week but Right side earphone of mine is not working, so I have put it on replacement.Other than that it's good.Everyone can trust this product 😉

name: Amazon Customer
title: It has good Durability.
content: this is the second time i am using boat earphones.. it has good durability.. after a rough usage of first earphones for 2 years now i ordered the same model again.. but the only disadvantage with this model is, when plugged in ears while in sleeping posture, you cant turn to any side. as it hurts your ears.

name: Pramod Kumar
title: Averages Earphone
content: It's an average earphone. Earpiece is heavy due to metallic case and tends to fall from the ear. Also, sharp edges of metallic ear piece may pinch your ear. It's uncomfortable. Sound quality is also average. I don't know how peoples are giving 4 or 5 star rating. I have purchased a UBN earphone from a roadside vendor costing Rs 200 and it is far better than than this one in terms of sound and comfort.

name: Lakshakumar Nadar
title: Best Headphone in this price.
content: Using for more than 1 year and it is More than value for money. Sound quality is awesome with clear bass and no loss for frequency with this headphone.. The headphone build quality is also awesome with the tangle free cable is super and strong.

name: Arijit Dutta
title: Stopped working in 1 month
content: One of the earbuds stopped working in just few weeks of usage. Kept it very securely and didn't even do anything that would make this happen. All I am asking is for BoAt to come up with a way these headphones have durability. Not sure what went wrong with this one in particular. I have applied for warranty from their official website hence was able to organise a return for the product. Still no word from the team.

name: Vasudeva Dongare
title: Best Product
content: This is best Product. Cost is low, Quality is high. Prompt delivery by Amazon. 2nd day got it. I am using many wireless Headphones. But I was searching for wired headphone with mic. I got this in low cost. Thank both Amazon and Boat.

name: SP
title: Everything is good about design sound quality etc, but most of the time get slip away frm ear
content: Everything is good about sound quality etc i hvw order this same 02 boat earphone product back one nd half year ago, it's was nice experience for music, but it's not exactly fit like while walking etc it's quit possible that it will cme out frm ear, don't no reason may be rubber not as perfect size or other, even while sitting also it can hppn sme

name: Sunil P S
title: Good one from boat
content: Good sound for the price. Also very well built. Comes with a lot of extra ear buds. The only issue I have with this is the weight which feels uncomfortable after some time.

name: Rakesh Tiwari
title: The product is nice but the design is not good
content: The product is nice but the design is not good and not fit perfectly inside the ear. It is irritating that, again and again, its pullout from the ear.. If you listen to the song almost for an hour you feel pain outside of the ear.. Again, Sound quality is good, no doubt but, due to the design, you will definitely feel the pain in the ear.. So finally I would not recommend this one.

name: VISHAL SHARMA
title: useless product
content: after 6 months of using this product i have to facing so many problem with mic button (disconnect call itself). and about customer care facility is not good boz when u call to them they not answering your call and call with only their compterize talk. so please dont buy boat products if you dont want facing these problems too.

name: Akram
title: Don't go with the name. They don't sound super bass
content: I was expecting it to be a super bass headset as they call it but that was not the case.. They are loud enough, has good amount of clarity but not a great bass.. If you're looking for a decent headset and not concerned about the bass, you can go for it.

name: Neeraj
title: Sound/bass quality is good but not comfortable for longer usage.
content: I bought 2 headsets - one is red in colour and other is blue. The blue one stopped working within few days of delivery so I requested for a refund and I got the same. I am currently using red one. This headset is the best among its competitors. It's build quality, sound quality and bass is top notch. The device and app you are using can affect its performance so don't judge it too quickly. Listen using a good Android device with JetAudio or PowerAmp. This is quite heavy and its earhook is uncomfortable. Not suitable for longer usage.

name: Padma
title: ok product.
content: Pros: Flat Wire. Cons:. 1. Design of earbuds are primitive,. 2. Rubber caps on ear buds are slippery and don't hold on and if you push it hurts your ears. 3. Not worth the price.

name: ABHIJEET RAMESH JAGTAP
title: Not heavy bass but clear Audio
content: Note before review: Bass= Boom Boom bass sound in simplest words. I am Xiaomi's mi earphone user and I love the distortion-free bass it has. Wanted to try these for a long so finally made this purchase.. Audio quality is good but bass is not even close to what Xiaomi's earphones produce.. Bass is flat (still way better than Philips). Wires are nice and so is the mic.. Pros:. Mic is better. Cons:. Earbud's design not creative enough to fit into ears neatly. Buds provided in the package mostly go unused except for the smallest one. As smallest ones are the one one keeping them in your ears.. Wires are heavy making earbuds come out of one's ears easily.. Bass is flat. Overall they are awesome if your preference is calls and music. but if you are into classical or even rock music, you might prefer going for Xiaomi's earphones and compromise on mic quality.

name: Aditya Devadiga
title: Best Earphones you can get Under 500 Rupees
content: Pros. Excellent build quality. Bundled earhooks. Can get loud. Awesome Bass. Cons. Oversensitive microphone. Bass overpowers mids and highs. Ratings (out of 5). Design/ comfort: 4. Audio quality: 4.5. Value for money: 3.5. Overall: 4

name: Prakash Bhanushali
title: Not steady
content: It falls off from the ears.. Sound is fine

name: irfan mohammad
title: Great buy for a cheap price.
content: This is one of the best wired earphones 🎧 one can buy in such a price especially when you're looking for a great movie experience or enjoy the games. My only concern is the slight uncomfort that you get after a long use. Other than that these products are good.

name: Deepak kumar
title: Go for other products in the same range
content: Would not expect it from boat according to durability and material quality as boat had served me well before for their better pricing and greater durability. Just because got huge number of customers, now doing the same as other most of quick rising companies do by providing below average quality material after once providing class products.

name: Pabitra Nayek
title: Very bad product, all were just hypes. It caused pain to ear. Seriously.
content: Plus points:- good noice cancelation, tangle free cable. Minus points- worst design, very low amount of bass, bad sound quality (there is a buzzing sound like fm radioactive in the background while playing music), very high price, bad build quality (glue was being seen at the joint of two earphone drums and cables.). Conclusion - you should not buy it. Rather you can consider products of other companies in the price of 60% of it.

name: Akansha
title: Fake,worthless,useless
content: Worthless to buy...i got delivered a fake product instead of the original.one...and when i returned it they didn't even returned the amount just by giving a stupid reason again and again.. And its almost about 2 months..i called 4 5 times but still no resolution... Don't Waste of money,time and energy.

name: Dinesh Rakheja
title: Good product in this price
content: Amazing product at this price range but the buds of this is heavy so it some times feel so heavy in ears and fall down from ears but over all is good product wire so long and durable also good quality jack area sound is mindblowing mic with button also good overall perfect buy if u not feel its heavy bcz of its durability

name: PK
title: Broken cable, lasted 4 months only
content: While the sound from these headphones is wonderful, the CABLE BROKE!!!!! It lasted me only 4 months!!!! The small leads of the cable inside the microphone enclosure broke, when they really shouldn’t. And it’s nearly impossible to fix! I have not stressed the cable much, just used it like anyone would, so this shows poor electronics handling from the manufacturer, if it lasts only about 4 months, I don’t know how much it’s really worth....

name: Dipender chauhan
title: Reasonable to pice , short term use
content: This product is cheap .. but you are trying to get best quality these are not for you .. in this price range they are reasonab price and that too quality accordingly price ... This won't last long more that a year I bought 3 earphones one after one and now I'm finally sure that not for long use type sounds also get distorting after time .. still you can buy for short time .. stylish , tangle free, cheap .

name: Veena C
title: "Bass heads"----NOT REALLY
content: Such an low class product from a low class "boat ". Pros :. 1.looks good. 2.tangle free flat cables. 3.L-shaped 3.5mm jack connect. 4. Mic. Cons:. 1. No voice clarity -3/10. 2. Bass heads? -no clear bass -5/10. 3. Tremble- hands down. 4.the earbuds is made of metal casing , it's so heavy that it doesn't stay in ears ,it's falls on even if u use it while walking. 5. Ears r paining on using for 1.5 -2 hours. 6.not for "bass lovers". Conclusion: An average product for the price. Not worth the money ... If u are a bass lover like me go for senheisser CX 180 , a masterpiece under 1k ... Boat --worthless

name: Aditya Nambiar
title: Good quality stuff
content: For the price, it's an excellent product. I cannot speak to how it compares to the elite level products. But for someone who buys earphones for 1k or less, these earphones were a very pleasant surprise.. Good volume, clarity is good too. I'm personally a fan of the design too. Comes with a set of ear plugs (the rubber thingies that fit into the ear, you figure out the right word) of varying sizes. Which was great. I'm a clumsy person, and I've dropped, sat and accidentally elbow-dropped (really slowly onto a bed) these a few times over the past 6 or so months and it still works well. So durability was not an issue.

name: Tanay
title: This product proves that Indians will buy anything as long as its cheap and looks nice.
content: To begin with, these earphones are not all that bad.. They look nice, and sound decent. Everything else is almost a disaster though.. I'm surprised how these earphones even fit comfortably for anyone. It took an eternity to even fit into both my ears, let alone let me run or jog with.

name: Achal goyal
title: Total Paisa vasool
content: I already bought 3 of these earphones and soon I'll buy another one. My whole family use these and they are really very tough and the sound quality is also decent. Bass is the main focus and it is really loud and deep. At this price range I'll recommend these to everyone. Total Paisa vassol.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Metal heavy - major drawback
content: A sad review only because the metal is heavy and keeps falling off the ears. Be mindful when purchasing this item. Thats the major drawback. Also, the microphone is not that good as it needs to be put in the mouth for the opposite person to hear properly.

name: Priyaraj
title: In Money point of view - GOOD.
content: I personally wont recommend buying this product again.. reasons -- the earpiece too heavy to fit and often keeps falling off. Sound quality is not excellent ,the background details of a song or video is not appreciated... One good thing about this earphones is the they dont tangle and has a lengthy cord. But if you are looking for earphones is budget range and able to compromise go for it.

name: abhinav singh
title: Nice earphone with good sound quality.. but not so durable..
content: After using more than 6 months, it's one side speaker stopped working then i claimed warranty and got new earphone.... but new one also stopped working after 2-3 days..... So It depends on your luck that how much it's durable.... Brand doesn't matter..... Earphones of every brand will stop working after few months so it is not good to waste money on that. purchase cheapest earphones from local shops is best method.

name: Yash Gandhi
title: YOU SHOULD READ THIS.
content: One of the best earphone I have ever used. BOAT company provided me best service. I buying this second time. First time I bought and after 6 months One side earbud is not working and it's in warranty so i raised complaint about it. They took 7-8 days but gave me new earphone as it can not be repair. BEST service. And one last thing but not least is "MADE IN INDIA". paisa aapne he country mai rahega lelo bindass earphone, badiya hai.

name: Vaishnavi B
title: Good
content: I have been using the same earphones since 3 years... this the second time i am purchasing same earphones, performace is really good but the quality of wiring and buds is not as good as the first one.

name: Kaivalya
title: Ok but not soo effective
content: The sound quality is good in the sense it gives out very high sound but it effects the bass quality that is much unsatisfying as I compared with boat rokerz 225 and even normal Samsung earphones they produce better bass than this one and if you like to listen at a high sound and beats u could prefer this and even I found realme buds 2 much better than this in sound quality,bass quality and even in noise cancellation

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good but not enough noise cancellation
content: The product is good, does the purpose. The wires are not completely tanglefree. Built material is quite good. Call quality is preety good but not enough noise cancellation. Can still hear back noise when around in noisy places. Wire length is enough. Bass is proper and listning to music is good.

name: JohnBasco
title: Durability max is 10 - 11 months.
content: I brought 3 pieces of this BoAt 225 headset at different interval of time but all of then either stopped working one side it developed distortion noise right after 10 month. So what you invest ( Rupees 599) is worth only for 10 months. The worst part is their return/ warranty site is suspended for days now ( see attachment)

name: Nilesh dhabale
title: Warrenty claim
content: Maine ek sal phle purchesed kiye the, but warrenty period ke last month me ek side ka earphone kam karna band hogay, ab usko replace ke liye bheja to 12 din ho gaye phir bhi replace nhi hua, abhi do din se out for delivery bata raha hai phir bhi abhi delivery ki process pure nhi hue,. Headphone acche per replce ke time bahot din khate hai,. Aur kan me bhi kuch acche se fit nhi hote bar bar nikalte hai kan se

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best earphones for only listening music.
content: Boat bassheads are best earphones for bassbut if u want to hear vocals,watch movies then these earphones are not for u because bass is overpowered and vocals are not that clear. Just buy if u want hear only music.. This earphones are good for PUBG,there is echo problem from the mic and u will not hear the footstep properly.. All in one best earphones for only listening music

name: Ishaan
title: Best Earphones Ever! Just buy it already!
content: It's the best earphones I've ever bought! Short review: It's Awesome, don't hesitate to buy!. This review is made after trying 2 different so-called best earphones in the market named JBL and Schneizer (probably that's not the correct spelling). And I can assure you this little beast (boAt) is way better than both of them.. Long review:. Pros -. - Superior Bass (even better than JBL). - Best in class sound. - Super clear sound. - Awesome looks. - Perfect fit (different sizes of earpiece in package are available). - L-Shaped connector prevents breakage. - Sounds better than Schneizer earphones. Cons -. - Sports Earpiece gives pain quickly or probably it's happening with me only. That's it. Only one con. The earphones don't fall off the earlobe as others say. If you use the right size of earpiece, they won't fall off. And they aren't even THAT heavy as the people say.. This is the perfect earphone for you! Just buy it already. A big hats off to boAt for there awesome products!

name: Venkat
title: Please upgrade for more BASS,  Jack pin is loose
content: Edited 1 star Review after 6 months..... Right side not working. (225)Sound ok for money, till need high Bass. Polished metal Ear phones are not fitting in ears, always slipping down from ears. 3.5mm Gold plated Jack little loose for Samsung J7 prime.

name: Aaron Vasanth
title: Less Bucks and High Sound :)
content: Pros :. - Less price for in-ear headphones. Got it for 450 bucks. - Good sound. -Good mid and low sounds.. Cons :. - Bridge for the division of left and right channels feels to be heavy and it pulls your headset down from your ears.. - Since the bridge feels heavy , have to pin the bridge part in your shirts so that your headsets don't come off.. - High sounds are not clear , but able to hear clear mid and low tones.. Overall :. - I used to hear English and Tamil Christian songs so I have written my comments with specific to that sound , I'm not sure about other genres.. Good to go if you are looking for a in-ear headset under 450 bucks when you adjust the heaviness of the headset by pining it in your shirt and feel ok to high sounds which isn't clear.

name: Kapil
title: Very bad quality
content: I have using BOAT products from quite some time now but this one is really bad. Sound and earpiece quality is very bad.. 4.5 mm Jack is also loose and quality of mic for mobile calls is extremely bad. Have to keep it very very near to mouth . One of the earbud got broken with in 2 days.

name: Srikanth Thottempudi
title: Not so great. Not so bad either
content: Not a great earphone to buy. But better than most of the earphones out there. Bud sizes are either too large or too small. Buds drop from ear as the rubber is not soft enough to hold on to the ear canal. Aluminium casing is too large and there is little to no protection to the drivers from the earbud side. The filter comes off in a day or two it's just fabric

name: Arun
title: Tangle free earphones for the rough user
content: The most important thing to like about this product is that it is genuinely tangle-free (That is if you actually make a small effort). The sound quality and the noise cancellation and the bass effect are mostly just above average. I would not recommend these earphones to people looking to get a premium quality sound under budget.. I would only recommend this product to those people who are tired of untangling their earphones every time they put it in. Also, it looks really good if that is your thing.

name: Yogita Pujari
title: Bang For The Bucks
content: Earphones are awesome with good quality bass and crisp sound quality which you will get in Boat Bassheads 225. I was not very happy with the packaging but although earphones are great so I am also happy. Noise Cancellation is also not that great in this earphones. Downside of this earphones are they are made of aluminium material. so, they fall off from your ear very often and along with it you will get some more earbuds like large medium and small.. Sound Quality:- 9/10. Bass Quality:- 10/10. Noise Cancellation:- 7/10

name: Anil
title: Think before you buy
content: After seeing the reviews, I ordered it but it turned out to be a bad decision. It's hard and feels quite uncomfortable. Additionally, it doesn't hold onto the ear and keeps slipping out. Absolutely hate it

name: RAN VIJAY KUMAR
title: Best and true review .. plez buy it after reading this...
content: First of all I would like to say that I used many earphones like piston,Sony MDR,audio technica, etc.. And I use this head phone while driving byk... I use it in my mi note 3 ... It has multiple sound optións in the phone so these review are best .... Isko Dekh ke hi kharidnaa.... Pro:. 1 build quality good.. 2 mic and pin are good.. Cons:. 1 always ear pic comes out now and then. 2 sound quality is not up to the mark. 3 just lag in crispy sound .. Just go with audio technica earphones the are best ....

name: Abhijith s prabhu
title: Boat Bassheads 225 Vs Ant Audio W56
content: Best For Hearing Music. Zero Audio Distortion. Bass is super boosted when Compared to Ant Audio W56. But Ant audio is better to play Pubg than Boat because its loud and can hear all sounds clearly. So i say that For Hearing music Boat 225 is Best And For Playing Pubg Ant Audio W56 is The best. Choose Wisely 😁. The Another thing is That people have a doubt about Boat 220 and 225. I will clearly recommend Boat 225 because it Has the latest 10 mm drivers and provide somewhat better sound Quality than Bassheads 220.My Rating of Boat Bassheads 225 is [5/5].. Hope this review helps Thankyou.

name: anishnair
title: Great Built Quality
content: These earphones of boat are good. The thing which I liked the most is the wire. The wire is quality is much better as compared to other boat versions which after little rough use get broken from the joining.. Many have complained about the weight of earphones it's true it comes out of ear becuse of that but after attaching the extra ear piece it remains in the ear. I would suggest to buy this earphone.

name: Theo
title: Excellent bass and sound quality
content: The sound is excellent. The bass as mentioned is too good. Cons: the ear plugs are too heavy. It does not stay in the ears. They have provided with a holder which is really irritating. Would never recommend for people who are trying to use this on the go, as the mic is too far and you would need to bite the wire where the mic is closer. Only then the person at the other end of the line can hear you. Thought of even returning it at one point in time.If you wish to sit at your leisure and want to listen to music then this would be the right choice.

name: Prajakta Gaikwad
title: Average product
content: The color is amazing.. it's almost 3 months now I am using the product . The buds are bit uncomfortable as I tried all the 3 sizes but still not that comfortable. It falls from ears. Noise cancellation is Ok. Bass quality and sound quality is average. The product is average.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Could lead to hearing problem
content: I usually use these headphones for calling for about 3-4 hours a day. After using it for about 2 weeks, my ear have started paining internally. It might lead to hearing issues. I used apple earpods for same duration since months but no side effects. Though initially I found it to be good for calling with no or minor disturbance and good noise cancellation but would not recommend for long duration use. I hope it helps.

name: Aman
title: Heavy bass, best for loud music. Soft sounds are not clear but not good at noise cancellation
content: It's a big thing if you are looking for heavy metal bass sound. Pros. Built Quality is decent, metal heads make it heavy than usual. Pros. Best Bass under 1000 rupees. best for loud music and sound sensing.. cables are nice and flat, no strangling. Decent built and durable. Cons. heavy weight, not stylish. Noise cancellation not good. not good for soft music and details in the sound are not good at high volume

name: prashvita
title: Unsatsified
content: Don't know about the rest but my experience with these boat headphone wasn't good at all ,initially they were working so well I was happy with the product but then. After 4 months of purchase the product has started giving me troubles , the headphone had bent and stuck in socket which I was unable to remove it .Don't know about the rest but my. 1. I din get the replacement because they said it was an external damage(Inspite of mainting it top notch condition). 2. In order To remove the jack from the socket of my handset I had spend extra bucks, that damaged my display screen as well ,. a complete lose -lose situation here.

name: Abhijeet
title: Very bad quality of ear buds!!
content: Using this product since month the quality of the metal is good but the buds are extremely bad they get out of the ear very quickly and the plug also not fits properly and gets removed quickly.and sometimes the buds tera off and remain in ear!! Very disappointed with product the sound is good but the buds are of very cheap quality

name: Balaji
title: U can trust boat little if u have patience
content: Sound : terrific for a edm lisner or beat lisner. Quality: good. Comfortable: on ear it will fall if u move little bit so waste of money not comfortable not a little bit. Problem:. It's been 5 months i am using this no problem came but now I have a problem . problem in mic while calling palying pubg. Customer service from boat : good nice response when I complained about my earphone on their website the pic up man will come fast but but but but it will take a total time of repair u r earphone or replace til come to your hand return 15 to 10 days I don't no about others but I can't live without my earphone. So cancel the pic up. But if you comfortable that k 15 days is k for Me if anything happens to me or I have another spare earphone go ahead bye it. But mic problem can occur I saw many uarsi on YouTube and my friends

name: Saifullah
title: Best sound quality but poor fitting
content: Fitting: poor. Sound quality: good. bass quality: excellent. As mentioned the product it bass boosted, if you are all time user, then your ears might experience strain due to more bass.. It is good for listening songs for small amount of time.. Fitting is not good at all. Even though extra ear buds of different sizes are provided, they slip easily from the ear.. Ear buds are not stable in ear, though you push it inside your ears, they come out easily even with little jerk.

name: Shauzab Nashyaan
title: Got defective product!
content: I don't know why Amazon chooses me to send all it's defective products! I've been waiting for this earphone for sooooo long! It took 3 days that's okay no complains.. but when I got it, wola! One side of earphone wasn't working! It was loose from the tip and the wires got out... Although they've successfully replaced it after waiting for 5-6 days. It has broken my trust on the very first purchase so I've lost my hope for it's durability and also I'm not getting any bass from this earphone, may be my phone hasn't that good output, but ironically a 60 rupees local earphone gave much better bass and clarity than this! I'm speechless. Was expecting sooooooo much!

name: Maniram
title: Perfect review afetr use of 3 months
content: the sound quality and bass are too good and one thing that about these earphones just fall all and the earphones are too heavy and that's the only problem with these earphones and people who want to listen for more time without stress please don't prefer this. the overall rating for these earphones is just 7/10

name: Sumana Kasturi
title: Great pair of earphones. Love them!
content: Its a really good pair of earphones with great sound quality and noice cancellation. Its bass is great and enjoyable. Its been 4 months since i bought it and there hasn't been a problem so far. Just that it keeps coming out from the ear while walking or on the treadmill, due to the heavy metal covering. Otherwise its a great pair of earphones for the price. Its tangle free too.

name: Aithagoni Srikanth
title: Sexy product for music lovers
content: Material Quality is not 5* quality but we can rate it 4*. The cap for mic with branding boAT is loose. It might fell away of you are inattentive.. Sound quality is superb. Bass, treble and middles are so good.. It maintains all the elements to give you perfect sound output. We can take calls with microphone. Change the songs using the keys.. I have been using this from more than 3 months and i cannot go for any other headset leaving this.. Sexy product for music lovers.

name: Tanmay Patil
title: 🙏Must Read🙏
content: Awesome Earphones to buy at this price ❤️.....I love bass bosted songs and at first I was hearing all those songs on Speakers for bass now it made easy by Buying this Earphones....🔥It Has a good quality mic,Tangle free wire,3.5mm Jack,clip to attach the Earphones to your shirt,5 pairs of extra buds.....💯 product is packed Awesome🔥. Edit:-Still in good Quality After 1 year 6 months,Same bass and No problem faced.

name: Sanjita Shinde
title: Earphone not working
content: have ordered Boat extra a bass wire earphone on 18 Aug 2020 and 1 earphone of right ear is not working.. I am hardly using this 2/3 times a week and it got defected in such a small span of time.. This is really making me feel disappointed as this is a very new earphone.. I would like to get this replaced under warranty.. Kindly assist further.. Looking forward for your immediate help.

name: Sachin
title: Artificial bass,Buds often slips from ears
content: As they mentioned extra bass yes the extra bass is added to the music which is unnecessary and worst the bass is artificial. feels heavy and often slips from the ear and bud quality is very cheap. Very noisy in the high volume. Only good things about this product are it has a Tangle free wire , L shaped head phone jack, Mic and metal body and good sound quality in medium volume.

name: Viraj C.
title: Great Product
content: Good audio quality for the price. Build quality of the wire is great, considering the wire is thick and the jack has a hard L shaped jacket to prevent the wire from getting damaged by physical movements. Must buy for the price and works great with Xbox One and Ps4 controllers.

name: Himadri
title: Amazing boat
content: Amazing basshead boat headphone🤘😍. This basshead boat headphone is seriously amazing. The bass is soo fabulous that you will love the beats. Only draw back is the normal songs in which bass is normal the lyrics get suppressed.. 4 rating is only what is truly fulfill i.e. the bass effect.. Thanks boat for one more awesome product.. This is my 2nd boat headphone and I am loving it.

name: Ananda kumar jena
title: Worse experience on boat
content: Bass is fine... But other all r very poor... After 3hour of delivery one side stopped also I order blue and got Blac one used product too... Instantly I try to refund it but they say u cant do that u can replace the order ,so did that but within 6to 7day of 2nd time delivery it's one side again stopped sometime or very slow acc. to other.. but 2nd time only perfect is that I got the Blue one ... After 2nd time damage I return it with Option of refund don't Know they will keep it or my 499 will go to vain .... Review after 2nd time return 🙂 Seriously very worse experience with boat

name: Vinay
title: But this earphones are exceptionally good and support HTC mobiles too
content: Please do not compare it with JBL or Bose. But this earphones are exceptionally good and support HTC mobiles too.... Bass is awesome(Purely bass, not for treble), Built quality is too good with hard metal type plastic, The call answer button is invisible but works good.The sound amplification is good thus need not to put full volume in the mobile.

name: Tapish Verma
title: This Thing Is Mind Blowing !!
content: First of all This is a short term review.. 2-3 days after Testing.... This headset Is Mind Boggling I would say man... the Bass Quality Oh Boy Oh boy.... Freaks me out... By the way I am using Viper4Android FX (Just an advance level, Audio enhancing Software). I have just Configured my headset for the best Bass quality... But I have also tried the Cx 180's and Jbl ones (which comes under 1000) but the best quality was From these no doubt these are actually the best earphones you could buy right now even at price point of 800-1000 i would say because the Bass was Just extremely very clear and loud . Cx 180's does the same Job but still when Lows hits the peak they tend to Distort a bit.. also the lack of mic is their On those ones too... Close your eyes and buy these ones ...

name: Sravon P Sunil
title: Perfect combo for xiaomi
content: If you have a xiaomi phone and use this headset along with preset audio effects in it. It's mind blowing. Awesome quality.. One problem is due to its weight its slipping from ear. Maybe because my ears are large😁.. Updating my review after using.. Best headset.. No problem at all. Go for it

name: Bhaskar Roy
title: Clear sound
content: The product was good. Used it for almost a year before it got damaged. Nyways the sound quality was good. The bass was deep but the clarity of trebleade the instruments of songs come forth. Its good for low budget earphone.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Okay okay product...
content: The package had the given colour headset and two pairs of ear gel... One set of the matching colour and one set of black I. E. Small, medium and black.. I find that the ear gel comes off too easily on the slightest provocation so need to attach the clip to the shirt cooler to help it hold on to the ear.. Most embarrassing for me at least is that the call end and answer button does not work. Found it late Nd now stuck with it. Everytime now I have to hang up... I need to press the call disconnect button on the phone. The purpose of this headset is defeated, it's not much useful for me now.. The wire is flat but not tangle free... I don't understand how... I had the xiaomi basic headset and it used to not tangle itself up.... The sound is alright... My purpose of purchase was not music... Just calling. Can not give much input on bass and treble etc... To the effect I could hear and the other person could hear me too.... Overall not satisfied with this... That much to give it a five star rating.. The rating is not For delivery but only for the product.

name: VINAYKUMAR MASANE
title: Sturdy product, optimal performance and value for money
content: Product Handling:. With Kids around at home, the products sturdiness and tangle free experience tested left n right... :D and it withstood rough handling. Enough Length to use with Laptops at desk or Mobile in Pocket. Performance :. Excellent bass quality even at Lower volume Levels. Noise Cancellation is Great! No flicker experienced during calls and A/V conferences. A quick Pause/Mute button would have been nice n handy feature while in Call. Rest A Cool product for the Price...

name: Tejas singh
title: Wrong model delivered
content: Assholes am a genuine customer since many years i always ordered all d products for myself and they wer upto date and all deliveries met my expectation... First time i ordered it for my cousin he said dont trust online products i sssured them that m a regular buyer n they wud provide me d accurate product .. But i ordered a different model and u delivered a different model of boat earfones... U broke d trust n spoiled ur image at the same time

name: Tanay
title: Best in class
content: Sound quality is best in class.... Very much durable.... 1 year replacement warranty.... (They even pick the product from home...and delivers the replacement at home at free of cost). Only a tiny problem is..its a bit heavy....so it does not stay very well in ear... a bit of adjustment and you are good to go...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good Product
content: I am using this product for six months and as per my thinking the bass was very high... I am not fan of heavy bass but after setting the equaliser it is working fine but those who don't want to hear extra bass then this is not for them but i have to say that product is very good by build quality

name: Anirudh Singh
title: You are paying for a disguise on earphones. I recommend not trusting what they say about warranty.
content: They only worked for me for only 11 months. And what next is they claim is they provide 1 year warranty..*my foot on their warranty card*.. I have sent them a request 5 times but they are not responding because I am claiming it when its been 11 months am using it and bragging about these headphones that they are awesome in such a low price. My sister also bought its Bluetooth headphones and their cloth for the ear whatever they call it, is so pathetic that you can't even wear it for more than 20 min continuously. My warranty is getting over at 31st August. If anyone sees it and agreeing with me, drop a like so that this doesn't happens with anyone else.

name: Mohit Sharma
title: Solved one problem created other!
content: Sound is good, noise cancellation is good Bass is also good. It solved the problem of cracking and tangling of wire but the problem it created is that the part which we insert in headphone jack got loose within a weak and after 2 week of use it has become completely loose. I literally hold it with my hand as long as I am watching a video or taking a call. Can't say I am satisfied with the product.

name: Abinash
title: Don't buy ₹100/- Product for ₹500/- Just for brand name
content: Its Built quality is too poor. breaks after 2months of use.. in the sense anyone side of the earpiece won't work properly which makes its similar to product that we can buy for ₹100/- from local street vendor. I have bought another set as well which behaved the same way getting me to this user experience that i m sharing.. so kindly refrain from buying cheap product for so much money.. just the brand name is not everything.. Packaging and delivery by Amazon was good.

name: Pramod
title: Does not sit well in Ears
content: The earbuds are not angled, and hence do not sit well in the ear canal , can be prone to falling off.... That is a big disappointment.. Also bass levels are high , if you like that , then buy these.... My only issue is , it does not sit in ear canal comfortably, without the fear of it falling off !

name: Tarun Mahour
title: Again one earpiece stop working
content: I bought it again after thinking it was a coincident but no, one more time and one more earphone's earpiece stop working and due to this lockdown I can't return it on Boat service center. Before that they have door pickup facility but not now. Not recommend it now. Don't Buy. Sound and bass and comfort level is good no doubt :/

name: Roshan Kumar
title: Sound coming from only one side within 2 weeks of purchase
content: I bought these earphones on the 16th of October. Now within 2 weeks, sound is coming from only the right side. The return window just closed so I can't even return it. I really want to get a replacement. Please connect and take this back. Thanks

name: Prajwal
title: Best headphones must. Read my review
content: Well I'm using boat bassheads 225 from 7 months...so following are my review. Pros:- 1) the sound quality is awesome. 2) the bass is extremely outstanding. 3) the cables are of very good quality wise and. It's durable too. 4 ) it's light weight and comfortable. Cons:- 1) my headphones mic got stoped after 2 months. Cause of impact while it was fallen. 2 ) mic quality is average. ....this my review but trust me this are the best headphones under this price range just handle it with care ..... .......thank u..

name: Ankit R.
title: Quality sound, but fits poorly.
content: Although the earphone is one of the best earphone in this segment when it comes to sound quality, the only problem is that it doesn't fit properly in the ear as after sometime of use, it slides out of ear. I tried all ear buds provided with it but problem subsists. The probable cause of it is, slightly larger size of speakers due which it hinders in proper fitting.

name: RAHUL
title: Does the job...
content: Boat bass 225 definitely does what it will be build for,. Build for pure thumping bass,. And mids and trouble is also fine,. All you need is a good equalizer to Max out it's potential .. It's bass is just outstanding thought I love bass music.. #the only con is it's comfortability,. Due to metal build it is bit heavy. Max 30 min I plug it on , after that my ears become frozen like😂🤣😂🤣. But it is sufficient for bass music, it is recommended not to listen bass music more than 30 min.. Overall. IAM pretty happy to buy it at rs 500 bit costly but ok.

name: clinton
title: for this price range very worthy
content: i like the built of earphone, and sound bass is too good,. i m facing only problem is with comfort, it is not proper fitting in ears, may b my problem, and the wires are heavy so while walking it regularly falls down, just this problem,. other than sound built and bass all are statisifed

name: gayas ansari
title: Tampered headphone
content: First of all this is trampered product and this not what i was expecting this is used headphone earwax was still there and see the above photo properly for reference like someone has kept in box the first copy and replaced the original one very bad experience this is third time amazon has not met my expectation...how someone can really give tampered or used product and even you taking the full amount i want my money back asap

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not fitting as expected
content: Definitely like the sound clarity and bass. But what is the use if it does not fit to the ears. I tried with all the different earbuds it still keeps falling off when I just walk. I tried even with my friends but all of them complained about the fit. Seriously it is very frustrating. The earbud speakers are too long. You cannot wear a helmet with the earphones. Its just too long. The fit disappointed me a lot.

name: Hemant
title: Defective product after one month
content: I exchanged it although after one month it's not working fine.. When I turn it slightly the sound will be disturbed.. This problem is coming after lockdown only earlier I ordered 2 pair but those working fine

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good for the price
content: Good for the price. Pretty sturdy.. One of the earpieces lost volume after a few months but it was replaced by the company( the process took 1 month but it was picked up and dropped off from my location). Sound quality is not the best but it's good for the price. Sound quality on JBL is better but the durability is ridiculous on those earpieces.

name: Abdul Rehman Khan
title: Shape of earpiece is old fashion and heavy in weight
content: Writing this review after using this product for 3 months.. Pros. 1) Good quality sound, Bass and everything else. 2) Flat wire makes it durable. 3) Too Many pairs of Ear buds. 4) Active noise cancellation works well. cons. 1) Its heavy in weight(Metal) , not suitable for long hours. 2) Earpiece shape is too old fashion and does not fit to Ear Canal. 3) Really annoying when it keeps falling from your ear due to old design

name: Nitesh Joshi
title: Waste of money.. headphones hardly last a month or two.
content: My usage: Gym, running, cycling, transist.. Device: one plus 6, Iphone 6s +, laptop. Previous headphone: Bose Sound sports wireless.. Volume changes automatically. Music changes automatically, can't listen to a single song completely. Doesn't starts on first attempt, need to try multiple time to switch on headphones. Not for taking calls, lots of surrounding noise comes in.. Pro: sound is good for a Bluetooth headphones, but after experiencing above issues I won't recommend it.

name: Dipra Chakravorty
title: Can be bought if only use is restricted to laptops or personal computers only!!
content: I have been using this product for the past 9 months. Although initially the earphone was working fine with both the laptop as well as mobile, but recently it has stopped working with the mobile. It has become incompatible, as it always interferes with the audio of the phone. Even after replacing the product, it has been the same. The new earphone has also developed the same problem. It is still working fine with the laptop though.

name: Jaivin
title: This product blew mind!! Read my comment to know why?
content: Hey Folks.... I bought the "boAt Bass Heads 225 in-Ear Bass Headphones with One Button Mic (Red)" on the 25th July 2018. It came in decent packaging. I had no complaints. I extensively used it for video conference calls, music and also cellphone conversations, dropped it like a 1000 times on the floor, dragged it, pulled it and what not... It did not have any issue till two weeks ago. Two weeks ago, the unimaginable happened. I had the headphones in one of my pant pockets and my wife accidentally puts the pants into the washing machine! I own a Samsung top load fully automatic "quite powerful" washing machine. This head phones goes through two stages of washing 20 minutes each. That is a total of 40 minutes inside a washing machine.. When I heard about this! I was so bummed out because I was sure that the headphones wouldn't survive after that!. Once I took it out, I blew dried it, and with full of anxiety, I plugged it into my phone. To my surprise, the earphone worked!!!! but Sadly, the bass was gone!! The music output was only with treble with absolutely no bass. So I decided, I wont use it again, whats the point without bass anyway???. Today, the 30th Jan 2019, When I plugged this thing into my devise, It worked with the bass!!! The headphone lived!. I am thankful for the product! Its amazing, It did not deserve to go through the washing machine! But it did anyway and survived! That tells me one thing, Superb built quality!!!. Cheers!!!

name: Ishak
title: Good for music..! Average for calls !
content: Just want to give my quick review after using it for couple of days.. 1. Good for music.. 2. Sound quality is good.. 3. You may need change ear buds as the default one is much bigger.. 4. below average for calls on noisy environment. ( Previously used Samsung ear phone that was much better compared to this. There is clear change noticed by other end user and felt more noise while we speak.). 5. Tested few sounds tracks in YouTube and all works good.

name: Aiswarya Ashok
title: Mic and earphones not working
content: I used for 3 months. Now the mic is not working.. And one side audio is also not working. When asked for replacement the seller told no delivery to the location. How come initially they delivered and at the time of replacement, its not deliverable.

name: Suraj Shetty
title: Too nice to b comfortable
content: The earphone never stays.. Always needs to be adjusted.. The wire quality is too good.. bcos of the weight of the wire, the earphones never stay in place.. One fine day I destroyed it when it was to much and switched to my old one

name: vivek Mehra
title: Third class product
content: I suggestbnot to buy thid product. This a very third class product .sound and mic quality is worst. You should with other brands .this is realy a cheap product .useless .Mic is very worst . I even replaced it but same poor quality issue with this one .my friends also sharing same feedback . Poor boss . I will never go with this brand in future.

name: Md asad Nadeem
title: BEST ON PRICE RANGE
content: BEST ON PRICE RANGE:. Many times headphones don't sound as great out of the box, but give them a few hours of playtime and it's a whole new world. Its been more than 5 months using it this sounds fantastic Bass is over exposed but in the price segment you can't ask for more.. The best part of this product is its customer service i had some issues with the cable and i register it online they pickup was on time no where to go and within seven days i got it back.. Best budget earphones.... PS: i also own jays-five and this earphone is my daily driver

name: Swarnab Das
title: Great product but still needs some improvement.
content: Need some improvement in their built quality. This is the second time i ordered this product because the last one got broken, which doesnt comes under warranty, tough its under warranty period. The ear plug got broken while fitting the ear bud. Still good brand in affordable price but needs to improve in their weak sector.

name: Your neighborhood
title: Excellent inear headphones
content: This is my third earphone of same boat 225. Previous two were used fore more than a year... And I lost it somewhere.. Sound quality is amazing for price...build is really excellent...but comparing with the previously bought( two years back) seems better and cable width was wider and finish was shiny....May be cost cutting😀

name: Sabari
title: Product quality and delivery men
content: It's super headset I would ever used.. It has more bass and clear noiseless audio and I'm impressed while using this Boat branded headset and gives perfect fit to our ear and gives some more buds and supporting supporter and clip for attachment.. And delivery is Vera level ,he handle me look like friend and his delivery is good and also I'm impressed about amazon deliver speed.....

name: Vineeth
title: Sound is like that of local cheap earphones
