content: Initial reaction - I made a mistake. Ive used Sennheiser cx275 before but can't compare with that one coz the price is much higher.. Bought this after seeing positive reviews in Amazon. I wonder what all those guys were thinking.. Sound is distorted, at medium to high volumes, clarity goes down , earphones are too heavy, and the ears start to pain after a few minutes. I'm returning these. Sound quality is pathetic.. Trying to produce more bass,maybe they killed other frequencies. There's got to be more balance even in this price range.. Sound is annoying actually. Some local products are more comfortable

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good
content: I am not fan of earphones as prolong hearing through it my ears starts paining. Instead use headphones. Still this product is great with less volume you can hear it for long duration. The best part it ear buds variety it fits to almost each and every ear type.

name: Sapna
title: 100percent water proof🚫💦
content: It's been more then a year.. Using this one which I purchased from Amazon.. Only defect in this was the mike. not working after 3 months.. But I would have been give otherwise 5 star.. But I was shocked.. That it is 100percent water proof.. Last month I kept my earphone in my denim pocket.. & my clothes went for washing.. I just forgotten to take it out from my pocket.. Searching my ear phone.. Then when j wore my washed denim found it inside my pocket.. I thought to throw it may be its not working.. But guys trust me.. My earphone is still working.. With same quality.. I m super impressed.. No damage to its speakers.. Or wire.. I m happy.. But only the mike was the problem..

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worth my deal!
content: I got a really good deal for a really good earphones as the sound quality is awesome...I could say the notice cancellation feature on it actually works! Quite powerful beats too. Good attempt at making it tangle-free by flattening the wires but it wasn't exactly the case as I still struggled with this one too. And it can pop out of Ur ears from time to time even though it is made as an "in-ear" earphones. Finally, I couldn't really comment on the durability as I got it last month only.

name: Srikar Sharan
title: Good for music, Average for calling
content: I am a very big fan of Boat bass heads. Currently, I was using the models 225, 228, 180, 235.. Among all these 225 is best for music because of its bass quality.. Personally, before buying I check these systems with Harris Jayaraj hits and then purchasing will be done.. So, here I felt 225 is a good choice.. If you want extra bass, go with 180.. Or you like simple bass, purchase 235.. #srikarsharan097. #srikarsharan. #srikar. #sharan

name: Tanmay prabhu
title: Not satisfied with the new ones... New ones feels cheap even compared to old bassheads 225!!!!
content: I currently have both the old one and new earphones with me...there are many visible changes like the size of the earpiece is small now also the size of button is small and length is shorter. The bass quality and sound is comparatively low. New models material feels much cheaper. Even the jack is not upto the old standards. No. of Earbuds provided is reduced and no clip n rings for sporty use are provided.. U can notice the cost cutting everywhere. The overall products quality is dropped.

name: somnath Deychowdhury
title: Working after 4 years!!
content: More than 4 years now still excellent sound quality, hear hooks are definitely helpful during sports and gym.. I never had a earphone which lasted more than a year but this one goes on and on, 4 years!!!. Bought this when i bought a new phone, I changed my phone now but these earphones still working!!. More than 50 boat earphones have been bought by all my freinds after i suggested them, boat consider giving me a new set now😂

name: Rishabh
title: Fine for the  price
content: Not the best I've tried. You would be better off if you spend a little more and buy a jbl.. The bass overpowers other sounds, hence diminishing the clarity of treble and vocals.. The sound-stage is fine. I will recommend it only if you like bass and have a tight budget.

name: Aswin
title: This is a duplicate Boat Bassheads
content: This is not an original Boat Bassheads.. Look the difference of Boat original and this duplicate one. It is a duplicate one. Which we will only understand after seeing. Don't be cheated. Please don't buy. Visit Flipkart for an original product. I had returned this earphone. There is no Boat Bassheads 225. Visit the boat store. There is only Bassheads 220 manufactured by Boat company 😥🙁😔

name: *india*
title: In love with this product.
content: I am very happy with this product... I had lost my previous one and i bought this again... It has a very good base quality and noise cancellation and sound quality... All this at this amount... Its all worth it... The flat like cord is easier to manage as it doesn't tangle easily and even if it does it takes only a second or two... Very happy with this product... Also it comes with this set of earplugs so its convenient if you by chance lose one... You have 5-6 more pairs.

name: Abhinav Agnihotri
title: Worthless Product-Don't buy !
content: Worst product.. Why?. It stopped working within 10 days-lol, & Amazon replacement window is also got closed in 7-days. So, taking follow-up with boats Customer care support which is pathetic too.. Although, it has a branding space, no button for Pause/Forward/Play buttons ⏸️⏯️, which make it pathetic deal of money.. So, I won't recommend/suggest this product to our buyers.

name: Nikhil Nair
title: Don't buy it.
content: The quality is lousy. Bought two pieces and the first one stopped working on one side within a month. The second one barely survived 3 months before getting a recurring loose connection in one year.. This thing is also extremely uncomfortable and will mess up your ear within 20 mins of wearing it.. Got it give it for the sound quality though. When it works it does have good clear sound and reasonable base.. But I'd say give it a miss. You can get better headsets on Amazon.

name: Ganesh Kumar Rajendran
title: Overall Excellent product...!!!
content: Overall a very nice ear phone with good quality sound & bass. Flat cable makes it tangle fee. Ear piece heads are little heavy due to metal casing and the heads protrude out of your ear so it keeps slipping down if used for a longer time which is quite a discomfort.

name: sai
title: No other company provide metal build in this segment
content: I don't why all have given 3.7 by average.... it's really best under 500 bucks...built quality is awesome i have used many others, but nothing has given this much satisfaction.... It is little uncomfortable in ears...it always slips from our ears, so i started using small buds and ear grippers....so now my problem is solved... without small buds and grippers, definitely it won't stay in your ears, so use small buds and grippers for better grip.... It's sound quality is really best under the segment. No one will provide metal build under this segment. Material quality is also best

name: Diksha Sharma
title: Perfect earphones. Must buy.
content: I have two other colors of this same product.. This is the best earphone I have ever used.. The after sale service is great.. My old earphone's left side stopped working so it got replaced by the Boats company because of one year warranty.

name: S.Pati
title: Sennheiser CX 180 has  better clarity and bass
content: Okay so those who are confused between this one and Sennheiser cx180 I will say Sennheiser cx180 is a better option .base lovers don't even think of buying this,go for Sennheiser CX 180.

name: Pooja P
title: Great but Heavy!
content: Sound quality is superb!. The only thing I did not like is its a bit heavy, earpieces are of metal and chord is somewhat thick with great quality. Due to this they fall off from my ear.. As far as sound is concern, it's a Boat!. What more anyone ask for!

name: sunil
title: Not a good product considering it's price
content: The product was not at all what I expected. Due to it's shape, it doesn't get fixed in your ear and pops out. The price is no less for such a product that too BOAT.. And there is only an option of replacement . They should allow us to replace with some other model , otherwise there is no point of having a replacement option. I hope the sellers look into this matter and help us with either a model replacement as soon as possible.

name: hiDhaval
title: MADE IN CHINA.
content: Turned out to be *MADE IN CHINA*... Thought of sharing that info.. + Good clear sound. Deeper bass.. - In-ear size slightly bigger for my avg size ear cavity, thus feels uncomfortable after short use.. - mic really needs to be in close proximity, else voice goes too low.

name: Nagaraju K
title: Terribly uncomfortable
content: I surprised after receiving this item by checking it's sound and build quality at this price range...but unfortunately it's comfort level is pathetic always comes out of the ear changed and checked all the ear buds those they are provided in box still not found comfort with this .. finally buy at your own risk..

name: Meena poddar
title: Good earphone/After sale service bad experience.
content: Boat basshead 225 was a good Earphone but after 5 months I have to replace that because one side not working and also mic was not working it's and good quality earphone and sound was also good but it was not working after 5 months so will give 3 star. And boat after sales service was slightly bad.

name: Below Average
title: Excellent quality but not durable.
content: The product was really nice for 1.5 months. Comparable to JBL or german product Senheizer. But it could only gone one ear no sound after 1 month of regular use. I need to purchase one immediately now.

name: suvendu halder
title: Decent buy
content: Sound is good but I am not very comfortable with the inserts into the ear. They come with 3 sized options for you to change but not very comfortable for me even with the smallest one. Sound quality and build quality is good though. PS, I dont quite like the idea of shoving the ear pieces right in.

name: vickykandavara
title: Stops working after a while
content: I had bought this a year ago and it stopped working after 5 months, just like that. Got it exchanged as it was under warranty. Until yesterday that was working fine, and guess what, left side stopped working again!!. It's not in warranty and these are useless now. So buy a good brand like Sennheiser, which works for years to come!

name: Gaurav Sharma
title: Best for the price.
content: Do not expect so much from a cheap earphone but i assure you it's worth for money.. ALERT- If you are already using any professional headphone or any high quality earphone then you might get disappointed, if don't then it's a must buy.

name: Indraneel Ghosh
title: Good bass but ear bud coming out from ear frequently
content: Sound quality and bass is really good but the ear bud is very heavy as it made up of metal.It come out from ear automatically without any jercking. It's very much uncomfortable to use for long hours. Only for the above reason I have been forced to return the item. So think twice before buying it.

name: Zebulon
title: Awesome headphones
content: *Awesome headphones!. But it works only for 4 months or 6 months(TEST CONFIRMED). I bought 3 of them and two just died after 4 months of usage so I assumed that it works only for 4 months. AGAIN I BOTH 2 OF THEM AND TESTED THIS PRODUCT AND YES IT DIES IN 4 TO 6 MONTHS OF TIME MOSTLY 4 MONTHS.. For a price range of 450-500 its a worthfull product but more than that is not worthfull.

name: Sridatta Nallamilli
title: Painful 😖 NOT RECOMMENDED
content: The earphones are great in all aspects except the FIT in the Ears. When used, the earphones just slip off the ears after 5 mins of usage and this repeats all the time even if you adjust them in your ears. This issue ruins all the hearing experience while using these earphones.

name: Abhijeet Das
title: Beast for Bass lovers.
content: First of all MANY MANY thanks to amazon to give me this amazing deal & best in the market ear phone. Boat you really rock in this 225 special edition it is really SPECIAL ear phone for bass lover. Music in low & high situation you grip it complete. Definitely I say PLUG INTO NIRVANA. BOAT YOU ROCK IN 225 SPECIAL EDITION

name: saraswathi
title: Rugged and good product in budget
content: Overall it's a very good product, I have been using this product for 6 months and by mistake I have put them in washing machine along with the sweat shirt twice but still it's working perfectly without any issues. I highly recommend this product for people who are looking for a good and rugged product in budget.

name: indranil mandal
title: In that range it's best air phone...
content: I use it so long time but it's works properly. Sound quality too good, bass not high but good. Notice cancellation is perfect...its durability is much higher more than two time it drops water but it's work is no effect.... In range it is perfect....

name: Praveen S.
title: Not enough bass
content: There is constant background white noise coming from earphones when they are connected to either PC or phone. This is highly noticable at lower sound settings, making listening to soft music difficult. Plus the bass is not present for a headphone advertised as "bassheads". Otherwise, it's alright but not the best at this price range.

name: Atharva
title: BEST BUDGET EARPHONES!!!!
content: Ordered this product for the 4th time and I still love it!!!!nice build quality,great sound quality,bass is perfect for all the bass lovers out there!The only problem of this earphones is the comfortability:- fits in your ear but due to the metal it is heavy which results in falling of earphone from your hear,this can be a problem for a person who constantly wears earphones for long times.But still i personally love it,and i would suggest everyone to buy these earphones:)

name: Rehan Raza Khan
title: Value for money.
content: It's quite a sturdy set of earphones... The bass quality is good.. Some say it's over the top, but after using for over a month, I can say that it's perfectly balanced... The only negative I found is that the earphones are not very comfortable in the ears and keep slipping out of the ears. The ear wings that is provided with the package will help a bit.

name: Piyush R.
title: Fabulous At This Price...
content: Overall The Earphone Is Best In This Price Point.... Metal Gives Them Premium Look... Bass Is Awesome.... Sound Quality Is Good.... But Only Problem I Have Facing With These Earphone Is Thier Design Because They Are Metallic They Can't Get Fit Into My Ears Due To Thier Heavy Weight...I Bought This Earphone Since 2 Months Ago Only This Problem I Have Faced With This Earphone..

name: AJAY KARTHIKEYAN C
title: One side of the headphone stopped working after few days!
content: I expected some good quality device from BOAT, but never go by the looks ! Just after the 8 days, the left earphone stopped working and I was unable to return it to Amazon as it was beyond the replacement time of 7 days. So, I have. applied for the warranty and as of 20/08/2020 it has not even reached Mumbai for checking fault.. Try buying some other expensive products that may stay longer than buying cheap and losing it !

name: Pradeep
title: Worst Earphones
content: I have no idea what that makers of this most idiotic product were smoking when they designed and productionised an in-ear earphones that refuse to stay in ear. Aesthetics of this earphone is good, no qualms there. However the usability takes a huge hit because of the ear buds which doesn't seat properly. Tried all sizes of the spare ear buds that come along. Nothing seemed to help. I bought two of them - another for my wife - at the same time after having read multiple reviews. But I was totally disappointed after using this earphone. My wife complained of same issue. Sound quality is average. Not too bad, but nothing superlative. Overall a worst product that anyone must try to keep their hands off!!

name: Abhishek Gautam
title: Good sound quality, but not very durable.
content: These earphones are doing a great job by providing you a quality music at this price range. Anyone can here bass and treble very clearly. Also these earphones suppresses outside noise, so you can enjoy your music. Outside noise suppression is good for you if you are on a call with these earphones in a loud public place like railway station.. Design and material is very good. Wires are designed to not to tangle while in the bag.. Only thing I don't like about these earphones is that these are not durable. I had to file a request for replacement two times in a year as one of the ear bud stopped working and one time microphone stopped working.

name: Jivan krishna marandi
title: Best bass
content: Delivery before estimated date so feeling very happy. About earphones we all know boat is best in bass and in great value of price. I got this one at 499 which is not usually not available in that price range so again great thanks to Amazon for that. I would say go for it if you want best wired earphones 😘😚

name: Prathamesh Patil
title: Fill the music 🎶
content: Boat is good company for sounds and this earphones is better in this price range thats sounds is so impressive Bass hocaals beat clear sound sounds provided And build quality is best tangles free wire they provide .

name: Sha2nk
title: Good headphones.
content: Decent headphones for the price. Serves the purpose and sound quality is average plus. Only problem is with ear piece provided you need to use the small ones to avoid vaccum inside your ear. If you use medium sized or large ones the sound is blocked by the vaccum and you need to constantly adjust your ear piece

name: chandan bora
title: Bass monster...
content: Good sound quality. This earphones are built only for basslovers. The high notes are very sharp. Midrange is not that great. Bass is hard hitting. Sometimes the sound get muddy because of too much bass. I would recommend those who is looking for an earphone with tons of bass.

name: Bhargav Prajapati
title: impressed with after sale service of boat
content: earphone is very good at sound quality, durability and it have very good design. i am impressed with boat's after sale service because after 6 month of buying it's one side is not working well so i have applied for warranty online. they arranged pick up my earphone from home and in 1 week my earphone is replaced and new earphone is delivered at home and i got new earphone at no cost.

name: Akhilesh
title: Great purchase
content: Sturdy, tangle free, good audio quality, not an audiophile so cant really comment on the intricate details of audio quality. Good for regular use. I have 2 of these, both are working great so far. Good for conf calls too.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Value for money
content: According to the price. Pros:. Sound quality is good (bass & clarity). Built quality is outstanding 👍 (anti tangled, metallic). Noise cancellation is good. Cons:. Little bit heavy because of its built quality. Clarity cloud have been better, fine tunes in a music are not audible.. Overall a good option 👌 you can go for it.

name: Oshin Bakshi
title: Nice but have one issue
content: Its been 5-6 month that I am using this product and below is the feedbck. Quality.....5*. Noice cancellation......5*. Sound Quality.............5*. Earbuds......painful fitment. But what i didnt like is the earbuds tips.........they come off frequently , itried with different sizes but same issue was there.. My friends have used this but same issue was faced by them as well!

name: Keval karavadiya
title: PROS & CONS
content: BEST EARPHONE UNDER 600.I BUY THIS AT 500 IN SALE. SOUND QUALITY IS NOT DISSAPPOINT YOU.BASS IS JUST AWESOME AS PER IT NAME.. NOISE CANCELLATION IS DEPENDS ON WHICH SIZE OF EARBUD YOU WEAR.IF YOU FIT BIG EAR BUDS THEN NOICE CANCELATION IS MORE ACCURATE.. IF YOU WANT TO BUY THESE ONE WAIT FOR SALE OR OFFER FOR SAVE 100₹.. ONE MAJOR PROBLEM IS 3.5 MM JACK IS LOOSE SO IF I TOUCH JACK IT DISCONNECTED WITH PHONE.OTHER THAN THAT IT'S GOOD EARPHONE.AND BEST PART IS IT ALSO HAS 1 YEAR Warranty ALSO.

name: Amazon Customer
title: 9 MONTHS
content: Well, the mic stopped working 2 months ago. As I am typing this, the headphones totally gave up. Lasted for 9 monthsin total. I wished to continue with it as the sound was good and the durability was nice. Well, for the price, you really can't expect something to do everything but it actually did. Sad that it stopped working. RIP.. P.S. Doesn't tangle easily.

name: Arunromeo
title: paisa vasool......
content: Very nice in this price. Im already using mi earphones but in terms of audio quality and buid quality. This far ahead frm it. Bass is awesome just like its name says bass heads. Buds feels like plastic but its full of metal. I found by the sound when i hit it in the ground. But its not heavy as mi earphones. Its very li8 we8. But mi earphones are very comfortable and not fall of frm the ear. But this is falling frm my ear again and again. But thankgod they gave a earhook. It improves the grip. But it hurts the ear when long usage. Sound clarity is awesome. Totally its worth for its price. And Amazon delivery is supr fast. I ordered it on feb 14 n8 and it arrived on feb 17. Totally a perfect package....

name: Zaki Qureshi
title: Stop working in 6 months worst experience
content: I had purchased these boat headphones and Suddenly it has stopped working after just 6 months. It has a warrenty of 1 year. I want this product to be replaced as soon as possible. Mic of headphone in not working . Such a bad experience with amazon as i have not done any major shopping yet on amazon. Just want this product to be replaced as soon as possible.

name: Ranjit singh
title: Stopped working
content: I got this product 4 months back and till not i have exchanged it twice ,i dont know how many time i have to claim warranty.. Twice with new pieces one ears stopped working thats not a good number for 4 months .Service centre is faar away fir my location and they are not even providing home pickup.

name: Sakpal k.
title: Eyecatching style earphones with beast sound & bass quality.
content: I'm writing this with 6 months of use. Bass is powerful. Noise cancellation is really good. Audio quality is i think best considering price point. Flat Wire quality is so good. U can feel every single beat of sound. Very good earphones those who wants to listen EDM (Electro Dance Music). Only 1 con u can't use for longer time...I felt pain whenever I exceeded 2-3 hours listening. (I love to listen music for longer time)

name: ANTK
title: Boat is a beast.
content: Im using boat for last 1 year. I loved this headset. No issues, no complaints, nothing. 1 year old. But its still young. Full of bass music. With this kind of earphones all of you can have a blast on your ears. So i personally recommend boat basshead 225 for all bass lovers. Value for money. Good built quality. Im having a rough using with it. But still its going neat and smooth.

name: Arnab Sahu
title: Not value for money.
content: Little heavy for ears and comes out of ear sometime...but sound quality is very good....build quality is not good.. Each one of them stopped working (one side or mic) within 1 year(used 4).. Waste of money ...buy better with little more money or buy cheap locals.

name: Ravi Napoleon
title: Worst product with zero reliability
content: Pathetic product. Sound quality is not good. Build and reliability of product is very less.. I bought this one month back and due to quality issues i wanted to replace with other product, which Amazon didn't allow. Instead, same another product was shipped to me. In a month it stopped working. No clue on warranty and how to get it repaired. Please Dont buy such things from Amazon, but get it from local shoos, where you get post sale personal support.

name: Amit kar
title: Go for it 🔥🔥🔥
content: Just awesome . Its sound quality is literally outstanding 👌. Very good bass and terrible and vocals are also clear . Just awesome . Go for it . If you getting it in 499 or less . Its the best deal . I got it at 399. 🔥🔥🔥

name: Ashish D.
title: Worth what you pay for but might give up after 5-6 month?
content: For the price you pay you get a really good pair of earphones.. This is my 3 time buying the same earphones.. The first one started having problems with the cable and the mic didn't work. The second one also had a problem with the cable and the mic didn't work after a few months.. Then I saw the new design and ordered it again thinking this time they would have improved and the cable problem would have been fixed.. But no, the mic still has problems and one of the earphone doesn't work.

name: Aman Choudhary
title: Worth every Penny.
content: Metal body takes the build quality, fit and finish to another level for the price.. Sound is good. Flat wire makes is easy to untangle.. Best part is it comes with a lot of options for silicon ear budds in the pack. Everyone should be able to find their perfect fit.

name: Rinku Chaudhary
title: Earphone is not working and return service is not providing
content: I bought this just before 20 days and Mike is n earphone is not working now after that I called to customer care and they are not providing any return service...I had very worse experience with boat.. don't buy ..in the first boat gave much better quality and service to attract people and when people started trusting to they are providing this quality.if I can give less than 1 to I will give.

name: Ashwin Ashok
title: Overall great experience. Only disappointed is the built quality of speaker grills
content: Build quality is decent at this price point only flaw was that it gets heavy around ears after some time. You might feel uncomfortable. And one of the the earphones speaker grills were broken.. as they are not made of metal. The Sennheiser cx180 comes with best speaker grills which are made of metal and also they are comfortable around ears they won't cause you any pain even after long usage.

name: Krishnanunni
title: Best in the price
content: I have been using this device for more than 3 months and this is my final review for the product. On this price range this is probably the best device for bass lovers.... The metalic finish makes the device looks perfect and it also has a gold plated end. Not recommended for melodies and personally I am not a fan of its flat wires since it keeps annoying me..... I can even use it for my laptop cause the bended end makes it easier to connect

name: sreeram
title: Don't buy it!!
content: Just don't buy this product, it doesn't fit perfectly in your ear even with all three different earbuds. And in my case it's one side stopped working within the 10 months, I had warrenty and got a replaced product which stopped working after 2 months and my warrenty expired. So i basically it's not at all good and if you want an earphone which u can only use in 1 year and not fit in your ear, then this product is perfect for you!

name: Saksham
title: Good build quality but the Noise cancellation issue has to has to be resolved..
content: The earphones and no doubt very good in terms of build quality and sound quality but when it comes to balance of sound they are extremely not up to the mark the noise cancellation is not also up to the mark if one has used branded earphones like Sony MDR XB MDR ZX series then the earphones are not them but if you are a beginner or the first one to buy a earphone separately and you have a tight budget then you can go for it, ...... But if claimed replacement for my product due to the problem in sound balance in that is the noise cancellation so if the next product will be perfect I'll write a review on that also

name: Prasan Gupta
title: BASS can move your base
content: Yes, actually the earphones can shake you throughout at its peak sound level.. It does have a sound cancelling effect.. I hope that the material does qualifies in the durability test in the long run even though for now it looks positive.. The biggest issue is with its ear plugs which due to its heavy metal design pops out frequently from the ear. You may get annoyed on adjusting the plug while listening to songs.. Overall worth buying the product

name: Antriksh
title: Vocals are not Good🔉🎶
content: If you have Dolby Atmos driver in your phone its not for you .. Sound quality is good but not best.. Bass is very high then you can not listening mid and high properly.. Block outer noise good but not compare to cx180 .. Bass : 4.5/5. Vocal:3/5. Treble:3.5/5. Built quality:5/5. Comfortable:4/5

name: Priyanshi Tiwari
title: Excellent product in good money
content: The product is very good, its material quality is excellent, you can sense the metal build near the earbuds. Tangle free cable, they will never trouble you at all. You will also get different types of earbuds specially the coloured ones you will loved it.. Sound of the earphone is mind-blowing. The bass is awasome you will feel each and every beat of the music. Sometimes you will notice voice getting noisy, but overall its perfect.. The product comes with a year warranty which is the best part and can be exchanged within the warranty time. Packing of this product was excellently done by Amazon. the product is worth buying in this money.

name: DumpDtrash_NS
title: Best earphones for this price... Good sound quality.... Original... Water resistant
content: This is the best earphones ever!!!! I am using it for 1.6 years.... and it is still working.... Once I even dropped in a pond... Found it later and kept it under sunlight for 15mins and it was working properly like before..... It's sound quality is good but noise cancelling is ok... Gets tangled easily...Best earphones for this price.... (Sorry for the late review)... Take this earphones.... It is original... Won't regret it..... 👍😇.

name: Deven Dholakia
title: Superb, go for it.
content: Excellent product from Boat. Superb sound and bass. Comfort is good. Looks attractive and case is durable. Go for it. Little costly though.

name: Krishn Singh Rajawat
title: Good at the price worth buying you are investing not wasting.
content: I am totally satisfied with the sound as i listen to the bass music and the price of this headphones is awesome. One thing many people wear them in the wrong way so their ear hurts and do not listen on high volume all the time as it as pretty high pitch. And one last thing they are much durable then other leads on this price bracket.

name: anu abi
title: Atleast try to have a replacement with other boat headaets
content: Everything is good ... Except its fitting .. It doesnt stand in ma ears even for a minute as its fitting is too staraight and not aligned with the angle of the ear .... Feeling heavy and ma ears are hurting after short usage .... Even i wish to return and replace with another boat headset the replacement is only available with the exact same item .... Feeling dissapointed

name: SR
title: Echo on calls
content: Bass quality is good. Quality of the product is good but your listeners will often complain about the echo in the voice. You wont heara echo on your end though.

name: Satya
title: Value for money.
content: My dad loves them. The diff sized buds helped him get the perfect fit for his ears. Been one month in use.. Well packed. Well presented and well delivered. No issues as of yet. Have to see what happens after few months and also what happens with warranty.. Overall proper accessories and good focus on comfort for this price.

name: Sanjay Bhatnagar
title: Discomfort to plug-in ear
content: Very discomfort to plug-in ear.. Lot of ear buds pieces given with a box that is also a reason to unable find out correct ear buds. Sound is good but unable to plug-in bcuse it does not stick to the ear.. Boat disappointed.

name: Suntosh Jagdish Srivastav
title: Value for money product with amazing and deep bass.
content: Packing is good, quality of product is also good. Company has given 5 pairs of ear foam accprding to ear size, sound quality is quite good. The bass is really thumping. For checking the sound of this esrphone, i tried to hear the dts dolby sound available on youtube. It is really a value for money product.

name: Manish Kumar
title: Very good quality and good experience
content: Very good sound quality. The product is awesome at this price range. And the service of company is very good. No issue using this product. Very good experience. I'll really recommend you for this price range

name: Dravyesh Narayan
title: Boat has Lowered it plastic quality.
content: Purchased this headphone in May 2017 and now in October 2020. I must say the quality of wire, plastic has drastically decreased since then. Now it is seen as a cheap quality headphone. I don't think it will last for 3 years like the one I purchased in 2017.

name: Lalita M.
title: bad quality and bad service
content: What is the use when the headphone stops working in less than 3 months of purchase and you take waste time to go to the service center only to find a huge line of complaints about boat ? And to make matters worse, the person handling service says there is no stock to replace the headphone and give me another number to contact over whatsapp only concerning replacement of headphone, with no firm date of replacement.

name: Ravi Kumar
title: Want to improve jack
content: Its gud and average product and sound quality but its Jack not supporting with my mobile case so I have remove my case when I am wearing headsets its dangerous for my mobile without carrying case.its Jack perfectly support without case even in my pocket also the Jack not support its automatically ejected the Jack want improve Jack length and it's making me more tention when I want to relax my mind I have ear a song but now the headset Jack irritating me more in that time

name: Vidyadhar
title: Best one for bass lovers
content: The bass quality is perfect noice cancellation is better and also it comes with 6 types of ear buds with one year manufacturer warranty card. But you have to claim it by contacting with the company u have to go to their website and claim it by registering your product. The problem with this is that the ear buds are little smaller they don't fit to the ear phones and also as the ear phones are little bit heavy they keep popping of the ears but u can fix it by having a different kind of ear bud prefered on ur choice. I would say it is best product for the this price.

name: Sudhakaran C
title: Lost Faith In Brand Boat
content: First set of earphones were faulty. Only one side worked. Claimed warranty, and received faulty set of earphones again!!! 😠This boat sinks! every time!! Lost faith in the brand.

name: ASHISH
title: Zero Bass, Just Looks
content: The product have zero bass. its utterly useless product , the sound goes haywire during some movie scenes. Better to opt for jbl or sennheiser. Except the looks nothing is good. The sound escapes through the back of earphone , so that other person can hear it too.

name: anjali s.
title: My second order!
content: I have tried a lot of wired headsets, none of them give me a satisfaction as this product did. This is my second order, I cant think about other headset other than this . Its sound quality is just amazing. My first ordered boat headset got damaged after 11 months of use. one of its ear piece got damaged. upto 11 months, it worked perfectly for me. after that i tired diff brands. but this one outstands. total worth for money

name: Aarthy
title: Superb
content: I have 2 words about this product MUST BUY this was literally awsome. I was having trouble with my audio until I brought this.. Pls buy this product. I recommend this. 🙏🙏🙏

name: Renjan N5P
title: Meh...
content: It is just an ok product. The sound is not clear at all, only a bit of bass is present which masks everything else. It is also uncomfortable to use for long periods of time. The mic is also not clear when speaking. I am not all impressed with the product.

name: sac
title: Loud and best in price, try with sporty earbuds.
content: You can't compare with this price segment, yes its metal build make it a bit heavy but it has many earbuds along with the package. Try it which will be comfortable with your ears, than you can handle in running as well.. Sound quality:-. Yes it has great bass you will love it but sound get distortion in max volume you can't hear,it is so loud that you can't bear it,so you have to lower down the volume to 80% than its ok and still loud and clear.. I can only say you have to try it,its really a very good piece of earphone.

name: Hari R Nair
title: Perfect for the price
content: I had this for approx. 7 months. Has decent sound quality, could understand while using in full volume. Bass is good, but could be improved so that we don't need to raise to higher volume for bass. Noise cancellation is fine.. I had issues with mic as it stopped working after getting wet in rain. I didn't get it serviced as I had lost most of its buds, preferring to buy a new one.

name: Sandeep Kumar
title: Not recommended..read review
content: It's been two weeks since I am using this product and here is my review:. This headphone is made of metal near earbuds which is heavy and does not stick to the ears. More often earphones comes out of ear due to its weight when you move your head and you have to keep pushing. I tried chaning the earbuds to larger size and also used the clip. Still the earbuds does stick to ears.. This has extra bass but comprovises with the clearity of the sounds. We can get adjusted to this but not with when earbuds comes our regularly.

name: Deepak Chauhan
title: Best earphones!
content: Pros:. 1. Bass (Device dependent). 2. Highs. 3. Inbuilt Mic (multipurpose button). 4. Wide Range of ear buds.. 5. Tangle free flat cable.. Cons:. 1. Not so comfortable fitting.. 2. Earpiece feels cold during winter(metal body). 3. Average sound quality.. 4. Buds dont fit easily on earpiece.

name: fordmustang
title: Decent buy
content: Good headphones.Metal body for the earphones gives a good feel, though feels cold against your skin! The left ear pod doesn't fit properly in my ear.. Good build,sound quality is nice.

name: AJ
title: In 6 months of purchase , 2 repairs/replacements, and problems continue!
content: Had to have the earphones repaired/replaced twice in the last 6 months of purchase, since once side stops working. Now, the replaced/repaired earphones mic does not work. To make things worse, Boat Support site now does not seem to have pick-up and repair/replace and drop option for defective products. You now need to take the faulty product to a service center. Frustrating...!

name: Digambar
title: Stops working after one year or so. Tried two times.
content: Sound quality is best. I have purchased this second time because first time one side stopped working. But second time also same issue after usage of 1 year. So you can say, Sound quality is best but durability not good. Go for it if you trying to buy for one year or so.

name: Souvik Saha
title: Delivers on every front except the Sound quality
content: Pros: This earphone gives you high volume and a solid bass. The passive noise cancellation is excellent thanks to the tight ear buds.. Multiple sizes of ear buds are provided in the package.. The build quality is excellent. And it's quite cheap.. Cons: The sound quality is well below par. There is significant distortion at high and low pitches but more importantly, the softer sounds are not heard at all. The ear buds are almost too tight. It starts getting painful after using it for just 1 hour.

name: sayed r.
title: Bass ..! Highs & Mids lover
content: I've been using them since 3 years now. kept ordering yearly. these are good at this price rang i think no other earphones delivers such sound signature at this price rang. talking about sound, There's lots of bass. highs and mids are loud. Bass Highs Mids comes together equally no doubts about it. listening with fully high volume music gets muddy i recommend you to down the volume 1 point or 2 points to get a good signature it's delivers crystal clear sound. while gaming (PUBG) these are the best you can say. those are very very loud while gaming you can hear and judge the foots steps very easily. GO FOR IT ...! if you want a high end earphones based on your requirements when it comes to one time purchase! head to www.headphonezone.in mail them your requirements and budget based on that they will recommend you a very good earphone which are well known brands of your lookin' for an upgrade. Cheersss ...!

name: Amit Kumar
title: Excellent!
content: Undoubtedly the best headphones in this price range.. Delivers a well balanced sound. The bass is just awesome and a crisp treble as well. Definitely a great buy.. Built quality is nice and sturdy. The mesh like design gives the headphones a premium look.. But earphone is a bit heavy.

name: Surya
title: GOOD ONE but not for LONG HOURS listening
content: The quality of sound delivered is really nice and classy with a decent bass... One thing need to mentioned is ...NOT FOR LONG HOURS USAGE...I have used a wide range and different brands of headphones. but this particular model of earphones from boat is not for long hours listening...But overallthe sound quality is equal to that of high-end earphones.

name: satish Kumar prasad
title: Awesome sounds truly.
content: After using it for more than 1year I'd replaced it two times because it's one side was stopping working, but there return policy was OK, two time I got it replaced within 7-10 days. Now I'm enjoying the headphones will full satisfaction, it's sound quality can challenge the headphones of 10000 price value. I must say sounds is awesome, u can customise it as u want, by your phone.. One negative point is its mic portion is heavy so you can't use it comfortably when you r walking or running otherwise it will come out of your ears or you'll have to hold the mic by your hand.

name: Sharmistha Ganguly
title: Don't buy it
content: The sound quality is good but I bought it on August and now in January suddenly one earpone is inaudible. I can hear in only one earpiece. I don't know what is the reason but it won't last more than 3-4 months. Before this I have used Senhieser's headphone and it lasted more than 2 years.

name: Venkat
title: Average performer
content: I bought this headphones because of its bass. After using it for a while , I am not satisfied with the performance of the bass, it gives output more towards treble rather. When I tested with other mobile it was giving the same results . Final verdict is it is not for bass lovers.

name: Krishna Chandran A. Nair
title: Decent sound quality, but not to comfortable
content: Not an expert to give a review about the sound quality, but in terms of comfort, I find them a little heavier than the JBL counterparts that I've used. Hence, it needs to be readjusted every 5, 10 mins so that the buds don't fall off from the ears. I find it a little inconvenient.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Faulty Earphone
content: This in reference to the phone I purchased in the past, however the earphone i received was little faulty as one side of my earphone wasn't working rest everything worked well. Kindly reach out to me through phone or email and pls do the needful by either replacing or by a partial refund or any way of warranty I could receive. Since I am a prime customer with Amazon , I had experienced a great service pls revert. My number is 9769516755.

name: madar khan
title: Price is slightly expensive.
content: This product is good but it may be uncomfortable for people with small ears as the buds may not fit in properly. Base and sound quality is very good. They should change the mic quality as the noise cancellation is not that good for mic quality. Well for 500 , these are the best so far.

name: Nabanita
title: Good but cable is very much tangle pron.
content: It lasted 6 month with sleeping with it kind of torture. BOAT is clearly making good products but durability could have been a bit more to be perfect and the cable is made out of sticky material which is very much tangle pron and you will have to spend good time to untangle it.

name: Vivek
title: Fitting issues
content: Comes of easily from the ear. NEVER FITS PROPERLY INTO EAR. Good quality other wise. But can't keep and travel. Can't keep and sleep. Also bigger piece. Painful when lies with it in ear. Can't rate noise cancellation because it never fit into my ear.

name: Honey Chauhan
title: Worth Buy , Awesome BASS !!!
content: headphones are very good in terms of design and sound quality.. but there is a little problem that they falls out from the ear even though you use right size of earbuds with them.... but for this BOAT has provided those hooks that can be used.....and bingo...... your problem is solved.. really liked the uality of the sound... must buy guys.

name: Amarindar singh
title: It might be comfortable for you.
content: Sound quality is good. Bass is great.. But the only problem with headphones is their weight. Due to metal build the earpiece is heavy which cause ear pain and headphones comes out from ear . For that solution the supporting tips are provided but they also cause ear tiredness.. it might be only my problem so don't leave this deal check out its reviews on YouTube nd go for it

name: vikas karthik
title: Still rocking in 2020
content: With out any second thought this is the best bass headphone 🎧 in this price range.. Recommended to go ahead straight and pick it up to experience it yourself.. No further explanation required, you can find plenty here.

name: Rishikesh s
title: Super bass
content: Super bass. It gives a heavy bass at this prive point.. The bass is soo good. Built quality. This product has an awesome built quality. Super buit quality. Less comfort. Its has poor comfort. Sometimes our ears feel irritated. Ours ear feel heavy when it is put on. Its heavy. I am glad that it comes with 6 buds

name: vijay Kumar S
title: Not Working
content: Brought this headset 2nd time for its performance for last 2 years.. But I'm completely disappointed.. The left side controller in the headset is not working.. And it always makes the google voice search to started and ended.. Kindly replace this headset which is brought within 10 days less.. and Reach out to me : 7010306864

name: Hani
title: Trust me guys it is worth what it is.
content: The product is worth the price.It made me guess why i spend so much on sony when i could get almost equivalent quality overall for a cheaper price.Was a bit doubtful looking at other people reviews.But i think they were expecting a BMW for the price of a Suzuki. Your review have to be logical.

name: Balraj J.
title: Too much Heavy and slippery
content: boAt BassHeads 225 earphones looks great and the bass is also good.. It has tangle free wire and made up of metal which make it great but when we talks about noise cancellation it fails in that and it is very heavy and slippery that's why we always have to use supporters with this which creates a lot of pain in the ears and metal also get cold in winters which make us feel shievering.. I will never suggest anyone to go for this, in place of this you can buy boAt 100 which have light weight and nice sound quality.

name: Vijay A.
title: Fully Disappointed with boAt products.
content: I thought, it will have good sound Quality in both the speakers but it proved me wrong bcz it's right speaker is less louder than left one that makes me unconfortable.. I have no complain with amazon but i am totally disappointed with boAt. In future, may be i will not going to purchase any boAt product, b'coz in the past before buying this pair, i had already purchased two boAt headphones on other online website and they both had the same problem.

name: Eswar Kalyan
title: One of the earphones stopped working with in 5 months.
content: Stopped working after 5 months. Bought in June 2020 and one of the earphones are not working from oct 2020 last week. Also it is hardly used for 1-2 hours daily., But surprisingly it's life is just an average of 300 hours only (5months*30 days per month *2 hours of daily usage), which means 15 full days at max. So sad.

name: Tushar ahuja
title: Good earphones in this price range
content: This earphones looks sporty.. with tanggle free cable.. but its not weight balanced. The earphones.. housing is steal built so its a bit bulky and sometime it seems irritative. else in this price bracket this is best earphone. This earphones has mic also .. so you can pick and reject calls from this earphone. Highly recommend if you need a good earphones in this price range

name: Immaniel Christian
title: It has been 1 year & still working
content: Good sound with no noice and quality is too good. Finishing is too good with metal.. It has been 1 year still its working ,I got skull candy in which 1 side speaker stopped working many times which i sent 4 times for warrenty but boat is good still working and bass also almost like stull candy (only little less).

name: Aman Raza
title: Excellent Earphones
content: I am using this earphone and have not faced any problems yet. Mostly I used headphone during traveling for listening music and watching videos. After two months of usage this headphone, I am giving review.. • I got the product well packed by Amazon.. • In packed box got 3 pairs extra earbuds with different sizes.. • Sounds are amazing. Sounds are high with Extra Bass but we can adjust. Sounds are much clear than others earphones I have ever used. No noises during calling.. • Length of the headphone is 1.2 meters. That is perfect for everyone.. • Wires are sturdy and strong.. • Jacks are metal and strong.. Verdict. Guys go for it. Value for money. Its reasonable price.

name: Tapan
title: Just about adequate.
content: Sound quality is mediocre. Bass is not very good, you can hear clicks and stutters in low tones.. I don't know if I received a defective piece, but after two months of use, I'm noticing thaf the left bud is sounding louder than the right one. This is extremely irritating to me personally, and looks like I'm going to have to discard these.

name: Supriyo datta
title: Value for money
content: Don't expect very nice sound clarity. I have used JBL, Sony headfones.. This headfone is much low in quality to those headfones. But, its value for the money. U can use it for basic needs.. One convern is, the ear buds are quite large for my ear. I found it difficult to fit them.

name: AK555
title: Don't waste time.
content: (It fells like a good quality product. Good sound and good voice cancellation. Fells like a premium product.) This was my previous experience, but after a month and half its mic is compant.

name: Iqbal Hussain
title: Bought 4 of these earphones and really Happy !
content: 1.Flat ribbon cable actually keeps the earphones from getting tangled. If incase this happens it's easy to entangle too.. 2. Encapsulated earphone pods and mic button feature I find the most remarkable. Usually after certain time of use these parts get worn out first but here its definitely not so.. 3. External environment noise cancellation and high quality sound projection in even at low volume. So I keep minimum volume to prevent deafness from frequent use.. 4. The earphone cap however is slightly slips if not kept in check.. 5. Suggestion: Buy an additional earphone case. Trust me even though it might cost a little more but will definitely increase the shelf life of your earphones.

name: Lekshmi
title: Mic is not working properly.
content: I bought it 5months back. It was functioning smoothly for 4 months. After that its mic started to malfunction. Person on the other side of the call could only hear some cracked noises that too in an unbearable sound. And now whenever I connect the headset either to phone or to my laptop to listen songs it automatically mutes the volume setting.

name: Saikat
title: One side stopped working twice within warranty
content: The only thing I love about the product is the Bass/Sound quality, rest all are worst, within 9 months, I have to sent the earphone for repair for 2 times(1 side stopped working), so there is no value for money, even a low quality Rs. 50 product also last for couple of years while this one stops working within few months, so I strongly recommend not to waste money by buying this product.. Another worst thing is when you send the product for replacement, they take minimum 1 month for the process, it's quite slow and tedious, that means they are eating up 2 months of your warranty period.. Customer care representatives never pickup the call to address your issue.. I wasted my money by buying this product and there is no one from BOAT to address or listen to my issue, they will simply send a product which will last for another few months and you are gone once the warranty period is over.

name: Krishna Moni Hazarika
title: Much better bass than the others
content: Sound quality is much better than most of the others the bass it gives is much powerful which vibrates my eardrum and it feels so sensitive to my ears but one problem I would like to mention that the durability of the product is not good I'm having two boat earphones that is bassheads 200 and 225 both of them are much similar but the 225 is the new model one. In my 200 one of the side is not working and in 225 my mic giving problem what I speak in the mic it doesn't get to the person so I've to open my earphone Jack from my phone then I've to call directly through my phone then only the person listens what I say

name: Kakkorott
title: Decent .
content: Pretty decent.. It serves as a good headphone.. Nothing special here.. Also the only downside with them is that the two earbuds cushions are way too loose . U’ll lose it if u don’t take care of them. I cant complain cause it comes with plenty of additional cushions of different sizes . Its as if they know it.

name: G Krishna Chaitanya
title: Value for money. Only concern is it's weight
content: This product is value for money. But the only con is that it's weight. You can't just keep it and walk. Due to its weight the earphones are loosing the grip and we need to adjust each and every time. Except that build quality, sound quality everything is good for this price range. Can't expect more than this..:-)

name: Raghu Yadav
title: Awesome bass effect
content: Awesome product, sound quality is good and bass lovers its good to go with it, everything ok but after 10thmonth I had faced a problem with left side ear piece not working, then with help of warranty and boat service they have exchanged new one it takes around 10-15 days, noise cancelling everything is good, but volume increased higher means it creates as terrible, overall good it's a budget earpiece...

name: Amar
title: The awesome quality
content: This is to inform you that ! Quality in terms of sound , durability , performance is very good. In market if u seen after JBL boat this seres really work good , again JBL is the JBL ,. But in low cost segment boat did his excelente job. I brought it at 350/- in offer. Bass is tooo heavy , for bass lover. Accessories of earbud is impressive. Boat and supplier u have done great job. JBL I stop to buy due to durability issue. But for boat I am sure i will be next user again

name: Amazon Customer
title: Superb Headphone
content: writing review after using this headphone for more than 3 yrs now, I am surprised actually that this headphone is working for me so long. sound quality superb, excellent noise cancellation.

name: Roystan Castelino
title: Good sound, love it. Got @499/-
content: Best bass. This is having best in class sound quality. The material seems durable quality. They provide additional 5 pairs of ear plugs and a clip to attach it to your shirt. Three of the ear plugs are brownish. And other are black. The plug is 90 degree which prevents bending of wire.

name: Tushar Singh
title: average product!!
content: the color and build quality is good and justified as par budget but the sound quality is average. the durability is a big question mark as in span of less than a year, one side of the ear piece has stopped working. overall, a average product. One can go for this if you have a tight budget and prefere to listen to really loud music.

name: Amazon Customer
title: The build quality is good however the practical usage is not worthy .
content: The build quality is good however the practical usage is not worthy . The earbuds keep on falling off due to weight of the wires. It is like to put it into your ears and freeze yourself else it would call. I bought it after lot of study of amazon reviews ; I am surprised why no one mentioned this . It is not working for me

name: uday
title: Chaos@Boat
content: Please guys..no buy this product..it's not good... In my case I brought this product 5 months back..initial days the performance was ok,but after some days I felt like some kind of sound brakes in one side,I thought it may be an song default,but after some days that one side has been completely gone,but here in description they mentioned it's having an one year warranty..But when I explained this chaos to Amazon guys there r not responding well..so guys plz don't bug this product

name: vinayak
title: Received different colour earbuds
content: I was already using boAt BassHeads 100 in-Ear Wired Earphones with Super Extra Bass...and then I purchased this....I don't find any sound quality difference... voice is louder in this head phone. Poor design....it falls down from ear due to weight.... Received different colour earbuds.....

name: Sushant Kumar
title: Not working after 4  months
content: I would suggest everyone not to buy this product. It will not work after 4 months. When I first-time purchase this product worked fine but after 4 months left earpiece was not working. I replaced and got a new headphone at the service center but after another next few months it again not working. it is only a waste of money. I would suggest you all buy JBL products rather than Boat.

name: Indrajeet Deshmukh
title: Overall review of boat bassheads 225!
content: These are the best earphones in this price range! They are definately worth it! They are durable, wire quality is good. Best for noise isolation and bass beats! The earpads are little loose, so be careful and don't loose it. Many extra earpads are provided! I personally recommend it!

name: deep parmar
title: What a complete disappointment
content: Too uncomfortable. Makes your head hurt not just ears. Sound quality is good enough but not satisfying at the price, it says tangle free but never yet has it become properly straight after the unpacking, it's always tangling even when you're using it won't stay straight, ridiculous material.

name: TALwinDER
title: Good bass and very clear sound
content: Everything is quite good about these headphones. very clear sound. bass is good. very reasonable price. just one issue wire quality can be more better

name: amresh95
title: Quite uncomfortable and irritating to use.
content: Worst headphone I have ever used. Quality is average with such a big price. Most irritating thing is that it is quite difficult to use. The earpieces are quite heavy and always fall down from ear. I wish I could return or replace it.. I recommend everyone not to buy this product. Even if bought then return it immediately.. Sound quality is ok. Bass quality is good.

name: Manoj pv
title: Not a great product
content: The mic stopped working within a year of use. The sound quality is not that great. Its average. The buds never fits in your ear, whatever buds you try. Yes it is tangle free, bud its make quality is not great.

name: EKN
title: Bad design and painful to ears
content: I bought two of these headphones. Unfortunately, their metallic backside causes pain and the headphones cannot be used for a long time. I couldn't return them too because of replacement-only policy. I wouldn't recommend this product.

name: Mohit Sharma
title: Based on your past experience.
content: There are two situations If you moving from down then this product is good for you i.e. Now you are using Samsung,Oppo or Vivo Kind of product then you will love this product but in second situation which happened with is I moved on from JBL so it was very tough for me to accept this product.. Cons. Need balancing in music & bass & it should be angled because in every 15 minutes it comes out of the ear.. Furthee would like to say cost is ok. You should try once.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Go for it!
content: Been using it for 6 months extremely happy with the product. Sound quality is good and the base is powerful. I was so satisfied with the sound that I got a second one. Unlike other earphones the inner wire is strong and doesn't break easily. It also comes with various earpieces to customize according to your need. Worth every penny!

name: Amazon Customer
title: Don't buy !! Worst Product with Worst Customer Services
content: I bought this product last year ( Oct 2020). After few days I found the speaker for right year stopped working without any physical damage. Then after few days the whole earphone stopped working.. As it was within warranty period I wrote several mails but they didn't even bother to put response.. So bad experience with Boat.. Don't buy !! I repeat, Don't buy anything from Boat.

name: Sagar k
title: This boat will sail long enough...
content: Are u looking for powerfull bass, well this is the best choice to have. Quality of product 5stars, durability 5stars, sound 5stars. These earphones are powerful and with deep bass. Earpiece material is solid and fitting is perfect. Tangle free cable and rough tuff usable...

name: Kapil
title: Worst earphones ever
content: Do not buy these earphones totally waste of money and big fraud is they will not return it. No bass no proper sound, noise cancellation is 0. I mean nothing is there in these earphones, if you want to waste your money you can purchase otherwise go with someone else. Thanks

name: Eye roll emoji
title: They keep falling off.
content: Decent/average earphones in the price range. The MOST annoying thing is that the earplugs are heavy, and they keep falling off. I've already tried changing the in-ear buds but still they keep slipping out of ear and falling due to the weight.

name: Maitri
title: Decent buy  for its price with good sound quality.
content: This earphone are durable and the sound quality is also good. They lasted me for around a year and keeping in mind the price I had to pay, it was a good buy. They are not completely tangle free but are much, much better than the regular wired earphones.

name: disha
title: The earbuds keep falling off, sound quality is spot on
content: The sound quality, the bass is the best you will get especially for this price not None of the earbuds including the extra fit comfortably for me so they kept falling out of the ears which has never happ with any brand. Using my old ones instead.

name: Saidu Buhari
title: Very Durable earphone
content: This earphone is highly durable compared to the other brands. They feel rigid and strong. The sound quality is better than average, but nothing great [ It is cheap compared to others]. It is not very comfortable to wear owing to its shape and size during a physical fitness session, but good for regular use. Overall, it is value for money.

name: RAKESH SINGH
title: Overall Very Good earphone..in this price range
content: बहुत ही अच्छी क्वालिटी का ईयरफोन है, मैं ऑडियो एक्सेसरीज के लिए boat को ही पसंद करता हूं... इस ईयरफोन के साथ में एक स्पेशल ये था कि इसमें डिफरेंट साइज के इयरबड्स थे वो भी 4 जोड़ी और भी उस से रिलेटेड items थे, जैसा कि मैंने फोटो में भी अपलोड किया है. और ये सब आता है 1 साल की वॉरिंटी के साथ में.. और मुझे सिर्फ 340/- रूपये में मिला अभी ये लगभग 65% ऑफ था... थैंक्स Amazon and boat.

name: Rabi
title: Not good for ear it can destroy your nerves
content: Not a comfortable product at all.. Its not fitting in the ear and it hurts. Too much bass almost causing pain in the ear. Just for a call you can use not for music it create headache

name: Aniket Ashok Tambe
title: Good Quality Earphone
content: I liked the sound quality. It's also durable product. The only thing I didn't like is that the earplugs are not properly fitting and are not comfortable and also the weight of earbuds is much more. I replaced the 'in ear' part with the one I had from Samsung headphones... I am updating this review almost after 2 years. There is not damage to the earphones after 2 years and it has the same clarity for both audio and microphone.

name: Vijay Kumar
title: Very bad quality; please avoid!
content: The worst pair i have bought so far; the ear plugs are of very bad quality; they just dont sit/stick in the ear; it is not a size issue; the problem is with the quality of rubber used to make the ear plugs. I will never buy BOAT again; lost confidence in them.

name: Vishal Gaikwad
title: Brilliant for the money! It's a steal, go steal it!
content: Got it for 399, I'm an audiophile. And this is it, it's a beast. I'd happily pay 500 also. Tangle free, and ear buds don't fall from the ear unless you wear the right sized buds. I'm listening to music as I write this, so I have a 6T and I have my own settings for the equaliser. This is the trick to achieve max performance from this. Funny call of duty mobile released today, and I was able to hear everything perfectly. Worth every rupee, just take good care of it and don't rough use it.

name: Raktim
title: Defective mic
content: The one I received had a bad mic. It made a electronic buzzing sound whenever the device it was connected to was charged. So basically you cannot use this earphone while charging your phone.. And I tested this with other earphones and with different phones and laptops. So it is definitely the mic which is defective

name: Gautham Mohan
title: I'd even say brilliant
content: That's a lot of stuff to come with a below 500 rupee headphone. I can't really comment on the durability in a day, but that is possibly the only area where it could do poorly other than the virtually poor quality of the materials used.. The sound quality is bloody decent at that price too. For someone who just downgraded to cheaper use and throw earphones 'coz even the costlier ones don't seem to last, this is a huge positive surprise.

name: Nitish Shinde
title: Better for long use...
content: Best ever earphones i ve been using since last 4yrs.... It never gave any complaints no technical issues... I m buying it 3rd time same product... Battery consumption is also less....

name: Priya Mehra
title: Value for money : Satisfied
content: Kind of worth a buy! All good except for the different color of the extra rubber covering but it doesn't matter that much! Also, it doesn't give me good fit even after changing the rubber thing... I anyway needed it for a different purpose which is being served so I'm happy with this at this price!

name: Parthivi
title: It's Still working after 3 Years
content: I'm not sure if you guys will believe it or not, but my Boat Earphones has been working for the past 3 years. I bought this on 10th May, 2017. It's 23rd January today. After 30 months its still working great. Hats off to its durability.

name: Anil Anthony
title: Great pair
content: This is 4th time I'm purchasing the same earphone. I always purchase one of these and my friends take it from me. The sound is extraordinary. This is best at this price point. If you can put in a little more you could go for seinhiser pair. Both are equally good though

name: Karan Atreya
title: good product
content: good product as per description, sound quality good, but there is no volume adjustment in the earphone itself, also there is no mute option, overall good product, price is on higher side

name: gaurav kriplani
title: One of the best earphones in 500rs. You would never think twice why have you bought this thing.
content: One of the best product in this price segment, easily usable, comes with extra earbuds if in case you have misplaced or lost you can use other 4 pairs. Works like a jam , it has been more than 8 months now, but still the product is same as new.. Depends on your usage too, but for me this is the best in 500rs. As compared to JBL or any other brand you are thinking of using, comes with 1 year warranty. Same as pictures are shown.

name: Imran
title: Uncomfortable in ears and long size of wire
content: Have been using this product since for quite few months. Every use of the product reminds me to write a review.. the ear buds are big and doesn't fit correctly. prolong use causes pain. the length is so long that the microphone attached to the wire gets located near chest. this makes you to hold the mic (really discomfort).. I would not buy this product again. poor quality of build.. thanks

name: SIVASURYARAJ
title: developed defect
content: I don't wanna give a single star, when the product is dead already...Initially the product was good. No issues., But after 45 days usage, one side of headphone stopped functioning.. And it started to give shock too., But we can't return.. As i know that,, i can't return anymore, i'm giving this negative comment not to remedy myself, but to help others to choose wisely.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Glad I bought boAt Basshead 225 (not 220)
content: The economical and best in it's compared price range with other products. Ya bass is high but doesn't dominant completely over lyrics part. You can still listen the vocals part quite comfortably. You don't have to too much worry about unclear or mixed sound vocals because even I worried about it before buying it but now I am glad that I bought it. The best part about it is that I can listen even a slight Change in background music which we can not recognise in normal earphones and even in those good earphones which are available in this range. (Note- buy boAt Basshead 225 not 220.)

name: yeshwanth om
title: Dont buy this!
content: Sound quality is good but goes on and off . One of the year pods won't work alternatively. Tried exchanging as well, but next one also has the same problem. There is no microphone option or there is no volume button/fwd or rewind button on the wire. Not handy at all... Not worth the money.

name: Shayantan's Tech
title: Don't purchase the product
content: Dobt buy this.... It looks tempting but its not worth. First product stopped working within one day, right earphone was not working. I got it replaced. Thank you Amazon. I love u. But again the replacement product was not working properly.

name: Vishal J.
title: Bass Rich & Value-for-money
content: Have to be honest, the name of the company didn't really inspire much confidence but, I took a chance going by the overwhelming positive reviews and they're bass rich & totally value for money. I highly recommend them #ThumbsUp

name: Pranadeep
title: Expected more than what I am experiencing
content: Sound quality is decent, this is definitely not bass heavy. Mic performance is good while taking calls when driving. Quality needs a lot to be desired. Within a month my earphones right speaker stops working, I need to keep adjusting the headphone jack so it starts working and then again it stops working, so quality not that great.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Five Stars
content: The bass on these are awesome. The highs and the mids are well produced, may it be a podcast or EDM music, these are decently rich and loud. You'll enjoy using these. Great audio quality, I only realized that after buying a few other more expensive headphones. The sound quality on these are similar to those that cost well above 1000 INR. Very good headphones in short. A Must Buy.

name: Dr Sandeep Radhakrishnan
title: Best headphone 4.5/5
content: Very good headphones in this price range.. i will tick all box 5 star but why i put 4 star overall is only becoz of its heaviness which we feel while using it in ear.. felt bit fatigue after long continous usage.. but quality wise its worth it.. Most importantly i should say its durability is very good.. rough and tough.. buy suggestion in 4.5 out of 5

name: Debasis Roy
title: Best product at affordable price
content: It's my first product from boat & I'm really amazed at the sound quality provided by the earphone at this affordable price. It has good thumping bass which feels nice to the ears when hearing dance number with good beats. Treble is also good, but not as good as the bass, still I'm more than satisfied with the sound quality. The build quality is at its best with polished metal earpieces & L-shaped jack. Though it feels slightly heavy on the ears, still it's ok. It's recommended to choose the right pair of earbuds according to your comfortness, otherwise earphones will get out of your ears. Mic works fine. The cord is flat & tangle free - that's another big advantage!

name: Anuj Singh
title: Great sound... Good noice cancellation!
content: I really loved the sound... Good noice cancellation at this price range.... At first I was given the defective product but it was exchanged the very next day so I'm glad..... Also this one works completely fine... I love it!!

name: RAHUL PANDEY
title: Good product with average bass
content: Recived products on 499/- but still think that price was bit more as per it's quality.. Strong and durable wire but bass is bit Higher than average. Also due to metal earbuds , some time it feels heavy in your ear

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not really comfortable
content: I bought these based on reviews and also because I thought the flat cable will be easy to handle and will not entangle.. While the sound quality is ok , the earphones on the whole are not comfortable. The length of the cable is longer than required. And the overall weight of the earphones is more making them uncomfortable.. Too late to return but these will just lie in my drawer as emergency headphones if the regular ones not there.

name: Abhijit Prusty
title: Loving it
content: Honestly the sound is amazing and once you add it to your ear and you are addicted.looks anazing and roboust.. It would have been great it would have given a case to keep the ear phones.. There is one small ifnorable issue is that it somestimes comes out of your ear never the less it still awesome product and i am loving it

name: muneez s.
title: Dosent look like a proper genuine product
content: When i got the product the packing look weird it looked like a local box just as size of my fist and the pack contains several items like 5 sets of ear buds, a pair of ear holder and a clip, the colour i opted was neon lime so got a fancy ear bud related to that colour but it dosent fit at all the hole is so small. first i played the right side ear phones sound was cracking and intal time i want to adjust the plug to get both of them working, its the first time i am using the product of boAt but it handled like a local earphones that we get from store. Anyway the sound is loud and have better bass. Neon lime colour gets dirty quickly

name: Arunava Karmakar
title: Money wasting
content: Don't buy this.I bought these in November 2020 but it is Jan 2021 and it stop working.First one ear side got pause and then the second one .It is really shameful from such a company. And I don't used it for hard job,I carefully used and after using I placed it on the same place.But it doesn't work.Waste of my money.

name: Loganathan
title: 👎👎👎Worst product👎👎👎
content: Worst product... Don't ever buy it... At first all was OK... But after 15 days of usage the product shows it true color... 🤜👎👎👎 Whenever I touch or insert the earphone the sound automatically increases or decreases and Video paused automatically and also I hv bn hearing some weird sound whenever I hear song... 👎👎👎I don't recommend the product go for Sony extra bass, price bit high, but worth it

name: Koshal Kamboj
title: Budget Competitor of SENNHEISER CX180 😃
content: Earlier i used SENNHEISER CX180 for 3years after that it was damaged....i was going for same earphone again...but after thinked for another one...then thought about this BOAT earphone after reading good reviews...All is good with this earphone...am happy as same Sennheiser it's giving good clarity...minor issue with noise cancellation...but that's okay with this budget.

name: Mann
title: Having trouble in some aspects
content: I bought these product fro every use but these earphones are good in sound and bass but they didnt meet my expectations in all aspects these earphones mic has alot of problem another person on call is unable to listen us so i recommend jbl becaus i am jbls user first time i thought of moving to other brand and it fails to meet my expectations.

name: Shreya
title: Disappointing!
content: Never buy this product or any Boat product for that matter. I replaced this product twice and the second replacement spoilt within 15 days. The replacement took almost 20 days when applied online. And the service center in Mumbai is really pathetic. It’s located in a building with pathetic infrastructure and the service center looks like a godown rather than a service center. Very bad experience with the product and after sales service.

name: Mary Manjusree Nath
title: Very happy with the Boat basshead earphone!
content: I am totally satisfied with the product. But only one thing I found a bit problematic is that there are some attachments with the extra ear plugs which I cannot figure out how to attach or use. The ear plugs keep falling out of the ears but I know there is an attachment provided but dont know how to fit it. It would be helpful if a picture or step by step instructions would be provided along with the earphone. Thank you. 😊

name: Naresh
title: Buy it for its Durability wow!
content: pros. *Build quality is excellent u can use rough & tough no problem. *angled 3.5mm jack useful for many mobile gamers. *Bass is just okay. Cons-. *Biggest disappointment is BASS is not up to mark, it's just average, because of the name "bass heads" we customers expect heavy bass from the earphone, but that's not the case, just ok bass coming from earphone.

title: Music + Gaming .
content: I would say it is perfect for budget Gaming and Music !. I use it myself for Gaming as well as Music . I spend most of my time on PC so .. yeah if you want a budget earphone for music + gaming it's really good .. MIC QUALITY IS SUPERB TOO ! My teammates haven't called it a cancer mic yet so 😂 .

name: vishesh reddy
title: Great product for the prize range!
content: Amazing product! Worth its cost, and I don't think there's no other product that's as good as this one for the price range!. Great music quality, mostly Bass-oriented, but still good!. Lasts long, although I've seen my friends get their earphones exchanged becoz the left ear pod stopped working!. All-round, a great product!

name: Muhammed Basil
title: Amazing product (Boat)
content: You know something ... you can understand its cheapest one earphone, because I bought this one for Rs 500... Its worth quality sound... Amazing build quality. Good bass... And there 3 pair of earbuds you can find one those buds you comfortable. And this is Important. *I bought this earphone 6 month ago (june 18). But it got a problem with jack because of me there got a damage one side is not working.. so you know this has 1 year warranty... So I jus complained in Boat service center....
