They pickup (after 7 month) and they gave me new one.. I'm so exited... So you must be understand Boat has good service and they have quality customer care... you I'm sure there you will 100 % satisfy with this product

name: awnish
title: Worst or best?? Confused!!!
content: Sound quality is awesomest but the major problem is its made, its very uncomfortable to wear comparing it with MULO and Mi But it has extra marks for audio quality but but whats the benefit of awesome sound quality when you cannot wear it pain, irritation. Please boat design a better one ergonomic one

name: Arshad K.
title: Awesome Earphones.. But if you have cats, keep them away from it
content: 7 out of 5 stars. 5 stars by me. 2 stars by my cat. This earphone is loved by everyone... I love it's sound, build quality, etc... And my cats love the taste of its wire.. They just love to bite this earphones wire more than their food.

name: anubhaw
title: Earphone Mic button issue 1st day of use/delivery
content: I received this product BOAT Bass 225cc on 25th May 2020 and started using this on same day. Disappointingly its mic button is not working from the very start of its use. Recently I have bought a few headphones from Amazon in last one year, I am Sorry to say this but all the headphone have some issue after a few months of its use, now I have started having doubt that are they real or duplicate.

name: N Roy
title: Honest Review after 9 months of usage
content: Everything is good. but one main problem is that sometimes the earpiece stops working(thats what i disliked the most). I requested for replacement 3 or 4 months(it worked smoothly) but today i requested for second time(lets see if this i can get the good product). Honestly the Replacment process is too easy(i dont know why many peoples write a negative feedback about the warranty policy) if your product covers the warranty then sure you will get an replacment. Lastly i want to say(dont listen to other feedback),just go for it and use the product once.. Dont forget to register your new product. Thank you.

name: Dr. Amanpreet Kaur
title: Go for it !!! good gift too
content: Its been continuous 2 months since i am using these earphones. I say yes these are Tangle free, ultimate voice quality, yes do cancel exterior noise .I am continue listener of 4 to 5 hours a day and I don't feel headache or irritation while using them I suggest you to buy them I have purchased even one more similar for my brother .I also recommend to gift your friends and relatives . economical and worthy buying . I am happy buyer

name: snehasish p.
title: Great product for this price range
content: This pair is surprisingly high quality for this price range, although a little bass heavy(that is why it's called basshead series). The sound quality is great. The tangle free cable is good. And it's built like a tank (i had stepped on it two times). The l shaped connector is a nice feature too. The only small con is that it feels a little bulky for first few days, then you will adjust to it, and the ear hooks are not at all comfortable, so i prefer to use it without them. It has been 1.5 years i've been using it and it's still great.

name: Subhan Biswas
title: Decent earphones...
content: First thing I would say it's not comfortable to wear. After 30 minutes you feel pain in your ears. Sound quality is decent not very punchy. But the build quality is nice and metal earbuds. It's a average model from boat.

name: Raj
title: Worst model among boat products
content: Worst model among boat products.. Doesnt properly fit in ears while walking and talking over phone even after changing all the attachment sized buds.. Other models of boat which are less expensive than this model are pretty good with design and fit for the ear.. this one is flop model. I bought 3 pieces to gift it to my friends.. everyone has got similar complains.. Usability untested probably. Didnt expect such products from Boat

name: Pranay
title: Just find something better than this.
content: * worst service u can see in ur lifetime, My headphones stopped working twice in 6 months, as I claim warranty for replacement it took more than 40 days (my unit of replacement still not received it will take 10 more days I guess while I m writing this review).. * sound not so impressive local headphones worth 120Rs gives better sound.. * One side of my headphone stop working every 3 month (I use them with extra care but STILL🤦🏻‍♂️)

name: Aditya
title: Product Review - Boat bass heads 225
content: First of all I would like to thank Amazon team who has delivered product within 30 hour of order. You guys are doing such a great job. Product is really amazing with super extra bass, gold plated Jack, one button mic, tangle free wire and it's looks very trendy though. There is extra earbuds in the box and product material is excellent. Overall worth of money. Suggest prime users to try Atleast once then u will get to know about product excellence.

name: Nikita
title: Fraud warranty
content: I just dislike the policy of warranty given by them as they say 1 year, it's all Fraud because if u are getting any problem they just pick it up immediately but then never reply to ur emails becoz there is no any other means to connect them.. Their customer care number also doesn't work in the working hours and in remaining time u have to heard only 1 automated message that please call in working hours..... Never buy guys...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Product is good. Everything is good from bass to treble to ...
content: Product is good. Everything is good from bass to treble to mids. The only problem is the sound clarity. It lacks that crispiness of the sound. But why i am telling you about sound clarity under just 550, because boat claim you will feel the nirvana once you start listening but there is nothing like that.. NOTE:- I used poweramp music player on my phone. I gave this review on the basis of that.

name: Dr. Divij Joshi
title: Buy it blindly
content: I prefer earphones that don't tangle. Having said so, due to its flat wire cords they hardly do tangle, if they do. The quality of music is nice and has a nice fit to the ear for precise music experience, so much so that at times I have to pull them out coz of the strong suction.

name: shambhavi
title: You having a second thought???? Just don't think twice. Go for it .
content: In all the products at this range this product is best. It offers you the best sound quality, best cable quality. Totally satisfied after buying these. Go for it without a second thought. If you are scared to buy any new brand or earphones to for the safest side and buy these.. Just don't expect a higher priced product quality from these. They do justice for the price.

name: Mohammed Aslam
title: Appears sturdy and durable. Sounds great.
content: boAt BassHeads 225 looks good, works good. Comes in a compact pack, delivered on time by Amazon. It has an inbuilt mic 🎤, the cable is flat, less likely to get tangled. Sounds Good. Bass best in range. Noise cancellation could be a little better. You get some extra earbuds which is very thoughtful.

name: Verified User
title: Decent earphones under ₹500
content: Bass is very strong but lacks clarity like skullcandy, jbl or sennheiser that I have used in the past. Not recommended for people who hear songs passionately or for enjoyment.. Though it comes with different size earbuds inside, it still cannot help you from the pain these earphones cause in long hours pf listening. Although if you want budget earphones with strong bass and your listening hours are short than go ahead with these. But there are better options available in the market in the same price range.

name: KJ
title: Good product. Does the job
content: Good product.. Good build quality.. Good sound quality.. Bass is good, not best. Clarity of the sound is really nice.. Really loud. So better to use with lowering the volume.. Adds some weight to the earpiece.

name: Abhi
title: Product is awesome
content: Build quality is very good.Not get broken from jack which is the biggest problem but here it is resolved with its buid quality.Also superb bass..best for gamers and those who listen loud music.. Only one demeri- ear bud is not comfortable and also gets down due to its weight.if make it lighter will be fine enough.. Worth buying this product.

name: Walkwithbook
title: Stopped working after 5 months
content: Left side of the earphone stopped working after 5 months of use. Also, the service centers available are very limited to avail warranty of the product. So warranty is also pretty much useless.

name: Rakes Pal
title: Stop working within 3month but get a new product on return
content: Sound quality was good and it doesnt hard in ears on full volume. But after 3months one side stop working. But good thing is, return policy of boat is very good. I got a new headphone within one month. Only thing they required, on the time of return is the original box of the product. So please keep box safe for one year.

name: soumya
title: Sound quality is quite good given the price tag
content: Sound quality is quite good given the price tag.quality of platics used may go down with some people but with this price no one should expect seinheiser or jbl quality. Bass quality is good enough but not as good as seinheiser , but it's ok ok. Mic does not seems to impress as person on other side might find it difficult to hear you sometimes. Overall this is a nice product for the given mrp. Happy music👍

name: Bhavesh Kharbanda
title: Not durable, heavy earplugs, decent sound quality but need extra care
content: Within 6 months of rather responsible use of the earphones, one of the earplugs has stopped working without any physical damage and the softcover on the speaker somehow detaching from the speaker. This followed it beginning to create sparks and that would cause mild electric spark-pains on the ear. It eventually stopped working. Could not trace back any reasons for malfunction and there is, ofcourse no international coverage. Stuck with a single working earphone before the warranty will run out.

name: Rakesh Rajak
title: WORST PRODUCT EVER
content: I recently bought this product from amazon and it has stopped working since 2 days which is unacceptable from BOAT.. - Mike is not working. - Automatically disconnect with the device. STRSONGLY RECOMMENDING NOT TO BUY THIS PRODUCT, JUST WASTED MY MONEY

name: Sneh Pradhan
title: Extra ear buds don't fit !!!
content: Decent earphone . My earlier boat basshead 225 's earbuds were coming out after using around 2 years . So bought this one . Sound quality is exactly the same as old one . But the extra ear buds they give don't fit the earphone at all . Cheating !!!

name: Vivek Singh
title: BOAT - SOUND WITH CRISPY 🤩 & CLEAR🔥
content: The Boat basshead 225 was Amazing With This Price tag Even Many Other Earphones 🎧 Available in This Price segment But Not One Beat This Soundbeast 🔥 Earphone Of Boat ..😍. Overall The Sound Quality Is Crispy & Clearly And Bass Was Amazing 👌 With 10MM Drivers & I'll Buy This Product in Amazon Sell So I'll Get In Little Bit Discount Compared to Regular Price So I'll Suggest You This Earphone 🤩 Best In Class 🔥👌

name: Nelson Teron
title: Good sound for the price but can't say about the durability.
content: Right side of the earphone stopped working only after a month of using it. Got it on August 1 and it stopped working on September 15.. For the price the sound quality is good. Noise cancellation works well and the quality of the bass is okay, but left to desired. I'd let it pass considering the price.. If you want comfortable earphone this is not for you. If you're traveling or using the earphone for a long period of time, you'll feel your ear hurting which is not good.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Very good
content: Durable product with a good sound quality. I used this all weekends while traveling in bus, for the last 1.5 years and it lasted without any issue. But the headphone backside protrude a little outside, causing discomfort while sleeping sidesise :)

name: Vishwanath B.
title: Earbuds lacks the grip.
content: No doubt the earphone is absolutely good with a high bass and also the great quality of wire, but lacks the ability to sustain for longer period. And moreover the buds won't stick within your ears, they tend to come out as soon as you put them into your ears. The ear buds lack the grip to settle within your ears and are not at all comfortable wearing at any time.

name: Siddharth
title: Worth every penny
content: I had this same model and used for 4 years without any issue or problems, but unfortunately it got lost, So purchased again and using with OnePlus 7t. Sound quality is superb and bass is awesome... Better than JBL and other brands

name: PankajHD
title: Good sound quality..
content: The sound quality is good (not great). The reason I am giving it a 3 star is the fact that these are a little heavy and therefore keep falling off the ear on doing minimal movements like walking even when the smallest ear bud is used. Not returning as I need it primarily for my desk related work.

name: Girish
title: Value for money with good sound quality
content: Nice sound quality. Material quality is good with the tangle free flat ribbon design. Three pairs of soft ear plugs are supplied that are nice and comfortable and effectively cut out outside noise for very good listening experience. The bass and treble output is commendable.

name: Rakesh
title: Boat Bassheads reality Check
content: If you are a lover of true vocals then don't go for it I repeat. It's only made for bass lovers. Quality wise it's really good . I am little disappointed bcz I am a true lover of the vocals. Mids are good but highs are little loud and not that clear. There is a little bit fitting issues.. One more thing I want to add that up to 70% volume the bass feels nice and after that it became lower and the vocals are also not clear just loud music is there. Best of luck Boat. It's my genuine review guys and it's 100% true.

name: Dikip
title: Very nice earphone with Good bass and mic sensitivity
content: Very nice earphone with Good bass and mic sensitivity. If I compared with sony mdrx extra bassheadphone sony much better .but sony price is 4 times.price to performance ratio points of view this headphone is excellent

name: Harikrishnan K
title: Wasted 600 Rs
content: Wasted 600 Rs.. Consider a 50 Rs footpath quality headset.. What Will it be like if it have great bass?. That is boad basshead!!. Its worst!. Voice & instrument sounds terrific to hear.. Buy any other.. Don't fall in high ratings or looks... Its worst

name: Rohit Dutta Mazumder
title: Don't go for the bass..
content: It is not a bad earphone. Infact it is bettr than most of the competition in this price range. It does what it says, it delivers bass, but what good is bass if you don't have clear mids and highs. The audio is totally bass inclined. I had this for one day and then i returned it, only because it lacked clarity. Also, the buds are too big to fit in the canal properly, I couldn't even use it for an hour completely and my ears started to ache. I would suggest to check Audio Technica ATH-CLR100 and compare to it before buying.

name: Bharat
title: Build quality better than jbl. Sound quality,  not so much.
content: I own JBL Cs 150 and this boat headphones.. Boat headphones are louder but sound is not clear as jbl. It is kind of muffled where distinction between music and vocal is not as rich as JBl.. build quality is much better than JBL

name: debarghya bagchi
title: Not better than cx180
content: Decent headphones, very sturdy. I am using it for few months and overall Ok. Flat wires means less tangled, which is major plus point.. Regarding sound quality, if u have used cx180 then you will never prefer this one. I basically choose this for the flat wires only as my last cx180 got damaged

name: Priyank Gautam
title: Best earphones In this price, Priyank Gautam
content: Amazing sound quality 😍, bass is too much amazing, punching sound quality, 10mm drivers are in these earphone. And the Buds made of metal and its create Amazing na crystal clear sound. Vocals clear, mic work amazing, bass is super amazing, Very comfortable feel in ear, when you put them in your ear forget about everything ,, only feel the beat , music .. I really say ,. Plug into Nirvana 😍😍

name: Shashwat
title: A budget friendly earphone
content: I have been using these earphone for about a month, and I would like to say that sound quality is pretty good. The only niche I found in these earphone is that your ear starts hurting after some time. One more thing I would like to say that you cannot sleep or rest on your head wearing these earphone as they hurt on pressing from something.. Other from all of these I can say that if your budget is a little tight than you can buy these.

name: Swarnava Banerjee
title: Best earphones with BASS in budget
content: The BASS QUALITY is AWESOME!!!!!!!!!. When I first wanted to buy the BOAT BASSHEADS 225, I checked the reviews on this product..... IT WAS AWFUL.... Most of them were critical. I watched the product unboxing and review on YOUTUBE...... And at last, I bought it........ 🔥BELIEVE ME IT’S WONDERFUL 🔥. I just wanted to acknowledge the person who is reading 📖 it...... JUST IGNORE & BUY IT

name: Rajesh sutradhar
title: Superb deal
content: Premium quality earphone .. I have used JBL sony earphone which cost a lot. But in 500rs/ this earphone is beast. Fully satisfied. I will recommend this product to every one, awesome bass, awesome sound quality. And last but not the least microphone works very smooth..

name: Santosh Chakraborty
title: don't consider the warranty factor.
content: I purchased three pairs of this earphone but and all worked fine but one pair suddenly stop working So I tried to contact the company because it under warranty but you will never able to contact them but over all in 550₹ its a good deal among the other earphone but don't consider that the warranty.

name: Joshua
title: Value for money.
content: After using it a couple of months I dislike the bass. Although considering the price its okay you can't expect bass of 2k 3k earphones.. The placement of mic is also a problem for me I have to increase my voice so that the other person can hear me or with one hand keep the mic near my mouth.. The 3rd problem is buds keep coming out it is very annoying.. Other than above rest is great like Build quality, Metal heads, L-shaped jack, Sound quality.

name: Koushik Chakraborty
title: Exactly same as described there..
content: Sound quality is awesome .bass is extreme.. Treble is also good..but I think you will find it harder to choose the right size of the ear buds because they have provided 6 pairs of ear buds and 1 pair of ear grippers and a clip.. I would definitely recommend you to buy this product and you will get 1 year warranty also.. Thank you.

name: Shagun Tripathi
title: Quality product by BOAT. want earphone with awsm bass n in range? GO FOR THIS..
content: A quality product by BOAT. Truely A. Wowsome.GOT This for 342 n would definitely say, the bestest earphone ever in this price or in499 in this only. Super. Bass. Super sound quality. If you want an earphone that has good bass and is affordable then go for this.

name: Thanmay ,Mangalore
title: Love it!
content: The best earphones I've used till now.. Performance+Quality to Price ratio = 5:1. Edit: Have bought some other earphones now. I feel the bass kind of overpowers the mid and highs. Too much bass I feel. But I'm sure many love more bass.

name: Sonu Garnaik
title: Worked only for few days
content: Just 20 days and one side is not working any more, sound quality is very good (not the best), bass quality is pretty good as well but yeah one side just stopped and by reading some other reviews it seems like few more are having the same issue as well.. Update:. Applied for a repair/replacement & overall it took around 20 days for getting a replacement after verification. Working fine for now atleast!

name: Machu
title: One of the best decisions I've ever made.
content: My review is after using this product after some months.. Advantages:. 1) Quality is up to the mark.. 2) Good bass. 3) Wires are tangle free. 4) Ear buds with different sizes (Check in my photo). 5) Metal parts add a good design and style. Disadvantages:. The only disadvantage I believe is that due to the metal parts, earbuds jump out of ears when u move.. Solution: They have provided a Arc shaped attachment which can be attached to the earbuds and wear it comfortably while physically active, so it doesn't jump out of your ears easily.. Just go for it guys.. U will never regret after the purchase.... BoAt just rocks..!!!

name: DHAVAL VAGHELA
title: Great Quality
content: Its Really Great Product.... 1. Sound Quality - Awesome. 2. Bass - Great. 3. Build Quality - Perfect. 4. Tangled Free - Yes. Due to metal build for some people it might be little heavy feel in ear but apart from this Its Perfect

name: VS
title: Below average high priced
content: Not a great product as per price. Also price is not competitive to other ecommerce places. I have bought exactly same one in INR 399/- from Myntra. Ear piece are very heavy. Ear starts paining after long usage. Flat wire cable is good but heavy in weight. An average product. I have been using this for last one week.

name: Nirmal Kumar Pathak
title: Good Product Go For It
content: After 9 Month I'm here to review this. I'm Super Satisfied with this Product & Truly appreciate the Build Quality of this Product Go For It If Your. Budget = 500 .. & If U Need Neckband Then Go For ptron Blutooth Neckband. But I'm Advice U Take this headphone because it's good for everything Just don't Drop in Water.

name: Priyanko R.
title: No noise cancellation at all
content: There is no sign of noise cancellation, rather it makes so much noise. The mic pic is not as good as assured.. For working out it is good for me, but not good for that person with whom I'm suppose to talk over a phone call, he/she hears a lot of noise of vehicles. Even I move my head from left to right or stand up or sit down , it makes a noise like the clap of thunder. This all noises are audible not to you but to the fellow person, with whom you suppose to talk over phone call. So that's the main problem.. Apart from that, the sound quality is too good and the bass is just awesome.

name: Vatsal Naik
title: Not Ergonomic for everyone !
content: The built is nice, sturdy and the criss-cross effect gives a good grip but it's just not comfortable for everyone . The fit is not proper, the earphones come out of the ear many times and you have to use ear tips to properly fit it in your ear. Very irritating. The sound quality is good not so great. There is bass you can feel it, its nice but i think it's not that clear. Overall : the design is not for all.

name: A correya
title: Product returned after service/ mic issue solved
content: Was a bit concerned about getting the earphones back after service as it took more than 2 weeks. I got it under warranty. Thank you distributors.. Sound quality is good. For people who complain about the headphones falling of from the ear. Choose buds of your ear size as it available with the package. And you can put it yourself.

name: Rajan slathia
title: Now awesome...hope will remain same aftrr months
content: I love this product. I had bought skullcandy 2 times @cost above rs1000 that was just rubbish though they provide 2 yrs warranty but trust me noone will bother if ur earphone is not working properly.. About this product, this is awesome. Perfect blend of everything. You will get 6 earbuds for your comfort. Hope this will work good for some long time.

name: Hemanth Vungarala
title: Sturdy built but not the most comfortable eat phones set.
content: I have the problem if pin not getting seated properly in my MI phone. Very tough and sturdily built. The ear bus are slightly lengthy. Over all good for rough and tough use but not very comfortable when you are sleeping or wearing then under a helmet.

name: Hongsha
title: Great product.
content: It has decent looks. It might be a little uncomfortable as it tends to fall if you don't push it inside your ear abit further, but the sound quality is excellent. I loved it so much that I bought 3(black, forest green and blue). So go for it, it will never disappoint you.

name: Trapti Rai
title: Will get spoilt in 6 months even on using with utmost care
content: The bass is good for the price point of the product but the earphones get spoilt within 6 months. Have used 2 different headphones and earphones both got spoilt with 6 months.. There are barely any service centers to get them repaired as well. So its not worth it.. Rather invest a little more in good earphones which last long and have better service.

name: Mohd Abdullah Khan
title: Great Sound | Poor Quality Built
content: The only thing great about this headphone is Sound Quality and Bass.. BUT the built quality is poor.. Bought these in the year 2017 and it only lasted 10months on average usage. One side headphone was dead and the mic button wasn't working .

name: Amazon Customer
title: In 5 months one side went bad and boAt was not responding to service request
content: I purchased this product on Amazon in January. By early June, one side stopped working. The quality of sound and bass is good.. I raised a complaint with BoAt ( complain number 414983). I was told that someone will pickup the piece in 12-15 days. Many weeks have gone-by. When I call on the helpline, +91-2249461882, no one is available to pick the call.. DO NOT BUY FROM BOAT!!!

name: Shivani Karun
title: Very Uncomfortable/ Do not buy
content: I bought these earphones on the 26th of May and after 20 days the mic stopped working. this is the most uncomfortable earphones ever. the cable is flat and uncomfortable. the sound quality is ok nothing special. I'm having an issue with the warranty service. Do not buy these, go for something else.

name: JUGAL MISTRY
title: Value for money with premium looks
content: After 1 week use:. 1. Sound quality good. Though not an expert to judge.. 2. Flat cable helpful in avoiding tangling.. 3. Connector comfortably plugs in audio jack and the 90° bend helpful while hands-on with phone in pocket.. 4. Earphone plugins have metal finish and look durable.. 5. The metallic greenish colour shade gives it a premium look.

name: Anuj P
title: It's good, but weird!
content: Bassheads 225 delivers in a way you don't expect it to. It cancels out the noise, BY BEING LOUD. And when it's loud, you kinda don't feel the bass being delivered anymore.. Value for money - nah! I've heard better in the similar price segment. Try JBL sometime, you'll understand.. Also, DO NOT PURCHASE WHITE COLOUR, unless that's EXACTLY what you need. It's turned somewhat brown (I didn't roll in poop while using these, nor did I dump it in some) within 24 hours.

name: Muralidhar S
title: Stupid Design
content: The product not serving he purpose is a waste. Ear phones are made for ears and it does not sit with grip and falls very easily.. I recommend amazone to stop selling such products.. There is option to return or cancel order. Once purchased, money is simply lost.

name: Sruthi.K.P
title: Don't buy very poor sound quality
content: Do not recommend at all. Not worth of money. If you are a person. Who use it a lot for games movies don't buy it. Very poor sound quality. Like u get no dimension of sound. In games , pubg and also movies. It works fine just as in name of headset but very bad sound quality

name: Indrajit
title: Go for it
content: After almost 2 years of extensive usage I can conclude that it is definitely a badass, both in sound quality and bass. But the only drawback is that it's a bit heavy and sometimes come out of the ear if not pressed firmly. But somehow thats managable and it definitely deserves a complete 5 star rating.

name: Ruchi Srivastava
title: Not for edm lovers. Bassheads mazak hai
content: The material is great, durability is solid but the earbuds aren't comfortable. The problem is with the design, not the buds.. Plus when you compare these with the jbl c200 si, you will feel the difference of both, amount of bass and clearness of bass, they both are far better on the jbl one.. If bass is one of your priorities, these are absolutely not the ones for you, buy the jbl c200 si, you will be pretty satisfied with that product.

name: samir007
title: Design could've been better as earplugs come out very often from ear.
content: I have been using it for two months, everything is fine but i don't like it's design as earplugs are bit of loose. What i mean is that it's easily come out of my ear that's very annoying for someone who is traveling in bus. Also with a gentle pull it comes out of ear. Design could've been better.

name: Veena Manegar
title: I loved it😍😁
content: Must buy awesome sound effect.. I purchased 2 set.😁. If you are a music lover perfect for you just close your eyes and order it😍 I'm sure you also love it🎧🎶🎵❤️ n I think all colours awesome ❤️💚

name: Dhiraj
title: Nice sound quality, too heavy
content: Bought it at 499,. Good sound quality for price.. Not ideal for going for walk,. Its pretty heavy and easily falls from ear.. Sound degraded after 4-5 months.. One side earpiece stopped working after 8 months.

name: Harshit Kumar (Dahiya)
title: Sasti but full masti...
content: The Headline says it all. Bass heavy. Capable of achieving quite high volumes. The sound gets little distorted on high volumes.. The weight of earphones is on the heavier side for an earphone.. In my view, these are the best earphones in the Rs. 500-600 category. Don't think much, just buy them.

name: Ritu
title: Loved this earphone and was very much satisfied, used it for 2yrs
content: I loved this earphone and was very much satisfied as it was working fine until last week. Now I can't hear from both the sides. Purchased it in October 2017. It still falls under 1yr manufacturer guarantee warranty. Kindly help me out with the details/number to get it repaired or replaced. Appreciate the help.. The product was replaced and it worked fine for another year but again the same problem. Overall it worked for good 2 yrs combined.

name: Mohan
title: Do not buy unless you want to waste hard earned money!
content: WORST EARPHONES EVER !. Keeps falling off now and then, not at all comfortable. Sound quality is average. (JBL is way better. Non bias quote!).. Icing on the cake- make sure you invest ample time to search for the rubber ear plugs which keep falling off now and then.. Good job there boAt 👍🏻

name: mayank verma
title: The flat cable design makes them very flexible and doesn't tangle easily. The sound is very good and also doesn't ...
content: I have been using these earphones for 1 year now and I am still enjoying. The flat cable design makes them very flexible and doesn't tangle easily. The sound is very good and also doesn't hurt in ears. The Mic is also very responsive and positioned adequately close to the mouth. The cable length is sufficiently long to use it while keeping your phones in the pocket. Angled jack guards the jack and wire do not break form neck. Overall it is a quality earphone within a good budget.

name: Akshay
title: Good sound. Good product. the ear holder support can be better
content: Good sound. Good product. the ear holder support can be better. There are two ear holder support provided, in addition to the rubber ear buds. But the ear holder support is not comfortable and suits the purpose. When used, it gives irritation to the ears.

name: abhishek m.
title: Great build quality acceptably good sound
content: Nicely crafted product. Bass quality 10/10 but it got some chunky sound which is not good. But that can be adjusted with equaliser.. Volume output is great.. If you want crystal clear sound then invest more on other earphones. Otherwise it is same as Mi basic earphone with slightly good build quality.

name: Radh
title: Actually price is definitely not worth. But for Amazon price this is good
content: It's a not bad one but as opposed to the one I tried in the shops this one's mic is not as effective. One more issue since I use the earphones while riding, Make a squishy noise when inside the ear when I go over bumps. It's the ear bud rubbing with the metal inside this was something that I didn't encounter with my JBL. The ear hooks seem to be of no use but the number of ear buds in two colors at that is really good. A good one specially since it's flat wire I expect it to last much longer than my previous one.

name: Hardik
title: Worth for the price tag of 500/-
content: Boat is a evolving brand, well known for launching budget products with a good quality. The reason I preferred this product was Mic, tangle free wire and metallic finish. Looks really cool! I purchased this as my backup earphones for meetings.. The sound quality is not that superior to Sennheiser CX 275 I have, but it does the task its meant for.

name: Subanta
title: Good bass, terrible music quality
content: Terrible sound quality.. Awesome bass.. Good built quality.. I was using a sennheiser before this, the sound quality is terrible on boat. I'm going to use this for office meetings and calls, so it will do a good job. But there is a significant difference while listening to music.

name: Himanshu Singh
title: Product awesome customer service Worst of all ......
content: All of the above the boat bass heads is best for you if you are a song lover or a intense pubg player like me who don't want to ignore a single sound but the thing for which you should worry is it's warranty claim and customer service support bcz if by mistake also you send them for warranty claim then you should forget about it and buy another one bcz BOAT customer service is not good or I should say it's worst ......

name: Unicorn🦄
title: The best i just recommend you .❤❤
content: The best earphones and the sound and quality is the amazing thing. The sound is best and it comes with the spare earphone's spesker cover or the ear thing. I will tell this one is the best selection

name: Atul k.
title: Overall
content: Bahut badhiya h sound and built quality but wearing problem h kaan dard Karne lagta h lagane se 9din baad return kar Diya sound quality clear nahi tha distortion tha. Aur Chinese product hai

name: Anna.K
title: Poor quality.
content: Everything was okay at the time of purchase but one side went dead in just a couple of months. Didnt expect that it would stop working in such a small amount of time. Waste of money.

name: Rithik Shetty
title: Decent enough
content: The sound quality is good but not really impressed by its bass. The left side wire keeps falling off because of the mic on the left side. So buy only if you plan on sitting at one place and using it. Overall i can say its a decent product having used it for months now.

name: Amol
title: Product starts having issue exactly after 1 year warranty period
content: Product quality is good..But noticed 1 thing in boat products..I bought 2 of this model and 1 Bluetooth earphones..All started having some or other problems after completion of 1 year warranty period..Some genuine problem or issue..How come 3 products had issues exactly after 1 year completion ??? Either mic stops working or one of ear side stops working..not a coincidence for sure...

name: Javed Ashraf
title: Crap & Rubbish
content: One word, CRAP.. with just10 mins of use it gave me a headache.. Feels so heavyish and the sound is Rubbish.. i am a JBLCSI100 user with a use of approx 6hrs daily and with JBL i never felt any heaviness and the sound is just brilliant.. Go for JBL.. This Boat crap is expensive even if given for free.

name: Tushar Kanwal
title: For the price, can't complain.
content: The sound quality is decent in these, sometimes the highs can get a tad bit higher but that's just according to my preference. The bass quality is great would give it a 8.5/10 as I have noticed that at times the bass gets too OP and the audio quality starts getting muddy, but the bass is great you can feel the bass with these. The only "downside" I found was that these are a bit heavy so, they can't really stay in your ear, but fortunately boAt has provided us with the solution with the earfin which is included also, it's made of metal so it's good quality.

name: Nono
title: Sound is decent but the weight hurts your ear physically
content: i just got the product 3 days back. I was just looking for an earphone, dont care much about bass reviews imao. Sound and mic is okay and thats enough for me.. BUT. Its heavy lol. i wear like for 30mins-1hr and boy my ear starts hurting. not kidding. i saw a similar review before buying this just few days back and i ignored because i thought eh ! But apparently, its true lol.

name: Anupam Wad
title: Great at this price point
content: Great product at this price point, had never expected this kind of quality from a new company. The headphones are built really good, those have flat wires so rarely tangles and the golden 3.5 connector with the good built of headphone capsules give good range of bass and music

name: Amazon Customer
title: Awesome product in this price range
content: Sound quality,bass, noise cancellation superb!!. My days starts and ends with these earphones.. really loving its sound quality,build quality and length of the earphone is very good..

name: rishab gigoo
title: Not comfortable
content: Everything in this is good for the price but the major cons are. 1. If used for longer periods u ll feel pain in ears.. 2. It will come off if easily if u r moving.. Both cons r because of its design {long head} other then that it's good. Edit:- The more i am using it the more annoying it gets for me. What to do with sound quality if they are coming out of your ears all the time.

name: avik biswas
title: dont buy this...... l know it looks good...but....it might be a cause of headeak....🤔
content: not like ..#that...as all youtubers say........... one.of these ear phone bass is less than other........most probably the left one....!!😢. i have a #iball free ear phone......which have a better bass than this...... dont go for it.....

name: Roshan Kumar
title: One side was not working
content: Got it delivered on time. 1st day - It worked fine on my LG G5 phone and I was happy with this purchase. 2nd day - I connected with my HP Laptop and all of sudden one side stopped working. It didn't work despite of multiple attempt and basic troubleshooting (restating my laptop itself). Post which I tried with my phone and only one side worked.. Even after multiple attempts throughout the days, it didn't work properly. I thought I will replace it but I didn't find time to do so and now I don't even know where this headphone is lying around in some corner of my room. 500 INR for one day use. Not a good experience.

name: VARUN
title: Sound Quality, Noise Cancellation, Working properly or not....
content: After using 2 months of boat bassheads in my opinion, it works properly... But if we talk about noise cancellation I had given 3 stars because if you increase volume to 50 or 60 you find the noise comes outside... Anyway but the overall performance is good... And it also depends on users how they use their earphone or not... But, from my side suggestion, you should buy it...

name: Victor
title: Boat 225 Vs Ant Audio W56
content: Obviously this was one best earphones in this price bracket untill Ant audio W56 is into market.... Boat 225 bass is very clumsy and mixed not clear but ant W56 has a clear and boosted base.... Base lovers will love ant W56 for sure..... Boat - Ant W56. Build Quality : 5 4.5. Sound Quality : 4 5. Weight : heavy comparatively less

name: DEEPALI
title: The headphones are good but one issue is one ear bud stops working with in year
content: I purchased 2 such headphone and both headphone had same issue within 12 month one of the earphone stops working.The Boat service was good for the first time they picked up the headphone verified it and then later replaced the first headphone but now the 2nd one i am facing issue as sevice centers are closed and no one responding.

name: Sushmita
title: Great product
content: The earphones are the exact colour shown in the image and the sound quality is so great! I’ve been using them for 6months now and they work just as they were on day one. The colour of the earphones tends to get dirty soon but nothing a wet wipe can’t fix.

name: Subhasis Roy
title: Best earphone under 500 ...
content: Boat Basshead 225.._______. Nice sound... Awesome Bass.....Tangle free cable........ Overall this is worth for money....😍♥️💝...i Love this earphone..... If you searching for a earphone with a good bass quality.....Then this will be the right choice for you...You can go for it.... Really it's very nice product....In low budget....I am using this earphone from last 3 month....🔥🔥..... I will suggest you to buy this product...

name: Anubhav Sharma
title: Plzz don't buy it. !
content: Don't waste ur money.. I purchased it after some days , it stops functioning.. It has 1 year warranty but no one to hear.. Their warranty portals are not working.. They are showing that they are giving warranty , it's a clever way to attract consumers.. Bot the reality is customer support number are computer operated which mean no one to hear.. I'm very frustrated about it.

name: pruthvi
title: Stopped working after 4 months.
content: Firstly the voice clarity during the call is bad, our voice is audible to other person only when the mic is placed in front of mouth.. Noise cancellation is not good.. The music clarity is good with some bass.. Bit uncomfortable in the ears when listening for long hours.. And one side stopped working after 4 months of usage.

name: Md. TauFeeQ
title: Stopped working after few months, But got replaced.
content: Purchase this headphones November 2019, after normal use of 5-6 months it started given problem and then after few days one side of the Headphones stops working completely, as it's lockdown right now (May 2020) so can't visit their service center.. Edited:- Replaced my old headphones with new one.. Sound quality and bass quality is good.

name: tarun sahu
title: Fedup pickup service
content: I am absolutely fed up with the pickup service that Amazon’s Courier Partner xpressbees is providing us.Amazon does not know how to create discipline among its workforce.form courier side saying address not found..i m clearly mention my full address and mobile number with courier service.once sell amazon product from his side then they doesn't take responsibility for product in warranty period.

name: M.N.Rao
title: fit is very important, ear hook doesn't help at ...
content: fit is very important, ear hook doesn't help at all, we have to fix post removing earbuds, they keep falling or the headphones keep falling from ear. very frustrating experience. metal & heavier cable also adds to weight thereby loosening anchor of buds. what sound without proper fit bakwass

name: Raju Rana
title: Just go for it if you are a bass lover.
content: Simply awesome. Best budget earphone for Bass lovers. You can't believe if you have not used it yet. After unboxing it I got 6 pair of different ear tips, 1 pair of wing tips and also a clip. This is too much the have provided. I Just plugged in and WOW!!! WTF!!! It's so loud that I have to keep the volume down to 70 to 80%. I already have JBL150CI and if I compare it with the JBL one, simply it can produce more bass and loudness than JBL150SI. I have gifted this earphone to my friend and he just denied to use it after listening few songs. As per him it can damage his ears..🤣🤣 One suggestion after using it, this earphone is only for them who loves to listen DJs all the time and likes hard bass.

name: aditya
title: Never buy
content: I suggest not to buy it . Why? Coz its not at all comfortable,its gives intense pressure to the ears. And after 2 months of usage one side of the earphone is not working. But this had happened to my frnd also who had brought it. There is lot more good options than this one.

name: jo
title: Good one at this price
content: It's my 3rd boAt product.Great Sound quality at this price point.BoAt is known for its after sale service.Unlike other brands During warrenty period they will provide pick up & replacement service free of cost.. Con : Design.Earpiece doesn't stay tight on my ear.Thanks to the rubber support they provide.I always have to use it.. I think for a heavy user like me their headsets last only for 1year.Get free replacement in warranty period.So total 2 yrs😅...

name: Bhavendra
title: highly reommend to buy this product
content: I loved this product and used it from last 8 months with super bass.once you use this product you will have an addiction to bass music and the tangle free and robust wire make it superb.. finally, the replacement warranty after 7 months which I got when one side not working makes me satisfied with the value of money.

name: Ashish Thakur
title: It's a copy of boat225
content: Duplicate product:-. i bought boAt Bass Heads 225 in-Ear Bass Headphones with One Button Mic (Red) through Amazon.in which is sold by Appario Retail private Ltd. and i am very much sure that it's a duplicate copy of boAt Bass Heads 225 in-Ear Bass Headphones with One Button Mic (Red). kindly, take appropriate actions bfor illegal trade practices. i am highlighting this issue because few days back I bought the same earphones and it was having manufacturing defaults. consequently, Boat is reputed compnay in their segment and they will relase any product in the market after several quality checks.

name: Bikash B.
title: Total "disaster" yet bestseller?!
content: Do NOT be fooled by bestseller tag.. This has a really inferior sound processing techniques. The bass is on expense of treble. Vocals and dialogues are distorted totally on volume above 40%. This is the worst headphones available in terms of sound quality (aka performance).. Build quality is great but then you are not gonna be able to enjoy, right?. The fit is discomforting after an hour of listening. I have taken review from 5 persons who are using this product and everyone is disappointed. My product is not faulty as I have checked 6 of these. Boats fooled the market, hope they improve or disappear.. Go for MI basic, piston fit, jbl, sennheiser.. Go for this if you follow sheep herd mentality.

name: FAISAL   BHAT
title: Excellent Bass
content: Durable, Stylish , cost efficient, good sound quality , high bass , appreciable noice cancellation , this product is worth a buy ...just want to mention one thing ,I bought the same product in 2016, its quality & stuff was a notch higher than present one..

name: Arun Sarathy
title: Good for songs, not for voice!
content: Great earphones for this price. I would love it more if this has inc/dec volume button. And one important thing:- songs were great when heard through the boat earphones, but the voice audio is quite gloomy and not really clear. The same audio file, when heard through my other earphones (Boult) the audio clarity was perfect (this happened when I played the same youtube talking video - with volume and everything else kept at same levels).. Calling feature: the same problem with voice calling - as mentioned above that voice is not sounding at its best compared to other earphones.. Overall: this earphone is great to listen to songs!

name: Ricky M.
title: Awesome bass
content: At first, i thought i rcvd a duplicate one coz everyone was saying its heavy in review bt i felt it light and when i plugged in the sound quality was not upto the mark, bass was heavy though. But when i switched off the DTS mode of my phone, it shows why it is so popular.. amazing sound with proper bass.. It looks premium. Amazing bass. Decent sound quality. Good built quality.. Very close to bOAt rockerz 285

name: Aakash
title: Don't waste money on this... Artificial sound.
content: If you don't know what bass is then go and have some research and listen to good bass... Ghanta SUPER extra bass... I am a professional DJ and producer and i am telling you guys this is shit. Sound is so artificial i can't even listen to half song in it. In 2 mins i got irritate.

name: Sayali M.
title: Product Seems FAKE Amazon This is Disappointing
content: First point is the color is very different its green not black,also the weight of product is not heavy if its original than it should be heavy as per me,also there shld be magnet in metal part of earphones there is no magnet in it,sound quality is good but expecting original product in Rupees=549/- Returning this product and ordering from orginal website of boat this was very disappointing

name: srikanta tripathy
title: Durability is the issue with the product.
content: I purchased 2 set of boAt Bass Heads 225 Special Edition in-Ear Headphones with Mic (Blue).. Past one month I used it well, there is no issue with the sound , buildup quality . But the mic was stop working after a month use. The mic quality was poor for both of my Ear Headphones mic are not working now, but there is no change in its music quality.. It is the best product for those who listen music, but who want to use it for call and communication purpose please Think twice.

name: Irfath Saba
title: Ear phones doesn't fit into ear
content: Sound wise everything is good..ONLY DISADVANTAGE About this is IT DOESNT FIT INTO EAR and it keeps falling out of the ear frequently. There r different size of ear buds.n the problem still persisted even with the diff sizes of buds. My question is if the ear phone doesn't fit into the ear then what's d point of having it with so called good quality.. I'ts very uncomfortable to wear ..I'm returning this product.

name: Smarajit Datta
title: Just Awsome!!
content: Superb set of headphones. The bass assist is too good. Very good value for money and a must have for music lovers. Can be used to take calls as well with an integrated answer/mute/end call button. The buds fit very well in the ear cavity and the extra buds in different sizes are an added bonus.

name: Puspita Mitra
title: Disappointed
content: Bought it in October 2019 and now it's June 2020 and the headphone is making noise on call.. Sound quality was very good initially but now it is making very bad noise. I connected other headphones then the noise isn't coming if I connect this one then only noise is coming on calls..

name: Adarsh thakkar
title: Not comfortable
content: The sound quality and everything is good but not as good as my sennheiser ones, but they cost just a bit more so I wouldn't complain. The only reason I am giving it a low rating is because it is very uncomfortable. They kept falling out even after changing the tips. Turns out that the metal is too heavy. I did put on the wing tips and they did stay inside after that but the wing tips can get really uncomfortable. I wouldn't recommend buying these. Instead buy something comfortable

name: pruthvirajsinh rana
title: Design hurt ears
content: After see many review on product i brought this one, but am disappointed with it , design of ear plus are matalic and cris cross which hurt in your ear , matalic body makes ear phones very heavy , so that can't use for long time , unnessesorry bass arise in some music, not value for money.

name: Vish
title: Best earphones I've used
content: This is one of the best earphones in this price segment... Been using this from past 4 months and many time it got stretched which was enough to damage other earphones.. but this one was highly durable.. before this i bought soundmagic but that got damaged within 2 months..so hats off to boat for durability.. coming to sound quality it is above good but not perfect.. i would say it's best in this price segment.. good bass too.. only thing that would cause trouble at start is the heaviness of earplug that might cause small pain in ears in first one or two weeks.. but after that you'll get used to it.... Overall its perfect bang for buck.!!!

name: Alapan R.
title: Old Basshead was good this is Sucks. Even built quality also sucks..
content: Well, this product used to be the best product but not anymore.. I have use 3 of 225Bass Head but nothing like the first one.. i also peovide the photo.. even though the built quality is also getting lower day by day.. its very very very disappointing. The first boat basshead 225 O brought it fron Amazon for 350 now its almost double but the quality was good but now its sucks..

name: Raj
title: Facing some many issue
content: The earphones slips on the ear. So it need to maintain in every 5 min and i never faced such problem in previous earphones. Some times its mic don't pass much voice so it is quite difficult to Comunicate from this earphones. My boats Basshead 152 were much better than this ones and they were cheaper than this one

name: Jairam
title: Cheaper and better!
content: One of the best earphones to purchase whose price ranges in the category of 500-1000. Has got enough sound quality for listening songs. Not consistent enough when it comes to MIC and the earbuds tend to drop while walking or on Bike, had to go with other earbuds.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good quality product for heavy bass lovers
content: Good product at good price. The best quality is heavy but the sound quality is not upto the mark. But I would recommend this product at this price range

name: Abhishek
title: Value for money
content: Flat cable so tangle free.. L pin so less likely to break in pocket.. Takes 15 hours of burn in to give good sound quality.. Bass is good, not excessive.. 3 button remote would have added volume control, but no regrets at this price point.

name: Shahed
title: Best in class in terms of quality, sound, bass and value
content: No words for bass, best in class.. Cheaper than other same level products.. Sound quality is also super.. Noise cancellation and mic are good.. Tangle free cords,thats a great thing.. Good build quality.

name: Amazon Customer
title: What good are earphones that don't stay IN the ears?
content: No comments on audio quality, which is decent, but this is the MOST irritating pair of earphones I've ever used - even the lightest tug on the cable will pull the buds out of ears. This has never happened with my previous earphones (Sennheiser and JBL) and is annoying on a crazy-making level.. Since I cannot listen to music in a hermetically sealed environment with nothing and nobody touching me at all times, I'd have to buy another pair of earphones. Complete waste of money.

name: Archit
title: Best In Class Earphones
content: These earphones are so underrated..I don't know why.These earphones have an amazing BASS compared to the other of this price range and the best thing is that BOAT gives Extra ear caps of different sizes for better comfort. These earphones are best in class and the build quality is awesome.. All Metal!. Thanks Boat For This Experience.

name: Nabeel R.
title: Volume Automatically Goes Down
content: Started making the volume of the phone go down automatically without me doing anything to it at all. Plug the thing in, listen/watch to something, in 5-10 minutes suddenly the volume of the phone goes down. As if someone is pressing the volume down button of the phone. When I searched around on the net as to why this might be the cause, I found out that badly made headphones sometimes send unwanted feedback back into the phone making it think that volume down button on the headphone mic is being pressed. This level of shoddy workmanship is not acceptable.

name: Samiran BIswas
title: waste of 600rs
content: most flat bass which this product clams to be the tagline of product. terrible sound quality even my 70 rs earphone can compete with this earphone. it looks like this company is more in advertisement then quality of product.

name: husain
title: DONT BUY THIS TO AVOID DAMAGE TO YOUR PHONE
content: DONT BUY THIS PRODUCT, The sound quality and build quality is but there is something wrong with the aux and it damages the the slot in your phone, this has happened to me and my several other friends after using these earphones, buy it only if you want to damage your phone permanently.

name: Sameer
title: Hissing sound.
content: Not frequent but i did observe hissing sound. Just two days passed since i have been using it so would share full review. Also i have not observed fall from ears as other buyers did mention. As of now giving only 2 stars. I always believe in Amazon's product for its genuinty but this time feeling that amazon does not do quality checks. There are many negative comments which i believe have some logic in it. Why they did not delist this product.

name: Kiran Joseph
title: Please Read May it's helps you
content: I purchased on boat initial launch time. The headset was very good in sound quality and bass. Almost 2.5 year I used. Recently it stopped working.. Again purchased same model from Amazon, now the sound quality and bass is pathetic. And slight changes in design also... May be it's duplicate else boat started selling local quality after they established.

name: Aman
title: Stopped working in 3 months. But good sound quality.
content: Sound quality is really good. But the earphone is not completely tangle-free. It's just relatively easier to untangle.. Also the metallic body makes it heavier and difficult to fix in the ear. Requires those rubber hooks to keep it in place.. The biggest problem is that in 3 months, left earpiece has stopped working. Since many others are facing the same issue, i dont recommend buying it.

name: Soumen Maji
title: For bass and loud sound lovers
content: Only one con it tends to come out because of the metal weight....other than that bass lovers buy it. It gives you to ear locking clips you can use to lock it....but i prefer without it, because it hurts after a while

name: Nelson
title: Loved it!! Recommended buy.
content: Been using this for about a month. The ear piece works well with decent bass. While not immersive, the ear phones work well even in crowded settings, like market places or trains.. The microphone is not that great in shutting off/masking background noises during a call, although I guess that's something that one can live with given the price.. Also, the tangle free cable is really neat. (I bought a green colored piece and I just love the shade of green offered). Overall, I'd rate it 4/5, given its price

name: Saloni Manhas
title: Great product
content: So I didn't want to write review immediately after unboxing cz that doesn't make any sense cz it's an electronic product. Pros:. Clear sound. Noise cancellation feature is great. Decent bass. Cons:. Bass could be improved but still it is great at this price. Earphones​ are made of metal so it slips out of your ear cz of heaviness

name: Gurdas Singh
title: Good in this price
content: Quality is very good,, but thodi palti awaz awndi hai,,compare to iPhone headphone is very good than boat headphone, but in this price boat v bahut badya headphone hai, but muje iPhone de headphone is nallo jyady badya lage,iPhone de headphone da base bahut badya hai

name: Nishant
title: Fair to middling!
content: After reading a-lot of positive comments for this, i finally bought this earphone.. After 15 days of usage I am writing this:. No doubt, the sound quality is amazing. But when it comes to comfort, to be honest its not comfortable. I dont know why..but you just cannot wear this without ear-hooks and even with ear-hooks, after half-an-hour or so you will feel like removing them as they tend to cause some pain in the ear (as earbuds and earhooks quality is not that great). But yes when it comes to its sound quality, its value for money but i'll suggest you to try it once (because eveyone's ears are different). Hope this helps!

name: Amazon RVH
title: Discomfort in ears
content: Sound quality and bass quality is good. But i am feeling discomfort in ears when we have ear piece. Ear piece design should be taken care, its not comfort in ears.

name: @avinash_pk_1
title: BEST EARPHONE FOR THIS RANGE 😚
content: I am Using This Earphone since 1 MONTH, This is Giving a Good Sound With Best clarity of Sound, i just Loved It, I have Selected BLUE addition As it matches with my REALME 2 PRO ocean BLUE, Its colour is better then shown in Picture, Go for it don't wait its giving u 1 year of warranty 🤗, So... No more worries for at least One Year ☺️☺️

name: Vishrut
title: Very average, muddy sound
content: Very average, in the name of bass bossting it muds all the sound up, reduces clarity. It's not very comfortable wearing it during exercise as well (although I understand it's not it's main selling points, but the wire weight just means that this headphone is always slipping out of your ear).. Very average honestly, would've gone for something else.. Only positive I can think of is that the quality of build of the in ear headphones plus the Jack is good

name: Subham Bhattacharjee
title: awesome earphones at this price
content: awesome headphones...very good earphones at this price point.... amazing sound quality,thumping bass,quite good noise cancellation. I have been using this for 1.5 years now and still works perfectly fine. The sound quality is still awesome. not drop in sound quality or bass. if your budget is ₹600 or ₹700 then go for this one

name: Good
title: Value for money
content: Major points about the boat earphones :. 1. Manufacturing quality of wires is great, ofcourse tangled free.. 2. Sound is good, totally noise cancellation approved.. 3. Bass is up to the notch, i compare bass with Sennheiser earphones and boat one is good.. I gave this review after using 1 month, till now it's working fine.

name: Saptarshi Dutta
title: Too much of a Bass cuts out mids & lows.
content: Too much of bass cuts out the lows and mids so unfortunately lacks a bit in clarity. My earlier Sony MDR EX 150AP was a better balanced earphones. 225 is still a great buy at 500 bucks. Wish the Bass was balanced that would've been great. Equaliser helps but not much.

name: Amazon Customer
title: I need a replacement or refund asap
content: The Product I received today.. Is a faulty piece.. The output is worst.. The mic is faulty.. Very annoying.. Never thought that Boat 225 would have provided this kind of faulty product. I have used the normal boat 225 rockerz earlier, I took this looking at that super extra bass.. This is worst than the original 225 one.

name: ALPESH KAKLOTTAR
title: Speak weight is lower then required weight
content: Bass is superb. Sound quality is low compare to JBL C50HI. Speakers are low weight if you compare with cable wieght and due this, your speakers can come out from ear sometimes.. After this, I ordered 2 pieces and both the were defective. Speakers not working in both items which I ordered later on.

name: Navneet Ranjan
title: A value for money product with a good brand name.
content: These Boat earphones are truly supub according to me.. Some Pros and Cons of the same listed below:. Pros:-. 1.Sound Quality is amazing.. 2.Build Quality is very good.. 3.Mic works fine.. 4.Premium wire quality.. Cons:-. 1.Bass Quality is not so good.. 2.The rubber in the earbuds are not very tight sometimes they fall off but it is also not a big issue as they have provided extra ones so you can choose one of your choice.. 3.The length of the earphone is very large which is not a good thing, it should be medium.

name: Siddharth
title: AVOID IT
content: Made the purchase in july, and here we are the right earbud is not working at all. The bass is one of the main features of an earphone, but this earphone has a very weak bass. It's good for talking on a phone. Bt not made for Music People.

name: Chetan parekh
title: Very uncomfortable.
content: The only n only problem in basshead 225 is , its too heavy , can't bear more than 15 mnts , again it comes out from ear, very uncomfortable. Also changed all size of buds came. with the product .Some times it pains in ear also.. Its my humble request to Amazon please replace it , wl buy another earphone of the same company. Also sent mail to boat .

name: Manzoor
title: Worst product. Right Ear piece suddenly stopped working. I DID NOT rough use the product.
content: Worst product. Please do not buy. Bought this last November. Left earpiece stopped functioning since one week. I have used the product with utmost care and DID NOT rough use it at all. Still.....I am fed up off these cheap brands. Faced a similar fate with Tekfusion earphones a couple of years ago. My mistake I bought Boats and fell in the trap to 'pay less get more' again......

name: kishan
title: Pathetic service response
content: I just want to to tell you everyone that.. Dont but this pathatic earphones after 2-3 months earphone one side sound not working and when I contact through mail and contact no no response from customer service no use for warranty because boat brand just fool people..

name: Saurav
title: Suck..
content: Seriously it sucks!!!!!. Sound quality good around 70%volume but above that it's sucks. Bass don't talk about it they have 0 bass. Comfort first of all they don't fit in your ear. Second ears starts aching just after a few minutes. Its just they durable and will last long nothing else is good about them....

name: Ronak
title: Bass bomb
content: It is good with the sound quality and bass but we all knw sound cancellation in boat is not possible 😂😂 I think that's not a major prob though. The only issue is that it slipps out of ears whenever u do some moments and if u push it in ears it gives a itching coz of metal in it but it's coz I wear earphone about 15 hrs a dag which is too much this review is after 24 hrs of purchase.

name: Mangesh
title: Best bujet earphones ?
content: Best earphones good quality value for money it was dropped in water still working without problem I bite wires much but still working properly without problem I think it's much good than expensive earphones I loved using this earphone best for gaming music and much more!!!!you can buy it bindly

name: GIRIDHARI CHAND
title: Don't buy this model. You can go another boAt model.
content: Very bad product. Earburd are very heavy. Continually remove from ear. Sound quality not like a branded product.

name: Tarun patel
title: This price range superb eraphone...
content: this price rang. It is a good ear phone. Good bass, good sound quality, good noise cancellation, good build quality, but ear parts little bit heavy bcz of using metal, other wise it is a good ear phone. Go for it... 👍

name: Nilesh Patil
title: Good built
content: I like the sturdy make of the earphones and its bass. However, it is not powerful enough in terms of sound output and the ear plugs are also a little uneasy to use and it pops out of my ear. I thought that's cuz its new and will take some time, but even changed the plugs and found them to be a little less befitting for use.. But for the cost of around 500, I like my purchase.

name: Lekhraj Meena
title: Haven't received my refund even after return completed.
content: Sound quality of these earphones is pretty amazing.. Bass is totally great.. And noise cancellation also good.. But the thing is these doesn't fit properly in my ears, I have too kept holding these earphones during use otherwise these comes out off my ears whenever I free them. I bought them so I can use them during running, but I don't think these are the earphones for me as these can't hold in ears.. I have returned this product but haven't recieved my refund.

name: chandan chaudhari
title: Sound & Bass quality
content: I'm jbl user but for the first time I thought that I should experience boat earphone but trust me guys I'm not satisfied with the product bass is to low even can't feel it design is too attractive but sound quality is not good one can buy this product only he's budget is too low otherwise I'm not gonna recommend this earphone.

name: Ninad
title: Decent buy. Not above 600
content: Best in its range, useful n gaming too.compatible with many devices. Bass n surround sound gets good when it's needed. Not scortching to ears. Only one issue I faced is with its mic. Sounds low than usual to the receiver of ur call.

name: Hitesh Chopra
title: Boat Bassheads 225
content: Amazing earphones. Comes with 5 pairs of changeable heads. Great sound with extra bass. Product Quality is amazing. And yes, don't use it to catch your lover. Because of tangle free cable,. Your lover will slips out from your coverage area. Then don't say me. Whats this man. Why don't you mention this in your review. Well its a great gift for your lover tooo. Thank you. And just kidding 😂

name: Rm
title: Terrible product
content: Terrible product. Working extremely weirdly. It starts to do random things to your phone. For eg: I just connected the earphones to the phone and music played on it's own and it led to Radom apps one after the other without me touching the phone. It can't be an issue with the phone because other earphones work perfectly okay with it. Please don't buy this

name: Amazon Customer
title: Your old play list will sound new to you.
content: I’ve been using this product along with redmi note 3 . It requires some tweaking I. The audio settings to get the best quality audio output. My old song playlist sounded completely new to me. I was able to hear lots of minute sounds distinctly with this hear phones.. The only downside is it has poor ergonomics, it protrudes out of your ear and it hangs down a little on its own weight. But definitely a worthy product for this price. It produces quality like ₹1000 and above worth headsets.

name: Zeeshanpasha Kazi
title: Unusual drawbacks
content: The sound quality is nice. Though the cable looks much slimmer than in the photos which makes one doubt the quality of the cables at first glance.. Also the earpiece are very slippery which makes it very difficult to hold them in the ears during traveling.. The microphone is very average, giving one a hard time while traveling and crowdy areas. The back portion of the earpiece is of mettalic construction which feels very premium but gets extremely cold in chilled conditions. Haven't tried it in extreme weather but think will be very difficult to insert the earpiece in the ears if it becomes that cold.

name: Md Tauseef Alam
title: Quite good
content: This boat earphone 225 has good sound quality and made by best material. I have buy this earphone 3 months ago first earphone I have three months and steel in condition. 👉The bad point abut that earphone is it's not fit in ear proper fall from ear several time so it's irritating Also pain in ear after long use .

name: Sameeran A
title: Pretty good for the price
content: Decent sound quality, good bass, quite durable, Mic is ok. A good buy overall. The most important feature for me was the tangle free cable 😅 comes in really handy! That said, I wouldn't recommend this to someone who listens to music for long periods. Not because ergonomics, the sound quality just isn't upto the mark..

name: Tanuj Kumar
title: DO NOT BUY it . just a HYPE
content: i brought this last dushera time and this dushera it stopped working.Warranty is over by 2 weeks .Can not do much.. All i can say is it is just hype that it is the best earphone in the market.Do not go with the hype.I kept my earphone with great care and they don't get more than the warranty period.Will not be going for BoAt earphones this time.

title: Not a valuable product
content: I purchased this company product in second time, first earphone is too good,I used that product maybe one or two years,but this time reached very bad quality product 👎👎👎, I don't know why. I'm so sad about with it. I do not suggest to others this product. Bcz this is too bad

name: Piyush Dhusia
title: Purchased it AGAIN..!!
content: Purchased an year ago.. it broke so purchased it again! Again because in this price range, I think this is perfect earphones one can have! Amazing sound quality and noise cancellation. Material quality is kind of weak so please *handle with care*. The colour is vibrant and gives overall a decent and premium look. Voice during calls is also clear and mic performance of this earphone is fabulous. Recommended product for day to day usage within this price caregory.

name: Reshmi Nair
title: Not comfortable
content: Sound quality, bass quality etc are secondary if the head phone is hurting your ears by not fitting properly. Earlier I was using sony head phone which was comfortably fitting on my ears while this one won't stay in its place at all.

name: Pogula a.
title: Genuinely speaking, dont buy this.
content: Only base sound effect is good,other than this nothing impressive. It always comes out of ears, not easily holdable. Mic was damaged in 2 months only. I dont like this product personally. Instead ,add some more money & get sony earphones. Thats best choice. I too saw reviews & buyed it even when i saw that its not fitting in ears.

name: Gautam Mukherjee
title: Immersive music experience
content: I have been using it since it arrived. Excellent sound quality, clarity, noise cancellation and Bass. Extra covers for the ear pieces are actually thoughtful, since they do tend to pop off if you absentmindedly rough it up. Excellent product and full value for money.

name: Ameet Arote
title: 3 weeks use max!
content: Delivery was quick. Initially it worked well. 3 weeks later the right ear piece one stopped working. In 7 weeks the entire headphone is not working.. For the price we paid, I at least expected it to last for 6 months. Disappointed with boAt product. Don't know why they build durable pieces??

name: Chetan Gohil
title: Not good quality
content: Got this delivered on-time from Amazon, but not good quality. Within one month the left side ear piece stopped working. Visited service center (14km far) for repair. They promised to replace in in 8-10days. (As on July 25th 2020.)

name: Nanda Kishore
title: This headset was useless. Don't buy this stuff anymore.
content: I just buy this earphone and months next day,its left side doesn't works. Please I want to return it. I is really painful for 3 hrs continous usage. There is no pressure balance in ear after it insert in ear. Also you cannot use it by laying on bed in ear to pillow manner. It's very uncomfortable to all. I really want to say that don't waste your money. Please I want to return it and I want you refund my money. 🙏🏻🙏🏻

name: Amrik Chatterjee
title: Best promising company (boat)
content: Best headphone at its price range, after that I realize that boat is one of the best promising companies I ever used. After 6 months I faced a technical glitch on 3.5mm jack but boat replace the product without any hesitation within 20 days. Their customer friendly service attract me most.

name: Ash
title: Ear phone doesn't suit my ears to fit in comfortably
content: The head phone is good in general with good bass.but giving 2 stars as it was not comfortable for ears and always wants to hold the head phones into ears for me, which doesn't serve the purpose of head phone..and 5 stars for amazon service.prompt delivery and return pick up.people who look for normal earphone with less bass, go for other options.

name: Shreyas S Ganigi
title: Very very good ...
content: Very very good... the sound audible range is very good... good bass and sensitive to treble settings.. very sturdy wiring... the buds have been gotten pulled many times inspite there was no damage at all .. survives harsh and rough handling

name: Yuvaraj
title: It is used product, and also not working
content: I got a used product, which is not working.. If you can see my pictures you can see the tapes used to seal the pack is local.. And mainly one side earphone is not working and the other side also not properly audible.. My bad Is that I have opened the box after the return period.. Can anyone suggest is it possible to return it now?

name: Zakeer Shaik
title: Worst to buy and not that worthy product.
content: Horrible. At first it looks good but after I used for normal like 5 days it creates connecting problem,. Then I placed a replacement.. The product which is delivered for second time also had the same problem.. Never recommend to buy boat headset.

name: Harsh garg
title: Do not wast money 🚫
content: Dam sure they will not work after 6 month . you get another replace earphone after you complaint about it (in a month atleast after pick up) but they will also not work after 3 month 😂😂 soo good luck if buy them, also they are most likely hanging around your than in ear coz they are extremely heavy piece of junk.

name: Sohel Rana
title: Just Go For It...
content: Very nice earphone in this price range and built quality is awesome. I have got it within 5 days. But the packing was really bad. Packet was sealed but it has many scratchs and there were no cover in packet just a main rapper and the earphone packet in it. But the earphone was in good condition.. I would say its the best earphone in this range. Thank You...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not the best as reviews said !
content: I have tried several earphones like bose , jbl etc .. The sound is good at this price but the build is such that you cannot use it for long time .Its too long to comfortable plug into your ears .These buds length makes it difficult to use earphones for more than 1 hr .

name: Amit Kumar
title: Nice earphones in this price range.
content: Earphones are really very good and sturdy but a bit heavy. Sound quality and bass are good. The only problem I am facing with these is its earbuds. Earbuds get seperated easily from the ear speaker and you need to be careful everytime when you take these out from your pocket. This is the reason I am deducting one star from the rating. Everything else is fine.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Value for money product
content: This product is good . Atleast for the pricepoint good sound quality and material quality. And the tangel free wires make it a boon to live with. But there is only one con i would like to mention here , that is the earphones don't stay in the ears while using it tends to drop every now and then using them while cycling or jogging. If ur buying this to wear while exercising "don't buy these"!!!. Or else it's a good earphone.

name: SIBI CN
title: Good product...i love it...😍
content: I like so much... Previously i bought same model black color...i used 2 years smoothly... last week One day suddenly that headset have a problem... Only heard music...no voice... so i decide to buy new one in same model red color... Looking good... Quality also very good... Sound effects pakka...😍 Need to reduce price...

name: Philip Thomas
title: Excellent product
content: Review after using for almost 2 years.. The product is overall good.. Good sound and bass.. Excellent noise cancellation.. Build quality is good.. After using for 1 year and 8 months, the left side ear piece and mic stopped working. It got a kind of loose contact. Until then it was good.

name: Arjun Makwana
title: boat 225
