content: 1.Super Fast Delivery on time,thanx amzazon delivery.. 2.Mind Blowing sound, super bass !i have sony xperia xa dual ,my device never give good output if i use any local earphones sometime it give good output so it was a big issue for me ,but when i got this 225 and pluged it in my device it give very good output ,my expectation becomes reality thank you boAt for making this product for me;).. 3.in the box i got Ear buds of almost everysize ,but fixing it in earphhone is very hard .. A M A Z I N G P R O D U C T thankyou @boAt.

name: Ganesh V.
title: if you hate the slightest of "HISSING" distortion
content: Well, let me put it this way:. If it wasn't for the price: 6/10. Value for Money: 8/10. Quality for money: 9/10. Highlights:. Distinguishing Bass, not too soft, nor Hard Punch, Just right: 8/10. Mids are Okay, upto the mark, keeping in mind the price: 8/10. Highs, its average, if you hate the slightest of "HISSING" distortion, than this is not for you, you will have to shelf out some more money for good pair of earphones, if your focus is on Bass than you will get used to the slight distortion: 7/10. Final Verdict:. After Spending Thousands of Rupees on deciding which earphones to stick with below 700 price range, im definetely Satisfied with this one, I know, this is not the best Earphone out there, but it offers great value and Quality product at such reasonable price.. I hope my review will help you make a better choice to buy a pair of Earphones. Thank You!

name: Chandan Kumar Biswas
title: Stopped working within 2 months
content: Everything was working fine but suddenly left side ear piece stopped working within 2 months for no reason. Sound quality is great with excellent bass(too much in my opinion) and design looks very sturdy but it is heavy and may take time for your ears to adjust. It should've lasted at least a year(my expectation) but don't know why it stopped working.

name: Shivraj
title: Nicee product
content: Sound quality-outstanding. Noise cancellation-Good. Tangle free cable-Yes. Build quality-Good. Overall it is a value of price and a very good product. If u need a good sound quality then u must go for this.. For pubg- Jldi jaao order karlo bht mast ha pubg ke liye . U can hear footstep clearly and I m also order again this product for pubg.

name: Sathish Kumar Srinivasan
title: Sounds good, superb bass headset
content: Sounding good, but buds are irritating after long time use. Not fit to the ears unlike other brand ear buds I tried every 6 of them nothing is good. Great sound, good bass, super quality cables and ear pieces worth for the price at this range, I bought it for 499

name: Aakash Siddhpuria
title: Depends upon your usage , you have to buy this product
content: If you are looking for budget earphone with great sound and great build quality in home usage then this is the best earphone in this price.. But Interms of heavy material used in this product,if you are riding or walking ,Earphone comes out and falls of. Then this is the worst product for you.

name: Arvind
title: Worst product
content: I had bad experience with this product. When I connect to my mobile, automatically volume increases or decreases or in youtube channel it will go to next song without making any attempt by mobile user. However it works fine when I connect to my laptop. I haven't expected this from seller nor from Amazon. I wish customer service all the more important while delivering the products; end of the day it is trust involved while buying online.

name: Akash Mazumdar
title: Wasted! :/
content: First 2 months it worked so good! Then one day suddenly it stopped working. The bass was no more only the treble can be heard. I checked it carefully but i saw nothing wrong in the earphones that means the problem was inside it. So disappointing. I m a teenager and i value money very much. They just wasted my 600 rupees.

name: Sivaram B.
title: Excellent quality sound but not so nice fit
content: The sound quality of these earphones is awesome. The only thing i didn't like about them were it doesn't stay in place unless you push it really inside your ear. That kind of gets irritating at times. Else a fantastic product

name: Cynazia Leonard
title: Warranty claim
content: So far these have been the best earphones that I've used. Sound quality is good and very balanced and the cable doesn't tangle but for 2-3 days one side has stopped working and it's troubling. I'm trying to contact the dealer regarding the warranty. I really love these earphones and it would be really nice to hear from the dealer. Please help.

name: Kaniyan Poongundran
title: Can buy without thinking much
content: I'm writing this review after using this for nearly 8 months. The earphone still functions just like a new one. I have no issues with it. The audio quality is splendid. The only reason why i give 4 is the earpieces are very heavy and falls from my ears frequently.

name: rishnu c
title: It Doesn't fit in ear well. Falling off every time
content: *It doesn't fit in ear, falling off everytime, maybe its too heavy, tried all the 5 buds that given, none of them fits well, only the medium one is good.. *Sound is excellent & bass is excellent.😍🥰🤩. *Tried playing pubg using this earphone,, surrounding sound & footsteps can be Heard clearly... *Tried using the clip that given in the box but its giving pain in ears. Boat 255 earclip doesn't give the pain in ear.... *Cables are good , its tangle free,. *Tried on my poco f1😍

name: Anand
title: Authorised service centre deemed the product "FAKE AF".Kindly look into it AMAZON
content: I bought this on 7th of Nov. The ear phones isn't working now being that the audio I hear is smugged. The authorised service centre told me that the product is duplicate/fake and cannot replace.The person in the service centre instantly told me it's a fake by looking at the plug.The images above prove the same. Kindly replace it Mr. shopkeeper

name: Sunny Saurabh
title: Nice product with some drawback
content: This ear phone is very good. Every thing is fantastic like, sound, wire and mic.. One problem with this earphone is if you loose earphone holder, this cannot be hold in your ear while moving. Also you can feel uncomfortable while you using this earphone in halmet.

name: Arindam Giri
title: wrongly designed and mic doesn't work properly
content: Let me tell you what is wrong with this product.. It will not stay in your ear. It will fall down due wrong design. Even if you slightly move your head, it will fall down from your ear.. The microphone reception is very poor. You have to keep the microphone in front of your mount very close to hear properly.. Don't buy.

name: Vishnukumar Chandran
title: Super bass
content: Recently I fell in love with boat earphones and especially this boat basshead 225 wonders me... really a good product value for money...Noise cancellation and sound quality are best apart from other boat products...I am surprised with 6 pairs of earbuds along with earphones, no brand will gives such in numbers. I personally prefer this product.

name: Parth Sarathi
title: DO NOT BUY.
content: A genuine suggestion for anyone looking for a new pair of budget earphones, DO NOT BUY THESE.. These are good for nothing, neither the sound quality is up to to the mark not the comfort.. If u ask me the biggest demerit of these, it would definitely be its uncomfortable fot in the ear, it is just not bearable.. I would highly recommend the REALMR BUDS Instead which come for almost the same price.

name: MOHAN K.
title: Amazing product
content: Very good product for daily use.. I've been using this for 8 months and it is still as good as day 1.. The sound quality is good. External noise doesn't penetrate the earphones.. It also comes with extra sets of buds so it is an added advantage.. I changed my buds recently as the old ones became loose.. Best buy for Rs. 600

name: Pijush Ganguly
title: Very good sound quality. Disappointed with noise cancellation
content: I am using this product for the last 2-3 months. It has an excellent sound quality and bass too but does not quite cancel out the noise. Good for listening to songs and attending to phone calls. A must no for those who want to conduct classes or convene meetings over online platforms. However, it's a good buy for the price.

name: niraj sharma
title: Nice dencent and Heavy buds
content: Sound quality is decent, overall product is good, buds are heavy and looks tough.. I use these earphones everyday while I travel to and from office for few minutes, since the buds are heavy, they fall often , this is annoying.. It is difficult to put buds of different size which came in pack. I am using the smallest size , bigger sized budds are too big

name: punit kumar
title: Waste of money
content: Worst experience ever... I don't understand whether it's a chainbof a prisoner.. It's so heavy.. It can't hold on ears... I want to returm it butboption is also not showing... I wil broke into pieces soon if i can't return it.... How can someone make so heavy headphones.... It can't hold even 10 sec on ears... Bcz of its heaviness..... Plzz dnt buy otherwise you ppl will repent

name: Sushil Kalwa
title: Boat  bass head 225 earphone
content: Not a good product if you have ever used good expensive earphone like I was using beats headphones which were extremely comfortable.. After using this earphone there is a constant headache and as the earphones are heavy the easily falls from your ears.. I would recommend to use senhiser earphones they are extremely comfortable and the sound quality is far better than boat earphones.

name: Regular Customer
title: Has bad grip
content: Sound and everything is fine but it has the worst grip. You end up adjusting the buds again and again while using and it comes off even if you just touch it by mistake. Didn't like it much.

name: Rev. K. Sagar Sundar Raj
title: Damaged and not even to the minimum expectation...
content: Recieved defective product. Not upto the expectation as previous used. No proper print on headphones which one to wear which side. No sound effect and even meeting minimum quality.. I used same product for 3 years but unfortunately there was wire cut below headphone and it was fantastic.... But the new one..... loudspeaker into my ears not headphones.... Returning the product

name: saurabh ranjan
title: Fake product confirmed by boat service centre
content: The earphone specially is not working and it creates irritating noise during call. In service centre they have told that this is not original boat earphone it is fake one. What one can do if paying full amount which is shown there and getting fake product. Amazon even not take care of the genuineness of the customer

name: AjayP
title: Poor Service by boAt dealer
content: Within a week the one side of the ear phone was not working. As per 1 year warranty they have picked up the product but its more than 15 days they haven't handed over the replacement. Very bad seller

name: Dhruv
title: Impressive only with Dolby
content: This is an awesome product with awesome sound quality. At first I got some treble along with good bass which I hate but I found a way for it I just had to lower the treble In my phone's Dolby and done awesome sound as I like. But without Dolby even after dynamic driver it behaves like neodymium driver which means Full treble lots of treble which I hate. But I don't have any problem my phone has Dolby.. I would recommend to all

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worst build quality
content: I never gave out a negative review for a product. But I had to give one to this piece of crap. Recently I purchased this headset based on the ratings and exceptionally good review. It was too late for me to realise that they are just the tactics played by them smartly in order to market the product.. After just about 5 weeks of use, my right earpiece stopped working, and a buzzy noise from the other earpiece. Yeah thumbs up for the audio quality for this PRICE range, but the build quality is crappy and the has gone faulty too. It's just a waste of money for me.

name: Sky
title: Good
content: Overall it's a good earphone but the metal makes it heavy, hence it keeps on falling from the ears.. Sound quality is good and adequately loud with rich bass. Can choose JBL at the same price which is much comfortable and sounds even better.

name: Engineer Raj
title: Best at the price range and beyond
content: This earphone is amazing. I bought the first one in 2017 and it worked flawlessly for 2.5 years before one side stopped working. Bought a similar one last month and it's just amazing. Best earphones at this range in the market.

name: Mathew
title: Good value for money earphones
content: Very good earphones under this price.. Bass 5/5. Mic 4.5/5. Sound quality 4/5. Noise cancellation 5/5. Comfort 3/5 cant use for long periods, initially was frustrated .. Build quality -4/5 very good , used it very harshily. Writing the review after a year of purchase, still works fine.. Flat wires tangle free was an added bonus.

name: Aditi Mishra
title: Don't stick to ears...keep on falling
content: I am writing this after 3 month use....the biggest disadvantage is that..the headphone did not get fit into ears properly and keep on falling. .......so the question of howz the music quality...hwz the noise cancellation...& Howz the bass quality did not stand a chance of answering..... These are earphones because they are meant to stick & fit into the ears....... So zero rating ...don't go for this product....

name: Madhusudan
title: Go for Sennheiser instead of boat
content: The headphone has more bass than the requirement and i have boat bassheads 100 also but even if you handle with care it will stop working after 1 year which means after warranty period is over.. I will say go for Sennheiser headphones which are costlier as compare to boat but it's the best in the market.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Uncomfortable
content: I've been using them for quite some time now. Sound quality is good, sound cancellation is not up to the mark. Being metallic they are obviously heavy and doesn't fit properly in the ear. Boat basshead100 are lighter, cheaper and provides the same quality of sound!

name: Surya Teja Chandana
title: WORST EARPHONES, NOT AT ALL WORTH..
content: THESE ARE THE WORST EARPHONES I'VE EVER USED.. My left side earphone had stopped working within 7days after purchase, anyway I've requested for a replacement.. Sound quality is poor, forget about Bass and Noise Cancellation. These're too far from those 2 features.. The drivers in these earphones just push a high volume junk in the form of an echo and call it as BASS.. After Replacement:. The replaced product has also stopped working after 1 month... I'll definitely neither prefer nor refer the Brand BOAT again..

name: ranjith gowda
title: Best is price , just go for it .
content: I bought it for 499 and in this price range it's surprising to get this good quality earphones . Sound is perfect and best is build quality and design .. But only 1 problem with this is , it fits lil loose in ur ears , it keeps falling if we pull it . But I dont think it's a big problem .. After buying boat earphones, I brought boat Bluetooth speakers also . Now a fan of boat .

name: Chinmay Kulkarni
title: Poor quality
content: The product can not withstand even a drop of water. Moisture damages it's functionality. After two and half months, microphone have stopped working.. Earbuds dose not fit well. Also sometimes it respond late to volume change. Not upto the mark. Yes it is tangle free.

name: Vishnu S
title: BEST HEADPHONE
content: The headset has a simple design.. Blue As a birthday gift and loterally I think this is the beat headset.. Super Bass, Really it is amazing product,Bass Effect is very good, Best Budget Earphone in this price.. Now my final word is that if you are planning to purchase an headphone you can buy it.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worst experience with Amazon
content: Worst experience with Amazon.. Earphone doesn't work. Left ear speaker completely dumb and with the right ear speaker I am hearing sound with noises. Product looks dirty and seems already used one.. You are earning billions from our people and looting like anything by selling already used products that too defected one. Please shut your website if you're not able to manage your sellers. I am not sure if it is you or your seller. But I need to ask you only if the product is not good as I don't know about the seller.. Mark it. I will post this information to social forums to make people aware of Amazon products.

name: sathishsuresh
title: Present review 2021
content: I bought this earphone and here two more songs I feel all the sounds are mixed in worst way. I already use senheisar cx 180 but this have 65% bass so I have choose boat bass head 225 because of bass but there is no punchi bass. It have Maddy bass. So I suggest pleas don't buy. I am return this item

name: Ravi Dhawan
title: Don't buy before reading my opinion.
content: Sound quality is amazing, wire quality, everything is so good.. Still I have given it 2 rating because 2 things makes it unusable.. 1. Side of earplugs. 2. Weight of earplugs. 3.fitting of it in ear. It is very very poor. I am sure you will not be able to keep it in your ear for long, or it will pop out itself.

name: Ajit Nadgouda
title: Excellent
content: Got it for R.499 less Rs.50 cashback on BHIM payment. Excellent build and sound quality. Durable. Strong tangle free wires. A bit heavy though and large for ears despite changing the ear pads probably because of heavy and durable build quality. But overall very satisfied with the quality of the product.

name: Kiran
title: Overall review
content: Highs :5 of 5. Mids : 5-5. Lows : 5-5. Bass :6-5 (it surely is extra bass). Sound clarity : Crystal clear! We can hear each and every beat and the actual movement or sound.... Noise cancellation : 4-5. Colour : Neno lime (Not so neonish!) 3-5. Material and quality : 5-5. Overall : It's totally value for money! I got a discount and bought it for 500 and you can give it upto 700 for the earphones if there's no discount.... Those who are looking for all in all... I'll definitely recommend everyone!

name: Prateek
title: Most important point for headphones
content: Zero grip in earpiece...they will keep falling down.... The additional buds provided do not fix properly in the headphones...my thought is if the design does not fit in ear...the headphones are useless even if the sound quality is heavenly....comfort wear is one thing that should be taken into consideration while purchasing earphones....I purchased realme buds 2 after returning these

name: Ankita
title: Build and look is very good .Extra boosted bass but loss in clarity
content: Build quality and look is very good.. But sound quality is not that much crisp and clear.. Boosted bass but loss in sound clarity.. Its okok type middle level earphones.

name: Dhruti
title: Good noise-cancellation headphones for their price!
content: I like the flat wire of these headphones; they don't get tangled easily. The bass quality of these headphones is quite all right, not bad. The only thing that sort of bothers me is the metal heads. They are a little heavy and I feel slightly uncomfortable in the ears, if I keep them on continuously, for more than an hour.. But, definitely not bad for its price. Thumbs up!

name: Ipsit panda
title: Worst products with expensive price
content: The worst products I have ever purchased.Ordered on 10th October 2020 and got replaced within 7 days after there was issue in volume as it automatically increased and decreased. The product replaced but again after one month same issues raised ..so I will not recommended anyone to buy this duplicate products which is providing by Amazon

name: Subhayan Mondal
title: boAt BassHeads 225 in-Ear Wired Earphones - Honest Review
content: I needed a cheap in-ear wired earphones with mic and purchased this one for 500 INR.. PROS:. The sound quality is better than the price they are asking for.. The default bass setting is really good.. The material is durable and tangle-free.. CONS:. The earphone heads are really heavy.. It is very uncomfortable to use for long duration.

name: Priyank
title: Worst boat product
content: I don't like this headphones and not recommended to anyone because it is too much heavy and not proper fit inside the ear. In place of this u can refer any other boat or any other brands headphones.

name: Samartha S M
title: Good but could be better
content: It's good for the price, definitely. No doubt there. Sound quality is pretty good too. Only issue for me is the design of the ear pieces, it's cylindrical & long. It looks good, but doesn't give that feel of comfort & becomes difficult when you're on lying down & listening to music. Maybe if they make the length of ear pieces short, it'll become much better.

name: Lijin Richi John Shaji
title: Best for gaming and casual use ..
content: Perfect one with great sound quality i used it for pubg and other games too excellent headset for price range and it has little high bass than others i liked it.. Liked it buying another for brother

name: John
title: Mic problem, earphones dropping frequently
content: This product is nice in built quality,i got extra 4 earbuds vary in size,anti tangled wire is good,"but only problem is mic "when ever you call to others while we talking mic not working properly as it has to keep near to our mouth then they (opp. Side people) can hear clearly..... Earphones are feeling some weighty because of it is made with metal finish on it and dropping frequently

name: Srikanth
title: Earphones keep falling out.
content: Bass is ok. Build quality superb. Little heavy earpiece which tends to keep falling while walking / doing household chores. If you sit idle and listen to songs/vedios.. It's a good earphone. Recommended to buy if you have budget constraint and want to durable earphone.

name: Ayushi singh
title: Good not great
content: I am rating it 4 out of 5 as I have complete faith in its material and durability. The sound quality that it provides for music is also amazing, however when using the earphone on call it is creating a very irritating disturbance hence unable to use the earphone for calls.

name: Insomniac
title: Flawless
content: This product is crazy good the bass is amazing and it sounds great the provided buds are soft.... The rubber earhooks are also nice although it gets a bit uncomfortable when used for a longtime also during the sale the price was Rs100 less so I got 5 sets with the case and another one without the case.... So yeah I am literally loving these 😂😂

name: NUTAN
title: Ear plugs are too heavy and thick. It hurts the ears holes
content: The ear plugs are too heavy. It just keeps on falling from the ear holes. I just keep on putting it back. Couldn't enjoy the music while using it. Can't use while laying down. I tried to get adjusted with it but I couldn't. It's a wastage of money.

name: Rajann K.
title: "PLS DON'T BUY THIS"
content: It's a third grade product. Boat has made it to just fool the customer. The earphones weighs a ton. It keeps falling of, it can't stay in its place for even 5 seconds and after a minute or two your ears will start hurting. My strong recommendation "PLS DO NOT BUY IT". I'm pretty sure boat has bought review for this sub-standard product.

name: Snehit Gautam
title: Stopped working in just 21 Days.
content: I purchased these earphones before it worked great and that's why I bought it again. It seems like I have purchased it from a street vendor. It stopped working in just 20 DAYS!!

name: Glen Varghese K.V
title: One side stopped working
content: I have used this headset for nearly 2 years one day the right side of the headset stoped (This is a common issue of this headset, i read a lots of reviews) working and it offers only 1 yr warranty so i cannot replace . I won suggest headset . Its a waste of money

name: Vikas Verma
title: Worst Headphones
content: Pathetic product Noise Cancellation is worst ..while using for audio calls be it zoom , voice , receiver always complais for too much noise coming from my mic 🎤 .Sound is kind of Ok ...too much bass not balance properly ....Never recommend it for professional use.

name: Deepak Gaur
title: Not good as expected
content: Writing this review after using 15 days.. 1. First of all the earbuds are rigid and hurts my ears after using for more than 1 hour.. 2. Though my earhole is small, so it doesn't fit in properly (using smallest bud size) and hurt ears. 3. The mic is not good, have to keep it closer to the mouth to send audible voice.. 4. The bass is good but overall sound is not balanced.. Bought this earphone after reading so many good reviews but eventually got disappointed.

name: Rishabh Sharma
title: Earphones
content: Its my second purchase its for my sister though,the quality of these earphones is really good and last much longer as compared to other earphones in the similar price range because of its sturdy design...But the only problem with these earphones is that the bass is really low but trebble is good!

name: Prateek Gehlot
title: Superb Product, Good price, Best in the business.
content: I've been using this from last few days. It was packed properly and delivered on time. Great sound quality, bass is also very good. Sleek, no tangle issues. I was a bit concerned about the originality and bass issues as realme and JBL are also offering good quality powerful earphones. But I chose Boat are to be frank you can't get any good in this price range. Satisfying product. Happy to get one.

name: Amazonian
title: Classy earphones with flat cables.
content: Brand Boat is always a trusted one.. The clarity of the audio is crisp and clear.. The price is slightly on higher side, but for the one year warranty and the careful handling would fetch you atleast 2 years for sure & looks like we can still go ahead.

name: sampath
title: You have to buy it for this price
content: I don't expected this is from board I thought that it is very cheap and worst quality but now it is mind blowing I don't want to talk this because it's simply superb and amazing and it is awesome saying in the best budget earphones if you want to see the earphone quality just look at my pictures

name: Kajuri
title: Its not upto Mark
content: Its good but there are better headphones, sound is okay. I have tried almost from Bose to JBL to Boat, so compared to all of them, I feel there is some improvement needed in the sound.

name: Roshan Rosh
title: Bought today and Returning now
content: Sound quality was not good for me, i could hear noise while turning up the volume.. The sssss ,shhhhh sounds make a high pitched noise which i find really disturbing.. Have no problems with the build quality , the additional Blue coloured buds didnt fit at all gave up on that.

name: Saurabh pote
title: Cheap quality customer service. Since last 6 months they didnt give me my headphones 👎
content: Most cheap quality customer service from boat👎👎.. Everything is fine in product.. but after a month 1side is stop working, because of that I gave it to customer service but customer service of boat is very cheap quality.. they didn't give me my headphones till last 6 months. And didn't receive my call... Most cheap quality service boat gives to his customers 👎👎👎👎

name: Ashish Mangal
title: Not recommended at all
content: This is just the sound of bass nothing else no vocals, no trebles. One can only hear the bass. If you really wanna watch a movie or listen to some songs i don't recommend this ear phone. And they don't allow the return, only replacement is possible.

name: yogesh mohan singh
title: Nice buy
content: It's been a year since I have bought it and here are the pros and cons.. Pros:. 1. Amazing bass quality.. 2. Nice quality of material used.. 3. Vibrant colour.. 4. Clarity of sound is nice.. 5. Amazing buy for around rs.400. Cons:. 1. No clip or any kind of attachment to clamp the mouth piece to clothes will doing some work.

name: Girish KM
title: Very good sound quality.  Sturdy build.  VFM
content: Very good sound volume mad quality. Bass is also awesome. But still lacks perfection compared to JBL. Build quality is very good for longevity. Ear buds are a bit bigger and can be uncomfortable for long durations at first. Smaller earbuds are also available with the pack but only slightly comfortable.

name: Shreyanshu
title: Quite okay product.
content: Well i had high expectations from this product. The sound quality is okay. Bass is not that great as it claims to be. If you have used any JBL product before then i would recommend you not to buy this product. Because once you're used to JBL you will find this product not that promising. So if you're buy any high end earphones for the first time then it is okay to buy this product. But of you're getting good deal on JBL product in same price range then yoi should go for that. Overall this product is good but not that great. So my rating would 3 out of 5 stars.

name: 🔥Binay Shaw🔥
title: Great sound quality with bad design.
content: I'm giving you a short review.. 1) Sound quality is upto the mark.. 2) Bass and treble are just OP 🔥. 3) Affordable.. Cons.. 1) The design, actually the texture at the end of each earbud hurts, it rubs against the skin and you'll be comfortable enough to wear it for longer duration.

name: naveen
title: Except one problem...
content: The product is awesome.. One of the best earphone brand and model in the market.. the performance is awesome like(Plug into Nirvana) as they said.. And I suggest this product to my friends and family and so many guys in my circle are using this product.. Everybody have the same problem,one earphone is working another one is not working after using some months.. Except this problem everything Wes good.

name: Anonymousss
title: Must buy
content: These are very good boat headphones in this price range.. Sound quality is amazing. Bass quality is dope.. And it gives pretty much fair noise cancellation.. Its a decent purchase of wired headphones under this price.. I am happy with the buy ♥️

name: Prateek Shukla
title: They stop working pretty easily.
content: The problem with these earphones is simple. I have so far used two boat earphones and i have found it they malfunctions pretty easily. Before boat I was using sennheiser cx 180 and they were very reliable compared to boat. In 2 months my bassheads 225 stopped working. Now I can claim warranty that's true but it will take time and I'll have to make a speed post. Do not but boat products.

name: Osho
title: Good, if its deep.
content: Good sound, fine base. Intangible cord is great btw. But only problem i found is its uncomfortable design, it keeps falling off my ear by its own weight. Unless i plug it hard in my ears, its gonna be one harsh journey with songs. 😂

name: Abhishek Banerjee
title: The Sound quality is OK while the build can be better
content: It is good product at this price range, while the Sound quality can be made more precise. The build quality is not very high and rough use can create wear and tear, that is needed to be noted. But for the price range, you can definitely buy and use one for few days.

name: ajay kumar
title: Product is different
content: I order this in 8th Jan. And now one side is not working.. when I was go in service center he said that this is a duplicate product.. I also see that the product is mention that and what I had got, is totally different.. the jack design is different.. what a worst experience with the Amazon.. will u plz return this or fix this problem,,😭😭

name: Bashir
title: Its up to the buyer.....
content: Sound and bass is really too good for this earphone but still not recommended at all.. Dont buy this one as it has metal head and its too heavy, always falls from the ear and also creates pain due to its weight.

name: Ayaz A.
title: Boat 255 white color sound is very slow... Please to get replace
content: I Lke the Red color which m already buy 2 piec before this but now after buying in white color after purchesing its giving issue sound suddenly go down n play slowly as comapre to other boat 255 in red color which m already having it very slow need your help to please suggest what to do bcoz its a very bad experiance for buying in white color my other 2 Boat 255 its working absulety fine n its owsome.... so please suggest what to do how to get service from boat.... plz plz plz revert...

name: Kaushal
title: Not goot for frequent user.
content: Due to heavy metal is used and the structure near ear piece is not good it easily fall down. Its reaaly bad to use whenever u run or walk. It is good to use when u r sitting somewhere.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Stopped working within 2 months.
content: This product is definitely not worth purchasing. The earphones keep slipping off inspite of using the smallest bud size, you can still manage it to use it with the help of wings, but those hurt after keeping the earphones for a long time. The left earbud stopped working only within 2 months of purchase, and the other one used to produce a screeching disturbing noise when the earphone wires were moved. Would not recommend buying this product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Only bass!! Nope
content: Bought this thinking there will be a balance in highs and lows. Realized that in order to enhance bass, the earphone compromises other sounds. Having heard music in Skullcandy, Sony and Sennheiser earphones, I think this brand is nowhere near their sound quality. Wanted to have this as spare earphones, but it doesn't even qualify for that. Sorry boAt, not for me.

name: A Gonsalves
title: Satisfied
content: After having earphones that used to fall off my ears, these ones fit well.. The ear bugs pairs fit in the earphones very firmly so losing them is out of question.. A Ear hook pair is also included, useful while working out or running.. Tangle-free, good quality.

name: Hemanth RH
title: Good Bass, bit heavy earbuds
content: Purchased mainly for bass effect. Noise cancellation is good enough for indoors.. Noise cancellation in outdoors is enough to hear the sound but not the low level ones. Sturdy and flat wire won't get tangled and hence can carry it as folded inside the provided pouch.. Earbuds are heavy and even with hooks might get irritating. Solution is to run the wire over the ear and then insert earbuds. This will make microphone closer to mouth.

name: Mr_dx
title: Quality of product poor
content: what i expected and what i received, no bass in sound just play like 90's radio.a mike switch is also not working properly, call automatic discoonnect ...amazon.in please make sure product is original or not. also, I can't get the invoice of product so how can claim the warranty?

name: Niharika
title: Good headphones (they are heavier than all other headphones and often heavy for commute)
content: Headphones are great, quality of the sound is great. They are perfect for keeping at home or office. I found them to be a bit heavy to carry around for commuting or traveling. They are definitely heavier than other headphones I used in the past.

name: Sayani
title: Pathetic
content: Pathetic excuse for an earphone. The earphone keeps falling off your ears. Have to forcefully stuff it in ears for it to stay. Don't fall for it's cool neon look.

name: Shrey Singh
title: Awesome Sound Quality and Noise Cancellation!!!!
content: Sound quality and noise cancellation are so good. Awesome music experience. Cable doesn't get entangled easily. The only problem with me was it stopped working after 10 months of use although I used to keep them properly. Anyway, it was in the warranty period so I got the replacement. Happy with boAt services. Definitely going to purchase it again.

name: Swati Kumari
title: Love you boat
content: Boat is the best earphones at reasonable price. Nd it also replaces product in warranty period. Sound quality is the awsomest..one can feel every single beat of music very clearly... ❤️❤️❤️. Bass is not too high..bt not too low..you get 90% bass.. Noise cancellation is 10 on 10.

name: Nithin
title: Delivered defective one fist and replaced new with warranty
content: When i first ordered they gave me defective one. After that I claimed warranty on website it took 28 days for replacement due to covid 19. I compared theses earphones with jbl t110 and jbl t210. These are far better than those earphones in bass and build quality. Sound is awesome. These are cheap compared to jbl and best in quality and sound and in everything. 5 stars for these.

name: Bhagyashri Bhakre
title: All over my experience
content: I loved this headsets, as i am fluent voice lover than the bass.... I recommend for bass lover don't buy this but if you are a fluent voice lover than must buy this other than rest headsets...... But sometimes in the public transport when i am traveling and talking at the same time in call , i can't here clear sound...... We can say that it is low volume headsets..... But its awesome i loved it..

name: MIRJA GALIB
title: Not ok
content: Product is not as worth as it seems to be. Eartop is very heavy and not easy to hold on ear. Best not to buy, it's my of openion.

name: Shubham Verma
title: The best earphone in this price range!
content: Writing this review after 8 months of usage.. Top product! Bought it again a couple of times for my friends and family.. The only thing which I've always noticed with all my purchases with Boat is the net-like lid on the earpiece (I don't know exactly what it's called) which covers the inside portion gets detached very quickly. Like within a week. This has happened with all the earphones that I have from boat.. Otherwise it's a fantastic product and I'd recommend this to everyone reading this.

name: Ashish cyril porh
title: Not working , disappointed by Boat and Amazon
content: I had buy this product on 6th August 2020 and today is 20th August 2020, one side of earphone is not working , I couldn't hear anything from one side. Boat and Amazon has disappointed me with this kind of product/service .. P.s If you want to buy this product, Buy in your risk. It seems like wasting money on this product .

name: Subhasis Mukherjee
title: Good Sound for Large Ear Holes
content: May be my ears are not large enough to hold even the smallest additional bud. Sound quality is average if you are not engaging both of your hands to push the speakers inside your ears.

name: A. Srinivasulu
title: Waste of Money
content: Color and design of headphone is good. Coming to sound quality, it's horrible and irritating with high bass. I don't think the noise cancellation will work as they claim. Quality of sound is not as expected. Tried with all the ear buds which they provided. Not even one is fixing properly. I don't recommend this product

name: Kanishk Soni
title: Perfect for bass lovers and who want the quality of boat .
content: This is just amazing for people who love bass and want boat earphones the case is really good and accesories are well managed this may be uncomfortable for some ears but the ear hooks helps a lot. This is really stylish and maintains good sound . Sound is very good build quality top notch . Loved it . If it could have come with a cable manager then its the best .

name: Amazon Customer
title: False advertising
content: False advertising: Bad quality of sound.. The membrane inside the ear plugs ruptured after a month, even with careful use. Now that the return window is closed, I have to bear with this faulty piece of equipment. Sound quality is just average like any cheap earphone.. Very disappointed with the quality of product. Better switch to JBL

name: Deepak
title: Got replaced it after 11 months
content: One side stopped working after 11 months , It has 1 year warranty . So I raised a case to Boat . And they replaced it in 7-10 days. I am so thankful to them.

name: carthikragavan
title: might the making changed, buy the sound quality sustains.
content: Current earphone is little less heavier than the old ones from this model 225, but the sound quality didn't change. I was using 225 for a year, in which the wire damaged at joint in driver end. Now again I bought the same model for 449 rs which is 50 rs less than last time i bought (499 rs), because 225 model is good at banging with bass.

name: IAMGAUSE
title: Worth 500Rs..
content: After 1 year usage.... No change in the music,mic,.. sometimes bass gets lower but after few days it gets normal on its own... Superbbbb sound and bass quality... Supprbb build quality... But very bad fitting into the ear... you can't use it while resting... And In true sense these are wireless.

name: Rehbar Sayyed
title: ... than 40 earphones now excluding headphones but i didn't like the sound of these because of the over powering ...
content: Ok so i have have more than 40 earphones now excluding headphones but i didn't like the sound of these because of the over powering bass i would suggest this to people who are more into heavy bass style listening but if you are like me and wants everything to be balanced like an audiophile you can go with other pairs

name: Amazon Customer
title: Plugs keep getting pulled out of ears
content: The wires are heavy due to which it keeps coming out of your ears. Very difficult to walk, drive or just move around with them on. The weight of the wire pulls the earplugs out of your ears all the time. Just manageable sound quality for tracking calls, video conferencing. Bought it as a stop gap solution

name: Shabbi
title: Works well for 1year
content: This product works for an year only and after that it's dead. I m using boat earphones since past 3years and in 3years I have brought 3boat earphones. But its greatly priced and works well

name: Govind
title: Very good sound & microphone quality and very robust
content: Performance is good and robust builtup. It remained in my pockets and go in washing machine and when I found them after washing and guess what... There was no physical damage visible and when I pluged in they are working perfectly fine. Go for it.

name: Myra
title: Not durable but bass is good.
content: One of the earphone wire broke itself within 15 days of use. It looked of good quality but it broke from the joint of two earphones wires. It is not durable.. However, it delivered good sound quality n great bass.

name: Venkatesh
title: Perfectly worked up to 11 months
content: Perfectly worked up to 11 months. Ear phones quality is very good and service also good. After 11 months one side is not working, aproach customer care, received new piece. Again within 6 months the product not working completely ... Don't know why it is not working.... Anyway I used more than a year..

name: Manikanta
title: Float on Boat
content: I like EveryThing in the headset. But the main drawback is. Due to its metallic nature it not fixes in the ears.It keep on slipping from ears. Apart of that it is a good headset.

name: Dr. Shruti Gode
title: Best quality
content: # Sound quality best. # Noise cancellation good. # Bass quality best. # Tangle free cable. # Length is about 120 CM. # Product includes 5 pairs of. earbuds, one clip, one pair of ear. hooks.

name: TANIA SAHA
title: Satisfied.
content: Amazing product, looking attractive,sound quality is really amazing,it's feel like I am in a Live music concy,I enjoying this product's sound quality.I am satisfied after buying it.You can use it to avoid irritating noise in public place,when you want to take time for relax,But you should not use it when you are crossing line, road,or in a driving or cycling mode.

name: Shailendra Bh
title: Good sound but heavy buds don't stay put.
content: Good earphones, very good sound. But 3 major issues, 1.weight of buds is heavy and don't sustain position in ear with or without ear hook. 2.You need to clip the wire else they pull the ear buds out. 3. U need to keep microphone close to mouth else they create echo in call due to frequency clash of buds and microphone.

name: Raghav sengar
title: worst choice under this budget
content: nothing is there in these earphones except bass I read lots of reviews about boat 225 but this does not fulfill my utility as per my expectation. sound quality is worst there is no clarity in sound and it feels very uncomfortable when you use them for long time say more than 1 hour. I've used jbl T160 before this and those were way more better than this. So personally I have liked this boat 225

name: Aditi Singh
title: Sound quality is great but they are very heavy & keep falling from the ears.
content: The sound quality is great but the problem with these earphones is that they are so heavy that they keep falling from the ears now and then. They are very uncomfortable if you use them while lying down on the bed or couch which I mostly do, so I returned them and ordered realme buds 2 instead

name: ANURAG
title: Good with its price range
content: This earphone is good with its price range,I spent 2 months with this earphone and it's working fine ,you can say I am a bit rough user still it holds very well and about sound quality it is very good for bass lovers ,if you are not a bass lover then I won't recommended this one.. Update(writing on 27/04/2020):-i received this product on 31st Dec 2018 and it provided it's service from that day till tomorrow from now both side works only in a specific position. Be sure I am a very rough user and have definitely used it carelessly for all those days.

name: sonali mahadik Pawar
title: Only for OnePlus
content: This headphones bring a smile on your face with the amount of bass it has. If you have a MI phone don't do for it (even poco) because bass ouput from MI phones is worst. If you have OnePlus don't waste any time reading other reviews and go for it blindly. Noise cancellation is a that great. But at this price best headphones.

name: JASWANTH H B
title: Good earphones
content: Durable earphone in the price range... Sound quality is fantastic and looks stylish too... Provided with extra ear bud cover,. Best in price range

name: mohit kumar
title: Mic is not working as well, this is second time i bought it.
content: I bought this item second time, because i thought the mic of my first boat 225 is damaged or not working well. but when i receive this new one the same issue with this new boat 225 , the mic volume is again very very low, even not listen a single word by another person through the mic.. I am very disappointed with this product.

name: aravindan
title: Disappointed
content: Sound quality, noise cancellation and base all these are fantastic, superb and awesome from boat but the earphone stops working after 3 months. on an average i roughly use 6 hrs per day. No proper response form customer care,even if u replace it with another one, u ll end up with the same issue again. some are lucky to have it for long time they are very few but definitely not for me. huge disappointment.

name: Sachin Singh Negi
title: not so durable and also the build material seems cheap
content: the product quality isn't that good instead of buying one of these BassHeads just add 200-300 bucks more and go for JBL or senheiser, atleast you would appreciate a good brand value and they would look a little bit better than these. overall good sound quality but not at all durable before buying i was a fan of these but now i can say it was a mistake. the build material looks soo damn cheap that if you ignore the boat branding you would say it looks like 150 bucks handsfree.

name: Sailesh
title: Bad sound quality & unproffesional approach of boat team
content: Useless product waste of money... Within one month, there was low sound.. Sent for replacement... Again they sent the some others defective product as a replacement to me with low sound & no bass quality. They think as if customer's are fool.. Loss of hardearned money ...not satisfied with boat teams approach . Will never buy the product online...

name: Jesse
title: Not at all satisfied
content: Not exaggerating but it's the worst product ever, the earphone phone was working for 3 weeks but I just didn't realise that it during calls the other person on the line couldn't hear properly but after 3 weeks the earphone phone totally stopped working and it says it has one year warranty but since it's been three weeks I cannot return or for refund it. it's total waste of money

name: Akshay K
title: Quite a Hassle
content: When I received the product and checked every corner to see if good or bad I came accross the ear piece hole the cloth protection was not there for one ear and we could see what's inside from the hole. And the sound used to crack a bit then was okay. Overall decent product.

name: Soumen maity
title: It also has a problem
content: The looks is very beautiful and the audio quality is also good .Side by side the noise cancellation was perfect and the bass was too deep but it has a defect and it's the biggest negative point of it . I placed it for 7 times and then it placed but for maximum 1 min . I tried all the ear trips but no one was perfect . Please try to change it. If anyone get a earphone, he will check all the features after fitting it in his ears, if he/she didn't fit it well in their ears then how they will judge it that how it is. Think about it...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Boat basshead not delivered. Why?
content: As an elderly person 80+ listening abilities declines. So to overcome this disability, the subject item is being used. It solves all listening music, news, attending phones etc. became very easy and comfortable. Also price is affordable

name: Hanish
title: Free stuff are rolling in
content: Arey yaar. This is my 2nd one. I love to buy it more than other. But now changed by dission. This is just 9th day after buying earphone but i am facing prblm....... Getting something noise. You truly disappointed me......... I need to return...... Now where I need to inform about my prblm...... If you tell me about it...... I will return it.....

name: RAHUL RANJAN
title: Quite a product in its price range
content: I have written this review after a good use of the said product... And I really appreciate commendable performance in terms of noise cancellation , bass and sound quality...and overall durability...with its tangle free wireholds....the only lacunae that it has is that it lacks grip in-ear...unless you use an wing...and sometimes it becomes choky...but in overall rating...it deserves a 4.7 /5 in the ₹1000 range

name: Ashutosh
title: Worst Infrastructure
content: The worst Earphone I've ever purchased till now. The jack wasn't made so good taat it able to fit in the phone. The shape in which it's made is so worst rhat it also not fit in the ears....... Main thing is jack The 3.5mm jack it was made with is so inappropriate that it can able to be fitted in the phone... Only the sound Quality is good... But sound is not everything........... So Don't Buy it.... It's not Worth it... .

name: madhukar pai
title: Great for the price
content: Great for the price. Works great with Xiaomi phones. Reviews which mention that it does not work with Xiaomi phones may have got defective pieces. Sound is clear and crisp. One problem is that buds are heavy and they keep popping out of you ears.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Impressed
content: This is a pretty good set of headphones at this price. If you are looking for a headset with mic that gives good sound output, looks nice and is sturdy enough - this should be the choice. If the sound quality can be enhanced a bit more, this would be perfect!

name: satyam bhandari
title: Bad Earplugs
content: Product comes with extra earplug, from the day of receipt of the earphones earplug started loosing and fallen down it's been a two months now I consumed all the extra ear caps too...And the earphones are waste now this is simply ridiculous. None of the earcap fits...... Pathetic. dont buy it I suggest

name: Omkar Gummidi
title: Your ear will get pain.
content: Iam taking my stars because it is best in sound and but now reliable. And it your ears will get pain after some time. Big in size and misfit in ears. And also it will get damaged at the connector. Don't buy this. Try another one like sony EX150AP etc.

name: Pinku
title: Average
content: It's nice but not up to the mark as I have used Sennheiser CX180, as base is not comparable, boat 225 has ok kind of base, also the ear buds are little large and you will feel that as CX180 doesn't give you that feel that something is put into your ears... however CX180 is an old model and when took the information they told they don't manufacture its parts now

name: VK
title: Heavy base as advertised
content: Okay okay headphones. I bought it for 450. Bass is too much as advertised, but goes beyond hearing comfort after sometime. Volume is loud. Treble and vocals are not that good.. Built is good, flat wire but tangles sometimes. Metal plugs are too heavy and not comfortable. Sound is all about base.

name: Kshitij Pandit
title: Best budget earphones
content: If you are looking for a decent wired earphone within budget then boat bassheads 225 is one of the best choices.. The earphones last long and the sound quality is just perfect with the touch in a little extra bass than other earphones available at this price. overall worth the price.

name: a2z
title: ALERT to buyer; And suggestion to Boat and Amazon
content: It's my first review on Amazon... I feel, it's my responsibility to share my experience so that it will alert someone in future.. Material quality is really good. BUT. I feel severe headache and ear pain after using this headphone. Something is wrong in this product. Definitely I won't suggest this product to anyone.. @Boat: Please ask your executives to test your product before releasing it into market.. @Amazon: if possible, please collect health reports from your customer who are using this product and see how many users facing the ear pain.

name: Kindle Customer
title: Good product in this cost.
content: Pretty good product. Not used much but the first impression is very good. This is my first so less expensive headphone mostly a huge fan of JBL and currently using sony. But was impressed with the output good bass and voice canceling.. Cons sound starts cracking in full volume and lil on heavier side. But good buy in such price.

name: Sumit b.
title: Good sound quality but very not comfortable at all
content: I just placed order without comparing with others so first the sound is really amazing far better then the price but they are really heavy on ur ears it start paining in 20 mins of use really heavy will only recommend if you can take a load on ur ears in terms of weigh not comfortable

name: Amazon Customer
title: Product and delivery Boy is bad as i spectated
content: Product and delivery Boy is bad as i spectated , product is not good in high price and quality its seem like copy , please search best product before buy this .. Uncomfortable to use in ears

name: Ahmad Raza Khan
title: Worse Headphone |
content: Okk.. In the range of 500₹ it's not justified.. Poor quality of wires. Head buds are loose. Fragile wires. Update after six months. 1. microphone stopped working. 2. one side headphone not working. Suggestion:. Don't buy this faulty headphone in this range of hefty Rs. ₹500.00+

name: Daddy V
title: Pathetic product.
content: This is a pathetic product.It keeps on slipping from my ears as this is very heavy.Slight movement while on call generates lots of noise and makes everything inaudible for the person on the other end.

name: Manindra Nath Barman
title: Outstanding quality in budget
content: Best product in this price range . Using it since 2 years still it's performing perfectly. Outstanding sound quality in this price range . Thanks BoAt for this quality product. Also thanks to Amazon for delivery

name: Nikhil Mittal
title: Good Quality Product for calling but Made in China
content: Overall a good buy. If you want to use these for calling, then this could be a perfect earphone for you under 600. But be aware, this is made in China and designed in USA. So Indian pays, Chinese and Americans earns.

name: Rajkumar
title: Not Comfortable.
content: Headset quality is superb but the plug ins provided looks low quality. It has good sound but not comfortable at all.......you can''t use the headset for 30 minutes straight thats for sure. Ears started to hurt due to the size of the ear pieice its two wide for in ear.

name: AK BENIWAL
title: Why you buy boat product??
content: Best earphone in this price range. I recommend this product becoz its bulid quility is great with one year warranty. If you face any problum in between one year then boat definitely replace their product. Its my personal experience becoz am regular user of boat from last four years. Their replacement policy is very impressive and liable.

name: Anoop VS
title: Average Perfomance
content: Not Good , sound quality is above average... If you make high volume the headset will produce some spark sounds and it will irritate your mind...!!! And the cable quality is not good... Easily got tangled and will get damage easily... !!!. Overall its an Average product from the house of BOAT.

name: Vel Muruga
title: JBL offers nice earphones for 700rs with mic and skull Candy offers ...
content: I read all the reviews for this product in Amazon and finally decided to buy it, everyone praised it but to be honest please go for some other earphones for this price, JBL offers nice earphones for 700rs with mic and skull Candy offers earphones without mic for 549rs. If you wany to feel the crisp and clear sound go for jbl and skull candy. Let me talk about this earphones, i appreciate their effort but speaking honestly it's a okay earphones .

name: Mayank
title: Works fine for 3 months
content: Good headphones , works fine but strangely , almost 4-5 headphone lying with me all have the same issue ....The right side stops working ...Not sure why but after a couple of months this happens...

name: Saptarshi
title: Cheapest headphone with noise cancellation but not very comfortable!!
content: Pros:. Cheapest headphone with some kind of noise cancellation and can be felt. Flat wires don't tangle easily. Gold plated jack is great at the price. Good bass quality at the price. Good sound quality at the price. Cons:. Pretty uncomfortable and tends to fall off the ears very frequently!. Though wires are flat, but they are fragile and might tear with only some force. (My one wire got torn in just 3 months with only a bit of pressure!!

name: Parth
title: Great earphones in this price range
content: Using even after 2 years Great earphones. Got mic damaged and got the earphones replaced and again mic got damaged after 1 year so not for someone who uses it to talk. Overall great experience although I don't like bass so I won't recommend it to people who hate bass.

name: SUDIP NAG
title: Extra Bass & Built Quality
content: Under 500...this is best headphone...I am confused between realme buds 2 & boat 225..many youtub videos watch but finally i purchase boat 225 ..& i am fully satisfied..it's bass is really extra...if you are a Dj & ncs song lover than go for it & if you are a story & sad / romantic music lovers than but realme buds 2....

name: Dr. Ayantika Mandal
title: Not satisfied.
content: 1) The sound quality is average. 2) The bass is a bit too harsh making it difficult for the distinction of voice in music. 3) Noise cancellation of the microphone is below average.. 4) The headphones were not working on one side within 2 months of use

name: Parul S.
title: DON'T FALL FOR COSTLY IS BETTER. GO FOR THIS.
content: I am trained musically and it's been over an year that I am using this earphone. Affordable price/ In ear / Noise cancellation/ Great bass/ no worry about tangling it or breaking the wires. Accidentally fell in water twice but still as good as ever. JUST GO FOR IT.

name: SANOSH KUMAR S Y
title: Nice Product
content: boAt Bassheads 225 in Ear Wired Earphones with Mic (Molten Orange) is very useful and enough audible. I have been using this item for Two months. This earphones is comfortable so that I like to use it always. This earphone provides good Sound and bass. Noise cancellation is also good. This is the best earphones below 500rs.

name: Manish Panjiray
title: GOOD INVESTMENT FOR LONG TIME
content: Used this earphones for a year now! And i can say tht this is rough and touch type of earphones which does provide a good sound quality and Bass.. The only Problem i have with this earphone is tht sometimes it may slip from the ear which totally depends on the ear type.. Overall the best earphone i used in this price segment.

name: NUSRAT
title: Awsome to buy
content: I brought and I lost after week. It's awesome headphone. You may found little costly.. But the performance and sound quality is awesome.. I completely loved it.. I ordered again for me and brother . I like the white mist colour. Which is very attractive to me.

name: Pulkit Shakya
title: Should extend warranty period amid lockdown whose falls under the lockdown period..
content: The reason for giving two stars is is that the sound quality best quality everything is fine but your phone write the right one came out and it stopped working sense the eighth month of purchase due to this lockdown I couldn't go to the service centre and lost my warranty of one year in my that's the month going on writing well review and so I am giving you two stars thank you

name: Mr. Rastogi
title: Bang for buck. Worth every penny.
content: I have been using these earphones since 17 months now. These earphones are really sturdy, easy to handle due to tangle free wires. Earpieces are metals they feel like they are built to last. Sound quality is very good regarding the price of the product. Bass is a little bit higher but it is good, not a problem. Microphone is also very good. Calls can be heard clearly.. A real bang for buck earphones.

name: Pranenjyoti
title: Good earphones in the price range but uncomfortable in certain resting positions
content: I have earlier used Sennheiser CX180 and was using JBL CS100 prior to this purchase. Comparable to both of them in most cases except comfort. JBL & Sennheiser much more comfortable. boAt Basshead is comfortable only to use in upright position and that too not for long hours. In any other resting position very uncomfortable.

name: Dr Arnab Saha
title: Recommended for everyone
content: I have used the headphone for last 6 months and obviously I would give it thumbs up the sound quality along with its Bass is very good and the material is also durable for regular use and the style is also amazing that's all go for it if you have a tight budget

name: santhosam
title: Super good value for a money
content: 1. Best sound quality. 2. Good finishing. 3. Easy to wear. 4. 1 time i clime warranty. 5. After warranty claim. 6. 1 time swim with earphone in thevpocket

name: Akshay Swamy
title: Good Product ❤️ Sound Quality 👌 Love It
content: It's very Best Earphones for those who loves bass and loud music. Still it should be better more some times it feels heavy , while using for long time .. But it's good one I love this bcz bass is wowsome 😍. I will give 4/5 for this. Suggestion :- While listening song use music player's Equalizer then you will definitely love the sound, what u want

name: V@m$i
title: After two Months Not working
content: I have purchased 2 months back, suddenly stop working both left & right, i have cross checked with another mobiles and laptop also, its not working, then i register the complaint on BOAT official site, thye told that will check & replace the item with in 15-20 working days

name: Manmeet Sarli
title: Amazing product! For the bass lovers!
content: If we consider the music performance....it's simply amazing! The bass is surely amazing! And the device doesn't hurt the ears ....But it sure does keep coming out of the ear!. The vocals are ample to support the bass(which is 10/10). The microphone is also good.. Best for the price (infact I haven't seen a better earphone in the price range of <₹1000) although I bought it for ₹650

name: Ranjana
title: Must buy
content: I have already used these earphones. And again I ordered these. I consider JBL and boat best accessories company (sound quality,bass quality).. But JBL product looks bit flimsy to me and are bit expensive then boat. So I always prefer boat. I got it for 500.

name: Amazon Customer
title: boAt BassHeads 225 stopped working after 10 months.
content: I am writing this review after 10 months of purchasing this earphone.. The sound quality is good along with bass, but after lightly using it for 10 months first the left earpiece died, then the whole product stopped working. There are no physical damage on the product and i don't know what caused it to stopped working maybe poor materials used during manufacturing, I didn't expect this from such reputed company.

name: AD
title: Poor audio quality as compared to others. DONT BUY.
content: Got a replacement but in short the audio quality is extremely bad as compared to others of even lower costs. Treble response is worst. I DON'T WANT A REPLACEMENT as the audio quality of product is bad, Amazon should refund the money.

name: Kush
title: Everything is good, but it easily gets off the ears.
content: Say if you're working out, and there's sweat inside your ears, you'll repeatedly have to push the plugs inside as they slip and get off.. I haven't seen that with some of the other brands, where they consistently remain in place, even when you're working out.

name: Arjun Ram
title: Superb
content: Got these for my best friend he loved it... The case quality is a big plus... Just if other colours were also available I would have brought one or two more of them...

name: Dipps.jk
title: No return options
content: I lost my phone now I got oneplus 8T . It does not support this type of jack. So I want to return this ear phone. But it has only replace with same item option. Plase help. I want to return ...

name: Shahbaz A.
title: Review after 1 week of use.
content: Bass quality is decent. Sound quality is pretty good. Noise cancellation is somewhat similar to earlier nokia earphones. You wont regret after buying it. If you're looking for earphone under 700 then it's the best option you can go for. Rest upto you.😊

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best one
content: The sound quality is best .. u can listen music or sounds clearly and in very nice form.. I m very happy with this product.. and it is more than 6 mnths for me using this product.. it is as it is till now. From the day I started to use .. very nice .. n good quality.

name: Aman  Farooqui
title: Nice one
content: Awesome earphone in this price. Quality is good. In low price. Good quality boat

name: joravar singh
title: Overall, I suggest you buy it
content: Overall fantastic but it has a few downsides which are not so big considering the price. Pros:. 1. Excellent bass. 2. Excellent sound clarity. 3. Excellent sound isolation. 4. Durable metal build. 5. Adjustable ear bud size. Cons:. 1. Irritating wires. 2. Ear hooks don't fit any ear. 3. Right earphone slightly less comfortable

name: fahadraza
title: Unbreakable
content: Extreme towards bass. That is not that much likely as its boosts bass and lowers treable and vocals. But it has decent surround sound and best build quality.

name: Rohan Yadav
title: Just about ok. Heavy cable and not snug ear plugs
content: Heavy cable makes it cumbersome and then the plugs are not snug plus there is a knocking sound that's replayed when the cable touches ones clothing. Mic is too far down and doesn't catch soft conversations

name: MS
title: High-4
content: I have been using these earphones for more than past 8 months. The sound quality is great. As the name suggests, the base is also good. On the perimeters of noise cancellation, it's not ideal say when you're travelling in Metro or buses. But Overall a good product. Haven't faced any technical glitch yet.

name: Ashish
title: WORST!!
content: Okay,this is the worst earphones i have ever purchased. The earphones are heavy in weight and you cant use this more then 1and a half hour and its stop working in only 16 days. Literally guys 549 ruppees for only 16 days now i have 70 ruppees earphones and its working for 6 months straight i will not suggest to buy this but its your choice:)

name: sandeep
title: Quality is good but this earphone keeps on falling from the ears
content: The music quality of this earphone is good, but the company has not paid attention to the dimensions of the earphones. Now they Keep on falling from the ears. The weight is heavy on the ear side( buds ) ,so overall not satisfied with the product. If you talk about music quality, then its good , but i will go for JBL T100 instead of it taking into consideration all the factors.

name: Vishal
title: Boat Sound clarity and bass is awesome.
content: Ear piece is heavy compared to other earphones hence its falling off from the ear. They gave many buds along with the packet but still it did not fix the issue.. I was using Skull candy before and the ear piece is plastic and lite weight so did not have such issues. Boat Sound clarity and bass is awesome.

name: Tanay Aggarwal
title: NOT A GOOD BUY
content: Utter crap.... Tangle free cable.. MY FOOT... sharp and caused cut on my ears... Can't use in phone without removing cover... Noise cancellation is only when volume is more than 80 percent which is normal for any local earphone as well... Ear sleeves not comfortable.... Sound quality is OK... mic is too close to the mouth that makes unnecessary noise

name: MANIMOZHI.G ISRO
title: Not fitting in the ear firmly.
content: I am using it with Redmi Note 9 Pro Max. The sound quality is very low, no bass effect very horrible. Also it is not fitting in the ear. Getting pain while wearing because so much pressure to insert in the ear for not falling down. It fells down from the ear.

name: Manoj Kumar
title: Worth enough for the price
content: As promised, the headphone is tangle free, thanks to the flat cable. The sound quality is not so great but more than enough for the price being payed. The only drawback would be the single button control with which you can basically just pause and play music or receive and end calls therefore can't change tracks or adjust volume, again a bargain for the price being payed.

name: Parikshit Dev
title: Extremely sturdy pair
content: I've been using these headphones for six months now. This headphones pair is extremely sturdy and even after extreme abused, it continues to work flawlessly.. I've used these headphones while riding my bike continuously for 300 kms and answered calls too without wind noise affecting voice quality (for the person on the other end of call).. I'd suggest these to anyone who needs a pair of headphones that can handle abuse

name: Nilakshi Gupta
title: Stopped working in just 1 month.
content: Stopped working in just 1 month.. I had purchased these boat headphones on 2nd December 2019. Suddenly right ear lead has stopped working after just 1 month. It has a warrenty of 1 year. I want this product to be replaced as soon as possible. I need headphones badly. Such a bad experience with amazon as i have not done any major shopping yet on amazon. Just want this product to be replaced man.

name: Kalia Saab
title: Good 👍
content: sound quality- is good. Build quality - is very good. Bass - is good. Noise canceling- is good too. Just in starting days it may pinch your ears..but after 15-20 days becomes soft a bit

name: umesh
title: Keeps falling from ears in 10 secons
content: Keeps falling from the ear. Cant even hear a song for 10 seconds... Tried all size rubber rings. Hence useless. Theres no option to return also

name: Shridhar Desai
title: Honest Review
content: After 1month of usage I'm reviewing it.. Everything about this product is good. Sound quality - excellent. Build quality - excellent. It can easily last long for more than other products in this price range.. Pros. You can get the best deals in this price range.. &. The biggest con. (It slipout of ear again and again unless you wear earhooks with it, but it also has con after an hour you start feeling pain in ear with it.). Hopefully BOAT will find any solution on it.

name: Sudarshan Dattatray Kadam
title: Boat.. they care for their customers
content: This product is very good in sound quality, At least for this prize range. Choice of Material That i didn't get why they are so heavy..?? They often fell off.. not good for workout... After purchasing Left side was completely mute then I registered my complaint to Boat.. and here come the respectful part... After registering complaint i received lots of mails and massages.. and replace it within next 10 days with fresh product... Good Product

name: Lalit Patil
title: Not comfortable at all. These headphones cause pain in ear.
content: As per sound qulatiy these headphones are good with nice bass. But due to their metal build as well as flat heavy wire they become heavy on ear.. Even i tried all of three guven extra pairs of ear buds but non of them worked. They used fall from ear repeatedley. Also if you want to use them while riding motorcycle or doing some movement (gym, jogging) they will fall. Also not comfortable inside while wearong helmet.. I returned them.

name: Sidharth Kumar Behera
title: Good bass , Lacks clarity .
content: People who write the quality is excelent and etc havent probably used good earphones .. It is decent , bass is good . I did not like the mids and highs and the clarity . It made out of good materials no doubt seems strong too . But hurts the ear . Spend a few extra bucks and buy a soundmagic es18 . Its really good the clarity top notch . Hope this helps .

name: Priscilla Chettiar
title: If it's in your budget, just buy it!! But do take good care of it!!
content: The sound quality is awesome for this price point. About the durability, headphones are headphones, you need to take good care and it will last long. Also, the metal in the ear pods is a bit on the heavier side so they will fall from your ears. But that's not a concern as you get the supporting material along with this. Been using it without any issues. Only drawback is you wont feel like using any other earphones after you get used to this. Pure noise cancellation earphones. Amazing microphone. Liked by everyone whom I've shown and they heard from this

name: Amazon Customer
title: Does not last for a long time.
content: Good headphones for the price!! It also has a good bass effect just like it mentions...was happy with the product initially, but after using it for a few months, one of the speakers stopped working then the mic. This has happened with 4 other people I know personally who purchased the same product from Amazon.

name: Vinoth M A
title: Headset for bass lovers!!
content: Those who for bass lovers, this headset is right choice. After 3 months use, I'm writing this review really it's worth to buy. They are giving 6 set of ear buds so put the ear bud which fits you properly otherwise it'll get fell down continuously but one problem which i faced is you'll feel slight pain after 2-3hrs usage because of weight.

name: JAYAPAL DAMALA
title: Perfect 💯 choose
content: I love boat products bcoz I have a great experience with this company, and I have headphones 🎧 too 510 rockers.. Buy them usually they come at around 500 but offer time so pick at 350rs.. I have been using this company products since 3 years and I'm perfectly ok with it.

name: Vihar Verma
title: Really dissappointed with the make quality
content: The right side yanked off with a slightest tug. Now left with just one ear. Really dissapointed with the quality. Cannot get it replaced as i have lost the detached part. My 200rs earphones have fared better then this. Really dissappointed with the quality. Very fragile. Not for outdoor use. For indoors, only where it doesnt get snagged somewhere.

name: Shivam
title: Too bulky wight for ur ears!
content: Practically useless because it keep on falling and that irritated so much. I want to return but no such option is available. Better go with some earphone with lite wight!! Because the wire and big metal body make it too bulky to stay in ur ears.

name: harsha nair
title: Bought my second pair . Very good product
content: Sound quality is amazing, but some may find it difficult to carry as it falls out of the ear often. Customer service is very supportive as I received the replacement product quickly when my first pair had mic issue

name: Vishal Rajput
title: Good Product

It's built quality is very good but sometimes rubber buds remove automatically from the earphone when you listen music for too long. But for a long trip it's very good product. I have purchased it about Rs499. Thank You Amazon ❤️

name: Kingshuk Medhi
title: Best Product at its price range
content: The delivary was faster than Expected.The Earphone Quality is still awesome even after 4Months of use.. There was only one cone i found that was its Weight of the earpiece It was heavy enough to drop out of your ear if not inserted propperly,If youre looking for a Good Earphone Around this price GO For It.

name: Honestreview
title: Not worth the risk if you outside of Mumbai
content: My headphones went silent within 10months though it has a one year warranty there is no service centre in Kolkata so I have to send it by post to Mumbai that is not worth the money as one can buy new headphones at the postal cast and feel the anxiety of waiting and waiting for new headphones to come!

name: Veda Kumar Raja Masanam
title: Worth every penny
content: This ear phones is worth every penny. The sound quality is very good and so is the build material.. For a music lover like me, bass plays a very key role. And this ear phones have been doing the job pretty well.. Only disadvantage I feel is that there are no buttons on the product. I have to pick up the phone for calls, volume adjustment and for change of tracks. Adding buttons to this would have been wonderful.. Overall a nice product, considering the price in the product.

name: AKHIL
title: Not a long time bet....
content: The product is not durable... Mic stopeed working after 6 to 7 months and also one of the joint of left year broken so built quality is not lasting...Not value for money

name: Syed sabil
title: heavy dutty heavy bassssssss
content: Pros:. 1. Bass (Device dependent). 2. Highs. 3. Inbuilt Mic (multipurpose button). 4. Wide Range of ear buds.. 5. Tangle free flat cable.. Cons:. 1. Earpiece feels cold during winter(metal body).. 2. Buds dont fit easily on earpiece.. Those who want better sound quality and durability, go for this product just awesome....

name: Raj
title: Worst build quality than earlier boat 220 version
content: I had used boat ear phone thrice. But boat basshead 225 is worse than boat 220.. In terms of sound quality.. Two year ago boat created a quality product with cheaper price... Now boat taking more money and provides cheapest build quality ear phone.. This is my last buy from boat

name: AKASH SHIV SHUKLA
title: Boat service quality(Imagine Marketing)
content: Gave 1 star because I have not received exchange of my earphone which is under warranty.. Even after many mail exchange and escalations there were only false promises.. Finally I gave up and bought a new earphone.. The earphone is good and it worked for around 8 months.

name: Lokesh
