title: #durable .. completely satisfying
content: Product is gud, worth money .... Fullfilled my expectations completely.... Most imp.. i am writing dis reveiw aftr more den 3 mnths of using... it is durable ... U should buy it ... Only minor issue is .. it does nt completely fix in ears .. so pull off on little extra force ... But its really worth buying it ..

name: HrudayH
title: Louder and not mind blowing bassy
content: Pick it for souly for good audio quality and good bass under budget. Overall Output is LOUD.. Deep bass is missing means no depth feel overall. but really good earphones for the price. Can pick Blindly.

name: Bikram Kumar Swain
title: Sound quality is good But earphone jack is not connecting properly in my mobile.
content: Sound quality is good in overall. But that earphone jack is not inserting properly in my mobile. For example if I try to keep my mobile in my pocket while listening to music , then earphone jack will loose from the connection. So again I need to connect properly. So before buying this product please check with your friends those who are already using this earphone and try the same in your mobile.

name: Hazarath Khan
title: Not at all happy
content: It is pathetic and very inconvenient to use. Just slips out of the ears. Need to literally push it but it again slips out. Please don't buy

name: PULAK M.
title: Considering the  price value for  money.
content: Sound quality is good. Tangle free wire, feels sturdy and solid. Has lots of color option. Overall recommended for buying.. Purchased for second time. Very good bass. Clarity is good. Tangle free. Recommended.

name: Amazon Customer
title: 8 month product
content: I ordered this headphones in Feb and after 2 months I dropped it on the floor and it's right inear being made of metal it cracked open I've been gluing it since then.. It sound quality is good and noise cancellation too.. After 8 month of daily use it's left inear stopped working and day after both and it says 1yr Warranty!. Ps. Your ear hole shouldn't be small otherwise it would keep on falling on it's own!

name: Deepak kumar
title: Loved this earphones. Ordered twice.
content: What a headphone****. Awesome bass , vocals are clear, noise cancellation is also available there. Trust me other companies are fooling public by selling their earphones in 2k or 3k. Buy this product in just 500 Rs and you will never regret.

name: Raghav Hegde
title: Good sound quality
content: Sound quality is good, due to the wire design it doesn't mess up quickly. As I observe product tend to stop working one side after 7-8 months but boAt's helped me by sending new product as the product was under 1 year warranty.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best in ear phones in the market
content: I ve used earphones from various top brands, but loved this the most. Its comfortable on the ears and sound and bass quality is near perfect. Its finishing is premium style. No complains since its use.

name: Dr.M.Subramaian
title: A decent headphone at this price range
content: This bass heads produce nice and clear sound. Build quality and appearance is excellent. Bass is good but it depends up on your players quality. Use equalizer to produce high quality sound and bass. The mic works well and delivers a noise free sound. Amazons delivery is always perfect. At this price tag (499) boat bass heads 225 is the best than other brands.

name: Balaji
title: Boat a Cheater and looter
content: Waste Product.... Don't even dare to buy the product.... The company has reputation but if your product fails they won't even respond to your calls and complaints.... Dont waste your money by Purchasing Boats ..... You can buy other nice branded products.... Boats is not a worth of eveb 100 rupees... My product failed and i can only buy a new product even if i have warranty because boat(Image Marketing) won't even care to respond to your complaint.... Pls don't buy

name: Mallar M
title: Decent earphones but Bad warranty service
content: Decent earphones but my unit has stopped working within 5 months. Infact I bought two units and both stopped working in a span of 4-5 months. Trying to claim warranty. It has been a week since they have collected the units. Clainh warranty is a long process. Let's see what happens.

name: Nikhil vishwakarma
title: Don't buy this
content: I purchased this headphones today and i found that's it's Branding is not mentioned and i seems to be old after that when i check this it have one side speaker problem near the jack side. I am very dissatisfied by this product .. Really it's not a worth of money .

name: Rahul Singh
title: Dead after 2 years
content: After 2 years they are finally dead. Replaced it once within 9 months of the purchase and after 2 years the earphones stopped working suddenly and they are dead.. Earphones are heavy, they fall down anytime, bass is good.. I would not recommend them for pubg because the trouble is so high when someone shoots it feels like someone is shouting in your year. You will be deaf in no time if you keep playing pubg with these earphone.

name: Tanupriya Biswas
title: AWESOME!!! but same problem as other it falls off...
content: the sound quality is really good i have used boat speakers also its nice and this headphn comes with a one year warranty also so i'm hoping this heaphn tolerates me for much longer because as everyone i'm also a harsh user to a headphn

name: Rajeshwari Jadhav
title: Durability issues
content: The material is good but durability is very poor . I bought 2 earphones....and both have the same problem of durability...the right part of earphones get damaged very quickly...so no sound is heard through right part of earphone...and I can not return also ...coz after 8 or 9 months it starts showing this problem...it has good bass ...overall it's good but when it comes to durability it's worst among the rest of the earphones...

name: Biju Mohan K C
title: Average product. Read before buying.
content: The sound quality of the headphones considering the price point is good. But the earbuds are not comfortable and it will fall off from the ear occasionally. The main reason didn't like this is after 1.5 months one of the earbud stopped working and it took almost a month for me to get the headphones replaced. The boat support team will say the entire service process will take only around 2weeks of time but it is not true. I will prefer JBLc100si over this since that is a great pair of headphones and it is more comfortable to use.

name: PRIYA MUKHERJEE
title: Design unsuitable for use
content: The product is very bad. The shape of the earbud is not suitable. It gets displaced easily. You cant even return this product. They will only replace with the same item. Please do not buy this item

name: Ramesh Chinnusamy
title: Please don't buy this product. Very worst product and service
content: Very worst product.. I purchased 9 months before. Now the left side it's not working. And more over the sound quality also really very bad. After this issue I couldn't able to connect the seller. Really worst service. And also the length also not convening ...very short. I would like to give below one Star.

name: Ajay gupta
title: Dont buy them. Dont expect noice cancellation
content: They are really nice .... I am really Impressed with it but they are very poor when it cpmes to noice cancellation... It just enhances base but not good in terms of soft and classical music. This will stay for initial months .. But as and when you use them you will get a good picture and that is these are crap. The 3.5mm jack wire got broke that to they claim the design is so that it wont break really disappointed.

name: Basavaprabhu
title: Good Sound quality , bad Endurance
content: Boats offer very good range of ear phones, this one is also very good.. no complains on the sound quality, bass and treble.. Looks wise also it is good, but he only let back to this product is its endurance.. After 6-7 month one ear piece stops to work, this is my 2nd boat ear phone and is also having thee same issue, after 8 months of use it abruptly stopped working.

name: Prashant
title: Awesome product.
content: Hats off to amazon for such a quick delivery. About headphoness.. Awesome product.. Good bass..awesome noise cancellation.. Press a little inside in to your ears and enjoy the music without any outside noise...... Be cautious, while driving or traveling.. You won't be abke to hear anything apart from music.. If gou push these a little hard in to your ears.

name: Rishabh Vashisht
title: Microphone stopped working
content: Microphone stopped working within 4 months of purchase, i try to register my product several time on boat complaint website, but they never give me an application number through email so that i can register a complain on their website for pickup. So sick of this product. I trusted and purchased even after seeing the bad reviews.... Dont buy this model atleast and very poor service by boat.

name: Buyer
title: Good earphones
content: Purchased these earphones for 3 times one after another each one last for around 6 months to 1 year for the price of 400-500/- it still worth.. Even branded earphones of Rs. 2000-6000/- last for almost same duration n quality wise also there is no big difference.

name: Vishwaksen Teja
title: Heavy to plugin. Go for other products.
content: Build quality is great. That's where the problem is.. they re heavy to pluggin in ears.. Ears are paining🤦🏻‍♂️.. Other than that, bass , sound everything is good.

name: Sathesh
title: Just ok.
content: At the whole the headphone is good. But there are some areas needs to be improved. Design of the earpiece is too lengthy and heavy which tends to come off from ears. And the ear buds quality needs to be improved, it's not comfortable while in ears. Bass is good.. but audio clarity should be improved.

name: Alisha
title: I dont mind it...its good.
content: I have used other boat earphones...and this is good going by the price point (I got it for discount price )but not the best... the bass is good...in all its okay...only problem i had is it does not comfortably fit in my ears and I've tried all the buds that came with it...but thats a personal problem.

name: Soumadeep Dutta
title: Perfect for the price range
content: The sound quality is great for the price range and really comparable to the 1k priced ones . But the problem faced by me is while taking calls the least volume too seems very loud.So I had to use only one earpiece but still it seems very loud and too sharp and feels uncomfortable. Otherwise no issues with music and other aspects.The wire is flat interestingly making it more durable. Great experience till now.

name: Jobin Joy
title: Don't believe everything cause of a brand name
content: It is very uncomfortable with my ear. Actually, the earbuds won't fit my ears, they always drop out. I don't know it's my ears or the shape but I'll suggest that first try earphones like these out from a local shop or friend and only then buy them if you are comfortable.

name: Shubi
title: Stopp working in 30 days
content: Wire quality not good. Sound is like boss. High sound quality. High bass. High treble. Bt wire i used only 30 days and one side stopped working. In this price u ll go for realme buds 2

name: Vishvesh
title: Basshead Nailed it 📌
content: The Boat Bassheads earphones are simply the best in its class. For such little price, the quality of the product is mind blowing, reason being richer bass base secondly the tuff built in cable quality which makes the strenght and capacity of rough handling, third purely highest quality sound level mike and the phone call/cut; play/pause; song change functionality is its top edge flexibility advantage.. Simply love its Quality 😘

name: Karthik
title: Splendid Earphones
content: Boat Never disappointed me and will not disappoint anybody too, it works so cool with my Pocophone F1 the highs and lows, vocals, bass (Especially Bass)wow it's a complete package and totally Value for money! I highly recommend just go for it, it's a worthy brand !! And Thank you Amazon for perfect delivery in mentioned time and thanks for Boat too!!!

name: Vibhor
title: FALLS OUT OF THE EAR FROM TIME TO TIME
content: AFTER 10 DAYS OF USAGE-. Everything is good like durability and sound quality.. ONLY CON-Falls out of the ears while moving, sometimes even while traveling in a bus. Certainly not a good fit if you're planning to use it while working out. Overall very much satisfied with the product.

name: AKASH PADHAN
title: Must Purchase
content: Don't know how many days will be lasting, But Sound quality is so good. You may purchase blindly because it giving door to step services if any there will be any problem.

name: Vikas Arya
title: High bass.. Alters the sound😤
content: The bass is set so high that it interferes with the original quality of the sound track.. I felt cheated !!!!!!!!!

name: Sudin J.
title: Don't buy it!
content: Bought it on April 24, 2019. Two times it fell off from my table top onto the floor and on June 24, 2019 one side stopped working. My two friends also bought the same headset and faced the same problem. And this thing is so heavy that it will regularly fall out of your ears. With all that heavyness, you would expect some durability. But nein! Totally disappointed.

name: vishal kothawade
title: Good earphones with very bad microphone
content: # Microphone of this earphone is worst ,. # If you are looking to only listening music this holds good sound quality.. # But for calls and recording it's worthless , you need to hold microphone button point almost inside your mouth then only someone from that side hears yoy

name: Maruthi sai kiran Reddy
title: Awesome ..!
content: It's sound quality built quality Nd bass are awesome ..I recommend you ppl to purchase this without any second thought , these are pretty heavy a bit but that doesn't create any problem .I loved these ear phones.if we play a song in it we would feel like we were I. Theatre itself .

name: Sv
title: If You want a budget earphone? Go for this product blindly
content: The sound quality of the product is great for this range!! But what was so disappointing was ,U will not feel so comfortable when you wear them for the first time.U ll have to figure out which position suits u so that the earphone is not going fall often. The Noise cancellation and the call quality r Pakka!

name: Pranava sai
title: The best in the class
content: Amazing product writing this review after2 years cant find any other earphones better than this

name: Sanchita V.
title: Not supporing in samsung galaxy M31
content: Not supporing in Samsung galaxy M31. Please resolve my problm. I was using this earphone in motorola and its working properly but now 2days back i purchased SAMSUNG M31 and got to knw that this earphone is not suporting in M31(calling issue). I am very disappointed. Atleast Boad should mention clearly the supporting device. Please my problem.

name: Omkar Odhekar
title: Excellent for Build Quality & Branding. Good for sound quality.
content: -> Build Quality is premium. It is the best feature of these earphones.. -> The boAt branding is at multiple places and provides the impression of an expensive earphone to the onlookers.. -> The sound quality is quite good. I won't say it is as good as Sennheiser cx180 or Sony MDR, but it is acceptable at its price. Could have been better though.. *If you need earphones only for quality music experience and build quality and branding is not a priority, go for Sennheiser cx180.. *If you need a balanced mixture of build quality, branding and sound quality, go for these boAt bassheads 225.

name: Ushmi Sangoi
title: Best
content: The best product I received.... Sound quality is lit .... No defects ... A very promising product .. I didn't believe in online shopping but yeahh after recieving such good product I'll definitely shop more

name: Narasimman
title: Build quality very good
content: I have purchased this headsets in 2018 , still awesome working condition... 1.Very good build quality. 2.Sound quality awesome

name: Abhiraj S.
title: Did the job great ✌️
content: I've tested these earphones in all aspects.... They performed very well like for gaming, movies nd music they provide a good nd clear sound quality with a good bass nd stereo for games as well plus a metallic design....so all those people who r looking for budget earphones can definitely go for these one✌️

name: Amazon Customer
title: Sound, loudness, bass, treble, clarity are unparallel at this cost.
content: Metal buds r heavy, nt very keen 2 return d product, bt ear fitment issue is d cause & nothing else.2 good & value 4money.Sound,loudness,bass,treble,clarity r unparallel @3k&can tk down any headphone. Do try ds song on des headphones - Becoming insane - infected mushroom at full volume. U will get the feel..going 4 JBL.

name: Ayush Negi
title: One side of the earphone stopped working
content: everything's good...bass sound and quality of the earphones...only problem with these earphones is that one of the earphone stops working....happened with me within a month and my friend had the same problem with boats 225....please fix this issue asap as i cant replace my earphones as the last date for replacement was 16 marcha and it's 25 th of march today...and claiming warranty takes a lot of time...

name: Alen Babu Idicula
title: Boom Bass
content: Superb for bass lovers with effective noise cancellation,small sound can be hear smoothly,flat wires help tangle free.. Got @ 449, definitely go for it !

name: Faheem
title: Not working. And to register complaint it shows no option
content: Nothing to say. Simply awesome product with heavy sound,bass, noise cancellation. Loved the product. Only problem I am facing I have to connect the C Type connecter for to use this earphone. But still good product.. Edit: I have used nearly 10 months. Now yesterday it shopped working with a sound. Now both the earphones are not working. I need replacement or repair

name: Vaibhav
title: Useless
content: Either we need to set them up deep inside the ear or they keep slipping. Useless earphones which will damage the eardrums. It's heavy on treble no bass.

name: abhishek sejwal
title: Very poor fit. Main cable too heavy
content: The wire is too heavy. Hence they keep falling out even though you have a good fit with the earbuds. The drum producing sound has a plastic sheet coating that cannot be removed. The plastic makes annoying chitter-chatter.

name: Clpa sharma
title: Uncomfortable. Very heavy.
content: I bought this earphone after seeing the review but Very much disappoint after I started to use it. I can't listen to music for more than 50 mins because of the heavy metal base on its sides my ears starts to pain. Better go for jbl, little expensive bt worth the price.

name: Comman Man
title: Good Product But Not Easy To Use
content: Durability is good enough but it slips through my ear easily. Need to hold it most of time if using.. Once I dropped it water but it still working. And rubber scobs on ear phone does not fit properly.. Easily it gets detached and due to which I have 2-3 of them. Thanks to boat they have provided 2_3 extra of them.

name: Deepak
title: Good sturdy product
content: Using these headphones for the past 6 months, Two things I like most is that the wires never get tangled and secondly I have been using it pretty roughly but still the headsets sound great. Thumbs up for the sturdiness of this product.

name: Rakesh Shete
title: Superb, excellent product at great price!
content: Super amazing headsets. Sound clarity is crystal clear, quite deep bass but doesn't hurt your ears. Flat wire cable is gr88 and good quality. Mic is good too. Its indeed a great product for the price tag, just that the brand is unknown. I have used Sony, JBL, House of Marley and this one is right up there without any qualms.

name: Amazon Customer
title: boat means bass
content: under 500 price range best earphones for bass lovers and durability of this earphones is better than others superb bquality with superb bass but fitting into the ear is little bit hard

name: Krishnakant Parsekar
title: Waste of money straight forward
content: This product just turned off after 15 days unfortunately I even can't return it back make some improvements boat I also use your other products and they work very well but this earphones are just trash very disappointed you just lost a coustomer

name: RSagar
title: Heavy earphones !
content: Using this product from last 4-5 days. The product looks good. The extra bass is good for listening music but slightly disappointed while using it for talking. The earplugs made of metal are heavy and extended and while using it for long duration I experienced pain in pinna (part of ear). Since the ear plugs are heavy it keep slipping out of the ears.

name: Kushagra
title: Boat Lover
content: Boat is like love . Don’t wanna say anything about this . Just go and buy it . Lovely products . I am using boats earphones headphones speakers years ago and they are still with there quality. I love boat . Go for it

name: Sarvesh
title: Product is good
content: Product is good but while claiming the issue it's lit bit of heacktik for me beacuse of these pandamic situation so I thought Amazon has to find a middle way were customer can not feel heacktik which I am facing. They should tack a complain and forward to respected brand and then they can call or mail us directly

name: Shopaholic Girl
title: Okay product but very cumbersome
content: They are too heavy and the wire is just too thick. Also I put the smallest earphone piece in but it still keeps falling out of my ears.

name: Alby Jose
title: Value for money.
content: Update (after 1 yr.):. One side of earphone got damged. I think its because of my rough usage. Still its a great product and worth money.. Good product in this price range. Writing this review after 1 month. No complaints till now. Super fine. I use it daily and use for gaming (like pubg). I would recommend this, if you are looking for a good product in this price range. Thank you BOAT®.

name: Arpan K.
title: Poor Product
content: Zero star.. Due to metal body it keeps falling from the ear quite often.. It also does not have the volume up and down buttons on it, you need to use the volume button of your mobile.. I repent buying it instead of Samsung which was available at almost similar price.. Don't go for this product friends.

name: Adithya
title: Very very heavy
content: Well, the sound quality, material quality and durability it good. But the product is very very heavy, it didn't stay in your ears with any of the ear buds, just a slight tap on the cable, ear buds will fall off Due to which its uncomfortable.. Not recommended

name: Narine Nandhu
title: Low price, good sound
content: I would give 5 stars fot this head phone bcoz of its price and quality. I brought for 550 rupees. After 3 months one side stoped working. I contacted costomer care and they gave one replacement with in one week. Now its working excellent. I love this headphone. If you want to buy good head phone with limited budget, then you can buy this with closed eyes

name: Lalit
title: the boat basshead 225 is really a good option. Bass
content: Considering the price, the boat basshead 225 is really a good option. Bass, mids, high sounds are good. The only issue is with the ear tips, they really slip out of ears everytime. Also the noise cancellation is good but longer use of this earphone results in headache.

name: Hari prasath
title: Headache not headphone
content: Too Noisy, Bass will give you headach. Cant use for long time. Voice is not much sharper and clear. If u simply need budget headset without any expectation go for this. Otherwise try JBL which I am using for more than 3 years. For 500- 800 range JBL wins...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Overall, love the product. Thank you
content: Good quality. Decently priced.. Love the design and thickness of the wire. However, the earplugs are a little uncomfortable, especially due to the protruding design from the outside one cannot rest the ears properly in bed.

name: Ashish Parshionikar
title: Best for Bass lovers.
content: This is my third Boat 225 specially bought for extra bass. currently i have boat 100 and 242. This 225 is no.1 in bass and 242 is more in to treble with reasonable amount of bass. for vocal and calls for thick voice, 225 rocks.

name: Angel
title: 1st impression is good
content: Today I received my eyerphon ater 1 months i fully revtew on this product.pight now i happy fir this look sound and other function thats y i have 5star on my 1st impression.the product is same like a picture

name: Santhosh
title: Kickass product
content: Posting The review about this earphones after regular usage about one two months this is second boat earphones because of the sound quality and material my dad liked it and took it from me ..... excepting buy something else but at last I stopped at these one because I can't find matching one for these earphones at this price range and build quality ... extremely good bass quality It's a totally thumbs up to buy for these one

name: Melvin
title: Awesome for 500
content: The quality of sound from the earphones is above average considering the price. There is better bass however the quality of sound is not up to the mark if you are a keen listener. Loudness is awesome. The buds provided with the earphones is not good for perfect fit. The wires are intangible. The mic quality is also fine Overall the quality is good but for a keen listener go for a better earphone Sennheiser.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Sound and base is good
content: Everything is good, sound, base, vocal & mic but i'll give it 4 star just because of it's designe since now a days every in-earphone is coming with 45° angel it is 90° which looks very odd and uncomfortable to use. Otherwise sound and build quality is good.

name: girija
title: Average product, nothing great
content: It doesn't tangle much, but a bit too long chords. Also the earplugs keep on falling down because of the weight i guess, even though i tried all the earpads extra ones provided it won't help. Sound is good but they should really work on the comfort of ears as little uncomfortable and falls down. Average product

name: Sufyan A.
title: Good sound, bad fitting
content: Even with the biggest sized buds you get, the headphones don't really plug in properly and since they're heavy, they keep falling out.. Otherwise the sound quality is brilliant.

name: indra g.
title: Don't buy......try something else... anything but this brand
content: Worse...just after 2 months, left speaker stopped working, disappointed very much, 'cause I really liked it at first....try to make lasting products boat..... wouldn't recommend to anyone'cause it's the second time...after I bought the wireless one... stopped working after 3 months.,.no more.

name: Maulik Pandya
title: Better than any other....excellent
content: Excellent Earphone....with superb sound quality.....Things to mention here is.....Crystal clear and detailed sound output......and addition to that extra bass effect makes it awesome.......Using this for my Iphone and it results just mind blowing......Far better than Sony/Scullcandy earphone in terms of price and quality of sound...

name: Archana Kumari
title: Don't choose it if you want for best sound quality and for lectures listen.
content: SOUND QUALITY IS BAD. BUT. WIRE OF EARPHONE IS GOOD. And. It's sound quality is bad,it can irritate our ear in high scale and due to chan chan sound(unpleasant sounds) it not give even good quality of sound ,best sound quality is very far away from it; don't choose it if you want for best and for lectures listen.

name: Vina j.
title: I want a replacement of this product for the same thanks
content: I baoght this product on 2nd jan 2020 now I am finding that voice is echoing not clear voice is also not clear I am using this on my samsung android. Please do the needful

name: E.Ajay sharma
title: Base dominating headphone
content: Yeah it's a good product and delivers a pleasent sound if you are a base lover I certainly say you to buy this because base is the dominating in this headphones if you are a melody lover I prefer you to buy another one and another problem is the wire is too lengthy but overall the product give you the worth of money at this rate..

name: Rohit
title: BUILT QUALITY OF THIS EARPHONE IS TOP NOTCH!!!
content: Its built like a tank .......can expect easily 1.5 years of longevity with rough use.. sound quality = IT surely got the bass but it lacks that vocal's crispiness. Its muddy compared to other earphones. considering the price point its a BANG FOR BUCK.

name: Amazon Customer
title: great product but with some inconveniences
content: the sound produced is okay.. quality of wire is as advertised. but there are problem with the noise cancellation. and the fact that these earphones kept coming off from my ear. especially whenever I put the phone down on the surface of kept it in my pant pocket , it just kept falling out of my ears. I have to keep my head straight up when I wear these earphones, coz whenever I look down, the same thing happened

name: shivaram
title: A technical glitch to be solved. Product wise 3.5/5
content: Sound quality is poor as when u talk via Whatsapp video call there's a disturbance like when u place ur phone near a tape recorder. Such disturbances make this product lose its value and purpose. For music alone it stands too good can give a 4/5 for that.. Boat rockerz plz rectify that technical glitch in your earphones plz.

name: Saravana Kumar
title: Better earphone
content: It's really a best earphone. Amazing sound quality. Range is good. Battery backup is great. Mic quality is good. Only thing worse is, while talking in call, the person in receiving end hears more background noises than our voice. This is the only problem. It's a better earphone with better build quality.

name: Sushma Ghosh
title: The BEST!!!!!
content: If you are a bass lover... then this is jus the right product for you.. Great work by Boat and thanks Amazon for the fast delivery.. The company includes various sizes of earbuds so that you don't have any problem with the earphone slipping out of your ear... Overall a great product at this price... Better than various other premiuim companies like JBL, Phillips, etc

name: Darshan C.
title: Superb quality.....👍👌👌
content: This boat 225 was awesome the sound quality was very nic and the best part is its BASS. The listeners who loves more bass just go for it...

name: Sumedh Dusane
title: VERY HEAVY TIPS!
content: The earbuds are very heavy and keep falling from the ear canals and it' hurts when used for longer time.. The lows are quite inaudible and the only thing it offers is raw bass which isn't the only thing that's needed while listening to music.. Disappointed.

name: MS Deepak
title: Good quality!
content: Very good quality earphones. The bent jack is perfect and there are less chance of you breaking the earphones! The ear piece of metal good quality and Amazing bass quality! And the pin also useful to clip it to ur dress!

name: naveen
title: Rugged well built
content: Good:. It's rugged well built, comes with 10s of spare ear buds... Bad:. Sound is gassy, rather than bass-y, noise cancellation is joke.. Worth money becos it is rugged and well biilt

name: Arish
title: Very satisfied with the sound quality. Best within this price range.
content: Been using for 3 months now, so this will be an honest unbiased review. So first of all, sound quality (noise cancellation, bass and sound combined) is very good, if not the best within the price range. The mic is not that great and the button within the mic is not very useful but the build quality is very great, the wire is durable and overall it's a really nice piece. Totally recommend buying it. :)

name: Prabhjot S.
title: Not strongly recommended Unless on tight budget.
content: Material quality is average.. Sound quality is better than several earphones. But not soo good. Little more investment and you can get such an improved audio quality. Try Sennheiser and see.. The outer packaging is good, but the box inside was in worse condition. Not expected this from Amazon.. Overall, I won't reccomend this unless you are on extremely tight budget.. Personally, I just want to use the mic for video calls. Not adequate for listening music.

name: Minati Boxi
title: dumb category chooser
content: It is very disappointing to see that boAt BassHeads 225 in-Ear Super Extra Bass Headphones is in "mobile and accesseries category but boAt BassHeads 225 Special Edition in-Ear Headphones with Mic and Carrying Case is under "electronics" category. apart from this,they sent a old product . amazon cheated me in the term of cashback giving and seller did in selling

name: Piyush Galphat
title: Good for the price
content: Good for the price.. The ear buds can be slippery on their own so good thing that the box includes a retainer and multiple ear buds sizes.. Sound quality is okayish for the price. You'll miss highs of you have surrounding noise. But in quiet conditions it performs better.

name: Nirmal
title: Good product
content: Sound quality is good.. but the structure of the earpod is odd the rubber is very hard rubber is not a premium quality. If you enjoy your music or video while lying on the bed it will not feel comfortable at all in your ear. Everything is fine sound, bass,built quality wire quality. But it doesn't feel comfortable in your ear at all. I use this earphone for travelling purposes so this is working great for me.

name: Shantala P Bhat
title: Overall good product
content: Overall product is good. First I got the damaged product plus green buds being the spare ones. Even the replacement had green buds though it was working fine..

name: Yagya Aryan
title: Color: Frosty White
content: That's a great deal in 599 and this is bang for your buck but its bass is not that so much good but sound quality is great and when your volume is above 50 percent and then it's cancel the background nosises and it's also great for playing PUBG,GARENA. FREEE FIRE AND CALL OF DUTY. And I feel the sound difference because I use gaming headphone so that's why I feel sound difference

name: Alexander Z
title: MUST BUY
content: PROS:. 1) Cable quality was very good.. 2) sound and Bass quality was good.. 3) call quality was ok.. 4) noise cancellation was normal.. 5) best earphone in this price segment RS:. 499. CONS:. 1) boAt will improve treble and. instrument quality of next generation. earphones.. OVERALL MY RATING IS 4/5

name: Arnab Chakraborty
title: An excellent earphone in budget price... Can depend on this blindly anyday
content: Very sleek degign and build with no extra, bass heads are of metal and have a good fit-in-the-ear design, wire is tangle free-don't get knots in it, finally... Sound is outstanding and that's what it is all about... Also great call quality, its crystal clear... You can expect a life span of 2yrs with everyday use.

name: Nikhath asma
title: Sound quality, Bass quality, noise cancellation excellent for the price
content: Best for the price. Excellent noise cancellation, sound quality and bass quality. Flat cable that helps it not to get tangled easily. Comes with 4 pair of extra buds in different sizes which can be used according to user's preference. In all great quality and worth the money.

name: Gajanand Maheshwari
title: Check it out for Honest review!
content: Pros-. Body design,branding,wire is awesome. You will get a nice sound experience with some kind of extra bass as said,awesome at such price. Cons-. Coming to cons due to metallic finish its heavy and often slip off the ears which is very annoying but you can use the ear holder to hold it but that also doesnt help much. Not recommended for sports like running use as it slips down. Overrall rating 9/10

name: From Kochi
title: Very good earphones for me
content: Very good earphones for me. I am not a very music kind of lover, just a regular music hearing kind of person. It is less tangled type of earphones. Also sound clarity is very good for me. Only I didn't find volume adjustment in theic slot. Also I have not yet figured out how the ear supports work. It's been almost 2 months of usage till date.

name: Bhanu prasad
title: Built problem
content: Waste of money. It is not staying in ears. Sound quality good bass is good. It will not stay in ears it will keep falling after two months use. it is my genuine review. Don't buy. just go for boat bassheads 242

name: Amazon Customer
title: Stopped working within 5 months
content: Stopped working within 5 months. Suddenly one side sounds stopped working. I purchased this product in the end of December 2019, And last week 10th May 2020 it stopped working.. It has a warrenty of 1 year and still under warranty, I want this product to be replaced. Had bad experience with this product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Sound quality: Excellent.
content: Earbud headphones: Got many attachments with this so can be suitable for any ear size. Bass: Extra bass. Comfort and weight: Very comfortable.. Durability: Not sure. I am using since 1 month. Cable dressing and length: Good Quality cable and length is average. Price: Good for this price.. Can be used for communicator call on the PC/Laptop.. Sound quality: Excellent.

name: Munindra Zinzuvadia
title: Really nice sound quality
content: I purchased these earphones after a lot of research. Really impressed with the quality of sound the earphones provide. The bass is nice the volume boost is also impressive. The only thing i didn't like about this thing is the build quality. I mean the cables are just normal flat cables not even breaded one so you may have to be really careful while using it.

name: Rishabh Saxena
title: Average Product
content: Personally i didn't like it. The earplugs are too tight and make a "Twitching" sound when inserted. Looks premium but sound quality is not better than average with low bass for a music lover like me. i recommend sennheiser anyday.

name: Poorna
title: Excellent sound, poor mic quality
content: Excellent sound and noise cancellation.. Mic doesn't work properly, give low quality reception. Some kind of loose contact in mic makes zoom calls disconnected frequently.. For listening excellent.

name: Anonymous_
title: Bass is not as the name tells "super extra bass"
content: The name contradicts the product. You could get a better earphone/headphone at Rs 200- 300 higher price. Bass is not as the name tells " super extra bass "

name: Nikhil pandile
title: Service is very very bad..... My one side earphone is not working i compaint the boat
content: Right now i m trying to call boat caz i mail boat customer serice centre 5th of july and i get my token no but today is 24july.. No one is come to my house pick my earphone..... And it is 7 month old and. Is on warranty period.... But now 18 min is i m in line but they only say wait and wait..... So dont buy boat earphone again..

name: Onkar Bambulkar
title: Very good for Songs, bt average for Gaming bcoz of bass.
content: Sound quality was nyc for songs. as caption bass quality was gud. m usin this headfone gaming pubg. bt in game bass not necessary. its too loud bass to play games. after using 3-4 hrs for gaming its slightly paining in ear.. overall for songs its very gud, bt for gaming bass is loud.

name: Debanjan Sarkar
title: IMPERFECT BUILT QUALITY
content: Built quantity is horrible.. this headphone having a metal piece from where the ear piece get separated that metal piece is so heavy it pull the ear plugs down which requires frequent adjustment . But though it provides a clip which is good but it feel like I'm carrying armour for my headphones . Ear plugs are not that soft.. Wish this company have a better tomorrow.

name: krishna
title: Not Reliable
content: Mick stopped working after 20 days- expected better life time than this. I would suggest to go for higher bracket and save your money on this range-it is a waste whatever is spent to buy this range.

name: Vipul Shah
title: Best Option for laptop use
content: Boat always works nicely.... Package gives different size of ear buds and 2 different color ones.... Nice quality. Works nicely on laptop

name: Sampada
title: A good budget buy product!
content: Have been using it for 3 months... Sound quality is really good at this price.. Bass is OK.. Noise cancellation works well.. Just a slight problem that it slips sometimes from the ears.

name: Charanraj Mani
title: One side of headphone was not working
content: Ordered this headphone for my dad. Received on the day we are leaving out of country. Checked it after one day, one side of the headphone were not working. The return window was closed while I was back to india. Now no way to return it. Felt bad of my choice with Boat. I should have gone with my regular JBL headphone. Cheap quality I guess. Better to go with some other good brands like JBL, SONY, ect... Never again going to recommend boat to any one. This would be my first and last purchase from boat.. Thank you Team boAt..

name: Shaik shafi
title: Very good quality working nice with pc/laptop
content: Good sound quality for listing music and taking calls. Bass is ok

name: Bharatkumar Bhatt
title: Good option
content: Not 100% satisfying as i had logitech ear plugs which were lightweight though very good sound quality, this one is bulky but let me use it.

name: Deepak Ray
title: Worst ear bud structure not fitting in ear.
content: It is not at all fitting to my ear. Constantly coming out. Sound quality is good this is of no use as ear phone doesn't fit in the ear. Try to return and get the refund but it is not possible.

name: soumik swaraj datta
title: Great on sound but poor on Mic
content: boAt BassHeads is a very good earphone in this range. The sound is loud and clear. It looks good and solid. Full marks for it. It is of a great purpose if you want to listen music. However, the marks go down because of it's mic quality. Whenever I have used the earphone, while calling everyone have complained that they are not able to hear me properly. The sound has been very low on their end. Sometimes I have to scream by keeping the microphone near my mouth. As the main reason for which I bought it was making calls, this does not meet my expectation. So would recommend others to buy the earphones after considering their purpose. Surely go for it if you only want to listen music. But if you want to make calls where you would require use the mic, it might not solve the purpose.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Awesome product
content: The product was delivered on time, and the headset is very good the sound quality is very good especially the bass is perfect, with noise cancellation support it is awesome to listen to music or watching videos... Recommended to everyone especially those who love bass..

name: Rupessh
title: the phone behaves erratically and no sound his heard Not satisfied with the product at
content: Highly Dissatisfied..Just after wearing them for about 30 mins , ears start paining almost every time. The headphones are too heavy due to which they keep falling out of the ears every now and then. Additionally if immersed 100% in jack, the phone behaves erratically and no sound his heard. Not satisfied with the product at all

name: Nisha kaur
title: Excellent sound bass and voice.. Worth a buy
content: When it comes to buy earphones or headphones i blindly believe in Boat.was a bit confused before ordering this but whn i got and listened its sound i was stunned..excellent bass, clear sound and noise cancellation.. Just go for it guyss.. Its worth a buy👍

name: God
title: Audio Quality is OK. But Earphones are heavy.
content: - Base is good.. - Audio quality is okay. Better than others in this range.. - Earphones are too heavy. You cannot jog with these plugged in. There is rubber extension to lock these in your ear, but are not too comfortable.

name: Krishnendu Banerjee
title: Mic Issue
content: purchased this four days earlier,mic issue present,during voice call something unwanted fluttering sound coming after 15 to 20 min.sometimes its coming much earlier.Its a problem for opposite side person also.very disturbing and also earplug is not comfortable,coming down automatically.want a return,but it shows a replacement available.

name: KarthikeyanMLP
title: Good quality awesome bass
content: "bass quality" awesome. "sound quality" also good. Cable is tangle free, Its most usable to carry ear phone with pocket.. "225" this model superb. Ear bud bit weight so it may fall if you have different ear size. Use matching ear buds provided.

name: Ana
title: Exactly One year working product!!
content: It's similar to other earphones, worked perfectly for one year, and right after that, one earphone stopped working! The L connector is valid just for a year. Had some high expectations out of this product atleast!

name: Abheer
title: Disappointed😔!!
content: I have used boat 225 earphones in the past, the bass and sound clarity were really good hence I opted for the product without even betting an eyelid. However, the new product that I bought does not offer nearly the sound clarity or the bass as it offered in the predecessor products.. I am really disappointed how boat has lower the product quality with increasing popularity of the company.. Hope someday the company will realise that products last brands don't

name: Ravs
title: Not worth the money you are spending
content: I purchased these after reading lot of reviews and comparisons online with JBL Mi Boat Mivi etc. Finally purchased these but they were not good in sound quality and neither good in durability.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Very uncomfortable
content: The earphone is too uncomfortable to the ears. It immediately pops out of the ears, is too heavy and even the sound quality is not upto the mark. Boat bassheads 100 is a far better option in all aspects (comfort, fit and sound quality) than this one despite being cheaper.

name: Lavanya N
title: I don't recommend
content: 1) I think I had got some defect piece, I hardly used it but the headphones are repaired now. Worst product.. 2) very heavy, doesnt fit if u have small ears, keeps falling from ear. I also have another boat earphones 100 in ear that is far better product

name: Sakshi
title: Bad service
content: Stopped working just after 4 months of use. Have registered a complaint in boat support but have just received an automatic response and no other action taken by them. Really disappointed with the support

name: Rachit Upadhyay
title: This product is very good. Must buy its top of its class in range of below 2000rs
content: Very good earphones at price 599. I am using bose ie20 primarily. Recently i wasted my apple earphones. I liked this earphones since my friend first bought it.. these are meant to durability and microphone on this is quite good.. I got this today. Very good product.

name: BALAMURUGAN
title: Such a excellent gadget to own by everyone. :)
content: I bought this product in Great Indian sale a week ago, initially i was little bit hesitated to buy this after read the mixed reviews. But I went ahead and ordered and got a product after 5 days,then I really proud of my self about my decision to buy this one.The sound quality is crystal clear and bass is also good.. I will give 9/10 for this product. Thank you Amazon for a wonderful product with reasonable price.. Only con is it is coming out of ear sometimes but it's not a big deal for me.

name: Raj Ghoshal
title: Don't buy these
content: Please Don't buy these earphones,. They don't stay in your ear without those support provided in box( and they get lost easily) , also it is very heavy. Better replacement is buying MI earphones or something. I lost one of those supporters and these earphones have became useless for me. :( I don't even know what should i do.

name: Sangeeth
title: Good in bass average in sound quality
content: From the first impressions the earphone has good bass performance but average sound quality. There are about 6 pairs of earbuds but it was hard for me to choose the best, it simply just comes out from ear. The build quality is awesome with flat cables hope to last it for long. And it also provides good noise cancellation. I will edit this review if any of my conclusion changes in future

name: Rita Sethi
title: Good, but gave a headache
content: This set of earphones seemed pretty good for as long as I could use it- the sound quality was good, durable enough to withstand quite a few accidental tugs and drops. Unfortunately, every time I used it, it gave me a headache within the hour, so I had to pass it on to my sister who liked it and continued to use for a year before dropping it in a gutter :D. In conclusion, my three-stars are due to the fact that I couldn't even use them as I intended to. They sure have good material quality, though.

name: Akhil Rane
title: Good Product and decent sound
content: Product is well made and of good sound quality. Have used for over 4 months and happy with buy.. Cable of good length and wont tangle.. Buy recommendation from me.

name: parmanand prajapati
title: Unsatisfactory product
content: I had purchased this product considering good quality product in terms of reliability and durability but after usage of it about a week it has stopped coming sound from one side of the earphone. I have been provided warranty card for the product when I did repeated calls on the number which was mentioned on the warranty card no one was able to answer the call.

name: Ak
title: Ear buds
content: The earphones buds are soo big. They don't fit in my ears. Tried changing the ear buds but no other ear bud fits. And the one it came with are soo big it doesn't fit in my ear and fall off alwayss!!!! This is the first time I'm facing this kind of issue with an earphone

name: Rakesh
title: Worst experience
content: Kind of bad experience in Amazon purchase item, Headset from Amazon is not good. They have always manufacturing defects. It's not good. Second time I am facing the same problem. When I called to Amazon people, they said they can't do anything and I have to go service centre. Which is so far from my house. Amazon people there not helping through, such a worst, am gonna review same with my friends too, finally decided not to purchase at all, this is taking me hectic issue .

name: Kanti
title: Not at all value for money
content: Not recommended while playing pubg. The earphone automatically wakes up google assistant all the time. Often it slows down volume to zero or charges up volume to full. Waste of a product. Boat must work on it. I suggest you not to buy. Waste of a product. Wastage of 600 rs. Could have bought a better pair of boult earpieces with that price.

name: basil johny
title: Very fast delivery.
content: Already have boat headphone before that was brocken when it's taken from my bag.. I recommend this product for my friend they are interested the build quality and sound. Very good and excellent product in budget and very fast delivery Amazon. . Thank you, if I play games with this headset my friends told me to switch off your mic , is some disgusting sound like (rrrr4rrrrrrrrr) like that.. . That's only a problem I found that. Build quality and sound quality is perfect. Only if play games or browsing social network that disgusting sound is going on.. .IAM using Moto x 4 headset

name: saj
title: Excellent earphones if u love bass.
content: Honestly speaking it was good earphone if you love bass then don't think and don't confused too much just buy it.price is Rs. 499. Slightly heavy and sometimes it's not adjust in ear. It built with Nice quality and good wires. I also suggest for JBL CS200si (it has mic and excellent treble and bass). and sennheiser cx 180(but it has no mic but sound quality is excellent).

name: Chetan
title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY..! Sound quality is same as cheap headphones.
content: No Bass at all. Better go to local shop and buy Rs 50 headphone. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY..! I have Boat Rockerz 600 Bluetooth Headphones soI trusted Boat and thought it must be better sound quality so bought it neglecting negative comments. But when received I am very disappointed with sound quality

name: mobin mathew
title: Suggested
content: Boat headbass 225 is a superb product in this price range. *Audio quality: descent audio quality but it is not a crystal clear quality(5/4). *Bass:superb bass quality it's a punchi feeling(5/5). *Build:build quality is excellent(5/5). Nize product in this price range.

name: anshu
title: all good, sounds good
content: all good, sounds good,, quality good, but the buttons is not working for changing track, but it doesn't bother me, because i dont use it so it's okay fir me, bass is excellent, if you use while playing movies, it seems totally like you hear from some very expensive earphones

name: Arman Soni
title: Exceptional
content: Honestly a very good option for cheap earphones. The bass is very nice and whole. Mids have a nice range to it and sounds great. The highs are very nice too, they've never screeched. The build is nice, these are heavier than the usual but that won't affect you in any way. However since the cables are flat and rubbery, when tangled the friction makes it quite inconvenient to Untangle the earphones. Other than that it's a very good product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Within one stop working
content: I bought this product on 15 oct 2017, and i have to replace this product within in a year although service was extremely good, now after replacement one side of this phone is not working. Regarding sound it is ok in this price but i am not happy with this product . I will move to senheiser cx1800 over boat as within one year boat shows his true color and wats the point of spending evry year 500 rs on boat if we get senhsesier in 1500 rs which have a better life time than boat

name: Dhruvrajput
title: Didn't satisfied!!
content: This gadget is ok. As i expected from a boat co. It didn't satisfied me at that level. The Jack diameter is too small . It has no grip it removes with slight movement of wire. And the bass heads there net is of such bad quality it is already removed in use of 3rd day.. And there is no bass i didn't liked it at such price!!

name: Jaysing Patil
title: Bad customer service
content: Loved the earphones and sound quality and noise cancellation is awesome but my left side of my earphones stopped working a month ago and I am not getting any means to contact to boat services even when my earphones are under warranty.The helpline phone number is not working ,the website is not accessible ,the mails are not reaching them either says "mail ids inbox is full" .Hopefully they will read this and help me wid claiming my warranty.Dissapointed in customer service

name: Alish Malik
title: Not good for calling
content: First I had written a good review but now I am changing because it's mik ia not working after use of 4 months.. It has also got 5 extra pair of earbuds and one year warranty. Till now it's fine.. The thing i didn't like was there are no volume buttons. U can only change the track but no volume. Go for it.

name: Gaurav Birla
title: Good clarity, high bass. Nice pricing.
content: High quality earphones. Comfortable but too much bass. Loud and clear, overall decent priced product.. Update after one year of use:. the product is not very durable and even after having flat wires, the tangling problem is still there.

name: Nilesh
title: Value of money 💰🎧
content: Yeah! I really live boat ear and headsets. Also it is a great earphone.. *Bass good. *Mic good. *well fit in ear. *Wire quantity also good. You should buy this product :)

name: Guru Prasad
title: It wont sit in ears
content: Boat should change the design of ear buds. This old design doesn't fit in ears even for few seconds. Very frustrating.. Sound quality is good though. If your ears accept this old classic design of ear buds, you may go for it.

name: Gaurav
title: Boat Headphone Review
content: Really good headphones under this price range. I have 2 other headphones within the same price range one is JBL and other one is of Mi. The sound of this headphone is good not great because bass is not more in this headphone as mentioned but terrible is. So, overall satisfied after using it from past 2 months. Good product

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not the same boAt it used to be.
content: What the hell has happened to boAt. I had an old 225 boat bassheads, which was great and based on this past experience i did place an order for new ones. But its sad to see that, it is not the same quality which it used to be. There is no balance in treble and bass. It is just bass, overwhelmingly annoying bass, and little or no treble. It sounds like beating drums in closed room thats all.

name: Devendra
title: They are good but ...
content: These are good in terms of sound quality but if you ask me about the "Grip". I would say don't buy it.. They will fall from your ears even if you sneeze.

name: Boby K
title: Bulky/heavy product
content: The ear piece is very heavy. You can see the cables are flat. So this product is not suitable for travel purpose. Over all a very bulky product. I was cheated by amazon as they din't allow me to return the product.

name: Shreyansh
title: Quality
content: That slim wire stuff is just OP its vey duarable ..... mic is some what good not excellent but speaker quality is excellent ..... By mistake i left it in my pants it got washed away in the washingmachine still its damn goo no complains and even the attatchents with it are very good

name: BISWAJIT SENAPATI
title: bass quality
content: Sound quality is very good... At this price bass is also very good... But one thing is whenever u plug in to your ear the ear buds are to be out as it is entering into ear properly... Which irritate me

name: sonalipanigrahi
title: Worst products ever received
content: Seems duplicate boat product... today stopped working....both ear buds left and right... don't expect such worst quality products from a branded site like Amazon...

name: Femin
title: best headphone under 1000
content: pros:. sound quality : 9/10. bass : 8/10. treble : 8/10. head phone quality : 10/10. earbuds quality : 10/10. cons:. feels heavy in ears for long term use because of the metal casing.

name: Sohni Kumari.
title: I love the product...!!
content: It's exactly same as shown in the picture...it comes with 1 year warranty..ND overall it was gud... quality is also gud..only one thing which I don't like is that it falls from ear.. otherwise quality wise and performance wise it's gud..ND it also comes with lots of bud attachment in different sizes..wires are also gud they won't break easily like other earphones Does..

name: Lavanya S.
title: Sturdy design and good sound
content: The earbuds are a bit big in size though. I lost sound in one of the buds. Boat replaced as they were still covered by 6 month warranty.

name: Sarvesh Kulkarni
title: Mic issue
content: I have purchase this earphone on 26-04-19, there is no doubt that sound quality of the earphone is fabulous,. But with in month the mic of earphone is not i have heard the same complaint from my friend also that his mic isn't working. Though i can clearly hear songs, listen to call but my voice to that other attendant couldn't reach. So if you are buying this earphone stay alert regarding this issue. This is my experience yours might be different

name: Kunal Bhardwaj
title: Refund/Replacement Required
content: The product is awesome, but my reason for bad star rating is because 10 days passed and one of the side doesn't work now. Would like an exchange or a refund at least, but I'm afraid it was a 7days policy. If you can do something then it would be great, other than that the quality of sound and bass was good.

name: sanket
title: Good quality product in reasonable price.
content: Over all its very good quality product... I have used senizer in ear headphone. Compare to that product. Boat is giving very good quality in mid bass, mid range sound. Wire quality is very nice...end of the day you will get satisfactorily result.

name: Subhaash.S
title: Just go blindly with this. Best earphones
content: Awesome! Fantastic! Mind Blowing!. That's all I can say after using this for more than a month. I personally like this over Jbl and Mi headsets.. Sound quality is amazing.. Bit louder when compared to other headsets at this price range.

name: Maninder singh
title: Really disappointed
content: The earphones are to loose to wear... They do not fit in perfectly... You can't lie on bed while wearing them... If you do so, (specially if u lie kn one side of your body) your ears are gonna abrupt... The pain is unbearable if you are lieng for longer time.... At last, I just wanna say that, don't waste your money on this product... Instead of this, you can go for samsung simple earphones that just cost ₹449.

name: AmazonCustomer Neo
title: Sound is good, but the earphone does not fit well into the ear.
content: The product is decent when it comes to sound quality and noise cancellation. But he biggest issue with the product is it does not fit well into ears. It keeps slipping out and does not feel comfortable. So a 2 star

name: Dr. Sandip Saha
title: Good earphone ,  should be priced 500 only.
content: I purchased this product 2 times at 499 and 549 respectively. Quality of the product which I received is very good. Best part is that it is tangle free. This makes me very comfotlable to pack and unpack it easily.

name: _shruity_
title: Unhappy Costumer
content: I am facing a feedback problem with this product. There are noise vibrations that a person can hear whenever I use these earphones for communication. This one is a replaced product. Still I am facing the same issue. I would request you to refund me my money because I am not happy after using with this product. And replacement is clearly not a solution here.

name: Suraj
title: Tough product
content: I do love boats products. The only problem I had that I wanted a black one but it was out of stock. It's good I accidentally washed it in washing machine it survived somehow and it also survive a fall from 14 feet from my balcony

name: Kindle Customer
title: Awesome earphones
content: Awesome quality in this price ,better than other boat earphones in this price range in terms of noise cancellation and bass quality.. Best thing is bass quality which is not available in other earphones.. Wire can be made tangled free as it got tangled a lot.. But overall good experience in using for 3 months no issues till now.. Will suggest to buy without any problem.

name: Abdul imran
title: Must buy
content: I will give 5 out of 5 for this Earphones. Im reviewing this earphones after using 1 years 4 months. Sound 5 out of 5. Bass 5 out of 5. Treble 5 out of 5. Wire quality 5 out of 4 wire is little less quality. Noise cancellation 5 out of 5. Value for money 5 out of 5,

name: nidhin prasad
title: Good for the price..
content: Build quality is nice..sound output is also good.. earlier i had used letv earphone which was priced at 1000 something..this basshead earphone priced almost half of it and gives same sound output..bass is little bit more pronounced in this..

name: JEN
title: EXCELLENT
content: good product....nice sound.....lot better than 1600rs sony....bcaus i brought it twice and..both became useless in a year.....this i got for 550 and...sound quality same as sony and base is more than sony....best product.....go for it u will love it

name: Prasanna
title: Bad sound quality
content: It's loud and the bass is good. And that's pretty much it. The clarity of the sound is very bad. After using Sennheiser CX180, using this feels like I'm using some local earphones (which are loud).. 2 stars because I got it for 460 during a sale. Earphone with mic for 460. Hence the 2 star. Can use it as a backup earphone. Definitely can't work as primary headphones. Not if you've experienced something like CX180 or better.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Can't rate 5 star for L shaped pin
content: Good material, good sound quality, bass,nice colour but I don't like its L shaped pin. Very uncomfortable when I used my phone in one hand. Straight pin more comfortable to use. If you have earphone hole on top of your phone then it's ok, if bottom then its problematic.

name: Sachin Charpot
title: Worth the money!
content: This headsets are the perfect for this price range. I have used Skullcandy, Sony, JBL and many more and I am glad that this does not disappoint in audio quality.. I am not a big audiophile but I like to hear good quality sound. Build quality is awesome and I think this will last more than 2-3 years if I will not it. Cable quality is also awesome and as far as I can tell you won't have problem of tearing down of cable.. You can sure go for this headsets if you are looking for sturdy and economic headsets.

name: Jaya
title: Boat is a fraud company
content: Don't west ur money on such products boat is fraud company they don't have customer service I purchased 3 headphones and both r stop working in 2-3 months from last 7 months I am trying to connect with there customer service but it's not available

name: Ankit
title: Average but don't have high expectations
content: As other reviews has said , this earphone indeed is very uncomfortable while listening.. After you have purchased , you cannot return it, it can only be replaced.. So before buying think of this point.. Delivery was perfect no issues on that part.. Similarly no damage issues.. Coming to earphone music quality you will have to adjust your music settings as it certainly delivers too much bass (depends on your liking).. Ear plugs ( whatever they are called ) are pain in the a(your imagination) 😀.. Hmm overall it's okay we'll certainly I have decided to dump this earphone onto someone to buy a new one

name: Shambhavi
title: Don't buy if you care about your ears.
content: Sound qualities are all good but what's the worst part is discomfort in using this... Pain started in my ears just after the use of 30 mins... And if it is not comforting my ears then its sound qualities are of no use for me... Wanted to return it but i didn't note that it's non-returnable as i was so confident about Boat...

name: kaustubh007
title: Hell of sound!!! Super !!!
content: The price they charge, there is complete value for money. I just loved ykthe sound quality, build quality and overall opinion is if ur looking for mid ranged earphones, these are the ones you will be hunting for many options. Forget about everything else. This is it!! Perfect bass, serene mids and lows. Just loved them.

name: Sanath Chavan
title: Bass Kings at Budgets !
content: Best in-ear earphones under 600 one can buy, i am using them for like a year, you can't go wrong with them. I ordered them because older ones broke because of me, i forcefully pulled left earphone out of its socket, when i was catching bus and was in hurry. Despite so much wear and right side is still working. Durability of Boat & sennheiser is always unparalleled.

name: Vaibhav
title: Durability 👎
content: This is mainly regarding durability. I think I have had these for over a year and now one side has stopped working. Now, this might not mean much to you if you change your earphones frequently but I like mine to go on until I go for new ones.. Anyway, some of my friends bought this same earphone(i recommended it to them) but theirs have stopped working too and it has not even been a year.

name: ABHIJEET HIRAY
title: For the sound it's the best but for body average.
content: Sound quality and other aspects are really stunning but One thing is not good that the earbuds keep dropping from the ear whenever you move around while listening a song. Even though you wear the safety lock which is available with product. Other wise it is really good product in terms of sound quality.

name: Raghavendra Prabhu
title: Best buy under 500/-
content: I love the bass it is producing. Really a good deal at Rs.499/-. It has tangle free wires, 3-4 pairs of ear buds provided with the package. It also has good noise cancellation mic. My sister told that the ear phone slips out of her ear even after replacing the buds. But I didn't feel it. It was comfortable for me. You can go for it.

name: ShoppingTime
title: Go ahead n buy!!
content: Material sound awesome. Yet to know abt the durability of the product. I assume it should be good since I have been told so many good things abt it. N honestly so far so good. Got this deal for 499/- works fine. Love it!

name: Samarth Handigol
title: Bad Defective product from Amazon
content: Bass and Sound are very very good and this is myns 3rd same earphones using 3years but this time the earphones mic is not good as compared as 2018 and 2017 model. Replacement is also not taking bad product from Amazon

name: Amazon Customer
title: Really good quality... Decent looking, but few problems in mine after 4 months
content: It was the best quality material and sound one would get. The price is amazing, and they surprise you when you use them for the first time. Although mine has been facing some issues after 4 months since april 18. When using during a call, the receiver gets very low sound. At present, when I plug them in, some disturbance is heard like a current hitting its tail, and automatically, the volume of my phone, goes mad, and gets to 0, all of a sudden, and nothing is heard after that obviously.

name: Srayan
title: PLUGGING INTO NIRVANA
content: I bought this product from Boat after a lot of searching and browsing. I even considered the JBL CS100. But I have not been dissapointed by this product. It's bass is really epic and it doesn't even need bass boost to be switched on in your device. It's volume is top of the game, and at a reasonable volume, you can hardly hear outside noise. It is a tad heavy, but fits in snug into my ears, and has a really durable build. It looks classy and the microphone carries your sound very well.

name: Shandilya Abhishek
title: Not worth
content: Don't go for this earphone if you're a bass freak.. It's fittings sucks. U can have Phillips earphones they sound better than it at same range and even below it... Or have ur budget up and go for skull candy jibs or other... Or bose they are best... U can go for boat rockerz headsets bluetooth... They are also value the cost.

name: vipin saini
title: Super earphone with fab bass
content: Super earphone i got it at 469 rs. In lighting deal you can purchase from SD at 450 aprox suoer earphone bass is awesome i dont think that any brand at this price point give you such a fab sound quality ... Only one doubt i have how to cliam warranty if it get damage or stop working

name: Moulika
title: Worth the cost
content: The earphones sound quality is good.. The noise cancelation is definitely better than the previous earphones used. The earbuds of the earphones have arrived in variable sizes too. The bass quality is good too👍

name: Manas Ranjan Mahali
title: My honest review
content: I love this earphone its the 2nd time i am buying .. customer service is great i mean every customer service force customer to courier their products if it is damaged but boat earphones is best in it ..the courier service itself avail door pickup. 2nd i am a bass lover and i use mi phones i have changed my equiliser settings n boy oh boy the bass now is awesome... It have 8 pair earbuds to apply according to your ear...

name: Amazon Customer
title: The best in its price range.
content: Like advertised, the bass is quite prominent in these earphones. But it sounds flat and doesn't have the 'punchy' or vibrating effect like the little higher end jbl and skullcandy earphones do.. But it's the best in its price range. The build is impressive and the mic is quite clear. Sound quality is very good overall.. Bass: 9/10. Call quality: 10/10. Lows and mids: 8.5/10. accessories: 10/10

name: peeyush pratap singh
title: ok product.
content: i was using samsung standard earphone for a long time,,so upgrading to this i feel satisfaction..otherwise product ok. better than my old one.. the only one problem i noticed that the ear buds are too tight and uncomfortable to wear..so i replaced them with my previous ones.

name: M v balaji
title: really awesome
content: I'm an audiophile and this is my honest review.. PROS: punchy bass, superb treble clarity, if you want to enjoy to the limit use sony,redmi mobiles.people with other inferior mobile like me having Lenovo plz use viper for Android.(root required) Rooting doesn't do any problem with mobile.. CONS: less comfortable. ears pains after 2 hours of usage. headphones slips from ears often.. in this budget you can't get any better than this

name: Prabhat
title: Read my review fully. Its not good at all.
content: It is not as good as I expected. If anyone is reading this please don't buy it. Go for the mi earphones. They are much better than these. Its mic doesn't work properly and also it is playing and pausing by itself looks like the buttons are on autoplay. I ordered it 3 months ago and now it is of no use. BTW I have ordered the mi headphones already.

name: Ninad Mandavkar
title: Excellent built quality for earphone that cheap
content: Brought em just for 549. Excellent built quality for earphone that cheap. Sound is amazingly crisp. May be a bit low on bass bit really isn't a major issue. Tested em with a few songs that play a lot of instruments and could hear the distinct sound coming from all of em. Comes with several earplugs to choose from. A relatively new brand but overall great job. Shall review the product again to see how long they last.

name: Gursimran Sekhon
title: Great earphone sound with bass  16 months uses
content: -Great sound. -Great product quantity. -Mic good but in public area voice quality. very low. BUT. Quality of rubber at jack area time to time bad and it will crack and one speaker dead. Due to break of inner wire (after 8-12 month) clicking button stop working

name: sai
title: Nice quality product from boat
content: Quality of the product is nice. Sound and bass is Good. Cable is of ribbon type which is tangle free. Product cost is little higher side. It comes with 1year replacement warranty which is very good.

name: BIXO bs
title: boAt bass heads 225 In-ear headphone..
content: BoAt bass heads 225 In-ear headphone. *Super extra bass. *One button microphone. *Flat tangled free cable. *Extra ear buds. *Sound quality is excellent and I loved it. *Bass quality is also nice but not good as we compare to seinheisser cx180..But it is satisfying. *Nice cancellation is also excellent. As we look overall this headphone worth the price... *Also the earbuds are little bit heavier than other headphones..

name: Argha
title: Sound quality is good enough
content: Sound quality noise cancellation bass quality all are too good.awesome.. Only 3 problems i got - 1.the speaker must be at the lips and because of heavy metal,. 2.the headphone comes out from ear even by fast walking.(but if you use eartight rubber which is given in pack then the problem will not occur).. But at end i am totally satisfied with it.. 3.if you give full sound,your surrounding people can hear it.

name: kunal k.
title: Only good for bass. DONT FIT WELL IN THE EAR.
content: I bought these for the second time after using other earphones. The bass is only what they are good for don't fit that good in the ear. Not at all for you if you are looking to use these during any kind of physical activity.Quality is good for price range.

name: pawan kumar
title: A good budget head phone.
content: This is one of good quality headphone under this budget. Sound quality is good, you feel like over head headphone and when you plug-in it cancels outside phone very well.. The only this missing is audio control button, at least next track.

name: Rubina Kaur
title: Heavy & Instable
content: I'd recommend steering clear of these mostly cause they are extremely heavy and keep moving in and out of ears. Lack of comfort and constant fixation is required. Worse option when you use it while commuting. You will end up engaging in headphones fixation than the music.. Sound quality is good however not worth in the cost

name: navneet kumar
title: Worst quality
content: My headphone mic is not working just after 2 months of use.. There are multiple complaints about this headphone now for durability from my friends as well, ordered based on earlier good reviews but product quality is wrost now. Please replace my headphone.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Great earphones but don't buy for high bass quality
content: I bought this product after much online review and how misleading all these reviews can be. Where is bass in this headphone which is being sold as high bass earphones. It's rather high on treble and instrument sound quality. Other wise a great headphone. Need to use ear accessories to avoid falling off of earphones as they are heavier.

name: Ankit Sonu
title: Extremely Impressive Set of Earphones
content: These are the most impressive set of Earphones I have used considering price point , its got sound signature somewhat equal or somewhere better than Sennheiser CX-275s , and those are 1400₹ earphones.. I am really impressed with these earphones, it's a steal at 500₹ trust me.

name: Ravi Ranjan
title: Amazing headphone
content: I'm writing this after using it from last 6 months.first of all thanks to Amazon for quick delivery. The package delivered was in good condition..package contain 3 pairs of ear cushions which easily fits.also contain 2 earplugs holder..which I dont use. But u can... Now the technical aspects. bass was too good..like a typical expensive Sony or sennhieser earphones..treble is also good..but now the bass is low.. the bass it had provided me earlier at half of the phone volume now giving at full volume..but still its great..but overall its a great product.. U cant expect more than that in such price segment... Cheers go for it..

name: Rohit thapa
title: Best earphones with reasonable price
content: The sound quality is superb. You won't be disappointed by the features mentioned. On the top of that price is reasonable.. From my perspective I think it's better than sony earphones that i was going to buy for 2499. It's price is just 499 with all the features super bass that's what I wanted.. Thanks a lot Amazon.

name: Ragavi
title: Sound quality was more than awesome
content: I received this on before the due date.,. Well packaged.,. Sound quality was really great.,. It comes with multiple size ear buds., so it can fits easily..,. No tangling.,. Look wise it was so pretty good..

name: Bipul anand
title: Good product.you should buy if plan!!!
content: Good product quality and sounds are really awesome.value for money.i bought this product in Rs499 during sale.if you plan to purchase a earphone go through this tangled free product.other earphone are also good like jbl but according to money and brands to show off , this product is nice.....

name: Amazon Customer
title: Definitely bass heads.
content: Found it louder than the other earphones of this price range.Bass is awesome. These are especially for those who love the bass. The bass sometimes overpowers treble and vocals.If you like bass then you can definitely go for this. Build quality is excellent and flat cable is tangle free..
