And the UI version of your phones plays a crucial role in the output of the earplugs. Any phone with equaliser settings will give a good output. In Stock Android sound seems to be flat.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best Earphone! Worth For The Value of Money!
content: Best Quality Earphone. Can trust and busy. The only disadvantage is heavy metallic body so it slips off from the ear but can be managed with ear hooks which is given with the product. Value for money. Just go for it.

name: RUDRANIL ADHIKARI
title: Overall its a good product
content: Its a great product this earphone is having all such qualities which a headphone requires, good bass qualities, sound is crystal clear, cancels useless noice.. It is having two defects felt by me i.e. quality of the mic isn't upto the mark and for me it is not easy to fix it in my ears and keep it stable in my ears it just only comes from my ears easily

name: Madhusudhana Reddy K
title: Best buy at the price offered!
content: The product is just perfect for the price range! I have used sony and jbl before, but they lack some or the other features like sound quality,noise cancellation and even the built quality.. Pros:. Better Sound quality than it's competitors. Built quality is great (metal finish). Better Noise cancellation than it's rivals. Bass is just awesome. Better pricing of all.. Cons:. Nothing as of now. Verdict: Go for it with out second thought.

name: Jyoti Tawde
title: Pathetic
content: This product is not good. I have replaced this item Twice within two months. First time, mic was not working. 2nd time earphone was not working. Service center person told to launch a complain about product. If the product is not good then why we have to pay. I never buy this product again.

name: SHIVAM KUMAR
title: Sound is awesome but earbuds quality is too bad
content: Sound is awesome but earbuds quality is too bad...Instead of giving 6 pairs of low quality buds they should have given 3 pairs.of good quality.. .................................................................................................................................................................................................................................. After about 11 months of use I'm writing its review again just to tell about Boat service.My Earphone's one side stopped working due to a minor cut in the wire. I wasn't sure about if they will replace it because it was due to normal wear and tear. But I thought let me try. So it registered a service complaint and they accepted it. Even then I wasn't sure about they will replace it with a new one. I thought they will send the same unit as the wire was damaged. But they replaced with a new Earphone. They took 20 days to process and no cost was charged for pick up or delivery.. I'm very impressed with Boat's service support and will recommend people to buy its products. But this Earphone is not that good. It keeps falling from ear due to its heavy weight.

name: swapneswar barik
title: Good sound but heavy, jack issue will be there 7 months after
content: I like the bass and quality but it's very heavy and you can't jog wearing it, it will come out. Sound quality is still impressive. today almost after 7 months the same problem happened... the #jack issue... i have brought before this also... same problem i faced... after same 7 months...

name: Savio Fernandes
title: Built to last quality and awesome sound.
content: Freaking awesome!. Sounds like a theater in your head.. It's boomy and also high on the highs, but bit low on the mids.. The built quality is super, could last for a decade with good care.. Well almost all boAt products are very well built and have that built to last feel.

name: Siddharth Kumar
title: Bass Lovers
content: Very good sound quality in this budget. Specially for bass lovers.. 1. Doesn't fit in ear when walking running using normal ear buds.. 2. 3.5 mm jack is loose after use of 6 months. It eject by small pull. But it was very tight fit when new.. Rest is good. Value for money. Bass lover will be very very Happy after buy this. Check service center in your city before buy boat headset.

name: Gokul Krishna
title: Worth it
content: The headphones are fantastic. The bass is nice and clarity is awesome. The package includes 6 sets of replaceable earbuds in 3 different sizes, making it convenient for personal adjustments. The tangle free cable is really helpful.. 4 stars only because microphone is not upto the mark. Call and recording sounds are okay, but not great.. Overall, a superb product from boAt.

name: Gideon Reginold
title: Excellent bass with excellent durablity
content: I think this is the most durable headset i ever bought excellent build quality , with excellent bass, Vocals are good , after 70 % of volume the vocals got distorted and the sound got so loud, i think 70% is good enough for listining to music and watching videos.. Only bad thing is the ear piece is too heavy very uncomfortable for using long period of time other than that best headset in the price segment go for it.

name: SHAHID
title: Will not work for one year
content: Within 4 months the earphones started giving a cracking sound. The warranty is for one year.. But the service center is 15 kms from where I stay. Now I will have to take a leave to have my headphones serviced which, I am not sure, would be returned fixed in a single visit.

name: SAURABH BHARDWAJ
title: Excellent voice and cable quality, but difficult to wear
content: Sound quality is excellent. Cable quality is also very good but it is sometimes very irritating to wear this earphone as it has very bulky audio drivers and difficult to fit in the ears. Can't wear while sleeping on one side as it will create very much pain due to its size and shape.

name: Prajwal
title: Don't make mistake
content: Please don't buy if you need good ergonomic feel, these earphones literally creats pain in your ears, built quality is good at this price range.. Think and buy I was jbl user first time bought this because of it's price and reviews, u get good bass, but if u use good tuning apps u can also get in any earphones of this range.. Buy JBL or Sanheiser earphones,only flat cables one. don't buy these if are going to use for long periods, like for gaming, movies.. U will regret trust me.

name: DG
title: Good for bass
content: If you want bass when listening to music on your phone, these should be fine. Not very accurate sound, but good for the price. I bought them as a gift and the person likes it.

name: Rajesh Dash
title: Not working after 6months.Bad service by boat
content: Please dont buy it. Mine not at all audible after 6 mnths of usage. I had made a complaint for replacement but i received the same earphone with same issue. Disappointed with the service.

name: Shubham
title: Bad quality
content: I had buy this product in the end of January it seems good in several 2 months this product has a great sound and bass. but after 2 months one of my earpiece get damage and get broke.the sound of the product is good but quality is not so good. I have 1 year warranty. So plzz Amazon replace my product as soon as possible. I really need a earphones in this lockdown.

name: mitul
title: Excellent product
content: Excellent product at this price. First I hesitate to order, but when I received and tested its results are too good. Nice product. And Fast delivery too.. Amazon has improved its services a lot in last one year.

name: Chaitra Goswami
title: Perfect at this price
content: I've been using these for so long. It has rich bass and clear audio quality. Looks are elegant. At this price these are perfect pair of earphones you can get.

name: SOURABH ABISHAK KHALKHO
title: Poor
content: Zero noise cancellations and pop out from ear all the time and very uncomfortable do not bye and quality is not sufficient

name: himanshu
title: one of the earphone stopped working
content: one side worksperfectly..the other works only after the wire is twisted/pushed ..it worked fine for ayear and then just stopped working

name: Anup kumar
title: We get more than we pay
content: It is a valuable buy at such a cheap rate also people who use their laptops for regular purpose can go for it as it has a Lshape connector which keeps it hassle free. The sound quality and comfort are far ahead than expected at this price. In total a perfect but for the price.

name: SJG
title: //.Accept Bass and wire quality nothing is good//.
content: Pros../. =Bass but is very distorting. =Wire quality top notch for this price. Cons../many. =Sound clarity is worst it's not clear due to Bass which is not balanced... =Worst thing about it is the fit it is one of the worst fitting earphone it will start to fall out in few mins and worst part is it hurts a lot...

name: Sourav Majhi
title: Crisp sound!
content: Really impressed with the sound quality. I was using CX 180 before this which I feel is easily the best headphones below 1k.. But this time I wanted to buy a cheaper one so I ordered this boat bass head 225. To my surprise this headphone is no less than CX 180.. The sound is very clear and crisp. Bass and treble is well balanced, the noise cancellation is great as well. And it also has mic which the CX 180 lacks. I became a fan of boat headphones after using this product.. Highly recommendable.

name: Mohit
title: Value for money.
content: Best headphones for the price range. Super immersive sound quality when watching movies on a laptop or an iPad. Love the sound insolation, just the right amount to keep you aware of your surrounding.

name: Ratnakar
title: Average product.
content: Good that the cable is tangle-free. But the shape of earpieces aren't good. It doesn't fit properly in the ear and sometimes it's painful if you push them to listen clearly. Quality of sound is good but not great. The earpieces are really strong and can be used roughly, so that's a plus point.

name: Alok
title: Right end stopped working in first 5 months
content: I am prime customer, however this purchas makes me feel like crime customer. The right end of the earphones has stopped working in first 5 months of purchase. I have registered a complaint and looking forward for boat team to have it replaced. I was happy with the product until the time it was working. Today, on prime day, i have ordered another boat wireless bluetooth earphones which means i still have faith in boat products but next 20 days will conclude it.

name: Viswa Bai
title: This price is very low for its performance, go grab soon
content: U can't just hate this, very hard to find a defect with Amazon as well as boat. If u don't want to spend thousands on earphones and just need all features in a small budget, Go for it guys

name: Vignesh sivakolundu
title: Powerful bass which I never seen
content: Ultimate bass.... Marvelous headset.. I never seen like this... Product is worth for money.. More colour option also available I like green so I ordered this colour ... Comparing with other headset this is very powerful... I like it 😍 boat is best branded too.. With this headset I got many spare of the rubber parts... I will recommended to buy this product...

name: G.S.PRASAD
title: Highly satisfied.
content: I have been using these earphones for about three months. The earpieces fit perfectly in the ear. The product comes with spare ear buds of various sizes for the user's convenience. The microphone has a button for playback. The quality of the product is good. The wires are sturdy. Audio rendering is very good even in external noise. All in all, these earphones are a value for money.

name: Laxit bhardwaj
title: Nice earphones
content: Bass is very nice.. It is more louder and the treble sound is much more which is a drawback. This sounds like much more sharper.. But if a person is listening on a moderate volume this earphone is just crystal clear with heavy bass. Enjoyed listening to it. Well balanced earphone.

name: Ankit Parihar
title: Overall a fine product
content: Today as I am posting this review this product worked just fine for almost 5 months and now it has got intermittent volume issues. And also mic malfunctioning. Otherwise it worked for fine. Good thing to mention is it has a year warranty I have placed the request for a replacement. Hoping to get it done soon.

name: Ami
title: Good Quality
content: The earphones have great sound and built quality. However it is a little uncomfortable to use, as the earphones are long and keep falling off from the ears.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good to buy this product. I recommend that to all
content: Awesome sound quality, well built bullet shaped earphone with broad stripped wire. 3/5 for durability, just because earbuds gets separated multiple times due to less elasticity. Finding and matching similar earbuds in the market is worrisome.

name: Manowar S.
title: Good quality headphones
content: Material quality is good, sound quality is good in terms of listening to music, but when used for call its not that great. The product looks durable but since I have used it only for a month, so may be not the right time to comment on that part.. Over all if we see, for such a cost its a very good product.

name: Amit
title: After 2 months of usage
content: Jack does not fit in completely inside OnePlus 3 3.5 mm slot.Also the buttons miss functions or many a times do not function at all. Poor product quality. Also poor after sale service with only 1service centre in Mumbai. That too in Goregaon.

name: MAYUR
title: Good.
content: It's good.But can't say about its lifespan.. Seems like hard material but what can you say about electronics items.. About the bass & quality,yes definitely it has a wide bass & quality is good but not as compared to skullcandy & JBL.. I would say opt for higher brands if you can double your expense for much better experience,either wise the product is worth it but costly.

name: vicky issac
title: Attractive sound quality and best
content: Loud & terrible clarity was awesome. Bass was overed i like it more.. Weight of metal bud its seems like heavy feel.. Length of wire was long it good while walking but weight of bud feels heavy not holding properly.. All sound quality makes u awesome

name: Farhan Ahmed
title: Mic issue and no resolution provided
content: Boat earphones services are very poor.. No replacement and not responding customer support number.. I have purchased this headphone but i am facing issue with mic but no resolution provide by the company.. I really request to you all don't purchase boat product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good and economical. Used for a year
content: The product was good and was bought for 450/- . i used it for a year easily. After that the Mic didnt work properly and along the 3.5mm jack .i had to go to customer center to ask for replacement under warranty and they changed it. thanks

name: lionell furtado
title: Bad quality and poor customer service - Boats earphones
content: Both the earphone 1 month back and already the right side has stopped working..Contacted boats customer service..they said that they cannot replace Amazon & Amazon is not giving a replacement for the earphones..Now I am stuck with a earphones that has only one side working and is not even 2 months old.. Pathetic!!

name: Abhay Prakash
title: Good headphones but disappointing design
content: It's a really good looking pair of earphones. I really love the metallic touch to the portion above the ear buds. The main and horrible problem I faced is how it just doesn't stay in your ears. You just shake it and voila it's out of your ears. Just so frustrating. It's got no design mechanism to hold it inside ur ears. Otherwise really good product

name: Prashobh A
title: Excellent Product
content: Excellent product in this price range. The bass is excellent. The fit and finish of the product is worth mentioning.

name: pradeep nair
title: Good sound quality. Not comfortable to wear.
content: One side is not working now. Used it for 22 months . Sound quality is good. But it's not comfortable wearing it .that's the only reason for three stars

name: RB
title: Amazing Audio quality
content: Good product at reasonable price. Pretty good audio quality for both mobile and laptop calls and I would recommend this product for everybody. I received it in just one day of order.

name: Anu
title: One Side Malfunctions
content: One side stopped working within a few days. Also, the wire connecting the earphones is quite flimsy and stretchable. Low price is the only selling point for this pair. JBL offers a better bargain for the price paid.

name: Susmitha
title: for workout, noise cancellation
content: Noise cancellatio i didn't observe any difference, like my voice and near by vehicles voices are clearly listened by other person.. Sound quality is good. For working out, like running or jogging they gave only one pair of rubber ring, it slips away from the headset and had many times misplaced.

name: sudhakar p.
title: Just ok bass not great
content: After reading reviews I bought these ear phones expecting a super/duper bass. But this is just a normal bass, not as expected. Also they keep falling from your ears.

name: Naveen
title: Best Ever & Cheap In-Ear Headphones I have ever used :)
content: My boAt has never left me unsatisfied whenever I hit them up with music filling my ears in a pure amazing ride.. Hope this gets to the point where you feel like to try these boAts... Have a happy day with some Music!

name: Veera
title: Worth buying..
content: Product quality is awesome. Baught this 3 years back and ordered again for second time. Same quality and the sets of buds they provide with this headset are the best.

name: Daud Ibrahim
title: Pros cons
content: Bass is to good 4/5. Good for music and calling. Even you can listen music by connect it to PC. Build is quality is 3/5. Jack quality is quite good than older models.. Package is attractive and nice.. Comes with different size of ear pieces

name: Rakesh Sharma
title: Great Performance at Bargain Price
content: Great Product that offers Excellent Value for Money... I am using these Earphones since 2017 and this is second time I have Purchased these from Amazon... Highly Recommended...

name: SATYA ABHILAS DAS
title: Worst experience ever...
content: I brought this one last month and within a month .. it's one side ear speaker stoped working... and bass is too high ... you need to set the volume down to listen a slow romantic track... also this one lowers down your phone original hansfree volume... but mi basic 399 earphone instead of this one... which works smooth n fine for years and delivers a good quality music... Sher ki puch khareedne se achha billi ka shar kharido... fyde mein rahoge... switch to mi

name: Chinmaya
title: Product worth it's price
content: Wire is too long. Also microphone is away from mouth. Need to clip it to keep microphone close to mouth and make myself audible on call. In package got case, 3 pairs ear plugs of diff sizes, a pair of earlobe plug.. Product worth it's price

name: Sumedh
title: Not for music lovers
content: i bought these headphones a few days ago,... let tell u guys I've used JBL T100A, JBL T150A, then sennheiser cx 180, and then JBL C150Si.... So yes, I love listening to the music... Boat Basshead has good built quality, looks pretty good, tangle free, but doesn't sound great,.... Bass is not that good, even if it has been named as Basshead, no very clear sound quality, but yeah cheaper than the others.... If you are music Lover like me, then I'll suggest you to go for Sennheiser Cx 180, or JBL T150A, both of these have very nice bass and clear sound....

name: Vickyss
title: Best once in the price range.Go for it
content: Best one in the market. Will go on for an year at least, that's how good the build quality is.. Stylish and comfortable. Lil heavy as the earpiece is completely metal. Sound and bass is awesome. Purchased again when one got defected after using for an year. Goo for it

name: Arpita R.
title: Best in price range.
content: The quality of sound is soothing. The clarity of vocal is great and the best part is its angle jack which provide longevity to the wire.

name: Ujjwal
title: Good but not best
content: Noise cancelation ? You came to the right place boat is making so many premium yet low price products. They work really great when it comes to Music and gaming. But there's this one problem it doesn't lasts 3-4months. I've bought another one. It's mic stopped working all of a sudden after 3 months but still buds are working properly. At this price its okay to loose mic lol.

name: nayan
title: 85% happy
content: sound quality good n bass is good. most important 1yr warranty. 6 ear rubber small, medium, large 2 pair. packing n items r branded n standerd. this sound quality available in local market in 150/200₹ but there is no warranty, no standard packing, no extrabass,. the same sound quality is available in ubon in 250₹ but not 1 yr warranty,. i request to company, plz ear fitting shape made like ubon n jbl , because this fitting is not perfect. frnds u feel more effective in original sounds quality in standerd print but i hv low quality audio n video , u cant enjoy original quality. (like talkiz print video or low frequency audio. in short sound quality good but not remarkable,. u can buy this price reason of 1yr warranty

name: M R Kanth
title: For loud band sound lovers....
content: Don't expect crystal clear music in this earphone.. This product is purely for people who listen to music in complete high volume.. If you keep high volume you feel that you are in some marriage baaraat or Ganesh visarjan procession. Average quality sound with high loudness.

name: jomy mathew
title: Not good
content: Dear friends, please don’t buy this product because my ear phone isn’t working after 7 months used.so many five star reviews is sowing here I think all are updated after one week use reviews.if anyone buying this product please update your reviews after 6 months.

name: Asavari A.
title: Value for money..using since more than a year
content: Sound quality is good however Mic stopped working in less than 2months. People complain that they can't hear me.. Edited - 19.12.18- Boat's customer support is very good. I placed a complaint on their website, and they took my product back and sent me repaired one. That is working perfectly fine now. I am giving 4 stars now for their customer service.. Update- 04.12.19: still intact..working pretty well. Bought it for ₹500 and it's totally value for money.

name: Gowriganeesh
title: JBL nice one
content: Nice one.. but it will stop working after one year... May be completely Stop working or partial which means one side will stop working.. JBL in just ₹100 higher than this one so I will prefer JBL

name: Ananya Chakrabortty
title: Awesome Sound
content: It's pretty good item. I first use boat rockerz 510 headphone. It's very good quality than I consider buy a wire headphone And got this boat bass heads 225. Bass is very good and price is awesome. It's have 1 year warranty. Tanx... Boat 🙏

name: Kalyan K.
title: Beautiful Headphones
content: Beautiful headphones, loved the lime color, looks very slick. I certainly enjoying the music. The bass is top notch for this budget. If you compare other headphones like Sony, Jbl, etc..... this "boAt Bassheads 225" will do the justice. I meant to say in terms of low budget headphones.

name: Lords Ninja7
title: I got returned product 😭
content: It seems I got returned product because earmuffs is dirty .left earpiece net is torn. Now I can't return this product, I have no bank account to get refund , now what I will do ? I have lost my 550 rupees and the delivery boy didn't gave me the 1 rupee back😭. And 1ear muff is missing.

name: Jordan
title: Not durable. Can't reach customer care to claim warranty.
content: Within 2 months of buying these earphones, it suddenly stopped working. I am a delicate user. I trusted Boat's durability and they let me down. Even worse, there's no use of having warranty if the customer care number is always unreachable.

name: adhikari deepak
title: Dissent earphone but JBl t160 is far better than this.
content: The wire is good and tangle free in real mean.but the part of earphone which fit in the ear is not perfect and smooth.. I think shapiis not correct.. Sound quality is good but base is not much.it will disappoint the base lovers.. The packaging is of ordinary level.it should be improved.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Headset sound is good but microphone is not working.
content: The headset sound quality specially about Bass is good. But Microphone is not working. I replace it with amazon replace policy. The new one was working fine till 10-15 days then again Microphone is not working. Now also microphone is not working. so can not pick up phone call through headset. Also the ear plug is metal based so heavy in ear not much useful if you are using while jogging/Walking.

name: Krrish
title: Quality is satisfactory one earphone not working after 5 months normal usage.
content: Loaded with heavy bass but its better. Quality is not much better as expected, cant compare with branded earphones. But its good for the price with provided all accessories and awesome design, carry nicely. And one earphone not working on 5 months usage.

name: Devashish Kachhap
title: One of the Best Earphones in Below Rupees 600 price range!
content: The BOAT Basshead - 225 is the masterpiece for listening the sounds having more Drum-percussion. Bass is really outstanding, Perfect Noise Cancellation, Treble is slightly annoying if you love to listen songs in maximum volume. Extra 3 attachment earbuds are provided which also work well according to your ears compatibility. Reasonable price for this masterpiece!

name: krishna
title: Must buy
content: Superb in this price segment. Very lound sound. Bass extraordinary, you cant imagine more than this in this low budget, you can feel like over ear headphone, must buy without second thought. I bought both jbl infinity and this and i must say this is also really good headphone in low price.

name: deepshikha porwal
title: Not worth the money
content: Back part of headphones is heavy so it is not sticking at ear, I am not happy with sound quality as well, right earplugs is not working properly I have exchanged my headphones because no return option available for this product but still I am facing the same problem with new product also.

name: ananya chakraborty
title: Amazing sound quality
content: I got it at an amazing deal of 350 bucks and the sound quality is great. If you purchase it from store you get it for 800 bucks but thanks to Amazon we get good quality products at best rate. Sound quality is great and bass quality is perfect

name: Gurpreet Singh
title: No Service No Replacement Don't Buy.
content: One side Not working after 2 month. I bought the headphone on 2november 2020 but now not working and not any system to repairs or change. Service centre also not give any respon.

name: pritam bhausaheb panhale
title: Good for money.
content: Good for its price. The bass is not as expected if you were user of JBL. Still for that price you get a descent headphones. The good thing is that wire is very tough so wont be cut or break easily. Good colour options available. You may disappoint if you are hard core music listener.

name: 🤘 Saaswat Panigrahi 🤘
title: Good Sound at Uncomfortable Ear Fit
content: Sound Quality Is Good Morning Doubt But It's Not At All Comfortable To Wear for more than an hour. If you sleep wearing this or while traveling or If You take calls using this and talk for more than 20-30 mins, you'll feel this as a piece of junk. Earls start paining

name: Sourabh Negi
title: No Vol button and it doesnt stick to your ears
content: Go for realme 2. No vol control button. Realme 2 is better. It keeps falling again and again. You cant use it while you are walking or doing something because it doesnt stick to your ears.

name: Shaikh Jounaid
title: Boat stands too it's words
content: They were a great purchase , Boat really do sta d on there word for the warranty , these were just for 500rs and still then I had issues with the microphone I got a replacement after 5 months off using it that too home delivery .. Great experience from Boat

name: Deepesh Tripathi
title: IF YOU ARE A MUSIC LOVER, DONT BUY IT - HONEST REVIEW
content: As a music lover i am very disappoint after purchasing this product.. Pros-. 1-long cable. 2. Inbuilt Mic. 3. Wide Range of ear buds.. 4. Tangle free flat cable.. Cons -. 1. Not so comfortable fitting.. 2. Earpiece feels cold during winter(metal body). 3. Average sound quality.. 4. Buds dont fit easily on earpiece.. 5- Bass is not good ,my JBL T110 is many times better than in terms of bass.. and even amazon not ready to return it.

name: AJAY SONI
title: I think i got duplicate Product
content: Sound quality is so Nice,. But i am a bass lover, so i ordered this. And i suprised its not the same what i expect.. In short product is OK but not with this price range.. Bass is not soo good. I have Ant Audio W56 AND its way faaaaar better then this.. I

name: AJITHRAJ GODWIN.
title: Must buy
content: Best Quality ... very good bass and excellent sound quality... after 10 months of daily use, my mic was stopped working ... so i claimed for warrenty ... They send me a new one .... very excellent sound quality, bass, appearance, material ... the only drawback of boat 225 is, not fit properly to ear properly (it fall down while shaking our head) .... overall , excellent sound quality

name: Sean Antony
title: Great for this price range..
content: Well I'm a Dj and music Producer.. u can trust my word... Pros :. Great headphones at this price range.. especially for bass lover's.. Good thump... Built quality is top notch..right from ur pin.. the plastic used is great, wire is tangle free and feels sturdy, the ear plugs are made of good metal... Cons :. Treble and mids are lil low.. (they are not bad) but a lil on the lower end... Due to the metal plugs they are a lil heavy... Overall worth every penny..It's a great buy at this price range..

name: Romanbull
title: Best earphone to possess
content: Brought this earphone after checking reviews, but got disappointed when product was delivered, left earphone was under performing. Asked for replacement & Amazon was amazing in getting swift replacement. Earphone is terrific & better than any top branded ones. Earphone is on heavy side so not suitable for jogging. Best overall sound output.

name: Shyam
title: Awesome sound and comfortable for longer duration.
content: Boat never lets me down and it has become my favorite brand. I have already purchased the Wireless headsets Rokerz 400. The sound quality is awesome.. The only problem which most of the people with small ears face is that this earphone does not fit perfectly in their ears but for me the fitting is perfect and it is comfortable.

name: Kk
title: Damage product
content: It was worst product.... I got damaged piece in which one side of earphone is not working... On wires there are small small cuts..... My suggestion, before dispatch plz check product once... Due to ur irresponsible duty someone will be lost there money if there is any problem according to returning the item....

name: Shashikumar. L.
title: Quality Product with Value for Money..
content: The Sound Quality, Noise cancellation n Bass Quality are all good.. I use these while riding my bike n even with normal volume settings the only thing I can hear is when someone sounds their horn.. built Quality is good n durable.. Definitely Worth The Price..

name: Amit Wankhade
title: Good for music, BAD for calling...
content: Very good product if you want to listen music.... Very bad product if you use it for calling.... Your smallest moment create huge noise which irritates counter party.... If you use it for calling, background noise is a hige problem.... Genuine Suggestion : Buy only if you want to ise it for listening music and not for calling...

name: Suresh Konduru
title: MAIN WEIGHT PROBLEM
content: Better to buy another because of too much weight when you put into ur ears , god there is no return option guys , if u don't have any choice then go for it , just think once or watch the review in YouTube

name: Aditya Krishnamurthy
title: Poor wire sensitivity
content: Wire sensitivity is really bad, when connected with laptop even the slightest touch near jack is causing problem in left earbud.. I’m using multiple wired and wireless (Sennheiser, Sony), none of the wired headphones had / has this kind of issue.. Highly not recommended.

name: Anwesha
title: Good product
content: The best part about these is that they do not get tangled. The quality of sound is not too great, but not bad either. It doesn't work well with mobile radio, otherwise sound quality is good. Overall, good for the price.

name: Avi 🇮🇳
title: Heavy + Uncomfortable !!
content: Not comfortable at all , cabal wire is so heavy that it automatically gets ejected ! Sound quality is Good for the price !! Bass is too high which suppress the vocal sound ! Overall ok for this price segment !!

name: Prashant
title: Awesome value for money
content: Left side ear bud stopped working within a month of purchase received replacement on the spot at service center. Replaced earphones are still good after 2 months no issue whatsoever. Sound quality is definitely good when using with laptops,iphone, and sanpdragon chipset based mobile and little low when used with mediatek chipset based mobiles(cud b issue a with mediatek) but still good considering its price.. Only other issue i had was during replacing default earbuds with translucent earbuds provided in box.

name: Praveen Thomas
title: Awesome And worth for money
content: This Boat Headphone is my favourite..Because of its sound quality and Tangle wire type.It last longs for a year by our proper maintenance..Keep it in a Good Maintenance for more lifetime of the product. Its Sound quality ,Bass and noise cancellation were good...

name: Varun kumar
title: Read my honest review 100%
content: Sincerely , dont buy this product this stopped working after 2 months. About sound quality : harsh bass ,sound clarity is very poor , because of heavy bass nd loudness i got headache. For this same price look for jbl or Sennheiser. Thnk you

name: Anshuman N.
title: Poor services
content: I clearly disliked buyung this product, because of the reasons:. 1. Especially because they took so many days for it's return. They hung up my return for more than 10 Days.. 2. The send me a faulty product with a hole in the left side earpiece.. 3. The service by Apprio is not upto the mark like before.

name: Rajye choudhary
title: ,,louse main pin ,, making sparking unusual noice
content: Packing of the product is looks like local ,,,sound quality is good but plug is slightly louse and making sparking voice during listening music ,,, contains of main wire with pin also louse , also making sparking noice ,,,,

name: Gautam
title: Worth every penny....compared to sony mdr xb450ap, sony xb30, sony mdr xb510as.
content: Good value for money... Been using sony mdr xb450ap, sony xb30, sony mdr xb510as.......bought this one for rough use...n found it to be worth of every penny...u will the 90% satisfaction that what u get from sony....but it distorts above 95% vol...other than that i love it... The bass punch is great for the price.. The build quality again i more than average.. The lows are decent .. The trebble lags a little... Reg comfort...avg to med... Overall good product...close ur eyes n buy it.

name: Bala vignesh raja
title: Nice product, But colour  variation on my ordered product ,
content: Good product,. But volume not so good as compared to boat 100/ jbl 100. Colour variation on delivered product:- Red colour product ordered instead of black color headset had delivered. No warranty card inside,but advertisement had one year warranty. How can I claim it,

name: Jude
title: Too high placed mouthpiece on left earphones
content: The earphones are not great at all. The mouthpiece on the earphones are placed to high on the left earphones that it doesn't sit on the ear and keeps falling off.. Not enjoying using them at all.. Sound is okay 3/5 rating since my earphones keep falling off and I can't enjoy listening to the songs.

name: PAVAN
title: Better than airpods , true.
content: Trust me when I say this , The bass is deeper than my airpods which cost 25x the price . I bought these because my airpods are not comfortable when wearing my helmet and yes these are comfortable for bikers . Finally , If you love bass heavy music , these are for you

name: Shashi Prakash Pandey
title: Nice
content: Sound quality is good.. Bass is little low.. Easy to use.. Comfortable to ears.

name: Spy AJ
title: Look & Feel degraded. Sound is same and is good
content: Boat has reduced the product quality! The look and feel is degraded and I can say that because I still have same earphones which I bought last year. But yes, the quality is same as previous and is good on noise cancellation and bass aspects

name: Someone
title: Five Stars
content: It stopped working after 6 months I sent mail to them boat company replaced me with new one within 10 days via courier for free.. From Now I became fan of boat. Only problem in this ear phone is its earbuds which are not so soft rest all are good.. The quality is suppeeerbbbb.

name: General Voice
title: Go to earphones
content: Best earplugs under this price. Only thing which against it is that ear do pain after removing them. But leaving that its top in durability and bass quality. Not that good as expected in noise cancellation but it works just fine. Great deal for me. And carrying case is good too.

name: Mayank Tyagi
title: Don't buy
content: One side not working , don't buy this and plzzz take my hearphone return . Important thing boat hearphone service center are only 7 in india . Even there service center workers not give respect , call to ask help and again try to call the service center number , they block my number . So , don't buy boat . Location: Chennai service center

name: Dr .
title: Best at this price range for bass lover mainly.
content: Amazing bass at this price this earphone is the best for bass lover ...i read many of review before buying this earphone ..then i brought this. In hd songs it can feel u like a dj party....sound is loud u can not open full of sound for long time bcoz loudness is very high and clear .also it has noice cancellation .and it work perfectly

name: Arti
title: Worst used old product
content: I received an open package.. se ruthe images of package i received.. someone has opened and put staplers later.. packet torn... Box is fully messed up.. half open.. earphone and accessories just crushed inside it.. some accessory from the packet missing.. earphone looks very old damaged and not working condition.. worst experience.. don't buy.. ordered second time and received bad product..

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not working after 6 months
content: I read few of Review and found lots of people are complaining about the one side earphone not working and I just ignore it and purchase this product but after 6 months I face same problem with this earphones right side not working.. So guys my suggestion to you when lots of people have faced same issue you don't need to buy this one. Hope my review helps you.

name: Vipulpratap Singh
title: Good to go if you are lucky
content: Sound quality and everything is great, you might find extra bass even if it's not required. But this pair of earphone doesn't last long. I bought it twice and it stopped working.

name: Ishaan V.
title: Good bass.. okayish vocals..
content: For most users is a good product. But when you have HyperX cloud 2 to compare to these arent that good.. (Although IK both are in completely different price ranges) but still a durable product, good fit, decent bass, vocals are a bit muffled, trebble is just of acceptable quality..

name: ROSHAN P.
title: WORST WORST WORST WARRANTY SERVICES
content: My mic stooped working in warranty period so i registered a complaint for warranty. But the process taking more and more time. I should have bought seinheiser earphones instead as their replacement process is very fast.. DON'T BUY IT EVEN IF ITS AVAILABLE ON DISCOUNT. MANY OF MY FRIENDS HAVE THE SAME MIC ISSUE. GO INSTEAD FOR SEINHEISER AS THEY WILL REPLACE THE EARPHONE ON THE SPOT.

name: Shubham Arora
title: Not Upto Mark
content: Product is good, sound quality is good but ear buds are of very poor quality. I have tried all ear buds size but they still fall from ears while walking or workout. I think i have wasted my 499 rs on this product.

name: Ankit Singh
title: Paisa wasool Ear phone, worth it
content: Well talking about quality, this China made earphone get 5 star from my end. The sound quality is awesome at this price.i have used mi basic earphone which costs at 599 bucks. But this is far better than that mi basic earphone. I have AKG earphone worth RS. 1400 and I didn't found any difference between both. The sound quality is heavy enough like some branded costly earphone. It comes with bunch of 👂 earbuds from that you can choose as per your requirement and size also include earphone holding ear plugs. The build in quality of wire is also good. As wish it will not go out of order if roughly used.

name: Pratik
title: Good but very heavy and falls often from ears.
content: Everything is as people mentioned here but nobody is mentioning the weight issue. These are made of metal which is why it is very heavy and falls from your ears very frequently. The rubber hooks given in packaging holds it good but if you use that, it is very painful in ears. So there is no solution for it. Also, if you wear it while driving, there is a risk of falling it on road and get messed up so think all this before buying. If you have any alternative or are okay with it falling down, go ahead. Sound wise, these are the best in market, considering the price.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Very long cable, loose fit earpiece
content: Sound quality good considering the price bracket.. Cable is tangle-free but heavy and unnecessarily too long, Hence difficult to manage.. Earpiece keeps on falling with slightest movement. It fits loosely in the ears.

name: SFC
title: Nice but nothing beats my sony headphones
content: Overall nice product. But earphones bit heavy for ears. Not a fan of in-ear headphones. And it cannot beat the quality headphones. I use siny headphones which were available in 500 on diwali sale, nothing like it. Its the best buy of my entire life.

name: Paresh Charpot
title: must buy(music lover) and good customer service.
content: i purchased this BoAt Basshead 225 Black on 21th December 2018. after 10 months one side speaker suddenly stopped(internal damage). so as per BoAt warranty i raised a complaint on BoAt official site. next day courier boy picked handsfree. than they replaced my BoAt Basshead 225(got new Basshead 225). whole procedure takes 10-12 days. just go for it.

name: Pradhyumna G.
title: I needed a good pair of earphones and this had so e good ...
content: I needed a good pair of earphones and this had so e good reviews. Got them and realised they're way too bass heavy. It's mind numbing bass. I listen to a lot of varied music and am definitely not a bass head so this doesn't seem like a good purchase for me. But if heavy bass is what you're looking for then this is great for the price.

name: Shadaab
title: Fabulous
content: These are fantastic piar of earphones in the price bracket of 500 they are one of the best any body go blindly for these..

name: Ashwini K.
title: Best
content: This is the best earphone have ever used and it is suitable for a sporty person who likes to run it fits our ears and doesn't fall down and of course it is tangle free and I suggest you all to buy it because and its sound quality is very good and as you all know it is available in many beautiful colours just buy it now

name: Rashid
title: Sound quality good but ergonomically very bad!
content: Sound quality or noise reduction is good but the earpieces don’t fit in properly and are heavy as a result they keep falling down regularly. Poor ergonomics. It’s useless despite having good quality. Have ordered another piece from a different company now.

name: Dann
title: Boat 225 Vs JBL CS100
content: Good For bass. Sound quality is ok for the price. But defenetely a good choice than JBL C100 . Go for boat if you are confuse between Jbl C100 and boat 225.. If you listen music on low volume then JBL C100 is Good.

name: ABHIJEET kumar
title: Great buy best bass headphones under 500
content: I love these bought 2 times as first one got damage by my mistake so bought the new i like the old bassheads better because of it's 3.5mm agled flat jack the new one have a rounded jack which i don't like doesn't seeem durable as first one but sound quality and bass is awesome!!

name: Siddh Shah
title: Does not work
content: I ordered one, out of which the right pod did not work. Replaced, again one pod didn't, work - this time the left side. repeat - repeat - fifth pair now. they refuse to give a refund as well.

name: Arya Snehil
title: Not durable. Lasted only 20 days.
content: About 2 years ago I bought the same model which stopped working in less than a month after which I switched to other brands like skullcandy and sony. This year I decided to buy these earphones again and the same thing happened.. Sound quality is good but there is no point in buying earphones which are not durable.

name: kk
title: No issues since 2 years
content: I'm writing the review after using Boat225 for more than 2 years now.. Excellent product.. Good bass and overall sound.. Cable quality is best.. Mic is also very good for audio calls.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Great in this Price
content: I had ordered for #special edition #Rockon2 headphone but bad luck.. i had not received an special edition one.. but it is bassheads225 .. the headphones are nice according to me best in this price.... Build quality is quite good in this price segment... Sound output is good... Bass is punchi.. it is just perfect.. N treble n mids are good if not the best... I had used this in lenovo k5 note n mi note 3 it works great on this handsets .. but it has only con is that this headphone are lil .. uncomfortable when we use it for long hours.. But overall this headphone are still great in this price segment

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not upto the mark
content: 1) Most of the time when we call someone then our voice won't be able to hear to the front person who is on the other side of the call.. 2) In between of the call, listening songs or watching videos the volume automatically gets increased decreased don't know which part of the headphone does that.

name: vijay sharma
title: अति उत्तम एवं मजबूत
content: सुमधुर संगीत एवं उच्च गुणवत्ता की ध्वनि के लिए उपयोगी उत्पाद। परंतु बार बार कानो से फिसलना इसका एक अवगुन है। 1 साल में कोई दिक्कत नही हुई। एक बार इसके एक तार ने काम करना बंद कर दिया तो वारंटी में होने की वजह से कंपनी ने बदल कर दिया।

name: SS
title: Worth the price.
content: Good product for this price... noise cancellation is average. Recieved 5 additional earbuds.. flat wire is much a relief to avoid tangling.. Received in less than 24 hrs. Thanks to Amazon.

name: Amazon Customer
title: The eartips provided are not comfortable. Make sure you have some spare.
content: Just got the earphone today... Bought it after a few good reviews from my friends... The most attractive part being they would last for a good time. They look durable and would be durable as expected. The only concern here is the ear tips provided are not comfortable which interferes With the whole aspect of listening and spoils it all. I understand these are budget earphones but instead of providing 3 additional pairs which don't fit the earphone at all.. Boat could have made the primary pair comfortable. Unless you have comfortable eartips... You are going to find it hard. Otherwise, the quality of the audio from the earphones are definitely worth the price you are paying.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Stopped working in 5 months, refund my money.
content: My bass sound is not responding,so cheap and third quality, please refund my money urgentlyI had purchased these boat headphones on jan 2017. Suddenly it has stopped working after just 5 months. It has a warrenty of 1 year. I want this product to be replaced as soon as possible. I need headphones badly. Such a bad experience with amazon as i have not done any major shopping yet on amazon. Just want this product to be replaced or refund my money man.

name: Vipul
title: Simply the best in this price range
content: Best In-Ear earphones in this price range.. -Sound Clarity and Bass is good and comparable to JBL earphones which we get around 1000 bucks.. -Tangle free flat wire also makes its usage much less worrisome. - Design wise too this product looks quite cool (i have used both black and red variants, both look equally cool). Overall: Go for this product if you're music addict and are looking for something under 600 bucks. This is the best product i could recommend to you in this price range for awesome music experience, also especially when you're prone to loosing or damaging your earphones frequently.

name: sourav ranjan mallick
title: In days of price 1000 earphones boat had service it worth ₹599 with thumbing bass.
content: it's amazing in that days in range of 600, it was lit and now also but as u all of known about technology developed hence some earphones are born after boat that is little bit better. but "bap bap hota hai" and lastly i want to say one thing in now days boat should developed the technology. i hope again boat will lit the world with the thumbing bass.

name: Simha
title: Good quality in sound loudness  but bass is low from my expectation
content: Here we seen the sound quality in loudness is very good, clear voice. Bass performance is i think is low from my expectation but its good .. Its warranty periods 1 years with exchange policy is so good thats why i buy this earphones. We buy this earphones specifically for playing pubg and improving my skill for my YouTube video .. My YouTube channel name is SansDaddyKins. Go and Search.

name: Rupam
title: Sound quality is good. But the speaker base being metallic is heavy ...
content: Sound quality is good.But the speaker base being metallic is heavy and pains the tragus part of the ear if plugged in for long time. The ear phones tend to slip from the earhole because of the weight. Also the Mic doesnot have the control (switch) to receive and end calls unlike an other earphones.

name: Sujan
title: Amazing product
content: I'm really surprised, the bass is really awesome. With 20% volume I can't hear any outside sound. After JBL earphone I love this earphone only. I really prefer this product to all. I'm using this product since 2 months, effect is superb, I used almost every ear buds which come in box. But no use, it'll not hold in ears, it'll drop frequently.

name: WAJID ALI
title: Headphone is great! Sound quality and bass quality is very good. A little problem is the delivery
content: Product is very good! Sound quality and bass quality is very good. The problem is that This product was supposed to have been received yesterday, today it has been a third day. This product is delivered in 1 day. This product I ordered before 3 days Today it has got me Delivery problem is in this product. By calling it tomorrow, it will take two to three days to come to the product. Thank You So Much Very good product! Thank you so much to give such a good service.

name: Jagdish joshi
title: Sound quality and connectivity issue after few months
content: I suggest to all customer. Who are thinking to purchase this product. I wanna let you know sound quality of this product is not good as price and it will work around 2 month after that you face many kind of problems like connectivity with mobile , sound. I want to replace headphone please let me know about the process of replacement with one year warranty. I am waiting a position response from your side as soon as

name: shivang
title: Great product
content: Good vocals. Good treble. Great sound. Low bass. Tangle free cable. Durable and tough. But it's made of metal and heavy may fall out from your ears while doing activiti

name: Jithesh Acharya
title: Quality & Price - 7/10 and Usability- 5/10
content: Pros:. 1. Reasonable price. best with-mic earphones in this price range. 2. Great quality.. Cons.. 1. Feels heavy on ears. 2. Earpiece will falls frequently due to built and design. You can turn the cable over the ear and plug into the ear holes to avoid falling. 3. Earplugs will pop-out and chances to lose them while travelling and if you have the habit of just throwing earphones into the bag. (Already lost 2 plugs for 2 different sizes) (This never happened when I was using my sennheiser earphone). Sound - 7/10. Bass - 6/10. Mic - 7/10

name: Riya Adhikari
title: I would say it's a good earphone. Noise cancellation absolutely done
content: I would say it's a good earphone. Noise cancellation absolutely done. Music quality decent. If you are looking for high end earphones then I guess you'll have to invest more. But in this price price range it's pretty satisfactory

name: gurjeet s.
title: Read before you buy!!!
content: Everything about this earplug is quite amazing! I am using it and it feels awesome. Just one thing which bothered me was that it's bit louder and high pitched voices are audible which may sometimes make you feel uncomfortable but I used subwoofer app enhancement and it's doing great!! Another thing to mention is that it's earbuds are bit harder and rough than others! But there are many other earbuds given with it which may be better than it! All above, it's price! That's the best value for the price!!. Go for it! You won't regret it!;)

name: Adarsh
title: Worst product ever
content: my earphone got defected with in 3 months only , i have contacted to the brand they are not helping me, they even not replying to me , you can also check in boat website, that boat people are not helping me. I have contacted amazon they asked me to contact brand but the brand is not helping me what to do.

name: Mahi
title: Good product. But problem with earbuds
content: Good product. But problem with earbuds. The ear buds removes easily.. till now I had lost 2 even though after handling softly... Good thing is that we get more ear buds along with headphone.

name: Faiz
title: Worst after sales service
content: Product is good but after sales support sucks.. Boat doesn't bother about the customer issue. I was getting issue with earphones, one side is stop working. Complaint multiple time, talk with their customer care executive but no response. That time it was in warranty. Very bad experience with Boat, never going to by any of their products and not going to suggest to anyone.

name: Ronak Kataria
title: Just Awesome
content: As always, Amazon did delivered the product before promised time, within a day. About the earphones, BoAt did a grear great job creating these earphones. They are super comfortable, looks really cool and has awesome bass and sound quality. Even at the loudest volume, there's no distortion. Even playing the music at high volume at 128 kbps bitrate, the sound is 98-99% distortion free.

name: aashish bharadwaj
title: Good product for quality and good music, and good service Amazon.
content: Amazon replace the product in single day. Nice service Amazon and product is also good built quality, bass, and sound every thing is good. I bought it at 499

name: Viral Shah
title: Decent Sound quality
content: The sound quality is decent but bass is not consistent on all songs somehow. Also not entirely impressed with the material quality, it does appear solidly built and the main body of the ear phone is made from metal but the gun metal paint on it has already started coming off from some places.

name: Palash Boruah
title: Very good sound.Useless microphone
content: Honestly speaking sound is super awesome... Ear buds are very uncomfortable if you hear for longer time irrespective of the extra sizes provided and keep slipping out of the ears. Microphone stopped working immediately after 2 days. Don't know what quality mics they have used,didn't serve any purpose. I had been busy recently and didn't get time to look after all this and write a review

name: Kunwar shashank a singh
title: Boat earphone
content: This earphone is very good sound quality.noise cancellation is also good.but thier is one problem I face that when we use this earphone when riding a byke then cord is always remove into pocket just becoz of its L shape jack .overall good earphone and sound quality is awesome.

name: Sandeep Rakshe
title: Below average
content: Bad sound quality. It has bass which have destroys the song feel. Instruments sounds very dull. I have realme bud2 and Jbl 200SI, both are far better from this...... Buy 100 RS earphones from local market but not this. Worst sound experience

name: Prakher Singh
title: Good Product.
content: Nice product in sub Rs.700 range. Sound quality is good at 70%-100% volume,but get distorted between 50%-70% volume and is nice again between 1% - 50% volume range.This is with mobile phones, I tried on different cellphones but sound is good if using them with laptop at all volumes.

name: saikiran
title: Aww!! Ordered two times
content: Great product from boat. Loved the sound and base sound quality is awesome. Budget wise you can go with this product. One thing I loved about boat is they replace the product if it fails to work in warranty period.

name: Jaspreet Kaur Chagger
title: Not upto expectations
content: I bought these after reading great reviews. But I found these quite irritating.Design of earphones is not good.. They keep coming out of ear. Sound quality is also quite ok. These earphones feel quite heavy on ear.. Though these are tangle free.

name: Ashish
title: Best among all earphone category
content: I am writing this review after using for 6 months.Sound quality is awesome ...... i would prefer it over airpods, eardopes,airbuds,bluetooth earphone.....feels so good listening music in it.

name: A new viewer
title: Only 3 Star
content: The product is very good comparing the price but the sound quality is not such good... when we are hiring in normal sound sound quality and bass is true but when we are increasing the sound just feeling irritating and. more chilling

name: Amazon Customer
title: They are too big, does not fit well my ear starts to hurt after a while.
content: I bought it by looking at good reviews. These are not good fit for all. They are too big. My ears starts to hurt. They protrude too much. I have used MI Headphones, Senhiesers in ear headphones. These are not comfortable.. I have to admin that the build quality is good and also looks durable. Sound quality is good for it's price. The flat cable makes it easy to manage and does not get tangled. I had tangle issue with MI Headphones.

name: Anna
title: Lasted for a year.
content: I used them daily for more than a year before one side stopped working. But for the price, I don't expect it to last forever. Now off to buy another one and if it also lasts for a year like the last one, I am happy.

name: Naomi
title: It's either incorrect description or incorrect item sent
content: There should be buttons to navigate like end call or play next song or adjust volume. That was what mentioned on the item details page. But nothing of that sort is there on the set I received. There's a joint but no buttons. Item out of stock so can't request for replacement

name: Sukhjeet Singh
title: Great earphones but...
content: Earphones are great in areas of sound quality, noise cancellation & bass quality. But they fall from ears due to their heavy metal build.

name: ILIYAS KHAN
title: Best Best Best 🎧
content: First of all I am getting to much attracted towards boat for audio devices. The quality of boat products is too good, I have Boat Rockerz 510, Stone 200, 2 bassheads 225, bassheads 235. I recommend each and every person to buy this because it is the only earphone that goes beyond expectation when we talk about price to performance ratio. Looking forward for some more amazing boat products

name: Anik Rakshit
title: As usual you are a rocking Boat
content: I ordered this earphone for the 2nd time just because i lost my previous one. When i received my earphone and play a song to test the product, i was quite disappointed, the left side of that earphone was not working properly and disconnected several times. Then i put a replacement request and they sent me a new one on the very next day. This one is absolutely fine and sound quality is too good. Thanks to amazon, Boat and also to seller to sell a nice product.

name: Lester Gomes
title: Love the bass!
content: Had my doubts about the brand. But turned out good. Love the base. Various size ear buds help to give a good fit. Had purchased two, when one had a problem the warranty service was also not bad(in Bangalore). Took a while to get the new one but was very trandperant. Not sure how it will be in Tier 3 cities. Overall like the product .

name: Amazon Customer
title: Don't go for it
content: Treble is unusually high. Pros:. Good looking. Cheap. Can act as secondary earphones. Cons:. Unusually high Treble. Okayish Bass, no point calling the product as "Bassheads".. The sound leak is so high that you can literally sound up the room without your speaker on.. The box it comes in is really substandard, looks like a box of playing cards.. Recommendation is to not go for them, add a couple of hundreds to your budget and buy a better earpiece.

name: Ananyo
title: Disgusting
content: First of all. The earbud changing situation is pathetic. Bcuz of that i was not able to test it properly. I mean i use the small eartips. And while changing the eartips. It is really a pain to do it. They are just focusing on the sound. But the ergonomics is really poor. So 1 star for me

name: San
title: Good..
content: Good pair of ear plugs.. One of the best sound quality among all the earphones of this segment.. Worst thing about this product is that the earplugs are too heavy and big that it hurts in the ear for long usage and comes out easily if we does not use the attachment provided with the product.

name: Chirag Vaghela
title: Value for money.
content: Only disadvantage is wires are heavy, which drags the earbuds down out of ear. But over all very nice. I can't believe this outstanding performance at this price. I have purchased and used many earbuds but this one is best I got it at four ninety nine. Value for money. Happy to have this. Go for it.

name: harshavardhan dhruva)
title: Value for money...
content: Worth each penny. For the amount this is one the better quality products in the market. After using quite a few of them the Boat earphones last way longer and their sound quality remains quite same with a less amount of detoration.

name: greysmoke0993
title: Amazing Performer!
content: Best earphones in the price you pay for! amazing sound and build quality and with perfect bass! Loud and clear voice through the mic for calling or video communication. they've also put in enough ear tips inside the packaging to help you find the perfect one for your ear comfort! go for it if you are tight on a budget and want an amazing performer!

name: Anand M
title: Good sound quality
content: At this price range it offers good sound quality. The cable quality is also good. Since it's made of metal it is little heavy and ears may start paining after continuous usage.. JBL has better sound quality but the build quality of JBL is not good.. When compared to Realme Earbuds 2, Boat has better sound quality.

name: Krishnaraj R
title: Improper design
content: Never ever buy this.the product even though providing excellent bass and sound quality,fails to balance itself in our ears.even after changing bud,same thing repeats.. Rsn is more weight is given on ear piece and hence it falls off.worst part is there is no return facility and can only be replaced.i believe its a design failure.hope atleast for future cutomers BOAT fixes this.

name: sandeep
title: Flat wire...Is it good
content: The wire has its own disadvantages.. it can be frequently pulled out as its texture is rubberized and flat shape increases the possibility .. Apart from this the sound quality is good

name: sarthak pachauri
title: Nice product
content: The bass lovers r going to love this product..tangle free cable..do keep in mind the earphone slips again n again from ear..but 2 ear clips are provided in box which u can insert it..then there will be no problem of earphone coming out of your ear..i purchased it at net price for 549...(got 50 cb)

name: Amazon Customer
title: Decent but not up to the mark
content: Bass was good but mids and lows are not that good, it is ok for those who love bass but har chiz me bass achchi nahi lagti let it be a song or something else... And yes the build material is good and durable, no arguments there.

name: Kritik Varma
title: BoAt BassHeads 225 Earphones with Mic
content: Build Quality is Very Good. Premium Looking Earphones....... Audio Quality is Awesome👍.... It's Bass is Really Good...... I feel like a Theatre Sound.... Very Good.. We get Lots of Ear Buds in Box..... This is the best Earphone in ₹500 Price Segment.. I Strongly Recommend It to Buy this Earphones... BoAt is Best ..

name: Priyaranjan
title: Really the bass is extraordinary...
content: This BoAt Bassheads 225 headphones are super awesome for bass output, also its bass is such a way that it doesn't hurt your ears. So smooth. Noise cancellation is great. Sound quality is good too.

name: Prathamesh
title: Great pick for the given price.
content: Great product by boAt" Earphones are tangle free (most important). Sound quality is superb and bass is just awesum. Just thing is you can't listen your music for long on a full volume. Noice cancellation is okay. Gets the work done.

name: Avinash
title: Failed basic test
content: Quality is ok but the make fails as the mic side i.e left side keeps falling down due to its weight .. Basic engineering test failed .. It won't be good if it keeps falling down .. I suggest don't take if you wanna listen songs while traveling and walking

name: shreesha hegde
title: Read this it will be helpful to u(dont buy this)
content: Buy it if u only listen EDM,trance etc because u cant even hear lyrics clearly. Bass and treble balance is nonsense. I recommend realme earbuds for 499 over this one. And comfort of this boat 225 is big joke it does not fit in your ears properly. I have tried all extra eartips provided with it but no use.

name: Hardik
title: Worst at 499.
content: Guys i had returned it after 4 days.i m a pubg player,it heals to detect foot steps very good,but build quality is😖😖.it jack started giving problem and mic was totally humming.

name: Himanshu Dhiraj Mishra
title: Good headphone with super bass but worst customer support
content: Honestly, the headphone is awesome with super bass but not a long-lasting product. After 6 months suddenly left side stopped working and I'm unable to contact customer care properly.. Every time call get disconnect after some automated recorded IVR.. I submitted a complaint around 15 days ago and still no updates.. So, you can go with the product as it's having great sound output but avoid if you are thinking for long use with better customer support.

name: Ani
title: Music + bass  is Good
content: The music is good. after listening from boat, I wasn't satisfied with other earphones music. the only problem I faced is initially, the metal buds come out soo frequently but, later on i just habituated to use them.

name: Amazon Customer
title: ONE SIDE STOPPED WITHIN 15DAYS. DONT BUY. RETURN WINDOW OVER ALSO
content: This is very dissappointing from Boat product. One side stopped working. all the products till today which i have used to Boat, don't work after 1-2 months and this product has stopped within 15days. DONT BUY.

name: Mohsin S
title: Very nice and at low rate only issue is litte over weight
content: sound quality is very nice, loud and clear as its extra bass, at this rate its good option, and the toggle free cable is long and nice however, I felt this earphone little heavy as it drops out from my ear did try small mud or other but still bcz of metal finishing it became heavy and I could not hold it long if I walk I will drop out from overall its very nice product .I later brought Sony MDR earphone which fits perfect in my ear even running and walking it does not drop

name: Vivin M.
title: Stopped working in two days
content: I had ordered this and one ear piece stopped working the second day. And I went for a replacement of the same. The earphones I had received for received for replacement had physical damages and was definitely one that was used for months. And it was not working at all.. Very poor quality by the seller.

name: Zoh1
title: Very Uncomfortable 😡
content: Very uncomfortable. I am surprised how people have given it 4 star. It doesn't fit in the ears and its button doesn't pause music unlike others.

name: Shivani S.
title: Love them
content: I totally love this product. Affordable yet good quality. You won’t get the issue of sound coming out of your earphones even in silent rooms(which is often embarrassing). This is third time I have ordered these. I lost one and broke the other two by my mistake.

name: Pranjit
title: Only lastd for 5 6 months.
content: Boat earphones just lasts for 5 6 months. I have purchased almost 5 earphones from boat and all of them didn't cross the period of more than 6 months. The sound and bass quality is awesome but the durability is worse. Nobody buys a product which only lasts for such a short period.

name: MOHAMMED SAHL
title: even i feel my Motorola g5 headset is much better than this
content: just a normal headset highly priced..... am using this from the last couple of months .... even i feel my Motorola g5 headset is much better than this... if you are a beginner you can try this.. or else better to go with some other products ...

name: Limbareddy
title: Astonishing sound
content: It was amazing.. Ears will blow out.. Nice sound quality.. Amazing experience.. I'm using it right now. Worth money.. Go for it.. The only drawback is, it won't stay in your ears for long. It keeps on falling down.

name: Deepak Louis
title: Think before u buy
content: Sound quality is just awesome....bass is superb....but the fault comes in the design and durability......first of all it doesn't fit in your ears.....every time u wear it, it just comes out ....not at all suitable for travel.....and secondly, after some time of use, there happened some loose connection in the circuit (maybe just for me) ....overall the experience was just average.

name: Venkatareddychinta
title: Waste product
content: Good service, after 6 months one head phone was not working. I raised complained online then boat team took an action, pick up head phone and replaced. Thanks to boat team

name: Prabhu Saravana
title: Worth for ur price and a great customer support
content: Good pair of headphones with good bass not extreme bass. Tangle free cables of great quality. Worth the money. also now after nearly 1 year my headphone stopped working when I contacted the customer service they immediately took my headphone back and replaced with a new one. i don't know how many companies provide such a good customer support. Really superb Boat

name: Krishnendu
title: Not impressed.
content: Nothing much to complain since the price is low.. Bass sounds artificial. Clarity eaten up by added bass, overall sound quality is not great, but again you are only paying 500 bucks. I bought this over seinheisser cx180 seeing so many positive reviews and I regret my decision now.

name: shirish
title: Delivers what it says
content: Delivers what it says. -Bass is top notch. -Sound quality is above average(good compaired to this price). -I personally liked the L shaper plug because most of my earphones wear out at that point.. -since it uses metal(good for rough users) it is comparatively a little heavy compared to other plastic bulit earphones. Most people won't feel it. I personally liked the built quality.. -the other good thing is the 3-4 size ear plugs so you can always find your perfect fit. -push a little harder in ear and feel the bass.. -there is no volume control. But you can always pause with one click.. To summarize its value for money.

name: sagar
title: Affordable Price & Performance
content: If you're looking for a good product at a affordable price than you're looking at the right pair of headphones , I have been previously using same product in blue which have worked just awesome till it gave up on the joints. But if take care of the product well it should last you longer .

name: mohammed farooque
title: Excellent product @ this price !!
content: For 500 it is a good product only, If you use earphone when riding bike with helmet, then I suggest you never buy this product as it has a big earplug, it hurts when you use this earphone with helmet or when you sleep one sided. For normal use it is a good product @ this price !!

name: PRKBhagat
title: Good Product
content: As company statement : Extraaaa Boom Bass.... Some people may worry about bass in this headphone, because it has really extra bass and loudness... only bad thing is ear piece are made of metal... so after long time... ear piece will drop out..... otherwise sound is good and quality is ok...

name: Divay Jung sah
title: Sound quality good but not worthy
content: It's been 2 months using this earphone...guys as it mentioned it has problem while plugging inside ear 😬 but bass super fast..don't think about other go and purchase this .... Edit...it's been 3 months ,one bud stop working..i complained against to review my product but it's been more than 1 month ,I didn't get my replacement....sound quality is awesome but service is shit like hell.....

name: Chirag
title: Not comfortable
content: These earphones are quite heavy and uncomfortable. Wearing them for an hour causes irritation in ears. You cannot use them while laying on bed as they are pointed outwards and it feels like someone is pressing forcefully into your ears. Bass is good but mid high n lows are not as good as it expected. At full volume the music distorts.

name: Raj
title: Replace the item
content: I had purchased these boat headphones on feb2019. Suddenly it has stopped working after just 2 months. It has a warrenty of 1 year. I want this product to be replaced as soon as possible. I need headphones badly. Such a bad experience with amazon as i have not done any major shopping yet on amazon. Just want this product to be replaced man.

name: m.praveenraj
title: i used these product more than 4 years still now also its is worthy
content: i used these product more than 4years but doesn't come any problems not at all ,,it is very uesfull product for earphone lovers and best ,sound quality and material quality is amazing i give carrenty to these product please try to buy these product for better option so overall these is fantastic

name: Rohan
title: Overall average earphones but not for the price
content: I just got this earphones on 21 oct 2018 and i was very excited. But as it sees it does not appear the thing is his earphones are very heavy on ears if your a wild listeners its not for you.. Pros: neon lime looks better than other colours it looks like your wearing a skullcandy or jbl.. : for sound its ok not for heavy listeners. Cons: its says double bass but its not like that its normal they just do advertising to fook people. :earphones are very heavy

name: Amazon Customer
title: Okay headphones for this price range
content: Expected more on bass and sound clarity as I was using other pair of Sennheiser headphones. But the sound turned out to be average and okay. This is my opinion. But if you really need a good headphones under this budget this is good, but you can look out for other options as well.

name: Charanjeet Singh
title: Pls do not buy
content: I got damaged product and unable to replace it. Even boat customer care team is not supporting.. I came to know that this particular boat product is not good. Pls do not buy wired boat bassbeads 225.. It was really bad experience. I spoiled my money.

name: Anne87
title: Superb!
content: Excellent set of earphones. Love all the extras: such a pleasant surprise! Looks good, feels good and sounds good. The best set of earphones I ever have had.

name: Rajan
title: Not good quality
content: First few months it worked well. Quality poor. Noise reduction not good. By 5th month charging port burnt out while charging. Had throw into garbage

name: Saurabh singh
title: Average headphones with better bass quality and clear sound
content: All good but not too good if i talk about sound quality it is clear and average and about bass quality that is not upto my mark but still you gonna like it .....noise cancellation is good it actually help to avoid unnecessary sound disturbances.. All over an average headphones in this price value.

name: Aminuddin Mohammad
title: Best amoung all other earphones
content: Build quality is excellent sound quality too. The only cons is the outside noise you can't hear like the buds will close your entire ear and won't allow nearby sounds. Especially for bass lovers they will love these earphones

name: SUBRATA PAL
title: Sound quality is poor
content: I dont like the sound quality at all (just higher than BAD). Not comparable with JBL or Sennheiser quality.... bass or sound. Not value for money. Better buy Sennheiser(without mic) or JBL(with MIC) for quality sound.. Product looks sturdy (too early to comment), but Amazon delivery was super fast.. Finally I use it for 1day and now want to sell it. Just feeling that buying this product is a BIG MISTAKE.

name: Sumit Gambhir
title: Good enough for a Rs 500 headphone
content: Good enough for a Rs 500 headphone. Solid built, flat tangle free wires. Button does not function well and mic is a bit far from the earpiece so most of the time I have to lift the mic to bring it near my mouth to make the person on the other side hear my voice clearly.

name: John Merston
title: Well, here's another great work by boAt...
content: Not that there aren't other earphones in the market that has got spectacular build quality and bass effects, instead, this is just one of those great earphones that will be remembered later on by us customers as one among the best earphones to have ever been made at this price point. The brand has certainly made their point clear that they're in it to win. Great work by boAt and ofcourse an excellent delivery by ATS.

name: Sachin
title: Surprisingly good!
content: These are surprisingly good! I never expected them to be this awesome. The bass is good, the vocals are even better! No complaints yet. Hope they just work fine for at least a year although they do have a year of warranty.

name: vijay
title: Review after using for few months
