content: Sound wise is good & awesome product but they should improve the quality of Mike.......after 6 month of usage, Mike quality is gradually reduced and finally it's not working at all......one advantage is they are providing warranty for this product, hence I got new headset instead of the faulty one.

name: Lokeshwar
title: Bass value for money
content: Best earphones at this price range. Bass:9/10. Noise cancelling:8/10. Build quality:10/10. Tangle free wire. Low notes:7/10. High notes:9/10. Trible:8/10. Mid notes:8/10. Mic:9/10. The bass was awesome in this earphones little bit heavy because of its metal body the weak point of earphone is the mic bottom so handle it safely iam using this earphone for 5 months best quality earphone

name: Monibhadra Sarkar
title: Extremely uncomfortable, not recommended
content: Extremely uncomfortable. The buds keep hurting my ears, I was using jbl earphones earlier and they were so comfy. The buds are also very heavy due to the metal finish and keep falling off from my ears. Even a 10 minute call is painful in them. :( The sound quality and mic reception is great though

name: Rakesh
title: Good for music but worst for calling purpose
content: If u r a music lover then these r one of the best earphones but coming to the negative side of these , they r one of the worst of the worse earphones for using it for calling purposes . I don't think that anyone should use them for calling purposes as the mic is worse.

name: HARISH
title: Worth for money.
content: I've been using it for 1.5 years and Very satisfied. Also BoAt's customer service is very good. I was having issues with jack plug after using for like 8-9 months so I sent it to them and they replaced it with new one of different jack plug which better than the previous model and within 20 days period they replaced it . And Also it's better than sennheiser cx 180 ...I know because I have both.

name: Nikhil
title: Degrading quality
content: The quality of boat is degrading year or year...This is my third headphone which after not more than 1 month of use has gone bust from the mic causing left side not to work...the service center keeps the headphones for months 😑... Think on all the fronts before buying it

name: Yashwani
title: Not a durable product
content: Bought this product as it seems like strong, the wire is tangle free and looks strong but its actually not. What look good doesn't mean it's good , same happened with me with this poor product within a month one ear piece stopped working. So I will suggest "NOT TO BUY THIS PRODUCT "

name: MD MASOOM REZA
title: Good product
content: Every thing is perfect in this earphone except 2 issues.. 1. Earpeace is sleepery and slip from ears after some time.. 2. Best sound quality and bass when you listening music, but while call its response is not good.

name: Priya Arun
title: Good colour
content: The pic i have uploaded is the actual colour of the product.. Love the product...good sound quality... the pouch helps to keep the wire untangled. I was confused a out the colour by seeing the pics uploaded here... anyway it turned out to be good.... Recommending this product and giving a 5star

name: Sanjay Hansdak
title: Too heavy , falls from ear
content: Sound quality is good but it's of no use if you can't put the ear phones in your ear. Due to metal used it is heavy and it falls from ear quite often which is really irritating. Forget about jogging or working out with these earphones.. I would suggest don't buy or try it and return it if you face the same problem

name: ravi singh RAJPOOT
title: Best Earphone in the Market BoAT..@Ravi Singh RAJPOOT
content: I already used the same Earphone for more than 1 year..Its best Earphone with Superb Bass Quality ..I also compared it with other branded earphones but always it was better i found...

name: MOHIT SINGH
title: Good but not for long time
content: I bought this product in July 20 & after a few month one side speaker is not working. I'm so disappointed with this product.. I also buy this product last year & with that product same problem happened.. I personally don't like this product much waste of money.

name: Vignesh
title: Initially superb later started fluctuating sound clarity.
content: At first I felt that the product is of great make but soon after (2 weeks of sparing use) the headphones quality is fluctuating and I need to keep the edge twisted or pressed to maintain good sound else the sound goes like a party noise. Worse part is no return after 15 days. Not sure if everyone might face the same issue, may be just my piece of rotten cake. So check with other reviews in order to come to a conclusion.

name: Amazon Customer
title: OLD PRODUCT WITHOUT WORKING
content: I got a old product by amazon which is not working.when i applied to return this product the amazone return man refused to return the earphone .my 549 money is spoiled. I complaint to customer care. But they didn't take any action.

name: Mohit
title: How can it be without play/pause/call button?!
content: Overall fine, but they don't have a freaking button to play pause or pick up calls. Very strange. Even 50rs. earphones have a button next to the mike, the utility of the button is immense. Hope boat people realize it soon. Bette to buy the hawk inspired design ones which is 150rs. Cheaper also, that also has decent bass. So avoid this.

name: Himanshu Negi
title: Good stuff.
content: Good stuff..working perfectly..nice bass excellent sound at high volume also..one thing is that it is heavy for listening songs more than half hour..made with metal that's the reason why it is heavy too much for ears..but quality of making is very nice in this price range..Thanku Amazon For timely deliver this thing.

name: Pranjal Das
title: It's good but...
content: Bass is good but sound is not very clear. The bass kind of muffles the sound clarity. And the eartips provided doesn't even fit the earphones. I had to buy another third party eartips for this. Also these are not comfortable for the ears as my ears hurt after using them for more than 10 minutes (not talking about the sound quality).

name: Dayanand Giri
title: All the time get removed from phone. While listening song.
content: Please don't buy it. There is no 30 days return policy. It get removed from phone while listening song during walking time.. It destroyed my earphones jack of redmi note 4.

name: satish yadav
title: Satisfaction is with boat.... Love the quality
content: Sound quality is awesome... But after certain time of purchasing Mike stop working properly... Not with my headset only... After I purchased my few friends also gone with the same model of headset... Even they are facing same issue... Other than this the headset has no reason to not to buy...

name: Vibhor Vaish
title: Its quite durable, super bass but lacks sound quality
content: It's description is 100% accurate. Its quite durable, super bass but lacks sound quality. Just plain amplified noise at the ends, if you have tried higher segment earphones, you won't like this one. Still at 549/- , its sturdy at that price.

name: Kunal
title: Great product and amazing sound quality for its price.
content: Great product and amazing sound quality for its price.. I like the colour and build quality.. The number of soft ear cushions they provide with the ear phone was surprising since I somehow I loose them.

name: Jinu George
title: Amazing head set
content: I love this head set .. it works amazing .. amazing sound ... I have been using this for more than 2 year now and I dont think am going to switch to any other .. specially at this price .. it's really good

name: Sudhanshu
title: Best earphone in budget segiment
content: Appario retail pvt is the best place to buy any. Gadget or accessories. They make me impress with their products no. Fake thing only genuine product they give. Thank u appario. The Best earphones i ever know this is my 3rd order i m very satisfy about this boat and trust on it

name: Meet patel
title: After 3 years use review
content: I use this earphones form past 3 years and i not face any issue. And this earphones is for Ruff use and also this earphones have 90• angle pin so there is no chance to break wire from that part. At this price this is one of the best product

name: Ajay saini
title: disappointed by the parcel I received
content: The product is a good because I previously used it but this time I ordered it for my brother and when we open the box there is a old previously used earphone comes out. I was very disappointed at that time and got angry. These guys are making us fool by sending defective or used product...very disgusting.

name: Amrita Gupta
title: Any update on this concern?
content: I bought this earphone in jan but after few days voice is not coming from one side ,whenever i am reconnecting then only voice is coming and after some time its not audible at all. I need to exchange this earphone or i want my money back as its not working fine. I lost invoice and bill.. Kindly help me to return this one or give my money back.

name: Ruchir Kumar Garnayak
title: Boat bass head earphone is great
content: The boat basshead earphone has a good build quality than other. It fits perfect in ear, mic is good, tangle free cable is nice and the cable length is perfect, color also good. Mostly I like his bass quality. Pure bass, and no noise.price rate in budget. That is awesome. I requested all the people go for it.

name: Sagarika Chattrerjee
title: Not happy
content: Initially no concern..as seen in pic...clear sound quality and great noise cancellation.. But within a few months the mike has stopped working and it has become only a listening devise. Did not expect this from Boat.

name: Ashutosh Shah
title: BOAT products better than the best
content: True Noise cancellation and best ear fit comfort. Try an 8d bass song with any other brand and u will come to know what is the sound of quality

name: Faisal Mannan
title: Best quality earphones
content: This is undoubtedly the best earphones you get in terms of material quality, sound quality and durability.. I have used almost every brand of earphones like Sony, JBL, Samsung etc. but this is there's absolutely no comparison when compared to boAt. Have been using this last 18 months almost and ordered not less than 3 earphones after my first usage.. Would happily recommend this for music lovers, Karaoke singers and everyone who are used to earphones.. Cheers!!!

name: Siddhant Raj
title: Not a good option . But the sound and bass quality is awesome
content: Four star , because it's tooooo heavy without full fitting you can't use them for atleast one song now options are available go for JBL or Realme ear phones because they are made up of good plastic and they are very convenient to use

name: Amazon Customer
title: Ear piece issue
content: Wouldn't sit in the ear. Despite many users comaints I proceeded to buy this product. They were right. Worst ear piece design.. I fell for the boAt brand. And it broke my heart

name: वैभव शेंडे
title: Music lovers with Budget constraint must go for it...
content: Full 4 stars out of 5... Music lovers with Budget constraint must go for it.... Build Quality 5 / 5. Audio Quality 4 / 5. Mic Quality 4 / 5. Loudness 5 / 5. Bass 5 / 5. Looks 4 / 5. Honestly we can not expect more than what this earphone offers from any earphone near Rs.800/-. To check real quality play real quality files not just pirated mp3s (128 to 320kbps).. purchase original Audio CDs and enjoy FLAC files for the best results

name: New In Tech NAVEEN
title: Ok Product.
content: Main Problem with this Earphones is when I m in call other person keep complaining that they can't hear my voice properly,, some noise is coming... Like that. OK for listening music

name: PRINCE
title: Superb quality. Go for it
content: Basically I am a music lover. I use headphones frequently. Friends. Just go for it. Don't think too much. Quality is good. Bass is superb. Sound quality is amazing. Previously I purchased boat 255 bluetooth headset which is extraordinary. Now I purchased boat 225.really its amazing. Music lovers definitely like it. Now I am a big fan of boat.

name: Namaz Shaikh
title: Amazing product
content: All I can say that the product is very good. At a price of 550. I got a great deal. at this price point sound quality is good enough and the build quality is amazing initialy after few months earphone stop working but I wen to the service center and they replaced earphone and given a new earphone to me since then I am using this earphone it been 2 year and 8 month and I am using it. Pros : buld quality, service.. Cons : uncomfortable, heavy not fit in your ear properly.will take time to use to it

name: Vyom Padhiyar
title: Value for money ..great sound ..but heavy weight
content: The sound quality is one of the best earphones i have used till date.. bass is really good and loudness is also pretty well... Built quality is very good as well... Just one problem is there.... The weight of the earpieces are slightly more.. and the weight of the cable is also more so it starts pain after using continuously for about an hour or more..

name: Roshan
title: Poor mic quality, sounds very low. only good for listening music
content: Changed my rating from 5 to 1.. Within use of couple of month the mic have developed some fault. While speaking on phone using this earphones the opposite person on phone hear very low voice.. Upset with the purchase as the product is not durable. Good for music with deep bass but at the end it failed to deliver it's primary function

name: Shah Arnold
title: Never gave me an issue even when I used it roughly.
content: I bought these in September 2017 and till date I've never received a single issue even when i used them roughly (even during rainy seasons when I was always out), basically I've always sticked with sennheiser and these earphones never disappointed me, it was a friend's suggestion that made me buy it and truly these are awesome and extremely durable. Honestly saying, go for it.

name: Ravi
title: Worth buying
content: I have purchased it on feb 2019 and till now it is with me sept.2020 just awesome na. And in bet. 1 side of earbud stopped working it was in replace period thank you boat for giving 1 year replacement time. I invested 599/- and still using it. It is more than worth every penny. Once again thank you BOAT.

name: mithra vinda
title: Extra tough. Worth the money
content: I've only used these for a month. But so far, I'm satisfied. They don't tangle, the sound quality is really good. One of the best investments I've ever made. They are tough to break too and I've stopped using other headphones because they're all so delicate. This one is extra tough. The noise cancelling could be better. A very good product overall.

name: Jitendra Sankpal
title: Best product for music lovers
content: Very good quality product in this range. Specially impressive for music lovers who likes high bass level as per suggested in specification. My son is very much happy using this product. Even he enjoy his Video games with his friends. Only handling precaution to be taken of its cable. Its worth while purchasing.

name: Arihant Jain
title: Comfort of wearing:
content: 🔰No doubt a very good earphones for this price range but comfort level is 0...really 0. Though they provide 6 pairs of ear buds with different sizes & color but nothing fits comfortably in ear. Rating out of 5. bulit up- 5. Looks - 5. Sound - 5. Mic - 4. Comfort- 0. Overall - 4/5. *based on my usage. Thank you☺

name: MOHAMED AMEEN
title: Average volume. Average product.
content: Average product. Looks very beautiful. But sound is little low. Its volume is lower than my Yureka head phone (which I received with my Yureka mobile), but higher than my Motorola headphone (which I received with my Motorola mobile). I think we will get a headphone better than this with this price.

name: sharmeen khanam
title: One earbud has extra annoying noise
content: It was the worst product of boAt I've ever had. It's left bud has some extra noise that I can't tolerate because it tease my ear very badly.. Sound quality of both bud is very bad I'm saying it because I have 3 products of boAt.. I've bought two of those in March-april but those are still working perfectly.. I wanted to return but it was one month old so Amazon wasn't showing return or replace option.

name: Venkata Raju k
title: Fine sound quality
content: Everything thing was awesome only thing is that rough usage may damage one of the ear peace making only one work properly but has a good quality sound output have used it for decent time and would like to get one more now after 3years

name: Amir
title: Great buy with good sound
content: A great buy below 500 price. Sound is excellent but bass is average. Expected some bass heavy earphones, based on the name, but better than others in this range. Surely will recommend these earphone over Skull Candy, JBL, Sony, Audio Technica, Philips, etc.

name: Azhar
title: Bass quality
content: Excellent sound and good noise cancellation. Bass quality is perfect.. If we press pause button it take some times to reach the phone after some time only it happens(am talking about milliseconds )

name: Amazon Customer
title: Didnt fit my ear
content: Sound quality and bass are good at this price level. But it didnt fit my ear at all. Tried with every bud provided. I switched to sennheiser cx180 or cx225 or sony. Those fit in my ear and comfortable but not this one

name: Shon George
title: Jbl is better than this
content: I have compared with jbl basic model. Build quality and look wise boat is the winner. But regarding an ear phone primary thing is sound quality with out any doubts i can say jbl is far far better than this.. My choice is jbl ..

name: Shybin Usman
title: Heavy on Weight and Bass.
content: A tad on the heavy side. And the bass is overwhelming. Those who like to hear the mids and highs should NOT BUY this product. The overall music output is not as crisp as I like.But ok considering the price.. The problem with bass can be rectified using an equaliser programme.

name: Rajan
title: Wastage of my money and time
content: The sound quality is bad. No noise cancellation overall. Bass quality is also not good. I suggest everyone not to buy these headphones. Instead buying these cheap quality chinese headphones i prefer sony headphones which are very good in quality.

name: Shubhangi
title: Best budget earphones I've purchased till date.
content: I've been using my boAt Bassheads 225 (Blue) for over 2 years now and I've never experienced any problems with the sound quality until a few months ago, which is a lot more than what can be said about most of my other earphones. For the price, I think that this is an amazing product. No regrets at all!

name: Arjun RK
title: Even better than my jbl
content: Absolutely great speaker with deep bass I really loved it but the buds seem to be a bit hard on the ears since I had another pair of softer bud I really enjoyed it. .for the price it really blew my head. . (Y). P.s:- it would be better that you don't mention the anti Rangel feature of these head sets

name: Mayur
title: Keeps falling off
content: Not good and keeps falling off if you are using it while lying down. Even otherwise very difficult to keep it in place. And there is also sudden changes in the bass and volume. Mic quality also sort of OK. Overall samsung is a much better option.

name: Exo
title: Earplugs are falling out bcz of the speaker weight..
content: Everything is good. But its loose for one of my ear.. bcz of the speaker its a little heavy due to which its falling from my ear. Don't know how far will it go...

name: Gireesh Krish Nair
title: Don't buy. Find out why.
content: This piece stopped functioning barely within ten days of usage. There was no way that I could get this replaced. Multiple attempts at getting the boat helpline number failed, not did the product registration on their website work. Buy this only if you wouldn't care about a replacement during warranty.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Product is good but it is slipping off of my ears
content: Product is good.sound is good but only issue is that it slips off of my ears .I tried using rubber hooks which are provided in the product but the hooks give pain in my ear in few minutes.so I feel the usability is not good .Ok product

name: vijay
title: High quality in Low budget
content: Boat brand is best for their extra super bass.. Top best earphone in 500-700 range.. Nice wire quality.. Nice wire length.. Awesome Bass.. Average sound quality.. Case quality also good.. Boat give 5 more pair buds with this earphone.

name: Vairavel
title: Good wow awesome
content: Quality of sound and Bass is wow awesome. I think its a Best earphone from boat. Worth to buy. 8D surround system works very super.. Best price (with carrying case ₹599). But the delivery and dispatch is very late. Iam totally disappointed.

name: Swapnil
title: Superb Bass @ Superb Price
content: Sound quality is superb and I have no words to define its bass. Basically I bought this @ 450₹ considering cashback on amazon pay but this has obviously more worth and have not thought for such an awesome bass in this range. Initially, I was just pondering to proceed with Boat brand or not, but then I realized this is Worthy. Ultimately this is a superb product at superb price. If you are looking an earphone around 500₹, I don't think there exist any; better than this. So Just Go For It & Enjoy👍

name: Krishna
title: I have washed for 2 times, warranty claimed, new product got🔥
content: Guys this product is really awesome. For 500rs wort it I bought it on 15th October 2018 still now date it has been thrown fell down but not caused any damage in bass. Very good built quality!. I have washed for 2 times so mic was gone so, I cal warranty and a i gave to a person he was in my door step and he got an d went and a new boat 225 will be replaced within 15 days told by boat company..... Very found on the service of boat company

name: Shubham
title: Definitely Buy it
content: It's good and I don't think anything will change if I point out some cons because all loves these earphones and yeah these are truly good but some time it make harsh noice when it's above 80% but it is manageable I didn't like covers build quality

name: Kapil Amonkar
title: Must Buy Earphones..!!!
content: Awesome BassHeads. Works very well. Sound quality is good and bass when used with equilizer is awesome. The build quality is top notch. The mic button and earphones are metal. 6 pairs of ear buds and Collar clip in the box. Tangle free flat cable. Must Buy. After about 11 months of usage now one ear bud is not working. Can I get under warranty replacement?

name: Pratik Sarkar
title: Emmersive
content: People say it doesnt have that great treble except bass.But I found bass and treble more perfect in this price range.It depends on how you set your equalizer of sound platform . For me both for dirac and dolby works out perfectly with minir setting change. Musics Movies all are emersive.

name: anindita majumdar
title: FAKE PRODUCT!
content: Bought this product last year...it broke in weeks ....on taking to boat service center they told that the product is fake and available in market for 150 rs. I paid near about 600 for it....extremely disappointing getting fake products from big shopping sites like amazon. Hampers the customers faith on the site.

name: Jagadeesh Namagiri
title: Best earphones with reasonable price 👌
content: These are my second boAt bassheads 225. I've bought boAt bassheads 225 from different shopping sites for my friends also I have faced same experience with all. Awesome sound quality even at 100% of sound. Noise cancellation is ok. Cable quality is good. Awesome Bass quality.. The one bad thing I have experienced with this earphones is its heavy weight because of its metallic body...

name: partha b.
title: Best budget product
content: The earphone is having nice sound quality and bass, truly tangleless but it comes out of my ears if I shake my head even a bit ...... It came with few ear buds of varying sizes so u need to pick the one which fits your ears....overall nice product.

name: Kalyan
title: Excellent
content: I love this product. Really sound is excellent and packing is also excellent. Amazing sound and noise cancelling earphones. I really loved it and nice product with low cost.. I love it 😍

name: Amazon Customer
title: Great sound quality
content: sound quality is excellent. color and design look good but it is slightly uncomfortable in the ear without the wing tips. the wire can get tangled but with the flat cable you can untangle it easily

name: Myadav
title: Good product at this price.
content: I would say best for this price range.. Pros:. Good sound quality.. Noise cancellation is great.. Bass is good(I have used it will my MI mobile and it perfectly fine). Cons:. 1.buds r not of good quality so it will hurt Ur ears if u use for longer durations.

name: Chandra mohan jha
title: Certification given product
content: This earphone is the longest living earphone for me 😆, because earlier when I use any earphone that didn't last even 2 months. The sound from the earphone is quite good but not the best, but considering price range it's fantabulous this is for casual users. Who wants to use their earphone everytime everywhere. 🎶🎧 But not for music freak.

name: Nimish
title: Not comfortable for a long time.
content: Pros:. Sound quality of this earphone is good, but the bass is not that much good. Wire length is also sufficient.. Cons:. Extra earbuds is of no use, they didn't get fir so easily if you wish to. Also earphone are not comfortable while listening or talking, you can't wear this for a long time. It will be very hectic.

name: PrabhuB
title: Just buy it
content: I'm using it as a daily driver for 18 months now, I have sat on it, thrown it around, squished it and yet its one of the earphones that still survived and continue to work flawlessly. I have tried lot of popular brands for higher prices in the last 8 - 10 years and none could beat this humble earphone that I reluctantly purchased.. I will definitely buy it again.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Don't buy it even if you get at a cheap price.
content: The sound quality is not at all good . It's better to go for JBL or Philips . But really unhappy with bOAT . Saw bOAT headphones advertisement during IPL thought should be given a try . But yupp not satisfied at all . Very loud and bad sound and bass quality.!

name: Naveen kumar
title: Amazing but....!!!
content: It's been more than a year using this its amazing....you got it all good sound,bass etc but the only this anoys me the most that the ear buds falls a LOT i have LOST more than 3 pairs of ear buds while traveling and even at home...so plss be careful wid this otherwise it value for money....!!!

name: Arun
title: Product review after 13 days
content: My review after 13 days of use the product is nice sound quality is good and noise cancellation is not there and it's not tangle free as it was mentioned and bass could be improved it's colour fadesup easily and it gets cooled in normal environment and if u wear it you will feel the cold overall I will give it 4 out of 5.

name: SHIVAM AGARWAL
title: Decent earphones
content: From day 1 the buttons didn't work on my oneplus 3. The bass was normal, sound was great but the left side stopped working after 5-6 months. Good investment as atleast gave me half a year usage.

name: saumya jaiswal
title: not much satisfying product... but was good for short term use
content: it seemed nice in the starting.. but within 4 to 5 months the quality was literally ruined... and then it stopped working... i dont knw what happened to it.. i hav already used many earphns.. so, i knew how to take proper care of it.. inspite of all that, it stopped working then, I'll probably not recommended this product to be used anymore. thank you!

name: Sk
title: Audio quality is pretty average, build quality is good.
content: After using for a month:. PRO: built quality is good, tangle free cable is better.. CONs: Audio quality is pretty average. It's heavy. Tried all provided earbuds, still it falls out of the ear.. SUGGESTION: Add 200/300 INR more and get Sennheiser or JBL which has best sound quality and build.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good quality
content: I bought this headset for 3 times to me and for my friends the quality was excellent including sound and metal body. If you are really expecting a good bass sound and long usage then surely go for this headset. You get 1yr warranty for this product I claimed warranty and get a new headset for replace(i used that old headset for 7months and accidentally i damaged it but no problem i have 1yr warranty and i get replace of new headset)

name: Shoaib Bhutia
title: Recommended
content: The mic is kinda weak and sound output comes a little bad but hey rest everything is okay. The cool design and thin wire makes it a true value for money product.

name: Robinhood
title: Good product at this Cost..Best Quality...
content: Good product..Good voice bass and quality good for all like voice/video calls..music and videos.... Cost effective..But all bus tried and its loose not jo5lding inside ear...dropping off from ear...not fits inside...

name: Aakash Bhavsar
title: Ordered for 4th time
content: I've been using this model for myself and family since at least 4 years.. I just broke one of these till date, which got replaced in warranty all others i lost.

name: Vivek rathore
title: Reviewed  my own experience
content: Build is pretty impressive for its price. Sound is decent. Bass is impressive. Sound distort at higher level<75% (recommend to listen in 75% volume as its high enough volume). you can not sleep with wearing it as is not bend (45°) large part of earpieces are out side the ear

name: Jeya kumar
title: Go-to headphones
content: The product is absolutely stunning. A go-to headphones in normal budget. The sound quality is mesmerizing nd it's made is also quite good for the buget. The cable is super flexy nd tangible, so u don't have to worry about wire.

name: Monica J
title: Good choice for rough use
content: Works well on mobile but not much on laptop. Sometimes there is a glitch with the microphone. Should good on selected models of laptop.

name: Piyush Pawar
title: If you are looking for a durable earphones with GREAT sound!!!
content: I've been using them for 10 months, first of all I cannot even believe a pair of earphones could last for that long I have bought Sony, Philips, Jbl, Skull candy ear phones before and NONE OF THEM lasted for more than 3 months or 4.. These headphones are super durable and after extensive use of them for 4 to 6 hours a day and got 10 months they show no sign of damage and no change in audio quality. If you are looking for a durable headphones these are the best.

name: Akhil Peter
title: Good earphones
content: Good earphones great quality audio good bass and depth.. My one side stopped working after 2 months. But was replaced withing 2 weeks. So overall happy with the product.. The replacement piece also stopped working on one end after 5 months so not recommending

name: Sony Chandy
title: Creates pressure inside your ear
content: The design is made for noise cancelation and completly cancels all the noise .. but the flip side , it creates pressure in your ears and after sometime your ear starts paining as air cannot escape and starts pressing the ear drum.. Buy if you are okay with it

name: Amazon Customer
title: One side stops working after a while
content: This was my 3rd and last purchase, all 3 times there was no visible damage in either wires or earpiece but one side stops working in 3-6 months. Seems like their life is determined right from start

name: Jonty
title: Bad choice and not worth for money you spending
content: 5 stars for style and fabulous built quality but zero for comfort , totally uncomfortable, buds come out automatically after few seconds, and too heavy for the ears so if you are using it for more than half an hour then your ears will facing suffer, if the earphones are not comfortable then it's built quality doesn't matter at all. Don't buy it for Ragular usage. I recommend you realme buds 2 or Artis E300m.

name: Amazon Customer
title: This one is made for ppl like me who takes care of ear plugs poorly
content: This one is made for ppl like me who takes care of ear plugs poorly. It has been close to an year and it works great. Comes with different sizes of ear buds (think it had 3 sizes) so you can choose the size that fits perfect for you. Highly recommend this one.

name: Lavanya
title: Not fitting
content: All the info that they have mentioned is there and it's better than I expected. But the only problem in this product is even it's smallest sized ear buds didn't fit in my ear it was not grippy it didn't get inside ear and if it did it comes out in hardly 10 seconds so if your ear size is small like me please think once or twice before buying this set of earpods

name: Punith
title: Buyer BEWARE (READ)
content: Let me explain these are wonderful headphones. But they just don't give life. After about a moth of buying these one side stopped working. After applying for the warranty (pickup and status are extremely slow I am yet to get my product back) I bought these again because I loved the quality after a month and a half, the right side stopped working and if you go to the warranty site there are a lot of complaints about this so beware.

name: Indraneel d.
title: Poduct review and feedback
content: Headphone is sturdy, good build quality, a seperate shirt hook is provided.. Also comes with 6 earlobes. Coming to the pproduct feedback. Bass is good, voice cancellation can be a little bit better, supports MI Phones perfectly... Overall a goid buy for the price range... Cheers! ✌

name: Raja Thiru
title: Best ear phones one could ask for!
content: Best price and super quality. This is the third time I am buying this. Had to gift other two to my friend ( as they steal it from me ;) ).. I have Jabra Bluetooth and have tried with JBL wired earphones also. But this one stands out the best.

name: Chiranjib Dash
title: Review after 1 month of use.
content: The first thing you'll notice after using it that, it feels a bit heavy. There is missing of low end punch. Low mid bass response is quite good. But today i noticed a cracking sound at D3, while using it on my piano. The crackling sound coming in between 146hz to 160hz. I'm bit disappointed.

name: Rajesh
title: Good quality ear ohones
content: Ear phones sre good quality but not very comfortable while placeing in thd ear. They fall out from eat quiet frequently

name: Amazon Customer
title: Bass is not good enough as told and shown..
content: Treble has outcomed the bass of the earphones and also the older versions of the same model has a very good bass but after modifications in the size of the driver,bass is no where not happy... Replaced the item and cancelled it too... Now these boat earphones are not worthy to buy go for antaudio found it better then these...

name: Vrushal Raut
title: Suitable for daily usage
content: PROS:. Quality of Boat bass head 255 is good , cable also long and quality is average but survive your daily usage.. CONS:. You can't wear these earphones for long more than 1½ hrs after that its very uncomfortable and eartips are quite painful.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Blindly Go for Product!!
content: Awesome product in this price segment!!. 1. Build Quality is Good. 2. Looks pretty decent.. 3. If you are Bass lover den go for it.. 4. wire quality is also good. In this price range this earphone rock's 👍

name: t khan
title: Must buy
content: This is One of the best earphones i have used....if u r looking for a earphone which lasts long then this is the product which u should buy....sound quality is awesome....also its tangle free....its been more than a year i m using this.....all this at such a low cost...thank u boat and Amazon

name: Sayan
title: Lacks clarity but bass is good
content: It lacks clarity. Mi headphones are better in clarity though it is more loud than the mi headphones in this range and bass is good. But too much of bass makes it uncomfortable for longer usage. For me it gave me a headache and i switched back to the mi ones. *Personal opinion. Some people like to much of bass, it goes to their personal preference.

name: Shweta Gupta
title: Pathetic !!
content: Ghatiya product, stopped working in just 15 days. No help from amazon!!! Never buy this cheap product!

name: Nitin Behl
title: Waste
content: DO NOT BUY, IT'S NOT WORTH IT. It's sound feels like someone is talking in your head, not in your ears. Wasted 599 rupees on it. There is NO REFUND policy

name: loveprit s.
title: Faulty product
content: I've recieved a faulty product form the seller.. Moreover after 4 days of using this product earphone seems to take over my screen.. Volume would go up and down all by itself. It would random open any app as if earphone were using my smartphone.. No sanguine response form amazon

name: Raunak
title: Expectations fullfilled
content: I bought these earphones to play PUBG and it's just amazing to get these earphones at such a valuable price. I played many custom lan tournaments using this. it's not the best but at such effective cost I would these earphones are worth it. and also it gives a 1-year warranty pretty impressed with the earphones.

name: Sagar Singh
title: Used & Broken Earphones
content: Very very disappointed with the kind of product received.. They delivered a damaged and used boat earphones.. And it wasn't even working.. Zero quality check.. I like the boat products, but very disappointed with this time with the product received by the vendor under Amazon

name: Praveen.D
title: Value for money.
content: I'm reviewing after using for one week .. This BoAt earphone gives you a way better sound quality when compared to sony and Phillips .(brands I have used before at the same cost).. It fits in our ears perfectly, and didn't tangled at all.. Im just used for one week. So I can't tell about it's durability. And i hope it will last long.. And the only cons Is, the dust particles will binds on the wire easily. Especially it is more visible in black colour.

name: HotTaquila
title: Absent Bass BassHeads. No bass, harsh-is sound.
content: They are called Bassheads. But my Mi Basic headphones have much more bass. Sound is clear, but harsh. It makes my ears hurt after an hour or so use. Will not buy again

name: Ashish Singh
title: Boat is the best bass earphones
content: Great things come in small packages. This is the example. Such a good design and all accessories packed neatly. This is the Mother of all Bass earphones. Was using altec Lansing earlier which was good for Treble but not bass. This one steals the show.

name: KalVJ
title: More lengthy wire
content: Wire quality good but lengthy wire. More wire length. it should be short . Not able to walk along with mobile.

name: Soham G.
title: This earphones are excellent forever.
content: I liked this product (boAt Bass heads 225) very much . Because:. 1.This are the best wired earphones comparing to other (wired) earphones.. 2.Sound quality, Noise cancellation and bass quality is excellent 👍👍.. 3.Also best for listening & enjoying 3d songs, music etc.. I am enjoying very much.......

name: Amazon Customer
title: Uncomfortable fit.. disappointed
content: It has a very uncomfortable fit...Sound quality varies... Buzzes if the phone is pocketed with the earphones plugged in... You have to adjust the plug to make it sound ok.. like a freaking antenna 😐. Disappointed.. didn't expect this from boAt

name: K a r a n
title: The earphones have a great sound quality at this price point at the beginning ...
content: The earphones have a great sound quality at this price point at the beginning you will love them. There is no problem with the sound quality n built is to last but the earbuds are heavy and they fall off the ears even if you just lying down,sitting listening to music they fall off and at certain point it gets irritating, and no way we can use it for running or at the gym whole time you will spend holding them back in ears better u keep them aside n workout.. No problem with sound n built as I stated it is amazing the problem is only that thing which I described. Thank you!

name: Neha
title: Excellent Product !! Impressive
content: boAt BassHeads 225 in-Ear Super Extra Bass Headphones (Black) - They are just great.Bass is next level.Performance is outstanding....And important thing is service of boat is one of the best i ever saw.I purchased this headphones on august 2018 due to some issue my mic was not working i claim and within 15 days they deliver me a new set of headphones which is amazing.I am totally impressed with the service.Great job !!!

name: Paaras
title: Good job boat
content: Best in budget... So rugged , that they were abused by mein every manner and not even a scratch on them. Sound quality is perfect in all aspects.. be it bass ,treble, mids, highs ... they are the best

name: Sarath
title: Worst product
content: Worst product. Within 3 month one side not working and it 4th month both side of headset not working. I dont have boat service center near. Now i have to roam to find the service centre for this. Name only branded but worst product from Amazon.

name: Nimesh
title: Super sturdy and clear sound
content: Everything is just perfect about it in this price range, hv been comparing Realme bud 2 with this, seems Boat is clear winner.. Using it since 3 days, happy till now.

name: Insight
title: Nice one👌👌
content: Build quality is quite nice as per price range concerned. Good bass with above average sound quality. As per price range, this is one of the *better* earphone. If you want cheap product along with above average performance, I would recommend this. GO FOR IT!!!!

name: Abhishek
title: Mic stopped working
content: I enjoyed the earphones for a few months and the mic starts giving problems (screeching sound, helicopter-hovering-over-your-head sound, and general amplified static to the point the person on the call begs you to cut the call) after 4 months of delicate usage. Now after 6 months the mic is not working at all !. The sound quality of the earphones is very good but this one loses on the mic, like terribly bad.

name: Suresh Kumar
title: Please help me...🙏
content: Automatic volume increase or decrease, automatic forward songs or video , automatically pause or play with this head phone... If i attend call , call is disconnected automatically or mute... Please tell me if may solutions of thid problem.... 🙏

name: palash
title: Overall.
content: Best Earphone at this range, Bass is the best part if you are a bass head, you will surely like this and also the sound quality will never disappoint you if you are not a bass head, built quality is also good, had this for more than year, service centre is also very helpful, had issue and it was resolved immediately by the boat service centre, overall good experience from the product. Will recommend.

name: Rishu Sharma
title: Superb
content: What else can we get in this price range...superb quality fantastic sound bass... perfect looks.. happy with this purchase..

name: Happy yadav
title: After using 5 months
content: I have bought this earphone 5months ago,. It's Working Fine, not any problem,. The only problem new user will feel, it is Not very comfortable, it slips down. It is heavy, considering this you can buy it.. The good this what I liked, it looks fine, it's quality is Good, Sound quality is Average.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Ear buds not fitted w
content: coming out from ears frequently

name: Kalpana Ghosh
title: Go gor it...
content: I'm just loveing the product. The colour is a bit different though... It has to be parrot green as per the image but its more like neon. Still i like it...

name: SHATABDI
title: Boat earphone
content: I am really impressed with the build and quality of the product it's really a nice earphone.. The sound quality is nice.

name: Sudarshan
title: boAt bass heads 225 review
content: The headset is quite good for its price. It comes with one year manufacturer warranty and a pack with extra ear pads, clip etc. (see the attached images). The noise cancellation isn't very good. However, I believe it is worth buying in my opinion. Go for it!

name: Kuldeep Singh
title: Undoubtedly the best choice!
content: Bought @499 in Aug 2019. 1. Sufficient cable length. 2. Built quality is awesome. 3. Bent design at connecting side makes its wire safe from damage. 4. Sound quality is good with noise cancellation. It's working as it is after 1 year no issues till now

name: Rushabh Aher
title: Nice product but the buds are a lot heavy.
content: The bass is superb, even far better compared to the sennheiser CX 180 street 2 headsets. It has mic has well which is a advantage over the other brand in this price range. The only disadvantage is that the buds are lot heavy due to metal finish and hence it does fall often. Its really a nice product.

name: Jay Modi
title: Only for BASS lovers
content: It has very high bass although it was already mentioned in description.. Overall Quality is great compared to competitor's.. But if you are ok with the poor material quality then you must go with competitor's.

name: Arpita
title: Bad product
content: It has a good sound quality and also a great noise cancellation feature, but the problem is they keep falling from your ears. I tried every size of the ear bud. It works fine for 3-4 days and then again they keep falling. These are so heavy for the ears. They are not comfortable at all. I would not advice you to buy it.

name: krishna gadade
title: BoAt  valu of money
content: Good sound quality in this earphones. Nice packing form Amazon overall product is good and valu of money .. Don't think buy this !!!!

name: Revathy
title: Good Product but with glitches
content: I grew to love these earphones. I am a music enthusiast and earphones are a must have for me. However, I am disappointed by the fact that they have stopped working. Its been 10 months and honestly, I hoped that ther would work longer. Further I have no idea on how to avail the warranty that I got along. Also, the buds that it came along with, were not so comfortable to the ear.. But still, I really love my earphones and this brand. Would really appreciate if I can avail the warranty and get it either repaired or replaced.

name: Siya
title: Disgusting product
content: The product is damaged ..cost of product is 550 rs ...not at all worth...left side of the earphone is damaged ...i need to again n again move it to hear it properly....the sound decreases again n again ..n i need to set it again ..it was horrible product rcvd ...waste of money...!! Amazon Needs to improve quality .

name: Varun Bhatt
title: Boat earphones are always trustworthy!
content: Thank you, Boat & Amazon for reasonable price of this awesome and better quality in terms of sound and it's strength. Never disappoints me after accidental or reckless use. It reminds me to take care of it and be careful to avoid further mistakes. :) If local company earphones were in place of it, lol I would have been shelling out money worth of this price. You are the life savior! <3 Going Great!

name: Aamir
title: Good headphone but price is high
content: Headphone wired quality is very good but sound and bass very less and not comfortable to ears mostly droping from ears and its heavy in weight. Price to performance is not good you go for BOULT LOOP better sound and bass available on this 200 rs less on price point.

name: Swamy V.
title: Thumbs down
content: Sound quality is ok but not so comfortable using it. Always keeps slipping from the ear. Design should have been much better.

name: Kartik Kumar
title: Very good sound qualityand bass is also veryyyyyyy gooooodddd
content: Sound quality is very good . You can hear every instrument playing in the background as well as the bass is very good. Material used is quite good quality . Just the button with the mic is a bad quality plastic . Otherwise it ROCKS! the metallic finish is premium looking and the connector is also very good quality. The only drawback is its hooks which lead to ear pain after 5 minutes use . Noise isolation is also good . Sound received through the mic is also good . GOOD JOB !!!! BOAT'S THE BEST!!!!!!!!

name: jaypalsinh
title: Superb
content: Superb at this price. Loudness awesome. Bass is also good. Comparable with ubon headphone. I got original earbud wich was not fitting properly . So i had replaced original earbud with soft earbud of my old ubon headphone and it is now satisfactory with sound also better.

name: DHARMATEJA C V
title: Good but not the best

Coming to the audio quality, bass dominates the vocals if you're a bass lover then go for it. But for me I felt little noisy when the songs are more with vocals. Sound get distarted after at higher volumes which disappointed me.But considering the price it's ok. My choices are house of Marley smile Jamica, Sennheiser CX 180, JBL T100A...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Boat 225 #Review.
content: Just i bought this earphone today. Apparently this is a tangle free earphone . Then its gives awsm feel, and the call attend button is not there in that earphone this is the only disadvantage for me . Finally i thought i bought a good earphone ........ ( Final info . Every new buyers think in that boat ear stip is plastic but that is not plastic that is rubber , so its pretty cool.)

name: Priyank
title: Good one
content: Sound quality is better in this.. In term of base it is better. Vocals are clear and better but in term of treble it is good. Aslo when comes to the the build quality it is better.. But quite disappointed with loud sound i think it is to be of 11 mm driver.. Still no issue is found with these earphones.

name: Chandan Rath
title: Completely dissatisfied.
content: Not before six months,the earphones stopped functioning with one side no sound at all. I tried to avail warranty by calling the company. But they didn't respond at all. I completely feel like cheated both by company and amazon.. Regarding earphone quality, it provided good bass with an active noise cancellation.but didn't work with my sturdy case for oneplus 5 because it has a hard end.

name: Vaibhav
title: Bass GOD
content: Overall the product was amazing. The bass of these earphones are just above the bars. I literally used them for 2 years successfully but after 2 years they are dead now. But seriously the quality of these earphones were amazing in this price range.

name: Kuldip Goswami
title: First time bad experience from Amazon
content: On 20 march 2020...I have purchased this headphones from Amazon...headphones is not working now...what shall I do now??????company has given a one year warranty against the product...number which that has been mentioned below is my product which is not working..plz suggest me to replace my product .....

name: JAI NARAYAN
title: Best for bass only
content: excellent product for bass lovers & professional sound engineers but not suitable for enjoying leisure time as the depth & treble quality is just not more than average, if anyone wants in ear headphones for leisure times I personally will recommend either SeinH or Sony, I have both and also to be mentioned their bass is not at all near to this product. Best product for only bass of sound.

name: Anurag Singh
title: Boat Earphones
content: Very much satisfies with it with broad wire and supreme quality sound but ear holding problem make me uncomfortable.. Overall very good and awesome. 👍

name: Arun Prasad
title: Product delivered was faulty

Why else would someone raise a replacement if it isnt defective. It's absolutely infuriating and I'm never gonna purchase the product ever again.

name: raju
title: Boat rockerz 255 active black not working properly

I bought 4boat headsets before this but I don't have problem of them. I Fully disappointed by this due to not working with in a year.

name: Anjali
title: Use full but 3 4 Mounths later have an another opinion

name: SBM

name: Goldy
title: Good at this price of 599

Just Keep the mouth piece close to your mouth when u speak soft as it may not catch ur voice very well when it is far. Wire is tangle free so I believe it ll last long.. Happy with the purchase.

name: vishesh mittal

name: surendra

name: deepak behera
title: Bass is good but not comfortable in the ear

name: amir h.
title: Super quality with high comfert

name: Sagar Chaklader

You'll need hours and hours to change those fuc***** buds. They're too tight to fit inside. I don't know why they provided those buds if they don't fit.

name: Khushi Mondal

name: Padmavathi

name: kam

name: Vishal bhan

name: Giriraj Jangilwad

That replaced unit also got the same problem. I'm fed up of all this. 😐 I finally switched to new earphones. Please don't waste your money.

name: Manish
title: Nice and sturdy

name: Nanda Paul

name: Himanshu Kumar
title: Overall it’s a good product for such a price

Pros. - punchy, good amount of base, clarity at high volumes.. Cons. - Yet to figure out as it’s just been few days while using this product.. But thumbs up for a price and quality.

name: Bibhuti Ranjan Mishra

name: Amazon Customer

Also the sound stage is so wonky, the bass is too loud that it hurts the ears. Also the fit is bad. I owned a Mi headphones before this and they were much better than this.

name: Sam
title: JBL is better
content: The overall quality is really good except that what's the use of this good quality if the earphone keeps falling from your ear no matter what you do. Even JBL earphones are way better than this. So keep this in mind before buying this. I will recommend JBL earphones or buy headphones.

name: Aditya Kumar
title: Good in this price segment

name: Suneet Nandan Nayak
title: Very nyc product

name: Jay Kapadia
title: Best in budget
content: Best in the budget. You can buy it for 450 in those sales. The build quality is super. The flat wire is phenomenal. I am not a audiophile so i would say sound quality is good, the bass is god like. Because of its material quality they are definitely durable. I have been using them for a year now and no troubles whatsoever. They are quite heavy so you will have to use those attachments provided in the box. Thanks

name: Prince Raghav
title: Low Quality build

Also the build design and quality is not so good, when you remove one pair of silicon buds, it's almost impossible two install other pair easily. The sound quality is also neglected in order to focus on bass which is quite good. Rating it 2 out of 5, won't buy again this particular earphones.

name: Rakesh Kumar Mishra
title: Durable. Good Quality earphones

I was little bit skeptical while buying it, but this has stood the test of time. I recommend this to whoever asks me about mid budget earphones !

name: Mithun
title: Not bad for the price range could do better for bass
content: The claim of deep bass doesn’t stand here. Had some expectations here which did not get met here.. Not bad for the price range but yes if you are claiming deep bass I guess justice hasn’t been done here.

name: Grim Mandex
title: Go wireless

name: kunal
title: Don't... BOAT custom care not available in any mode (call or mail and no centre location)
content: I ordered it and got 1 year warranty... but it is not working properly. It automatically reduce my mobile voice... I want to complain but no option. Neither custom care no is working, not custom service mail I'd. It's a big fraud.... stay away from boat product because you have no option to contact to boat custom care.

name: Sidzor✂️

name: Kiran Kadam
title: Good headphone for the budget

name: Arti yadav

I want my refund because it s second time i bought these earphones. total waste of money .

name: Chandu
title: Microphone is not as expected

name: Arpit Anand
title: Never buy these products

name: Smita
title: Not comfortable

name: deepak kulkarni

name: Amit Ghosh
title: Defective product

name: Sunny
title: Best

My earphones has got replaced as one of right ear speaker stopped working after 6 months as this earphones gets with one year of warranty i have claimed warranty and got replaced with new one.process for claiming warranty was easy with boAt website.

name: Karthik Raja R

name: Suresh
title: Read the full review

name: tushar dubey
title: Great product. The first great thing is distortion control ...
content: Great product. The first great thing is distortion control which I have experience for the first time.. Pros:. 1- Distortion control.. 2- Bass ( which depends upon your equalizer but if you have right settings then it will worl great.). 3- Different sizes of ear buds which helps in getting you comfortable.. 4- Great build quality.. 5- Noise cancellation microphone which works great.. Cons:. 1- For long period its not comfortable.

name: subham p.
title: Its amazing... One of the great performance in lower price
content: Noice cancellation and tangle free - amazing performance. Comes with extra earbuds of different sizes - fit for everyone. Generally not affected by rain water. Amazing bass and sounds experience - best in class. Dont look for reviews ..just buy it.. you won't regret later 😊

name: alok sinha
title: Absolutely recommend!
content: Boat is really investing so much into a good quality product for a reasonable price. Add to it, your packaging is real good too.. Like the flat wires, the vibrant colours and the nice case that comes with it.

name: Meghna

name: anuska shrestha

name: Shayon

name: Com
title: Forget SkullCandy JbL @ This Price Range 😋

name: Julie P

name: Azma Bano
title: Very Slippery, not fit as expected, Average Product...

I m mentioning some. 1 Not fit into your ears as this is very slippery and I have tried all the given pairs of ear Bud's but still is very slippery.. 2 Bass quality is average as 100 rs earphone can give you a better bass instead of this.. 3 sound quality is just good not best.. Overall I m not happy with this product. It's very slippery and not fit properly.

name: Vishwajeet Ujjwal
title: Yeah its true review after 1 year

U will get warranty for 1 year, my boat earphone 225 last for 8 months and after then i replaced under 1 year warranty that lasted for 5 months only. Build is perfect . songs like Arijit u will feel , but with old retros .... Not suited for lows bit rated songs.. For better sound enhancement use perfect ear tip and volume little louder .

name: Deepika
title: DON'T BUY THEM AT ALL

Sound is very average but you can't listen only since the earphone will not fit only.. 5. Forget workout, can't use while sitting idle.. 0 stars option not available, otherwise would have given that.. Writing review to save others money

name: Arvind
title: Great for the Price!
content: Overall Score: 9/10. Durable and long-lasting metallic build. Sound quality is good compared to others in the price bracket, noise cancellation is very good and drowns out almost all the noise from outside, the bass quality is also good, the volume goes up pretty high without distorting. The inbuilt mic is also gives some great audio input, very good for calls and audio recording.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Very worst Servicing.
content: It was just 3 months after I bought this earphone one of its EarPod stopped working... and just in next 10 days the pin became loose. and second pod also stopped working. When tried contacting through boat's website they didn't responded. No replies to mails no replies to calls. worst Service ever. Would never opt for a boat product in future.

name: Mehul
title: Very Nice
content: Very good product, sound is clear. lot of extra buds available that fits on ear. looks premium, 90 degree angle jack will protect from breaking cable. Metal finished speakers, overall good deal.

name: kushal b.
title: go for it, nice headset, awesome bass n sound n call quality
content: using 1st time some product from boat, loved it, sound quality is awesome, call quality n everything is great. got xtra buds n ear hook too, n clip also, loved it 👍🤘 go for it.

name: Chirayu
title: Good sound quality

There was a problem of disbalanced sound in the earphone . So I requested for the replacement So there was a pickup within two days of launching the complaint But I got it so much late about 14-15 days after Pickup.So I suggest that replace your earphones at service centre itself, maybe that would help.

name: Wonder woman
title: A little heavy but good sound quality

name: RAJIB D.

name: Poornima
title: Check n sale the items in online

name: Amazon Customer

name: ashaya kantawala
title: Value for money

name: AmazonCustomer
title: Worst case product ever!!

name: arvind kumar

name: Raj prithvi raj

name: Ajay Prasad

name: shillu
