name: Namrata Yadav
title: Nice buy
content: I I just love this product but find it heavy as compared to other earphones but not bad at all good product have very good quality 👌

name: Dilip S.
title: I feel it is one of the best at the price range
content: I feel it is one of the best at the price range. I purchased like 5 pairs for everyone in the family recommending them to buy the same... The quality and is excellent... It has the best Bass and noise cancellation on the product...

name: ABHISHEK
title: Poor Sound quality..
content: Quality of sound is very poor........its only loud....no clarity and quality in the sound.....sennheiser and Sony having better sound quality

name: SACHCHIDANAND PRASAD
title: This is an awesome earphone. Its sound quality is so good that ...
content: This is an awesome earphone. Its sound quality is so good that you will be forced to love it. I really enjoy listening to songs and all. And the main thing is the price, which is not that much for this amazing product;. Thanks Amazon :)

name: Subrata Maity
title: One year product life...
content: One year product life... Then useless😃😃😃. One year product life... Then useless😃😃😃. One year product life... Then useless😃😃😃

name: Choudhary
title: Way Better than Basshead 242
content: Bought it again, I have been using 225 from past 2 years but unfortunately it broke and then I bought basshead 242 but they were very poor specially its bass when compared to 225 so i returned it and bought this again.

name: Varada
title: Value for money!
content: Best at such a low price.. Awesome bass.. Tangle free. And the look is so classy. Value for money. And amazing choice of colours!. Trust me, I recommended this to my entire family and they all are using it.

name: Chandeep k.
title: This is better than any expensive earphones loved them ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
content: It has perfect noise cancellation for me great bass great sound quality I've been using them for like a year now and I don't have any complaints sound, bass quality is still same If you are looking for good quality earphones under 600 then I would recommend these for you

name: Darpan Nath
title: Smoothing range of sound quality, bass enough to get you rocking.
content: Great audio quality, bass found it better than cx180, working fine after 40days use. Only con, earphone heads are unusually unbalanced which makes it difficult to hold to ears during physical labour. Wouldn't recommend it to workout oriented customers. Common user like me can definitely give it a try for this affordable price range.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Lacks quality
content: Great sound quality at this price!. Had given them the above review almost 2months back when I had bought them, but they have stopped working in 2 months!

name: miraclemanoj
title: Awsome
content: Awesome,lasted for an year and half. I blame myself for misshap. But i would like to note that if your earholes are smaller ,i suggest to go for plastic one such as boult also these are heavy metals which might fall off quickly while walking or running. If there is a earloop with tbis. It would have been a better experience

name: Piyush Dingore
title: Good product...
content: The product is pretty good and I durable while on heavy use... The only thing I didn't like is the position of the mic... It's not comfortable and is pretty well... The wind quality is awesome on almost every phone that I've tried on...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Highly uncomfortable
content: Can't really use for running, gymming or for extended periods as they are heavy and uncomfortable. Keep popping out from the ears. Sound quality is good though. Better go for JBL instead.

name: Aditya Raj
title: Nice earphone.
content: It's been about two months of heavy usage. No issues till now. Wire is decent and tangle free. Go for it if price is within 500. I bought it during festival sale and got it for Rs. 500

name: FurQuan Ibn Hasan
title: Replacement done for faulty one is also not working
content: First one got replaced, now I had two, expected the second one will work good, but instead ended up with same issue after 2-4 months.. obvious that now I can't exchange it. Not recommended and not worth it

name: Mohan
title: Great after sales support
content: Few months into usage, the left speaker went dead.. Contacted Boat service center and the repair / replacement was absolute seamless and a delight. They replaced mine.

name: Gaurav Kumar Verma
title: Heating Issues otherwise good
content: I used this Ear Phone for a day and it really gets heated up with 15-30 minutes of use.I tried it with both PC and Mobile but same results .My ear feels irritated after using this earphone. Although the earphone has excellent sound quality.I returned this product next day

name: Alina Naaz
title: DO NOT BUY
content: This was my second product from boat.. The size of the outer size of buds is too big, which is a bit annoying. Though the sound is not that bad, I'd suggest not to buy this one. BOAT is a nice brand but this product doesn't go with it's name. Get something better.

name: Amish Gaonkar
title: Very poor quality!
content: After using only for 3 months only one side is working. Quality is very poor. First reason to buy I thought this was good deal with this price but this won't lasted 3 month. If you choose this product your money will get waste like mine.. Updated review: After complaining to customer care I got replacement with brand new earphones and after I have no complan.

name: Dewal Prashar
title: Good quality but lacks good ear fit .
content: Ear phones are quiet reliable and good quality but it doesn't hold into your ears for a long time . Ear grip is an issue . If you think u are ok with it then I guess this is the best product at such cheap price

name: krishna kumar mishra
title: Nice sound quality with extra bass
content: earphone is very comfortable by design and nice on ears. They have provided different type of buds. Sound quality is very good and excellent in this price range. Cords are very comfortable to handle. At last awesome look and design. Can't found any flaw or cons till date

name: Consumer no1
title: Not good. The pin is too loose
content: The jack pin is too loose for redmi note. I am trying to return- but they only replace and I cat just return. Sound quality is not good because pin keeps coming off. material is ok ok. Durability - I am not sure.

name: GemzyGal
title: Must buy !
content: Go for it without giving second thoughts. I bought this during Amazon sale and i think the sound quality, bass, clarity, noise cancellation is superb. Genuine product. The wire is tangle free so a relief !

name: Rishab
title: Worst earphones ever
content: Worst earphones ever i would recommend everyone not to buy these earphones at all.. I bought 2 pairs one for me nd one for my brother, but both the earphones stopped working after a month nd 2 months respectively. Sound is not coming from one earphone.. I talked to the company and even they are not replacing them even its in the warranty.

name: Devansh Tiwari
title: Good for Prize
content: Very good material quality under this range because I bought JBL earphone for ₹1400 that has a very bad material product and doesn't go long.. Material Quality - 5 Star. Sound Quality - 4 Star ( because sound comes out of the earphone during listening high bass sounds.). Go for it...Grab it

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good bass and clarity but two cons
content: The sound is amazing. But after 1.5 years of rough use. The connector has gotten loose and sound only comes from one bud.. However if you hold the connector for like 1 second and try different ways of keeping it in a place. It can give sound on both. One last thing they are not as comfortable as normal earphones due to their long tail.. But bass is excellent. Clarity even at full volumes is amazing.. The bass was even better than one of my JBL HEADPHONES

name: Umang Rocks
title: Worst earphone
content: Worst earphone!. It got broken within just 15 days and worst quality of earphone I ever had.. N I couldn't even claim the warranty as it will consider as physical damage.

name: Pavan
title: Worse headfon
content: One of worse experience of lyf ever wid dis earphone... One month of initial stage it was good.. Then I found voice problem, contacted to customer care service, they only take earphones in their custody for tym pass, after a month tym they give us back, wid same error, it happened thrice in a year.. Lastly I threw it in garbage... Guys plz plz don't buy it....

name: Karthick
title: Stopped working in just 4-5 months.
content: Stopped working in just 4-5 months.. I had purchased these boat headphones on 02 Dec 2019. Suddenly it has stopped working in just 5 months. It has a warrenty of 1 year. I want this product to be replaced as soon as possible. I need headphones badly. Such a bad experience with amazon Just want this product to be replaced man.

name: Lithin L.
title: Keeps falling off
content: Even though we get different sized ear buds, i have tried using all of them and it just keeps falling off my ears everytime i move. This is probably due to the added weight at one end of the buds.

name: Rachita Saha
title: The worst earphones out there
content: The worst earphones out there! Does not STAY in your ears! Comes out at every motion. Forget working out while you are wearing these. Really waste of money and uncomfortable.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Earphones not working in few months
content: I bought this product on Jan’19 and have been using only for few months but none both the side earphones are not working now. It has warranty for 1 year and I tried contacting boat for the same but no response

name: Sumitra
title: feeling  in the ears was uncomfortable
content: the disappointing thing about the product which i have received was , plugs were giving a shocky kind of feeling in my ears and i was not feeling well with it , i don't know whether it was current or something else . At least i don't expect these kind of manufacturing defect from BOAT.

name: Arpit Dwivedi
title: Awesome product in this price
content: Its sound is osm and build quality is superb..... This earphone is best for this proce range... Must buy this earphone.. if ur budget is under 600... osm earphone... sound is exilent , design is exilend over all this is osm.. it fullfils all ur needs... bass and sound... 👌👌👌

name: Soheb
title: Worst
content: It was a worst experience to buy this product.. Not at all good.. Just after a week. One ear piece has stopped working.. It's just the small bag of the earphone.. Which looks attractive.. I would suggest others.. Not to go for this product.. It does not even fit in the ears..

name: Ankan Debgupta
title: Powerful and bassy
content: Beautifully balanced output and if your handset has a dolby equilizer..it works even better. Only issue is the ear piece,tends to slide off the ear. Good bass. I am a bass lover. So would definitely recommend it if you are a bass lover

name: Dave
title: It's good headphone for this price range
content: The bass is fantastic and the build quality is decent.. I would have loved it even further if it was a bit lighter and if it had a call pick-up button.. Overall a good package as it has many options for earbuds as well.

name: Tamali Ghosh
title: Not bad not that good
content: This s decent headphn wid good bass bt d sound gets creaky in high volume nd its nt clear at all. Bt its a hardy one as it got a good built quality. Bt as compared to othr brands its quite decent prdct

name: Santosh sharma
title: Sound Quality is energetic
content: Boat headphone sound quality is energetic, you feel low sound instrument wise clearly and the bass is not much higher but satisfying, I like this product and me recommendable to all to buy this product.

name: pradeep
title: Good product
content: Good product really its worth money but 10 days later after my purchase left side stopped working so i claimed replacement to boat directly through their website they responded immediatly and replaced my product with other one but the entire process took 1 month to receive the product however they really value their every customer just go for boat its good

name: T.V. Sudhakaran
title: wiring
content: Though the sound and bass is excellent, the quality of wire at the earphone gets cut and not usable for long period

name: Charan
title: Amazing product i have ever had
content: This is my 2nd boat basshead.. Earlier was damaged after 2.5 years of tough usage, such a good quality... Literally after 2.5 years..... I'm a hardcore bass lover. And it totally satisfied me till my heart...♥. Nothing can compete BOAT in this price range..... I got carried away by the reviews of real me buds 2 earlier and bought them... Now i reget buying that...insted i could just tear off those 600 bucks which it costs...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good product but have discomfort with it
content: Evey thing great except it dimensions, it feels heavier in ear and gets small pain after some time of usage, it doesn't fit inside helmet when riding, bass is awesome, sound quality is okay.

name: Divyanshu Gupta
title: Great earphones
content: The earphones are great, with awesome bass quality. But the only reason i'm rating it 3 stars instead of 5 is that it's earbuds keep falling off. When i place them in my pocket one or both the earbuds would get detached and thus it's chances of getting lost(earbud) is very high.. Dunno if it's just for me but yeah this is a major issue i encountered.

name: gaurav
title: Good Earphones at great price
content: Very Good earphones at this.. Bass annd treble both balances.. Though if you are a heavy earphones user( 5 hours on average) then it loses bass in about 4 months but then even more expensive ones also goes through same problem..... overall very good budget earphones.

name: Milind Mahajan
title: This are the best budget earphones
content: They provide best BASS quality. With immersive sound quality, When listening to beat drops. Putting on new earbuds is a bit challenging at times. If you don't like heavy songs or beat drops then this shouldn't be your choice of earphones. But overall i rate them 5 stars.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Product defective
content: Dear Amazon,. I have bought this boat earcode to gift someone. But the product was defective. One side sound was not coming. And when I check this one in another handset and laptop the same issue arrives. Kindly return this product nad refund my full amount. I will order another headset later.

name: Khurshed P. Fitter
title: Had an issue with one side of earphone within 8 months but boat replaced it immediately.
content: These earphones have a very good built body amd the bass is awesome. I used it for 9 months as of now it is good. A month ago one side of the earphones stopepd working i countacted the company and i got a replacement within 10 days. Thank you Boat.

name: Shubhamgrover
title: True review of boat basshead 225 from a bass lover.
content: I use this product from a huge time and I'm music lover so i always want a great earphone for a huge bass and clear voice .When i get this earphones and i use it.they are like what i want but they also have so problems which i don't like it.They are very sleepy every time when i use it and do some exercise they automatically came out from my ear and i again put them in my ear.This is the problem i just face otherwise the earphone is great deal .

name: Rahul
title: FRAUD COMPANY
content: Within 3 months the right earpiece producing distorted sound. please dont buy this brand. it just ruins your hard earn money. the service centre takes more than two weeks and still, my earphone is at the service centre.. look some other genuine brand.

name: shriram thakur
title: Sony = music, Music = Sony
content: The sound quality is awesome. perfect bass. Noise cancellation is not good. Voice sounds different on-call to another person. heavier than MDR155. Build quality is woW. the wires are very strong.

name: Rashda Azaz
title: Four months in and one side stopped working all of a sudden.
content: It's a good quality product but there's no point if it just stops working few months in. I bought this product in December and four months in one side stopped working all of a sudden. Now boat has also stopped doing home pickup and drop off for repairs/replacement for products in warrany period which is also a very big inconvenience.

name: Harsh Ghosh
title: Worth your money!
content: ABOUT THE PRODUCT:. The sound quality is of the first order with pretty decent noise cancellation. The bass quality is not as good as hyped by the brand but it's serviceable. The bottom line is it will give you a good experience and you won't get a better product at INR 500.. PRODUCT DELIVERY:. The product got delivered when expected and there's nothing to complain about regarding its packaging or the contents.

name: Rohit
title: Serious bass head
content: As they said they are true bass head in this price segment. Sound quality is good. Tangled free.. But the problem is the earphones get out of my ear very often. Use any size of the given spare buds and you will face the same problem. But not an issue as with the help of supporter (which is given in the box) following problew was solved. So overall best earphone in this price.

name: Nandeeswaran
title: Not Working good with Webex. Mic is not good
content: I have been using this headset for 4 months. I had mic issues with my headset,Boat replaced me a new headset on claiming with Warranty. One issue with this product is, it isn't working great with webex or skype. Your neither hear clear audio nor your voice would be heard by people at other end.. If you are a webex or skype user, pls avoid buying this headset. This isn't for you.. I would recommend this headset only for hearing songs.

name: Vikas Agrawal
title: Average
content: I like the durability ofthe headphones.. but sound quality is not upto the mark.. surround sound is not perfect...it is good for calls and normal use... Not adviced for gaming purpose...

name: Uttam
title: Boat baseheads 225
content: This headset is really good which has a very good sound quality with out any disturbances which fits in the ears exactly, even they have provided different sizes of ear buds material is good enough to handle in daily life i will be giving 4 star for material. Even u dont have any length issue its enough big in length i prefer to buy this to every one in this price range not only in this price range this is best other than many hearphones.

name: Anant Huse
title: Very Poor Sound quality and build Quality, Don't BUY This one
content: I've tried this. This headphones not justifies the price. It's not fit properly in ear and the sound quality is very poor. I'll suggest to buy SoundMagic headphones which are very good than this. Don't buy this one

name: Ravindra
title: Not a good earphone in this price range because of heavy metallic earpiece it falls down
content: It's a good product because of you can use it rough and tough but does not have a bass as specified with it and also it's earpiece are heavy they fall from ear , for that you have to put an extra jogger earphone fixer part provided with this earphone but that will increase your carrying headache because you have to always adjust them according to your ear.I think if u buying this then it's not worth a money you must go with jbl or seinhiser with a little extra bucks

name: Pranay Verma
title: Best you can get. Loved em'
content: Trust me I have tried every earphone in the budget of Rs.400-Rs.600 and this one is unbeatable... I mean you can't get anything better than this in Rs.500 Really.

name: Soundarya Giridhar
title: Excellent buy.
content: I bought this product almost a year back.. After today's event I thought I MUST review this product..Without realising I put my headphones in the washing machine along with my bedsheets..After an hrs washing I couldn't believe it's still working 😂..I would highly recommend this product.

name: VISHNU K B
title: Don't buy it.
content: Not fit into the ears.. Sound quality is very poor.. Easily fall off from ear.. Not comfortable at all.. Feel pain on ears with in 15min.... Build quality is seems to be good, but very bad design.

name: Mitesh Savani
title: Don't go Bass lover.
content: Sound quality is not better than Mi Earphone basic with ultra deep bass. If you love bass then go Mi Earphone basic at just 399.. I'm bass lover, but this earphone has more treble.. Overall sound quality is average but good.

name: adarsh s.
title: Wastage of money and China made
content: Not so good. Average earphone and manufactured in China. Build quality is very bad. Wastage of money. No return option available otherwise could have returned it.

name: K PANDU RANGA RAO
title: Pain when continued for long time
content: If you continue for more time, 👂 are paining.

name: Ganesh
title: Very bad product
content: Very pathatic headphones, dont fits in ear properly... And even if we want refund, u cant do cz they only provide replacement.... Very bad experience...if possible take this hedphones n give my money back

name: RISHU RAJ
title: Good for rich bass and music💀☠️
content: Material quality- good. Sound quality- it does not give you any chance to complain about its sound quality and it's bass ... It's bass is so deep and rich that you does not have to compromise.... Perfect for bass lovers... Durability-very durable... Don't think so much about this product just go for it and enjoy the music...

name: Shampa G.
title: worst product
content: I bought it 1 month ago. after using 1 month, it got damaged. One side is not working and i gave this item for replacement a long age. But still, i could not get it return. I emailed them lots of time but they did't answer.. So Disappointment with this product.

name: Ommy
title: Awesome....
content: Good in voice quality..... Good in receive call and playing next song on play list.... Overall good ... bass is good.... Only one small issue .. if you wear it on bike then it release sound of wave in ear... only on bike... otherwise no issue.... Like it

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not recommend!
content: It was working amazing since I bought it.. But after 7 months I don't know why the jack stopped working, whereas the buds were fine as the sound fluctuated at times.. So I don't recommend it for long run.. And Boat's service is so pathetic as no one answers the call.This was really not expected from BOAT

name: Sudhanshu
title: Great experience
content: Bought these headphones in February 2019. Writing this review today , it's 1 Jan 2021. Used these headphones for nearly 2 years, yesterday headphones stopped working, so I'll say that these are durable and sound quality is also good

name: Kevin Daniel
title: Sound is ok but built quality is poor left side not working..
content: This product is just ok I brought back in 2017 Oct 22 now the left side one is not working if you just want it for a year you can get it but you want longer life earphones then buy something else this not for you

name: Rubini
title: Good Product
content: It's been 2 and half months since I've purchased. I've no complaints on its quality. An highly reliable product. The only issue I've is the ear heads doesn't properly sits on my ears. It falls down often and makes me irritated to use it. Even thought to change the earphones. But I found a solution for it which worked for me. I hold my mobile in hand/pocket and place the ear heads into ear leaving the wire behind my neck. This actually works.

name: Rahul Rampure
title: Decent Bass Earphones
content: Received original product as advertised at Rs. 699.. Pro: Nice looking earphones with decent bass effects. No tangling issues.. Cons: since it's made of some metal, the earphones are quite heavy and causes discomfort and pain in ears after long usage.

name: Sathya
title: It's a steal, superb sound and high quality...
content: Love it, amazing bass. Quality is awesome, you have to see it for yourself metal body housing for the earphones and the connector.. Sounds awesome on phones with hi-res audio. On other phones you are just going to enjoy the bass mostly...

name: Gurkirpal Singh
title: Not worth the money, low durability
content: Bought them on a recommendation of a friend. But they stopped working within a year. Fortunately they were under warranty so had them replaced. My friend faced a similar issue but unfortunately after the expiration of the warranty.. I wouldn't recommend them. They keep falling out of the ear. And aren't that comfortable. The high base just puts off the balance of the sound.

name: Kevinf
title: Average
content: Only thing I didn't find comfortable was that earphones kept slipping out from my ears, had to go in for a headphone to avoid this. Sound quality overall us good , mic is not that dependable

name: Biswas
title: Go for it
content: Very nice product... its my 1st time using boat... i jst loved it..... looked exactly as the images... i went for the orange one....... i will truly recommend u guys to go for this product...... i have been using it for more tha 1 month, no issue so far..... very strong built....metalic body.....good product

name: Priyal.
title: Heavy ear buds.
content: It has a good sound quality. The main problem is the weight of the product, due to the use of heavy material in the ear buds they keep slipping out of the ear, hence not letting you even walk without them falling out of the ears.. This product is not good for people who want to walk or run or jog with their earphones in, as the buds will slip out.

name: Ruchi Jha
title: Beware of this brand. It might trick you!
content: Beware before buying these earphones. I have been using these earphones for less than a year and one of my earbuds stopped working. When I tried for a product replacement, the contact details turned out to be invalid.. However,the earphones had top notch bass in accordance to the price. So you can consider buying it if the durability doesn't bother you.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Certainly not for an audiophile.
content: If you are looking for Sony/Sennheiser, buy only them. Don't think you are going to get the same quality with boAt for 50% of the price . The quality is also 50%!! I never had any good opinion of such brands but I wanted to give it a try and learnt my lesson

name: PRANAB SAMADDAR
title: SATISFIED
content: EXCELLENT PRODUCT....HANDLE WITH CARE....SOUND QUALITY IS OK....EAR BUDS ARE SUITABLE TO ADJUST INTO THE EARS....

name: Gautham Padmanabhan
title: Not so durable.
content: Sound quality and all is okay. But built quality is not that great. Left earpiece got damaged within 4 months. Many of my friends have the same experience. Better go for a more durable high quality earphones. If you can take good care of it, it might last an year.

name: Pranay Patro
title: Must Go For it...!!
content: the product is awesome sound quality is also good, mice is working good no issue with the performance. but it doesnt stay in the ears for a very long time as i am aregular train traveler so need to use the extra set of ear holder provided with the earphones,but it gives pain in the ears if wore more than 2 hours without the ear support works like a charm. Rating 8/10;

name: Amazon Customer
title: Only for bass lover
content: Exactly after 1 year completed of purchase it stops working. i.e after warranty period completed.. This earphone is perfect for bass lover.. Quality is product is good,but it need to handle with care.. This earphone gives best audio quality interm of bass only.other are on average sucha as teible, voice, background sound.

name: Jahid Anowar
title: Decent Product
content: Decent quality add this price point ... Build quality is A1. And the sound quality is fabulous. It provides a control bass not too high not too low.. In short if your budget is 500 then this is the best earphone for you.

name: Saumil
title: Value for money.
content: This is second Boat earphone which I own, sound quality is great and has a lot of different attachments in terms of ear buds as complimentary to suit each different ear size. Overall worth purchasing. Must buy

name: santhosh
title: EXCELLENT
content: One of the best and affordable gadget.. Nice bass quality.. Only one the default ear buds installed while purchasing is not good. So please its advisable to change them with the spare buds given along with it

name: Parminder
title: No warranty its just written to fool us.
content: I have been using these earphones for the last 10 months. Now the one side of these earphones had stopped working. I tried to contact the warranty claim department through the mail and contact number provided in the warranty card received alongside; but for my surprise both the CONTACT DETAILS ARE INVALID.. So if you are buying these earphones make sure you would not be able to claim warranty if required.

name: Adidev.m
title: Very good headsets
content: The quality of the product is very good. I highly recommend this if you are looking for a budget headset. I have usd the Samsung headset and the infinity zip 100. But the one I fell in love with is the boat bassheads 225. Btw the quality of the case is also too notch.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good headset
content: Quality of sound is good..bass is also good and I shud have rated 4.4/5 but ear buds are very annoying and always comes out even when we are sitting without moving head..I tried the spare buds but that too where having same issue..I ordered two in a row and both had same issue..3/5 rating

name: Mayank
title: Good earphones....but they are too heavy
content: Good earphones ... Using this for almost 4 months no problems with the sound or cable. 1 star less because you can't wear them without earhooks ...they are heavy and the earhooks does not remain in their place when you don't wear them .... You may lose them ....but so far i didn't lose them despite being so careless....

name: Rahul
title: Bass disappointes
content: I am really satisfied with the build quality.. However, the bass disappoints me.. The clarity of bass and sound is not very good, it's pretty loud though.Overall i can't say wow but it is ok ok.

name: RAJARSHI ROY CHOWDHURY
title: great earphone...true bass with deep sound effect
content: An awesome product having truly deep bass, surround sound, dolby effects. Distinctively clear sound as well as voice during calls. Noise cancellation is highly active and effective

name: Viju
title: nice earphones with good sound quality
content: sound quality is good and they have provided multiples earbuds, the price is also reasonable, all things are excellent

name: mythili
title: Horrible headphones
content: The headphones fit is not good, the wires are heavy. It's like wearing rocks to the ears.

name: aritra chatterjee
title: Good product
content: Great product. At first I was sceptical about Boat, but this being the first Boat product that I am using, it has lived upto every bit of expectation that I have had.

name: Abhishek UglePatil
title: jack has issues
content: jack does not connect good. at times one side plays louder and at other only one side plays. needs continuous adjustment of the rubber part right next to the jack- especially while walking or riding. same issue when i use it with my laptop.. Also, left ear bud net came damaged. could see the inner of the bud. material and sound quality good - when it plays.

name: Nikhil kumar
title: Could be better
content: All about this is good but hard to find exact fitting ear bud. Extra ear support is helpful to stop ear button to fall of your ear...after all good deal...good material and quality

name: M Santhosh
title: If you want pure music experience go for sony r Sennheiser
content: Boom boom bass imbalance sound vocal not clear and bass dominanting every section for extra bass when no bass in song aslo it's coming bass waste of money for pure music lovers clyster clear sound lovers. Previous I used Sennheiser cx 180 it's much better sound produce than this buds

name: Suman Kumar
title: Very Durable Earhone After a Year of use
content: I am writing review after using it for a year. its material and quality you can totally rely upon. Only problem I had was its bass, it was too much for me. Other then that its perfect. I just lost mine so ordering another as other earphones like JBL, sennheiser i had used didnt last even 6 month.

name: Kumar
title: too loose to fit
content: It does not fit in any way into my ears. And the worst thing is Amazon does not let you return this item, only you can exchange it with an exact same item which also does not fit.

name: N
title: Not EAR freindly
content: Product quality is good, but the headphone is basically useless, it doesnt stay in the ear, with in 5 minutes the headphone will come out of the ear and it is accompanied with ear pain. If any body is planning to use it for more than 5 min, dont purchase this

name: Drona Kakati
title: Painful experience
content: It's the most over rated headphones I have ever bought... First it does not stick into the ears ever time it falls down when I try to move my head such a disgusting experience. The supporting buds hurts my ears so much.... Don't buy it.. Gather more money get Sony or jbl headphone.. Boat didn't float in the ocean rather it sank into it.... And its not refundable..

name: DIBIN
title: Good ! but noting great !
content: Not as good as i expected i prefer sennheiser cx 180 earphones . The earbuds are big so you cant put it when u wear a helmet its get uncomfortable . The sound is just ok not great since i been using cx 180 up untill now ..

name: GURINDER SINGH
title: Good but not for games
content: Not good for pubg, double voice ia going to teammates and this problem is also on my friend's earphones, so it's this particular earphones problem

name: rahul
title: Good but not perfect
content: I have purchased this product. It is fine in terms of sound quality and look. But the design looks beautiful but is very poor. You feel pain in your ears due to the back portion as it comes in contact with your ears while sleeping and listening.

name: Santrooz
title: No Cc response
content: Don't expect warranty from the manufacturer bcoz no one respond. They just display the warranty.. Feature quality good,. Physical quality not appreciable.. Irritating thing no customer service available. So many times called to them no call back even no call response. I have proof of calls n mail. And I am registered person. My ticket id: 343487

name: Sunil
title: Perfect for general purpose
content: I am not a technically knowledgeable in sound technology. I like to have all aspects in medium range like bass, treble etc. After my 2 days use I like this product and i feel i got the right one with Good quality of sound.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Decent but not too worthy
content: This brand was very much hyped by my friends and i was even fancied after seeing its price. but then i realized after buying it is not a right product as it often falls from the ears. and moreover u can press it to have a good hold but results in ear pain as the earphones is metallic finish. By nothing compromises the audio quality. Decent bass. Not suitable for using while movement and not a go for all the ears.

name: Milind Purushottam Kulkarni
title: Good for normal use but slips from ears.
content: Headset build quality, sound clarity is good but slips from ears. Feels heavy for longer use. Can be painful some time. Not Comfortable.

name: Radha
title: Ok ok headphones
content: This headphones heavy to use .I don't like the shape of ear head phones .some times it's makes sense ear pain because of its heaviness .it disappointed me.

name: PRaj
title: Worst ear phone
content: It won't fit inside my ears and also ear buds are very big. It causes pain. Unfortunately you can't return this item. Ear buds always fall from ears. Waste of 550 bucks.

name: Anil
title: Outstanding product
content: Excellent sound quality after one year of use. The bass is also great.only one complaint is that sometimes it feels like one side is pumping more output...but other times it's fine. Overall great product for jogging and enjoying music

name: Sakshi Bhatnagar
title: I loved it... But no button for changing songs or cut /take call
content: Very nice n clarity in sound... Great sound, bass, noise cancellation... I liked it very much.. I got in deal of the day.. So me price was also good

name: jayesh
title: They will hurt you ears as well as your hearing.Don't Buy Them
content: They are the worst earphones,heavy so will fell down all the time.. Uncomfortable ,due to its ugly design your ears will pain.. Worst quality sound,it will just give you a large amount of bass that's it,other than that the quality of sound is low grade and too loud.. Buy sony or seinhieser earphones instead.

name: Abhi
title: Average product value for money
content: This product is average value for money first the main problem is it don't fit to ears but it 4 different sizes but no use we have to adjust with it.. Sound is very louder compare to base, base is minimum

name: Brijender Singh
title: Don't like them at all!!!
content: Dont like them at all. None of the buds fit accurately in the ear. Also, the weight of each of the earpiece is heavy enough which makes them fall off every now and then. Wearing them for more than 15 minutes at stretch starts causing pain in my ears. Would not recommend it.

name: navjot sohal
title: Value for money.
content: Good product. Tangle free wire. I loved the L shaped jack, makes it comfortable while holding the phone horizontally. Metal shell makes it a little uncomfortable for long use. This can also be taken positively, 'an alarm to take them off your ears'. For the fact that prolonged use of any earphone can cause serious issues to hearing.

name: Amit
title: Can't ask for more
content: The 225s are great paired with my Lenovo K8 Plus with Dolby Atmos especially for rock/pop music. Writing this as I listen to Bad Company's 10 from 6. Works well on phone calls and with FM radio too. Can't ask for more at this price point. Recommended.

name: Jatin
title: Must buy
content: Recently I have received earphones on 23 Jan. I have used for last 2 days then I am suggesting you guys go for it.. Its awesome earphones.. Not impacting on ear. Lyrics quality and bass quality is very clear. I have been continue used for 1 hour while doing workout. No pain to your ear. Earlier I were using Sony earphones it was very painful for ear. Must try.. 10/ 10

name: Gaurav Shetty
title: It a steal for ₹500🤑
content: I received the earphones today;1day befr estimatd date...initial impressions: build is top notch...produces a lot of bass...if u watch more videos like series n stuff,it tries to create bass at every point...which cn be a good thng(if u lustn music videos) n a bad thng(if u watch othr regulr stuff).. Coming to sound,its exceptional fr d price.at frst i felt like treble is a bit too much in my redmi 4... Bt aftr tweeking the equiliser,its amazing.go fr it...it a steal

name: Mohiuddin Ansari
title: Would say it's OK...
content: It doesn't fit well and the ear bud would stick in your ear while the headphone comes out. It has a sturdy look and feel but the ear buds are not that great.

name: Amit shaw
title: Good for rough use
content: It's not really high quality stuff but however for a rough use this can be a very useful product. Bass is strong but clarity is a bit on the lower side.

name: prashanth sharma
title: Boat Wireless Headphones Do Not Buy
content: I have purchased boat wireless headphones. First of all, it lasts for only 2.5 hours a day after charging for almost an hour. So it needs regular charging or travel with spare wired headset. Not good for 9 to 10 hours daily outing.. Secondly, there is zero noise cancellation as the recipient can hear the surrounding noise more than the receiver voice. Amazon users kindly do not buy this product.

name: Philip Nunthuk
title: Happy with the product
content: I am very happy with the product.. It's reliable and durable.. One of the few products which does justice to its price.. The anti-tangle does really work

name: thavakumar
title: Good one with high bass
content: When i use firat it doesn't work good. It worked like normal Samsung original headphones but later when i replaced the ear bud with small one which fits my ear perfectly it was awsome. Realy bass is very good enjoying it lot. Caution.: at full volume definitely it will tear your ear drum. Volume is too high

name: Amazon Customer
title: Waste of money
content: This the most worthless headphone I ever bought. The build quality is worse it doesn't even sits in your ears. U have to adjust it every second or else it will fall down. Pls don't buy this headphone and waste your money

name: Mayank Singh
title: Not worth it.
content: Sound, Acoustics, Bass all good.. But not a comfortable fit, they keep falling off even with the ear hook sometimes.. It was all good until after a month one earpiece started sounding distorted and its volume also decreased.. It caused uncomfortable listening experience.. When complained, there was no reasonable response from the Boat.. Earlier used to recommend it to everyone, Now please Don't buy this piece of crap.

name: Manju A.
title: Headphones are brilliant!!!!
content: Brilliant sounding buds! Wanted to purchase high end earphones/headphones, gave it a try and found the sound quality absolutely worth it. Sounds on par with bose high end or Sony high end for comfort, built quality, and for looks.. This product made me give my first feedback on amazon!!! Amazing headset!!!

name: Anjali patil
title: WITHIN 3 MONTHS, IT'S STOPPED WORKING!
content: I bought them at the month of july and within 3 months, they are damaged! There is no proper sound, one side of the earphones, the black net of which is invisible! The sound is so improper! I expected more from boat going on the brandname, infact i recommended it to my friends! But now, seeing this condition, I'm regretting it!

name: Vishwajeet
title: Awesome sound.
content: I would rate this product with four stars. The only reason one less star is for the ear buds given with the head phones are not effective as I expected, it doesn't fit well. Sound quality is excellent no doughnuts about that. Bass is brilliant. With is price go head and buy this headphone.

name: Rounak Ghosh
title: Uncomfortable fit.
content: The ear pieces don't fit well and keep dropping from the ear. Everybody complains about this drawback of 225 and it's true!. Sound quality is good. But I suggest you to avoid this model and go for other models around this price point.

name: Rangarajan
title: Material quality is great!!
content: I just bought this ear phones last week.. The material quality is great!! It looks like medium quality in the picture but it is far more better than how. it looks in the picture.. The sound quality and bass is good but not as good as sennheiser.. I haven't used it much as I just bought it last week but it looks like the one suitable for rough use.

name: Rd
title: Best earphones @500₹
content: Material quality is best at this price, sound is quite good base is gd bt the vocals r nt that much great in my opinion...mic was working without any probles bt now few weeks ago it's not working perfectly because i have to put the mic almost infront of my mouth otherwise the person will nt able to listen ur voice clearly.im using it since July, 18..nd there is no problem in fitting..I use it every day nd also I make vice call fr almost 1-2 hour every day.

name: Amazon Customer
content: Sound quality isn't so great, one always can hear some kind of echo no matter who calls and from where.

name: Rehan Qureshi
title: Review after using 6 months
content: Writing review after using for the product daily for 6 months.. Durable product with good sound quality. Mic stopped working during rains but getting replacement from the brand was very easy. Go for it if you need a good quality and durable product at affordable price. It will easily last for more than a year. Thanks!

name: Sanjeev
title: Good Headphones!
content: Good sound output.. It has an annoying "humming noise"...and also one can feel an "interference" from devices it is plugged into when the volume is set very high. But needs "very" high volume anyways?!.. Hence, at normal levels it sounds perfect. A great feature of this product is the type/quality of it's wires.... really entanglement free!

name: Prathyusha
title: Not recommended any more!
content: With in 2 months one side of the earphone not working. I have placed it for replacement, boat service took the product for replacement but didnot send me the replaced one even after 45days.customer care number doesn't connect at all. Such a bad product with a bad service. Utterly disappointed.

name: Vikram Paul
title: The "Best" under 1K.
content: Material Quality is very good. A good 4*.. Sound Quality. Nothing to talk about it except a solid 5*.. Brilliant sound. Perfect Bass balance.. Durability is also great. I'm using mine for 4-5 months straight now with heavy usage on daily basis. It is still the same.. One thing I didn't find quite well is the round size of the headphones which didn't fit that well in my ears. Maybe I'm facing it and you might not.. Overall, the best for this range.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good Product, But...
content: I am very impressed with the sound. Earpieces are heavy due to which they tend to fall out of ears sometimes.Quality is so awesome. This is first time I purchased a Boat product. I brought it for my Redmi Note 4, but when I used the Headphone in phone the volume got reduced automatically.. Check before you brought it. It works good with other phones.

name: Vivin vijay
title: Good One
content: Decent Sound and Bass Qualityi have used and a big fan of Sony xdr series but it's costly and bulk head prevents me from wearing it while wearing a helmet but boat earphone is small and can be used while driving and it provides more or less the same feel

name: Expert review
title: Please give refund
content: I want refund for this product.. I am trying to reach customer support but not getting any response.. please take this chords and give me refund as there is no noise cancellation and it's not even fitting anyone's ear.. please support call me

name: Kunal
title: Average quality

name: MAYILSAMY S
title: Na
content: First of all check the product deeply by your side .may be it will return how much loss for you

name: Mridul
title: Good but keeps falling out.
content: It's sound quality is really good and it does do a bit of noise cancellation but the problem is it keeps falling out of my ears. I tried changing the buds but it's the same story with all of them. Other than that it's really good.

name: Dr strange
title: No bas not durable
content: No bass at all worse than mi basic.... UPDATE.. worst earphones.. Stoped working after 4 months.. don't go for any boat products..... be aware boat isn't a brand go for Chinese over this

name: Hritik gupta
title: Worst experience ever

name: Gaurav jha
title: Worst ever
content: Worst product ever......it's not original .......left side of earphone sound is not coming and it gets reduced day by day......one side of earphone has stopped working within a month of purchase.......they only Cheat u by selling worst of worst product

name: Saavi
title: Diffective products being sold
content: Boat bassheads 225 stopped working within 4 days , ans so had to replace with another boat bassheads 100 which stopped working after 15 days followed by boat bassheads 225 that didn't work since the very first day. Each time one of the bassheads would just go totally mute. It clearly reflects poor quality products being sold on Amazon by Boat

name: Suman Mishraaa
title: Boat Bassheads 225 Review
content: This is the one of the best earphone available in the market. The sound Quality is good and amount of bass this earphone produce justify its named Called EXTRAAAA bass. The one Corn of this Earphome is that this earphone is slittely heavy that always trys to Fall down from the ear but after using Ear wing the problem is fixed

name: Bindusar
title: High priced, no value for money

name: Ashutosh N.
title: Not the best , but does the job.
content: I bought the bassheads225 2 months ago , build quality is quite good , earphones are firm and provide clear sound quality. The only aspect they lack is bass. Don't get me wrong , it does have decent bass but at lower values it turns flat.. If you are strictly concerned about bass , get the audiotechnica earphones which are in the same price range of this. But overall boat bassheads is quite good.

name: Monika
title: Dont buy
content: Third grade useless earphones as weight of earplug is to heavy, so you need to constantly place your hands on top of it, otherwise it falls down. Highly disappointed.

name: Hendry
title: - Good bass effect - Good look and tangle free Cons
content: Pros:. - Good bass effect. - Good look and tangle free. Cons:. - Not fit properly in ear and falls off from ear often. - Ear buds with multi-color are causing some discomfort

name: Ankur Fernandes
title: Average.
content: Keeps falling off the ears. Sometimes really uncomfortable wearing it.. Hard to wear it with the helmet for riders.. Quite heavier compared to any other ear phones.

name: Priyanka
title: Great product!!
content: By calling these earphones bassheads , the boat relly means it!!. The bass , the sound quality is superb in this price range. Only drawback bcoz of which i gave it 4 stars (and not 5) is that the earphones are bit heavier which cause some inconvenience during workout. Other than this , no other issues

name: sid shaik
title: Honestly bass is worst
content: Bass quality is worst. MI earphones are best for bass. Really expected best bass as named it as bassheads special edition. But honestly worst bass, sound quality is best. After using this i would suggest you to buy MI earphones instead of boat. MI perfect sound.......😀😀

name: Vimal Sudhakar
title: High frequency noise when speaking to friends.
content: So when I'm listening to music and videos there is no problem with the sound, but every time I connect the earphones and start talking to my friends over the phone, it makes an awful high frequency noise for the person whom I'm calling, but when I remove the earphone, they hear me crystal clear, but when I connect the earphones, the noise is back again. I would like this product replaced please.

name: Priyal Singh
title: Good but Some Improvement for Buds Needed
content: Earphones are very sturdy and don't get tangled. But what I didn't like is the Buds Quality. Ear buds are very hard and ears start paining if used for a long time.

name: ROHIT BABJE
title: 1st time disappointed by Amazon😪
content: I had purchased these boat headphones on dec 2018 .Suddenly it has stopped working after just 6 months. It has a warrenty of 1 year. I want this product to be replaced as soon as possible. I need headphones badly. Such a bad experience.Just want to replace this product

name: Amazon user
title: Durable and good for daily use
content: Ordered the blue ones. Earphones in blue color look very cool and they look similar to ones shown in picture. Sound quality is also good. Go for it!

name: AJAY VARMA
title: Not durable, within 2 months cannot use it
content: Product worked well for 1month-1.5month, later it started behaving abruptly. It started increasing decreasing volume automatically. Hence could not use any further. Worst earphone ever used.

name: mohd waseem
title: These earphones are made for elephant's ear not for human's.

name: BADRI
title: good cable..but without  clips or case. Heavy  falls down often
content: giving 3 stars overall as the cable is heavy and the product came without any holding clip or case

name: Sahil
title: Cant keep it in ear
content: The quality is good and sound is good but The outer part is so uncomfortable.. It doesn't stick in your ears.. You cannot use it because of that.. So its a total waste..

name: Vijay
title: Not satisfied of words they given on screen
content: When I first got this product ofter 3 day it loss it's quality, then i returned it in this case they considered as return policy completed one time,ofter 4 month the earphone not working properly and i don't have any choice of return it and replace it, * ,and they given 1 year of warranty 🙏

name: Abhijeet tiwari
title: Great product by boat, at a very affordable cost
content: Never seen such a product by branded company at a very reasonable cost. Yes extraaaaaa bass. It's true, bass was more compared to treable, but if u know how to control equalizer setting well, than u can adjust these bass as well as treable too. I was using mi in ear headphones for more than 8 months, but now this boat bass 225 is going to be my primary in ear headphone. Loved this product, recommend to everyone, just go for it..

name: Gagan
title: Boat never disappoints with its products
content: Another Boat product to my collection and it never disappoints me.Love the design and the sound,giving 4/5 just because not so happy with the fitting.

name: Arpan.paul
title: Bass and quality is dope but fittings is nope
content: THIS product bass and quality is op but is not comfortable for ears u will not able to wear it for long so I think boat please change the design of earphones for fit in ears it will 100% best earphone in low cost thank u

name: vinay k.
title: Not fully satisfied
content: Sound is awesome no doubt a high quality bass but 3 stars because dont know why the right earpiece makes a irritating sound when you are placing it in your ear i complaint about that got a new set but still the same problem even the earphone bought by my friend did the same.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Poor Warranty service by boat team
content: Warranty service by boat team is very pathetic, I registered for online warranty on 8th July but still as on today 24th July product is not replaced. Customer care is not picking phone or always busy. You will be in trouble is product gets error before warrant period.

name: Amazon Customer
title: NICE
content: this is very good one , but somehow I feel this is heavy and it could have been lighter to have a long hold in position while using due to the heavy weight you have to keep adjust and hold tight !

name: Santanu Das
title: Above average sound quality with nice bass effect.
content: Sound quality is above average with nice bass effect. Material quality is way better than the other brands available within same price range.. Overall it is a nice product with reasonable price tag.

name: Shivangi Pandey
title: worst earphones not get fits in the ear
content: worst earphones it is too heavier on the speaker side and as for thz it not get fits in the ear.... when i try to put earphones in ear it gets remove again again not to buy

name: Rajender Singh
title: Ear phone Mic not working properly
content: After use of 1 month I am really disappointed, mic of ear phone is not very good, I have to speak very loudly , so that other person can hear my voice. From last few days ad soon as I am connecting my earphone to mobile , volume start automatically increase and decrease or mute. I tested it in other phone but same issue.

name: Lalit Kumar
title: Smallest ear piece size is not fitting in ear.😒
content: Product is good but the smallest size of ear piece is not fitting in my ear. I am also using MI ear phones with medium size and boat smallest is big for my ears.

name: Adarsh das
title: Poor in comfort.
content: The sound quality is quite good with the powerful bass but doesn't fit into the ears properly and bit hard in quality which makes pain in the ears after an hour use. Very poor in regard to comfort.

name: Rev
title: Good one but for the ergonomics...
content: Sound quality is too good with deep bass and clear music. I have Sennheiser cx180 so this way better than that one. The only issue is with the ergonomics the ear plugs don't sit plush in the ear but juts out which can cause pain with long use. Otherwise happy with the purchase.

name: Surya psr
title: Terrible
content: In my opinion, don't buy it. Cuz one side of the ear bud will stick in your ear and the earphone falls off.. Bought 2 for my dad and mom and they totally regret it. Trust me buy JBL T-SERIES. About 900 and still they are perfect for earphones around 1000/-. I feel terrible buying these.

name: Raga kiran
title: Loved it
content: I am not at all aware of this boat head phones lost my scull candy headphone so thought of giving a try its superb full satisfaction great quality tangle free wire good clarity and fits my budget

name: gaumsy
title: Inflicting pain
content: My ear is paining. I have small ears, this earphone is too big for my ears.. Metal finish makes it look good but it won't help any good to your ears.. Pain and heaviness.. Music enjoy nei kr paa rhe hai.

name: V K I  Vikram X X
title: After Philips This is The Best Choice for Earphones !
content: I Used To Have Philips SHQ Action Fit , But recently They Have been disappeared then I thought to try these for once & these are actually worth the price !. Evene useful for gaming sonetimes !

name: Umashankar Kumar
title: Good but not the best
content: Hello team Amazon,. The boAt Bass Heads 225 in-Ear headphone is not compatible with Xiaomi Redmi Note 3, I could NOT receive calls, could NOT pause music, randomly opens Google so many issues. Couldn't return this for refund.

name: Ashutosh
title: Pros as well as cons
content: Sound quality is not an issue for a budget earphones but i dont know why but earplugs doesnt fit in my ear even after trying all the alternative earplugs, difficupt to use while running even while walking at fast rate, you have to use the support plugs provided within but that you cannot use for more than an hour cause they start to feel uncomfortable after some time. One more thing worth mentioning that my phone now is started to haveing problem with this perticular earphone might be the peice is faulty.

name: Aditya
title: Best value
content: Use Equalizer for the best output as per your liking, it will not let you down, amazing value product. One downside is its difficult to fit it in the ear, keeps falling, that earpiece support they have provided is good but it might pain in the ear for long time use. These earphones are very difficult to use while sleeping.. But considering the price it's an great deal.

name: MK
title: boAt BassHeads 225 Headphones not worth for name of boAt
content: 1. boAt BassHeads 225 Headphones not worth for name of boAt. 2. Sound quality is average.. 3. mic quality is average.. 4. Headphones not stand and fit properly in ears.. 5. so only 2 stars.

name: Shreyes
title: Were good initially but have developed issues after 1 month
content: Earphones I received have developed issues with the mic button, which keeps pausing and playing songs. Don't buy these earphones, they have electronic issues that could harm your device. Audio quality is average.

name: Surbhi Negi
title: Earplugs are soo heavy
content: Built quality is good... good for High base songs and daily use ..... But not for low base music ... Overall product is good but the only problem is that it's earplugs are soo heavy and not comfortable while u are moving

name: Mita ghosh
title: Absolutely not recommended
content: It's pathetic, one side of the speaker is not working at all, and it is still in warranty period. It gives headache when you listen for 1hour or more continuously. Don't buy it at any means. It's just a waste of money.see for any other brand

name: Mobasshir Quamar
title: Good product in this price range
content: Boat headphones meet all the quality standard and are one of the best in their price range of 475. It comes with a one year warranty. The only issue is the replacement, it took over a month to get it replaced. Otherwise they are the best in this range. Can definitely go for it.

name: Deepak Nehra
title: Good durable product but may not be eveypnes taste
content: Earphones are awesome.. Built quality is superb. Great Value for money deal.. Ear buds are made of metal with good finishing at ends to prevent damage in long term. It makes earphones durable.. Sound quality is AWEAOME.. But I felt them quite heavy in the ear as I am uses to of Philips earphones made of plastic. So felt very uncomfortable. Have returned the item.. Happy again with Philips.

name: SMRUTI RANJAN MOHANTY
title: Packaging should be improve
content: Boat is best at all,,bass is awesome,,feel relaxe. Packaging should be in proper way to avoid damage of product

name: Jenila Jegadeesan
title: Okayest product
content: Okayest product, of you're poor too buy a good headset you can go for this, sound clarity is like caitlyn Jenner, somewhere in the middle of okay and worst can't tell, I have a tasted a good clarity music like Sony XB55 this is a downgrade for me, too poor to afford a good one.

name: Sahil kumar verma
title: Huge salute after 2 years use
content: Awesome🥰Product, this the best earphone in good price I had bought blue 225 in 2018 and green one in 2020 . Both earphones have fantastic sound quality same and bluee one is working very good and perfectly after 2 years use. This time i ordered it in green colour. If you are thinking to buy then you are on right place go for it it gives best sound

name: Vaibhav Saxena
title: Excellent
content: An excellent earphone in this price range.. It's been two years since i have purchased this earphone.. But if you use it normally it will last much longer.. It's sound is great , bass is great .. Noise cancellation is okay.

name: RAJEEV BHARTEE
title: Bad quality earphones
content: Every thing is not fine with this product it's a worst earphone in my life till this time because it's mike is always faulty company should not provide mike with it than it should be better I have replaced it 3 times

name: Arjun
title: Good Buy

name: Lokesh Sagar
title: How to claim warrenty
content: I bought this product on 3rd of July and just after 2.5 months the right side of the earphone stop working suddenly. I'm not able to return the product but as the product is in warrenty I want to replace it or get it repair but not able to do so. Can anybody help me out how to claim warranty?

name: Ashim Hyonzon
title: Incredible Product

Thankyou so much for take such a care of the client by putting 6 pieces of different earbuds along with nice cover box. I will recommend it to go for it without any shade of doubt if you are looking for new headphones in a reasonable price.

name: Niharika Joglekar
title: Writing this review after 3 years of usage

name: Khalnayak
title: Satisfied
content: This headphones have been through some worst times with me, getting washed with cloths, fighting against the rain during rainy reason, getting pulled, thrown and worse stuff yet it survived it all. y'all should go for this headphones if u want something with good audio quality and gaming in office which i use it for .

name: Santosh Kudtudkar
title: Cheap and defective
content: Please don't buy these. Both became defective after 1 year of user. Same problem my friend is also facing. One year plug becomes deaf... irritating

name: amit ray
title: Good Earphone
content: This is a very nice earphone. Sound quality is also good. Bass comes out good. I am satisfied with this earphone.

name: B.ferns.
title: Boat earphone
content: I purchased it last year on 30th April 2019..it work well.. Or I must say good enough compared to other earphones.... Now from past two days (as of today is 2-07-2020) only one side of the earphone is working...

name: Hitendera Dubey
title: Effects as claimed aren't good. Its average earphone to listen to videos or ...
content: Changed the rating from 3 to 5 after using it more. It's foolish to expect perfect bass in 500 rs. But it's fab to listen music, clear sound and no issues even for using it for hours. More I am using more liking it.

name: mahesh
title: Good
content: The overall sound and bass quality is great. The mic at times is a problem with poor voice reception/ sensitivity.

name: Sabeel
title: Stopped working after normal usage for months
content: Experienced after 8 months of normal usage.. I must say the built quality is amazing, but thats not what they are made for.. Functionality is not much impressive, one side headphones has stopped working after 8 months of normal usage. sound magic does the job well in this price segment, would say better then this.

name: Mahendra
title: Good but unusable
content: The quality of the headphone is good but the ear piece is too heavy, it simply slides off your ear. The ear tips provided couldn't hold it either. Got similar review from my friends. I had to buy a JBL in spite of having this in working condition.. No matter how good a product is its quality depends on usability. Avoid buying.

name: Arun
title: Nice product but low bass...
content: The headset looks quite attractive and I don't think so it is best for high bass sounds.the bass is some what low...eventhough on high sounds the voice clarity is good...since it's good for voice clarity and look...if u want good bass this is not suitable for you...

name: Sharun Nair
title: Great product that is worth the money!
content: Got this pair of earphones about 3 months back. Will take around 2-3 days to get adjusted with the base and overall sound quality, but works like a gem afterwards. Mic is also of good quality, handles phone calls very well. The different bud sizes given is very convenient as it will suit different people's ear sizes appropriately.. No issues faced till now. Highly recommend!

name: Malathi b.s.
title: Disappointed!
content: The same product was purchased by my brother in law and had great bass, while the one I bought (same mode) there was absolutely no bass!!!! How cud that happen?? The same product , same model no but with zero Basss!!!! Feeling Vy bad about the whole experience!!!

name: Aditya Kumar Verma
title: Metallic earpiece :(
content: I ordered this product for my father. he told, it is good in quality, look, noise cancellation, style, But it's ear piece weight is too much. whatever size of you use earplugs you use after some time you will feel heavy ears, or it will fall down. it should be in plastic rather than of metal..

name: DEBASIS GHOSH
title: Sound not coming to one side
content: Quality of product poor. Within fifteen days of purchase, sound is not coming in one side. I've purchased two different model but same hardware problem. Sound quality and bass quality is very good. But, noise cancellation is below average.

name: Jeson lozil
title: Review after using full 2 months
content: I bought it after I saw my 2 friends buy it, well turned out to be a very good decision. They sound absolutely awesome. Good base, mids and highs. Volume is very loud, I always have to keep it at 4 or 5 out of 11 scale. With MI a1 though I get static Noice, its not too much. None the less I love these.

name: Dhananjay Kaushik
title: Too long and heavy, Fall off easily, don't buy.
content: Sound quality and other functions are working perfectly, but the major problem with them is that the earphones are quite heavy and over that they are quite long. Due to this, they easily fall off from your ears. Rest of the things are good, quality of the product is also good. You get 6 pairs of earbuds with them. I suggest that you look for something else, like JBL ,Senhheiser, Sony or Samsung.

name: SHEIKH WASEEM HUSSAIN
title: BAD
content: Quality of sound was good and this was also tangle free. But the problem is that after very short time of use its both earpieces stop working

name: Utkarsh Sinha
title: Great for general/daily use
content: Noise cancellation and bass quality are up to the mark. Sound quality however is not excellent. But comparison cannot be made as boat offers great products at great prices.

name: Anuradha
title: Want to exchange the earcord
content: It has a lot of problem seen in the mic. The sound is not available in one side. I took it 3 Jan 2020 & also the guarantee period is not ended before the guarantee period the earcord has a lot of problem seen so I want to exchange it. Kindly exchange my earcord

name: gayathri
title: The best earphones
content: Loved the sleek design and fixed well in the ears. I bought it in feb 2019 and still using it. Economic option and looks so good

name: Raju r
title: Thank u amazon for refund I found a paper in delivery box which in i bought a earphone.
content: Amazon delivery like this. Amazon is always fraud company .I bought a earphone but in box I found newspaper .when we bought a premium item then it's correct and no fault in delivery but when we we bought a item which is not premium then it's always like this delivery with me its second time

name: $¡\/@ Pr@&@|)
title: BLINDLY JUST GO FR IT.. THIS REVIEW M WRITING MORE THAN 1 YEAR I USING IT
content: Its been one and Half year by purchasing it.... Quality of the sound and colour of the product is not fadded a bit.. I am so Happy with Boat Brand especially 225 version.

name: Ritesh Thakkar
title: My ear phone is not working within 6 month.
content: My ear phone not working within 6 month and i have warranty 1 year but when i call calling in service centre they are not responding.

name: Deepankar G.
title: Worst sound..overhyped product
content: Worst sound quality. Over tweaked for extra bass, hoarseness is felt in the sound while listening to music. Background music can't be heard properly. Even dialogues in the HD quality movies sounds like from CAM rips. Overpriced product. Rs 20 earphones are better than these ones.

name: Karthik Kumar
title: Not Durable, didn't last more than 5 weeks one side completely stopped working
content: In terms of sound and bass quality it's really good but the quality of the earphones suck, they barely lasted for less than 5 weeks!. Disappointed with the purchase!

name: Ganesh mankar
title: GOT WARRANTY CLAIM AND ITS HASSLE-FREE.
content: GOT WARRANTY CLAIM AND ITS HASSLE-FREE.. Bought this product 7-8 monts back. Suddenly 1 ear stopped working and after 2 days 2nd also stopped. I tried contacting them on their mumbai landline but it was continiously busy. Somehow at 12.30 hrs it got connected and they provide me email id for complaint. I emailed them the problem and they arranged the pick up . After 10 days today I received brand new headset back.. I very much appreciate boat team customer service .. Thank You

name: PadamataS', Delhi
title: Boat ear-phone disappointed.
content: Sound quality is very poor.. Though in Auto play mode, this ear-phone doesn't support. After every song, one has to manually play. Sound control facility ABSENT. I bought two ear-phones & Disappointed.

name: chiranjeevi
title: A good product, but their was a mistake in the wire at the plugpin
content: Product has occured damage in the wire at the plugpin. The product is suddenly making the volume high and low, even Google assistant is suddenly turning on in each seconds.. So buy it carefully.. And only one ear locking cap is given.. Please make sure that customers get a perfect product by "boat" in ear earphones.

name: rohith chandra
title: Too much cranky
content: It works good at low volume but it geta cranky with lot of noise at high volumes. Mic is worst and won't work unless you keep it to your mouth.. I used House Of Marley before and it is good product and used it for comparison.

name: Muhammad Faizan
title: Awesome product!!!!!
content: Fantastic earphones at a very reasonable price! Sound quality is very good and if you like bass then it is excelent! Build quality is aslo very nice! I bought it for my son and he likes it so much that he keeps it in a specific box for safety measure.

name: ANIL RAJ I S
title: Good For Music
content: I use poweramp player in Samsung J5-2016. Treble is good. Product quality is good. Bass is above average. Stereo is very nice. High sound, sound clarity and quality is good as expected.. At this price it is ok

name: Shashank
title: A Great Product from a Lesser Known Company
content: I always like to try new brands so, I chose to try Boat. This product is amazing, fits into the ears well, cancels the noise and, gives an awesome music experience. Well done Boat, you have gained my trust.

name: Yogesh pawar
title: Quality very good fitting is loose
content: Pros.Build quality is excellent. Sound quality is very good. Noise cancellation is also very good.. Cons. Metal dots which is very heavy it feel it will fall from ear.. 3.5mm jack is not properly fit in my moto x4 mobile due to some black portion on it. It may fit or not fit to other mobile can't say.

name: Star
title: WHAT THE HELL!
content: I got a duplicate copy of earphones!. CONS:. 1) Duplicate product i.e., very light weight made up of plastic.(But on the box, it is labelled as 'POLISHED METAL').. 2) The play/pause button doesn't work properly, when I press 3-4 times, then the video gets paused.. 3) I ordered them BLACK colour & they sent me GREEN!. PROS:. *It is of 'boAt' brand!. Conclusion: Don't buy it!

name: Bishvendra Singh
title: Must read, before buying
content: These are the best Earphones around Rs 500.. You may not have heard of this brand "BOAT" . But this brand really provides a bang for a buck.. These are worth buying, I had these 2 years back, still in great condition and sound as new.. This has adequate bass, but not too high bass.. Vocals are clear and fine.. Build quality is amazing.

name: Prashantkmr
title: Music World
content: I personally refer this to my friends... 5* to the hands-free.✌. but I think if the product gets broken or not work after sometime so the process to complete a queries should be in timly manner.. else the exp was good with this product...👍👌

name: Deepak joshi
title: Packaging was wrost.
content: The product is really good .but packaging was wrost . In the case. the product I received is defective because the packaging is wrost . So I return this product .In my opinion sound , material quality and the product durability is good .. So if you want a budget head Phone so go for it.

name: Sari HD
title: Works great. Just as described
content: Works great. Just as described. Comes with 6 different pairs of ear-buds of various sizes. Works great. I am listening to System of Dawn as I am writing this. So far so good. No earphones last for more than 6 months though. Not with me, but let's hope this one does! Buy it !

name: Vadem Puneeth
title: Boats earphones good to buy...
content: To watch movies and to listen songs with good bass, boat ear phones are good... metallic finish and tangle free cable and microphone... To use while jogging or running this earphones not suitable because it slips out from ears...other than that best to buy..

name: DINESH KUMAR GOEL
title: Additional earbuds n quality not upto mark.
content: Additional Ear buds are of lime colour whereas earphone is of orange colour. Should be replaced or additional earbuds should be dispatched of same orange colour. Quality is also extremely poor n not working properly within so short time n even used so diligently n delicately.

name: Amit
title: Great build and audio quality for this price.
content: I have been using it for last couple of years, this is my second ear plug... going great so far, off-course i do not use it roughly.

name: Arghya
title: Best in the Sub-1k range
content: I have used this for the past 1 year now and I must admit this is the best earphones in its category. It can over with a JBL in the sub-1000/- category. It has am exemplary bass which you will get in high range earphones which are week and above 1.5-2k. If you are looking for budget earphones within 1000/- range then this is the best choice, go for it.

name: Shubhajit Kundu
title: Additional earbuds are of dissimilar color.
content: Quality and performance of this headphone is satisfactory. But additional earbuds included in this pack are of dissimilar color.. I have ordered Molten Orange colored headphone but additional earbuds given are of Neon Lime color. Hence, 4 star.. Otherwise headphone is okay.

name: MAHENDRA PAL SINGH
title: Worst product, don't buy
content: Within 2 months it became defective. I filed complaint on boat site but they did not contact me neither initiated any process to replace it as it in 1 year warranty period. I will not buy any BOAT product in future. JBL is best in quality and service

name: Bipin mishra
title: Bad product bery disappointed.
content: I ordered this boat ear phones and seems like it is not working 1st its one side ear podnpart is not working and same goes with another one also. If you make prime members then why u are delivering bad products which are not in working condition. Very much disappointed from amazon.

name: Rajiv.Vaghela
title: All n all good Deal
content: Good product i got good deal i inquire in local market it was actually costly and price to price. But i got here in big discount so I m so happy.... Quality is good and sound is also good thank you for such nice product in perfect price.

name: Chandan Nallal
title: Good bass and sound quality for the price point.
content: Loved the sound quality for this price. Have tried their headphones which are awesome...this one lives up to the expectations as well. Ensure to have good sound players and good quality music on the phone and the earphones will certainly deliver.

name: Deep Dutta
title: Best in this price point
content: One of the best headphones you can get in this price point. Bit heavy coz of the metal body other wise everything is fine. Wire quality is decent and tangle free. Bass is good mids are little average. For rs550 this is the best u can get

name: srikanishka
title: Worst Headphones ever!! NEVER BUY
content: It's worst Headphones I ever purchased, the Sound quality is worst, but its been less than a month and already 1 Earphone is not working and the other Earphone is throwing poor quality sound. I strongly recommend everyone not to purchase this Headphone.Material quality is okay, but what to do with it if you are not able to hear from the Earphone.

name: Nav
title: Headphone work good for initial few months not working properly
content: How the headphone works after few month of use, will update later.. Edited - for few months headphone worked well but after 6 months, earphones are not working sound not coming from the ear plugs,. Boats needs to work on this they charge so high amount and after few months headphone stop working then WATS the difference between then and those cheap headphone which comes at a price of 50-100.

name: Ashish Datyal
title: in-ear comfort
content: everything is good compared to other earphones in this price range. However, the only downside for me is in-ear comfort, not comfortable at all. found the earpiece slipped out of my ears so often that I needed to wrap the earphones around my neck....

name: Bee
title: Sound quality is amazing. There are many pairs of extra buds that ...
content: Sound quality is amazing. There are many pairs of extra buds that come along. The packaging is cute too! If you are looking for a pair of budget headphones, go for this. Have been using it for over 4 months now.

name: AMIT j
title: Im in love with boat base head. The slogan is soo true ie "plug in to nirvana"
