content: Awesome earphone i just love it. Base is awesome vocals are crisp and clear. Sound is very loud so you don't need to increase the volume to maxx it works perfect at half volume. It fits perfectly and doesn't fall off while running. Those wo face fall off problems may be the have small ear holes.

name: RTH
title: Great quality as expected from a branded product
content: Great quality as expected from a branded product. Sound too is good with right bass and real sound. Only negative is it keep falling down from my ear frequently, a problem while running. Update on OCT’18 : After using it for 7 months and few days, my earphone started giving troubles. Now I am going for a new one. Just a heads up on the product life

name: Subrata Mandal
title: Excellent product.
content: Sound quality is very good both in low and high volume. I am using it with my mobile and laptop. Very much satisfied.

name: Beast
title: claiming warrenty
content: I have been using this earphone since december and is awsome but suddenly a issue was raised with d earphones dat since past few days one side of the earphone is not working, so i want to put a complaint on the data of my warrenty period and request you to please help me out claiming the warrent

name: sanjay m.
title: Brilliant bass&tremble...
content: Feels allot like a surround hometheatre ... I bought it for 499rs. The headset coming with a 1 year warranty and extra 5 sets of ear buds..s/m/l sizes..and a pair of ear hooks.. the body being made of metal, it's capable of withstanding normal day wear and tare.... The boat 225 however is not waterproof. Be careful not to use it during rain!

name: Anshuman
title: Good  sound quality not so good ergonomics
content: Sound quality is nice bass is pretty good. .Problem is with the metal earphone is tha they are heavy if you have been using plastic earphone they will feel pretty heavy at first but u will get used to it also the knurling done on earphone hurts ear this happend in earlier days of usage but later it went noticable

name: AmazonCustomer
title: Unsatisfied
content: It last for only one year, loud sound and over bass, if we listen in high volume ear will hurt,it not fits in ear and very uncomfortable earphones not satisfied

name: Karthik
title: Budget pick
content: Passive noise cancelling mic. Bass headphones.. A budget buy that's it. Music enthusiasts keep away. Sound is not natural. Deep bass. Nothing much. Mids and lows are not at all appreciable

name: Rohit waghmare
title: Great Product Boat Nirvana 225Bassheads...
content: This is very good product are this price range I'll bought this product last 15 days this product such a nice good sound quality great bassheads 225 great tangle free cable easy to keep ...red colour also good looking ...neon colour also good looking...Nice product guz you can take closely eyes...it's very good product of this budget range... I've bought this product 499rs. Only....Guz don't West time you just take it ....

name: Shanboklangz Shabong
title: Go for it cause it's decent!
content: Just want you to know that these are not the same as the older ones. The build quality is fully plastic and not the heavy metal you think it is. I guess they changed the built quality due to the heaviness in the buds.

name: Guru
title: Most Trustable Review
content: * 'L' shape Pin. * Trustable brand with Decent quality. * 5 set of extra buds ( different size ). * 1 set supporting clip( flexible). * 1 year manufacturer warranty. * BASS 9/10. * Clarity 7/10. * Quality 9/10. * Overall worth for money

name: Robin
title: Boat bassheads 225
content: Received in good packing. Got additional ear support and swabs. Sound quality is excellent. Sturdy and durable. Wire length is long. Easy to use. Looks great. Eliminate 90 % of outer noise

name: vijaysundar
title: Waste of money
content: It's the worst earphone I ever purchased. The main drawback is the size of the speaker which is large and has more weight. This makes it not fitting inside my ear with any earpods they have provided. Always have to adjust it while talking and doing work. Very irritating. The earpods are also low quality rubber. Sound is ok and mic works well. Now I changed to sanheisser. Waste of money

name: Satish VSS
title: Simply amazing. One can buy it without any second search
content: Simply amazing. One can buy it without any second search. The sound quality is superb. I bought two different earphones before boAt. One of them is House of marley. Comparing with boAt, House of marley can be put aside for showing it as earphones but not to listen songs. It can be used for phone calls only. The same can be said for the second one, Phillis.. Coming to boAt Bassheads, the built quality is nice and as said it is tangle free. Bass is a little bit high. But one who love bass loves this also. The sound sensitivity can be amplified using equaliser. But don't use Bass booster or bass enhanced equalisers. .

name: Sneharghya sil
title: The heaviness of the earphones.
content: The earphones are overall decent.They have a great bass,noise cancellation and look.. The only problem i would like to point out is that,. 1) The earphones are made of metal and that is great btw but they feel a bit heavy on the ears.. 2)and i hate to bring it but the left earphone wire having the mic with it,makes it even heavier.

name: Prajjwal verma
title: Good for bassheads
content: first of all. good bass , one of the best in the segment. sound output was okay. if you want it for gaming its the best in the price segment. eartips are not comfortable , you cannot use this earphone for an hour or more , it really hurts ears , and also if you move it will pop out of your ear very easily , not for sports

name: Santosh
title: Simply amazing
content: I didnt get any sound quality issue as the bass covers it all.. Yes the bass is tremendous.. You may get better bass with increase in price range but this does the job very well in its price range.. Go for it without a doubt.

name: Nilesh
title: Worst earphones, Fake Reviews
content: I am 100% sure most of the reviews of this item are fake because I am pretty sure that anyone who will use these earphones will never give positive feedback for it.. The main drawback is that the earphones fall off after every few seconds, it never sticks into your ear. The reason is the poorly designed body, the metal part which is on the backside of the earpiece is heavy so it automatically slips down.

name: sachin jethe
title: Good product.But disagree with service of amazon.in
content: 1.Awesome earphone. 2.Built quality is great. 3.Sound is great with powerfull bass decent clarity. 4.In line microphone with play,pause,next,Answer call,end call. *#ONE thing is this earphone is not comfortable and fit in my ears. BUT , I GOt A DAMAGE PRODUCT ,LEFT EARPIECE IS DAMAGED. and i refund this product but refund is not initiated in my amazon account

name: Faisal Habib
title: Awesome sound and built quality
content: Product is really good, the sounds, bass quality, built quality all the things are just awesome, it also includes some extra ear buds in the package. it also has built in microphone for the calls, just go for it, if you want a good quality ear phones then you must go for this. very nice product, value for money.

name: Pramod Kumar
title: Please give after sale service
content: Just my return policy is over the micro phone is not working,within 7 days, I am help less what to do ?

name: PALINDROME SYSTEMS
title: Good product but did not suit well
content: This is a good product, however, the earpiece has metal base I believe, which has made it a bit heavy. Kids found it difficult to hold onto their ears due to weight. Returning the item.

name: shivanshu lal sharma
title: do not buy this
content: I would recommend to all my new buyer that do not buy this product because this will not fit in your ear. Ear phone removes from the ear again and again. this is very heavy. hence removes from the ear again and again.

name: Roshan Joseph
title: Reliable Product with superb Extra Bass and long lasting tangle free cable..
content: Best as well as most reliable earphones what you can get at this price point.. I 've been using it for a year.. I would recommend buy a good earphone case like tizum (aftermarket) or opt for earphones + case (boAt) combo..

name: sanjeev khanna
title: boAT BassHeads 225 in ear phone review
content: If you are looking for subtle high frequencies and enhanced bass frequencies at a reasonable price, boAT BassHeads 225 is the right choice for you.. The negative point is excessive wire weight when compared to the likes of Sennheiser and Samsung.

name: abhinav g.
title: Mixed opinions
content: It is good earphones, are tangle free, but it has some problem - the bass is very high, very very high, it affects the sound quality, they are also a lot heavy, if you compare with sennheiser cx180 , also its left earphone suddenly stopped working just after 2 months, i tried to contact the customer care but got no response, the line was always busy, i would rather prefer if you buy an earphone feom an offline shop, my left earphone stopped working of my wireless earphone i went there with a reciept and without question they gave me a new one

name: Nitesh Bamhania
title: Worst customer service
content: Don't buy any of the boat products... Their customer service is worst I have ever experienced.If you submit your product for any kind of replacement.. You won't get it back.. I have submitted mine 3 weeks ago.. Its one side was not working & didn't get my product back.You won't even able to collabrate with customer service once you submit your product.

name: Rika
title: Perfect but stopped working after barely a couple of months :(
content: Sound quality, bass and noise cancellation-everything was perfect, actually it worked perfectly as long as it worked, which was only for a couple of months! :(

name: SOUGATA
title: Metallic sound, unnecessarily heavy bass.
content: 1) Plastic heads,not metal. 2) Metallic sound. 3) Unnecessarily heavy bass at the cost of clarity. Retained it because can't afford a headphone at higher price point.

name: Aaliya
title: Don't buy
content: Worst product from boat it doesn't even stay in your ears while in use because the ear plugs are heavy. I purchased it in feb n now one of the ear plug is not working. Never gonna suggest to buy them.

name: MerchandiseSpeaks
title: Trust Score 8/10
content: Pros-. Budget Friendly - Best phone in this price segment. Good packaging. Awesome sound Quality - Super Bass. Cons-. Not 100% Tangle Free. Plastic Quality is not sweat/splash proof. Noise Cancellation is not as expected

name: 0gesh_R0G
title: Full reviews 🧐🧐🧐
content: All ok but quality MAX zero ,....... Good noise cancellation voice quality and sound quality is more important than wire quality. Why equality is most worst near to Mike will get breakin even if their child long it. Bass 5\4.7. Wire quality 5\2.2. Sound quality 5\4.2. Ear but quality 5\5. If you have an option go with ant audios. with box are given ♥️

name: praveencat
title: missing crystal clearence
content: built quality and all other attributes are good, but sound quality in terms of crystal clearance is missing in compared with Soundmagic Es18s

name: Kawaljeet
title: Working nicely
content: Writing this review after using it for 6 months. Sound quality, noise cancellation and bass is good. Only problem that I found is that they come out of ears often. Use smallest size ear buds provided, for best fit. Boat also provided holder to hold these in place so that solves the problem.

name: Siniya
title: Please help
content: I bought this headset on may 18th. After one month its left headset and mic produce too low sound. Now i cant use this while calling. How I can return this product?? Please help.

name: Rahul N P
title: Cool earphone:)
content: Ordered it on 6th August night, received the product on the right next day without Amazon Prime membership:). Coming to the product, the earphone looks cool with many pair of ear buds. Bass effect is decent with high sound volume. Tangle free wires are very useful for someone like me who likes to keep the earphone all the time in pocket. I'll write a detailed review after a month of use of this earphone.. Cheers

name: Sandeep
title: Boat handset is very good
content: The product is very good ,bass & sound quality is awesome.. The product came in good condition.. Thank u very much Amazon

name: Aadi
title: Good review
content: I must say that the quality of sound at this price is just awesome. Wire is tangle free as promised and it is really good you can rely on that.. But the downside is it's so heavy that while listening the earpiece comes out of ear.

name: Ranaul Haque
title: It too good than my expectation.
content: I'm using it from 15 days, very nice product. It is very durable, audio drivers are made from metal, cable is long enough and tangle free. Bass quality very strong. It more suitable for listening songs but in case of watching movies is little bit poorer.

name: Deepak.g.m
title: Best buy!
content: Have been using it for more than 6 months, and haven't faced any problem yet. The durability, quality of the product, the quality of sound especially the bass is just best in class. With a budget of ₹500/- this is one of the best choices you could make. The only con i have faced is as the ear piece is made out of metal which makes it heavier, the earpiece tends to come out of the ear very often. Other than that it is a great buy. Go for it!

name: Yakshit yadav
title: Its a value for money product !
content: a good sound quality; we can say value for money product not for the sound quality or bass its because their one year warranty, you can replace them for one year..... in my case my one ear piece stop working in 2 months then I exchange then n realize the new one have imbalance bass ….. after 3 months again one ear piece was died now I have to exchange it again...……. : (

name: Sparsh
title: Worth for money but still not durable.
content: Great sound quality but no durable especially while working out.. Got damaged within a year.. Bass : 9.2/10. Treble : 9.6/10. Mids : 9.8/10. Durability : 3/10. Looks : 6.9/10

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best in this price range ❤️
content: I read so many reviews in online about these headsets saying that these are heavy and falling out of ears while listening,Yes, that's true but you didn't find its disturbing in any manner.. Bass is 🔥. Just go for it with no other thoughts 👍. Plz Don't go for MI basic earphones those are worst and make your ears pain 👎

name: Srinivas M. P.
title: I think I did mistake by purchasing this product
content: This product in my wish list for 2 years and after that I purchased.. I'm not happy with it.. No magnet, mic is poor, vocal not clear

name: Ayush Sharma
title: Great product
content: Sound quality is great and all but note that the earphone typically lasts for only 6-7 months and the replacement unit only works for like 1-2 months.. I've purchased the earphones twice and it fullfills your average music listening session.

name: vijay kumar shah
title: Worst Earphone don't buy zero star overall
content: Too much poor audio. Even at low volume its extra loud, it causes ear pain & headache. Extra loud volume & Bass is toooo much extra loud. can't tolerate it for a minute.

name: Jenifer Ranjili
title: Very bad
content: Its been 7hrs since i got the headset. After connexting this headset my phone volume automatically going down when it is removed my phone volume gets to normal. I have tried other headset and it is working good. I'm not able to return please help

name: SHARMILA DUTTA
title: Value for money in this price range...
content: Sound quality is too good.. Bass quality also satisfactorily good.. Noise cancellation is supported.. Being tangle -free, the earphone has engraved metal finish which gives it a premium look..It also comes with a free hard case... I am totally satisfied by purchasing this and suggest u to go for it !

name: Sameer
title: All rounder. Thank you so much
content: These Earphones are the best in sound quality,noise cancellation, and durability,etc. The only issue is some ears don't fit this buds without the clips. Thanks to boAt for providing separate clips as well as different size of buds. A complete package is given in only Rs 500/- . Thank You so much.

name: Eternal_K
title: Best earphones is the price range
content: Best buy is this price range. The earphones are good for daily use and useful while commuting. Earlier i have used Sony earphones but since this one is less than half the price of Sony i won't compare these, hence best earphones is this price 500-800 ₹

name: Vijetha
title: Good but concentrate on simple issues
content: Sound quality is good...but the ear piece keeps falling out since it heavy.. the earphone jack doesn't fit the socket neatly.

name: RahulGupta
title: Not that good as it promises..
content: Ordered it couple of months ago..It worked fine for few. But now right one is not working...i am fade up with it.. Not sure if i got the product right.. now i have to go through all the hassles to mail this company to replace it as it's under warranty... But in one sentence ..not worth it.

name: Miss J. Khiangte
title: Good one
content: It's really good for this price range. I've been using it for past 4 months and seems durable. Value for money. Looks nice too. Doesn't tangle much.

name: Vivek kumar
title: Lightweight and flexible wires plus nice finishing along with joints and corners
content: Looks like a nice earphone in this price range.Its really flexible plus nice finishing ar edges and joints. Extra set of ear buds along with ear hook are also given along with this product

name: Ishita
title: Value for money.
content: I've been using these earphones for a while, paired with my OnePlus 6T. They do not disappoint even a bit. My only problem is that they keep slipping out of my ear which makes it difficult to use while exercising or jogging. But other than that, the sound quality and the product quality both are pretty good.

name: Divya Pardeshi
title: Highly durable and true sounds.
content: There is no match to the boat headphones. The is my 3 order one after another.. highly durable and recommended . doesn't even feel like using any other .. just that.. before the company provided multiple buds, holding clip and ear clips.. it's not there now..

name: Sourav Das
title: Best headphones for this price range
content: The sound is too good.. the ear pads are comfortable.. the cable length is medium length and those flat cable is tangleles.. the tip of the jack is gold coated bt eventually washes off with vigorous use for 2-4months. The red colour is dope

name: Tejas
title: One of the best buy in earphones
content: It's my 5th order for this earphones anyone in my family or my friend this the earphones I suggest it's really good and comfortable with all the qualities .

name: Nishan Brahma
title: Quality Product
content: The best Earphones in the price range. The bass is just awsome. Comes with adjustable ear pieces. Just go for the headphones depending on your colour varient. U wont regret for ur purchase.

name: jegan r nair
title: Feels like cheated..
content: Such a terrible product i brought it on June 8 th and and with in 20 days it's left side is not working . I brought this earphone because of the same problem that I had with my mi earphone which I had used for 2 years before this issue happening. Charging about 549 rs and cheating people..

name: Ash
title: poorly designed product
content: the design has defects. earphones are heavy and easily slip out while listening. also the quality of cable connections is very plasticy. do not look durable

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not worthy
content: 225 boat Plastic is too cheap , sound quality is bad , one can buy 150 boat as ere quality is good in comparison to 225 , even bass is not worthy

name: Avish Shah
title: Used it for about a month or so. In ...
content: Used it for about a month or so. In terms of listening to music it's just superb, considering the price factor. I rated 3 coz I mainly bought it to talk to people with this rather than direct mobile. It disappoints on that front. Person am talking to on the other hand have to try hard to listen to what I wanna say, as noise of surroundings is more to that person than mine. So I have to remove my earphones and have a word with them, than through earphones. I think they should develop and upgrade this factor since they are offering with mic facility so it has to work properly.

name: Abhishek
title: Awesome!!!
content: 100% Recommend you to buy this product if you have 3.5 mm Jack for your earphone. It has too much deep bass and sound volume and Effect. I can't Listen it for More than 10 minutes at 100% Volume.. it becomes too much loud. I listen at 60% it rolls my head. i am Using Mi phones so i changed some effects and its just superb awesome. Very happy with the product

name: Rahul Ohlan
title: Too Good !
content: The sound quality and BASS are super awesome in these earphones ! Been using them from three months now .. Initially they kept falling out of the ears even on brisk movements but the issue was resolved as I switched the ear buds, (got extra 6 pairs in the pack !).. Build quality is too good and they feel like super light !. Worth it !

name: Ashmetal
title: Good For Daily Use...
content: The earphones are good for daily use but it doesnt feel right on your ear after long duration of use... A lil push and it falls of my ear... Tried the diffrent ear buds but still the issue persists...

name: MANISH KUMAR SAINI
title: nice and clear sound quality
content: decent sound quality and decent level bass and good stereo effect but only problem to hold it in ears. sometimes it comes out from ears , i expect devlopers could improve holding quality in ear , otherwise very good product and i really liked it , thanks a lot again providing your service

name: Abhinav Gulechha
title: Not compatible with Redmi Note 7S
content: It was not compatible with my Redmi note 7s phone. Due to using it my phone volume was going up and down by itself. Bad purchase. always check phone compatibility before buying.

name: Vj
title: Recommended
content: I was little hesitant to buy this product in the beginning because Sennheiser first choice but this product give me such comfort a good noise cancellation good boom affect good treble and good quality of sound and I could feel a cinematic experience every time I hear this thank you

name: mohamed suhail
title: Good
content: This one is cheap and best product...extraordinary sound quality... use this one gently...but I'm not using this gently till now i got 2 issues from this one but i claimed warranty for 2 times and gotta new one😍. Issues:-. 1. Mic doesn't work properly in few days. 2. One side not working

name: Gana
title: Your decision NO Warranty, 9 months duration
content: Yeah it is good. But it works only for 9 months. Also, there is no year warranty for this branded one. Don't get diverted by looking pandya picture.. 50 Rs headset will come for at least 4 to 5 months.

name: I_am_Agrawal
title: Don't buy this
content: Please don't buy this. I have bought this in March 2018 and left part of this earphone stopped working, and when I tried to register a complaint at boat website, I ended up with a thank you page mentioning that you will soon receive a registration ID on your mail and no such mail is being delivered to me till date (logged the complaint one week back). BOAT INDIA might be fake

name: Amazoncustomer
title: Don't think to much about it, just go for it.
content: Don't think to much about it . The sound quality is amazing and the bass quality is also average also it has some noise cancelation which cancels outside noise . I am very happy to have this earphone . Fully worth of money and the built quality is also good as compared to other earphones . Just go for it .I repeat don't think to much about it and grap it before the offers end.

name: Abhijeet Dhengre
title: BOAT at it's best
content: The product is of "BOAT" so there is nothing to say much... The sound quality is awesome... Bass production is good enough and yes at this price range it's a product which everyone should have...

name: Aamer
title: Doesn't fit into ears.. don't go for this
content: Very irritating to use as it doesn't fit into ears.. I would not recommend this ear phone .. Bad product by Boat.. After an year of use, it stopped working.. I wonder why this product has good rating.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Ears start to pain after 2-3 hours
content: The material of wire is very good. I have been using it for more than a year and both sides are still working. Mic is also good. The only problem is your ears start to pain if you use it for 2-3 hours. Also bass is not so good

name: Prashant Patil
title: Original and genuine
content: Genuine and original product. Be alert, duplicate product is available on Flipkart which I returned and purchased this one.. Extremely happy with the sound and voice clarity over calls..

name: Santosh
title: Awesome headphone !
content: Sound quality is really good. Apart from this we get 5 pair's of ear buds and a clip that helps in perfect fitting.. If you are looking for a headphone around 500rs,. then this is the best choice.

name: Nirav Mehta
title: High quality sound. Fits well in ears. Ear hooks cause pain with long use.
content: I was hesitant to buy this initially. But the headphones work really well.. I'm enjoying them - six different sized earbuds make it easy to fit. One problem I have is with the ear hooks. If you intend to use them for a firmer grip - keep in mind they can be painful after a while.. All in all, very good product.

name: Rajan Preet Singh
title: Bass yes , but not good sound !
content: These earphone have a good bass and that it for earphones. These are just suited for music with high bass. If you come under that target audience then definitely buy it . I do not recommend if you plan to use it as general purpose earphone for call ,movies, etc as sound appears to boomy.

name: sagar N.
title: Change the buds change quality.
content: At this price range this is best. bass is loud but not punchy. This is because of hole of buds are narrow if I use my skullcady's bud which cames with wide hole in bud it feel awesome.

name: Ashutosh Sonar
title: Superb! Best Buy!
content: Best buy, fits best with all size options for the ear buds. Love it. I had same ones for 2 years now. After sales service is great. Warranty claims are seamless. This is my second pair. I don't like any other earphones as I am used to the quality this one provides

name: Ankit Singh
title: Recommend if you need good quality... overall 4.5
content: I have used lot of headphones but at this price, its the best you got. As mentioned this headphone has very good bass. Sound quality is good. build quality is very good... lot of additional ear plugs.

name: amit meda
title: ) Quality wise its good but not the best under this price 2
content: Reviewing it after 5 months of daily use. 1.) Quality wise its good but not the best under this price. 2.)earphone usually falls from ears. 3). Mic is not good at this price. 4). Can't use it longer ,your ear will be having pain after 10 minutes. Conclusion:. Avoid buying this earphone if you hear music for longer time . Not good at all for music lovers... It is just for normal use. Go for another brand

name: Priyanka lucky
title: Good but not at best
content: Boat 225 earphone is good but not best...Bass is good but still not wat I was looking for..I used my samsung earphone nd after that used boat 225..there was a slight difference of bass quality..overall not as per expectations...

name: Vivian Ronaldo
title: Affordable pair of earphone
content: Pros -. Excellent build quality. Bundled earhooks. Can get loud. Cons -. Oversensitive microphone. Bass overpowers mids and highs

name: Debankur Mukherjee
title: Too much Bass....Lack of Clarity.
content: The earphones have too much Bass and lack of clarity. The sound is muffled and not clear.

name: ANUP
title: One side speaker and microphone is not working.
content: I have purchased this earphone few days ago and now only single side working, one side sound has been lost and microphone is also not working.. Seriously worst experience with you BOAT company, I'll never suggest this one to any of my friends.

name: Dr. SANJEEV KUMAR
title: This is product has great bass and little clear vocals
content: Just brought it today. This is product has great bass and little clear vocals. Great build. Sturdy looks.. If you could spend few more money better buy Sennheiser CX 180 Street II or JBL.

name: muralivilla
title: Low value, low durability.
content: It's been just 2 months and one side of the earphone had gone inaudible. I accept the sound quality was great but it comes with a cost. Lower the price lower the durability.

name: Deepak Ramasamy
title: Not the best one for travelling purpose..
content: Sound quality is amazing for this price range. Super cool wires and L shaped connector will help for a long run. But the major con is that, this will stay in your ears no more than 5 mins bcoz of the earpieces are made out of metal which gives little heaviness on it and comes out of the ears. Irritating while travelling so a BIG NO for those who wants to use it while travelling..

name: Abhijeet
title: Amazing product
content: Material quality-Nice better than mi basic. Durability-Good. Wire quality- It's tangled free... Noise cancelation-Its Soo goood..... Sound quality-(faad) Amazing... Bass-(faad) ultimate... Better than all earphones comes in this price range but not better than senhiser cx180 but senhiser has no mic lol..... Cons:. Wire is too long.. It slips..

name: Akash Rumade
title: Great earphones.
content: Great earphones at this price range. Lasted for 1.2 years. But now after some more competition at this price range i will prefer Ant Audio or leaf :) But seriously got great after sale support from Boat team. Kudos for that 👏👏

name: Balu T.
title: Great product and very good price
content: The quality is awesome, I use it while jogging and it fits my ears perfectly. Sound quality is good and decent noise cancellation.. Boat earphones have very good built quality. Unless you are careless you need not buy another in couple of years.

name: Jayant B.
title: Good sound.. good quality, but slips out of ur ears due to heaviness
content: This is 3 weeks review.. sound quality is very good. But it's made out of a metal, not plastic. So they are little heavier.. slips right of ur ear all the time.. they have provided sort of extra rubber thing which help sometimes... Best for working on laptop or Lying on bed.. not recommended while working out, it may slip and hit you in the eye..

name: Mohd Osama Raza
title: Buy or Not??? In One Review.
content: Bass and Sound quality is more than expected, only problem is its heavy metal built without angular design that is painfull for ears if uses for long time.. Better than any other biggies like jbl,senhiezer etc. in this price range.👍👍👍👍

name: KB
title: loved it
content: Really good a bit heavy but its good and the sound is excellent. Actually doesn't tangle so thats a added bonus. And with warranty thats good.

name: Rajesh Ray
title: Recent Review
content: The sound quality is good,But the company made this product ,where it is not suitable or feet to ear,they may forgot this thing,it sleeps out of ear and it ear will feel pain ,if u use 20,30 minutes,So Don't go for this,I already return this product,Amazon Return service is excellent..

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good quality at an affordable price
content: Awesome.. Really awesome.... One of best headphone I ever had.... Sound quality is impressive (extra bass) .... It doesn't get messed up easily when I keep it in pocket or bag..... The earphones doesn't fit in the ear properly bt that's the problem with many earphones so no complain it's adjustable too.... I recommend everyone those who are looking for good quality headphones in little bit cheap rates...

name: Jitesh Dembla
title: Not great as described
content: The earphones have low bass and echo in the ears. I have used JBL(₹799) and MI earphones (₹399) and they are much better than this. Disappointed with the product and you cannot return and ask for a refund as it is only replacement. I prefer paying more and buying better ones. Tried this after reading reviews.

name: Lakshmi prasanna
title: Not so great
content: Noise cancellation- people can hear a lot of baground noise and buzz sound over the call.. 3.5 mm jack doesn't stick to mobile. It keeps ejection and come out. Just for name sake showing as gold plated

name: Raghuvaran
title: No customer service available.
content: It has been just a month i bought this earphones. The left side is not working. I tried to claim warranty, but the number provided was incorrect, their website was not responding. Very worst product. Don't buy it. Amazon, don't sell this type of product with no service available.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Value for money
content: Overall it is an excellent earphone. One drawback, by design the earbuds doesn't fit in the ear properly. Resulting in, the ear buds falls off the ear quite often.. You cannot use it on bike

name: Rajasekhar Katta
title: Quality of sound good but shape of the head not so well designed.
content: The quality of the product and sound is good. The reason I gave it three stars is because of the lack ergonomics design. The ear phone is not ergonomically designed for the ear so even with simple nod of head or any movement it keeps falling off.

name: Manmeet singh
title: Nothing more good can expect in this range ready to beat up music
content: First time user for boat thumbs up for the manufacturing team. I have Skullcandy ,JBL and MI and this product really given tough fight. Bass is better than both of them and also crystall clear sound. Price is not comparable at all as in this low and affordable rate given boat has achieved success.. All the best for future product one should go and purchase it.

name: Sudhanshu Pandey
title: good sound
content: When I bought this earphone it was best, sound and quality of the earphone was good.. But after using it for 2 months, its produces irritating noise on a call. so kindly tell me how to claim warranty of this product.

name: patel suresh
title: Minor glitches
content: Overall the experience is good but after using for a month it started giving minor problems like getting disconnected automatically or connected and the music is playing but you won't hear a thing. Happened twice with me so will update after a month or two about the issue.

name: Axom Rhino
title: Stopped working within 5 months
content: Stopped working within 5 months. Bought in February 2019 and right side stopped working in June. Tried to register warranty so many times but registration number never comes.

name: Anugraha
title: Bud drops off due to the weight. But the rest is damn good
content: This is not the range for joggers/travellers. Sound quality is damn good, but if you have to enjoy it you must sit idle somewhere. Because the buds slips from your ear due to the metallic body weight.

name: Amazon Customer
title: How to claim warranty?
content: I bought this headphone on Jan 02nd, my mic is not working now from past one week. I heard it has one year warranty. How can i claim warranty for this headphone. The other headset is also not working in which the problem is speakers.

name: Sagar
title: Complete value for money product
content: Best headphones with in your budget. Complete value for money product. I'm using it for more than 18 months now.. This is my 2nd headphones which worked this long. Happy with the product

name: KNM Rao
title: No Grip to ear
content: Not good my opinion, because no grip to ear, all sizes. Desine not good for this price. Use at the time of only sitting with putting both hands near ear. I like Boat but iam not satisfy.

name: akash manik
title: Not what I was expecting
content: So my friend told me about this earphones and that he has been using it for quite a long time and it's great . So I purchased it on 4 th March , 2019 , and it has been exactly a month and 4 days , today is April 8th and one of my earpiece isn't working . Not going for it ever again . The price seemed right , so many would think to buy but trust me , few bucks could spare u from the terrors .. Hope this was useful

name: Sahil  jain
title: Great Cost
content: Nice earphones but I will prefer you to buy boat 162 it is far better than it and it is just one 300 to 350 bucks .. I have both of them so I tell you my experience .

name: vmaraskolhe
title: Not Quality materials compare money
content: Worst service by jbl harman due break of ear plug rubber. in month it refuse warranty claim its fault of company material no service executive are answer you on mail so dont purchase its not quality materials

name: Jayesh Parate
title: Preferable for only Bass Lovers
content: Although it has a good Bass, it lacks in sound clearness and clarity. Sound quality through microphone is very nice. Earphones are a little bit uncomfortable to wear. Lacks perfect fitting in ear. Also the extra buds provided have small size holes. It doesn't fits in the earpiece. Okiesh type of earphones. My old micromax canvas nitro's earphones were better than this. But that's now damaged so I purchased this earphones.

name: Virtual
title: Too class
content: My bestest experience with earphones till now.. Bass is excellent. Voice clarity is perfect.. The only problem is it doesn't fits into your ear and slip usually and it will cause some pain in your ear if you listen for hours.. That's it.

name: Arvind Arya
title: Good Headphone for laptops, not for a phone with cover on it
content: Good Headphone for laptop and bare handsets.. its jack coating is very thick (strong too :-)). wouldn't fit to a phone with cover on it and render unusable.. More then worth its value otherwise.

name: Nikhil gangwar
title: Working to expectations so far
content: Had used these for over a year, my old ones got lost. So , I bought these earphones again, liked the performance , bass is quite good , going by the colour blue/red looks more attractive. Microphone works magic although my older ones it didn't work past 6 months. also Earbuds are not tight enough to not fall listening to music while walking.

name: G.Gopalakrishnan
title: Waste product
content: This product is sound quality and finishing is very good but it works only six months after it I'll not work this is my second product both are same complaint waste product and useless product don't buy

name: ARUNMOHAN
title: sund and build quality is good. secure packing
content: I have been using this product for a month.sund and build quality is good.secure packing.extra earbuds with different size are amazing.this product is worth for coast.ear piece build with heavy metal, so it's falling from ear frequently is the only one pblm IAM facing. So I will 4stars

name: Lijo jomon
title: best at this price
content: sound quality is on another level when compared to other company headphones I have also used boat 238 extrabass but this is a more better choice(FROM MONEY AND SOUND QUALITY POINT OF VIEW) and brilliant bass (not too much or less but balanced and enriched,pleasing bass)

name: Roshan Kumar sinha
title: Experience
content: It's too heavy to handling ears , You cannot do anything without holding it ,U can enjoy it only at the time of rest ,If you want to enjoy music while doing some work it's not possible , Because of heavy weight it's always fall down form your ears

name: Riya
title: Best product at such a good price.
content: Boat is my personal favorite in headsets and speakers. I am using it since last two years and trust me it still feels like I have purchased them only few days back. Also, I recommend it to my friends who loved the sound quality as well, it's a great product at such a reasonable price. Must buy it is!

name: gaurav k.
title: Very bad quality of product
content: I bought this on march 2018 . It stopped working after few months. One side of ear buds were stopped working. A I applied for replacement (they have very good replacement sevice) and got new headphones but again it stopped working after the end of one year. Better go for different product.

name: MALLIKARJUN
title: Above Average
content: It's an average product got it for 499/- don't buy more than this and there are many fake products with lesser price sold without earbuds set Beware of frauds boat should take action against them

name: Mahendar.ippa
title: Value for money
content: I heard about boat from one of my friend and I bought this headphones and when I plugged into my mobile I really heard a good quality of sound. which I have never hear before. no words to say it's a good one to consider.

name: Siddarth
title: An amazing pair of earphones!
content: Amazing product!! Beware of buying wireless products from boat as they suck! I was impressed with this product and hence proceeded in buying a wireless neckband from boat. Literally sucks!! But this is one of the best wired earphones out in the market!!

name: harsh
title: The best in price range and one of the best in durability
content: Best available in the given price range. Buy this with a type C to 3.5 jack converter and you should be good to go with your high end smartphone. Durable and heavy bass which does not deteriorate the sound quality. Using 1-2 hours every day and works great even after a year.

name: Prudhvi kanth
title: Stupid earphones
content: Stupid earphones. It has nothing but bass. Buds keep falling out of ears. If you kept on listening to music continuously for more than an hour, then it's headache and ears will pain.i used Sennheiser cx180 for two years never felt these problems wid them. I'll return these and buy my old ones. Ofcourse only plus point is they look good and has mic that too@500/-. other than this it's nothing!. If u js want bass, go for this. If u are music appreciator and want every minute sound to be heard and enjoy music, then go for Sennheiser!

name: Subham mishra
title: Bass king 👑
content: Best earphone ever that i had used in my life.. Bass is awesome. Noise cancellation is perfect.. Design is good that it doesn't allow any bend in the cable. Most comfortable😊😊

name: Rama
title: Worked for 1 and a half year
content: Now it is gone completely, one side stopped working. Worked well for 1 and a half year. Purchased in 2018 December.

name: Rahul
title: Utter waste of money
content: I have ordered these second time. But this time, the earphones stopped working in 20 days only. There is no way of returning them back. I suggest Dont buy the same product again from amazon. They send inferior quality. I have myself noticed it.

name: Jaysh Jaishu
title: Worth for money..
content: It's a good and stylish earphone, and it's works well and the noise cancellation feature was amazing.. loved the tangale free cable and the color.. Definitely recommend it.👍👍

name: Keerthi Vasan M
title: Gives pain in ears.
content: Sound quality s somehow good. But can't hear for long time. Getting pain in ears.. I think a quality of speakers may b like this. I used high bass headphones as well. But I didn't get pain like that with other. But In this headphone, I can't hear more than 15, 20 mins. Getting fear that it will create any problem in ears. I'm not using this now..

name: Kira
title: Better in all aspects 😍
content: Well i previously buyed boat 242 Bass heads But i didn't find the feel of Boat 225 So i returned it back again & bought 225 truly i loved it & was better then 242 in all aspects .....Boat 242 was kinda very lound & crystal clear but had a very low bass & treble...so i prefer these boat 225

name: Alisha
title: Extremely Dissatisfied
content: Sound got extremely reduced in one of the ears of this headphone within 14 days of purchase. Seems they sell products only uptill their warranty time , i.e. 10 days. Only one ear works now - 100rs earphone would be similar or better (only good to look but not durable item)

name: WASHIM REZA
title: not made for melody
content: if u r looking for a durable one then go for it.... it has a good build quality and a great style as well.... but the vocals are poor.... overall sounds are okay but for those who like bass too much...... if u like Melody then don't buy it.... go for JBLs or Sennheiser as those are balanced products and much better than this one

name: Avinash Bhagat
title: Plz check it n send it to the customer!
content: I believe this brand is the brand that can compete with other great music accessories producers. Why so? Because it offers a quality that high-end and expensive brands gives you. Don't believe me then test it yourself. Just a little complaint or a request to make some changes - please test each product before dispatching it. I got one for myself and was really impressed by the hardware but as soon as I started using I noticed that the right ear port is not working properly. Beside it no complaints.

name: balu
title: Too heavy..
content: I am using this headset since 6 months.. nice product with an affordable price... it is durable but the problem is very heavy.. its hard to fit my ears because of the metal parts is too much weight, otherwise its a good product...

name: Sourav Mishra
title: Nice and Good quality from boat
content: Sound quality, bass quality and build quality is good considering the price range. Only problem i found is it is very difficult to swap the eartips as its very tight and it took me qt mins to do otherwise the earphones are good. This is not for someone who is a audiophile. Yes sometimes the bass is little too much but overall considering the price range it is good

name: SHUBHANSHU PANDEY
title: Perfect product, bad experience.
content: I don't know why, the earphones worked perfectly fine for 2 months and suddenly the sound in the left side started disappearing. And after few day, the left side stopped working completely. It's really disappointing. Such a perfect piece of earphones going ending up malfunctioning.. But the product, was superb, maybe I had a bad luck.

name: Shreyansh
title: I was confused before buying but...
content: After using this for a while i would say I'm pretty satisfied. And the bass is overwhelming. I would recommend it to anyone who is looking for a decent earphones in this range.. Its my first experience with BOAT and im quite happy with it.. 10/10

name: surya kumari
title: 1 EAR PHONE ISN'T WORKING
content: IT'S BEEN 3 MONTHS SINCE I'VE PURCHASED THE EAR PHONES AND I HARDLY USED IT FOR 3-4 TIMES. WHEN I PLUGGED IT IN THE LAST DAY ONLY ONE EAR PHONE WAS WORKING AND THE OTHER ISN'T. THE SOUND QUALITY IS REALLY GOOD BUT THE DURABILITY ISN'T GOOD. I REQUEST BOAT TO REPLACE MY HEADPHONES AS IT IS STILL UNDER WARRANTY

name: vimal
title: Awesome headphone but wear ability is not that great
content: I have used this earphone for more than one and half years. The sound quality and bass is really good. Durability also great. Only downside is, as the earphones are made of metal, its falling out from ear easily.

name: Kirti Suri
title: Media volume going down automatically
content: Whenever I plug in my headphines..the "Media" volume will pop up randomly on its own and cut itself down. I can show u videos.. I am using one plus 7...

name: Bhupesh Sharma
title: Too good
content: I have already use JBL & SONY.... recommend. BOAT Eyerphone Quality Awesome...but bass not good. If you ignor BASS....then best Eyerphone

name: Tejas Ithape
title: Slips off...
content: Used it for a week... I'm satisfied by the output..bass quality is excellent as compared to JBL c100si I was using this also..vocals are good..mids and highs are ok...just one major problem it really slips of from ears while walking fast..workouts..bus traveling...but the ear hooks does the job of a secure fit...wire quality is awesome..mic control is also good.. overall it's a worthy product in this price..!!

name: Neelendu
title: Good product
content: Good product and good sound quality, but metal construct make it heavy and it sometimes fall from ear.

name: Supriya
title: Terrible product worse service
content: Terrible product . Within one month of buying the product the mesh on the ear phones caved in . And sound is dis balanced. One ear piece it very low . The boat service center calling is a long wait and they don’t accept amazon order emails . That’s what I have and cannot find the invoice . The product has a supposed one year warranty

name: DINO DMONTE
title: Bended plug in and low vocals too heavy bass
content: Too much base can't hear vocals or vvoice also curved plug in is a hindersnce and looks very ugly

name: Apurba
title: About the Speaker and Sound quality
content: At first I thought this won't be a great purchase but when i received my headphones it was awesome. Great sound with bass especially i want to mention about the speaker it's really good every little sound it captures . Noise cancellation was also great. Overall a great purchase within 550₹.

name: UNDEFINED_S_M_S
title: Please don't go for this
content: I don't like this product. Why would a recommended and reputed Company like Boat would produce such a bad product.

name: SK
title: Good
content: Writing review after an year of use... sound quality is good.... only issue i faced is with ear buds... it's quite hard and slippery. I gives pain to ears after a long continuous use, else the ear piece is good in its price range.

name: Shivanshu Siyanwal
title: Go for a better product like headphones but not this.
content: I would suggest not buying this product. Once you lose the so called "ear supports"( I am talking about those hook like things which you can use to fix the earphone in your ears), they keep coming out of your ears. I think they designed it like that in the first place so that we eventually will lose it and buy it again. Plus after several months of use it has stopped working on one side. It's a waste of money, to be honest.

name: Sanjeev
title: Don't go for it if buying to use during workouts/running/cycling
content: Product is good only for desk/indoor usage. In case you are buying to use during your workouts, this is NOT AT ALL SUITABLE. Ear buds are heavy and keep falling out. Also, there is no refund/return option available for this product, you can only replace in case of any defects. So beware before you pick this one.. For indoor usage, build quality and performance is good enough.

name: Ganesh
title: Don't buy
content: Plz don't buy. I am writing this after using for 5 months. The two got damaged and for the warranty boat is not responding at all 😡😠

name: Jayaganesh S
title: Though the bass sound is great, it is not comfortably sitting into the ear ...
content: Not met my expectation. Though the bass sound is great, it is not comfortably sitting into the ear canal without the spounge cap. The spounge cap totally blocks the outside noise - it is good for listening music; but I find it difficult to take up official calls by keeping the cap on the earphones, as it doesn't allow you to hear outside noise, you are unable to control your voice decibal and keep it minimal while attending calls.

name: Prakash K R
title: Heavy, not comfortable
content: Head of heavy. Cannot fit to ear, since it is heavy, it falls every five minutes.. Not comfortable.. Wire is good, but music quality & comfortability is not upto the mark.. I prefer JBL ch 50 than this.

name: Ace
title: Mic gets spoiled after 2 weeks of use.
content: I bought 1 couple of months ago. Mic stopped working withing a week but the sound quality was good. I thought why not buy another one maybe this one will work perfect. And what do u know The second also face the same problem.. Buy it for the sound quality it's good. Mic gets ruin within few weeks.

name: Avinash s
title: Complaint
content: Everythings good, except the fact that one of the in-ear is not working just after 3months. Is there a warranty or guarantee on this thing??

name: ANUSH
title: Not much of a long drive.
content: It's heavy good that is metal casing good sound the bass is good. For the price bracket it meets the expectations no doubt. Durability? Nope doesn't even pass a month and my left side stopped working. Just when I was expecting a long life it fell.. Good work boat but work on d quality of the electronics more.

name: Tanvi Rainak
title: Good but...
content: It's good like sound quality, bass quality and noise is good but it's only been 2 months since I bought it and the left side has already stop working I used it so carefully still it happened one side suddenly stop working when I was using it and the same thing happened with my friend too

name: Tarun Royal
title: Amazing earphones for this price.
content: Bass is amazing. Noise cancellation is not so good. The material is strong. Sound is very good. Suitable for audiophiles who are not willing to pay 1000's of rupees. No cracking of sound at high volume. Finally i would recommend it. If you are able to afford 200 more go for sennheiser cx 180 but it doesn't have mic. So, this is the best pick.

name: Ajo Varghese
title: Good headset, worth bucks.
content: Sound quality is great. Don't do much about noise cancellation. Bass quality is not that great but OK. Overall, product is worth with pricing.

name: Priya
title: Cannot register on boat site...Not as per expectations in this price range
content: Not able to register on boat site !!!!!!Sound quality is good.. External noise cancellation.. Ear plugs are not that good...I tried all different ones finally selected one of them still it slips from ear ..No sound control button ....

name: Riyanka
title: Best in this price
content: I am using this earphones from last 2years and I really use them very roughly.. they are still intact and best at this price range.. now gifted it to my sister, she also loved them

name: Aniket Purkayastha
title: Sound quality is good but the fit is absolutely poor.
content: I recommended you do not buy this earphone. The audio jack is not of the standard size and keeps coming off again and again. The L shaped jacked has proved to be more of a problem. Don't buy because i regret after buying this.

name: vinit kumar
title: Need to improve the design
content: Sound quality is good and bass is also good. Doesn't pain even if you use them for hours. The only issue is with the design. They slip from ears with head movements. Boat can improve the design and make it like mi earhones that is of 599. It fits perfectly

name: Sushant
title: Best Sound and Clarity
content: All Boat products we have used, exceed expectations This one has clear excellent sound and built quality.. Loud and compatible with all phones.. Comes different size ear buds and one can use as per requirement.. Ordered another two.

name: Victor
title: Practical use difficulties
content: Don't buy this product..this review is not about sound quality. This headphone has more weight in the centre point so most of the time it will fell down from ear. 3.5mm Jack won't get recognise in phone after few months. Mic is not working most of the time in different 3.5 mm Jack position..

name: Deep Biswas
title: For The Bassheads only.
content: It's for baaasssss. If you are a bass lover unlike me then go blindly for it. Sound is so loud too. But there is some lack in vocals or mids. If you want balanced sound then it's not for you. And looks much premium and durable.

name: Sravanti
title: Didn't like much. Sound is good
content: Didn't like much. Sound is good. However, these don't sit in ears well. Bass is not great. Sound One E10 earphones are the best for bass lovers. I purchased those for 599/-. They work better than sony and sennheiser.

name: Shubham Shaswat
title: Don't take Reviews Seriously
content: Please don't buy this product.If you want a less expensive earphones buy boat 100 but do not buy this,you will get any improvement from the former. The sound is terribly loud and the built quality is similar to the earphones that you see people selling in the trains.Do not take these reviews seriously !!!!. I can't save myself but you can ,DON'T BUY!!!!!

name: Koushik Kar
title: Good but heavy for ears
content: Sound quality is good. But the earbuds are heavy as it is made of metal. So quite uncomfortable for ears. It feels like something is there in your ear always. Due to heaviness does not fits to my ear properly.

name: s kavil kumar
title: disappointing
content: not worth for money,my frds suggest this headset,i love bass but this headset not that much bass,his extra buds not fix in the headset,i buy to hear the song but his sound quality not good,now i use this headset only speaking.

name: Pavan Kumar
title: Except the above sound is good.
content: Ear buds are little to ear, until these ears buds are attached with its ear hook, else these ear buds are falling off. This is disappointing.. Except the above sound is good.

name: Nitin Hajela
title: Boat basshead
content: Glad I bought this product. I have high regards for this brand and this product too lived to my expectations. I am a frequent user and I’m loving the experience

name: Amazon Customer
title: Falls with a blink of eye
content: Never go for this product it keeps falling earbuds are really heavy and not at all comfortable. Sound quality etc doesn't even matter when the earbuds don't even stay in your ear

name: Roshan Samuel Raja
title: Average, with wierd bass
content: This earphone on prolonged use, hurts your ear because of the extensive bass it has. The bass is good, but it is not a properly clear bass sound. It just muffles the sound and increases the bass, making it completely inaudible of the high frequency songs.. Other than that, it is durable as hell.

name: Jayanta Barman
title: Awesome build quality and bass
content: I used about 4 month. There is no issue about this product no colour fade. Best product at this price range... I'm reading some reviews and says it's doesn't fit in ear properly but I haven no issue about this... It fitted well. Just make sure ur air tight is in proper size. Best part of this product is build quality as well as sound quality.

name: Queeny Lazarus
title: One side of Earphone stopped working in just 3 months
content: It just stopped working in 3 months .. not worth buying this product . really bad experience in Amazon .. I have just bought this on 23 June 2020 and one side of the earphone just stopped working although it has 1 yr warranty but not worth the price .. really bad experience..😑😑

name: Sarvesh Sharma
title: Defective product was received first but was easily replaced. The earphones are astonishing
content: Defective product was received first but was easily replaced.. The earphones are astonishing. High bass, clear and rich voice and fits well. The wire is also of good quality, it's tangle free and looks classic.. The only con is that the ear pieces are a little heavy.. But all over, at this price, it's gold.

name: Ajith
title: Excellent one at low price but more bulky
content: everything is okay and meeting expectation all except the size. its really bulky and don't be comfortable for smaller ears.

name: A.Narasimha varma
title: Impressive
content: Good quality but wight of ear phone is bit heavier as a result it slips out of the ear easily and this can be overcome only by using ear grips given with these pack.excpet this it is a wonderful product

name: Amazon Customer
title: The quality of the earphone is really good. Pros
content: The quality of the earphone is really good.. Pros:. Bass quality awsome.. Tangle free wire.. Build quality is really good.. Cons:. It does come out of the ear because of its design fault as it heavier outside.. Noise cancellation is not so gd but you cannot complaing because of the price in which you are getting this product.

name: dileep r.
title: Pathetic mic
content: It's a good product for the sound and bass but worst in case of the mic .. It's been 3 months already mic isn't working at all.. Go for a better product it's totally unworthy.

name: Adarsh Hatwar
title: Easily the best earphones ever at this price
content: Easily the best earphones ever at this price. Comes with a lot of earbuds alternatives bundled inside the package for different ear sizes.. The bass is just mind blowing and sound is crisp and clear. No doubt that BOAT are stepping up the game on this one

name: A Loyal Amazon Customer
title: Must have Headphone for a true Music lover.
content: I love this iconic headphone as it's the true combination of excellent sound quality with premium build & awesome bass. Regret for returning this to buy Realms Buds 2.

name: Ganesh
title: After 3 years..
content: It is still working beautifully! Sound quality & bass are good. But best thing about the product is tangle free "FLAT" cords which increases its durability to totally another level. Absolutely no damages yet & still working like a charm.

name: Aaryana
title: Cool and best earphone in this range
content: Great product awesome sound quality dont think about this product you can go for it. But low quality sound like 128kbps will not provide best sound effect but around 320kbps it just awesome

name: kundan lal
title: False commitment on warrenty
content: Mic stopped working after few months, despite repeated calls & emails Boat company not replaced this product.. False commitment by Boat

name: Dr Jagdish
title: Poor quality ear buds
content: Cant use it, as the ear buds keep falling from the ears. I have to throw it. waste of buying. I never though that, BoAt can be of poor quality.

name: Lucifer
title: Superbbb!
content: Amazing, Awesome, just go for it. A little bit uncomfortable, because of its big capsule like body ... But Beleive me it will won't dissappoint you, in terms of durability, sound quality, bass, clearity, noise cancelation, you will not get anything better in this price range, that is 500-1000INR.Go for it blindly.

name: KASUNDRA V.
title: It is good in this price range...i advice u to go 4 seinheiser
content: Sound quality is not better than seinheiser but best in this price range..bass quality is normal i think but not balance.oversound is found in this earphones... Treble r too much...i will suggest seinheiser 4 better sound quality and music....i have used cx 180 and boat 225 i like cx 180 more.....

name: Amazon Customer
title: worest product
content: Don't buy this product......I have buy this product in December and now it's February left side speaker is not working...so i call the help line number but there also not connected......so don't buy this product....

name: Amazon Customer
title: Malfunctioning within a month
content: Microphone is malfunctioning. Folks at other end only hear static noise. Waste of money. This is my second boat ear phone. The previous one worked smoothly for more than two years.

name: Anand Kumar singh
title: awesome earphones in this price range
content: awesome earphones in this price range...got in 470 at deewali sale...this earphone for boss lovers...only prblm is that jack is little heavy...boat should work on that... remaining things are awesome....can fight with cx180 in quality....m having both....thanks...

name: Niharika Meher
title: Great sound!
content: Excellent value for money.. Sound quality is excellent.. Bass quality is not that punchy at default equilizer but is far capable... Just tune your equilizer and it produces very strong bass.. Noise cancellation is good enough.. Just go for it you won't regret.

name: Amazon Customer
title: It's working fine now. Sound quality is very good
content: Initially had some glitches, whenever played a song the sound got reduced automatically after few minutes .First i thought it was because of my phone but it was not, finally somehow managed to repair it.It's working fine now. Sound quality is very good.So make sure it is in good condition immediately after buying it.Go for it

name: Siddharth Chakraborty
title: Love it ❤️😍
content: I am not sure about reason but I feel uncomfortable while I use during running or walking or in sleeping posture may be cord is long and earbud designed in a way so sometimes difficult to adjust. The earbud is not fit untill it has ear holder .. btw I gave my review after using it a month

name: DarkSider
title: Very Satisfied
content: Bought On 10th December. Today Almost 3 Months Completed. Working Just Fine. Meeting The Expectations. Also Cable Is Tangle Free. Material Is Durable (Because I'm Kind Of Somewhat A Rough User). Overall Great Product...!!

name: Manoj Choudhary
title: High bass, great noise cancellation, worthy.
content: Bass-good,. Noise cancellation-great,. Sound quality- nice,. But it's weight is not comfortable for initial days, earbuds comes out due to high weight. After some days you will be in comfort with earphone.. Buy it for high bass at this price.. Star rating - * * * *

name: Archit Mishra
title: Excellent product
content: Excellent bass and buid quality.. Only problem everytime you will get a heavy bass infact while watching movies so sometimes treble is more important to listen anything rather then bass. Some controls should be there to adjust it. Rest fine

name: ravikumar d
title: Ear phone cups are not good
content: Sound quality is fine. Most annoying thing about these ear phones is "Ear cups" . material of the ear cups is is not good. they won't stay in the ear. I tried all sizes that comes with the product but i ended up in vain.

name: Swathi
title: One side not working
content: Bass was good but its been only 1month that i bought this but one side was not working. And still replacement has not reached me.. They said it is couriers fault.. But at the end of the day it was me who is without earphones and any proper response

name: Dream
title: I want Replacement
content: After receiving my item... It's been only 10 days I m having problem with 3.5mm jack is not working ...i want to replacement for this. And I received green buds for orange headphone I thought just buds are changed but I got defective product

name: Sukhram Shakya
title: It's amazing
content: Wonderful earphone in this price range,. More than expected,. Awesome BASS,. Build quality is great,. tangle free,. All-over experience is great.

name: Priyam
title: Its okay in this price range
content: This is the first Boat earphone that I bought having used Sennheiser and JBL earlier. You can definitely go for it if you didn't mind the sound clarity too much. The bass is too much and the playback singer voice seems to be a little overpowered by the bass and music.

name: Chintu
title: Okay but better options are available at the same price !!
content: Have been using for about a month now.. Pros:. 1. Stylish. 2. Good bass. Cons:. 1. Very Heavy and keeps coming out of the ears coz of the weight.. 2. Mic isn't good. Always gives a buzzing sound to the receivers.

name: Naresh Kohli
title: Somewhat satisfied but better go for jbl in this range.
content: I order the blue one.The bass quality is amazing but one of its earpieces, stopped working just after the regular use of 1 month. And was replaced with 15 days but now i got the black one and it too have some minor defects.

name: Sachin Antony
title: Terrible.
content: Mic stopped working after 7 months .. Got it replaced from boat website.. But an annoying sound is produced during call. So the replaced one is unusable . Boat is cheating customers . Their product will stop working after warranty period is over . I will never buy any product from boat in future.. They are crap.

name: Viplove Khushalani
title: Good sound quality but less comfy
content: Pros -. Sound quality is good. Bass is manageable. Noise cancellation is good. Stylish. Cons -. Little Big in size on ear plugs. Not much comfortable to plug ( sometimes it pain after long plug in )

name: sahil bansal
title: Build quality is good of the earphones but
content: Build quality is good of the earphones but...the difficulty starts when you plugged this earphones into your ear...they don't fit into your ear..and everytime if you move your head a little bit...these earphones comes out from your ear...so it's very annoying...I don't like it...so only buy if you have long ear... otherwise it's waste of money..

name: ASHWANI KUMAR
title: Fitment in ear is not gud
content: Sound quality is very gud.. There is one biggest problem in all boat's ear phone is... It is not properly fit in ears... 99% earphone are not properly fir in the ear.... Samsung and other earphone are better fiting techniq...

name: Shubham khulve
title: Initially good but not a long time working product.
content: I've purchased this earphone for 499. Initially the bass and sound was superb. It gives a crystal clear sound along with superb bass. But after two weeks it started creating disturbed sound along with uneven bass. You can't hear music on this earphone continuously for more than 30 minutes after 12-15 days. It means that drums build quality is not good. And due to its heavy weight it falls down from your ear, so you have to adjust it continuously. I prefer portronics instead of boat which have better earphones in lower price. Hope this review helps you.

name: Shakshi M.
title: Best budget earphones
content: I bought this product for the second time because I love the quality. Only good product in this range which provides a guarantee of 1 year. The sound quality, bass, build and durability of the product is commendable.. Must buy.

name: Koushik Das
title: Don't buy this if you want durability.
content: Just after 1year, one side and the mic stopped working. Wow boat. Wire tangling will be a major problem after 1year. I tried to claim warranty but it was rejected because the problem arose after a year.. Its durability is 1year. Other than this the pros are nice sound quality and bass quality.

name: Arjun
title: Noise cancelling very good..
content: Noise cancelling is ultimate.. but as per boat said bass quality not upto mark. I Used top brands earphones like JBL t150 ,t110, JBL sx, Sennheiser 225,180, it not satisfied this range..

name: Ravat utsav
title: VFM
content: Very Good Earphones From boat especially in this price range. Value For Money Product. Must Buy Product For Bass Lover Like Me.👍

name: Jitender
title: Nice product
content: This gives the nice sound quality. But you cannot wear it while working out. But if you are fond of music and don't want to spend a load of money, so this is the product you should go for.

name: Kingrock
title: Decent earphones!
content: I read the reviews and went ahead and purchased these earphones. All of it is true. The sound and bass is good. However the ear piece is so heavy, it keeps falling off. Cannot use it for a jog or exercise. It is good for hands free phone conversations

name: kamal Raj Joshi
title: Disappointed with the quality life of product
content: This earphone get wrong even with in a year, then I returned back to the seller though I get it replaced very easily. The another replied product again get damaged within 5 months period. I don't know what to say to boat such a good brand by name and getting product like this totally disappointed .

name: Tushar
title: Peace!
content: One side of the pair seems to stop working after a year or so. It happened to me as well as to my friend. Mine was in warranty period, so they got replaced pretty easily!. If you are looking for noise cancellation then these are not built for that!. At the end I liked them alot!

name: Sanju
title: Waste of money
content: Bought the product on 18-August and it went bad before even 30days of puchase and their is no return as well, complete waste of quality and money.Very disappointed . Boat's other model which was around 300/- approx worked at-least for one year plus.Not expected from the brand.

name: Griffith
title: Good for music
content: Good for listening to music only. During phone calls, there’s too much of background noise and the caller cannot hear my voice properly at all. Go for this only if you intend to listen to music and not for phone calls

name: Amazon Customer
title: Ear piece are heavy so slips off
content: It does not fits perfectly in ears , due to its weight it slpis off the ear.. The ear piece supporter provided with it also not remains in its position and it is not so comfortable also.

name: Chithra
title: Good for gaming
content: Excellent product with very deep base and sound.... only problem I faced is that it was falling when running or doing work but that can be solved with the help of the ear piece we get in the box itself... good product at this price range.

name: Aditya
title: Good headphones for the price and water resistant
content: Very good headphones at this price range. Sound doesn't get distorted at high volume. Since the outer casing is made of metal the buds tend to fall out of the ear especially while walking.. And these earphones are water resistant (tested in washing machine) and still in perfect working condition both earphone and mic.

title: Low quality product
content: One side Hear phone is not working within a month even after 12 month warranty given at amazon. There is not any information provided at amazon for replacement or refund

name: Amazon Customer
title: Value for Money!!
content: These Earphones as the name describes are indead for Bassheads. These have Ample Bass but it tends to leak into the Mids and ruin them, Thr highs are just....... Nonexistent, but still I am indeed spoiled by my AKGY50. These Give you a bang for your buck

name: Amazon Customer
title: speaker in
content: In this headset earbuds are in small cloth(at speaker above) was not fit properly and the change of earbuds is not fit immediately this take some much time and not fitted in ears .

name: Jay Acharekar
title: Product is OK but customer sercive doesn't exist
content: Right bud of the earphone stopped working in 3 months. Called their customer service several times and kept holding for long. The automated response says that my number is recorded and I will be contacted by their customer service team. Ita been months now and there is no response yet.

name: Manjunath.SM
title: Awesome 👍go with it. 💛
content: I already have two more boat products. The sound quality is amazing. 😍👍🤩 and bass is high and noise cancellation is also easy. And u can also buy these product "boat heads 225" Earphones 🎧are very stylish and metallic finishing, super base sound quality ❤

name: DHRUBA CHAKRABORTY
title: BEST SOUND QUALITY , NOISE CANCELLATION ,WITH GOOD WARRANTY SERVICE
content: I PURCHASED IT AROUND TWO MONTHS , AND I GOT BEST SOUND QUALITY AND BEST BUILD QUALITY WITH BEST WARRANTY SERVICE . YOU CAN DEFINITELY PURCHASED IT.

name: Naveen Kumar Gandla
title: Why bolt bash heads 225 is an average product
content: The product build quality is good...but it is not comfortable to use .... It does not for in ears well.... Sound quality is average .... The bass has affected the sound quality.. The long wire makes us feel irritated while sitting on sofa or while sleeping on bed..... The sound range is good ... This is for the people who love loud music .... Overall this is an average product under this price

name: Chitraksh Singh
title: Please !!!!! DONT !!!!! Buy this Product
content: Firstly they are too heavy and falls every time from ears. And after using for 2 months one of the earpiece got defect and was giving a very low sound. Which no one likes. So i want you to suggest Not to buy this Product.

name: Akash A.
content: 𝔾𝕠𝕠𝕕 𝕡𝕣𝕠𝕕𝕦𝕔𝕥 𝕦𝕤𝕚𝕟𝕘 𝕤𝕚𝕟𝕔𝕖 6 𝕞𝕠𝕟𝕥𝕙 𝕓𝕦𝕥 𝕟𝕠𝕨 𝕤𝕠𝕞𝕖 𝕝𝕚𝕥𝕥𝕝𝕖 𝕔𝕣𝕒𝕔𝕜 𝕤𝕠𝕦𝕟𝕕 𝕡𝕣𝕠𝕓𝕝𝕖𝕞 𝕠𝕔𝕔𝕖𝕣𝕚𝕟𝕘 ,𝕤𝕠 𝕪𝕠𝕦 𝕥𝕙𝕚𝕟𝕜 𝕥𝕠 𝕓𝕦𝕪 🅾︎🅺︎. 🅿︎🆁︎🅾︎🅳︎🆄︎🅲︎🆃︎

name: Champak Patel
title: GO FOR IT.... DON'T BELIEVE IN NEGETIVITY SPREAD FOR THIS MODEL
content: This Bassheads are my 4th Boat Product. And i'd never got disappoinment for this products. At this price boat products are best and 1 year warranty...Generally this kind of accessories does't have year long life if using them daily for 3-4 hours. other brands doesn't give this warranty and build quality. Buy it...

name: Aadit Agarwal
title: At your own risk!!
content: The headphones have an amazing sound quality and decent purchase for their pricing. But the defect is that they have an issue with their design. The earbuds are long and oddly shaped making them uncomfortable and also these keep coming off the ears more than often in the beginning couple of days. I am writing this review after 1 month of use and they now feel very comfortable and have no issues and the sound quality is redemption for everything else?

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not value for money.
content: I purchased the product,but seems like chinese one.Sound quality is not so good.As a user of JBL ,tried new on which was from BOAT,quality is not upto the mark.When u mute something the earphone creates automatic low pitch sound, outdated technology.I suggest not to buy any product of BOAT.

name: iamab77
title: Supper BOOM Bass
content: Suppper BOOM Bass.. Previously was JBL fan bit after using this ... just mind blowing sound.. Durability was the main issues in JBL but here this is quite strong and tangle free too .. Sound quality is just BAPOK

name: Capt GS
title: Worst product dont buy
content: Worst buy. Got screwed up. One side stopped working in few days. No one rovides warranty for online buy. Better buy from shop. I bought SKULLCANDY and its working great.

name: koshal
title: Go for it music lovers
content: Awesome sound quality.. deep bass... Fully satisfied... Only one problem is that these earphones don't stuck in the ears without the holder given with the package.. overall awesome product in the range of 550-600.

name: Ritesh
title: Don't trust boat warranty is very bad don't trust it plz dont
content: Sucks it stopped working in 3 months I have tried so many times I have download the PDF from. Very website an boat says it's not valid bc look at the bill I have brought the product an it is faulty every time I log a complaint reply is invoice is in valid fxxkers I have not made the bill I have got it from Amazon I have the bill that comes WID the box as well but no nothing works. I k keep to give no 🌟 but m forced to

name: K.K.Gautam
title: Bad sound and Mic quality
content: I bought this earphone by keeping this item title in my mind , but when I received and used first time, it start increasing sound automatically and open Google Ok, Mic is not working at all. I checked with two phone, same problem.. It's doesn't meet even ordinary earphone.

name: The_lone_wolf
title: Great for bass lovers and not suitable for sports activities
content: The sound quality gets better after one week of usage....pretty good earphone at this price range...the only downside is....it don't have a angular ear buds....not suitable for sports... although they gave a earbuds tips...still not suitable for sports activities.

name: Ashok Advani
title: Worst earphones ever
content: sound quality is ok.. dosent fit in ear properly and it hurts the ear while you wear it.. it feels so heavy when you wear it.. better options is Sennheiser or sony earphones

name: Naresh
title: Poor microphone
content: If you are looking for a good earphone with good sound quality, you've got it.. But if you are more in speaking using the mic, then this should not be your choice.
