The mic is poor, Everytime you have to repeat to make sure the other person talks. If you're not interested in talking then you can choose this.

name: SUMANTH BEPPURANA
title: Not durable
content: It is not durable. Maximum durability is 6 to 7 months. Cheap but not a reliable product

name: Md shoaib
title: Fair enough
content: I have been using this earphone for a couple of months now. It is a great earphone with good sound quality and bass.. The negative point about this earphone is its fitting, it doesn't fit properly in ears and always comes out and furthermore your ears will hurt if you use it for a prolong time.

name: Vishal Raju Murthy
title: Worth for the price segment !!
content: I'm been using the earphones for a month now n for the price segment the product is worth buying, the bass is gud for a normal use n even though the ear piece some time slip out cus of the metallic finish n ter r some extra accessories given as a solution too, happy with the product ^^

name: SAJESH P
title: Not made for exact sitting position in 👂.
content: Product delivery :9/10. Material Quality: 7/10. Sound Quality: 8/10. Above 2points it's value for money.. ***👂 Plug Position: 2/10. Since ear piece is little extended in back side, it's not sitting properly in position. It's coming out of the ear while listening to music in sitting position itself.

name: Pavan G
title: Too much bass. No sound clarity.
content: Only bass. Too much bass. No sound clarity. If you want to listen or watch action or beat songs then go for this. Or else go for JBL or Sennheiser for good sound clarity along with decent bass.

name: Gerard Thomas
title: Bad sound quality
content: I've used JBL and Sennheiser only in the past and this bOat headphone has badly balanced sound comparatively. Too much of bass drounds the other frequencies and am not able to even adjust it with the equaliser . Not suitable for music at all. Can't even return it as it shipped with replacement policy!!!

name: Kirankumar Shahadeo Dhakane
title: Satisfied with this product
content: Sound quality and product quality both are good. Boat support is also good they gave me replacement in warranty

name: Suryakanth raju
title: Real Bass head for music heads
content: Awesome sounds amazing 🔊 plays pure music this is second Bass head 225 along with my an year old 180 Bass head Boat is great really impressed 👍

name: Kantesh Das
title: Best head phone u can buy 😊😊
content: Best head phone i have used till date.. I have purchased this product 2 time i didn't search for other it was best for rough daily usage and sound clarity is just awesome.. Just one problem i have faced is noise cancellation is not so great.

name: Santhosh kumar
title: Less comfort while traveling or walking
content: The problem is that the base end is little heavier so it finds difficult to fit in the ear.. Comfort level is poor. While selecting a headset the first priority is for comfort. Here it fails.. Else everything is good.

name: Dexter Fernandes
title: Heavy in weight, pops out of ear, bud stays in ear
content: Really not great headphones.The buds that came with it are bad too. Infact the headphones are too heavy for the buds. Many times bud stays in my ear and earphone pops out. Its very frustrating. Im using another pair of buds now.

name: Yash Pandey
title: Just go for it.👍
content: I've been using these earphones for 2 years (they were not so famous back then). I have used all the other competitors in the price segment but no one could beat these except Sennheiser in terms of sound quality. I accidently damaged the buds. Just be carefull with the earbuds and you're good to go!

name: sandeep sharma
title: Good product... I'm specially thankful to Amazon, great a very cooperative customer service 😘😘
content: Good product, 1st day it was creating a little problem, but now it's working amazing, I'm very happy with this product....and specially a very great service by Amazon and their customer service, I'm very thankful to them for such a cooperative and for great service....😘😘😘😘😘😘

name: RM
title: IT IS GOOD IF YOU WANT TO DO WEIGHTLIFTING WITH YOUR EARS
content: Very bulky. IT IS GOOD IF YOU WANT TO DO WEIGHTLIFTING WITH YOUR EARS. BUDS are OF Metal. Cant take for a walk. if you're a wrestler this stuff is for you. Sound quality is fine.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Sound system is good but give much bass effects than the required
content: Sound system is good but give much bass effects than the required. The earbuds will not fit comfortably. But the company has provided extra four pairs for earbuds with different sizes ...so u can change according to ur requirements.

name: Venkatesh Deo
title: Good with more weight
content: These headphones are good and has the best bass, best sound quality and best in everything. But the heads are somewhat heavy in weight.

name: Subrata Chakrabarty
title: Good buy for short duration
content: Bought this product in Apr 2018. Using it since 6 months. At this price, the sound quality and material quality is pretty good. It's good for listening any genre of music. Having said that, it's durability is in question. I think the wiring is not stable. Left or right phone will go off after certain period. Happened with me twice. So, my advise is go for something on the higher end, if u have +1 year of usage in mind.

name: Rohit Mishra
title: It's worth it
content: Especially the "L" shaped gold plated 3.5mm jack which helps it to be long lasting rather than wear out soon like normal "I" shaped jack. People using phones while on bed can relate that this part of jack always seems to start tearing as soon as you start using the earphones.

name: Chandra Mohan
title: Good but it doesn't sittings properly on ears.
content: I have changed all the ear buds rubber which is given along with the product. But still it fit ears properly. All the time come out from ears itself. Needs to be improve...

name: Subhransu Sekhar
title: Great overall experience
content: The output is great. As usual it's bass heavy and great value for money for bass lovers.. Positives-Great Sound, Enriching Bass, Good wire quality.. Negatives- Slightly heavy earpieces that tend to fall off and the colour of particularly the 'neon' one isn't neon at all, it's yellow.

name: Bhanu Teja
title: Great value.. Use a gud equalizer to get the best of this..
content: Sound quality is clear enough.. Has enough bass boost compared to mi basics.. Quality is good.. But using the earpiece without the included hook is not possible.. Always fall out the ear.. Good thry included the ear hooks.. If u have a decent dac or good equalizer installed (i use viper4android) u can extract the best out of these..

name: Aabid Hasan
title: Product is good but the colour become dusty after 3-4 month use
content: Bass and sound quality is amazing but the noise cancellation is midium and this lime colour become bad I mean dust full after some days or rough use.. Black ,blue or green is best for colour. But qst time I fall in love with this lime colour...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good
content: Good product just one thing I did't like much earbuds are bit heavy but it can be neglected by considering quality of it. It worked well for me on laptop as well as on mobile

name: Naagadara Narsimulu
title: I want replace of the product boat bassheads 225
content: I bought these earphones on Jan, 9 months it worked properly now it's October one side is not working but Amazon gave 1 year warrenty , facing problems with boat bassheads 225 .I want exchange or replace anything of the product but I want something to be done . Thankyou

name: Nirmalya Biswas
title: Good with a few cons
content: Everything is okay about the product, but the biggest con in it is the fact that it keeps falling out from the ears very often.

name: DJ
title: Not good.
content: Not good.

name: Himanshu_Paliwal
title: Value for money. Nice earphones
content: Posting review after 2 months of use.. As mentioned it is not tangle free.. But yes. Cable is very durable and stylish.. Bought it for 599 in offer period.

name: Ramavtar Meghwal
title: Music for Nirvana
content: The moment it was delivered I found it amazing as early delivery than expected. I opened the package and music playing started soon I realized what a nice piece of earphone I just purchased.. "Nirvana" is printed on earphone that makes it really feeling the moment and nerve of music sound bass rhythm.. Best one. Giving 5 star

name: JADEJA SATYADEVSINH
title: Must buy...
content: Good Product but not very good.also value for money, quality is very good, look is very good and performance is good..

name: Sharada Prasad Das
title: Poor
content: It's an below average product. I've used it for 2 years. Suddenly It's speaker ( right one) stopped working. After one year of use its useless. I had faced the mic issue many times. Using this earphone during a phone call is like disaster. Paying 599/- for such product is completely waste of money. I won't recommend anyone to purchase this product.

name: Swastik Roy
title: Could be better...
content: Bass is not that great but it works....for good base you should go for the JBL one because it has great base and I am owing that because after 1 year of usage left ear piece is not working...

name: Rahul Tapariya
title: Irritating static sound despite good sound quality
content: It's sound quality is good. The real issue is a static sound produced during team meetings which irritates the other people present on call. Due to this, I am discontinuing use of this product and will not recommend to anyone.

name: Aman Rafi
title: Boat Family!
content: Now I have a lot of boat products. Such a Value for money products....... The earphones is a dope. Nice bass,highs,...loved it. You need a good phone to unleash the true power of these headphones. I have Rockerzz which is very powerful in bass.. Love you Boat.

name: Nishant Bhardwaj
title: PATHETIC SOUND QUALITY, UNCOMFORTABLE TO EARS AND JUST EXTRA BASS.
content: I am literally wondering how did this product managed to get so many positive reviews, it has nothing beside extra base with no sound clarity. Extremely uncomfortable to ears. Pathetic, over rated product.

name: Susanne Rodrigues
title: Works well to begin and then gives way
content: Worked well for a couple of months and the gave way. On video calls, I could hear but couldn't speak. The noise cancellation quality decreases over time. No good for train rides.

name: Amazon Customer
title: JJ kalita
content: I liked the bass in this earphones. But sound quality is not pleasant like that of JBL's. Quality of the wire is good. The earplugs are loose and they comes out of the stem easily. Missing the inbuilt track change and voice control in this earphones.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Simply Nice but no warranty
content: Very good finish and sound quality. Ergonomic designed. Looks stronger. Very good at price. But no warranty. As long as your product working enjoy and then through this Chinese item.

name: Kindle Customer
title: Best headphones under 1000
content: I have used a number headphones of same price range. This one is the best, although it's Chinese but sound quality is superb, specially Bass.

name: Marvels
title: Not that good, but fine with this budget
content: Sound quality is good. Build is fine. But many a times they fell down on their own as they are little loose. I went through JBLC100SI and they are the better than this one. JBLT160 are also good and sennheiser CX180 can be an option

name: Sarath Kumar
title: Worst of money please dont buy
content: Bought 2 of them at one go and lost 1100. Pathetic earphone in terms of fitting and sound quality. The earphone makes plastic cover like sound when plugging in our ear. Worst earphone

name: Rezwanul Haque Mondal
title: Good Sound with Fitting Problem
content: Sound quality is good enough. Bass is also fine. The problem is it is not fitting in my ear. It comes off from my ear with even gentle collision. Using the additional part to attach in ear is not much helpful. Can't use in bus- train. Also having trouble while lying on bed.

name: Amazon Customer
title: REALLY GOOD HEADPHONE UNDER 500
content: BOAT IS A GOOD COMPANY AND THIS HEADPHONE IS ONE OF THE BEST OPTION UNDER 500 RUPEES. SOUND QUALITY IS AWESOME, LOOKS IS ALSO GREAT AND THE FLAT WIRES DOESNT ENTANGLE. SO SIMPLY GREAT.

name: David Vaz
title: Mic does not last beyond a year
content: The sound and build quality of the speakers are good. The mic is poor quality and stopped working completely just after a year. Boat refused to replace it. The jack too is not good quality and due to this there is disturbance after a few months .

name: Jitul Nath
title: Great... But..
content: This is the best earphone anyone can buy around Rs.500. The overall sound quality is good, bass is there. There is not much distortion at higher volume. Manufacturing quality is also very good. The flat cables are really great. But there is one little issue that I found, it does not fit in my ears. Tried the smallest ear plug/cap thingy but still it slips out of my ears. I also tried to use the pointy rubber piece. Though it helped to keep the earphone in place, it started to hurt my ear after few minutes. If Boat improves this small design flaw, then it is worth 5 stars easily.

name: Inderpreet
title: Great product at this price range!
content: Writing this after 4 months of using the product.. It was my first Amazon purchase. Glad that it turned out to be a good product. Nice bass and sound quality. Loved the blue colour! Stylish metallic design. Feels quite durable. Flat wires are great.

name: iamasim
title: too heavy earphones dont buy
content: if you are buying a earphone under 600 don't buy this boat 225.. buy real me or mi basics.. i had a worst experience with these boat earphones... too heavy earphones

name: Amazon Customer
title: The best!
content: The best earphone in it's category! And I have tried many- JBL, Skullcandy, Sony, you name it. The bass is crazy good and colors are super cool. I'm in love with them. 4 stars because they keep slipping out of my ears. But they have given multiple earbuds- different types and sizes. I just need to find the perfect one I guess.

name: Abdul Rahman
title: Good...
content: Amazing for this price amount. Heavy for some people. Would not fit In ear. But I don't feel any problem. Nice product though. But after some days of use I feel difference in sound quality. But thats not bothering me..but choose wisely based on ur need

name: Rushi Vyas
title: Grab it
content: Sound is clear, bass and trebel are perfectly balanced. Build quality is good. But as speakers are somewhat heavy it comes out of ear this can be partially solved with clips but it's not good for those who use it while jogging. It will be very good product for all normal user. I have used JBL earphones and I can say that this earphones are slightly better in terms of sound quality.

name: Biju
title: Cable not good.
content: Product is medium quality. Not much voice cancellation. Earphone will fall off from ear. One of the ear phones stoped working after few months.

name: prabhanshu maurya
title: Go for other better options.
content: Looks are superb, sound quality so so. Wire quality is good. Doesn't entangle. It doesn't fits to the ear. Comes out often. Fitting design needs to be improved.

name: Sujay U N
title: Best Budget Branded Headphone
content: I really recommend this head phone only for all ppl who are need one.. Bcoz. 1) It is designed to fit into hear properly and even if we wear for long, we wont get hear pain and we wont feel anything.. 2) The metel design makes it more durable and grids given on it gives strong grip to hold.. 3) Flat cable is designed to make it more sturdy. 4) Neon Color is my fav

name: Ankur Shah
title: The earphones are very good for the price. Great support
content: I would like to add that after almost using the earphones for 9-10 months, one side stopped working. I contacted the customer care, they took back the earphones and replaced with another one. It has been 6-7 more months from that time. The earphones are working fine

name: Pulkit
title: Poor service
content: Suddenly mic and right side stopped working and it's under warranty and I have put complaint on their website they provide me a ticket no it has been 4 days no and it's still showing pending they service are very poor I will not recommend to buy to any one and I will not buy any product in future bass is good of this earphone.

name: Atif
title: Mic is bad
content: Good earphone, bass is bit high. Mic is not good you have to keep your mic as close as you can to your mouth for clear voice.

name: Mithun
title: Good but too much Bass
content: It's really good but why boat or others are so focused over Bass...I really don't get it.....there should be balance..... although a decent but.....has been 6 months and more....still going on good.....

name: Saurav
title: You get value for the Price tag.
content: Its an okay product for the price tag.. Build quality is superior.. Audio quality is okay.. Cable Wires dont get entangled like others.. Only downside is the metal earheads that are too heavy to stay in ears. Which is kind of the main vital functionality of a earphone.

name: Vasupradha
title: Not so good. Disappointed.
content: One of the worsts I would say. Don't get cheated by the number of people who bought this (as shown).. The ear buds are of very poor quality. Instead of giving 6 pairs, they could have given 1 or 2 good quality ear buds.. The sound quality is ok and not as excellent as they claim.. And there is no return policy (only replacement) that adds more worries.

name: cosmic lucky
title: Nice product with quality sound output
content: It is good, I already use Boat Rockerz 600, which is brilliant product. Therefore, ordered this one for other needs. Bass is not very deep but good for average use. Overall a nice product, loved the flat cable.

name: Rocky Patel
title: Very bad
content: Sound quality is very poor compare to brands like JBL, Sony, Philips, Sennheiser etc. Ordinary build quality of cable. Didn't test microphone.

name: Aniket mishra
title: Low price best pair
content: I bought this earphone at 499 on 21 April 2k17 and from that to this day it never failed me to impress me... Every time I plug it into my ear it reminded me of a nice pair of earphone with awesome sound and best noise cancellations system and that too with such a low price.... The only cons it has is that it always come out of my ear on slight disturbance this irritates me a lot but u can't expect everything from such a sweet device

name: Harshit
title: G.O.A.T.  ,  under 500 ! !
content: Almost great, but at this price point best. No doubt about it. I got my first set of these 4 years ago but i broke them a week ago while running, didn't face any problem throughout 4 years and now the new ones arrived. Lets see how long they last.

name: Ravindra Singh
title: Good fit.
content: Good fit..awesome treble to bass balance..very happy with the product..although hoping that it has a longer shelf life than the previous "branded" headphones I threw in the garbage after using it for 5 months..

name: sourav xsp
title: long lasting  super duper built quality
content: buit quality is good made for long lasting. bass avrage hai (feel hota hai kam nhi hai). sound quality is good. plus point mic hai call reciver hai. definetly goo for it. if u wants a long lasting earphone

name: Harpreet kaur
title: Badly designed
content: Not at all recommended. This product is not designed correctly. The wire and the metal body is heavy because of which the earphones pops out of the ear. Earphones need to be pressed deep inside the ear which gives a pain in the ear as well as in the head. Please don't purchase this one.

name: Palas Swarnakar
title: good product from boat
content: Nice ear phone.. and all people know about BOAT products.. but one condition,you can't listen song for long time..you will use only for 1and a half hour maximum ..otherwise your ear can little bit pain..but it also more bass and clear sound quality.. Playing pubg with this ear phone are like you will play pubg on bigger subwoofer.. 🤗🤗

name: ajin kovalam
title: Worst
content: Bass is good... but am going 0 star because always hears background sound... its really terrable... pls dont buy... and ear pains a lot... i buy become of seeing the reviews .. hope the reviews are from the marketing team of boats... 👎👎

name: VISHNU KRANTH
title: Good Quality and Excellent Service
content: The product is strong and sound effects are better than standard headphones. Almost after a year right side ear bud is not working but I claimed for replacement through their official website then the sent me a new one! I appreciate their service. Nice product Just Go for it...

name: Godman
title: Good base average sound very uncomfortable
content: The sound quality is good for the price range, has enhanced base but that comes at the expense of true tone sound clarity. Pros-best headphone in price range I.e below 500. Cons - very uncomfortable, earpiece keeps sliding out,

name: Varun Vijaykumar
title: and I can say I am very satisfied wirh them
content: I bought these earphones around 6 months ago, and I can say I am very satisfied wirh them. The sound quality is great and it is tangle free. I bought this for Rs. 469 and it is well worth it. My only problem is that the left bud keeps falling off. I happened to see another person at the gym who has the same model earphones and I saw that the left earbud was missing, so this seems to be a problem with others too, I presume. But overall, it’s great and well worth the price. Recommended.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Overall best
content: Best sounds quality, no noise problem bass quality is so good... Overall best. Best quality Very nice product If your need earphones then I suggest you must once time purchase this items Very nice products ... Very nice👍

name: Zeel
title: Best earphones
content: This will be the second time i have orders these the old ones lasted for 2 years best brand for budget earphones, speakers in general.

name: umavijay
title: Concentrate Earbuds.
content: Sound & Bass quality is good, only thing that Earbuds is very big size not fix in the Ear, very uncomfortable.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Heavy earbuds keeps falling out of ear
content: Some genious mind made the back of the earbuds metallic. Due to this the earbuds have become very heavy and are constantly falling out of ear leading to a most irritating experience. Sound quality is also average. Too much bass but lacks clarity. Giving it 2 stars because the build quality is good and lots of earbuds have been given in the package.

name: Pranab
title: Take wise decision
content: As a well wisher i say u dont buy this model at all..bass is extremely high which would push u to migrain..n deafness..the chest would feel pain as well as the jack will just slip from phone...u wont be able to keep in pocket due to angled jack...n also the buds are heavy n none of earbuds will fit ur ear. Worst buy just wasted money hope u dont

name: rb
title: Not durable, Earbuds keep coming off, heavy on ear
content: I'm writing review after one year, i had sennheiser cx 180 and i bought this coz it had mic. i wil not compare this bad boat earphone as right side of earphone stopped working within 6 months. I sent to service center and replaced it. even that stopped working within 3 months.. Ear buds keep coming off

name: Shubham Patil
title: Best Premimum earphone go for it.
content: Superb BASS @ 500 RS ITS DOLBY in ur ears hahaha...Best noise cancellation , but sound clarity is just ok. Wire quality is also good design is premium , attractive colors also added and thanx to boat 1 year warranty .

name: Bhavesh Wadkar
title: the best one
content: sound quality and bass quality are the best for this product range. noise cancellation is not that good. have been using this past 2 years and this is the same product i have been using for the second time not for its price range but for it's sound quality

name: Sukripto G.
title: Good buy.
content: It really is a very good product of its price segment. Premium brands would definitely require shelling out almost double the price with the same quality. Very reliable too as i hve been using it for quite a while now and there are no issues as such.

name: Aakash Jalamkar
title: Not Good...
content: What are its cons.... 1. Too heavy (please new buyers check its reviews). 2. Its just about a month and already the jack is not working properly. 3. Ergonomically metal design is worst. I earlier had metal headphones but they never skid and fell off.. Boat Co. failed to design it properly. Pls search for better alternative

name: Suman Biswas
title: Great product and Value for money
content: Using this product for a month now,totally satisfied with it. Only cons I find till date is the locking mechanism with the shirt,little sleepery.Otherwise the sound and noise cancelation is good.. You can go with the product in this price range.

name: Kindle Customer
title: damaged product
content: The right ear bud was not working when i got the the first time. Then I made a complaint for replacement and the ear phones were fine but after 1 month the same issue resurfaced even with the replaced one....I DID'NT EXPECT THIS WITH BOAT PRODUCTS

name: Amazon Customer
title: Durable, Value for money!
content: The product is durable which is best part. However the sound quality is not as good as JBL etc when compared. Also, the speakers are little large and doesn't fit into ears even though different size of buds available with the product.

name: Raghupati
title: Only volume
content: Only volume is good but not quality of the sound, most people get confused due to high volume they feel it has good bass. No sound clarity and capsule design is quite big, looks outside of ears.

name: Pallab Borah
title: Decent but not comfortable
content: Writing review after 7 months of use.... Sound is still good with powerfull bass... i like the way it kicks the music into your ear...but...it had a major problem...it doesn't fits in our ears..its just too big and heavy and constantly falls off.... There is an external ear piece to attach so that you can wear it...but it is very much uncomfortable and after 2 - 3 monts it will fall off as the grip loosens..buy

name: Omkar shigwan
title: Best in class, superb, awesome
content: Under 600Rs best earphones till date, don't trust any others brand if you want heavy bass and volume boat 225 bassheads earphones are best, and best for pubg also but use 3rd party sound equilizing app for decreasing bass, i used ant audio W56, realme buds 2, ptron boom 3 no one can beat boat bassheads 225

name: Gaurang
title: Good sound quality, but ergonomics isn't great
content: Sound quality is great, but the ear plugs doesn't have good grip. You have to press it hard to keep inside ear and then it hurts a bit. If you keep it lose, it'll come out easily.

name: Saurabh
title: Good deal for 550₹.
content: Cable material is of decent quality, does not tangle like regular wires. Also wire is sufficiently long. Audio quality is fair enough for the price it's available for. Bass can be increased with a little tinkering in your Equalizer settings. Fair deal for the 550₹. Its good for calling purpose and listening music if you are not a high bass lover.

name: User
title: Not true for Bassheads tagline.
content: Product not worth money.. It's mentioned bassheads...but the bass is not good quality...it's more of mid tones... JBL earphone around this price are way better in sound reproduction

name: Kiran K M
title: Awesome one
content: Product is extremely good and the wires are tangled free. So it is easy to handle the headphones. The head is made of metal and it is very strong...

name: Ravi Bakraniya
title: And it works just fine. DO NOT USE ON
content: I used with PC & the pin stoped working on 1st one.. I did not get response on customer service.. Because of my budget I purchased same headphone again.. And it works just fine.. DO NOT USE ON PC

name: ASHOK PONNAM
title: I will not suggest for this
content: This earphone is its weight. Due to metal body it weighs more which cause it to fall from ear very often.. Also it is not at all comfortable with any of the ear buds they have given with box.. Very uncomfortable listening to music for long hours,Right Speaker Stopped working after 8 months.. Overall the bad experience

name: Mukesh kumar
title: Duplicate produck
content: Sound and bass is good... But it doesn't fit in the ear perfectly... Even with the another pair of buds.... Due to the weight of the speakers.... And... It worked only for four months. By the way... I didn't receive the original one...

name: RAJU BAI
title: Sound quality and product nice.. boat products are good
content: Very nice product from Boat 225 headset.. I never expected this kind of cost... Sound quality and accessories ear bud. Final packaging box everything Super.. Thanks Amazon's giving valuable cost of that product.

name: Kartik Kukreja
title: Perfect earphones
content: I think it's gonna takeover all another earphones . This is what i can call a perfect earphones . From design to quality this is just lit . I know i am writing review quite later from purchase . Just check the date of purchase in my profile i think its more than 3 years . And its super fine yet .

name: Amazon Customer
title: Much better than expected
content: The premium metal build, the amazing bass, and the quality of the earphones as a whole makes this a bang for your buck. Just trust me.. However, one of the nets (or dust absorber or whatever) that sits inside the earpiece slightly came off within one week..not pretty sure about what it does..but still.. Ill update this later on.

name: Yash
title: Only buy if u need an average experience.
content: Probably Boats have lowered their standards. I purchased the same earphones a year back and they were just awe. Recommended almost more than 10 people to buy same. But now, when I bought them again, the quality is not good. Earphones lack sound clarity. Noise while listening to bass audio. Have exchanged them but still, didnt get a good one. Finally returned back

name: Saroj devi
title: 100% love
content: I am youngster, and believe me, i had never buyed such an awesome earphone.. They are just awesome. I buyed them, when their price was 1000rs, after around 2 years, they are working 100% in all means.

name: Amazon Customer
title: No grip. Heavy
content: Heavy. It's will fall oftenly. No grip due to heavy.. but good sound good bass good quality, but at the connector it got some issues after using 1 year

name: Vishal N.
title: Value for money
content: Value for money product. But earpeace is made of metel because of which it fell down offenly from 👂. For that they provided additional fittings but it is not user-friendly.. Built quality is good and sound clarity,Base are excellent.. Very good product from boAt.

name: kamal A
title: Discomfort in ears
content: No comfort in the ears, when u plug into ears, the air inside of your ear will stuck inside and will give some discomfort, and the actual music is not able to hear properly.. and I am not able to enjoy the music with this issues.

name: Rohit kachi
title: Best earphones of the year
content: Best earphones of the year. I was using Sony earphones i replaced it 3 times in 3 months and it has 1 year warranty and i was angry 3 time already i have wasted time and Agin left earphones didn't working

name: ANMOL HV
title: Complete review
content: This product from boats is yet another amazing product. The sound quality is amazing and the name says it all. Yes it had really good bass and you can acutlly feel the bass. Since the body is made of metal it gives a better sound quality. It had flat cable which even if gets tangled is very easy to untangle. It's durable as far as I have used it. That's all I can say about this product

name: Balaji
title: Good one
content: Everything is good about this headset! The sound clarity.... looks .....all fine except tht it comes out of your ears very often! Which is a bit annoying!

name: Ajay Anil Nair
title: Very Uncomfortable but earphones are Awesome.
content: These Are Extremely Loud, Bass is kinda Thumping but there’s no highs and Mids All you hear is bass unless you do some tuning with your sound equaliser. Headphones are nice at this price point but they are uncomfortable to wear always pops out the ear you can expect most of your time will be killed just to adjust these earphones.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Superb and Marvellous. 200% satisfied
content: Being a music lover I was always in search for an best budget head phones. I have came across boat with tangle free cable and 1 year warranty for headphones worth RS. 500, it sounded very different from others. I Thought to give a try hoping it will last for at least 6 months to an year. To my surprise I am using this till date. Bass sound is awesome. Best performance at this price range.

name: abhilash rai
title: Go for Sennheiser.
content: It's not worth of money. People writing positive review and comparing with sennheiser are just pathetic and trying to be technical. It's Mike is not working properly after few days. Too much noise while talking.

name: sai kishore
title: Okay quality but can't stay in ears due to plugs weight
content: Built is not user friendly, easily drops from ears. . Giving static noise while connected with windows 10 PC.Does minimum job for Skype calls

name: Alapan Bera
title: Very good product
content: This product is very good at noise cancellation and sound quality. The only thing i think to be improved is its earbud quality.Because when you linten to music for a long time, you can feel iching imside ear.I think this happens due to quality of earbud.Everything else is ok.

name: syed muzaffar
title: Super Bass earphone
content: Simply superb, but it's fit in ear only when put a attached ring like Bluetooth to it.. Otherwise it's slip when ever put in ear 👂

name: Abhijit
title: Left speaker not working
content: Very nice packing and I was very happy for a minute but this happiness not last long. Tried using it with my MI Note 4 but only right speaker working, I thought my phone problem so tried with other phone MI prime and there also same problem. I have initiated return and now will buy new one from shop tested on the spot. Anyway Amazon services are good but as a customer I lost time.

name: Pawan
title: Warranty and Replacement
content: Warranty : My earphones stopped working after usage of 10 months .. I just check order details it had one year warranty .I registered product on boat site and then created ticket for replacement , next day they came for pick up and received new piece on 10th day . Fabulous customer services

name: Amazon Customer
title: Heavy
content: Its sound quality is good. Noise cancellation is nice. Only drawback is that due to its heavy weight it keeps dropping from the ears

name: Rahul V.
title: Heavy tuning to bass side which ruins rest of the frequency band.
content: Music quality is very poor. Its tuned to bass side, not slightly but heavily. What this does is wash away the mid range and ruins higher frequency sounds. If you are looking for quality headphones, consider not buying this.

name: Gunnmay
title: Cheap quality 😒
content: Everything is broken. Nothing is good. Wires are also damaged. Quality of product is very cheap.... Not happy with the product 😕. Cheap 😒😒😒😒😒😒😒😒😒😒

name: Ashish Musani
title: Don't buy
content: One side stopped working within 3 months. I raised service request. Earphones were picked up and delivered to service center by courier. After that no update from service center. It's more than a month now since it was delivered.

name: Kumar deepak
title: Faulty design, kadak Sound!
content: BoAt engineers need further training. Though the sound is kadak and deserve appreciation. The biggest drawback of this ear phone is , ear Budds will come out of your ear frequently as they are bit heavy on back side being made of metal. You can't even walk after wearing this ear phone as the ear Budds will fall frequently. So a Big no from my side, if you want to use it along with other activity like cycling, gym, walking.

name: sivamanikanta
title: good but not for gaming
content: this earphones are good for listening to music and watching movies but when i play games this earphones dosent sound good they are irritating

name: Abhishek J.
title: Long lasting
content: Long lasting. - That's what she said. Good quality stuff, worth the extra cost, it covers it up by lasting almost twice as long as the cheap ones.

name: manvi rathore
title: Not comfortable ,zero noise cancellation but having good bass without clear sound
content: These earphones are good bass quality only nothing good in these as noise cancellation is zero almost and not comfortable for using while lying and feels very heavy in years while using

name: Gaurav Samantaray
title: worst
content: Worst product. I bought it after viewing the ratings. But, the first earphone left side stopped working after 10 days of delivery. I got it replaced quickly. But, again the same story with new earphone. Again after 12-14 days this earphone left side stopped working.. Won't recommend this brand at all.

name: Yugal Kishore
title: Worst Service
content: When I ordered it, the price was 500rs , the delay was about 5 days & I did not receive the delivery at all. 2nd time when I ordered this product it was 600rs with the delay of 1 day & it didn't last for even 1 month. The right earphone is not working at all. Very annoying & disappointing delivery I have ever received. Waste of money & time

name: Karan Rajiv Kolwankar
title: these headphones produce good bass, if you love bass these are the ...
content: As the name suggests, these headphones produce good bass, if you love bass these are the ones to go for under a budget. They cant be compared to the more expensive headphones. But for the price they deliver more than expected.. Good build quality. Tangle free cable. One negative point i would point out is that there are no volume control buttons on the cable.. Overall vfm product.

name: Sushil Bisht
title: best budget headphone you can buy at this price range
content: it is the best budget headphone you can buy at this price range. The bass and sound quality is great.the build quality is also good.. I saw that some people were complaining about it not being comfortable on the ear. I personally did not felt it. although during the winters you will do feel chill for a moment when you'll put them on (because of the metal head).

name: Neeraj
title: good product, bit heavy
content: i was using sennheiser cx 180 and was pretty much satisfied.. was looking for in-ear headphones with mic.. sound quality is decent but the earpieces are bit heavy.. tangle-free cable is nice.

name: Mr.Nair
title: Satisfied
content: Good set of earphones at an affordable price. Only issue is that it keeps falling off from the ears due to the wieght of the metal. Product got faulty within 1 yr while in warranty so...Boat inspected and sent me a new set. Works pretty well...only negative is its weight.....

name: Shubham Khandalkar
title: Amazing earphones at really good price
content: Bass: 5/5. Treble: 4/5. Tangle free wire: 4/5. Earbuds were little slippery for me but I had extra pairs from old earphones.. At this price you are getting a really good deal.. Bought on 13-July-2017, I will update when they stop working or start having issues.. If you are reading this then they are working perfectly awesome till date.

name: Sagar
title: Not satisfied
content: Somehow i donot like the quality, robustness of this product. The first purchase broke in one use. The rubber of the replaced product also came out in 7days of use. But thanks to amazon on quick delivery and replacement in time

name: O P Khadka
title: Awesome bass and built quality
content: Awesome bass and built quality. But there is a defect in the earphone. Whenever I play music or video on any mobile and connect this earphone, the volume suddenly reaches to the top. It's very annoying.

name: Vipin
title: sound is good but keeps coming out
content: Sound quality is ok, it has good bass but it compromises on quality a little bit. There is one problem that I am facing. The ear plugs are heavy and long, so they keep coming out of your ear all the time. build quality is good.

name: Hari
title: Sound quality decreased after 2 weeks
content: I don't know why, its bass quality decreased after 2 weeks of usage. I only use 1-2 hour a day. And one important thing is it is not comfortable to our ears. I think it is a fake product (China).

name: Sk. Mustafeedh Ahmed
title: Boat Bassheads 225.Great Bass At Cheap Price.
content: Amazing product at such a cheap price. Just blindly go for this. I have a Sennheiser CX 180 street but now listening to the boat bassheads 225, I think boat is much better than my Sennheiser earphones. Truly satisfied.

name: Owais
title: Not Bad at this price
content: i got the damaged one at first, when i complaint about it, i got the exchange the product is really good and the sound quality also. i feel like it's little heavy for my ears i don't know about others over all every thing is perfect

name: Ney Patel
title: BOAT is BEAST
content: I am writing this review after 3 monts of usage. These earphone are great. It has the best sound quality with a great crisp. Even at high volume there is no distortion in sound.. It also gives a great durability with great sound. There are a variety of earbuds provided in the pach for best fit.. If you are thinking to buy one of these i would say just go for it.

name: Bhanu Thapa
title: Good earphone for music lovers
content: Pro:. The Bass is good. For listening music while at home its good.. Cons:. Somehow I felt the ear piece is not comfortable. I use it while running that time also its not comfortable.. If use for online meeting the sound will have lot of bass.

name: Arpit Garg
title: Good sound, good bass. Bit heavy.
content: Very Good sound quality.. Very Good bass.. Bit heavy, so not preferred while running. At times you'll have to refit the earphones. If you use this while eating then the earphones will pop out in every few minutes.

name: Prince Garg
title: Not good
content: Product’s make is not good ... it just pops out of ears again and again unless you stuff it tightly .... Sound is also not good .

name: Rahul Kumar
title: Slips out from ear frequently
content: Very bad product. Build quality not good. It slips out from ears frequently.. Please do the needful. Refund the paid amount

name: Dragon slayer
title: Too noisy
content: The sound quality is not so good but the bass is too much noisy and the vocals are very much loud but the music beats are not so loud and is very much noisy.But the best thing is it's built quality is awesome and its flat cable makes its gorgeous and its gold plated jack is superb.

name: Kalyan Angara
title: Wonderful ! A pleasure to own these Bassheads
content: Superb quality earphones with a beautiful design. Very sturdy and the main bassheads are made of pure metal. You can feel build quality by just holding them. No cons at all. You also get 4 extra pairs of earbuds, holding clip and shirtpin

name: Gunjan
title: Bad
content: Sound quality is good. But it falls everytime from my ear while listening to song or any calls, don't waste your money, i am regreting i wasted my money.

name: Arpith Prasanth
title: Not quite a 'Bang for Buck' :(
content: Quite average sound quality with good bass. The Build quality is good. It's quite heavy for a in ear headphone. It tends to fall of from Ear. Also there is an annoying problem which is static within the headset when playing music or movies etc. and also the headset controls go 'automatic' at times pausing the song and increasing volume etc.

name: Oliver Coelho
title: Didn't expect this from boAt
content: The product I received is not working. The moment you connect it, the volumes automatically go up and and left side has some issue where you can hear a lot of static disturbance.

name: Aditi
title: Red colour is good
content: My friend ordered it for her friend on his birthday.. The colour of this product was good, and unique. I fall in love with the colour that's why ordered it.

name: Amazon Customer
title: ... bass and bass no sound quality not at all comfortable and even extra ear buds and ear clips can't ...
content: Only bass and bass no sound quality not at all comfortable and even extra ear buds and ear clips can't even help to make it comfortable in ear. At high volume you can't hear vocals and only bass will reach your ear canal. I would suggest to buy Phillips shq 1200 which cost less than 600 with great sound quality sufficient bass and great sound cancellation and great comfort

name: Maya sable
title: Just wrost
content: That was mistake I bought this. After reading lots of review i finally bought this. But believe me it's just wrost. It's like 150rs local market earphones. Wrost bass. Not fit in ears. Not comfortable at all

name: Krishna
title: Rhetorically Exaggerated
content: The Earphones are too heavy may be bcoz of thick wires ..... The earphones do not produce as much base as they have been named on , and no comparison to cx 180 as far as I have used them.... U can buy them for casual and soft genre with less surround and not much disturbance around

name: krutuparna randive
title: no regrets
content: looks premium,performance is far better as compared to price 499/- ,only one issue is that it is very loose in ear you have to use the extra fitting given with it to get rid out of the problem.

name: Gautam
title: Amazing
content: Great earphone. Best sound quality, superb bass, amazing look, durable, and also very comfortable. Overall Best of the Best. Thanks (Boat).

name: AW
title: It's terrific at the price
content: It sounds great... Just the fitment in the ear needs to be better.....Bass is great... It delivers even better bass which is comparable to the larger headphones with 4 times bigger drivers, if you use bass boost app... It is one of the best earphones in the market

name: Faizal R
title: Worst product ever
content: Worst product ever. It will not work after 1 month. Don't purchase. It will not worthy. Better to purchase local products that available in mobile shops near you. Please don't purchase this product.

name: Alok
title: This earphone bass is very very bad
content: This earphone sound is not good and not good feeling in song bass look like someone is beating drum very dirty bass not good bass don't buy this earphone waste of money on this earphone if you want to purchase so you can purchase mi in basic earphone that earphone sound is good don't buy boat 225 earphone I am giving you suggestion nobody will give you suggestion

name: Devayani Anantwar
title: Awesome earphones.
content: The bass quality is awesome. You can hear all the beats clearly. There were some reviews saying that the earplugs fall off as they are heavy, but that is not true. Just change the bud size and it will be fine.

name: Shazam217
title: Best You can get for the Price
content: Boat has done a great job with this. Well balanced sound with great base when needed.. Durable and sturdy design. Non tangle wires are blessings. I have been using them for 2 years now and still getting same performance

name: Sarvesh N.
title: Average
content: I liked this ear phone it has a supreme sound quality and even the durability is osm. But it not good to hear long hours it effects the ear. And if you are looking it for playing games such as pubg please don't go for this one it will really effect your ears.

name: Digital Hardik
title: But I cant change Next and Previous song
content: I heartily recommended to you this price point this is is a not Value for Money Product. I wanna Return My Product and Back my Money. Because sometimes automatic off earphone and sometimes tangle free vire still I see.

name: Shailender sharma
title: Excellent quality headphones with mic
content: I ordered these headphones with a risk as none of my known people was aware of this. To my surprise, the quality of headphones is really awesome. The mic quality is also good. Tested with my Samsung Galaxy S4, Moto X play , and Mi Note 4.. 5 Stars of this quality product.

name: Rajesh V Ekbote
title: Poor Quality
content: Quality is poor and within a month I have to go for warranty claim and there is no support from Amazon on this

name: Kindle Customer
title: Okay but not okay
content: Okay, so I've been using these earphones for a month now and boom the left side is dead🗿The sound's good but there's no indication about right and left. And the earphone comes out easily out of your ears. I don't think you should buy these🙌🏻

name: Abhay Rautela
title: Not happy with product one earpiece stopped working
content: Ordered 2 earphones, same as other one it's one earpiece also stopped working at the end of warranty period. Similar earphone with same base already had but one can easily differentiate the quality of sound it presents. 2nd one ordered during sale.

name: Shaik Moula Ali
title: Nice product
content: We can easily use 6 to 8 months without any problem.In boat earphones basically right side ear phone won't work properly.. We can easily claim warranty on this product without any issue. Company will provide new earphone on replacement

name: saikarthik
title: Overall best under 500rs
content: One of the best in ear headphones under 500rs....Bass is just outstanding comparing to other earphones under 600..Sound cavity is above average...But as per my view i have used buledio t4 with cost around 4.5k..So comparing to other earphones under 600 this is masterpiece..

name: Ginger
title: Cheap sound
content: You can't listen to seperate instrument sound clarity.. it comes nowhere near to the original samsung earphones i got years ago with my samsung grand 2.. i still suggest those samsung one over this..

name: Chaitanya
title: It worked good for 1 month
content: I purchased in July 1st week. It worked good for 1 month. From Aug 2nd week left earpod stopped working. I gave for replacement/repair. The concerned person took it in Aug 3rd week. It got delivered to the on 4th week. They are out of stock asked me check with the Sep 1st week. 1 month for replacement. Earpods sound quality is terrific, but build quality is bad as i see so many ppl reporting the same. I suggent stay away

name: Pranavasoriya
title: Bass is boomy not deep
content: Treble quality is good. Mid are ok. Bass is boomy. Better than 150rs earphones. But not best in this price range..i wish if bass could be little deep...i bought it today only so i will check quality after burn in period

name: DIPESH BANERJEE
title: Best earphones under Rs-800
content: At this price point this is one the best earphones you can get. The bass is incredible as mentioned,the build quality is superb but the only problem is the silicon tips as they are hard which can cause some problem which can be solved by just replacing it with any other earphones . Overall this is a beast.

name: Divya Prajapati
title: Don't buy this product
content: I buyed this boat headphones on 29 th August and opened it today on 22 nd sept ,1 side earphone is not working.Feel like cheated. how come brand new earphone can be faulty.

name: Satya Pragya Samal
title: Very Nice Headset For Under Rs.1000 Price Segment
content: Really awesome headset....bass quality is also damn good like you cant hear your background surrounding....But 1 problem is that It always pops out from the ears...but apart from that Its Good as hell....

name: Gaurav Yadav
title: VALUE FOR MONEY
content: After using it for 1 year i decide to buy another one for my friends. the sound quality is great. Bass was deep and smooth. Cable Quality was also very very great.. we got many accessories with it.. Like different size buds, And Many More.. Over All It Was VALUE FOR MONEY

name: Himani
title: I just loved it.
content: I just like the quality of the product. If someone want to buy the earphones in low price can go for it without even thinking.. It's base quality is very nice. Noise cancellation is awesome. And the best thing about the earphones is that it's tangled -free.

name: Komal Pandita
title: Not Happy with this.
content: Bought this and after using for 5 to 6 days suddenly 1 earpiece stopped working. The customer service is also i think only in mumbai. So i ordered for a replacement but again after receiving the product the left earpiece is not working. Rest mic and other is working normally.. The build quality looks good but i cant say what is happening with them.

name: S.Sarma
title: Good Sound quality for the price.
content: Good Sound Quality but i have seen that the ears starts paining after using is for a few minutes though you will get adjusted to it after a few days.

name: Gautam
title: Sound quality is good but mic experience is poor.
content: Headphones are good, sound quality is superb but ear piece experience is bad, it doesn't fit properly. We need to adjust the headphones every now n then. This issue i have heard from many friends as well.. Mic quality is also not good. I don't know if this isssue is only with my headphones but the mic quality is very poor. Sometimes mic doesn't work, the other person can't hear your voice during a call.

name: Devabrat Bindhani
title: Awesome Sound quality in this price range
content: Very good bass and sound quality in this price range. You can try it for sure. You will love it. Build quality of ear piece and wire both are good quality.

name: Amazon Customer
title: One unexpected pull
content: I have used this earphones before for 6 months and bought it again few months ago. Its the best ear phone in the market i have ever used regarding the sound quality it provides. But one unexpected pull to wire and the earphone becomes useless. This unexpected pull happened earlier due to which i bought it again.. I would suggest to make the durability a bit more stronger then i will buy it.

name: Erin D.
title: Good sound store what ?
content: The construction is well thought out but poorly executed , my headphones fell to the ground just once and separate from the shell disconnecting the earphone , I ordered once again and same results , the sound quality is kinda OK , but the bass and impact is good , I guess the top reviews are from people who haven't experienced damage

name: Kritika Sharma
title: Earbuds pop outs
content: Overall Product is good but the only and main problem is that ear buds just don't stay in ears...they just not fit in any size. They just pop out randomly within few minutes.

name: ANUJENDRA MANI TRIPATHI
title: Not soo good product
content: The sound quality of the product is good but the weight of both side earphone is too much and that discard the comfort of earphone and also the life of earphone is only 5 months.

name: Vishal londhe
title: This is the best headphone...just buy it
content: Don't think that it is budget headphone,. It is very much better than any expensive headphone in the market,. I am giving 5 star to it, Because it really deserve 5 star rating.... 1) material quality is fantastic. 2) awesome sounds quality. 3) very powerful bass. 4) price is very affordable

name: Liz
title: Nice but its heavy
content: Liked it.. Sound nd all is pretty good.. But the only complaint is its metal nd its heavyyyy doesn stay on ear for long tym.. Aftr sometime ul endup having earpain

name: Rajesh Chavan
title: Just fall in love with this company.. Beautifully crafted...
content: Bassheads... They indeed mean it....great bass..great treble..i can able to hear every beat... ....in matter clarity sound little bit (again little bit) dull.. If you adjust your phone/laptop audio settings you will get better clarity.... Again beautifully crafted...

name: Sujeet
title: Worst product..
content: Worst product.. actually after return window closure I realised that it's left earbud input is damn low. Otherwise I could have returned it.

name: Miru
title: Wont recommend
content: I bought it last August and its not even 1 yr and its gone. I can't hear anything. I wont recommend it. Since its still in warranty period i'll try for that. Lets see what happens.. whether they will replace it or not

name: JEFIN JOSEPH
title: Headset buds comes out from the ear
content: The headset ear bud is loose and comes out from the ear frequently.. Difficult as one tilt the ear or in a travel or in sleep to keep it up in the ear position.. Not comfortable in the ear.. Returned upon recieving.

name: LAVAKUSH MADDHESHIYA
title: Fully Disappointed with Amazon cheap product delivery system.
content: It automatically opens ''ok Google'' , volume up down,and many more apps.....I want my money refund or at least replace this defective product...

name: SANSKAR MISHRA
title: Durable and Excellent Voice
content: Boat is well known for its Durability, and Design . This time audio quality is excellent and also very comfortable for Call. They are also giving one year warranty that's makes it considerable. I think in this price range it's suitable choice.

name: Gowtham sai
title: Boat earphones
content: The sound quality is excellent and bass quality too. One of the most trustable company...Using the boat earphones 225 for almost 6 months it is the best i love it because of it service only.They give pick up and drop service for your earphones and quality wise earphone is also nice it has a base and the smoot sound

name: Niranjan
title: Best at this price :-)
content: Pros: built quality is brilliant.... Like flat cables.... L shaped jack and metal earbuds. Sound quality is quite awesome... Beat and bass are too good to hear musics and movies.. Cons: Due to metal ear buds you didn't use this earphone while sleep right or left side.... I think.... Only one cons.

name: Kishan Bhilawat
title: Bass need improov
content: Material of this headphone is very good looking also good, sound is very high but sound quality is need to improve.. Bass is written on packing box an also on headphone but while playing music there in BASS as much as showing for it.. If anybody want good BASS for music don't go with it and if you want high sound than you can go with it, other wise quality of this headphone is very good.. It's my personal opinion

name: Shiv
title: Best quality sound, best quality design, strong and long lasting earfones in budget friendly range😎
content: Best quality headfon in this price range guys, long lasting and excelent performance. So lovely Sound of these earfones😍, highly recommended😇👍

name: Hrishikesh palagiri
title: SUPERB QUALITY BUT VERY SLIPPERY
content: I have been using them for over a month now. The sound clarity is superb and cable is tangle free. Only problem is the ear phones are very slippery. You have to struggle to keep them in your ears while walking. But you can figure out your own way just like me. Built quality is very nice.

name: bhavya sharma
title: Bass quality
content: Sound quality is not good enough, now there is no option for return

name: yogesh chauhan
title: Worst  product and worst  to worst warranty  services
content: Worse product because if you want to replace or warranty services so don't chouse this product no one to attend your complaint even on mail also they have lot of issues with when he want to pickup i if you want my reviews so i strongly says no never done use this product.

name: Navneet Verma
title: Everything is good except the design
content: No doubt that these are good earphones but design is so bad that you cant wear these. Wierd design so I returned

name: DKboi
title: Although it has a good sound and 1 year warranty but after 3-4 months ...
content: Don't buy it. Although it has a good sound and 1 year warranty but after 3-4 months it'll stop working. It happened with me. And the customer service of Boat is worst. They do not pick the phone nor do they respond to your emails. Buy it at your own risk !!!

name: Ankur
title: Must read my review before buying
content: First time I am writing review on amazon this earphone is just amazing 🎧 i got this in @rs 500. Bass is just amazing. Quality is amazing voice cancellations is amazing overall its amazing i will suggest you if you are thinking to buy an earphone in the range of this price this will be awesome for you just go for it you will not regret i am damm sure

name: Nirmal Aryal
title: Worthy for money
content: Product was bad that I got because I heard sound and from my friends boat bass head 225 it was quite good but the handsfree I got works only from it's one side the other side doesn't work properly and sound quality was not that good and after delivery I didn't get bill inside or on the packing but after replacement it is quite good

name: ChandraD
title: Not a good quality product..
content: 1. The mic is not that sensitive to catch up the voice. Sometimes doesn't catch up.. 2. The flat cord is tangleless is not true and not easy to handle.. 3. Metal earbuds are too heavy.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best product
content: It's 3 years since I am using this. No issues yet.. Clear sound. Got 5 different types of eartips. The only consequence is it doesn't fit in the ear

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worst product ever
content: Worst product ever bought. This product is not at all reliable.The quality of this product is really bad. Within 6 months of my purchase,I had to get it replaced 3 times and it takes a lot of time to get replaced. Sometimes the mic won't work and I'm other times the earbuds won't.

name: anees p.
title: A Bass bomb
content: It is a bass bomb as name mentioned.. Pros:. Good and deep bass.. Crestal clear treble.. Tangle free cable. Durable build quality.. Cons:. Tuned only for bass mid is missing. Its paining for long time use. Not suitable for call function.sound frm otherside is not clear becuse of bass.. Mic is below average .

name: Devasheesh
title: Nice one
content: It is not as bad as it was mentioned previously. I think its build quality is nice, while delivering great output. Listening music and playing games using this earphone is a great experience. I didn't face any problem till now. The thing I liked the most about this earphone is that while it gives great output, it has flat cables which is tangle free and the way the cables are attached with the drivers is what makes me feel that the earphone won't damage very easily.

name: Amazon Customer
title: High Quality and very durable
content: These head phones have amazing sound quality and are at a reasonable price...…. Not only that but they are very durable, I forgot to take them out of my pocket and it went in the wash and the dryer but no problems with the head phones what so ever...….. Worth every penny

name: prasad
title: Value for money
content: Good bass headset for this price range. Accidentally washed along with clothes, but it worked normally after hearing 4 to 5 songs with same effect of bass. After that washing monthly once, to remove dust.

name: Amitabh
title: Still going well
content: Update: 2nd Purchase, after going through varieties of earphones, I selected this for the 2nd time as well.. Its been more than a year since i have purchased this earphone. No tangling, sound quality is awesome.

name: Ankita Gupta
title: Waste of money
content: Left side earphone stopped working within 1 week of purchase! Amazon cannot help you with that and they will tell you to contact Boat and they will tell you to go to the service center.

name: Surender
title: Boat
content: One side headphone not working. at all. Very disappointed

name: Kiran s
title: Good but read the review.
content: It's value for money with regards to the sound.. But when compared to material and build quality it's not that good , had to replace it twice within the period of 1 month , so think before buying

name: Pradeep Kumar Nair
title: Good in price range
content: Nice product under this price range.. Extraa bass is just a tag line so don’t expect to have something really with a boom effect 😂 Bit heavy because of metal heads. Was expecting more..

name: Nitesh Guleria
title: Amazing Product
content: Undeniably an amazing product. My travel partner for over 18 months. Product and company I'd love to promote. 🙌. All hail Boat! Added to that company's. manufacturing defect warranty for a year makes my experience even better.

name: Aritri
title: Good buy.
content: Got the orange flat wire ear phones. Good buy from Boat even though made in China

name: Ashwin
title: Dope stuff
content: This seriously a dope stuff. I have used philips shq sport earlier which is known for its bass levels. I ordered this to since i got bored with the earlier one. Did not expected it to perform to the level of philips shq. But Manh! this is lit af. Serious amount of bass . Make use of proper equalizer and yu will love it . Go for it without and second thought ;) !

name: Subham Gangdeb
title: This thing surprised me
content: Was expecting an "OK" kind of earphones but these really blew me away with the first bass filled track that i played, its nice and very comfortable. Quality is also top notch. The box was quite tiny though. If you want a earphone, go for it.

name: Salman Ansari
title: Have too much weight and no bass  .....!
content: Volume is too much high ...! (i like this quality of output very much). .. .. But come to the Bass - it is very poor .....!. earphones weight is also more than any earphone, as compare to other earphones in this same range's price, so it is little bit difficult to keep earphone inside the earphone and walk .....! (so many time earphone come outside, cause of it's weight)

name: Kulwant Singh Ratahur
title: Boat's worst product by far
content: Not a good fit in ears. I have many boat products and because of this reason I thought to go with it but I'm not at all happy with the product.. By paying 100 rupees more I can get a better earphones in JBL

name: MADHUSUDHAN
title: antha maya
content: The set worked for 2 months only. after that one side ear phone gone. I don't know details for servicing. two sets I purchased 2 sets gone.

name: sibangi panda
title: Average product But worth money
content: Nice earphones,but has to work on sound ,it has some distortions, bass quality is also good but has to work on it .. Cons are It came with different size of ear buds and a pair of ear hook.. Thanks boAt

name: Samruddhi
title: NEW EARPHONES EVERY 6 MONTHS!!
content: Trust Me boAt heads 225 have sooooooo pathetic durability that you'll need to replace them every 4-6 months!. It's like i am using 4th earphone but the sound quality is good.. i get them replaced by boat everytime until they are in warranty and later fool amazon to replace them!

name: Avinash Jha
title: Money wastage
content: I bought this few days before only... Delivery part was timely but, this device couldn't last more than 10-15 days. Time of return policy lapsed and life of this earphone as well... I will never suggest anyone to ever invest in this earphone...

name: Shubham Rolend
title: Great earphones.!
content: boAt has certainly made its mark by providing us with great budget audio devices. This earphone is awesome. The bass is amazing. Would certainly recommend this earphone under this budget. I have been using this for almost a week, and I'm in love with it.

name: Gotcha
title: for handy use (checkout some extra things below!)
content: Best for general, temporary, handy use. After 3-4 weeks low sound problem occurred but replacement was very well done (took time...). The Extra Earbuds are too tight to put on. Their is no fixed metal net on the earphones! Just gum-sticked plastic net.

name: Neeraj Agnihotri
title: Worth to my Money, happy customer
content: Well guys you did a great job, perfect speakers and crisp mic for clear communication.. Pros. Great sound and mic. Noise reduction. Perfect length. Real comfort for my ears as I use headset for almost entire day.. Budget price. Cons. So far non as I received product today only, will. Edit my review after using it sometime.

name: K.K Jha
title: Great product!
content: Sound quality is excellent. Bass quality is superb. Only drawvack is its too heavy and sometime uncomfortable to wear into earlob. Overall nice product

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not good.
content: Boat bass 101 are better than this. These are not perfect fit for my ear. They keep slipping even though they have given me 3 pairs of buds. Sound quality is okayish. But I will not purchase it again.

name: raghava
title: Go for it...
content: Have been using it for a while. It's more comfortable. But some what disturbance occurs during high bass. Although if you listen for moderate bass. It is perfect to use it for hours. Calls doesn't have disturbance. Very clear voices. Finally best quality for best rate.

name: Arnab Mukherjee
title: The sound and built-quality
content: After using the earphone for around 6 months my reviews are positive about it.. This earphone is a really good product being under a pocket budget. Hats off to Boats for taking out such an awesome bass enhanced and durable earphone.

name: PKA
title: Above average.
content: Bass is good. Wires do not tangle. Build quality is just Ok. The earphones keep falling often while using but the clips and ear wings helps so some extent.

name: Victor
title: Uncomfortable Design
content: Very uncomfortable design, the metallic addition adds to the discomfort and makes the earphones heavier which makes them prone to falling off again and again.. Should have been more ergonomic with respect to fit and user comfort.. Sound and Bass quality is average

name: Sreekanth
title: Will trust Amazon ?
content: It is guaranteed for 6 months but one of ear phone is not working. Is this the value given to your trusted customers. I believe that Boat is one of good manufacturing company for hearing goods. But my trust is coming down on the same... It is not are all good signs for your company and as well as customers of like us

name: Beulah
title: Bad quality
content: This product stopped working with 6 months of purchase. Only one side ear phone is working. This product is not genuine. I cant belive that boat has such cheap quality product. I am really dissapointed with the quality of product.

name: Rk
title: Nice earphones but right ear stopped working after a month
content: The earphones are very nice and sound quality also is up to the mark. But barely after a month if buying the product the right side of the earphone stopped working. It might be my bad luck I got such a piece but this is FYI. I have put a complaint and company people have pciked up the earphones from my home, hopefully they will replace it.

name: Ursheeta
title: Must buy!
content: One of my favourite pair of earphones. They'd work like magic. Sound was crystal clear and the colour was very vibrant and attractive. Easy on the ears too.

name: Prazwal Tripathi
title: BETTER THAN ANY EARPHONES🎧 AVAILABLE IN THIS PRICE RANGE 💸💰
content: Best product i can say this is much better than those pair of magnet buds earphone , built quality is awesome ,It will work upto 3 years .. Go for it .. THANK YOU🙌.

name: Himani
title: Please DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
content: I am dissapointed with good reviews. This product is not worth the cost. Unfortunaletly I lost my One plus bullet earphones and after using that, this was a complete dissapointment for me. It comes out easily of your ears while jogging and sound quality is substandard

name: Zoom electric
title: Instrument separation is absent
content: High value for money product. Good build quality and great bass at this price point. I wont say mids and and high is bad. But what i feel is there is no separation between different sounds. The highs lows mids appear to be intermingled which does not give me great experience. Its ok product.

name: Sai Hemanth
title: Good earphones for the price
content: Punchy bass. Good mids and treble for the price point.. The in-ear buds have replacements in the package. My earlier earbuds (Mi piston 3) were a much better fit (Not this product's fault though).. Comfort takes a small hit after wearing it for a few hours.. Absolutely love the cable and the 3.5mm jack. (My Mi earphones broke near the 3.5 mm jack)

name: Sasuke
title: Good sound quality and durability
content: Overall Sound quality is quite good along with the durability compared to other product with an effec price range.The extra ear-buds are provided that will add an good experience while experiencing the earphone.well excellent work by "boAt".I must say you should go with this set of earphone.The sound is powerful with minimized trable that's the best part about this earphone.Hope you will get same.Thank you.

name: Sumanta Kumar Das
title: Bass boost machine!
content: Good wire quality and looks good as well. Sound is good as well but on full volume with my MI5, the sound clarity could have been better. At max volume sometimes it feels like a bit of noise. Bass is awesome though.

name: BALJINDER SINGH
title: Good quality
content: The sound quality is very good, built quality is very nice and tough.

name: Vijay prasanth
title: Got replacement after malfunction issue.
content: I bought this product through amazon prime. After using it for 4 days , there was a malfunction in the earphone. The volume automatically raises, then decreases , it goes to google assistant and stops.. Then I asked for replacement within 3 days they delivered the new earphone. Today only they delivered it. As of now it is working good. Thanks to amazon.

name: Arunima R
title: poor sound quality
content: I ordered the black one but delivered the blue. truly disappointed. The sound quality is too bad. No Bass even if it is named as the bass headset. The sound is noisy and disturbances lead to a headache. Can not use for a long time. People who are looking for a bass headset with sound quality, please don't choose this.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Price Worthy😍
content: It's just awesome because of it's quality.. Loved it because of its quality in this price range.... It's more trustable because it's one of the companies which are offering 1 year warranty and in this range...

name: sameer
title: DHAMAKA
content: first thing before I purchase this I have watched all the unboxing videos of this product.. sound was superb and clear. mine colour was lime green.. delivery was fast. comfortable in-ears best budget earphone of this range. guys without hesitate just buy this product it's superb.

name: IRFAN ALI
title: Amazing Earphones.......
content: Awesome product from Boat.... This was my 4th earphone which i purchased from Amazon n now this time i have got this @ ₹399 only....... Sound Quality n bass is awesome @ this price Range..... So uptill now no issue from any earphones.... So directly purchase it ......

name: Alloysious Fernandes
title: Love for metal
content: Too good at price. Sound quality excellent as always. Bass level is balanced as per genre (that's the best part). Noise cancellation works well. Blue is lit colour. This is my second purchase after a year ..both workin fine

name: poornima
title: Good sound quality
content: The bass is good, sound quality is good ... but only thing is earphones slip from ears...

name: UMESH
title: it sucks. I've personally tried so many earphones that have ...
content: for an earphone that boasts that it has a lot of bass, it sucks. I've personally tried so many earphones that have way more bass than these do. I had the xiaomi piston v3 before this, and it gave me better bass, the ear hooks provided are pretty uncomfortable if you use them for a long time. if you're a basshead like me, I'd suggest you choose a different pair of earphones.

name: Rajini
title: My fav brand
content: My favorite brand. Buying the same from years. In the past 3-4 years this is the 3rd time buying this headset. One i lost in a trip , the other damaged. So i have good experience with boat

name: Ramesh Gombi
title: Good build quality
content: Good build quality and sound is better. Not ideal to use while driving bike as earphones doesn't completely fit in ears.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Excellent product the issue started with outgoing cal..
content: Product is good after using for 5 month the outgoing cal is not audible,. Still it is in warranty and I'm trying to contact their toll free no and there is no proper response.. Can any one support me in getting the correct toll free number to register the warranty!!

name: Sarath Aravind
title: Average
content: The bud was green eventhough in picture it was orange, The sound quality is not good. I think product quality is fine, Not suited for songs only musics bass is more voice notes are minor, provided spare ear buds are big not suitable and cause ear pain

name: Monomita Roy
title: Didn't met expectations!!
content: Bass quality is not at all as said in the reviews, product is good....but sound quality could have been better....using Mi earphones......which is far better.. The product doesn't have return policy rather it comes with replacement, so think twice before investing.

name: Priyanka T.
title: Gr8 product. Best among all
content: It's wire is good, flexible and broad. The sound is of good quality and bass is gr8. The earphone is durable. I even used it before and my past experience is also good of it

name: Reyansh
title: Damaged and not working
content: I received used and damaged product one side is not working even my case is also broken don't buy this product even only one side is working the worst product which i received i even don't know how to they check their quality before delivery totally worst

name: Pushpendra
title: Bad mic quality
content: Sound is good but mic is not working properly and it's seems used earphones thats not expected from Amazon I am very disappointed with the product besides I am regular user of Amazon ....

name: Aishwarya shukla
title: Indian one.. But need to improve quality
content: It's good because it's Indian product.. But i don't no it's only happened with me Or ur here with me to.. After using 1 month it went bad...

name: Harsha Choudhary
title: Good earphones.
content: Been using this for a couple of months now.. Firstly, they sound great and live up to the 'Bass Heads' name. It has a good low end and sounds clear.. Fit is good with the different silicon tips in the box. Has a good metal design and feels quality at this price. Doesn't tangle up due to flat wires. All in all, a good buy.

name: Priya
title: Big and Heavy - be Cautious while buying
content: Felt bit bad as the size of buds is big and couldn't fit in my ears, even couple of spare buds doesn't suit at all. Also these are heavy when compares to others. Doesn't suit for all people.

name: Sunil singh
title: slip from ears and sound is not smoth due to this it causes ear pain
content: A VERY BAD PRODUCT FROM BOAT. SIZE IS NOT FIT IN EAR IT ALWAYS SLIP FROM EARS.. SOUND QUALITY NOT SMOOTH AND CAUSES EAR PAIN.. VERY HEAVY. I TOTTALY NOT RECOMMEND FOR THIS EARPHONE BECAUSE I AM A MUSIC LOVER AN ITS DON'T HAS ANY QUALITY GO FOR JLB OR ANY OTHER BRAND

name: Pusa ankit
title: Boat headphones
content: It's second time I have ordered boat bass head, firstly I am fan of boat headphones.
