Previously I have used bass head 220, that product was assom and I had used it more than a year but coming to 225 the quality of the wire is that I have not satisfied with. The build quality totally discharge my opinion on boat so it's your choice.

name: Santhosh Jayen
title: Bad experience
content: I have bought many boat Earphone, but this item. I have received the defective product, one of the hearing side was cut. its ripped.. I couldn't return the item, not sure why the return option was enabled.

name: Param
title: Amazing Product
content: The material quality is really good as the earpods are pade up of metal they are heavy duty and the tangle free cable really helps out... Sound quality is really something great which you get at this price... Talking about durability the product is really good unless u purposefully tear it apart... Overall I must say it's must buy at this price

name: Partha roy
title: Awesome after sales service. Loved it
content: Ok so previously I wrote a negative review as it stopped working after just 3 months of use. But to my surprise, after I registered a complaint on Boat's website, I got a replacement within 3 weeks (not too long considering you get a totally new one) with a free door to door pick up and drop service. So updated my review.. The rest is up to you.

name: Vinay P.
title: Fantastic headphones. Great bass, good mic.
content: This one has great bass. Works wonderful with samsung as well as iphone. Noise clarity is great and the mic is very good. Price is a steal so just go for it. Been using for a month and very satisfied.

name: Vishal Bhatt
title: Waste of money
content: Within six month one earphone stopped working.. It happened with one of my friend as well... Either the model itself is defective or the seller is sending the bad pieces, the one which has failed quality checks.. While production...

name: Zibran rashid
title: Worst wastage of money
content: It's a worst earphone after one month of use or not one month also within few weeks it becomes one sided this not the first time I am using this earphone it's my third one and all the 3 times within a month it bacame one sided so I will not recommend you all to buy this item.

name: Ajay Jangra
title: expensive poor quality
content: trust me... sound quality is very poor and shorter size if i compare with my mi earphone.. noise cancellation is a joke in boAt earphone.

name: Romulan Overlord
title: I like it, quite a lot.
content: The product is pretty great. The sound quality is good, noise cancellation is acceptable and the bass hits hard. I've been using my earphones for a while and I have no complaints. The company could dial down its tendancy to try and appeal to people with its overly exaggerative and sometimes cringy ads though.

name: Shyam
title: Paisa vasiool. Value fr money..
content: 4.4 my rating.. nice built quality.. nice bass... Good packing . Lots of ear buds.. flat cable is awsm... Design is good...i bougt red nd blk.. i think this headset will long last........bcz of flat cable nd ergonmic design... Thnx boat nd amzn.

name: Krishna Chandra
title: Over all bad product in its range comparing to other competitors
content: Sound quality not good as expected to boat in this price range, even seller did no give extra earbuds or supporters with it whitch are provided by company.... ..Over all bad product in its range comparing to other competitors

name: Ultratech Projects Engineers
title: Poor Quality
content: In 3 months we found one earphone is not working , we made complaint but told to visit customer service center. I current situation i am out station is & is not possible. Asked for pickup but no response. I will not buy this product again.

name: Amazon Customer
title: very good product by boat
content: very good product by boat, it handles the bass very good. i could have given one more star if it was more comfortable and i could plug it for hours. but still the punch of bass is good at this price. buy this only when u r willing to forego voice clarity or the treble in the songs to some extent in place of bass. just mean to say that these earphones are not for everyone out there because of the bass

name: Soumya r.
title: Good but not price worthy
content: If you like bass its good, but not good clarity, uncomfortable wearing, accessories have variant s, design is good, wire quality is very good, but earphone speakers have little issues.

name: Abhijith Sahadevan
title: Awesome earphones!!
content: Really awesome earphones! Best in this price range!! Awesome sound clarity and best bass! I already ordered bought two more for my friends. Mic quality is also good. Tangle-free flat cables are really good for me. I recommend this product. Just go for it!

name: Renjith R.
title: Read before you buy.
content: Sound quality is good enough for the price. But it won't fit in your ears. Earpiece and mic are bit heavy so it will loose from your ears every time.

name: Abhay A.
title: Sound quality is good but non durable
content: I bought this product in July'2017 and it lasted with me for exactly one year till July'2018 (i.e. warranty period).. However, the sound quality is very good and the price is perfectly fine.

name: Mohit
title: !!! Superb !!!
content: Just Superb !!!. I was always a skullcandy loyal. Never got the same deep bass till today in any other earphones below 1.5k price range.. M very excited to tell u guys that finally i got something which if not overpowers skullcandy geniunely matchs its audio quality.. BoAt build quality is far superior than any i have used till date... Just go for it..

name: Sachin
title: Best earphones with a small promblerm
content: This product is very durable. The bass quality s best for gaming ,listening songs. The promblerm with this product is that when we plug the earphones in our ear it gets loose and sometimes falls down

name: Jasmin
title: Good earphones
content: Good sound quality with average bass. The noise cancellation works fine. I got it for Rs.499. Overall it's a great earphone for it's price. Don't know about longevity because haven't used for over 1 year yet.

name: Vishanth K.
title: Best companion headphone during travel
content: I use headphone during weekend travel for 1-2 hours only. Easy to fold the cables and feel durable. Movies and Songs able to enjoy with bass effects. 4 months old now. Due to travel chances of getting damage or lost is more, so I purchase the headphone in budget range. Overall good experience.

name: thahir s.
title: treble is not that much fine. but what mostly disappointed me was i felt ...
content: Guys first of all this is a bang for buck.i got delivered by last monday.let me clear about one thing here.i was using jbl t100.so when i switched to boat 225 there is difference.bass is awsome..sound quality is not much as jbl.treble is not that much fine.but what mostly disappointed me was i felt pain in my ear as well as my head too.i cannt even use for more than 10 minutes..so that reason i m returning this item.for people who are feeling pain in ear while uaing headset i wont recommend you..but like all reviews quality is superb.. Totally bang for buck.

name: kevin p.
title: Good number of accessories
content: Good number of accessories. Build quality is good. A bit heavy. 2 stars cause I got mine with some problem. It automatically increases and decreases the volume on it's own. I've checked in my sound settings and with another phone and it's the same problem. May be I got a defective piece

name: Prajwal Kakade
title: Must buy..
content: This is really an amazing product. Sound quality is as perfect as described in the description...... Colour is too good as perfect bought the red colour headphones. Although the accessories are also good as it gives 6 pairs of ear buds and other thing too. And the price is also suitable for this one.

name: Yedukrishna
title: Only good in music
content: It's good only for listening music, not good for a call. No noise cancellation with the product. Apart from this, it's worth of using. 2 months of use.

name: ADITHYA V
title: Boat has best service
content: Bought 7months ago got a problem one side not working I went to boat website and claimed warranty the service of boat is very good in 15 days I got a new earphone delivered I am very happy with their service boat is the bestttt. I always buy boat products now.

name: Gokul
title: Good product, Needs improvement in design. Worth it
content: Sound , Bass and Quality is Very Good. Only problem is Build . The design doesn't fit in everybody's ear. Lasted perfectly for about 9.5 months. Since last 1.5 month only right side is working.. It's probably because of a little bit rough usage . It worth it

name: Neha Biswas
title: Very good
content: This is the best. I can't live withouty headphones. Although I've been using this only for a year, I don't know how long is it gonna last but I'm surely gonna repurchase it if this one dies.

name: Dhairya Khutwad
title: Product not durable
content: Sound quality is good but product is not durable , it was working verywell for a week ,then one of it's earpiece stopped working, i replaced the product but new one was also not working after sometime there was deflection in sound ,then i have to replace it for the 3rd time from boat website which took almost a month to get replaced

name: Satish G
title: bass-driven stereo sound and good attenuation of ambient noise"
content: Mentioned as "sonic clarity, bass-driven stereo sound and good attenuation of ambient noise", but not effective, Sound clarity and Bass is very poor.. Good for Listening music & Watch movies in loud environments (like in Travelling in Train/Bus/ Also not good for making calls, Mic is very poor, there will be lot of Disturbance.

name: Girish J.
title: Boat basshead 225
content: Sound quality is a little more than OK. Not very loud. Built quality is very good, looks sturdy. Bass too is ok. Overall @599 its value for money. Works for daily use. Overall ratings would be 3.75

name: JP
title: Good product.
content: Great earphones. Good in East fit and as the description says, it's with extra bass. Sound quality is good and so is the noise cancellation to some extend. Worth a buy as wired earphones.

name: sayantan sanyal
title: Beats SONY and sennheiser by a lap
content: Wooooo......Writing this review after 6 months use.....Sturdy....Quality of physical wire is phenomenal....The most balanced one I have ever bought....Better than sony and even sennheiser at this price bracket....Any one looking for quality product but don't want to burn hole in the pocket must go for it.....You won't regret a bit.....

name: MilindParate
title: One of the best headphone
content: According to the price range it is a good earphone. Long life, rigid and good quality product. One can think to buy and use this, if you want a reliable and good product. Thanks to amazon team and the product designer.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Lotta sound with a good treble and bass
content: First of all this is an insane headphones I got it today, more than expected including the build quality, sound( specially bass) but I am lil disappointed with the earbuds part as it hurts a bit, it could be better may the quality of earbuds or design. Overall I prefer this stuff in this particular budget I.e 549/-

name: Srivatsan
title: Boat Headphones
content: While material quality is good it isn't compatible with my One Plus 6. It takes over the controls and everything goes wrong. Maybe we must check for compatibility.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Poor sound quality
content: Never expected that Boat Brand...ear phone could be so poor sound quality..though look, material is fine...

name: Naseer Hyder
title: Sturdy design, especially of the jack
content: After 6 months of use, I'm giving it 5 stars. No headphones in this price range offer such features.. Sturdy design, especially of the jack. Ear hooks and extra earbuds. Flat non-entanglisng wires. Good sound quality. My next headphone will probably be a Boat. I don't expect to need one soon, though... :)

name: INDRANIL
title: Bass is awesome
content: Its approx 1 year I am using this product without any single issue.. Sound quality is awesome. Mic quality is good . Everything is good.. Only problem that I have is it may cause pain in ear after long use bcz its heavy metallic earplug(without using supports)

name: Pyagang T.
title: Sound quality and bass performance is excellent
content: Sound quality and bass performance is excellent as also I been using it's for 6 month both side of earphone piece is still working...but the problem is that it's doesn't set good at ear so it's fall down very easily....but I only need earphone which work for longtime, so it's fine for me..

name: Abhishek Shukla
title: Nice earphone's but mostly slips from ears
content: Nice earphone's but mostly slips from ears ,they have given attachment by using that we can fix it in our ear but without that too slipry other than good earphone looks nice and better than mi basic earphone

name: Praba Karan
title: Overrated Product
content: This headset is not fitting to the ear properly. If I use continuously even for half and hour, I can fell some discomfort in my ear which is little bit of pain. It may be due to the design of the ear bud whose weight is quite high. I have also used Boat Bassheads 162 which is far better than this product

name: Sk kashyap
title: Good at the offer price
content: Not like original sounds .. Noise cancellation good.. Bass is not as boat say super extra bass it is medium.. And last it is slightly heavy due to metallic thats why not stay in my 👂 hahaha pd is good at this price i suggest you to buy at sale

name: © AASHISH WADEKAR ®
title: SUPERB BASS .... LOVE IT !!
content: I USED LOT OF HEADPHONES BUT BOAT IS MY FAVORITE COS BASS QUALITY IS JUST SUPERB ...!!. EVEN MIC ALSO COMFORTABLE WHILE WALKING AND TAKING ON CALL!. AND I LOVE THEIR WIRE DESIGN ..... ITS TOO AWESOME.

name: Guru
title: Not comfortable
content: Giving 2 star because earphones are heavy and big as compared to other, not all comfortable for taking or using while walking, it always slip out from ear.. Sound and bass are good, not sure why people are rating these so high.

name: Tushar Agre
title: excellent product.
content: excellent product. superb sound quality.. i am using the product since last 1 year no any issues. very durable.. i recommended it to my friends, they also using it and loved it.. better replacement policy, if people face any issue with this product then they can replace on the spot in service centre.

name: Sayan Karmakar
title: I suggest this product as one of the good option in in-ear headphone category.
content: It is an excellent product. However, I feel certain improvements. It can be better if its design is changed to a form that creates in buit grip in-ear. Overall excellent performance.

name: Bijoy Das
title: Give us a good service
content: Boat earphone is good in sound quality but boat not give a good service to its customers. Because my one side speaker is damaged in only 15 day after order . I have complent in company . It had a warranty for 1 year but company not give any response for it.

name: satish
title: Average

Just want this product to be replaced

content: The sound quality and durability of the product is good. But I am not able to enjoy the music. Since the earbuds are big for my ears. The smallest size also doesn't fit. So it is kind of hurting my ears.

name: Syam
title: Using from close to 3years
content: Using from past 3years.. I think i purchased this at Rs. 599. Doing great. Quality DIDN'T deteriorate at all. U can go for it. My kids will take it and stretch it, throw it.. Still working fine.

name: sampada manwatkar
title: Bad
content: NOT SO GOOD ....it stopped working after 2 months, same had happened with me last year also . One earbud starts making havoc after few days for sure. 2 times had experience with same model. Just one good thing about it is it is tangle free.

name: Shweta
title: One side earphone stopped working in a week
content: I got these earphones in a lightening deal. Initially the sound was excellent. But after a week's use the left earphone stopped working. :( Not happy with the product.

name: Anil Jain
title: Earphone not working properly
content: I bought this earphone but within a week i replaced it because it is not working properly...i got the new one which is working fine for a few days and then again has the same prob!! Only one earbud working... Whoever is reading my review..just don't buy this product!!

name: N.P Benny
title: Quality of the  Headphone
content: This headphone is of good quality metal construction. If your are looking for online or listen music this is the right choice mic is of average clarity. My reviews. Mic- 8/10. Sound quality- 10/10. Build quality- 10/10

name: Vedant Joshi
title: Terrific!!!
content: This product definitely proves the title 'Plug into Nirvana'. It's freaking awesome. I had seen many reviews of this earphones as I had a very bad experience with earphones in this range. Sound quality is magnificent. It's literally cuts you of from the noise outside. It's definitely worth trying according to me. BoAt are doing an excellent job. Love these earphones.PS: IT HAS A THUDDING BASS.

name: Hema gulati
title: everything is great except comfort. Painful experience.
content: Everything is great but they are Not COMFORTABLE AT ALL. I am feeling pain in my ears just after using it for 3 minutes.(Dont Buy Not comfortable at all)

name: Bhavik Mehta
title: Not genuine
content: This is not a genuine product i got it for 299 in a deal used it for 9 months and now they are not working , but i was a fool to expect boat like qualities with such cheap price maybe offline is better

name: Spart
title: Sound is very loud and bas is also good. Sound quality is just good
content: Sound is very loud and bas is also good. Sound quality is just good. Earpiece fitting material is not up to the mark .. try any side won't help with the comfort of the ear piece.

name: Baishakhi Biswal
title: Very good at this price
content: It has total 6 pair of earbuds ...it has also a clip to fix the earphone anywhere. It has a earclip which helps to fix the earphone in your ear...sound quality very good...bass is very nice. Noise controlling quality is awesome

name: Nishit b.
title: Go for it
content: Superb product just loved the sound clarity and comfort.. The adjustable earsupports and pads you get along makes it comfortable for anyone.. Bass is superb in this price range.. Boat nailed it as a value for money.

name: Rama Prabha
title: Worth for money
content: So good... Go for it... Worth the cost... Even if its out of trend... If you are looking for affordable and very good quality earphones... just grab it!

name: Customer Review
title: Very bad quality, not working just after 4 months
content: Left side earphone is not working just after 4 months handle with care and without any excess use.. Bad quality.. Noise cancellation is also not working.. Service Center is also far from reach.

name: Jay
title: best in the budget
content: This is the best headphone in this price range. I have been using it for 2 years now. Working perfectly fine. Just the jack is little damaged which has stopped working of left ear set.

name: Abi 420
title: Boat 🎶🎶
content: High bass and treble. awesome effective. Build quality good. But little bit much weight otherwise great. Earphone 👍

name: hari siddartha
title: I bought this on Feb 2018. Now it stopped working
content: I bought this on Feb 2018. Now it stopped working. I thought, for its quality, it would lasts for years. But unfortunately the left earphone stopped working, the head phone jack also got loose connection. Enjoyed well with these earphones. Super puncy bass.

name: Raj
title: Very Pricey not worth it.
content: Soubd, quality etc are far better than normal earphones that come with standard purchase of mobiles, but mlof poibt us whether its vakue for money, i personally doubt it, better product available for this sale price rs 499.

name: Aky
title: Dont waste your money
content: After one day of use there is so much pain in my ear. The earphones wont remain in your ear unless you use the ear tips provided. And after using those supports your ear is gonna pain like anything..So disappointed and cant even return the items as amazon will only replace it.. really waste of money

name: Bhavya Kaushik
title: Review
content: The product is good sound quality is nice but the worst part is earphones buds are lose.

name: Samnoon
title: The Best
content: Been using these for 3 months almost everyday for like 10-12 hrs or so and trust me, the durability is amazing and thats where it stands out from the rest of the Earphones in this price range... Also the sound is amazing with decent base... If you looking for long term use with good sound and low budget... This is the only one guys

name: Lakshya
title: Doesn't fit to the ears
content: The sound quality is good but the earphone cannot be properly placed in your ear.. I had to return because the earphone used to not fit properly to my ears . It keeps falling down and quite irritating though.

name: Siddhant Kumar Srivastava
title: Product is nice
content: Well, Sound quality is good.. Headphone did break done in around 5 months but Boat has one of the best customer services.. It really does have the untangled wire.. Not suitable for while running/jogging.

name: Pramod Kumar
title: Good quality sound but with ear fitting issue
content: The overall product is good in terms of sound quality but for me, it's useless as the earbuds keep dropping out from my ear. Even the cushion did not work as expected.

name: Shourja Seal
title: Best to go for in this price range (comfort issues solved)
content: Best build in this price range. Boat has improved its quality and comfort overtime. I have used bassheads 220 and it was not at all comfortable, and often falls from the ears. Bassheads 225 addresses those issues and came with a upgraded version to be almost a perfect budget headset with extra bass.. Great work boAt.

name: R.S chandra
title: Super Cool earphones in it's price range
content: Boat 225 is an excellent bass earphones....in it's price range... this is the second time I am purchasing this earphones..My last boat 225 lasted for about 2.5 year's with 0 issues... Amazon delivery service is super quick and positive.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good product
content: Sound quality is decent. Giving 5 stars for durability. My son uses it rough but it still works. I keep buying this product again because my son looses it.

name: Abineshwaran S
title: Super Bass and Good Quality
content: Very good earphone especially for bass lovers.. Only drawback is that it is little heavy on your ears. Build quality is awesome. Absolutely reliable, I have been using it for more than a year.. Working like a gem.

name: Vikash Mishra
title: Overall the earphones are very good. For bass lovers
content: earphones are well and awesome for the bass lovers and value for money and I have used for process documents then I am writing this review for the earphones and outside the earphones are still very good and produces a very nice and punchy bass just awesome

name: srikanth
title: Awesome earphones by boAt
content: It's been 6months since started using these and It never took to much time to put on like other headsets do thats the best thing in material and quality is just awesome recently one or my left earphone stopped working so I placed for replacement if I get my replacement then these earphones will be the best

name: Sat
title: Not so good after all.
content: Please do yourself a favour and avoid these headphones. Like you I went through several reviews and bought it and regretted it later. The bass is good but the other sounds.... not so good.. Believe me... Don't buy these headphones.

name: sai Vivaswan
title: I have got 2 of these, played pubg also nd I am always on music
content: Around this price range these are the best u get, but Jack troubles at some times, it depends on how rough u use, very good bass quality... This my 2nd one, 1st one's 3.5mm pin tip was broken inside headphone jack, still I got boat again, good quality... Not ment for gamers 75%managablenfor gamers

name: Subhankar B.
title: Overall not satisfied with the product. Let me know if there is any way of replacement
content: Ordered this headphone in the month of November. It was working fine for first 2 months but suddenly I started facing a lot of problem. I can't hear anymore in the call. There is always a disturbing noise in the background.

name: meraj alam
title: Poor customer service
content: Product was good but after one month one side is not working. I contact with boat customer care and sent my product for replacement but after six month i did not get my product yet....poor customer service..🤔

name: Biju X.
title: Value for money product. And 1 year warranty , what else do you want at this price man ??
content: If you are a basshead then you should go for it .. I listen about 4-5 albums everyday of every genre , and this headphones never disappointed me, it's comfortable and it's built for that punchy bass .. At this price point it's a completely bang for a buck.

name: CHANDU
title: Nice👍
content: The total headset was simply awesome and very satisfied to but little problem is the ear buds are not perfectly set to ears but it is worth for the money the sound quality is very nice package also damage but product was good

name: Amin
title: Service issue
content: I had purchased molten orange color wired product. Look wise it is good, but had mic issue. I raised complaint and a replacement white color product was sent. The service is very bad. I would not recommend anyone to buy it.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Sturdy wire, but the headphone part does not fit in the ears.
content: Sturdy wire, but the headphone part does not fit in the ears. May be this is not big problem.

name: Amith Ghosh
title: Bought on 24 may, stopped working on 25th May...
content: Can't believe Amazon is selling fake products..... Or otherwise boats is an average quality products..... No surprise, the life span of boats is undoubtedly small.... Added to that my experience is bad enough to garnish it with contempt.... Never again boats...... Buy at your own risk......

name: Vinisha Reddy
title: Buds size doesn’t fit well
content: The bud size in inappropriate...it’s not fitting properly in the ear ..

name: Sreerag S R
title: Good sound quality..  Horrible design..  Dont buy
content: Good sound quality.. But horrible headset in case of design... Its not even fitting in to my ear even though they gave many buds... I won't recommend this headset.. I feel sad, that i lost money

name: Amazon Customer
title: Unsetsifectory
content: Sound quality is too good but after one month right side speaker stop working. And service centre location far (210 km) distance from my home location., That's why iam unable to get service from service centre .... I ordered this item on 30th sept. 2019, today 31st oct 2019 start problem..

name: Bibhudatta Sahoo
title: Bad mic, not sweat resistant and poor service.
content: Quality of music is very good. It has mic issue. Most importantly it isn't sweat resistant. Service is very bad. They have taken 2 months to repair the product and after using 4-7 days it shows its nature. I sent it again for service.

name: Sanchezz
title: Just go for it.!!
content: If you are a bass and treble lover, you would surely like this earphones in this price range. Sound quality is crystal clear with fine built quality. Also, the length of tangle free cord would be sufficient for everyone. Ear buds and ear hooks fits quite well in the ears.. A great product in this price range.

name: Nandan Kumar
title: A real Bass head
content: I've been using this earphone for past 6 months and it's a super value for money item. It's a real bass head. Everything you hear feels like it's playing in a home theatre.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good Headphone
content: It is good who need a bass. the main drawback is a heavy headphone. My ear started paining after use 20mn means it heavy for my ears. Otherwise ok.

name: Rohan
title: Damaged!
content: I would say that sounf quality and bass is amazing but on the second when i buyed left part od the earphone has stopped working and i have requested a replacement over it,I'm very dissapointed about that damage because it automatically stopped working!!

name: Meet
title: satisfied with sound and service
content: Nice quality product with great service response... I bought this before 7 months, unfortunately one side stopped working in September but boat's service is great I got replacement within 15 days with home pickup and delivery without any hassle... sound quality is also good as per the price.. must buy while under discount

name: Omkar Borhade
title: Budget friendly earphones
content: Best earphones in this price range. Sound quality is fabulous. Good noise cancellation helps a lot in getting focused on music

name: Gopal Borashi
title: Excellent Earphone .... Must buy
content: Excellent earphone ... For my Redmi 4A perfectly fitted to my phone . And about Sound it's Awesome .. downloaded an effective bass app from playstore . Btw by default sound it's average ... Overall satisfactory product

name: Chirag singh
title: In this price u have to buy this.
content: This earphone is actually very good.. -i have bought this 8 months before and still its working very fine, fine means the same it worked 8 months before.. -in this price wow. Go for it guys.. Look is also very good.. Either single bud or double it sounds well.. I have used this like we use normally fot daily use.get it round and put it anywhere we want.in pocket after folding it and around neck after stretching a bit.. So i m recommending this .

name: rohit k.
title: Wonderful earphones ,go for it
content: At first got the product in ₹499,in it's initial uses it shocked me by it's outstanding performance... Bass level is minblowing,sound quality for any kind of songs is great.. Built quality is superb and it seems trendy and durable... Just use the earphones with right kind of eartip u required.. otherwise it slips frequently from ur ears..

name: deepika
title: faulty within 2  weeks of use
content: like ..bass and sound quality. dislike... within a week started zzzz noise and also other person cant hear me properly during the call... very bad experience with boat...

name: Sidhant Ahuja
title: Worst Earphones
content: This is one of the worst earphones I have ever purchased. I thought I could return it but this product has no return policy. The noise is very creaky and pathetic and will give you a serious headache after using it for ten minutes. I would not recommend anyone to buy this product.

name: Mander Mukherjee
title: Great sound but cheap material
content: The products look little cheap plus it comes out of ear pretty easily. But in terms of sound quality. It is really great product.

name: PRABHAT
title: Worth buying
content: The product is tough,. The sound quality is amazing,. It comes with attached accessories like different ear connectors.. Choose colour which you like... Because you love the way it is designed anyhow.

name: vijay patil
title: Awesome product
content: It was amazing product..... But little bit change happened I am ordered black colour but it comes with blue color..... But no problem..... Product is same and happy with boat bass heads 225.. Thank you amazon n Boat.

name: Ravi Prakash
title: Always comes out from ears
content: Sound is really good but only drawback is that, it's rubber it little bit hard and it's heavy as compared to other earphones so it comes out from ears always.

name: Shubhadeep bala
title: terrible experience
content: the experience in the ear is terrible specially if you have small ears even though the sound quality is great but you cant just sell a in ear product on just sound quality you also have to look after the customer experience, which they failed miserably

name: vinay kumar
title: MasterSahab's review
content: Good product. The ear cushions tend to fall if not forcefully inserted into the ears. The flat wire helps reducing tangling of wire. There are different size ear piece cushions, make sure to use the right ones else falling of these will be too often.. Recommended if u wanna go wired.

name: Sumathi
title: Worst jack
content: The 3.5 mm headphone jack is useless...falls out easily and doesnt get connected that easily too..i have to do some finger gymnastics to make it work...dont go for it because its low on price

name: Bhavani Dheer
title: Not so great!
content: It's really uncomfortable to fit in my ears!!! Noise cancellation is pretty good for an earphone.. but claiming it to be a "bass head".. doesn't produce the bass required.. budget friendly earphones I say!

name: Sumit Dewang
title: Choose by your choice
content: Bass is quite good but not best .. sound distorts at full volume... very heavy earphones... you cannot wear them for long... but its tanglefree and build quality is best

name: Vibhu Gaur
title: Nice robust budget earphones
content: Nice budget ear phones. They have good distinguished bass and depth. Wire does not tangle and is quite robust. Build quality is up to the mark as well. Have been using them for about an year now.

name: Praveen
title: Excellent Product - boAt Bassheads 225 in Ear Wired Earphones with Mic
content: Purchased on 23rd Nov 2019 and writing this review on 21st Nov 2020.. Its an Awesome product. Very rigged and sturdy product.. a little bit heavier than other products due to the flat cable, but real worth for the money we pay.

name: Antony Thomas
title: Uncomfortable to wear.
content: Because of the shape of the product, its very uncomfortable to use for longer periods of time.. EDIT: after using it for so long i have to say the product design is terrible.

name: Fenil
title: Worst one!
content: Didn't liked it! Its falls from ear now and then and so can't be used for travelling purpose aur driving purpose! Also u can't wear it for a longer time coz it hurts in ear!. Sound quality is also not upto the mark as per the price....!. I would suggest you to go for some other earphones! There are many other great product at this price range

name: Aniruddh
title: Good sound effect, but doesn't stay inside ear
content: Good product with good sound output. Build quality is good. But it falls off your ear every 30 seconds. If you are planning to use it during travel it is going to be very annoying.. All the time you need to put back inside ears.

name: niraj
title: ok, mic button not good many times clicks by its own
content: sound is OK not as good as CX180, the mic part is not that good its not working properly, mic button many times clicks by itself.. for 500rs that much is ok don't expect much.

name: jwell
title: Could have been a better product
content: Good one..qualty of sound is good..but ear buds are not light weight..doesn't fit into the ear well..this earphone is not comfortable for those who use it while lying flat on bed as the buds comes out of the ear very often..kindly change the design of the ear buds

name: Bharat Bhushan Nagda
title: Bass Boost - Good Bass range - from 30 Hz to 200 Hz ...
content: 1. Call -. Can receive the call but not cut/end the call by button.. 2. Music. Can play and pause the music by single tap, by double tap it will change the track.. No voice control button.. Bass Boost - Good. Bass range - from 30 Hz to 200 Hz. Bass test - Ok, Good.. Treble - Max. 15000 Hz not more than this.. Polarity - Great.. Looking Great.. Overall great earphone, will rate 4.3/5.

name: HARSH
title: Sound Quality Awesome
content: Great Earphone!!. Sound Quality is awesome.... Very Comfortable in Ears. Fits Perfectly... Build quality is good... Bass is awesome..!!. The Noise Isolation is just awesome..!!

name: Siva G
title: Headset was not good. I used it for 3 months after 3 ...
content: Headset was not good. I used it for 3 months after 3 months one side of the headset is not working. So dont try to buy this . getting the warranty service is also not possible. The manufacture was not responding for the warranty service. Too bad totally

name: JOEPHIN
title: Poor built in quality... Money wasted
content: Build in quality is very poor.. within 2 weeks of purchase boat earphones developed snag issues... Wire is not durable.... Only positive thing with this earphone is good sound quality.... Amazon should remove this from its product of choice ..... Amazon should come up with Amazon basics earphones

name: Venugopal
title: Good, go for it
content: Good Bass, good quality.. Flat cable is not exactly tangle free as mentioned.. Overall a bulky earphone set, I should say.. Recommend others to buy.

name: Mahmudul Hasan
title: Not suitable to sleep with them in the ear.
content: Absolute value for money unless you want to sleep with them on. The speakers are larger than normal and are too long to get out of ear when your ear touches the pillow.even normal walking is not that suited for the earbuds.. Sounds quality is awesome with the bass and treble perfect for ear.

name: Anirudh S.
title: Felt Current in my left ear (like a spark or something)
content: I am writing this review after using this earphone for over a month. If you are planning to buy these earphones. DON'T. Just after having these for a month, I felt a current (literally a spark) in my left ear. It's ear buds come out easily you have to keep pushing it in your ears because of the design (Even though they provide with 6 buds). Stopped using it since spark.

name: Krishna_KS
title: Will not recommend this one . Due to bad design.
content: The product is good...but the earphones are able to fit normally in the ears. We need to apply some force to fit them in ears. Well i will not recommend these thing.

name: Arushi
title: Got damaged too soon
content: The product is fine, but it stopped functioning from one side after 3 months of use. The worst part is the return window closed by the seller and the support is unresponsive.

name: Chitrang Shah
title: Good Value for money.
content: The flat cable makes it durable and easy to manage. The L Shaped jack makes it easier to handle the phone. The sound quality is superb.. There are different ear plug buttons included in the package which helps you attach the right ear plugs buttons for your ears.

name: M IMRAN
title: Go for it without a thought
content: Very dependable product from boat. Almost two years of use still very good.

name: Rahul t r
title: Tangle free cable is not upto the markpoor
content: Tangle free cable is deformed easily ..Several bendings on wire is visible all over. Even after careful usage ... Mic button stopped working :(. I have send mail but no reply from the service centre company Don't buy this

name: Michael A. R.
title: Ok Disappointed by the Micro phone performance
content: No real noise cancellation,. Also I have to keep mic very close to my mouth so that caller can hear.

name: Daksha Pednekar
title: Warranty issues not resolved
content: The products looks good but gets damaged in a month or two and warranty commitments made by the boAt company is zero. They don’t respond to your calls. Several mails have been written to get them on board to help but none of the mails is acknowledged.

name: RAJAN JARIWALA
title: Don’t Buy
content: No Bass. Only Treble. Not even not Compatible with all Phones. Already exchanged 2 Times in Two months due to technical problems. Don’t buy

name: SAKULE MAYUR SHAMBHULING
title: Don't buy!
content: Received worst product. Sound quality is worst than buffalo humming.

name: Praveen B.
title: not worth of buying
content: i wouldn't recommend this to anyone , the ear bud keeps falling off the ear even if you are sitting idle , the additional buds provided are also not compatible , at least the one i got was like this , though to return this ITEM , but i am sure Amazon was aware of this so they did not kept the option of "RETURN" on this item, instead i was asked to get this replaced with another piece of same headset.

name: Aman
title: Worthless, not to buy.
content: Useless, I bought it in Nov. 2018. One earbud started not working during warranty period, when I claimed they fixed it, but now another one became soundless. I spoiled 500 buying this worthless product. Boat is not behaving like it's name.

name: S S.
title: Want to enjoy the music better stay away from this.
content: I have purchased this a month back from the time I got this i realized the bass is very poor. Still i was fine with it but eventually I have noticed that the right ear plug volume is getting reduced. I really want a replacement i don't know how to proceed. I simply wanna through it but still trying to approach the Amazon if I can get any replacement.

name: Udhayakumaran B
title: Good product
content: Very good clarity.. Only one complaint is the additional ear buds are not fixing in the headset, unable to change and use.

name: SK
title: Headsets are good. Support is not.
content: Well, the headsets are awesome but they worked for few months only. Claiming warranty is not easy since the boat official website asks the product to be registered.. I have received the registration details yet without that i cannot claim warranty. B01M9C51T9 is the serial code of my product.

name: Soumen M.
title: LOVE IT.... :-) :-) :-) :-)
content: Hello,. Received the product in proper condition... Received the same which shown in the images... Received extra ear buds of different sizes in the box.... Using this earphone more than a week, I am love with it!! Its just awesome... You can definitely buy this product without any doubt!! For this price range its awesome..... Just go for it!! :-) :-) :-) :-)

name: Partho C.
title: Earplugs keep falling down, built quality v good, sound quality is above average.
content: earplugs keeps on falling. too irritating. its a headache.. built quality is superb. sound quality is fine. infinity or jbl earphones of this range are little better, but their built quality is little low.

name: Akshay sree nair
title: Trust me guys u won't be disappointed
content: At last I found the right one. Best one for this affordable price. Cheap and the best. This one suits best for all kind of songs. Expectation upto mark

name: Naveen
title: Bad quality build
content: Though the earphones are good for listening to music and calls, the durability of these earphones is bad. This is my second earphones and both of them broke with 2 months of use. The second one's left earphones broke into two pieces

name: Amazon Customer
title: Great Built Quality But Average Sound Effect
content: Can't recommend to anyone who loves to hear music day to day basis. Low Bass. Just Loud music which hurts your ears. Built Quality is the only plus point. Mi earphones is the best choice in this price range.

name: Nicky
title: Bass as its best.
content: Boat delivers what it promises.. The bass level is amazing. It does shut out outside noise and clarity over calls too is brilliant.. The product comes with a pair of earhooks and different sized multiple eartips.. The cord, a vibrant green colour,is tangle free and resistant to dirt and grime.. Quite good packing and on time delivery too.

name: Mansi
title: Keep on coming out of ears
content: I didn't like the earphones bcz they keep on coming out of my ears maybe bcz they are quite heavy from the back. I have even tried all the different sizes of the extra rubber buds provided by them but nothing helps and it irritates me a lot.

name: AKASH
title: Damaged and used product
content: I can't understand why Amazon sell a used and damaged earphone on its portal.. Extremely disappointed with the performance as I can hear only music not the voice of singer.. I strongly believe about bOAT earphones from my past experience for superbass but its end with lots of disappointment and harrassments.

name: Akshay
title: The super extra bass produces attacking
content: These earphones boasts of hd quality sound that is sure to make you contended and fulfilled. The super extra bass produces attacking; powerful bass with natural vocals and precision highs provides a fulfilling experience.Super earphone in this price range.സൂപ്പർ ഏർഫോൺ ഇൻ ദിസ് പ്രൈസ് റേഞ്ച്.ഓരോ അക്ഷരം ആയി പെറുക്കി എടുത്ത് ചെവിയിൽ കിട്ടും അത്രയും ക്ലിയർ ആണ് സാധനം.100% നോയ്‌സ് ക്യാന്സലഷൻ ഉണ്ട്.volume കോൺട്രോളിംഗ് സ്വിച്ച് ഇല്ല,ആൻസർ കീ മാത്രമേ ഉള്ളു.

name: Subham Das
title: Problem with the microphone
content: The headphones are influencing Google chrome ( the Google voice assistant is opening automatically) and creating a huge disturbance while listening to music or watching videos.

name: Praveen Karat
title: Awesome
content: Boat products are awesome.... They have good sound and balance.... They are easily fitting in ear.... And the sound quality is also awesome

name: Arun
title: Faulty product
content: Recieved a faulty product. Voice heard was low and had loose contact

name: Mohit Sharma
title: Just go for it
content: If you like in-ear earphones.. this is one of the decent product in this price range .. been using it for about 1.5 years no problems till now.. satisfied

name: aripaka
title: Super Product. Worth Buying!!
content: Received in a good condition. I just love the Boss packaging . It's been a month almost since I bought this. Sound Quality is just awesome. It does some amount of noise cancellation. Inbuilt mic. It has the metallic finishing on it. You get the 4 pairs of buds with it. Worth the price. As any earphone use it with care. Let's see if it works for atleast 6 months.

name: aditi jain
title: Stopped working after 3 months
content: Within 3 months, one side of the earphone stopped working. This is my 2nd boat earphone , last time it stopped working after 8 months. Even though it has gurantee, i dont know how to avail it as there is no service centre for it exvept in mumbai .. disappointed..

name: Dhanshree Shirke
title: Poor Quality, Mike Stopped Working Within 1 Month
content: If there are any negative ratings, I want to give this to this product. One of the worst ever used headphone in my life time. I had purchased these boat headphones on 31st October 2018. Just within 1 month the mike of the earphone stopped working. Horrible experience with Amazon. I am strongly recommending not to buy this headphone ever.

name: FEARLESS RIDER (INDIA)
title: worst built quality
content: wire quality is not nice after few days of use wire get dirty cant clean it because when you will clean this wire it will get pill from inside and get damage

name: Niceman
title: Good buy
content: I think it is value for money. I would have given 3 stars if it was priced for more than 800-900 rs. Speakers are pretty loud which helps to amplify the voices calls and also some videos online which have very low volume. But the minus point is clarity. The loud volume sort of eats up the clarity of the song and you won't enjoy the premium feeling you get when using costlier earphones.

name: Akarsh
title: 4/5 star difficulty in earplug
content: Supporters not able to use. Changeing th ear plugs very difficult. Sound quality is awesome.. Noise cancellation is ok. Excellent bass. Best for plyaing PUBG .. WATCHING YOUTUBE. L Shape wire is ok. Any queries can ask me

name: Aakashh Negi
title: Very good to look at
content: Pros: good built quality, nice sound, wire is tangle free, colorful. Cons : uncomfortable to use ears start paining, can't use even for 30 mins.. I had to return it. I hope boat will listen to it and rectify the problem.

name: Saheer Fazle
title: Best as it says... Better bass n high volume output.. Tangle free
content: Better bass n high volume output.. Tangle free cables ... But it is not recommended when jogging as it is heavy... Tends to fall from ears... Ear clips provided can abate the problem to an extend... Bought 3 pieces and 2 of those's mic becomes faulty just after 2 weeks.. Remote buttons are super sensitive.. Working unnecessarily....

name: Manoz kumar
title: Good. But
content: Product quality is good, sound is best. but heavy weight headset , you can hear only continuesly for 1/2 hour, and it's drop from ear frequently. I got Rs.469.00. but this price range this only best. If you want some other range . Go with JBL. But I going to replace...

name: NAVANEETH NITHIN
title: ITS BOAT MAN NO WORRYS
content: Its a fantastic product with extra bass 225 with thumping copper rounded technology boat means no compramise .based on ur budjet max boat products will satisfiy u .when u listen music in it you goose bumps may tumped boady shakes boat rocks

name: Sandy S S
title: Sound good, didn't work with iPhone 6s
content: Sound was awesome, noise cancellation good, economical price.. Con : 3.5 mm jack does not fit iPhone 6s. Mic did not work !

name: shehbaz khanna
title: Slips out of ears
content: Sound and build quality is good but it’s not very comfortable to use it for long time . Ear plugs shape is not very aesthetically and technically good which results into it slipping out of ears again and again. Not recommended by me.

name: Srihari
title: Decent - for the price range
content: Decent product for the price. Encountered a lot of noise while taking calls. Good for random music. Average performance as per the price. Do not go for it if u can afford better earphones.

name: Samarth Sarnopant
title: Good Quality Earphones...
content: After using for a year this is my review-. •The sound quality is as good as new.. •The bass and noise cancellation are still better.. •But while you are in ur relaxing position the earphone often comes out, that's the only problem with it.. •Otherwise they are value for money.

name: sanjeev chsnda
title: Fantastic ear phone till now
content: Amizng product..superb build quity..i hve nver seen ear phn having such great bulid quality..and sound quality baas truble quality awsm...go for it..fast delvered by amzon..great experince..last word ..amzing ptoduct with amzing build quality..i hve nver seen these type of ear phn..i hve used sony.jbl.bt they r nothing in front of BOAT ear phn...

name: Saba nandgadi
title: You can go for it!! Worth the money
content: I've been using this product since 2018 and it's amazing. The special quality about this product is it's jack. Even though had to replace the first product because soon after using it for a week, one side was not working but got it replaced/fixed with good and best quality.

name: Santanu Dey
title: Affordable and fantastic
content: It is a 'No compromise' headphone at all accounts. Looks great, fits into the ear perfectly, very good quality sound, fantastic bass and tangle-free cable.. It checks all the boxes.

name: Sunita gupta
title: Awesome~Awesome~Awesome
content: More than worth rs. 600.. Super sound.. Super Treble.. But i have to say treble is more than bass.. Bass could have been lil more.. Overall 7 star.. 👍👍👍👍👍👍👍

name: Rajan
title: Boat bass heads
content: I bought it these on 15 July 2019. Today on 5 August 2019 it has started giving me trouble. Some times I can’t hear properly and some times other person can’t hear me thru these ear phones.. My return window was till 25 July 2019. So I have wasted my money.

name: lsandeep3
title: After one month usage review of boat 225
content: From one of ear phone i am hearing noise while seeing videos.Bass is high.microphone quality is average and over sound quality is good but with full volume bass dominates sound.you cannot listen music with high volume. At mid volume listeninng songs are peaks.At this price you can buy.I bought it at 499 and with discount of 50 rupees.I comes at 450 for me.

name: anuradha bangal
title: Avoid
content: The first one didn't work on the right side... The switch is the reason of failure.. Got it replaced but not worth of the trouble.. If you are fan of reliability and durability... Stay away from this product. The price is too high compared to the quality...

name: Jayesh
title: Bass is excellent bt not impressed with vocals and clarity
content: Bass is excellent bt not impressed with vocals and clarity.. bt at this price range u cant expect everything.. Its a nice pair of headphones bt may be not for me as i couldnt enjoy songs on this as much as i do on 1more piston fits..

name: Ajith kumar T
title: Great bass and good quality cable.
content: I have purchased this product for my frien built quality was tremendous. Base was very loud when comes to the vocal it was terrible even in very less volume also bass and beat dominating the vocals it was very good ear phones who loves bass more.

name: praamoth raahul
title: A worst product in Amazon
content: This is my 10th day & the left side speaker out & no warranty or guarantee for this product now the wondo closed to replace or refund.. 100 bucks platform product works for at least 6 months

name: Sanaya
title: The ear phones look very classy and are very good in terms of clarity
content: The ear phones look very classy and are very good in terms of clarity. It also has a mic.. It comes with extra pair of ear buds. So if you have are a little careless like me and keep the ear phones rolled and tangled all the time then the extra buds come handy if you loose the ear bud.. Also, the wire is flat. Which adds to the look of the ear phones and makes it look classy.

name: JYOTI RANJAN DAS
title: According to price better.....buy it
content: Material... feel like tangle free cord....but...100% not..... Sound- better sound according to price.....if you want sound noise cancellation...go for bang and Olufsen..........

name: Himanshu Ranjan
title: So so product
content: Good purchase..but at last I didn't find any extraordinary thing any it...as compared to redmi earphone..which cost around 400...

name: Natarajan R
title: Value for money
content: 1. Good build quality. 2. Amazing sound quality. 3. Good noise cancellation. 4. Enough wire length. 5. Bassssssssss. 6. Supercedes other headphones above this price band a little higher in hierarchy.... No doubt. Go for this

name: Akshay lokhande
title: Worst headphone ever.dont buy.
content: This headphone i got before 2 month...i was using daily but one week before this headphone is act like hang.. It is now automatically actuating ring button call end button and google security.. When i remove the headphone mobile work normal. Bt when i attatch it,It is going to be hang my mobile.. Don't buy it

name: balaji
title: Best quality sound
content: Very nice quality. If u wana buy ear phones then choose this. Wire length is more than enough. Sound quality is best.

name: Rohit S.
title: Not worth it... sound is average but doesnt last long
content: Package received perfectly, nicely packages. Headset was inside Boat box without any damage. After around 2 months of daily use, mainly office calls and stuff, the right ear stopped working. No sound is coming, only left ear works.

name: Alan Reji
title: Customer
content: I got damage product .it not working properly sometimes its doesnot work. And its button is usless its does not work. l never except damage product from amazon . l never purchase again from Amazon

name: Manoj
title: No words Great Earphone ( Second Buy )
content: I have bought it for two times they are much better than skullcandy and other even frim 700 rs range earphone. You wont see great bass with good sound in any other earphone. Its durability is also great. Even its service center people are also much friendly you get quick replacement. So go for it you wont regret.

name: Shivam gupta
title: I think product is good but mine piece is only defective
content: Right side base is not working. Requested REPLACEMENT on 12 Oct. They said they will call and take it from my home on 14th Oct. But now it's 18th October no messages/response at all for my req. Of replacement.

name: Moumita M.
title: Very poor product
content: The right side earphone stop working after a month that also I don't use the earphone regularly.

name: Naseer Ahmed
title: I could only use it for 5 months, I dunno how long they will last for you.
content: It's been 5 months since I bought this item, the sound quality is clear and crisp (remember this is just an earphone, so don't expect anything crazy from it) I was very satisfied with my purchase. But in the month of December I discovered that I couldn't hear anything from one of the earbuds. I conclude my review by saying that my earphone broke. I really wish they would have lasted a little longer.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worst performance of all times
content: Worst performance of all times...trust me..I'm a music enthusiast with a wide variety of earphones ranging from sennheiser, creative, jbl ETc..it's nowhere near all those.. The bass is present only when you set it up very deep in ear . also, the clarity is nowhere close to other earphones.

name: Himanshu Sharma
title: Too much uncomfortable always irritates me. disappointed
content: For sound quality 5/5,.. but too much uncomfortable... always irritates me when i put it into my ears too heavy. If u only want bass & sound and can compromise with your comfortableness then u can go for these but i recommend you to go with jbl/ Sennheiser they are much better in sonud & on the level of comfort in above prices of 2 or 300 rs.

name: Pankaj singh
title: After usage of 2 month
content: Neon colour is bright yellow not as shown in picture. Pro-. 1.good sound quality. 2.good bass. 3.durable. 4.good transmutation. 5.punchy colour. 6.microphone is having pretty good quality. Cons-. 1.due to metal it is heavy. 2.sometimes hurt ear after long usage. Overall damn good product . Value for money. Reasonable price.

name: rajesh Kumar
title: Honest personal opinion on Boat Bass 225
content: I've used this earphone for a while and found it very nice for the price. Some time the bud hurts my ears if I keep wearing it for long time. In a gist, worth the money and recommend to purchase it. Tks

name: Abhay Gupta
title: Amazing!
content: In this price, this product is really a great choice. Without a second thought, one can go for this product. And Boat is taking the Indian market to a storm :)

name: neeraj
title: Dont go for Online shopping with amazon or else you won't genuine products.
content: I got this product on 19th of june.. And sudenly one side of ear phone has stopped working..i have been facing this issue since july...i dont know what to do or what not do??. Just waste of rs 600,. It would br great if i purchased it from any shop rather then buying it from amazon because i will get 1 year of warranty over the product and i can easily get the replacement.

name: abhishek
title: Don't get trapped
content: Third class product, very poor service, earphones which you buy from the roadside work much longer than these. The company doesn't care about customer satisfaction, they are just targeting sales of their product and that's it. I can only laugh at my situation right now that I trusted 'Boat' for audio product.

name: Ajeet Singh
title: Not recommend go for Sony or Skullcandy or jbl
content: Pls don't buy it ....the wire feels heavy to ur ears and after using for sometime the ear starts paining, and feels like u can't use it anymore and u have to take out your earphone for sometime and give some rest to ur ears and that is when feel most irritated and uncomfortable 😣.

name: varun
title: Doubt about Falling out from ear
content: WOW Amazing Product @500. People say it won't set in your ear always fall from ear.. they have given 5 buds for comfort try all and check 100% sure it will not fall out from your ear and also you have a supporter or grip it's awesome....

name: Sloon01
title: Only for dhinchak songs.
content: Very bad for pubg and slow songs. Even you can't watch movies wearing it. Waste of money for me.

name: Debojyoti jhorasa
title: Malfunctioning earphones
content: This product is good i appreciate it But after a 2 month my ear phone is malfunctioning. It automatically reduces my sound volumes without my doing and now it also produce a distortion sound while i m talking with other in calls i probably can't hear it but the other people talking with me on other side say a distortion sound come from me

name: Ayush N.
title: BohT Hard
content: Wow.!! I had To say these earphones are best.This is not a fake review dont go on my photos.These looks premium and have metal speaker housing.Bass is so good extraordinary if we compare it to jbl then these are much better than them.But you will get that extra bads in only supported device.All Redmi phones are supported.Try it in your device but the quality is too good man.

name: M.Abhishek Dora
title: Superior Product at a budget
content: These earphones are so good that I bought them twice.My friends regrets having bought some other reputed brand earphones after testing this one.These earphones not only provide extra bass but they also provide you sharper sound quality.Build quality is commendable.Some people complain about "not fitting in ear", which turns out to be true for certain people, though not for me.

name: Sandeep Solanki
title: Total waste of money, don't buy it.
content: Awful! the ear buds they dont fit in ear. You will irritated how many times the ear buds fall out of ear. You cant excersice(run,walk or do gym) with earphones on. Dont buy it.. And there is no return policy with it.

name: SS
title: Too much Worth
content: One of the best product I bought in last couple of years from quality and robustness perspective. Nice sound quality and pretty convenient in daily use. Do not worry about wore breaking or one side no sound kind of things.

name: Dhaivat Trivedi
title: Passive noise isolating eartips make the experience awesome.
content: Good build quality, good bass as promised. The mic feels a bit flimsy but it's not a deal breaker. The passive noise isolating eartips are definitely a inclusion in this price band. The earhooks are also included but hurts due to bad finish.

name: prashanth
title: Best budget earphones
content: Bass and is really good on these I have tried many other budget earphones akg,Samsung,Phillips,JBL but boat 225 is better in sound and also in build quality really good but earphones are too heavy the they these 6 shaped rubber thing that really helps prevents earphones falling out of ears second time I'm buying but

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not value for money
content: Sound quality poor. In place of giving extra prop, company should have improved sound quality... RS 549/- is not justified....I got defective product and I wanted to exchange but I didn't get time and lastly I got so irate with the product quality that I broke it completely and thrown it in dustbin. Earnest request please don't buy....

name: jp
title: NOT SUITABLE OUTDOORS
content: overall great earphones. amazing BASS. FITTING is the only PROBLEM..it keeps falling of one's ears.. eartips shud have been angled.. DO NOT buy if u have SMALL ear cavities or want to use outdoors.

name: Mohamad Shami
title: Awesome. worth for money
content: i have ordered 5 quantity for this item in last 1 year for myself and friends as gits.. Every time i found this earphone with awesome voice quality, base and most importantly sale after service.

name: Prince
title: Perfect name bassheads
content: Already using seinheiser , mi basics ..but no one can be compared with boss basshead 225 at this aggressive price range...got it in 499 ...but i can pay 800-900 for this type of product..build quality i good...i impressed with its bass..just loved it...go for it blindly if u loved bass...

name: venkatesh.K
title: Amazon delivery is too bad
content: earphones to costly parfomance are 200rs earphones only bass is good.. Amazon delivery is too bad. That's courier boy says product not deliver at my home pls collect at bus stop in main road. Ather cancel my order.That bus stand is nearly 1.5km at my home

name: Rakesh Paturkar
title: best quality, comes with 10 different sized buds for ...
content: best quality, comes with 10 different sized buds for each n everyone's ear. Superb quality sound. Best design in its class.. nice packing. comes with 1 year warranty incl of warranty card inside the box.. quick delivery from Amazon India.. Worth for the investment.

name: NUCLEYA
title: 🔥🔥🔥love these boat
content: Awesome product liked the sound ,bass and colour combo ...they give a lot of exrta ear buds in different varients..the color is so funky ...but a lil bit heavy on the ear plugins..all over the product is lit

name: Inderjeet
title: Super
content: Very good quality product, only one annoying thing, those pretty innocent ear buds keep coming off every now and then although boats provided with extra 6 7 pairs but I fixed them using fevikwik.

name: Akshay Paun
title: Overall Good!
content: Build quality and features are awesome... so if you're looking for show off then they are best.. Sound quality is ok and not so good because of extra bass. Those who prefer high bass can absolutely go for it. Although you can audjust sound effects in your music player to get a decent sound! Overall good!

name: SANTOSH
title: Wow One <3
content: Amazon delivery and product quality is outstanding.. the product came with a loose connection but on letting them know. immediately they replaced with a proper one.. Awesome one with the effects outstanding

name: Jay
title: Good quality, Bad design.
content: The biggest drawback is the shape of the earphone and the architecture the earphone is made of heavy metal so no earbuds will fit in. Sound is good but is irritates as it keeps coming off. With Lenovo K8 note, It has got a decent base, just better than average. If you already had amazing headphones you may be disappointed.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Surprising awesome!
content: I honestly didn't think that, for the price, these would be sooo good. Great bass and clarity. Mic is excellent too. Can't go wrong with the product. Durability yet to be established

name: Sheetal Tavhare
title: Okay Okay
content: It is Nice with base quality. Sound is also Okay.. The only thing I didn't like much about it is.. once plugged in ears.. it doesn't stay in your ears and comes out with little movement.

name: Ksr
title: Satisfactory
content: After receiving one side is nt working, requested for cancellation& replacement. Everyting went smooth. Thnx amazon

name: Vikas rawat
title: A good deal... For one year...
content: Giving this review after a year and half have passed on since I'm using this. The sound quality is amazing no doubt about that it's durable and as said doesn't get tangled up !. I really enjoyed using it..... But !!!! After one year it's left side stopped working and suddenly the right one as well !! N now it's just left in the drawer....

name: Midhun
title: Sound quality is good and the buds fit properly
content: Sound quality is good and the buds fit properly. But which product designer designed an ear phone with a jack that always seems to come off due to its dick like design. Half the time goes in making the headphone adjust to the jack properly.

name: Maheshwar Raut
title: Best headphones in this budget.
content: Best ever headphones you can get in this budget. I'm using it since a lot time. Some time stretch, got wet but still no problem. There is no compromise with anything such as wire quality, headphones unit, mic, button, 3.5mm jack. A must buy products.

name: Neha D.
title: Replace earphones
content: I want to replace my earphones. its not working properly from one side. it hasn't been two months since I bought it. I sent mail and call on there help line number but there was no response from them.. please guide me how I replace my earphones??

name: Aayushi nayak
title: Depends on you, working fine with me.
content: It's been 10months and there's been no issue/no glitch. If used properly and carefully, will stay for long. Mic also working great till now.

name: Sayyad S.
title: Great sound quality but littlebit weight
content: Pros : Great sound quality. Amazing product quality. Great noise cancellation. Best for pubg players. Cons : little bit weight. For small ears it will drop due to weight

name: Anu A
title: Left ear piece stopped working after an year
content: I bought this on 17th August, 2017. I was really satisfied that time. But after an year,by now, its left ear piece and mic is not working. So its durability is not fine.

name: Saurabh singh
title: Personal review
content: As per my view for using this earphones from last 2 days they are working properly and it has a bass like boom! And having awesome build quality , but only the problem is fitting ,they don't fit properly without earwings.. And at 499Rs it worth .

name: Bandana
title: Love it
content: After using it for 3 months am here to write review . overall built quality is good but sound quality is good okay okay type. bass is awesome good bass heads at this price range .got this before delivery date .overall am satisfied with this product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best in its class
content: The only best budget headphones that would survive longer then any other products available in market, plus the customer service of the company is commendable. They will replace your headphones if any issues without any questions or queries just keep your original box with you.

name: Gaurav Sharma
title: Mic Quality
content: The mic of this product doesn't have any sensitivity, you really need to keep it closest to the mouth using your hand and then only the other person can clearly listen to you, if this is a common feedback from other customer then this is not a hands free product, if this problem is only with my product, then i have been delivered a faulty product.

name: tejas
title: Always best
content: Received product with good packaging. Sound quality is good.. Earbuds is not that much comfortable.. Good quality wire with l shape connector

name: Sagar
title: No service centre
content: until now it worked properly but from few days rightside on gives low sound as compared with the left one. I'm facing this problem and there is nowhere a service centre near me not even in big cities near me so i don't know what to do and i still have it in warranty period. I hope that amazon will come up with some solution for me.

name: Aarti
title: Preferable
content: As there are many wireless earphones available in todays date but instead i would still prefer this one. Using it since the launch and this are my 2nd one as i lost my prev one. Awesome sound quality and bass

name: kirti kashyap
title: Bad quality
content: I didn't liked the product since the earphones doesn't fits in well and the most weird the strength of these wires are really bad as u can see

name: Amazon Customer
title: The earphones will keep falling off from your ears due to their weight.
content: 1. This is very annoying and because of it, I wear one around my neck.. 2. They will probably last you around 1 year, not more than that, with normal usage.. I have had 4 of these and none of them lasted more than a year.

name: Prakash Patel
title: Warranty End Device Stop Working
content: After sharp 1 year use this device stop working.What a great manufacture calculation,after 1 year warranty/guarantee plus device stopped working.Think twice before buying this device after guarantee period this device won't work.

name: Zeus
title: That bass man!!
content: These are just the best in under ₹500 price segment. Great build quality, good material, a bit on the heavy side.. Tooo loud. Need a little bit tweak with equaliser and you will feel the thumping bass in your head.

name: Rana Rajesh
title: Great product for bass lovers
content: The sound quality is average but the bass is awesome in this price segment. Overall, good for a bass lover but for a person who likes detailing in music it won't suffice his/her need. Also, ear buds are tight and are not comfortable for long use. Overall, value for money product.

name: swapnil D
title: Dammage product
content: Worest experience this time i am order 3times of this earphone but this time amazon gives me dammage product. Auto stop songs and play song. Automatic acctive my phonese assistance Alexa. Reciver is dammage

name: Selena L.
title: Worst experience ever..
content: Plzzzz don't buy this product...this product didn't last for even two weeks...if you want to buy a good earphone with this price then go for realme earphone at least it last more than two years..... this product is totally wastage of money...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Sound quality is not GREAT
content: The sound is loud enough, and noice cancellation works 'okay' in noisy surroundings. However, the quality of sound, the clarity of various frequencies is not good. Many a times for me, the feel of the music does not get transmitted to its full extent when listening through these earphones.

name: vaseem akram
title: Not Good in bass
content: The built quality is good, but as the mentioned on the box extraaa bass, there is little bit muddy bass not punchy what we normally preferred or you can compare bass with any 100rs. Ubon earphones bass both has the same bass quality. When we talk about Calling quality, the voice sounds painful little bit, heavy so overall i am not that much happy with the product as I listened so much good reviews before I bought this.

name: Praveen Kumar Mehta
title: Good for the price.
content: Might not fit on everyone's ear but was good enough for me. Sound quality is good for the price, even the quality of wire and build quality of earphones. No alternative in this budget.

name: Manoj
title: You will not regret buying this product
content: Product is amazing. Only problem is the buds are heavy and fell easily from ear but once you get used to it its normal. If you search for earphones under 600 its best.

name: Shoaib Yaseen Khan
title: No doubt , Go for it.
content: To be honest , I am using this for around 1.5 years the bass is awesome no doubt in this...But if you're not a basshead don't go for it...The bass is very high and in some cases you cannot hear the lyrics due toh high bass..if your bass lover go for it...Orelse go for Panasonic/Phillips.....

name: Saraansh B.
title: Best budget earphones but buy Sony XB55AP if you can afford it!
content: Great budget earphones. Probably the best in this price range but lacks a bit in clarity while offering a better bass than Sennheiser CX series. Highly recommend buying it unless you can afford Sony MDR XB55AP earphones which are the truly complete earphones with awesome sound and build quality.

name: Dhananjai K.
title: Great sound, and the included clip
content: Great sound,and the included clip,and ear hooks are quite useful.but changing the ear buds is very difficult,and most bud sizes provided are not that fitting,they fall off.for the price ,its good.

name: shubham
title: Best bass earphones
content: In this price segment ,this is the best you can get.Earphones are highly durable and feels premium ,it is slightly heavier due to metallic frame but I think that's not the big issue

name: Rajat Bansal
title: Good but Slippery as they are heavy comparitively
content: Good sound, good built quality, but a little bit heavy thus they keep slipping on from ears.. although they are very good, but you have many more better alternatives in the same price range. Inwould have preferred MI Earphone MRP 999 , sale price 599 approx

name: Sanghvi
title: Product doesn't match the pictures shown
content: I have used this product before and loved it for it's durability and sturdiness. Especially the jack. Turns out, even though they show the product being the same in the picture, what arrived WAS DIFFERENT. THE JACK IS SUPER FLIMSY.

name: Maaz Hashmi
title: Spoilt within a year
content: The music clarity and sound is good but the ear piece is problematic as it keeps falling off from the ears. I tried changing all possible rubber heads given with the ear phones, all of them fall off even when sitting and using the earphones. Plus the rubber heads does not stay on the ear phones and i have to always search for them in my bag and put them again to use them. Not satisfied with the product and the same needs improvement. Spoilt within a year.

name: Vishnu
title: Doesn't fit the ear
content: Not liked it because it doesn't fit perfectly in ear and comes off frequently due to the weight of the headphone..

name: Avijit Mandal
title: Excellent headphone
content: I have purchased a Sony for myself and boat headphone for my brother. With compared to both Sony and boat. It is found that boat headphones are more pleasant sound than Sony. It is really a good product.

name: Rajasekar
title: Review After five months..
content: I purchased sep 2019. Sound quality super... Personally I played pubg using this headset.. Its pure quality... But that mic stop working after two months.. Still working but not mic... Best sound base headset.. But seller is important..

name: Dr. Sinner
title: Good product
content: Very good piece,nice sound quality...just one drawback,that the earpieces are too heavy,so they might just slip off due to the wieght...my ears are usually not too good with in the ear,I prefer light wt. ,But if U are ok,these are very good pair,awesome sound.

name: Aarushi
title: Worked fine for 3 months

name: Rahul Prajapati

name: Juma A.

name: Amazon Customer
title: 3rd class earphone!!!!!!
content: Plz dont dont dont buy any Boat brand things... Earphone plug(from where we attach to phone) is giving problem. 2-3 days it was working well bt after tht problems was arriving cont. Same problem was with my friends who were using Bosts brand.. its really worst brant i have came across...

name: Ashok Jerry
title: Good bass and sound quality.

name: Mukhil Marx
title: Good sound output
content: The only headphones that has survived with me for a year and more. I had previously purchased brands like jbl ,seinheiser, Marley etc. This is too good for the price !

name: Debojit
title: Nice earphones.. go for them
content: good product with brilliant bass and nice sound quality. But microphone gets bad often.. I had ordered 2 pair of boat earphones and 2 boat 900 bassheads headphones.. 2 of them are in working condition and the remaining two, mic got damaged.. but they are still working.

name: Samuel A.
title: Quality compromised
content: Quality became poor. Last time in year 2018 when i ordered this the quality of the product was way different. But now it is totally poor quality. Material of wire, sound quality, colour etc. All poor. If anybody ordered earlier will notice this change of quality. (see image for colour difference).

name: makarand kulkarni
title: Defective & used boat earphone delivered
content: Used & defective item delivered.One side earphone is not working.Delivered product has scratches already .Shame on Amazon & boat.I never received used product in my Amazon purchases in last 4 years.But it can happen for sure.

name: Cecil
title: Very poor product
content: Worst product with too many defects, replaced the item 2 times and at last applied for a refund, mic stopped working, voice cuts in the middle and I would not recommend this product for other customers too.

name: Shobhit Mohan
title: Bad Boat product stopped working within 2.5 mnths
content: After only 2 and half months one side stopped working, now only one side working , didnt expect this quality from boat. I expect them to change/ replace the product when the lockdown opens.
