name: Meenakshi
title: Pls don't buy. Go for boat cheaper version
content: It's very heavy. It does not fit inside the ears. Keeps falling down. Even my friends tried the head of earphone is heavy

name: Santosh
title: Got damaged product... Earphones NOT WORKING
content: I got a damaged product or used one... This is first time I am buying boat earphones and my first experience was worst..... Seriously... There is no sound coming from both the ear buds.... How such reputed company like boat could sell such damaged earphones

name: Santosh B Phad
title: Good
content: Very heavy, keep slipping our of your ears, so dont buy, you will get pissed off. If u can manage with weight and slipperyness, then this is the best item in terma of sound quality and durability

name: ROHAN
title: Auto Switches endlessly...... Pathetic!!!
content: Automatically plays the next song when you play from YouTube.. Tried to stop the same by turningoff auto switch, but effort went in vain.. It's quite irritating and headphones becomes useless if this happens continuously which is the case with my headphone.. My money got wasted. Need to buy a new one, definitely not of boAt

name: Aayush
title: Best in price and Good product
content: Spec:. 3/5. Average on Sound. Noise cancellation upto mark with set pair of plugs given. Bass quality is average. Others:. 4/5. Good for travel use,. Good design,. Product as in pictures,. Best among price range,. Timely delivery.

name: Sourabh singh
title: One of the finest best and comfortable headphones under 599.
content: one of the best earphones under this prize and moreover sound quality is superb.. talking abiut comfort they do fit well and those complaining of discomfort are either not humans or thy dont know how to use these bass heads... earphones r superb u should go for it!!!!. I will change my review after 1 year of use. till now i have used them for 2 months

name: Mariyam
title: Worst!
content: It has been a month that I bought it and has stopped functioning. It kept falling out of my ear, i think due to the weight of mic that could not be handled by the slim wires, even though I tried different sized earpieces provided. I am gonna try replacing with coMpany as amazon closed return but don't know whether it will be possible or not. Will update.

name: AmazonOfficial
title: Rock the music
content: Perfect headphones for noise free sounds.. Bass and trouble is well balanced. Using it from last 3 months and found no issue.

name: Suraj Shrivastav
title: Catchy, heavy bass & heavy material.
content: Its loud, durable however its a bit heavy bcz of which it may fall off frm ur ears. If U can change other earbuds then it would be ok. Bass is heavy & it looks catchy.

name: Ankita vora
title: Worst product
content: Its less than a year and one side headphone stopped working.. I was not happy about it , but when i went to company website and raise a ticket.. The team got it collected from my house, got me a new one within a week.. Satisfied with product and now Service too

name: Amazon Customer
title: THE BUILD QUALITY OF THE PHONE IS POOR.
content: The rubber earbud tips are too lose. They fall off easily. And the overall build quality of the earphone is too poor. Go for Jbl or any other earphone. Don't buy this one.

name: mukul pitale
title: True boat experience
content: I am simply happy with this product. Best part is good looks, life like sound, with in budget, light weight, comfortable in ears, nice colour. Its a TIK-TAK-TOE experience. All the best to music lovers.

name: Nidhi
title: Worth the price
content: This is the best earphones ive ever purchased. The sound quality is fab and also they provide extra buds. Go ahead and buy it guys. Its worth the price.

name: Sanchi
title: Not good for exercise
content: Bass is good, everything is good but the main thing is this Earphone is not good for walk + running+ exercise cuz it's fall out easily from the ears. So i highly recommend not buy for the purpose of running and exercise.

name: Manoj
title: Niceeee
content: Bass lover go for it, but I feel uncomfortable for long time use, wire and build quality nice, sound nice, bass nice .. little heavier on ear

name: Shaik Noor Mohammad
title: TEACH LESSON TO EVERY ONE
content: This ear plugs teach you how to use the ear phones in your life.. In first week I got ear problem that it first not setting up properly to my ear. I had huge pain in my ear.. Then I reduce using the ear phone in every time.. I only use them when it's imp at particular times.. I'm really telling you that they will teach every one.i can't tell u entire story. you will experience it.

name: Manish Batra
title: Not good enough
content: Started using this recently.. just after few days (15-20 days), microphone suddenly stopped working..

name: yudi
content: Comapring the sound quality to apple earphones... BASS is top notch... but the vocals were not very clear... not fully satisfied with the treble tho... but then again what can you expect from a 500₹ earphones... material is good. Bass is too good... but it lacks vocal clarity i feel

name: Amazon Customer
title: Fake product
content: First time I received fake product in Amazon.....am really fed up the product....low level quality and sound...I have the headset the quality and sound awesome then I purchased again to gift my wife this headset ....this time I received fake products.....don't cheat Ur customer yar.....😟😟😒😫

name: Vicky
title: Not that much satisfied
content: Its good for music bt in gaming effect and for long time uses i didn't experienced it suitable also the weight of earfone is slightly more bcoz of that it slips out of ear canal. And couldn't connect to all the devices i have

name: Dr. Swetha
title: Worst product ever received
content: The product was delivered on time. However, when I started using it I encountered all sorts of problems. When on call, it'll automatically mute the call and when I plugged in to hear music, it kept pausing and then playing and suddenly the songs started changing. I didn't expect this with such a standard product. Doesn't deserve even one star😣

name: Debjyoti Banerjee
title: Awesome product.
content: Please I recommend this product at this unbeatable price. Better response than Apple Earpods and JBL earphones. I have compared them with boAt BassHeads. One of the best.

name: Muhammed Yashin
title: Great product
content: The product has a good built quality and sound. I am a rough used of earphones. Usually i could only handle a earphone for hardly 6 months thankfully this earphone stood for 9 months before it was stollen from my office. I have ordered the same product again.

name: uditjain
title: Got a defective piece
content: I had gifted to someone this earphone directly to their address. I only came to know later that the quality of sound in earphone was not good. There is a humming sound in background all the time. The person i gifted thought that the earphone was like this only.

name: R.GOPIKRISHNA
title: EARPHONES BEST BUDGET
content: Perfect in this budget.. Good to listen English albums.. Metallic.. And mic one button was also good.... Only drawback it comes off everytime.. Boat uno also same problem.. Remaining awesome.. Got For 389

name: D. SRINIVAS
title: The mic quality is really poor
content: These aren't comfortable if you are using them for more than 2 hours, and the other person is not able to hear from you.. All he hears is the noise, did multiple calls and all of them said the same thing.. Very disappointed with the product.

name: AMIT SURI
content: Its been almost 6 months since i purchased this product, headphones were good at the beginning, i used the product very rarely and now when i plug it in my ears no audio plays on right side and after 2 days left side is also not working.

name: Etii
title: Instead of giving these much accessories, focus on the main product. That will help you in longer run.
content: Too bad to be given even 2 stars. No matter whichever ear plug you use, it will not stay in your ears. And due to its weight, you can't use it for more than half hour.

name: Harsh
title: Good ear phone with mic
content: People who like high bass quality product go for it. It's cheaper in this price range and is durable.. Sound quality is clear N crisp. Fits perfectly in ear.

name: Christina
title: Better than I expected!
content: I was a bit hesitant to buy headphones online but this product didn't disappoint me. The headphones proved to be of good quality and was close/true to the product description.

name: Darth Vader
title: Value for money
content: These earphones are amazing.. The build quality is awesome.. Only con with these is that they tend to fall off while brisk walking.. The earphones lasted a whole year of rough usage before one the buds stopped working.

name: Rahul Raj
title: Package was broken badly and product is damaged
content: Once I got this product. Earphone package was broken badly and stitched with elastic (I have uploaded photos of that) . I am totally dissappointed with Amazon this time. How can I trust? Audio jack is not working properly. I requested to return the earphone. I'll purchase another or will purchase from another shopping site.

name: Nikhil
title: Sounds tinny!
content: This may look good, but the good part ends there. The sound is tinny and it gets amplified as you increase the volume. I can never prefer to use them in high volume. The bass is not worth mentioning. Overall, does the job if you are not an audiophile.

name: Amaljith
title: Good
content: The sound is good and the packing is excellent.. The only problem I faced after using it was the left side volume is slightly decreasing in between here and there while playing music as well as while talking.

name: Abhi J
title: like 'em!
content: sometimes it think it has way too much bass; it overlaps the other instruments, notes etc in some songs. also the body of the headphones is kinda heavy and they slip out of the ear if it weren't for those hook like things that are provided... overall they're good for that low price tag.

name: Ullas Mondal
title: One of best I've ever used
content: One of best I've ever used. Bass is fantastic but varies with source devices. Build quality is great. The only reason I can't give it 5/5 stars because of its weight. The earphone covers are made of metal and it is a bit too heavy and sometime you will really feel the need to put it down for a moment. But within (₹499-₹599) this range of price this is an awesome choice.

name: Deepa Chauhan
title: Don't trust the brand (#no boat)
content: I am not able to get the warranty of 1year of boat products , useless services provided by boat company . Don't buy this product . Since month of March , I am not able connect to boat services. And also not answered by Amazon . I will definitely rise this issue on twitter.

name: Samrat Saha
title: Good product, long warranty and quality Customer Service.
content: For the price, it is a great option. Sound is good, bass is okay and build quality is very good. The best part is their service after sale.

name: Sai ramam
title: Best at this price
content: One of best earphones I ever purchased I using it since 2 years In between 2 years once one side of my headphones stopped working I asked replacement to boat they provided u replacement at ur doorstep it was soo nice of boat now still iam using it I purchased it at 2017

name: Vinoth
title: Extreme bass
content: As its name, bass is extreme. Yes extreme. We require to fine tune the equilizer to listen songs. Else, continuously hearing in high bass affects the audio quality and also ends with headache..... So, player without equilizer is not suitable for this earbuds.....

name: Vivek Kulkarni
title: Good product, worth the price
content: Good set of headphones. Ok for regular daily usage. Has only one button to play/pause music or video or receive/end call. Sound quality is ok on both ends of the frequencies. Overall good product worth the money. Definitely try. Good deal on Amazon and timely delivery too. Was we'll packed. The forest green color looks amazing too.

name: Deepak Kashyap
title: Good quality
content: Sounds quality, noise cancellation & bass quality all good

name: Utkarsh
title: Much better then all the earphones available below 1k
content: It sounds far better than Sennheiser cx180 in every expect.. But just being slightly larger and heavier becomes uncomfortable in long run. However, that's a plus point too cause it is much more durable than S cx180.

name: Anas Ahmad
title: Best earphone and good customer support!
content: Review after 1 year:. Sound quality of this earphone is amazing. Earphones are bit heavy but managable with the use of clips. Bass is just best. Got problem in one side after 7 months but got replaced without problem. So it was a positive experience for me!

name: raman
title: Good sound quality
content: Sound quality is good can't say the same about the product quantity. Me and many of my friends bought it but after 1 year of usage we all faced the same issue of no sound from one of the ear plug.

name: Priyansu Choudhury
title: Overall sounds really good
content: Sound quality is awesome if you are not a bass lover. Its made of metal so you will feel it cold on winter and the ear piece are big so the rear part rubs with the ears and it pains due to its rough texture design.

name: charanjit singh
title: Hmm
content: The mic is damaged and now i want to exchange this product in warranty. But the problem, I lost the Invoice.... Still I have the same, couldn't exchange those...

name: chandra Sekhar .G
title: Quality of material
content: Product is really good and sound quality is excellent 👍. Material is also really strong .. I loved it ,easy to pic the call . Stiffness is good I love it. U try these earphones and definitely you will love these ..

name: Preet Raikar
title: Best earphones within 600rs
content: I had bought these earphones on 21st September 2017. The sound of these earphones is crystal clear.The volume of the earphones is quite loud even at mid range volumes.The bass is quite good at low frequencies.The additional earbuds help for a comfortable fit.For the price within 600rs these are the best earphones you can buy.

name: Customer
title: Pathetic Durability
content: The sound quality of the product is is very good. But the major issue is the durability. I had purchased this twice and even after taking alot of care of the product it still stopped working. It's highly irritating to hear music only in one ear. I had purchased this product is June 2018 and within 4 months it's useless. I wouldn't recommend this product.

name: ram
title: Super extras bass not in this product
content: Bass quality is poor, when compared to other product, my previous product was boat baseheads 162model that model is very good and best bass quality, I really like that. I don't feel any base quality in boat 225 model

name: Gokulamuthukrishnan R
title: Good for short term usage, not for long time
content: Been using this for 6 months and now one side is not working. As I said, if you only wanna use this for short term like 6 months, u can buy this. Else, if you're looking at long term, go with good brands unlike boAt.

name: himanshu khati
title: 3.8 rating
content: Nice product. The only problem is that they can't hold in ear even while walking. Even when I used to walk 100 metres with fast steps they get out of ears.. Good earphones in such price. Just need to change the design of earplugs.

name: Anukul Kumar
title: Good for calls,not for music lovers
content: Good for taking regular calls and meeting. Ear buds are heavy (metallic) and they keep falling.looks good. Bass and tremble are just okay. Not for music lovers.just for calls mic quality is good, never faced call quality problem.

name: Saravanan
title: Overpriced
content: I paid ₹600 for this but my friend got this headset for ₹350 on local market. Here it is overpriced. Sound quality is good though but price here is disappointing.

name: seaeagle
title: Nice sound quality
content: They are nice but don't fit as comfortably in the ear as I expected them to

name: Harshita vaishnav
title: Best build quality, sound and look
content: Best earphone. Give premium look. But becoz of metallic head it's little bit heavy. For long time it's not comfortable (after 2-3hr) . In my earphone 1 head stop working... But BOLT service is very good within warranty they send a person to pick your earphone and just replace it and give new one. Nearly in 7days.

name: Venkat
title: I am totally disappointed with this product
content: I am totally disappointed with this product. After month one ear not at all working and. When am trying to customer care no response from any one though my product in warranty no one is supporting to solve my problem. Am not suggesting this. Poor and very bad service for any queries and help

name: Himanshu dwivedi
title: Quite good.
content: Earplugs are quite decent for the price range.. Bass is actually good and highs and mids Are Considerably good. If you can extend you budget then go for cx 180 but yea that doesn't contains microphone. So with microphone this is a quite decent.

name: knight
title: Bad earphones
content: Good initial performance. Want to see now how long it works like this. Shit earphones the mic started showing issues. Automatically starts Siri or google voice commands.strted showing issues in a month.

name: Vivek
title: Best in budget.
content: The item is made very sturdy with the additional feature of tangle free wire. The sound quality is superb.. The only fault is the buds do not fit properly into the ear. They keep falling. But there are additional 4 pairs provided with the package.. Best advice is to go for it budget earphones.

name: abhinavjha
title: The bass of these earphones are lit
content: Likes-. 1. It has amazing sound and EDMs are perfect for these earphones.. 2. While watching movies on phone with these earphones it gives perfect sound as if you are in a multiplex .. 3. Noise cancellation is very good.. Dislikes-. 1. It doesn't fit in the ears while we are working out.

name: Sreenath K P
title: Value for money product.
content: Thought it was a waste of money when i bought it before 8 months since it wasn't fitting. Then changed earbuds with that of a damaged jbl. Now it is working fine,has extra bass. Using for a long time will cause pain. Build quality is good and also tangle free. In the morning, it's cold due to the metal present.

name: Manoj Mandal
title: Unnecessarily Heavy
content: I am not happy with this product ☹️. I am using another Boat headphone since 5 months which is working fine. But this one disappointed me.

name: Manan
title: Value for money
content: I've been using it for about 3-4 months and I can say it's a very good product. Very good sound quality. The only drawback is it's not fit in ear and can fall down from ear very easily.

name: Rajneet Kaur
title: AMAZING!!!
content: My best money ever spent on earphones.. They r super amazing. .......sleek.. Buy blindly.. You would not regret.

name: Devz
title: Good
content: Its good, but don't know why it always fall off from my left ear. I tried all the buds.....

name: Guru Brahmchari
title: Made by China
content: Made in China product.

name: Aryan saxena
title: Nice ass earphones
content: They are a nice alternative if you have an Bluetooth earbud and you are tired recharging it again and again..sound is fairly good and bass is again good for its price but as i used an better earphone for a long time before my dog chew it..it will take some time to be familiar agin with wires

name: Sourabh Biyani
title: Budget earphone
content: Loved it at the price. But it falls off from ears while walking or roaming around. As well the earpiece is made of metal therefore it's heavyweight for ua ears compared to other earphones at same budget. U can go for it once.

name: Adarsh
content: Love these. Extra sturdy and durable. Sound quality awesome of course.. For those who are saying that the earphones fall off, just use the smaller pair of buds given with the earphones. Then it will stay put.

name: Pranavi Sudarsan
title: Less durability making it unworthy of the price
content: The package was great when received. There were enough sets of extra earbuds. I used them with oneplus3t for calls and music.. Within three months of purchase they suddenly stopped working (without any rough handling). I am yet to claim the warranty.

name: Rithvik
title: Bass🤟🤙👌, But???
content: Perfect for bass lovers. But I suggest you to replace the eartips which comes with the earphones and use another one. The eartips with the earphones are so loose.Noise cancellation is upto expectations for this budget

name: Abhishek Rath
title: Awesome build, sound quality and comfortable. Loved it.
content: I love this earphone. They are awesome. The sound and bass quality is superb. The saunds are also quite clear. Good loudness. Comfortable in wearing for long durations but sometimes gets a little sweaty. Also the in packet eartips were useful as the default ones were a little big. If u r looking for great sound in this price range then go for it.

name: Roy
title: For budget its perfect!
content: The built quality is the BEST I have seen compared to all the earphones I've ever used its really strong the only cons of it is that the mic and the button stop working eventually if you have a habit of working out it em on!

name: S R
title: ... be losing my money the product didn't feel so great over the screen of the pc
content: Opted for Boat BassHeads with a shaky heart that i'll be losing my money the product didn't feel so great over the screen of the pc. but once used i have been using it for more then a month and a half the sound and the bass are top notch and the noise cancellation is so good you can get hit by a car but not listen to it horn ;3 by far the best earphones i have had at this price point.

name: sumi raj
title: Dont go for this as it keeps falling off from ear
content: Using it now for more than a week.. But totally not recommended because of faulty design due to which it keeps falling from ears. Now not able to return the product also 🤦🏻‍♂️ Waste of money. Dont go for this.. Only pro is that Good in terms of sound quality for the affordable price

name: Shivang Shukla
title: Good sound quality but poor mic
content: Sound quality noise cancellation and bass quality is good but mic quality is too bad.. Friends agar sirf gane sunne h to hi ye achha h , agar call karni h to ye bht bekar h naa lena paisa barbad h. Mic se awaj bht blur ho kr jati h

name: Roushan Kumar Yadav
title: Honest review
content: Every thing is awesome . I play pubg using it & the sound of pubg is so clear i can hear the footprint of players clearly & direction of players also. The only problem is when u use it while charging your phone u will hear vibration sounds . ( English ki maa ki 😀)

name: Jit
title: BAD
content: I ordered this product just before the lockdown and got it after 3 months in June end. it is September now and the earphones are acting weird, I cannot hear anything, sound increases decreases itself and the video /Audio file get's closed by itself.

name: K KRISHNA KUMAR
title: Good product with better quality.
content: Good product with better quality. I recommended to my friends. They also purchased and felt happy.

name: Atul
title: Writing after 1 year of use
content: Writing this review after a year of use the product is good in this price range sound quality is good for music lovers as well as mobile gamers just had starting to have problem with mic after a year but its still working fine as i use it for music go for it

name: Prasanna kumar gattu
title: Not fitting
content: Fitting is very important,. small ear buds also not fit properly,. this company not take care about fitting,. really sooo bad,. only care about sound. Ear bud come outside,. I return this product...

name: Mekala Devi
title: Oki quality for this price but this headphones makes my ear pain
content: Product is Oki for this price.and sound us also Oki but this one is not suitable for long-term use..I don't know it's only me but this makes my ears painful and not stiff comes out of ears with slight touch

name: Nandan Hegde
title: Average product
content: I won't recommend this product. Good sound quality, good bass and vocals. It was nice for first 9 months. now has issues with jack. Music comes from one side. need to press and hold to listen from both sides.

name: Sreya
title: Does the job
content: These lasted me 2 years surprisingly. Used it everyday. And it lasted that long. Overall a good product.

name: Vigy
title: good quality super built
content: My search is completed....what a mindblasting earphones....good quality super built....clear sound loud bass.....boat #salute....thank you amazon for such good earphones at such a low price....thank you @cloudtail india for good packaging and sending again a genuine product...

name: lakshman kumar
title: I like so much and u will also like
content: I like it's build quality I already buy the earphones I been using 8monts ,and I suggest for my friend for brought once again. Friends this is best ear phones in 600rs quality and design was good,. After long use completed of 1year of use its sound quality as like ite new the wire and quality of product is super because its metal body.

name: Hari Narayanan
title: Best headphone from boat...🎧😍
content: Material quality looks good and comfortable....I purchased 1 year before...Till now it was working fine without any problem....Main thing was bass was excellent and smooth....i bought it in a great indian sale ....Kindly you can go for this decent product ...Thanks to amazon

name: Viru surendar
title: One of the Best Headset bought ever.
content: I have liked the built quality and design. Good to hear melody songs during night time. My second fav headset next to panasonic. Only concern most i felt it dont have grip on my ears to adjust changed the buds size but felt the same. Overall nice headset 4/5. for design and sound 5/5

name: Santosh P.
title: Worth buying
content: Very nice product. Using it since last 1 month. Sound quality is very good. Bass is also nice. I would recommend it to anyone who wants to buy a headphone.

name: SRao
title: Problem with rubber of ear buds
content: It's been 2 months I'm using this earphone. The major problem I'm facing most of the times is that the removal of rubber in earbuds. I need to search and place it again but it's of no use

name: Harekrushna Sahoo
title: Budget friendly bass head
content: I have been using this earphones for quite a while now. The sound is really great for this price point. The L shaped pin is quite comfortable and easy to use. Just don't use too much force while pulling out in a difficult angle. It might break your internal headfone port. Apart from that it's really a budget friendly and fully bass earphone.

name: Ritik Tailor
title: Best in this price range
content: The earphones are made from metal, so in winter it gets quite cold and when they touch our skin it feels kinda cool. The design is splendid. If you need more bass go for the Sennheiser but this product is awesome and a decent sound and bass quality.

name: Deepali
title: Not worth purchase
content: Bought this product in July , in beginning it sounds amazing everything was fine but now its just mid november its the worst purchase I have ever made stopped connecting to my phone, sound distorted and bad .Its still in warranty want to replace this product asap tell me how its done.

name: Sandeep Arambam
title: Good amount of bass but muddy and not so clear sound quality.
content: The sound quality is not that good. I feel the sound quality is a little bit muddy and not so clear but good amount of bass. But despite having a good bass if the sound quality is not clear its not good to listen to music. Overall i give this product 3 stars.

name: Amazon Customer
title: please don’t buy.
content: What’s the use of quality when it won’t fix properly in ears. It slips like hell..., it would be good if it is anti slippery.

title: Volume too low problem ?
content: If your device ( Computer or Tab ) doesn't have a mic or is not configured for mic , volume from headphones will be low. Buy a earphone splitter along with this. That should solve the problem.

name: Rao
title: boAt BassHeads 225 in-Ear Super Extra Bass Headphones
content: It is good one. Recommend to buy. But cost is little higher. Sound quality is good, cable is very flexible and quality of cable is very good.

name: Ranesh
title: Overall i satisfied with this product
content: Bass quality is very good at this price range. I have purchased this product by Amazon 499. Value for money product at that price point. I received 3 piar of earbud s. Overall worth for money earphone. If you bass lover and your budget under 500 than buy this product

name: Rajdeep G.
title: Just perfect on Everything and Everybuddy...
content: This is a perfact headphone for bass and also sound quality is very good... Not to high not too low ... Just perfact ... Its look very premium and color is also attractive... One think I personally don't like, that is it's fitness... It's not very fitted on ur ears... But at this prize point i think it's a best deal... Thanx a lot amazon...

name: Shashank Patel
title: Very Ok
content: The fit is not that good. They are a bit heavy as well, so they fall out event while brisk walking. Sound quality is decent. Only plus for me was flat wires as they don't tangle much.

name: Akshay Pancholi
title: More than 3yr of use, i bought a new one though still it is working perfectly
content: Super base, excellent noise cancellation, good for base..... not good for soft song listeners.... best for pubg players..... excellent service by boat (takeaway from home @0 charges)

name: Hrishikesh Lakhotia
title: Wonderful Earphones! Loved It!❤
content: in Love with this Earphones. Wonderful bass and sound. The Sound quality is excellent. The build material is also very nice. Although I've a little issue with fittings in ears. The fitting in ears is not very good because it pops out of the ear though Ear Hooks which has came with the earphones has basically solved the fitting problem in ears and made the fitting of earphones much better. So, I am totally satisfied with this Earphones.👍👍

name: kiran kumar.b
title: Less thumping,more of clarity,but too big for ears
content: Thumping effects are low comapred to boat 100 ,I thought it would be nice to buy 225,so am disappointed..and it's not good to return back

name: Ratul Shee
title: For bass lover and for PUBG ❤️
content: I use 1 year .👂. Osam sound quality 👌. Bass are are osam.🥰🥰. I am bass lover I love it ❤️❤️. Flexible cable durability best quality 👌👍.. I play pubg footsteps are very very clear sound.😮

name: Basavaprabhu
title: Good Sound quality , bad Endurance
content: 2nd review for the same product. Overall a good ear phone, great sound quality. looks good, perfectly priced. but wears and tears after 6 months, first one ear piece stops working and soon another... its good if u wanna use for half a year or so

name: Aditi Mahale
title: The best earphones.
content: I have been using Boat earphones for the last 4 years.. have found them to be very good. Great bass and sound quality. Superb for listening to music or watching content.

name: Divya sharma
title: Dissatisfied due to products durability
content: The product is good but I started experienciexperiencing problem in the headphone nearly after 6 months as the Jack was having some issue and the voice is coming only in one side. I complained for the same headphone was taken from my place and returned to me back with no improvement in its condition. The product is in warranty but what is the use of warranty if we don't get it in a good condition.

name: Md Zafirul Hasan
title: I think I got faulty one
content: Its Ear Tips are not not permanent. Every time Ear Tip found missing, I have to search everywhere. Its really pathetic. This is only issue but I think its one of the biggest.

name: Om Prakash
title: One side not working after 15 days
content: normally I appreciate the boat product but unfortunately the one side of earphone is not working after only 16 days. I am unable to call others by this earphone only able to listen with one side.. Actually not in the position to recommend others.

name: Rahul jadhav
title: Worth for the price, on time delivery - go grab one of these
content: Worth for the price is what I ll term this product, as the name suggests its good on bass, provides different sets of muffs to fit your ears, good work on noice cancelation for the price. Overall I would suggest this product anytime for this price range. Amazon delivered it on time, great service.

name: Sunil
title: Nice earphones
content: A nice earphone in this price range.....using it more than a year now and it still works fine. Sound quality could have been a bit better but overall its a nice earphone to have.

name: Prashant
title: Bit heavy
content: Sound : awesome. Base : adequate. Built quality : metal : it's bit heavy for the earphones it falls off at almost every instance. and when the coating/paint on the metal earpiece wear off I felt some static shocks while using it with my PC and laptop.

name: Manjunatha J
title: Earphones sounds good...
content: A very good earphone by Boat. The sound quality and noise cancellation is good for an earphone at this price range. The volume control feature is also provided along with call receiving/disconnecting feature. Worth the price...

name: Dr. Devdutta Mishra
title: Boat With a Bass
content: The headphone is really good and durable, the strangle free cable is a plus point and sound is also really good with bass. But the only problem I faced is dat when u use it for a prolonged period the ear starts acheing...and after 2& half months of usage the mic didn't work....so the nice thing is also that u can claim it in warrenty.... otherwise it's a good product...

name: K S
title: Awesome awesome awesome
content: It's awesome... Audio quality is so good... I love the color... Packing is amazing with all the accessories... I've kept the box instead of buying any other pouch for handsfree... Worth the price... 👍

name: ANUP
title: Lost one side sound and microphone functioning.
content: I have purchased this product and now I lost my one side sound amd microphone functioning.. Extremely disappointed with this product I think you should work on this BOAT company.. Worst experience have ever.

name: ashish
title: worse warranty service
content: it started malfunctioning the day return period ended. I have sent them for replacement under warranty. but no communication from warranty department. I don't know if I will be getting replacement or they just took the product and forgot it. and no answers on customer care number.

name: Bhavesh gaur
title: Plz read before u buy it 3 3 earphones use krne k bad review h
content: Sound thik thak h, outer build qaulity b thk h but mice wale joint me bahut hi loose h jb b kice hilta h to left wala speaker bnd ho jata h wire loose ho jata h ek do bar ni mere 3 3 me yhi dikkt aayi h same, tb ja ke ye review likh rha hu...

name: Aparna Gautampurkar
title: Awesome Earphones
content: Sound Quality is Good and does not hurt even if you use it for a longer time. Awesome sound quality, noise cancellation, bass level, mids highs lows perfectly balanced and specially the Quality of the product is Awesome, just a bad thing in this product is, it gets out from your ear when you are in motion.

name: Ankit Verma
title: Below Average Earphone
content: Sound quality isn't good. Not of premium quality. You can prefer JBL over It. JBL gives you excellent sound quality.

name: Ekansh Paudwal
title: Excellent bass but cheap earbuds
content: 5/5 For Bass. 4/5 For Sound Quality, bass is high so music isn't that clear. 2/5 For Earbuds quality, feels cheap and they keep falling off

name: Shashwat Anand
title: Decentl performer
content: See the only disadvantage being is the earphones come out of the ear easily even if you are using the biggest earbuds available with the same. So take that into account if you are not using it for sports or any other purpose one of the best ones in the price segment

name: @banaras_wala_ladka
title: Best earphones in market
content: Confused???. Just go for it you'll never feel disappointed.. I'm taking the guarantee of sound it delivers, bass it produces and the enjoyment it gives.

name: Amazon Customer
title: My point of view alone.
content: Sound quality, noise cancelation and bass quality is up to the mark and is as expected. The only downside is keeping the earpieces firmly in the 👂 but that's only until you get used to it.. However, if ur someone who listens to music on wheels the earphone is not so comfortable under the helmet. Overall, a very good product. Recommended.

name: Sk Sharuk Mohammad
title: Boat 225 Super Earphone
content: Boat 225 earphone is good for those who love super bass. Its bass is good and also noise cancellation. Terible is moderate but sound is clear.. I've brought it in Great Indian Sale for just Rs 299/-. Unbelievable deal. Price was Rs 499/- and got Rs 200/- cashback.

name: harnisttanna
title: Best bass effect earphones
content: Pro.. Satisfied with sound quality with your you are paying.. Wire gets entangled.... But obviously better then simple wire.. Good noise cancellation. If you are looking for Bass effect then it's best. You can have

name: Harshdeep Singh
title: Quality product at a great price
content: I have been using them almost everyday since last 6 months and I gotta say I was skeptical about them but they are a really great product at this price range. Build quality is solid. Sound, especially the bass is superb. Does not feel like a cheap pair of earphones. Their after sales service is also good. Go for it.

name: A very discriminating customer
title: Good for the price.
content: These are not meant for audiophiles. You get what you pay for. I'd definitely recommend it since the quality is excellent, audio frequencies are good and audio quality is better than competition at this price range.

name: Saurabh Ghewari
title: Boat cannot be compared.
content: Best wire headphones I have used. Used JBL, sennheiser. But Boat beats all. Sound quality and wire quality is best.. Also beats in price for other headsets.. Best buy.

name: Sumeet
title: Mind blowing product.
content: Mind blowing sound with quality of good wire length.. For this price this product is awesome. And sound quality is fabulous.if u have any problem with your headphone then you can directly exchange it from company.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Low quality,  will damage within 1 month of use
content: It is damaged within 1 wonyh and also bass is too high, you will get headache within few mins by using this headphone

name: Ronak
title: Nice head phone
content: Nice head phone.. 1- it looks awesome. 2- sound is good. 3- noise cancellation works good. 4- bass is excellent no doubt. 5- worth buying this codes. 6- not giving 5 starts because on first day ears was stated paining but not satisfied with this no issue seen till now.

name: Arjun Singh
title: Best sound quality in this price range but not for workout.
content: Giving review after 5 months of use.. Best in bass looks are also very good but not for working out or running because it fells down while running or work out but I found it best in sound and bass quality that's why I kept it.. Only for listening to music and watching movies but defenetely not for working out.

name: Suman
title: Good Bass
content: Very nice earpiece.. Bass is nice but sound clarity isn't that good... But not that bad either.. Comparing bass, sound clarity is fine

name: N Chetan kumar
title: My Opinion
content: Sound quality is good, Noise cancellation Never mind & Bass is also Good. Evrythng good in this product but the only minus point of this product is your Ears👂 starts paining & irrating in internal canal of the ears.

name: arjun
title: Replacement required on priority
content: nice for short time. Now am facing lot of promblem in my set ibrealy disappointed with the product pls take back and pls replace with new head set dont loose cuatomers. Or pls refund my money as per warrenty my head set to be replace.

name: Shashank K.
title: Too heavy to handle
content: Comes cheap with good sound quality. But it's not at all handy , the earbuds are too heavy and always tend to fall out. It's of no practically use.

name: Shashant
title: Great sound quality at such price!
content: Noise cancellation is good and sturdy design, overall a great combo at this price!

name: Adarsh Verma
title: Defective
content: I think i got a used product. The build is quite old and one side is not working properly. Previously, i had ordered many things from amazon but this is the 3rd time that i got defective/wrong product. Highly disappointed.

name: Mounica
title: About product
content: As usual Amazon always delivers on time.. Coming to product-Sound quality is superb.. The color is different near ear plugs.. But the problem, is the ear phones come out of the ears due to the weight near ear plugs. This can be managed by using the support of the clip.

name: Prathamesh Lot
title: Bass is awesome, But Comfort is very Bad
content: Sound quality and build quilty is next level. But in terms of comfortness this earphones are very bad. You can't use this for long time. Ears paining after sometime. As these earphones are littlebit heavier than usual earophones

name: RK
title: Value for money
content: I ordered this specific for mic use , to avoid using phone directly...it's extra bass pulled me to use for music too... But the only problem I found is it fits loose in my ears so I will try other different style Ear pads received it... Else amazing product and value for money... BOAT..

name: Yasin
title: Uncomfortable
content: Sound quality and everything is good. But very uncomfortable in the ear. Don't buy if you concerned about comfort level. Its getting painful if you use it for long time. And you have to adjust a lot, because it can be removed with a slighest of movement. Ridiculous

name: RUPESH TYAGI
title: This product worked for only 3 months
content: My earphone stopped working after 3 months of purchase. Since it was promised that this product comes with a warranty of one year, I request you to please change my earphone. I also have emailed to Boat's official mail address but they have not responded yet. I request Amazon to please look into this matter

name: sravya roy k
title: using it for extended period of time is giving me ear pain sound quality not so good.. colour is excellent
content: the ear phones seem too big for me..using it for extended period of time is giving me ear pain. sound quality not so good... colour is excellent..packaging compact..

name: MAYOOGH GIRISH
title: Won't Recommend
content: After 2-3 weeks one earpiece stopped working. After taking to the amazon customer care the gave replacement (kudos for that). But the same thing happened with the new one after couple of months,

name: PALAGIRI SHASHANKA
title: Wow..  I am totally  surprised. Simply  superb!!!!
content: Wow.. Its a surprise for me!! I have been using. Lots of headphones and earphones of top brands but this earphones of 500 surprised me a lot.. Tjis earphones are really good., bass mid and treble. are really so perfect Quality is also very good. I subjects this earphones 100%. Go head and buy it. I am sure you are not going to regret!!!!

name: Rajan diwedi
title: Amazing sound
content: Superb product. Very crisp sound quality. Nice base. A little higher on the treble but not much. Just takes getting use to. Used a sony earphones before this and find this equally good if not better. Love the base.

name: Vaishanavi Pandey
title: Less durable
content: It was good in starting bt after some time only one earphone stop working

name: tarit ananth
title: For daily use it is great 👍
content: I would suggest you to go with it. It is really great , for daily use it's worth it's prize. It isn't comfortable , it often slides and come's out , it's comfortable with the additional ear supported given in the box . It has a pinch of base but it's more than enough for your ears 😊

name: Nikon Guy
title: Good for music and calling
content: Boat gives extra 6 rubber buds (3pairs). It have 10mm drivers. It give high quality sound. The only problem is the mic is not enough good to catch the sound or voice

name: TAPAS, Purulia
title: Good product under Rs 500
content: It's a good product if you get it within Rs 500. After 13months of normal use,left side speaker stop working due to wire damage. Fortunately managed to fix it by a local repairing shop for Rs 20/- . Hopefully it will lasts another couple of months.

name: Sourav K.
title: Best in Class.
content: Superb sound quality. Immersive experience.. Con: I have to hold the mic while talking near my mouth otherwise it doesn't pick up my voice well in outside locations.

name: Agni Dutta
title: worth buy
content: Got the product earlier of the day,i am very much satisfied with the product,i have already used too many ear phones mid-range and high-range as well,but it seems the best one among all.

name: Arjun S.
title: Product malfunction, do not buy this product.
content: Just two months of use and it started to malfunction. Can't use it with mobile anymore as it randomly keeps changing songs or opening random music apps. They don't have a service centre and do not respond to mail. Waste of money, do not buy this product.

name: Rohith
title: It is good,but still disappointed..
content: If u are a bass lover,it will defenitely scatisfy u with its sound signature.but the real problem with the earpiece design.it is bulky and it will defnitely pain you if you are listening for more than 30 mins.i really appreciate the build quality and amazon service.But it just not enough to buy it bcoz the comfort level is most important.

name: Abhishek Kumar Singh
title: Best earphone in this price range
content: Its been more than 2 years and I'm still using it. Best ever earphone i have every bought. Bass to too much as I'm not a big fan of too much bass. But you can always adjust that in your phones.

name: Sandip
title: Good for sometimes. Not for long lasting.
content: I bought almost 6 months ago. After use 1month its Jack loose. And not comfort for any device. During call other person not hearing clearly and echo his own voice.

name: yogesh thorat
title: good build quality
content: used this product for almost 1 year. It best for rough usage. After this my current next earphone is from same brand. Then i ordered bluetooth speakers from boAt and satisfied with that also. Best part is ,its indian brand.

name: Arun Reddy
title: Defects in my boAt earphones
content: My earphones had issues after one month of purchasing due to the mic not properly working as a single button and also not able to navigate to next songs in the playlist while listening music. It bbecame very irritating when i hear from family and friends that they were not able to hear my voice clearly via earphones as if I was speaking from a far distant place .

name: Ankita
title: Don't buy. Just because it's sound quality is good.
content: It wasn't appropriate for a normal ear. Always falls down due to its metallic head. Even doesn't feel comfortable while using it for prolonged hours. If you are in search of a durable earphone for long time. Then don't buy this. This keep on hurting your ears while using it. Manufacturers should have tested before launching it.

name: abhinav yadav
title: HIGH BASS/BUILD
content: Aesthetics: 09/10. Bass: 10/10. Sound clarity: 7. Build: 08/10. Great product for audiophiles. Bass is high as expected. Sound clarity needs some more work as i don't get to hear the background scores perfectly as it gets shadowed by the powerful bass. But then other aspects clear the problem. Enjoying. Worth the price.

name: Abdul Kareem syed
title: Superb quality 👍
content: Sound quality is excellent and bass also superb but quality is some poor .if he can give the magnetic attachment it will increase the earphones 🎧 range . And item is value of money 💰 for this item

name: PARTHIBAN
title: Not satisfied
content: I bought for 499 RS. I am not satisfied with quality, I think Sennheiser cx180 is better than this, At higher volume, the music distort greatly. Music is not clear.

name: Goutham.k
title: You must buy it , otherwise you're the loser... best among this price range 🔥
content: Best headphones under 500₹ and it's also impressive product by boat for low price more features... probably" best headphones under 500 than any other" I really fell in love with this product...🔥

name: Raushan Raj
title: PLEASE IMPROVE THE QUALITY OF WIRE OF EARPHONE.
content: The length of the wire of earphone is upto the mark & over all everything is good.BUT WE HAVE CONCERN WITH THE QUALITY OF WIRE OF THE EARPHONE , MY EARPHONE WIRE IS GONE DAMAGE.SO ,PLEASE IMPROVE THE QUALITY OF WIRE.. THANK YOU

name: Parth Mittal
title: Good product. Could be better
content: The sound quality is good. Too much bass. Balance of right audio is missing at times. Difficult to adjust in the ear. Tired all the buds sent along but still pops out often

name: akhilesh
title: Good for 2 to 4 hrs use
content: Not a bad product. Its enough to use maximum 2 hrs. After that ear pain started. Go for it use if you use normally 2 to 6 hrs in a day

name: avanish
title: It worst product. I bought it as per its rating ...
content: 1st Order-It launches Google Assistant automatically along with volume reduction with redmi 4a phone.. I bought it because of its rating on Amazon.. Replaced item: One Button, Multi Function is not working as per stated. +sound quality is good.

name: Ronnie
title: Worst earphones
content: I bought these earphones by going through other reviews. The one end of the earphones got stopped working within one month. I can't replace or return this earphone. This is my first time I have invested so much money in this earphones. Money got wasted. So plz don't buy this earphones.

name: Navdeep Singh Sandhu
title: Not worth
content: The earphone keeps falling from my ears. The worst is the mic of the earphones. One cannot use this earphone mic and talk on handsfree. It sounds like you are talking from far away and even if kept on speaker mode you cannot hear the voice of the person using this earphone.

name: Yash Joshi
title: Good but not great!
content: I have enjoyed music from many other brands, this sounds more closer to the ears and have a tendency to pain after a few minutes of listening. Other brands I tried sounded more farther from ears, and were more comfortable to the ears.. For 0.65K, It is acceptable quality.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Honest review.
content: One shouldn't expect too much in this price range. Having said that, it DOES what it says in the name and does it well enough.. Excellent bass.. The only shortcoming I felt was the mids were really muffled. But few tweaks with the equalizer should fix that.. The vocals come out decent though.. Good value for money.

name: subha
title: Worst product
content: Very poor design . It's difficult maintain in position. I tried all the buds provided in the pack still unable to listen more than 2 to3 min. Ear pain will appear with in 1 min of use.

name: Isaac Samuel
title: Truly Super Extraaaa Bass!
content: This is truly Super Extraaaa Bass!. Made for Bass lovers..... Truly awesome at ₹499...... Loving it!

name: Naseer
title: Worst Product
content: writing this review after an year, there is no noice cancellation, its good if you need only for music, if you talk while driving, there is lot of noise, please dont waste money

name: sanjay patole
title: I bought the product on 9th April 2018 and its ...
content: I bought the product on 9th April 2018 and its microphone is not working from 20th April 2018. Unfortunately 'return window' closed on previous day, i.e. 19th April 2018. Now what to do?

name: Prithvi Raj Dev
title: Overall good
content: Good pair of headphones. Quality is good and build is great. Sound quality is above average however i have the boat 220 and that sounds much better than this. I was hoping the opposite.

name: mahithlalmg
title: Good quality but bass is not that high
content: overall nice product i got 5 pair of earbuds. sound quality is average bass is not that high. before this i used vivo XE160 compared to XE160 boat225 is below average because XE160 got better bass and better sound quality.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not To Buy , add some amount and buy JBL or SONY ....
content: worst headphone, overweight than normal earphones (automatically the earphone will come out of the ears), and the length of the earphone is large than the normal headphone (difficult to wear inside the helmet) and within 6 months one side speaker stops working. I personally won't recommend anyone to buy this product.

name: Amal Joy
title: Terrific Purchase
content: Product is super awesome with great sound, noise cancellation and bass quality. I got the blue limited edition one and it's super cool.

name: Francis
title: Great Bass, if you are a Bass lover you ...
content: Great Bass, if you are a Bass lover you will enjoy it, plus very crystal clear sound, doesn't miss a beat, I received it today and it's awesome, I strongly recommend to everyone, Go for it !!!

name: Kuldeepak Kisan Marde
title: Rubbish😏
content: Bass below average☹️. Sound Quality below average☹️. Not suitable for classical and instrumental music😒. Built Quality below average☹️. Not comfortable for ears and painful for ears😠. My recommendation 👉 Sennheiser CX 180, Sennheiser CX 213 and now I switched to Sennheiser 275🤘😉

name: Varsha cs
title: Good product
content: I bought this one year ago..still working without any complaints....its good bcz older ones didn't lasted for atleast 3 months...but the bass quality is too much...creates headache sometimes. But still worth

name: Shaun
title: Bad product bad service
content: I got this head phones with mic and it was a very bad quality as mic didnt work.. I requested replacement or refund and the amazon guy came but since he couldnt find my address he went back .And i am left with my faulty headphones.Dissapointed

name: Sunny
title: Great pair of earphones with premium aesthetics
content: One of the best headphones available at this price point. I was using a blue one ,I liked it ,therefore I bought a red one for my gf as well.. I love boat products and I have a wireless boat headphones and a boat Bluetooth speaker .Keep the good work going BOAT !

name: BeerenderBrain
title: Best in price and awesome.
content: Base is awesome. Kudos to boat for coming up with best headphones for reasonable price.. Edit: Definitely amazing headphones. But doesn't last long. After 6 months or so one side of earphone stops working.

name: Manash Jyoti Dutta
title: great sound quality but build quality is little bit compromised...
content: after using 1 year i can definitely claim sound quality is great in this price rang. and you can use is as a gaming earphone. but but but the build quality is not as good as sound quality. and ear plugs are too heavy. if you are a carefull user then this is a great earphone.

name: kk
title: Great product
content: I have been using Boat earphones from past 4 years and they are great at this price

name: M-kay Singh
title: Bassheads
content: Bass are not that high..this is my second time purchase...earlier one of the ear piece stopped working and mic also got faulty..hope this time it wont happen...sound is not clear when volume is full

name: Tasha
title: High Bass and great Voice clarity
content: Great product, very good voice clarity for mobile as well as music. Not too heavy and the supporters provided are pretty effective and helpful. Overall a good pair of earphones. Good quality build product. High bass and effects even at low volumes.

name: MURTHY
title: Left Side is not working after using for two days
content: I used this headphone for the last two days, after the second day the left side has broken down, it's output is less than the right side piece. I dont recommend this who wanted to use the headphone on atleast 6 month bases.

name: Ajay Singh
title: not good at reliability
content: Tried writing mail and phone call for warranty. I am getting directed to a site to register complaint but there I am getting directed to a local center with a messages that it is closed.. Completely stuck . No way to register complaint. Poor service quality.

name: Kindly customer
title: Good quality playback!
content: Good quality playback and comfortable for long usage. In box got multiple sizes silicon caps (3 black and 3 bluish-gray). So changed it to fit snug. Also had ear locks in the package. Everything needed for using it. Big thumbs up for the product.

name: Amandeep Singh
title: Go for it!
content: So, not so funny story: Neighbors in a flat near us got robbed. According to the cops who interviewed us, the attacker rang the bell and asked for a glass of water and robbed the house after they opened the door. You want to know what the scary part is? I didn't hear a thing, thanks to my amazing Boat headphone's noise cancellation.. FIVE STARS.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Speaker not working from day1
content: One side speaker not working, It looks like used/replaced headphone. I did not expect this worst quality from trusted made in India brand. I order the replacement, after 2 months not received any replacement. I cancelled replacement. Now I am not able to do anything

name: Danishkazi
title: Worst product quantity
content: i have just recently brought this earphone from here and now it is not working properly on one side...and the other worst this is i cant see any option from where i cld use the warranty of these peice. i believe that it shouldn't have happen so early. i want to knw from where i cld get it repaired or exchanged!!!

name: Balivada
title: Failure design
content: Due to heavy weight both ear buds are slipping out. Sorry to say that it is not ear friendly design.. Ergonomics division shall need to think about giving support to both buds for stable erection in ears. rest is good.

name: RAJ KUMAR
title: Boat bass head phone not working properly
content: I had purchased a boat bass head on 20-jan-2020 that time it was working properly but now it is not working properly mean I am not hearing voice from both buds.. I am getting voice from a bud, I think one speaker is not working.. It is in warranty period.. Please suggest.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Very bad product and amazon service
content: So much disturbance while on call, unable to talk using this.. When I decided to return it Amazon doesn't allow that, only allows to replace the same item but I want from another brand. After using it for 3 week going to throw it in dustbin.

name: Karthikeyan.R
title: Boat225 BASS
content: Usefull for rough usage it has tangle free flat cable with quality and metalic finish design with 10mm drive sound gives bass quality better for this pricerange. Only one disadvantage is it has no volume up and down in this system...overall value of money for this pricerange

name: Sunil Rathi
title: Doesn't stay in ears
content: Falling out of ears even without much movement of head. Of no use until stable inside ears. Good sound quality and build quality are of no use until the earphones stay in ears.

name: akash
title: totally awesome...
content: oooooooooohhhh maaaaaannnnn...... just got totally mind blowed... shut up searching for a mid range headphones and but this boat bass heads 225 , just received , it's awsome.... the sound quality is never questionable.... just play the imagine dragons believer song first , you will get Goosebumps.... the mic was awesome for me.... Amazon got that in time 😊😊😊😊

name: Sandeep
title: Nice. Value for money. Genuine sound quality.
content: They’re value for money. Genuine sound quality. I’ve used them for over 3 months now. Good and running just like new.. Don’t order white. They stain quickly.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Ok ok product
content: cord pin is not proper, not properly fitting with my phone and laptop. Need to do some adjustment to fit proper other wise sound is not coming properly in both the ear piece. And sound quality is ok ok...

name: Nitin rohilla
title: Boat beats handfree
content: Superb mind blowing handfree... Now I m a fan of boat.. I m using for last 7 days The boat having clear sound and full extreme bass 😍..but it's little bit loose of buds.. Overall this boat handfree is stupendous in this budget.. Price. Thanks Amazon.

name: AnkitAmazon Customer
title: Useless product, doesn't even fit in ears properly.
content: I purchased this product a year ago, and stopped using it within few days as it doesn't fit in the ears properly and thus start causing pain in the ears, which is very unusual for a ear phone.. Sound quality is good, but if it causes it is of no use, today I accidentally saw it and tried again, felt really angry and got motivated to write this review.

name: Anisha
title: Poor fitting in the ear.
content: The sound quality is good but the phones dont fit in the ear properly. Every few seconds the fall off the ear even if the wire gets touched.

name: Kartik Kapgate
title: Don't Buy, please!!
content: Please don't Buy this product.. It's not durable at all.. It's right side stopped working just after 2 months.. This are my 2nd earphones, previously same thing happened but BoAt Replaced it.. Now,the product is out of warranty & I'm robbed.

name: Rupali H.
title: Bass Lovers, Don't Wait, It's Yours
content: Bass - 10/10. Treble - 9/10. Mids - 9/10. Body - 10/10. 3.5mm jack 9/10. BoAt Service - unbelievable 10/10. Don't Think, Just Go For It!!!!!!!!

name: Sarthak Mishra
title: Go for it
content: Considering the price it is an excellent product. Audio is quite good too , the audio is balanced though , Bass lovers are really gonna enjoy this product

name: Srikanth reddy
title: Worthy if you buy at discount
content: Bass is good. Earphones quality is also good at 350rs. Tangle free earphones.

name: AMOREY
title: This is totally worth it! Just go for it!!!!
content: I've using these earphones for the past two years and they are still working perfectly fine. Even after I exposed them to rain by mistake the earphones are still working which is surprisingly helpful!!!

name: nadeem
title: Worth the money
content: At this price range it really very good earphone.. Its sound quality is good and awesome bass.. Only one problem, its earpiece are made of metal so sometimes it feels uncomfortable.. Otherwise it's a good quality earphone. I am using this earphone from 2 years.

name: Vaibhav
title: Got wrong product!!!!
content: 🤔I got the wrong product . In which that box contained apple designed earphones but those were used and a bit torn out. I also ordered an earphones case with the earphones .Case was safely delivered to me but packaging was not there .. And the headphone box was already opened from the bottom. And what I saw was... Replaced earphones and missing accessories. I hope I can return it....

name: Sujayan Samanta
title: Just buy it.
content: My mom thought in-ear are nothing like over-the-ear. Now she won't take them off (just kidding). But its the best budget earphone. I sleep with earphones on. They barely last a week. But this one has been there a month and doesn't look to take off any sooner. Also the overall sound quality won't disappoint.

name: Krishna
title: Need to improve in ear fit structure
content: Making quality and sound is good but the fitting of the buds should be improved.Its very poor.Bass is also quite good.The only issue is the fitting which is the main prblm.Rest sound quality is superb.The wire is also tangle free.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Bad experience with product and customer care
content: The product quality is very bad and one side speaker stop working in 3 months. Customer care not picking up call and complaint registration link is not working.. please don't buy this product. Waste of money...

name: Rahul
title: Wouldn't recommend it
content: So the audio is great but the ear piece just keeps falling off making it impossible to use it for long durations or while doing any activity even when you're simply lying down. Doesn't work for me and I got myself different earphones.

name: Ajay Kumar
title: Very good
content: All features are good, but only noise cancellation is not fixed.Come to product wire is intangible, can be water proof and can withstand to all strectchs,folds etc.Bass is very good.sound quality is awesome.overall it is the best product of all in this price.

name: Utkarsh Pandey
title: Decent Product and Good sound quality...
content: Sound quality is decent, bass is upto the mark.. Wire material is sturdy and strong.. Non tangling earphone.. You get extra earbuds(3 pairs).. Earphone with microphone, has button for track change and pause/play.

name: AZK
title: Used product received 😓
content: Order date -/ 01-Jul-2020. I ordered boAt Black earplugs on 1st July but when I received my order It was used earplugs also of different color.. How can this happen with anyone and used product completely worst thing happened. 😓

name: G. Sanjay
title: Better performing than crossbits BT wireless
content: Earbuds needs improvement for aligning axially with ear canal. Tend to slip from ear unless u push them hard inside ear. Bass is extra ordinary, best headphone for bass lovers.

name: Mani Rajesh
title: If anyone worry about durability more than sound quality and bass , definitely go for it.
content: Using last 4 month , No problem . I would love the build quality . Used 3 , 4 earphones original product , Mi service good . Seinheiser good sound quality , JBL and sony good base. But their life time not more than 6 to 8 months. My brother using boat 220 last 1 year , i using boat 225 last 4 month. If u think durability is first preference , this is the one beat for u

name: Kunal
title: !!!BEAST!!!
content: It's one of the best earphone I have ever used in this price point.So don't just give a second thought just buy it directly and I can assure you that you won't regret.I just got this earphones in a lightning deal of 499 and at this price point you will never find an earphone as good as this

name: Dinesh
title: Bass is good..
content: Pros:. Bass is good..... Clear audio..... Cons:. 1.The headphones are heavy and large,so wearing headphones inside helmet is not possible.... 2.Cant wear while sleeping too.... 3.Headphones are enhanced to produce bass and not clarity. Overall can buy if you are a bass lover...but at this price there are other brands that provide better audio experience...

name: Amazon Customer
title: value for money and awesome sound Quality
content: value for money😍. Its sound Quality and bass is great. best sound quality in mid volume level. Then warrenty service is excellent , I got new one after clamed the warrenty. I'm using this product 2 year

name: Rajesh Kumar
title: Stopped working within just 15 days.
content: This product has stopped working.. Not torn and no breakage , looking nice but no sound in speakers and Mike. Pls tell me how to exchange or return. I got just 15 days back.. Initially, It was very nice.

name: William
title: Broken product with no real value
content: I got this new Boat headphones. When I received it, the wire is already torn and I tried the headphone in my laptop and my mobile and I could see that this is a low quality make.

name: Pavankumar
title: Value for money
content: As boat is best as ever affordable lovely and still working from 2 years

name: customer
title: Even after months, it's working fine
content: This is the longest surviving earphones I've ever had. Along with the winged ear tips, it's simply perfect.

name: Bengal Tiger
title: Worst product
content: Within two months of regular use, the internal wires came out and was visible in multiple area. Don't buy this.

name: Daksh
title: I hear a weird clicking sound whenever I attach it to any device.
content: Sound quality is really great, the fit is a little bit odd, built quality is nice, the case is great, bass and noise cancellation is also great.. The attachments provided are practically useless as there is no way to attach the ear support and changing the ear tips is really really tough though it shouldn't be.

name: CJ
title: Good Product
content: I ordered a full black earphone. But the earphone's metallic part is of military green colour. I don't know how is it happening. Because there is no such colour pattern in the Product catalogue. I'm adjusting with the colour. Not spending my time to return

name: Kore Mukesh Madhav
title: Superb bass
content: Compare to other earphones this earphone comes with good quality material & provide quality bass. It doesn't fit in ear due to weight of buds & it has poor noise cancellation property. At last this earphone is good for one who like to hear songs at high volume

name: Anand
title: Please don't buy, bad customer support
content: Guys please don't buy this product, right side speaker not working from 8th day onwards, amazon doesn't give any replacement or return, when i contact with Amazon customer care bad response from them, please go for Flipkart.

name: Arunav Sarmah
title: Best worst
content: It was best till last week... I have used only approx. 20 days. Now music is audible....but mic is giving problem while talking in Call.... So rating 1*. May be will order from other now.. It is again working... So giving 5 stars

name: Amazon Customer
title: Value for money!
content: I have bought them in the red color, The earphones are really good, they give total 6 pairs of ear buds(including the one on the earphones). Sound clarity is really good, the BASS is balanced not too high or too low, as they say they are tangle free, the microphone is functional.i assume that the durability is nice.

name: Abhishek
title: Great for the pricetag
content: Great earphone but it have some problem..though not major...... 1 it fall of pretty easily. 2 sound and bass is absolute but if you previously used any Sony or Skullcandy you might feel sound clearity isuue.(but it is hardly noticable so not much of a problem). Well final verdict for this is a greate for this pricerange....but don't use it with pc as a primary... Prolonged use might hurt your ear

name: Amazon Customer
title: Wrong product description.
content: Very very ery dissapointed....Not deserve for half star..as per the product description the earphone comes with mic by which you can answer your call and adjust your music track and change the volume but all these are fake there is no mic in this earphone and it's useless if you are looking for a earphone with mic

name: Amazon Customer
title: waste product!!
content: Do Not buy it at all. Mic is utter waste. as soon as you plug in this headset, Mobile will go crazy . Volume goes up and down automatically. Apps are opened randomly. it is a waste product. I tried 3 headsets including a replacement one.

name: M
title: Disappointment
content: These are such heavy headphones that they fall in seconds after putting it in the ear. Not at all comfortable to wear. Can't even move my head without them falling off.

name: Ajay Sharma
title: No return ONLY replacement
content: If boAt is confident of thier product, i date them to have 10 day return, instead of 10 day replacement.. You are not getting an chance to try and return the product if you don't like.. Sound quality is average.

name: Shambojee
title: Excellent Quality
content: The in-ear headphones are excellent because of the excellent sound quality and sturdyness of the wire.

name: Nitesh
title: It last for only one year
content: This is my second hand free I have already used this product of same type I found it satisfactory in all aspect but it last for only one year, so if you are thinking that you can use it more than one year then you are totally wrong here

name: V Arora
title: Product is good but jack pin does not insert properly if mobile phone has a Case/cover
content: product is good in terms of sound quality but the back side of 3.5mm jack pin is thick and does not insert properly if mobile has cover. No one uses mobile phone without a cover these days, thus this is a defect that Boat needs to fix in next variants of this product!

name: Panam Ayer
title: Tangle Free; Good Bass; Good Quality - Go for it !!
content: I brought this second time (my friend took the first one !!) and my colleagues also brought it after my review. The built and sound quality more than justifies it's price. It has ample amount of bass with fair amount of high frequency response. The tangle free cable is the icing and really helps. Definitely recommended.

name: Spandan
title: Nice product , Need to be more durable
content: Best in class ear phone with proper Bass and Trebel balance .. I have already order 7 of them, but you should be a little careful with the wires it can stand rough but . dont mess much .. But thanks to amazon they replaced it soon

name: vikas shirani
title: Purely osmm product
content: After a long time i got a very good quality earphones...this is purely osmm...if u love good bass,,sound,,this one is the better option for you ..this is more than your expectation

name: GS shimpi
title: Best earphone must go for it
content: Awesome.if u want to buy earphone in this range then basshead are absolutely worth buying.i am using it from last week and the quality of sound is awesome and it also having extra bass as mentioned in name.the design is very nice and wire is long enough and tangle free. very good noise cancellation and perfect fitting with proper earbuds as they provided six pair.overall if u bought it u will love it

name: Farman Khan
title: Big Fan Of Boat 225 In Ear Super Bass Earphones.
content: I Purchased This Earphones IInd Time And This Is The Best Earphones Ever In The Budget... Customer Service also good..... Love The Bass..

name: Apoorv Lele
title: Great earphones for this price
content: Ok so as the description says the bass and sound quality are very good for this price range...only problem is that if you have small ears the earphones will not fit perfectly in your ear and may frequently fall off...thats why 4 stars.

name: Shivang P.
title: Not what u would expect!!
content: I've used this earphone fir only 3 months and it already stopped working on right ear even though having a warranty of one year this certainly wasn't expected. Its a let down don't buy this coz they are not worth spending such as they stops working so soon!! I'm looking for replacement now.

name: Gyan
title: To buy it or not..?
content: So much recommendation in review section...but nobody wrote it that..it has too much bass and metallic head is hard to fit inside ears.... overall build is good and when u adjust equilizer in ur phone u can decrease bass.

name: Sam
title: Pathetic for calls.
content: This headphone is really pathetic for calls. Other person hears a lot of static even if the wires criss-cross a little bit. Even cheap roadside headphones worth 50 rs are better than this for calls. It is ok dor music though!

name: Bhavik
title: All good
content: Everything is perfect for the price.. just because the earphone has metal body due to which it comes out from the ears more often. So no matter how much ever you like to grove to music.. keep your head still ;p

name: Suman
title: Not working
content: I have taken this in September and in 5 months right side speaker is not working, there is no damage to the wire, but the speaker itself has a loos connection.. Even Rs: 100 earphones serve 1 year at least.

name: sam
title: Great for price!
content: Value for money. Tangle free cable,mic,extra bass. Only sound clarity is slightly less as compared to CX 180. If you want earphones which balance out everything then go for CX 180 but if you want durability and extra bass then get this.

name: Venkatesh
title: Good
content: Awesome but Sennheiser cx180 was incredible in sound quality when comparing with boat bassheads225. Do check Sennheiser before considering this one. In boat bassheads 225 as the name suggest bass quality was tremendous but not soo clear in high volume. That's why I suggest cx180.

name: Amazon Customer
title: dont buy from amazon
content: worest eae phone from amazon .. recived faulty ear phons not working . and also not accepting return

name: Vishwajeet Patil
title: Trust me and buy this.
content: I am using this from last 2 years.. And the best part is that you will get replaced this if it is in warranty. The will only pickup and replace you this headphone within 10 day.

name: ambidextrous
title: Amazing sound quality but durability issues!
content: Amazing sound quality but one side of my earphone recently (after a month) started malfunctioning and after checking I found sweat like liquid getting collected in one ear of the earphone. No respond from customer service.

name: sona
title: Less durable
content: I have used it since last 6 months. It worked wonderfully for 6months. At present (march) both the ear plugs are not working. Purchased in July. It's too expensive for such durability.

name: Puneet Khullar
title: Not compatible with OnePlus 6
content: This earphones are not compatible with One plus 6 phone. Everytime it's jack comes out. The size is not standard 3.5 jack but this works well with laptops.

name: monika
title: Super bakwas product
content: Totaly useless product . First it's silpery never set on ur ears and if u try to change ear buds then it's doesn't fit totally waste of money . One star for looks only

name: vadivel nataraj
title: its not orginal boAt headphone quality.
content: color and quality is different compared to last year purchase. now quality is average .

name: Dharavath p.
title: super deep punch earphons under 500
content: super punch deep bass,,😎 500 burject is this earphones is ossam,,, bass lovers can buying this earphones,,, gamming and singing, and music lising is superb quality

name: Neel
title: Boat or sennheiser..
content: Guys..not up to level!! Really disappointing as compare to sennheisser CX180 .Its a avg product frm boat!!. Pro- 1. Look good. 2. Flat tangle free cable. 3. Avg sound. Con- 1. Sound is far better of sennheiser cx 180. 2.Its not light weight so if u want 2 use it @ gym so believe me it will create problem.

name: Sri Harsha S R
title: In 3 months the Quality is gone, people can't hear me well with this headset!!
content: This product was great initially, in 3 months the Quality is gone even with a limited / delicate usage. Product looks the same when I see it (looks as good as new and great)... but people complain they can't hear me clearly on it every time. I switch back to the phone (without the headset) and everything is fine!!. I would have expected the product to survive for an year at least or may be at least 6 months!!

name: Muwaffaq
title: Very good
content: Bright red color, good build quality and has all the minor factors correct. Bought it during Great Indian Sale, so good price point for a headset with mic, and inline press button.

name: Appu ironbutterfly
title: its not working
