content: I only brought this product on fab 22 and one of the head is not working. I try to replace or return it but there is no such option. I am so disappointed with this bad service.

name: sajan pawar
title: Boat is best
content: I m using this headfone from last 1 year and its awesome, works perfect, its material quality is so good that no matter how u use it it does not give u trouble much.

name: Ragavan
title: Somewhat Ol
content: Its ok. after 1or2 months the warranty ends, the headset also ends life. Good one for shorter life span for me. Again have to purchase. That is unnecessary expense

name: Subham Kumar Singh
title: Very bad experience..
content: Sound quality, bass are good but One side of the earphone stopped working in just 3 weeks.. very bad.. please don't buy.... If u want to waste ur money then only purchase it.. very bad bad bad

name: gowtham
title: Looks good but Cheap Quality earphones
content: Even with minimal use of this earphones it did not survive for one month. First, left side stopped working and then right side surprisingly within a month. Very cheaply built earphones.

name: shyam maloo
title: Inconvenient to put to ears
content: It is not meant for all kinds of ears. Although, it has certain attachments with it, but it's too cumbersome to put all of them to put it in one place when you could have sorted it out through design improvisation.. Not worth the money!!! Go for sennheiser instead, although costly but worth every penny.

name: Aniket
title: Sound quality is fabulous
content: Sound qualityy is so muchhhhhh good. I always preffer boats products beacuse of their base qualityy this are my 3rd earphnes i have been ordering .... mostlyy i love the base quality. There are no of brands in the market butt for my suggestion u must definitely go for boats products....

name: Diwakar Sharma
title: Loud bass, but lack of quality bass
content: Bass was loud but not clear, these are some heavy earphones, that cause pain, no angled earphones, and earbuds are hard, sound was okay,

name: TVA
title: too heavy... it will fall off from ...
content: too heavy... it will fall off from your ears.. I dont know how ppl are using it.... i saw many facing the same issue.. on what basis 5 starts are given by people??. Luckily i was given refund.

name: Kunal Tippangol
title: Defective product
content: Got a defective product :. 1. Mic doesn't work. 2.Button doesn't work. The which looks like it has been used before.. U can find dirt in the ear pieces.

name: Kaustubh Gorivale
title: Bass lovers can go for it...💫
content: Sound and Bass is quite Good.. Design could be better...little heavy for ears.. After one year of use..one side is not working... after handled by care for year.

name: tushar kayande
title: Best In Sound, Quality & Durability
content: Best Earphone in this price range, I personally recommend to go for this one.. Build quality is top-class.. Length of the wire is also perfect.. Buy this with your eyes closed.. Trust me !!. Material Quality : 4.8 /5. Sound Quality : 4.5/5. Durability : 4.6/5

name: Arun chouhan
title: Great product with minimum price
content: Best choice under Rs. 500/- budget.. Pros -. 1. Look. 2. Exatra items comes with earphone.. 3. Metal use.. 4. Sound quality.. 5. Bass is excellent.. I bought it for only Rs. 340/-

name: nithin
title: Cost effective product with good efficiency
content: Been using this product for more than 6 months. Good product and cost effective. Didn't find any defects so far. Efficient and worth buy

name: sai prakash
title: Worst earphones pls don't buy ..
content: Dont get cheated by other reviews...Worst earphones....with in 1 week, The audio pin is getting shorted inside phone and started controlling (rasing n decreasing n muting) mobile volume on its own...Not able to watch/listen anything with this.... Contacted customer care...3 weeks over and no one came for pickup...Worst est service ever...

name: Soham Pawar
title: Durability
content: I had ordered this product on 2nd July. It was delivered on 4th July. Its been 3 months since the purchase and my earphones have stopped functioning properly since today evening. First, the right earphones went off then the left earphone's sound went down. Now their is hell lot of disturbance in the left earphone. I want a replacement for the same. Revert back at the earliest.

name: akhil naik
title: Best to use Only for 6 months
content: The product is good for daily usage Only for 6 months. Now both the earpieces are not working. The quality is not good.. I gifted to someone and now they are complaining that its not working at all... looks like the product purchased on discount also gives you low quality of products.

name: nandakishore
title: Good at this price point..
content: It's fine quality product and I like all boat products. But I have problem with the size of ear bud I wanted a smaller one which is not present but it provides a lot of other size too. I got like 6 pairs (2*(3 pairs of different size)).

name: VIKAS PATEL
title: Bad quality
content: Plz replacement my earphones bczz not working properly and chip quality plz replacement and call me now..6353116461

name: Dharti
title: Not Worth
content: I had purchased these boat headphones on may 2018. Suddenly it has stopped working after just 8 months. It has a warrenty of 1 year. I want this product to be replaced as soon as possible. I need headphones badly. Such a bad experience with amazon as i have not done any major shopping yet on amazon. Just want this product to be replaced man

name: Preeti
title: Not worth it
content: They worked only for a month. First the left side earpiece stopped working within a week and now approximately after a month the either side too ... disappointed.

name: G NAVEEN KUMAR
title: My microsoft headphones are way better than this
content: My microsoft headphones are way better than this. My Microsoft headphones produce clear bass than these... waste of money. Vocal frequencies are heard nicely through these, but bass is way too low

name: Pranam Mendan
title: ‘NEVER BUY THIS PRODUCT’
content: “NEVER BUY THIS PRODUCT”, it’s a waste of money. I bought this product and they didn’t even last for 5 months, the sound quality is poor, there is no noise cancellation and I don’t think they have any bass quality. I don’t know how I could get it replaced or refunded.

name: Sonali G.
title: worth a buy in this price
content: in this price range the sound, quality Boat is giving is up to mark.. Its only a week now so cud not comment on its durability.. would recommend to go for this product if ur budget is within 500.

name: Arunima
title: BUT EARBUDS NEED TO UPGRADE.
content: I liked the quality of sound , bass. But not satisfied with the earbuds ,they don't fit in ears they get slipped. My friend is also having problem of this.

name: Lucky
title: boAt service is well and good.: )
content: The earphone has premium built quality but the bass is not deep yet its satisfactory.. After 2-3 months my one earpiece volume got decreased without any reason.. I contacted boAt service centre (by providing invoice/bill) and thanks to them they sent me a new Earphone (though with a color).. boAt service is well and good. :). Thanks boAt and Amazon

name: umesh kolhe
title: Paisa wassol product by BOAT
content: Supurb product by BOAT.. In very less they provide bestest features I am using this product from pas 2+Years.. Its Sound Quality, Bass and noise cancellation which is far better than other branded products.. And the end Paisa wasool Product.

name: vinu gautam
title: Uncomfortable and heavy
content: I bought this because boat is well known earphone company but after purchasing it is not comfortable for ears in daily life.I think weight should be less.bass is average.

name: Lijo
title: Worth for the money
content: Good one nice bass and trouble. really worth for the money. My friends using this for more than 2 years. But if you really love music go for bigger one.

name: Himanshu
title: Bass is good
content: Makes some vaccume is ear & there is loos of noise. Can't usable while sleeping. Sound quality is beat in price

name: Santosh Choudhary
title: Nice product.....  Value for money.
content: Good product, but the packet contain only one earhooks, which is uncomfortable in ear.. Company should include a carrying pouch with it.. But the product sounds is superb, overall a balanced sound quality

name: Falguni
title: Best product ever!
content: Its the best value for money product anyone can buy. Came with extra ear buds and a case. Absolutely loved it and would strongly recommend it for anyone who is tight on budget and wants good quality earphones.

name: Swarna
title: Need an exchange
content: My headphones are not working . It has been only 25 days of my purchase and now it’s not working. I want to raise a complaint.

name: Pawan Maurya
title: Don't buy it. Go for other options .
content: Within 7 months of use ..It has already stopped working . No sound coming from either of the earpiece . Was working fine and suddenly stopped working without any reason. Not comfortable. Earpieces are heavier to wear. The supports for the earpiece provided are not comfortable.

name: Sandeep
title: Flat Wire with Good Sound. Press button enable.
content: Sound is ok But Nirvana boat headphones are better than this. Press button enable to receive calls & pause music also. Bass is really high. Light weight, flat wire.

name: Agnish Gupta
title: Defeactive Earphones
content: After 7 days. All of a sudden The Right side of the earphone stopped working.. Worst experience. This is not the first time. I have faced the same scenario from Real Me ear buds. That was Purchased from Amazon.... Disappointed.

name: Bhuwnesh Singh Barfal
title: Plug in problem
content: I had used it for more than 2 months and sound quality is fair but main problem is tha when I use it it just come out of plug intermittently and I have to refix in plug. The problem mainly arise in viewing and listening in close range specially in bed.

name: isaac
title: Not long lasting
content: Worked well, but only for 5 months.... After that one of the earphone stopped working.... After a few more days the other one also stopped working.... However in those 5 months it was amazing.... Should have worked longer.... Didn't get value for money

name: samrat
title: Best product
content: Best earphones at that price, worth buying,extra bass and punch

name: Antra
title: Best Sound Quality and Durability
content: Nice product. I am using boAt headphones this model from last one year. This is best and cheap. The sound quality, bass and Beats are really of awesome quality. 5Starts from my end.

name: Pawan
title: Plzzzzzzzzzz send only the 1st quality don't send second quality
content: Superb quality and bass... But for the 3 rd time of my replacement I got good one... Really bad situations happen to me 2 times finally I got quality one....i like . Amazon but unfortunately 2 times I got second quality ones and now I got 1 St quality boat 225 earphones... Plzzzzzzzzzz correct this problem

name: Jitendra
title: Green ear tips for Orange variant
content: This is my fourth earphone. I have tried Red, Green, Blue variants. This time I ordered Orange color and the accessories it came in with are for the Green variant. What do I do? Don't have the patience to ask for a replacement. Bummer.. Build and sound quality is great for the price segment.

name: Akshay
title: Best for budget earphones
content: Base, sound clarity and looks are awesome. But buds are little heavy keeps coming out while running, working out, or moving here and there.

name: Allen Joe Rodrigues
title: Not the quality I expected
content: Likes- sound, bass and clarity. Dislikes- Quality and durability.. one ear stopped working after a month had to apply for an exchange..

name: Ramesh Gokamalla
title: Quality reduced (both audio and material quality)
content: Company reduced wire quality as well as audio quality from earphones too.. I bought these earphones for my friends. All were good in quality but now they reduced it

name: Pankaj Samant
title: Great Product
content: Received it on 19-july-2020, over all earphone is good..... Will detail review after few months.....

name: Thakor J.
title: Loved it
content: I have been using it since almost 6 months and I have to say that the built quality is great and very nice. just make sure that you don't misplace or loose those black coloured rubber ear hooks, because without it, it will not stay in ear, it fall down from your ear.

name: sagar mohanty
title: Otherwise a very good choice under 599
content: Has a gud base quality and loud enough. The build quality is very strong and lasting. But I had only one problem: due to metal heads, it sometime feel heavy near ears and eventually fall down. So it not be used while jogging or going for a walk in it. Otherwise a very good choice under 599.

name: Sairam
title: Mic and pauses and play button is not working.
content: Will the mic and button in the earphones is not working even after replacement. Iam not sure why it happens does it not support my device (Galaxy S7 edge &redmi 4) or the earphones again delivered is faulty one. But for the price point earphones is good but iam getting always a faulty one.

name: Arnab Sengupta
title: OK headphones at this price but more expected
content: Its average.... Sound is loud and good but somethng is missing as compared to JBL headphones.while on call on skype or any other apps,the voice is crystal clear.And overall its too heavy as compared to JBL headphones...the earphones tends to come out..

name: Arka Naskar
title: Sound Good but falls out from Ear
content: Sound quality is too good. Extra bass sounds awesome. No other earphone that I have used till now has given this quality. But but but, the biggest drawback is the weight of the earphones because of which it falls from ear very easily, even if you slightly move your head. So only because of this I have to give 3 star.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Poor Quality
content: DISAPPOINTED not a good product.i bought this product about 2 month ago and one of the ear pice has stoped working..the same case is with my neighbout who faced same issue even after getting it repaired from service center..and not good for calling absolutly not..you need to talk louder so that the other person could hear..will not recommend this product..

name: Neeraj
title: sound quality very poor
content: Think twice before buying. Sound fades when you push the plugs in the ear.

name: Jyoti
title: Nice earphones at good price
content: Nice earphones at good price, I bought 2 of them, however one of them was not compatible with my another phone I requested for a return for refund but amazon refused to do so. I ended up having the extra earphone which I don't even require. Amazon form a new policy for the electronics item to be returned for the refund not a replacement.

External noise cancellation via ear cushions is minimal.

I was disappointed a bit with the fact that it hurt when I heard songs for more that 45 min. Everything else about it is awesome. Give it a try guys

name: Jithin HL

Overall the product is so gud with the price i got

The only thing i am looking forward is the longevity and consistency in the product. Hope it delivers at least for a good long year. Overall im suprisingly happy with the earphones performance!

name: Vivek

Sometimes when we pull off the headset 3.5mm jack from phone, the phone ear speaker does not work until the phone is restarted or we plug in and out the 3.5 mm Jack again next.

The pros overpower the cons comfortably to buy this without a second thought

name: Amazon Customer
title: It's not a good buy.
content: Bought this headphone after I lost my JBL headphones. First thing about the headphone is it's quite heavy so having lot of problems in keeping it in the ear & It comes off at the slightest movement. Also, the bass & treble are too much on the higher side which atleast for me hurts the ear if I listen to music for a longer period. The good thing is the tangle free cables and the metallic looks. Considering the price, it's ok but if you want to enjoy music, go for a JBL or Seinheiser or Sony.

name: Suraj
title: Good quality headphone
content: Sound clarity is pretty good and it delivers amazing bass.These earphones completely fit in ear and are very comfortable.The wire quality is very good and its flat.so it is very unlikely for it to get worn.The design of earphones is also very good looking.

name: Aparna
title: Sound quality is good. I liked the bass as well and it's ...
content: Sound quality is good . I liked the bass as well and it's a good buy given the price range . However , the earphones (mettalic) are heavier than anything I have ever used and it's tends to get irritating if I use them for a long time. Guess , that's why most earphones are plastic .

name: kumarswamy
title: Please don’t buy boat225 headset
content: Please don’t buy this simply amazon people’s put this product on top. Only thing in this you can hear loudly and also no clarity in voice.. Better buy mi headset instead of this for the same price mi will give volume control also.. My personal opinion don’t buy boat225

name: Maetrei
title: Heavy like an anchor. Keeps falling off
content: It is so heavy that the buds keep falling off no matter which size removable bud I use. Making ear buds from metal is the stupidest design ever

name: Dheer
title: Mic stopper working in less than 1 month of usage
content: headphone, sound quality is good but It's mic stopped working in less than 1 month, I've reported to customer care now let's see what they to resolve this issue.

name: Mahesh
title: Head set at its best as per the price
content: Awesome headset. Very comfortable and Value for money.. Go for it!!!

name: Kaushik Hazarika
title: One ear plugs not working in less than 2 weeks
content: Okay so I bought these headphones on Amazon and it was delivered on the 6th of June. I has been just two weeks and one of the ear plugs has already stopped working. This is very disappointing and I am very dissatisfied with this product. Also there isn't any option to return/replace it here. The microphone of the headphones is also not good enough. My suggestion to you guys? Don't buy it!

name: sunita n.
title: Definitely recommended besides the only fact the fit for my ear was a bit large.
content: I quite liked the product. The sound quality is awesome. Plus the brand. Definitely worth it. The only reason I didn't find this one the best is it doesn't really fit in my ear. I found this one a bit larger for my ear. And I'm not sure if we humans have different ear size. Anyway, if you're getting this in your budget go for it.

name: D Deepak
title: Why i cut 2 stars
content: Everything is good according to its price except its fitting in ear. I face lot of struggle for fitting it into my ear. thats why i cut 2 stars.

name: Jeevana Jyothi
title: Not working after 2 months
content: At Starting worked properly but after 2 months one headphone is not working...please replace my headphones I have warranty card also....or else replace my money

name: Inder
title: A must buy at this price (caution durability)
content: Great sound but poor built quality. Left ear stopped working after 2 months but at this price the quality they are providing is awesome so 500 bucks for 2 months. I would suggest go for it.

name: Prakash Bhoi
title: Three Earphones not work after using within 1 year.
content: I Purchased three earphones of Boat Company,Quality,Sound,Bass,clear voice every thing is good but after within 1 year some reason all are not working. Please improve durability of product.

name: B Harshvardhan
title: Looks a bit fake
content: The earbuds in the earphone is black instead of orange which altogether let down the Beauty of orange.. The extra earbuds are also of different colour.. For now, it is working good.

name: Rajeev
title: Boat headset useless cable
content: Useless product and not up to mark and when requested refund amazon states we can replace defective but no refund and this a nowhere calls out on the site for this product .. better stay away

name: Hirdesh
title: Think and buy?
content: Earphone sound is very good and bass too. I can used only one year because after one year this earphones is not working. I think this is not good choice to buy this earphone at this price range. So keep thinking and buy it.

name: Dibyajyoti
title: Excellent product at affordable price
content: Excellent product at affordable price. Superb bass n sound quality.. Even at low volume the bass is excellent & the moment you increase the volume the experience is so astonishing.. Writing this review while listening through the earphones & the outside noise cancellation is so good.

name: ANKIT SINGH
title: Audio basss is not up to mark .high loudness .
content: Build quality is goo... But sound quality is not good.. Only having loudness in sound .. Bass performance is not good .. Used in multiple mobiles but sound output is louder and painful.

name: Kunal Pawar
title: Sound Quality is almost equal to boAt Rockerz 400..
content: After using for 2 months I can surely say that :. Sound Quality : 9.5/10. Bass Quality : 10/10. Noise Cancellation : 8.9/10 (Actually they don't have noise cancellation but still it's covers inner ear which as a sound barrier 😅)

name: Sumedha Sengupta
title: Right side stopped working after 2.5 months
content: The earphones really worked for 2.5 months and then, the right sided one stopped working and works only when there's some magical angle. Quite disappointed.

name: Stephen
title: Great for music not talking
content: Very good sound affect.. however microphone pickup of sound not so good.. party on other end hears u faintly. Good for listening music not for talking.

name: Abhinav
title: Good product with bad experience!
content: Everything is good with sound thing. But the product and the box I got was pre opened, ear piece came out the next while making them off the ears.. Just requested for the replacement!

name: chandra mouli s
title: Got a New replacement from boat after 1 side stopped working
content: I bought this earphone 4 mnths before and now before 2 weeks i had a problem on 1 side of the earphone it was not working. so i registered a complaint in boat support site and i sent a mail too. I succesfully got a new replacement thank you Boat for your convinience customer service.

name: Prashant Mishra
title: Waste of money
content: The earphone was great for first month when I bought it. Going into second month, occasional problems stared like no sound or sound from only one side and the likes. Inti the third month and lo and behold the earphone stopped working altogether. Now, I don't know what to do with it or how to vent my frustration other than to write this review....

name: Pardeep
title: WARNING READ THIS BEFORE BUY
content: Material 9.5/10. Sounds quality 9/10. Bass 10/10. Clarity 9/10. Comfort 9/10 with attach accessories. Packaging 3/10 Boat improve packaging. Noise cancelling 9.6/10. If you're looking for bass 👂 phone then go for it. Any other questions ask me on Instagram. @ipardeepmalhi

name: Afnan Ashraf
title: Bad Quality
content: I bought this one in Aug, then after using for 2 days left earphone was not working. Then i raised a complaint and got it replaced. I got new one after one month and the right earphone of the new one was dead after 1 day of use.

name: Gaurav
title: Very very bad product
content: The earphone stopped working exactly 3 days after the expiration of the return window. Now I cannot even return. Very bad product

name: Tanmoy Halder
title: Perfect bass and awesome pund quality
content: The bass quality is just perfect.. Good balance between bass and treble.. The earbud fits perfectly and does not hurt ears even after 3 hours of continuous use.. The tangle free wire is a big help... Overall worth a buy for every penny spent for bass lovers

name: K.Apoorva
title: Boat
content: I have ordered white color. But I got black color. Please check for the color before dispatching. Other than that everything is fine. I would like to ask for a exchange

name: Parthiban
title: Warranty not done
content: I brought this item last 10 month before but is it in warranty period now my headphones are not working one side speaker and Mike also so i send that item to warranty but i am not getting any reply from company side so this not good for me and iam not satisfied with this...

name: Sathwik sai
title: Only for bass lovers
content: Sound quality overall: 4/5. Bass:4.5/5. Build quality:5/5. Mic quality:5/5. Definitely worth for 499 rupees. I also used ant audio w56 it has good balance between bass, treble and vocals boat225 boosts up bass.. Ant audio w56: 4.7/5. Boat 225: 4/5

name: Jinu George
title: Amazing ones
content: Best headphone I have ever had ... brought one for me and now all of my family have the same ones ... best ones ....

name: sabarish
title: Quanlity at its best!
content: This is the second time I purchased this earphone. First one, I gave to my friend and the second one was missed. So unlucky!. However, the built quality and the noise cancellation is really good at this price.. Ordered my third one. Hope that will last long with me 😂.

name: Abishek Varghese
title: Nothing More,Nothing less!
content: Although it is made of good quality material and sounds above average the durability of the product is not as expected. The ear bud of the left ear seems to be loose than the right ear and comes off sometimes. Simply put its and "Above Average product" ntg more ntg less.

name: Ashutosh Dash
title: BassHead 👍🏻
content: The bass of this IEM(google it) is reasonably high. U've to insert it deep properly for bass. U could let it rest on the pinna for arijit/atif songs to avoid bass. Change equaliser settings for customisation. Use ear bud of your fit(smallest probably)

title: WORST PRODUCT TO BUY AND WASTE MONEY BELIEVE ME
content: One of the worst product ever seen....me and my friend bought this on Jan ...but after few days his earphones one side stopped working but mine stopped working today .....bad product didn't even work properly for a year

name: Unknown
title: "BOAT THE BEAST OF BASS"
content: Awesome purchase from amazon. A must buy product . The sound quality is crystal clear. The bass is outstanding. Really an AUDIO TREAT for all BASS LOVERS 🎧🎶.It feels like sitting in a cinema theater after wearing these headphones. Just go for it .Don't think about reviews on sennheiser ,sony ,jbl etc stuffs .

name: sukanta
title: Quality product and affordable price
content: Value for money, premium product... Never expected to get such quality sound in this affordable price.... Thanks Boat. But the weight of earphones could be little less.

name: Shubham kadu
title: Product get damaged in some days only
content: Headphones are good but it has problem that automatically sound increase and decrease frequently and video pause and play automatically also call get cut whenever i used headphones to call..it changes videos automatically....very frustrating things happening with this product

name: Ashish
title: Poor quality and not useful unable to listen voice
content: Very worst experience head phone is not in working condition. Other person is unable to hear the voice.. Please exchange it. Not exchanged yet

name: Dr. Giridhar kr.
title: Go for it blindly bcoz in back there's a better bench strength i.e. customer service 😀
content: Nice one... Go for it.. They have a gud customer care team.. They replaced my faulty product i.e earphones ,after 3 months with new one.. The gud thing is that,they picked it up from my door and returned it by themselves.. It's hilarious.. Amazing BOAT.

name: ArijitG
title: but without any 2nd thought this one is the best. I really loved it
content: I have used many headphones within this range, but without any 2nd thought this one is the best.. I really loved it. I am able to give only 5 stars as there ia no options to give more.

name: Akshaya
title: Disappointed
content: I already had a replacement for this due to mic issue and I am not able to use any ear buds other than the one that is already fixed with the earphones... Other bids provided are too small that are not fitting... Disappointed

name: Sanjay Chakravarty
title: Nice sound and build quality very good
content: The sound quality is ok. Nothing to complain at this price.

name: AC
title: Uncomfortable. Period.
content: Sound is great. But the earphones are very uncomfortable. They keep falling off and the grid part hurts my ear. I cant use it. Also someone stole it last week and I dont care.

name: Lino James Abraham
title: Outstanding product
content: The sound quality and the product is superb... The durability of the product is also good.. My nephew threw this around and played slipping rope with it but the product didn't face any problems.. Superb!!

name: Bhupendra Singh
title: Waste of money on this product.
content: One side ear piece difunctioned every timre after 5 to 6 months. It is total loss of money. Because it has a price of more than 500 Rupees. Which is not so easy.

name: Maverick
title: Decent, but not great
content: Pros:. Good bass. Overall Decent sound quality.. Cons:. Does not fit well in the ears.it keeps falling off.. tried all the ear buds provided.

name: Abhijit Rout
title: Best Quality Build
content: It's really good.. Sound quality is 9/10. Noise cancellation is 8.5/10. Bass boost is 10/10. Tangle Free cable. Cable quality 10/10. Product lasts longer than your pet dog.. Go for it 🔥

name: Moon
title: Good Product but very heavy
content: Product is good. Sound quality, noise cancellation is very good. But the earpiece seems to be heavy than sony or apple earphones. Due to this heaviness, the earplugs keep slipping from ears

name: Nabeel Yousuf
title: Disappointed.
content: Its only been 5 months and I've been taking care of it like my child. Still it gave up on me. The right earphone is not working. Before you think that i might have kept it tangled always: no. I kept an earphone case for it.. Pathetic reliability. Please don't buy. Seriously.

name: kartik rao
title: Satisfied
content: Yes the problem of the earphones falling off repetly is present, but by putting the attachments provided with the product, the problem is solved. There was also the problem of the sound quality being cheap and tinny but by playing around with the equlizer settings of my phone i was able to fix it. A very awesome product

name: Chetan Sharma
title: Best in this price segment.
content: It's an excellent d product. Sound quality is amazing. You can't listen what is happening outside when you put on these headphones. Best when you are traveling in public transport. But not good when you are doing some work and want to listen & reply to the people around you.

name: Amazon Customer
title: “Good one but not best”
content: One day usage review:. Good quality. Bass is good but not excellent. Earpiece not resting in ear. Call quality is excellent. Packaging is good. Quick delivery by amazon. Overall good purchase

name: Ashish Binjhal
title: Noisy and harsh.
content: Sound quality is not good as mentioned in reviews it's terrible it can harm your ears, damage your eardrums so dont go for this. Amazon basics earphones are better than this.

name: Tamilselvan
title: Not satisfied
content: Bass is too loud and ears getting pained within listening continious third song,though am a bass lover not satisfied with this type loudness sound,remembering old days takai sets,while watching movies this sound effect is irritating,equalizer adjustment too not gives cool smooth tight bass,but recommend for low end sound effect mobile handsets,my result Sennheiser cx 180 street 2 is best and cool for my music and video mood

name: Meet Shah
title: Great Build quality with Nice Sound
content: Very nice product, build quality and wire quality is exteremly very good, sound is also good at this price range. A bass lover music listeners should try this. Tangle free cabel is best for rough use. L shape jack pin will adjust for all devices makes it more secure.

name: Neeraj rawat
title: Great earphone but problem with earbuds.
content: Great sound great Bass. everything is fine with this earphone except it's earbuds. You will feel vaccum in ears and if anyone or you yourself by mistake tmtouch your ear it feel pain in eardrums and can cause serious problem.. in simple it's like imagine if you have earpain and someone touch your ears.

name: CHIRAG JHA
title: Good..!!
content: Good earphones with decent bass, good sound quality, wires are of good quality, metalic earpiece makes the feel premium. I have ordered with case version so the case is also of good quality. Extra eartips and clips are also a good thing. Overall satisfied.

name: Sathish Ariya
title: Music & BASS lovers must buy this product. Hear it also with Dolby ATMOS enabled Mobiles and Media.
content: Worth to buy. Awesome BASS. Very easy to change next song by pressing the buttons twice. Decent mic . Music & BASS lovers must buy this product. Those having inbuilt Dolby ATMOS in mobile can feel & experience the same.

name: Govardhana.K
title: Use Less
content: Not worthy , Ear buds dont fit in , slips always

name: Satyajit
title: Got nonfunctional after about 3 months, I want a replacement.
content: This is the worst quality earphone, it got non functional after using only about 3 months of purchase with very less use even the wire shines still but the product doesnot work I want a replacement.

name: Deepak Raj
title: Ok product.. Mike could have been much better..
content: Music is heard well at lower volume.. as u increase the volume sound appears to shatter.. Mike quality isn't so good... Receiver complaints of disturbance being heard during call.. the product could have been much better.. quite costly for the product provided I suppose..

name: Lord
title: The best product of boat
content: Awesome product and also comes with 1 year replacement policy which is seriously worth to buy this.

name: Ojas Salvi
title: best earphones ever used
content: this review is after 1year 3months of using boat 225 bassheads.....best earphones at 500.....ut survived washing machine hence durability 10/10.....super bass and crystal clear sound.....buying the same again as right side earphone stopped working after 1year 3months

name: wilson varghese
title: Right ear stopped working within 2 months
content: The product has great sound quality...But build quality is not up to the mark... Right earpiece stopped working within 2 months of use... I would suggest bassheads 100 over this . It's much cheaper and better

name: sharad wankhede
title: mind-blowing product
content: I suggest this product to everyone who love music, bass, sound, and everything which is a part of great sound experiance. I'm very much impressed with this product.. I love this ear phone a lot...!!!

name: Mohd shadab
title: Good and main issue
content: Good in listening songs and movie but if you are long time talker then it's not so perfect go for other earphones. THE main issue in this is its heavy weight it drops from ear every time and less soft voice in talking time... Thank you

name: Sandeep Arora
title: Overrated headphones
content: My review on this headphones. Just one word-Overrated.. I am a music lover and have a huge collection of audio devices. After using this i actually realised its just overrated. I recommend people to use jbl or skull candy. There is nothing called bass in this headphone.. Sennheiser or JBL are much better than this shitty thing.. 1 out of 10 marks for this gear

name: Pallabi
title: Should try once
content: It was a good pair. The sound quality was really very good & the bass was also good however the noise cancellation wasn't that good

name: Šhantanu
title: Great Buy
content: The earphones is really great .the design allows u to fit in ur ears comfortably and the extra earbuds also gave and extra opportunities for those whose ear holes are small

name: Kishan kumar
title: Replacement request made.
content: Although Boat provides better quality than others, I received a used product, one of the earbuds can't work.. I didn't expect this from Amazon and Boat.. I had made a replacement request and waiting for so.

name: Karan
title: Pathetic service
content: I have received a defective product. One side of the handsfree is not working even when the outer wire is all fine. Patheric service.. Not at all expected such from amazon company. I need to complaint against the same. #callback ASAP.

name: Jyoti Dipti
title: Value for money
content: Best ear chord as it has tilted inject pin.. Provides best sound quality like skullcandy and JBL. The soft rubber of ear piece gets detached and need improvement.

name: Vishnu Sathyan
title: Perfect for Bass Lovers
content: I just loved the product , I brought it on October 4th 2017. I have been using it roughly without much proper care. But this product has been really good both on bass and quality. Just love this product. BASS LOVER ? Do not think twice. Just go for it . Unlike the regular earphones ,it is tangle free and truly adheres and justifies the name 'Bass Heads".

name: rakesh
title: Ant earphones sucks at higher price point and boat is good for its price
content: Extra bass is good and for comparison I brought ant dual drivers earphones for 999/- and it's definitely disappointing. No good bass compared to to this boat earphones

name: Ajay Rana😘
title: BOAT ⛵ 🔥🔥🔥
content: Sound quality 🔥oxmmmm.. Build 🎧 quality premium.. BOAT.is best brand for earphone.... 💯/💯👌👌

name: Aniket Gawas
title: Just loved it...
content: Wonderful piece from boat at such low price... Using since 6 months with no issues at all... Bass is just awesome.. The performance is almost similar to skull candy at this price.. But this product gets advantage that it has a mic (included in skull candy also) with a switch to receive or hang up the calls as well as to pause or play the music and also to change the tracks..

name: Ramnandhu
title: Good product, but not for Pubg !!
content: It's a very good earphone when concerning bass and sound quality, no doubt in it.. but,. When it's comes to mic, it's not fair enough... While playing pub-g so much of noise problem... Your team should correct this problem.. otherwise it's a good product...

name: Flash
title: Good product.. needs RnD though
content: Good for the price, bought 2 more for my sisisters.. Since metal heads are heavy, kind of annoying when it falls down. Ear buds are large in dia.

name: Subhajit Mandal ....
title: God Earphones!!
content: Good product at this price range.. Using this with my Realme2pro,the sound is really loud and Crystal clear ... Bass is also good !!. Carry ur mini home theater in ur pocket ... Go for it 👍

name: Satish pawar
title: Don't buy
content: Music sounds quality is nice but th earphones is not proper fit to my ear and not for others also again n again I have to adjust the earphones in my ear.. I would not suggest to buy this product

name: Harshal Morankar
title: Worst Now ! Lost 1200 Rs in 2 months
content: Worst Decision ! I order this twice and both the times, very disappointed. 1st time mice gone in 23 days..2nd time 1 side of earphones get crashed. No sound at all.. Boat earlier was superb but now becoming worst day by day. I have lost 1200 Rs. in 2 months. please don't order this product and save money .

name: Rohit Joshi
title: Horrible Mic
content: Mic is horrible. I got lot of complaints regarding unclear voice on the call. Even I cross checked and it is absolutely horrible.. Sound quality is good for this price point.

name: Akshay
title: Good budget earphone under Rs. 600
content: giving 5 stars in terms of music quality, cable quality, 3 stars for ear bud, they are little hard little painful after certain period of time other than that everything works smooth.. Earphone mic quality also good mic button work well to change music track and to receive or disconnect call as well overall happy with product

name: Ankit Mishra
title: Awesome Buy
content: Great Earphone at this price range, Strong and steady build quality, Tangle free flat wire, Good sound quality, Noice cancellation is also working fine but Bass is not as great as highlighted and mentioned on the box ' Super Extraaaaaaaa Bass'.

name: Tushar
title: Does not stay in ears
content: They keep falling out of the ear no matter whichever fit you try. It looks like the weighted area in the middle of the cable does not let it stay in place. Checked with other friends and they have similar complaint

name: Abhishek Maji
title: value for money
content: bass is amazing...Around rs 500 excellent product..value for money..and the carrying case is also very good...u can put the earphones for long time...it will not hurt...most important doesn't tangle due to the flat wire...overall its a beast

name: Anujit s.
title: Connection knob different this time
content: Black one I have order now it's little bit chance at connection compared my old earphone in green . connection different this time just want to know is this genuine product or not?

name: Aamir Syed
title: Good but a bit heavy
content: Good sound quality. But a bit heavy. Don't prefer this if you are looking for light earphones

name: TechnoMan
title: Totally amazing Bass and up to the mark quality
content: Couldn't believe that it can actually deliver Bass, as they are in ear headphones.. But. After using for the first time, I had to believe.. It actually gives superb Bass.. Totally amazing Bass and up to the mark quality.. Worth buying. Trust me.

name: Rohith
title: Price/Quality =Worth
content: Best sound quality in this price range.I prefer it even for gaming.....rather than using my Stereo 7.1 headsets(i bought separate mic)

name: deepa
title: Good voice but earplug design is not useful
content: I did not find the earphones very useful for putting in ears. Other model was useful for me. No issue with sound quality or noise.

name: Midhun Pankaj
title: Exceeded all my expectations.
content: Why isn't anyone talking about these? If you are in a tight budget but still need some bang for the buck audio quality, this is what you need.

name: Akash Awasthi
title: Not working after 16 days of the delivery
content: The earphone is not working properly after 16 days. Sometimes the sound comes lesser in the left earphone as compared to the right one. Unable to exchange it as the exchange window got closed 5 days ago.

name: Namit piriya
title: Good but not for hard use
content: This earphones are good may be 3 months passed and it sounds good some sounds in background sometimes on specific songs .... Good bass but after 1 i stretched the earphone and the mic and the earphone was in two part.. Use it carefully....

name: Kishan
title: Pretty to enhance sound quality for music and gaming
content: Sound quality could have been batter, higher freqency output aren't upto the mark. But above eq preset brings best of it. For music and even gaming. If you're not satisfied with the sound quality you may try this preset, hoping it helps.

name: Shubham
title: Excellent for moderate users
content: I have been using these earphones for more than a year and had no problems at all. The sound quality is excellent and you get the feel of the song. I am a moderate user and hence the weight of the earpiece didn't bother me. A terrific product overall!

name: Pinky P.
title: Not comfortable at all
content: Everything is very good. But the main thing thing is bad that is comfort. It will not fit in your ear properly, it will slip off again and again. And while listening to it, it produces a buz sound.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not fit in ear
content: Loose fit, hence need to hold with hands

name: Rahul
title: otherwise good for hearing music
content: mic is a wastage..every time u have to keep it near to your mouth for speaking..very faint reception quality for mic usage. otherwise good for hearing music, slightly heavy on ears

name: mayank
title: I want replacement
content: I bought it on 26 Nov 2016. Now today is 3 Nov 2017 one side my earphone stopped working and is also not supporting my phone since 18 Oct 2017. But as it still in warrenty can anybody tell me how can I replace it. I didn't expect such a problem get in my way from from boat within a year. I am so disappointed.

name: Arpit Tiwari
title: Value for money headphones.
content: I like the sound specially bass. I recommend poweramp player for android with this headset. I don't like the comfort it provides. For the price its the best you can get. Vocal could have been better.

name: VasanthKumar
title: Good product but not fitting in ear
content: Hi, from a Product quality perspective this is really good to use. However, this doesn't fits comfortably in the ear at all. Have checked with some of my friends who bought the same product and heard the same feedback from them as well...

name: shibu george
title: Value for money
content: It is good for this price range. Sound quality was better than most earphones at this price range. My only issue is that it doesn't stay snug in my ears. A slight pull on the wires by accident or movement will take both the buds out from the ears.

name: Reshma ali
title: Replace product under warranty
content: The earphone starts malfunctioning it's not working properly I want to replace it under the warranty period but could not reach to the boat customer service as if the number is not reachable so please advise

name: KRISHNAKUMAR
title: Value for money
content: Been using it for 3 years , no complaint. At first comfort was an issue as it doesn't stay in my ears. After a while I became it used to it and very much satisfied. There more than enough bass for the price.

name: Santosh Kumar rai
title: Best in class
content: One of the most economical and best quality earphone...go for it without a second thought.bass, sound clarity,noise cancellation are awesome.well build product.Delivered in a very attractive and safe pakage.

name: Saikat Datta
title: Budget headphone but not satisfied
content: Good bass quality, but not crystal clear sound... If you prefer only bass , buy it.... but if you prefer crystal clear sound (not only bass) do not buy this... I recommend everyone to buy samsung EHS64 which is a overall good budget headphone....

name: Tripti Kanojia
title: Good sound but....
content: These earphones have amazing sound quality but these don't stay at all in my ears. I have tried all three sizes of these silicone rubbers that cover the earphones but it doesn't stay.. :(

name: Sanjay S
title: Good Product with a Major Flaw!
content: The looks and the color is good. The sound quality is also great.. However, There is a Major Issue: The ear piece is a bit too heavy and hence they keep falling off your ears. This is very annoying at first, since you always have to pick it up and readjust the position. The weight could have reduced in someway.. Due to the above shortcoming, I may not entirely recommend it.

name: Harmeet
title: Received A fake product
content: Was provided fake productm Stopped working after a week. Boat service center could not replace it as it was a fake product. I have attached the photos comparing the original with the fake

name: Smeet A.
title: Good Buy
content: Sound Quality as expected, very good.. But the fitting isn't good, and the bud starts to fall out of the ear after long usage...bud is heavier than usual.. Also not as durable as other products in the same range.

name: beck
title: Voice echoes
content: The receiver of my call hears echo of his/her own voice. Tried with 4 different phone brands.. Had the headphone replaced and the issue is still there.

name: Karan brar
title: Worth but one ended up up working after 3hrs
content: Earphones really worth their cost and are of awesome build quality. Earwigs and such a number of earbuds with the pack were a good pleasant surprise. But one earpiece stopped working after 3-4hrs of use☹️ waiting for replacement ☹️☹️

name: Shailesh
title: Excellent product
content: Blasting sound quality... Nothing to say more also use Poweramp and subwoofer aap. title: The sound related performance is awesome. If u r the one looking for a ...

Even though it irritates at the begining, we will get used to it later. The sound related performance is awesome. If u r the one looking for a headset with low cost and better quality don't stare ...just book this now.

name: Jordan Dias
title: Best earphones you can get for Rs
content: Best earphones you can get for Rs.550 (met my expectations). Build Quality 10/10.. Audio Quality 9/10.( Depends on the phone output, works great on Dolby Atmos). The earpiece might be little heavy because of metal build, which may feel they are falling off so you gotta keep on adjusting.. But that is well compensated with great Audio and Build Quality.. Delivery was before time and product was well packed.

name: Akshay Tibrewal

title: Buy if u only want good build quality. Sound quality poor.

name: Nithin Bharath

name: BIJOY K.
title: Worth to buy (within a minimum budget)

name: Amazon Customer
title: completely worth the price
content: I got these earphones because my cx180 had stopped working. With the cx180 being one of the best budget earphones, I was prepared to be disappointed but these are really good. They also come with ear hooks and a shirt clip to prevent them from moving around. do be warned that they're a little heavy because of the metal body but you can avoid them falling out of your ears by using a size smaller than your usual ear plugs.

name: Nothing but the TRUTH
title: TOTALLY WORTH IT PRODUCT

Before this earphone, I had original iPhone cords & sennheiser cords but this BoAt bass heads 225 can beat them both ! I totally recommend these earphones.

title: Audio quality is good considering the price

name: dheeraj
title: Wrost Product

Definitely not recommended for gym users. -after 1month of use, one side of the earphone stopped working. - Bass not that good just average. Think before you buy.

Comfortable - 3/5. Accessories - 5/5.. Treble - 4/5.. Middle - 4/5.. Bass - 5/5.. Sound Quality - 4/5.. OverAll - 4/5.

name: SUVORAJ BISWAS
title: awesome purchase

name: Kolkata
title: Simply amazing I love it
content: The best headphones one can buy. Simply amazing

name: Venkatesh
title: Super quality

name: sreejith
title: Bad Design

name: Mohamed Jamal

name: shahul km
title: good noice cancellation
content: As mentioned in its descrption ,bass is exclnt..good noice cancellation.. But we always reduce the phone volume to adjust bass,otherwise we can not hear more than 10 minutes,bcz the sound is heavy ,it iritates our ear...and also the design of headphone very poor,it becomes difficult to hold in our ears...falling frequently...

name: Bondah
title: cheap chinese rejections rebranded
content: products last for less than 1 year, it dosent fit snugly into the socket, very poor sound quality, only one ear get the signal. waste of money

name: Vikas Bhutda 1
title: Not as expected.
content: After 3 months of use the jack is not getting connected properly to my phone and needs to be hold so that proper sound is heard from both earpieces. Otherwise the left earpiece doesn't give output at all.

name: Rishabh Mishra
title: Use medium sized ear buds.....
content: Extraa bass high volume earphones..... Go for it if you like to hear high volume music. Cons.... It doesn't fits in your ear properly. Adjust it according to your ear size by using provided different size ear buds..... Overall..... Great product......

name: Shorya
title: ABSOLUTE BEAST
content: Boat BassHeads 225 under this category is a beast .. with crystal clear volume and heavy bass it is a must have. Put on Heavy bass songs and you'll feel the bass banging 😎 the only drawback is that this beast is not much suitable for calling as bass is very heavy therefore sound problem may come in talking. Everything else is just so perfect 😎

name: abhijit
title: Not good
content: The pair I received has some problem where the sound comes in one pod only. You need to twist and press the jack to make both the pods work. And then even if it does, the slightest touch makes it go back to one pod mode. Just not worth the trouble.

name: Tanmay Chandane
title: Nice budget earphones
content: I guess these are nicest earphones is this budget range. The only thing I've noticed with these earphones is the mike bar (or whatever you call it) it just keeps getting stuck in collar of every dress shirt I wear. And it's damn annoying!

name: PRATIK KHANDELWAL
title: Sony before buying this product by boat I was a bit concerned still went ahead to order this and to my surprise this is one of the finest earphone I have ever had
content: I have been a big fan of music and earphones Basically after using JBL ,Sennheiser, Sony before buying this product by boat I was a bit concerned still went ahead to order this and to my surprise this is one of the finest earphone I have ever had, amazing product from boat, the build quality is amazing, the quality, deep bass , truly worth the money.

name: Lyon Andrade
title: Didn't fit my ears  but i ?
content: If you're ears are small this will fit you well. This didn't fit in my ears so i gave it to my friend ..He uses it for daily use

name: Poulav Biswas
title: Worst service ever, avaerage sound quality
content: After 8 Months of use, one of the earphone is working and the other is not. I called boat service, they said they will pick it up from my home but they are not coming after repeated requests.

name: Rahul chauhan
title: Product is good but poor delivery system
content: The sound quality of product is good but base is OK... Noise cancelation is also good.. But delivery is very poor.... He called me and left the package at shop that shop is 5 km away from my home.... That's type of delivery is not expected my Amazon..

name: Saurav Pandya
title: Want to Feedback

name: siraj ur rehman
title: Not to buy, suddenly stop working one eartip i replaced it one time but but again come same problem
content: I already replaced my boat earphone becoz it has problem of not working one eartip so what the reason of same things happens again... It am not happy with your product.. i suggest to other to not to buy boat products... Really unhappy...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good to Buy
content: Quality of product is awesome . These earphones offer beyond its price .In this price range no earphones are even closer to its comparison and quality...Sound quality and the bass it offers is tremendous. Only issue i experienced is that they are little bulkier to ear.

name: Harsha
title: Not much impressed

name: Aswathy
title: Nice Budget earphones😎😎
content: Its good. ..it's built and sound clarity is good...bass is moderate at low sound..for more bass I have to increase volume with which I'm uncomfortable... Anyways I prefferd boat I over jbl as jbl is very bad when it comes to durability😓...boat has a very reliable warranty..with their own pickup and replacement....

name: Vipul singh
title: Bass is superb!!!
content: Its a fantastic product. I have been used lots of earphones within this price range but it is the best among all them bcoz along with sound quality. It having solid build quality!!!

name: Rakshita
title: Sounds good but stopped working in 5months

name: Amazon Customer
title: Very good at this price point
content: It's like almost Skullcandy in sound quality and something extra in style, build quality and accessories. Overall it's a very decent earphone in 500 segment.

name: S.mujeeb-ur-rehaman
title: Good

name: Kohinoor Acharya
title: If you're under budget then go for it !! Highly recommended

name: Anu Bharadwaj
title: Tangle free, easy to use earphones just right for everyday travel!

name: Dinesh Kumar
title: My earphone not working. Replaced it as it is in 01 year waranty
content: I have buy 02 set of said earphone. 01 speaker of 01 earphone failed and not working. Please return this 01 earphone because it is in 01 year waranty. Thanx.

name: Shridhar.S
title: Worth for money - paisa wasool la jawab product

name: Naveen Phatak
title: Good sound quality.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Nice Product from boAt!

Till date I had sennheiser cx 180, phillips SHE 1405WT, MI, JBL c100 si earphones and personally i feel sennheiser is best and yes this earphone stands next to Sennheiser.

name: Vigneshwaran M

name: Sathishkumar
title: Stopped to work after six months
content: After usuage of six months, one speaker not working. It stopped to working. Simply waste of money.

name: Anup
title: Well not that great not that bad, giving 3 stars based on their service center replacement

name: Dr. Anil Barak

name: Ghani enjoy

name: Jack Sparrow

name: Amazon Customer

name: Guru

name: Himanshi
title: VALUE FOR MONEY

name: Ritesh gupta

Awesome sound with terrible discomfort...if you are taking this for running purpose or watching movie or listening music for long duration please dont go for it...but if you are a light user..its fine..mic is good also...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not Compatible for All Models

name: VINEET Thakur
title: Five Stars

name: Dharmesh Mistry
title: Wrong and low quality product received first time then replace with new one

name: Shekhar
title: Very Nice, Very Happy

name: Anirban
title: Like or dislike

name: Amit Karne
title: Value for money
content: Must buy boat products excellent after sale service

name: Tanmoy
title: Awesome experience with boAt

name: lingaraj
title: Nice earphones, but pack is not a sealed one

name: Amazon Customer
title: BoAt 225 earphone is not good

name: Keerthi N.
title: Nice quality product

name: Christina
title: Amazon is the best
content: Good sound quality and after 11months 1earphone stopped working and it was replaced and I got a new one.. Thank you so much. Fully satisfied with the product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good one

name: george
title: Excellent

name: Amazon Customer

name: Amazon Customer
title: Amazing!

name: Abhijeet

name: Anish Kishor Pardeshi
title: Warranty
content: It has a warranty of 1 year but still by using it in a good manner...one of the earphone has stopped playing sound...really disappointed by this Boat company....

name: akash

name: Kriti Kejriwal
title: In exchange for product damaged within warranty
content: I had purchased this item on 28th August 2019, and from last few days I've been facing trouble with this product as both the earbuds aren't working. I want an exchange for this product as it within the warranty period.

name: Prachidipta Mishra

name: robert t lianmalsawm

name: manjari

Tried reaching to boat support number as there was warranty for one year, which never connected at all. It was of no use buying these ear phones for this cost when they provide such bad quality of not lasting at least two months. Disappointed a lot with the product.

name: Rohit
title: Don't buy waste
content: Don't ever buy boat earphones as it has bad quality mic and also only one service center in whole Delhi Ncr. Also replaced with an old one for my ten days old earphones. No brand just show off. Also you have to call its service center to take complaint number without which you can't visit service center and to contact that number you have to call the whole day as it always shows line busy. So never buy any boat product.

name: sahil j.
title: To much sound disturbance 👎🏻

title: Value for money

name: Lohith
title: I want to get exchange my boat ear phones

name: Narmadha

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not buy again

name: Manisha
title: best buy in this segment

name: Sunil kumar
title: Worth in this price

name: Electrokriti

They too are facing same problem. Within a week of their purchase, mic stopped working. Such an disappointment. Never expected it. I would not recommend anyone to buy it.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Only for music lover

name: Mehboob Shaikh
title: Owsom product

It's really amazing products so i can suggest u to buy without any doubts 😁

name: Harshit
title: Durable product

name: Suhasini Reddy Nalagapati

name: Raj Pandit
title: but its not that much comfortable, and also come out of ear from easily

name: Bdjske Dabsnfdnsn

name: Naveen Goli
title: Good one

name: Sajal Rahman

name: Premson Rodriguez

name: Sumit Jaiswal
title: Good to buy

name: Suvi
title: Good for the Price.

name: Prasad P.
title: Good

name: Amazon Customer
title: Very Poor Quality Earphones
content: The built quality is okish but the earphones are not at all comfortable.. Cannot wear them more than 30min.. Not suitable for running/jogging,poor in ear grip.. Sound quality is not good either.. Suggestion: Better to go for a better brand - sennheiser/sony/phillips/jbl in the same range.

name: BA
title: Good one

name: Amazon Customer

name: ankita pal
title: Do not purchase from boat

name: Avinash

After, 15 days of use the second one also stop working but this time on right side speaker. Throughout working time earphone performed exceptionally well. But no life.
